Aye nyamfo ni bana ba ǝsuǝ Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Oka David eto ufluflu lɛbɔ utsyi , nya David ni ufluflu wǝ lɛbɔ utsyi Abraham eto kafo .
Idu lǝ Abraham ibǝ Oka David ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ antomǝ ba ntǝkǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Abraham léle Isak wǝ léle Yakob wǝ léle
Yuda ku wǝ bayimisani . Yuda ku wǝ usiǝ Tamai léle Perez ku Zera , nya Perez léle Hezron . Hezron léle Aram , nya wuntsya léle Aminadab .
Aminadab léle Naheson wǝ léle Salmon .
Salmon ku Rahab léle Boaz , nya Boaz ku Rut léle Obed . Obed léle Isai ,
nya Isai léle Oka David . Nya idu lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ isu lefe nǝ Babiloniafɔ dítsyi lema lǝ Israel bebi ǝsuǝ nya bǝmuǝ mǝ bésuko mǝ kasɔɔ , mǝ antomǝ ba dítǝkǝ lǝ betsyuǝ ǝsuǝ ni mba lǝǝbǝ mfo nɛ . Oka David ku usio wǝ lídi Uria eto usiǝ wǝ ɔ́lɛ ófo úfii , ále Salomo .
Salomo ále Rehoboam wǝ léle Abiya . Abiya tsya léle Asa ,
nya Asa léle Yosefat . Yosefat léle Yoram wǝ léle Uziya .
Uziya léle Yotam wǝ léle Ahaz wǝ léle Hezekiya wǝ léle Manase .
Manase léle Amon , nya Amon léle Yosiya wǝ léle
Yekoniya ku wǝ bayimisani lǝ Babilonia lɛkɛfe .
Idu lefe nǝ Israel bebi ditsyi Babilonia bǝbǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bále Yesu , mba bále ku mǝ antomǝ eto aye ni mba lǝǝbǝ mfo nɛ . Yekoniya léle Sealtiel wǝ léle Zerubabel wǝ léle
Abihud , nya wuntsya léle Elyakim . Elyakim léle Azur ,
nya Azur léle Sadok wǝ léle Akim wǝ léle Elihud .
Elihud léle Eleazar , nya Eleazar léle Matan , nya wuntsya léle
Yakob wǝ léle Yosef wǝ dífi Maria wǝ léle Yesu wǝ baakpo Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
Itǝ eso idu lǝ Abraham isu Oka David eto lelefe eyifo alefe lefosi ana , nya idu lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ isu lefe nǝ Babiloniafɔ dímuǝ Israel bebi besuko mǝ kasɔ lǝ Babiloniaa , eyifo alefe lefosi ana . Nya isi idu lefe nǝmfó ibǝ lefe nǝ bále Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , eyifo alefe lefosi ana .
Nnyǝ mǝ ɛyɛ fɛ bále Yesu Kristo . Bátɔ Maria bǝtǝ Yosef , tsya fɛ bookpa wǝǝ , Maria ǝnyǝ nkǝ ufi ɔlɛ kafo . Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale dítǝ íbǝ itǝ nko .
Yosef eyifo utidi sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ se wóanla nkǝ woakpo Maria eto ǝnǝmi kasɔ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto ǝnǝmi esoo , úbu disi nkǝ lǝ oyani wǝ kpoo kalɔkalɔ .
Lefe nǝ úfi nsusu bomfoo , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ lǝ kola kǝmiǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Yosef , Oka David eto kafo eto ubi , mante sikpi ku fǝ usiǝ Maria bokpa kesuko fǝ ɔflɔ . Itsyise kafo ka ɔnlɛ mfoo , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ itsyi .
Nya woole ubisaibi . Nya fǝ Yosef luutǝkǝ wǝ diye fǝ Yesu , itsyise wǝ ni nwǝ luulǝkǝ wǝ betidi utsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ lǝ Maria ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ nkǝ yuubǝ itǝ sitinti . Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Kebitɛ kǝtsyuǝ ka lenyi osani ǝbɔlɛ kafo nya woole ubisaibi . Nya betidi lookpo wǝ bǝnkǝ Imanuel . ” Nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ Onanto si ko bo .
Lǝ nyaso se Yosef lésanklii , ókpa Maria , úyifo wǝ usiǝ fe kase Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ .
Fɛɛ Yosef ku Maria mánte bǝtsyuǝ fe usǝ ku usiǝ isu ese lefe nǝ óle wǝ ubisaibi ǝmǝ . Nya Yosef dítǝkǝ wǝ diye nkǝ Yesu .
Bále Yesu lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Betlehem lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Oka Herodes díkedi seka lǝ ke ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , babesibe bǝtsyuǝ ba léte asa ɛyɛ lǝ olalɛlɛ befandebi eto ǝtsyǝbi ǝsuǝ etsyi kofekatokɔ bǝbǝ Yerusalem .
Nya bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti bále ubi wǝ luudi Yudafɔ eto oka ǝmǝ ? Búnyǝ wǝ sefandebi lǝ kofekatokɔ . Nya búbǝ boǝ boesumu wǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ Oka Herodes lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , difufu ǝmuǝ wǝ ku betidi ba kenke lɛkɛ lǝ Yerusalem mfó .
Nyaso ókpadi Onanto eto besunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Sieti boole Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ? ”
Mfó nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Betlehem lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ , itsyise nko Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni útsyǝ nkǝ ,
‘ Fǝ Betlehem lǝ Yuda eto kasɔ , emenyifo ɔkɛkɛ lǝ Yuda eto kǝmǝnkplɛ nti . Itsyise lǝ fǝǝ , nya nwǝ luudi ɔtɔnkotɔnko wǝ lɔɔyɛnko mɔ betidi Israelfɔɔ , lɔɔbɔ utsyi nɛ . ’ ”
Nyaso Oka Herodes ákpadi bafɔ ba dítsyi kofekatokɔ bamǝ bǝbǝ mfó nya ókpe disi ku mǝ kabiɔ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ ɔ́nɔ lefe nǝ tutuutu sefandebi siamǝ lɛbɔ bǝnyǝ .
Mfó fɛ útǝ mǝ kusu nya bédu bésu Betlehem . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu lǝ bisu bɛbɛbɛ dikpefi nǝmǝ kukɔnɔ . Nya lǝ binyǝ wǝǝ , lǝ bisinkli bibǝ bɛtɛyi mɛ , bǝ lǝ mintsya lǝ nsu nsumu wǝ . ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , bafɔ bamǝ áyifɛ kusu bédu . Nya se bántɔɔ , besi bǝnyǝ sefandebi siamǝ fe nsia bǝnyǝ lǝ kofekatokɔ mfó ke . Nya se bǝnyǝ see , bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti . Sefandebi siamǝ áyɛnko mǝ sisu síńyǝ lǝ kaka ubi ǝmǝ nlabe .

Nya se bédufǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya bǝnyǝ ubi ǝmǝ ku wǝ ambe Mariaa , báse akonki nya básumu wǝ . Nya basini mǝ kabɔtɔ nya bǝtǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya lefo koya , nnya ni sika ku lufui ku uyudu .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ óte mǝ lǝ kola kǝmiǝ nkǝ bénsisinkli bayɛ Oka Herodes ɔflɔ . Nyaso báyɛ kusu bamba bésinkli bésu mǝ kasɔ .
Se babesibe bamǝ dísinkli bédu eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Yosef lǝ kola kǝmiǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oka Herodes ebutǝ nkǝ bati dikpefi nǝmǝ kama lǝ balo wǝ . Nyaso taka , lǝ etsyetsyiko dikpefi nǝmǝ ku ni ambe esuko Egipte eto kasɔ . Bisiǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ mɔɔtɛyi fǝ minkǝ bisinkli bibǝ . ”
Ketsye kamfoo , Yosef átaka úfi ubi ǝmǝ ku wǝ ambe útsyetsyiko bésu Egipte eto kasɔ .
Nya bǝsiǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ Oka Herodes díkpǝ . Kase bákɛ mfó ǝbǝ itǝ lǝ asa nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bɛnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Egipte kee , mínkpadi mɔ ubi míntsyiko . ”
Lefe nǝ Oka Herodes dínyǝ nkǝ bafɔ ba dítsyi kofekatokɔ mfó áwɛ wǝ bákpee , kafo ányi wǝ tinti . Nyaso útǝ nkǝ wǝ bamamanyǝ su Betlehem ku kaka letsyilama mfó kenke lǝ balo bebisaibi ba díkafo alɛ ǝnuǝ ku ibǝ kasɔ lǝ kase bafɔ bamǝ léte lefe nǝ sefandebi siamǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ séte .
Mmǝ ibǝ bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yeremiya eto lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝǝ , ǝbǝ itǝ nko sitinti , nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Bánɔ bofa butsyuǝ lǝ Rama ini kekuwiwi ku kaminsǝ eto kɔsɔ kekleke . Rahel lɛ keku buwi itǝ wǝ bebi . Nya ɔnnlɛ bɔtɔnɔ nkǝ bammansǝ wǝ lɛkɔ , itsyise bebi bamǝ ǝkpǝ eso . ”
Se Oka Herodes díkpǝ eto kamaa , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Yosef lǝ kola kǝmiǝ lǝ Egipte .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka , lǝ efi ubi ǝmǝ ku wǝ ambe lǝ bisinkli bisu Israel eto kasɔ , itsyise mba léla bǝ baalo ubi ǝmǝ ébukpǝ . ”
Lǝ nyaso Yosef átaka nya ókpa dikpefi nǝmǝ ku ni ambe nya bédu bésu Israel eto kasɔ .
Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Yosef lɛnɔ nkǝ Arkelao , wǝ ni Oka Herodes eto ubi , béfi bǝtsyǝ seka lǝ Yudea lǝ wǝ anto eto kɛnyɛɛ , óte sikpi ku mfó busu . Nya se Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ díkǝ wǝ ato lǝ kola kǝmiǝ nkǝ wensu mfoó , ófloma kusu údu úsu Galilea eto lɛkpɔ mfo .
Nya se úsu mfoó , úsu úsiǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Nasaret . Nya mǝ eto mfó busiǝ ǝtǝ bǝ Onanto eto Bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ditiki nǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ , “ Bookpo wǝ bǝ Nasaretnyǝ , ” ǝbǝ ítǝ sitinti .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ésu mfiminti lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ , nya útsyiko letsya bobe katɛyi
nkǝ , “ Bítsyi mi akɔɛsi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ , itsyise Onanto eto Sekadidi eboyo selo . ”
Yohanes ǝmfo ni utidi wǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛtɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi utsyuǝ lɛ bofa bembembe lǝ mfiminti katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bɛlɔ Bonamute eto kusu bitsyǝ . Bɛtsyɔnsǝ wǝ kusu bitsyǝ itǝ wǝ bɔyɛ ! ’ ”
Nya awu nnya Yohanes lékpee , ɔtɔmini ku lekoko eto bise béfi bédi nnya . Nya úfi kubukikue eto abɔsu ókle nkɛ . Nya wǝ didisa dídi bekpǝsǝ ku bablɔ .
Nya betidi dítsyi Yerusalem eto umǝ ku Yudea eto kasɔ ku Yordan eto Ketu eto lekpake mfó kenke bǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Bǝlǝkǝ mǝ asa bua kasɔ nya úflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ Yordan eto ketu kafo .
Se Yohanes dínyǝ Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ kpǝ ba díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ uflǝsǝ mǝ ntuu , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi mba nte fe bawa eto befluflu ! Owoe lɛlɛ mi kɔlɛ nkǝ bitsyetsyi lǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ko nlɛ bubǝ eto kɛnyɛ ?
Beté lǝ mi eyifosa ǝsuǝ biǝnkǝ bɛtsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ .
Nya biembu biǝ se ini Abraham eto befluflu bini esoo , Onanto embunǝ mi koto . Bɛlɔ bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto ebofo befluflu bulǝkǝ ketsyiko aba nyamfo ǝsuǝ kǝtǝ Abraham .
“ Bebe se banlɛ kefiebi bǝńyǝ bǝ baala eyi nyamǝ taa keyudu ke . Kuyi saa ko laanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , boola ko befi bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝ .
“ Mɔɔ , ntu mǝǝflǝsǝ mi nnya nlɛ bote bǝ bɛtsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nwǝ ntǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , wǝ ebufi Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ku ute uflǝsǝ mi ntu . Ɔmɔ oso mɛ , nya mǝnńyǝ ntǝ bǝ nyifo wǝ keyifo kulaa tsya .
Utsyi wǝ kɔfɛ ko wuufi ɔflɛ wǝ kamɔ ulǝkǝ kofo fɛ lǝ ufi ke okpo lǝ unwu . Fɛɛ kofo ko luubuu , wootonsǝ ko lǝ utǝ wǝ laanni kulefe kulefe , kǝmiǝ ! ”
Lefe nǝmfoó , Yesu etsyi Galilea eto kasɔ úbǝ Yohanes ɔflɔ lǝ Yordan eto Ketu nkǝ lǝ Yohanes lǝ uflǝsǝ wǝ ntu .
Fɛɛ se Yohanes mánla nkǝ lǝ uflǝsǝ Yesu ntu esoo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bomu ele bǝ mbǝ fǝ ɔflɔ , nya inni fǝ ele bǝ bǝ mɔ ɔflɔ fǝ mflǝsǝ fǝ ntu . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝǝ , tɔnɔ lǝ eyifo nnya nko te mɔmɔ . Itsyise nko fɛ yuutǝ buyifo lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto lelabi nɛ . ” Nyaso Yohanes átɔnɔ útǝ wǝ .
Nya se Yohanes díflǝsǝ Yesu ntu ólosǝ koo , ɔ́bɔ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ , nya mfó ǝmǝ kato léna nwaa nya úńyǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nlɛ bɔyifǝ kǝbǝ kasɔ fe lɛblɛkpa seka díbǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya bánɔ ɔkɔɛ dítsyi kato ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝmfo ni mɔ Ubi Lala wǝ mankeko , wǝ eto asa leedufǝ mɛ ǝnǝ tinti nɛ . ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ákpa Yesu dísuko mfiminti bǝ lǝ Obonsam lǝ oto wǝ obe .
Nya se Yesu lékle kɛnyɛ itǝ eyifosi anaa , kukpɛnsɛ álɛ wǝ .
Mfó nya olontidi ǝmǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto eto Ubi fenii , tɛyi abambi nyamfo lǝ efiani didisa . ”
Mfó Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Inni didisa mate lǝǝntǝ utidi nkpǝ . Bomu ditiki saa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ , ni lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ sitinti nɛ . ’ ”
Mfó nya Obonsam ǝmǝ lékpa Yesu úsuko Yerusalem , Umǝ Kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ . Nya úfi wǝ úsu útǝkǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo eto kaka nso botaka eto disinti .
Mfó ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto Kosate eto Ubi fenii , sa ǝbǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ kasɔ . Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebotsyese wǝ batɔnkpe nkǝ bakɔbe fǝ lǝ ani bǝ lǝ fǝ kokpa lǝ kɔyɛ butusǝ lǝ abambi ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fɛɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue komǝ ke lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Manto fǝ Onamute Onanto abe . ’ ”
Mfó nya Obansam ǝmǝ lékpa Yesu úsuko kɔtini ko letaka eto disinti nya óte wǝ kawunsiǝ eto sekakedikɔ kenke ku ke diyǝnde .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Muufi asa nnyamfo kenke ntǝ fǝ , lǝ ebose akonki esumu mɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Satana , du mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ ! Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ Onamute Onanto hã ele bǝ se akonki ǝtǝ , esumu . ’ ”
Mfó nya Obonsam dídu lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ , nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe díbǝ bawunsǝ ko wǝ .
Se Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes béti bákpe lǝ diyoo , údu úsu Galilea .
Wǝnsiǝ lǝ Nasaret , bomu údu úsu úsiǝ lǝ Kapernaum , ni umǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ Galilea eto Ditumbu kplɛ ɔflɔ lǝ Sebulon ku Naftali eto lekpake mfó .
Úsiǝ mfo nya Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto kɛnyɛ ka ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ díbǝ kǝtǝ nkǝ ,
“ Sebulon eto kasɔ ku Naftali eto kasɔ eto betidi ba nkpǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ , lǝ lekpo eto kusu ɔflɔ lǝ Yordan eto Ketu eto ditukpenkpe nǝ nse lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ kaka betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ luunyǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ! Nya mba nkpe lǝ ukpǝ eto bulǝ kǝmiǝ , Onanto eto diyǝnde ebuyǝnde lekpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”

Ídu lǝ lefe nǝmfó Yesu étsyiko letsya bobe katɛyi nkǝ , “ Bisinkli lǝ mi abua kama itsyise Onanto eto Sekadidi ebɔfi . ”
Nya se Yesu lɛyɛ lǝ Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ bayimisani inuǝ ba ni mba laata asabu . Mǝ ni Simon wǝ baakpo Petro ku wǝ ɔyimisani Andrea ba díkata asabu lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bitǝkǝko mɛ , idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , moote mi kase biulǝkǝ betidi bitǝ Onanto . ”
Mfó báyani mǝ asabu bǝtsyǝ nya bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bédu .
Nya se ɔ́yɛ sɛkɛ úsu sɛtɔɔ , usi únyǝ bayimisani inuǝ ba baakpo Yakobo ku Yohanes ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi . Mǝ ku mǝ anto Sebedeo ǝmǝ ákɛ lǝ ɔklɔ kafo bákalɔ mǝ asabu fɛ Yesu lékpadi mǝ .
Lamfolamfoo , báyani mǝ anto ku ɔklɔ ǝmǝ bǝtsyǝ nya bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bédu .
Yesu áyɛ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ kenke nya óte asa lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ . Nya óbe Onanto eto Sekadidi eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya . Nya ótsya betidi ba efimbi ate ate nlɛ bulǝ kenke .
Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ wǝ diye ku ditiki nǝmǝ áyɛ éfia Siria eto kasɔ kenke . Nyaso betidi ákpa mǝ befimfi ba efimbi ate ate nlɛ bulǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Mǝ bǝtsyuǝǝ , awɔnɔ bua dísiǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kakpe mǝ bulǝ . Bǝtsyuǝ kǝkpǝkasankli eto bufi díkǝlǝ nya bǝtsyuǝǝ , ani ku akpa díkpǝ mǝ . Yesu átsya mǝmblɛ kenke .
Sitiditu kplɛ sia ditsyi Galilea eto kasɔ ku Kǝmǝ Lefosi ka nkpe mfó ku Yerusalem ku Yudea eto kasɔ ku nsɔ bo nkpe lǝ Yordan eto Ketu eto lekpake nǝ nse ǝbǝ bǝtǝkǝ ko wǝ .
Se Yesu dínyǝ sitiditu sia dítǝkǝko wǝǝ , óbe úsu kɔtini kato nya úsiǝ kasɔ . Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya útsyiko mǝ asa bote nkǝ ,
“ Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba nyi bǝ beyifo bakombo lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo mǝ sele .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba leewi kaminsǝku . Mǝ Onanto loomansǝ lɛkɔ nɛ .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ . Mǝǝ ni mba luudi sɛkplɛ lǝ kasɔ kamfo eto bikǝ ǝsuǝ .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba laakplatsya keklekle bǝ bǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Mǝ ni mba luunyǝ asa nnya luuyuǝsǝ mǝ kafo nɛ .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba lǝǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ kaminsǝ . Onanto ebunyǝ mǝ kaminsǝ .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba eto ketu lekpa kɛnkɛ . Mǝ luunyǝ Onanto nɛ .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba laalɔ bǝtsyuǝ nti kaboko diyuǝ . Onanto ebokpo mǝ wǝ bebi tinti .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba eto kama baati kate ohiã se bensi nkpǝ sɛɛ ekeyifo lǝ Onanto lelabi ǝsuǝ eso . Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo mǝ sele .
“ Onanto ákpo mi atsyɔ lǝ betidi aaka mi , kate mi ohiã nya baatɛyi bidia saa lǝ mi ǝsuǝ se bitǝkǝko mɛ eso .
Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ beto keyudu , itsyise mi kayofofo fui lǝ Onanto eto kato . Nko ke ete báte Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba lɛtɔ mi sɛtɔ ohiã nɛ .
“ Bite fe mmba bitǝ betidi ba kenke . Fɛɛ lǝ kamini ábɔ lǝ mmba bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝnsiǝmbofo kamini bokpe lǝ mu bio . Nya se bunsibǝ kutǝkǝ saa esoo , buwui hã ele bǝ befi mu bewui lǝ betidi lǝ bayɛ lǝ mu ǝsuǝ bafe .
“ Biyifo fe diyǝnde bitǝ kawunsiǝ kenke . Umǝ wǝ bála bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝǝ , ambiɔ .
Kuutsyuǝ saa anto okandiɛ kefi asa keti wǝ . Bomu bufi beefi wǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kǝtǝkǝkɔ ǝsuǝ kaka wuutǝ diyǝnde utsyuǝ saa wǝ nkpe lǝ diyo nǝmǝ .
Nko ke ele bǝ mi okandiɛ yǝnde utǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ nɛ . Bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ asa sɛɛ nnya bieyifo lǝ befi atɛsǝ bǝtǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Biembu biǝ mbǝ miǝ maninsǝ Moses eto afi nnya ókpe , nye Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi léte . Mǝmbǝ miǝ maaninsǝ nnya kon . Bomu mbǝ miǝ lǝ mbǝ mflɔsǝ nnya .
Nya nla miǝ bete sitinti minkǝ , lǝ kase kato ku kasɔ nsi nkpee , kulesa saa embɔbɔ lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ lesa saa luubǝ elo .
Lǝ nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ ataka uńyǝ lǝ kɔfi komǝ eto lesa sɛkɛ ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nya ote betidi bamba nkǝ mǝ tsya yifo nkoo , boofi wǝ fe ɔfɛfɛ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ke luuyifo lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ nya woote betidi bamba tsya nkǝ beyifo nkoo , boofi wǝ fe ɔkplɛnyǝ tinti lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi wuee minkǝ , fɛ biofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufǝǝ , ele bǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi bo lɛlɛkɛ bonso kase kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ kulaa tsya nsi .
“ Kɔɔ bɛnɔ bátɛyi betidi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Manlo utidi . ’ Nya utidi wǝ leeyifo nkoo , ele bǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo .
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , mɔ lɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke luunyǝ ɔblɔ lǝ wǝ ɔyimi ǝsuǝǝ , bookponko wǝ lekpo . Nya utidi wǝ tsya lɔɔtɛyi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Eyifo utidi bimbaa , ’ bookpa wǝ besuko beninǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Nya utidi wǝ lɔɔtɛyi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Eyifo ubukii , ’ Onanto ebunǝ wǝ koto lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ .
Nyaso lǝ ibǝ bǝ efi fǝ ǝtǝsa atɔnko lǝ Onanto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝǝ , nya fakloma fǝ lesatsyuǝ kpe lǝ fǝ ku fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lenti ,
yani fǝ kedi kamǝ ǝtsyǝ lǝ Disumuyo mfó lǝ esu lǝ fonko fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lǝ bekpo ntu lǝ bǝtsyuǝ nti fɛ lǝ efi fǝ kedi kamǝ esu ǝtǝ Onanto .
“ Lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ weefi fǝ usuko kɔfi ɔflɔɔ , bɛbɛ lefe lǝ fonko wǝ lǝ bɛlɔ bǝtsyuǝ nti . Lenni nkoo , lǝ fonko wǝ esu lekpo etii , utidi ǝmfo ebufi fǝ okpe lǝ okponkpo eto ani . Nya wuntsya luufi fǝ okpe mba lɛmuǝ betidi eto ani nya bookpe fǝ lǝ diyo .
Nya nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi kasini minkǝ ebɔkɛ lǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ foofo kayo ka fensi alosǝ .
“ Bɛnɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Yanle bǝ bǝsǝ ku bǝsiǝ fe bǝtsyuǝ kama . ’
Fɛɛ mɔ lɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ utsyuǝ saa kee loobe usionko nya wɔɔkɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛɛ , ókpo wǝ lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ koko .
Nyaso lǝ fǝ kodiani eto dinǝmi ǝǝtǝ nkǝ dufǝ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝǝ , lǝkǝ ni ato akpe . Ɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ bǝ nyansǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ enso bǝ befi fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke bato bakpe lǝ utemanlo kǝmiǝ .
Nya lǝ fǝ kodiani ǝǝtǝ fǝǝyifo lebuaa , la ko ato akpe . Ɛlɛkǝ itǝ fǝ eso bǝ nyansǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa lɔni enso bǝ fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke dufǝ lǝ utemanlo kǝmiǝ .
“ Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Utsyuǝ saa ke lɔɔni wǝ usiǝǝ , ele bǝ utǝ wǝ kukue nkǝ ɔ́ni wǝ . ’
Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lǝ osani utsyuǝ áni wǝ usiǝ , nya yanyɛ lǝ disenkpo ǝsuǝ esoo , osani ǝmǝ dítǝ usio ǝmǝ lekpo kusǝ . Nya dimanyɛ lǝ osani wǝ ke luufi usio ǝmǝ tsya ákpo kusiǝ .
“ Kɔɔ bɛnɔ tsya bátɛyi betidi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mankpadi asa esi etudi kɛnyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Bomu yifo lǝ ntamu bo faka fǝtǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ . ’
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ mankpadi asa ǝtsyǝ kɛnyɛ saa . Mankpadi asa nnya nkpe kato itsyise Onanto eto lekankpomɛ ni mfó .
Mankpadi asa nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ tsya itsyise Onanto eto akpa eto kǝtǝkɔ ini . Nya mankpadi Yerusalem , itsyise mfó ni baka eto Oka wǝ ni Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto umǝ nɛ .
Mankpadi fǝ disi tsya itsyise ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale foofo fǝ disi eto sɛwɔni eto lɛ ɔni buyifo uflubi lee ona .
Tǝ lǝ mi ee lǝ iyifo ee , nya lǝ mi oowo lǝ iyifo oowo ete . Lesa bamba sa enso nyamfo eto bɔtɛyii , etsyi lǝ olontidi ǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
“ Bɛnɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bafo dinǝmi lǝ dinǝmi eto kɛnyɛ , nya lɛnyi lǝ lɛnyi eto kɛnyɛ . ’
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , mɔ lɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , mantisǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto kabua ka úyifo eto oko . Lǝ utsyuǝ ásɔ fǝ lǝ kodianitosii , tsyi nkonse tsya ǝtǝ wǝ .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woasama fǝ lǝ ofo fǝ awu katoo , wuninsǝ fǝ kafia tsya ǝtǝ wǝ .
Nko ke lǝ ǝsuǝalenyǝ eto utsyuǝ anyikǝ fǝ okpe nkǝ tsyi wǝ bikǝ lǝ bɛyɛ disunkpo lɔnii , yɛnko wǝ nnya ǝnuǝ .
Lǝ utsyuǝ atɔ fǝ lesatsyuǝ , fi ni ǝtǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ utsyuǝ tsya atɔ nkǝ dia lesa ǝtǝ wǝ , dia ni ǝtǝ wǝ .
“ Bɛnɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ La fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ lǝ ekisi fǝ olo ! ’
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bela mi balo lǝ beto ola lǝ mba leekisi mi eto disi .
Bǝ lǝ befiani Onanto wǝ nkpe kato eto bebi tinti . Itsyise wǝ lǝǝtǝ kofe laafa kǝtǝ betidi bua ku mba leeyifo kasɛɛ kenke tsyɛtsyɛɛtsyɛ . Nya ɔsɔmi tsya laani kǝtǝ betidi ba leeyifo kasɛɛ ku mba leenyifo kasɛɛ ta .
Lǝ betidi ba laala mi ete mi tsya laalaa , nte kayofofo ka Onanto luutǝ mi . Nko ke te mba laafo umǝnko kula tsya leeyifo nɛ .
Nya lǝ mi bayɛtsyuǝ mate ete biǝsiǝsǝǝ , nyalɛ bienyifo tɔ kulesa nǝ eto ani ele bǝ basɔ mi . Mamfokanɔfɔ tsya eyifo nko ke .
Bomuu , bɛflɔ fe kase mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato lɛflɔ seka .
“ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ bienyifo kesumu eto kasɛɛ ka ele bǝ biyifo bilǝkǝ bete lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ . Itsyise lǝ biyifo nkoo , biensiembunyǝ kayofofo saa itsyi lǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato ɔflɔ .
Nyaso lǝ ǝtǝ okombo utsyuǝ lesatsyuǝǝ , mambe nya letsya lǝ betidi lǝ banɔ fe kase ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi leeyifo lǝ ntsyakɔ ku lǝ umǝ eto kabia . Beeyifo nko bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ batɛsǝ mǝ . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ boonyǝ mǝ kayofofo koko .
Nyaso fǝǝ , lǝ awunsǝko okomboo , yifo nko bǝ fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ kulaa tsya embote lesa nǝ feyifo .
Itǝ bǝ iyifo abiɔnsa nya kuutsyuǝ saa lembunyǝ enso fǝ Anto Onanto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ asanyata , bǝ lǝ ofo fǝ nya kayo .
“ Lǝ bɛlɛ ola botoo , bienyifo fe kase ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi leeyifo . Baala buńyǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kalakatokɔ ku lǝ obia bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ unyǝ mǝ . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , boofo mǝ kayofofo saa koko .
Fɛɛ lǝ alɛ ola botoo , dufǝ lǝ fǝ diyo kǝmiǝ lǝ eti siku lǝ ato ola ǝtǝ fǝ Anto wǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝǝnnyǝ . Nya fǝ Anto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ fǝ eyifosa kulakula saa , ebofo fǝ nya kayo .
“ Lǝ bɛlɛ ola botoo , biendi etiki kpenkpenkpe katɛyi , kalɔ bɔtɛyi fe kase bamamonyǝ leeyifo . Beebu bǝ lǝ batɛyi etiki kpenkpenkpee , nya mǝ bǝfiǝ loofo mǝ olatoto nɛ .
Bienyifo fe mǝ , itsyise Mi Anto Onanto yi asa nnya behiã fɛ biatɔ wǝ .
Nyaso nnyǝ mmǝ ele bǝ beto ola , ‘ Boanto wǝ nkpe kato , tǝ lǝ bakpasǝ fǝ diye .
Fǝ sekakedidi lǝ sibǝ . Beyifo lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo fe kase inte kato .
Tǝ bo bo mmi eto didisa .
Fi bo abua atsyɛ bo fe kase bo tsya leefi katsyɛ mba laata bo kebu .
Mǝntǝ lǝ budufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ , lǝǝlǝkǝ bo etsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . Itsyi sekadidi ku ǝsuǝale ku diyǝnde eyifo fǝ ale lefe saa . Ibǝ itǝ . ’
“ Nya lǝ bifi mi bǝtsyuǝ eto botakebu bɛtsyɛ mǝǝ , mi Anto Onanto tsya ebufi mi ale tsya ɔtsyɛ mi .
Fɛɛ lǝ biemfi mi bǝtsyuǝ eto botakebu bɛtsyɛ mǝǝ , mi Anto Onanto tsya embufi mi botakebu ɔtsyɛ mi .
“ Nya lǝ békle kɛnyɛɛ , mǝnyǝnkisǝ ǝnǝmi eyifo fe kase ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi leeyifo seka . Beenyǝnkisǝ ǝnǝmi sekasitsyuǝ bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa luunyǝ mǝ nkǝ balɛ kɛnyɛ bokle . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi wuee minkǝ boofo mǝ kayofofo saa bálosǝ .
Lǝ bɛlɛ kɛnyɛ bokle nɛ , biflǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ besadi disi .
Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ betidi embote bǝnkǝ bɛlɛ kɛnyɛ bokle . Bomu bǝ lǝ mi Anto wǝ boǝnnyǝ hã lǝ ote . Bǝ lǝ mi Anto wǝ lǝǝnyǝ lesa saa , lǝ ofo mi nya kayo .
“ Bianlɔ ǝsuǝ eto bikǝ bitsyǝ lǝ kasɔ kamfo , kaka balɛ ku kosansa laabiasǝ bikǝ nya beyu tsya laaba biku kedufǝ ayo keyu mi .
Bomu bɛlɔ mi bikǝ bitsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto . Mfoo , balɛ embobiasǝ mi nye beto kosonsa nya beyu tsya lemboba siku beyu mi .
Itsyise kaka fǝ bikǝ bia lefo koya ntee , mfo fuufi fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝtǝkǝ nɛ .
“ Ǝnǝmi eyifo fe okandiɛ itǝ utidi . Lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi alɛkɛɛ , fǝ ǝsuǝ kenke ebokpa fe okandiɛ .
Fɛɛ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi annlɔ kǝnyǝǝ , fǝ utidi eto umu ǝmǝ kenke ebɔkɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Nyaso lǝ diyǝnde nǝ nkpe lǝ fǝ afiani ketuntuu , fǝ ketuntu kamǝ ebɔkɛ ale tinti .
“ Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo banamute inuǝ busumu . Woola ɔni , ukisi unuǝfǝ . Uutsyue ɔni koto nya wɔɔni unuǝfǝ . Ǝmbofo Onanto ku atabi bɔkɔ kesumu .
Nyamfo eso minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bianso mi nsusu bufi kǝtǝkǝ lǝ lesa nǝ biudi nye biunǝ nye asa nnya biɔlɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise nkpǝ afo koya eso didisa . Nya ǝsuǝ eto uyi tsya lefo koya eso asa nnya biɔlɛ .
Bebe baklɔbɛ , baamfo kakuɛ nya bǝmlǝkǝ edisa nye eyibibi kǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kewũ , fɛɛ mi Anto Onanto aabe mǝ ! Nya ntsyǝ fǝ woombobe mi enso mǝ , lefe nǝ eto lefe befo koya benso mǝ .
Nya mi utsyuǝ ebofo nkpǝ busiǝ diyi lɔni kasonsǝ kaso kase elee , lǝ ufi nya okpe lǝ wǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ kekleke nko ?
“ Bibu bebe kase dituwinimi lǝ dimǝ laanɔ bobee . Kaanta olokotutu nya keendi kafia kefi keti ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Oka Salomo kulaa tsya lǝ wǝ kɔlɔkɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , mánnɔ bobe fe dituwinimi nǝ lǝǝmǝ mfó .
Lǝ nko Onanto lǝǝtǝ sefa kɔlɔkɔ komfo eto oklee , sefa sia lǝǝńyǝ mmi ete nya kǝsiǝsǝ ete baala se kato kakpé lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝǝ , ntsyǝ Onanto lembutǝ bo alɛsa kpǝ enso sefa eto ale ? Ntsyǝ wǝmbutǝ mi kɔlɔkɔ enso ? Bimbǝ bofokanɔ kpǝ !
“ Lǝ nyaso biensisiǝ bikebu disi katɔ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Sieti buunyǝ lesaatsyuǝ budi nye lesaatsyuǝ bunǝ nye lesaatsyuǝ bɔlɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ ? ’
Asa nyamfo eyifo asa nnya bamamonyǝ lǝǝsiǝ kebu disi ketsyiko . Mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato yi nkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebohiã mi .
Bomu bitǝ lǝ mi abɛbɛsa tutɛ lǝ idi kase Onanto luudi seka lǝ mi ǝsuǝ le befiani basɛɛ . Nya wuufi asa bamba nya kenke loofe itǝ mi tsya , utǝ mi .
Nyaso biǝnsiǝ bikebu disi itsyi lǝ kusɛ ko nlɛ bubǝ ǝsuǝ . Diyi nǝmfó tsya ebubǝ ku ni bulǝ . Yanle bǝ bufi bulǝ bamba bokpe lǝ mi eto bole ǝsuǝ .
“ Mankponko betidi bamba lekpo bǝ lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ɔyɛ fǝ lekpo bokponko .
Kase faaklá asa yeeyi kaba kakpo kǝtǝ utidii , nko ke eto okle Onanto looklá utǝ fintsya nɛ !
“ Ntsyǝ fɛ fanlɛ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto dinǝmi bobe fɛ fannlɛ dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ léle bunyǝ ?
Ntsyǝ fɛ foofo fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , ‘ Lekpakpa , tǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi , ’ se dikubi kplɛ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ kosate eto lele ǝsuǝ ?
Fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto utidi ! Ka dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi bulǝkǝ fɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ kusu ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto lele kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ wǝ lǝ dinǝmi .
“ Biemfi asa nnya diyifo kɛnkɛ beto bitǝ bakpa . Lǝ bifi bitǝ mǝǝ , mǝ bomu ebɔtsyi bawuninsǝ bǝnǝ mi . Biemfi mi atsyabi nya lefo koya beto bekpe bakplako . Lǝ bifi bitǝ mǝǝ , bɔɔnwɔ nya ku mǝ akpa bakpe lǝ kota .
“ Bɛtɔ asa lǝ befi bǝtǝ mi . Bɛbɛbɛ asa lǝ binyǝ . Bɛsɔ siku lǝ basini mi .
Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ laatɔ asaa , bǝǝtǝ wǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laabɛbɛɛ , wǝǝnyǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa , wǝ lɛsɔ sikuu , bɔɔsini wǝ .
“ Minti eto Owoe lǝ wǝ ubi atɔ wǝ abolo , wuufi lebambi utǝ wǝ ?
Nye lǝ ɔtɔ wǝ lɛkpɛ , wuufi owa utǝ wǝ ?
Mimba ni babuayifo kulaa yi kase buifi asa sɛɛ bitǝ mi bebi . Nya ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ ku Boanto wǝ nkpe kato itǝ bo ? Ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ weembufi wǝ asa , asa sɛɛ , utǝ betidi ba laatɔ wǝ ?
Asa nnya biala biǝ betidi bamba yifo bǝtǝ mii , mitsya yifo nnya bitǝ mǝ nko . Nyamfo ete Moses eto kɔfi ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nlɛ bote nɛ .
“ Bɛyɛ lǝ kesie kɛkɛ befe bidufǝ kǝmiǝ . Itsyise lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ kesie ka lɛmɔ ku kusu ko disensǝ ko diyuǝ ku bɔyɛɛ , yookpa mi isuko katsylɔkɔ ka ni ute kǝmiǝ . Nya ko ǝsuǝ betidi kpǝ nyɛ nɛ .
Fɛɛ nkpǝ eto kusu afɛ , nya ko bɔyɛ kesu mfó kpe ale , nya betidi esiani hã lǝǝnyǝ ko .
“ Bebe mi ǝsuǝ sinini lǝ bidiabidia eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ . Bǝǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ fe basamu seka lǝ dinyǝbi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ mǝ kǝmiǝǝ , baso bekiti .
Biunyǝ mǝ bitsyǝ lekpo lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ . Kanyi aannwɔ eyibibi nnya bedi . Nya otonkpa anwɔ nnya bendi .
Nko ini bǝ kuyi sɛɛ saa aanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ . Nya kuyi bua saa aanwɔ ebibi bua .
Kuyi sɛɛ saa aannwɔ ebibi bua nko ke kuyi bua saa laannwɔ ebibi sɛɛ nɛ .
Kuyi saa ko laannwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , baala ko kefi kakpe lǝ ute .
Nyaso badiantidi ba lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kɛnyɛɛ , biunyǝ mǝ bitsyǝ lekpo lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
“ Inni utsyuǝ saa ke laakpadi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , Bonamutee , ’ luudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Bomu betidi ba leeyifo mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato eto alasa luudufǝ mfó .
Lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ayoo , betidi kpǝ bɔtɛyi mɛ bǝ , ‘ Bonamute , Bonamute ! Lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ nya búdi fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ nya búyifo ayanisa kpǝ bóla awɔnɔ bua kpǝ búlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ’
Mfó nya mɔɔtɛyi mǝ minkǝ , ‘ Minyi mi kulaa o-o ! Bidu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , mi babuayifotidi . ’
“ Nyaso utidi wǝ ke laanɔ mɔ etiki nya weeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ni obesibe nɛ . Ute fe utidi wǝ léto wǝ diyo uńyǝnsǝ lǝ koba ǝsuǝ .
Ɔsɔmi áni nya ntu díyi boba bokpo , nya ufiebi kekleke lɛsɔ ɔyɛ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ófe . Fɛɛ díamba itsyise óto ni utǝkǝ lǝ koba ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ mɔ etiki fɛ woanyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , okateko ubuki . Ute fe utidibuki wǝ léto wǝ diyo uńyǝnsǝ lǝ kɔwinimi ǝsuǝ .
Ɔsɔmi áni nya ntu díyi bóba bókpo mfó , nya ufiebi kekleke lɛsɔ ɔ́yɛ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ófe , nya léba kploo lékpo lǝ kasɔ . ”
Se Yesu léte asa nyamfo kenke ólosǝǝ , wǝ asatete eyifo mǝmblɛ yanii .
Wǝ asatete ményifo fe kase afi eto bateasa laate . Bomu óte asa fe nwǝ nkpe ǝsuǝale lǝ asa nnya óte ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛyifǝ kɔtini komǝ úbǝ kasɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
Mfó nya osani utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ bufi sía bufi díbǝ óse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute ! Lǝ alaa , ebofo butǝ bǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ le . ”
Yesu ǝnǝ wǝ kɔni útidi wǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nla . Fǝ ǝsuǝ le . ” Lamfolamfo bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ utidi ǝmǝ .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Be kukɔnɔ , nya mensu atɛyi kuutsyuǝ saa kulesa . Bomu fi fǝ ǝsuǝ esu ate Onanto eto usumunyǝ wǝ luudi fǝ adansiɛ nkǝ fǝ bufi ǝyuǝ fǝ sitinti . Nya lǝ efi kedi ka Moses eto kɔfi lɛtɔ ǝtǝ . Bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ote nkǝ bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ fǝ sitinti . ”
Se Yesu dídufǝ Kapernaun eto umǝǝ , Romafɔ eto Omamanyǝ Ninǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ ,
“ Bonamute ! Mɔ uyifoyifo lɛ bufi kekleke . Olabe lǝ diyo ɔnnlɛ bofo botaka . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muusu lɛ nsu ntsya wǝ . ”
Omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , oolo ! Yǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ mɔ diyo . Tɛyi ditiki lɔni ete mɔ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ eto bufi ebuyuǝ wǝ .
Mintsya eyifo nwǝ nkpe lǝ beninǝ eto kalɔ , nya bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya nkpe mɛ kalɔ . Lǝ ntɛyi utsyuǝ miǝ , ‘ Suu ’ weesu . Nya lǝ ntɛyi obamba tsya miǝ , ‘ Bǝǝ , ’ wǝǝbǝ . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mɔ uyifoyifo miǝ , ‘ Yifo nǝmfoo , ’ weeyifo ni . ”
Se Yesu lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , íyifo wǝ yanii nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ Israelbebi nti kulaa tsyaa , mǝnnyǝ tɔ bofokanɔ kplɛ bomfo eto okle !
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ betidi kpǝ ebutsyi kofekatokɔ ku ko diyokedufǝkɔ bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ bedi lesa ku Abraham , Isak ku Yakob lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
Fɛɛ mimba ni sekakedikɔ siamǝ eto bebii , boofi mǝ batobakpe lǝ ketuntu ka nkpe lǝ se kama mfo . Mfó boowi nku bayimi anyi . ”
Nya kamaa , nya Yesu lɛtɛyi bamamanyǝ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Du esu diyo , yuubǝ itǝ fǝ fe kase fáfo fánɔ ǝsuǝ . ” Nya omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmǝ eto uyifoyifo eto ǝsuǝ dímuǝ wǝ ale lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ ke .
Se Yesu dísu Petro eto diyoo , únyǝ nkǝ atikesi ǝmuǝ Petro eto usiǝambe kekleke , nya onlabe .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛkɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni nya atikesi nyamǝ léyani wǝ nya ótaka úsu úyifo wǝ afɔ .
Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , bákpa betidi kpǝ ba awɔnɔ bua díkǝlǝ báboko Yesu ɔflɔ . Yesu lǝ ditikididi lɔni ǝsuǝǝ , óla awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ úlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ótsya befimfi bamǝ kenke mǝ efimbi .
Úyifo nyamfo bǝ lǝ ditiki nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛtɛyi utsyǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nkǝ , “ Wǝ kosate átsya bo kǝsuǝfi , nya ótsya bo efimbi kenke . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu dínyǝ betidi kpǝ ba ńyǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ nkǝ , bǝtǝ lǝ bayila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ besu ni lekpake nǝnse .
Afi eto oteasa utsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó . Nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , muutǝkǝko fǝ nsu kaka ke fantɔ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nkpaflɔbɛ kpe ǝbiǝ nnya eto kafo baalabe , nya baklɔbɛ nkpe ayo . Fɛɛ Utidi Eto Ubii , ǝmbǝ kaka wuuluǝ wǝ disi . ”
Nya utidi bamba utsyuǝ wǝ ni okasebi lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ mɛ kusu lǝ nsu mbikǝ mɔ anto fɛ . ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . Tǝ mba nsi nkpǝ fe bekpǝnkpǝ lǝ besu bebikǝ mǝ bekpǝnkpǝtsyuǝ . ”
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ kafo .
Yanklɛ ufiebi étsyiko bɔsɔ kekleke lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ɔnlɛ ntu bɔsɔ kakpo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya íyifo fe woonya udufɔ lǝ ntu kasɔ . Fɛɛ Yesu wǝǝ lábe selabe .
Bakasebi bamǝ ésu básanklisǝ wǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝkǝ bo ! Boǝbǝ bukpǝ lo . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ sikpi bote nko ? Mi mba eto bofokanɔ lemfui ! ” Mfó nya ótaka úúnyǝ nya ókpe ufiebi ku ntu bomǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ bǝyuǝ kɛnyɛ . Nya lesa saa díyuǝ kɛnyɛ kananana .
Iyifo utsyuǝ saa mfó yanii . Nya bátɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Nte utidi wǝ eto okle ni nwǝ mfo ? Ufiebi ku ntu kulaa tsya eetsyue wǝ koto ! ”
Se Yesu lɛyila ditumbukplɛ úsu ni lekpake nǝnse údufǝ Gadara eto kasɔɔ , betidi inuǝ ba ǝsuǝ awɔnɔ bua nsi ábɔ betsyi lǝ edi nti bǝbǝ bátsyako wǝ . Nya se bakɛ sikpi tinti esoo , kuutsyuǝ saa mánkatɔnɔ nkǝ woayɛ kusu komfo ofe .
Lamfolamfo , báfa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ Onanto eto Ubi , be nkpe lǝ bonko fǝ lenti mfo ? Bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ etsyiko bo koto bunǝ katɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ lǝ leyoo ? ”
Bakplako eto lekpa kplɛ ditsyuǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ mfó ɔflɔ békedi lesa .
Nyaso awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ ebola bo ǝlǝkǝ lǝ mfoo , nyalɛ la bo esu akpe lǝ bakplako eto lekpa kplɛ nǝ ńyǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó Yesu dínyǝnki ókpe mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bidu bisu . ” Nyaso bédu mfó bésu bédufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bakplako bamǝ kenke dítsyetsyi báwunini lǝ kɔtini komǝ eto kotosi bésu bédufǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya bǝnǝ ntu bǝkpǝ .
Lǝ nyaso mba laase bakplako bamǝ étsyetsyi besu umǝ . Bátɛyi lesa saa nǝ díbǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ku betidi ba awɔnɔ bua disiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso utsyuǝ saa lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ ésu nkǝ wǝǝnyǝ Yesu . Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ udu lǝ mǝ kasɔ .
Yesu édufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya usinkli ɔ́yɛ lǝ ditumbukplɛ ǝsuǝ úsu wǝ umǝ .
Mfó nya bákpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ léba onkpo kasɔ lǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Se Yesu dínyǝ nkǝ báfo bánɔ tinti esoo , ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ léba onkpo kasɔ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , kpe utu . Mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ . ”
Mfó afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ba díńyǝ mfó lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo lǝ mbusiotiki budi . ”
Yesu ǝnyǝ mǝ nsusu bomfo utsyǝ lekpo nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ nsusu bua bomfo eto okle bufi ?
Nya nte etiki nnya eto bɔtɛyi diyuǝ enso , ‘ Mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ , ’ lee batɛyi bǝ ‘ Taka , lǝ ayɛ edu ’ ?
Bǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ nte mi miǝ Utidi Eto Ubi kpe ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ ufi abua ɔtsyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ mfoo , ” ɔ́tɛyi utidi ǝmǝ léba onkpo kasɔ mfó nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ efi fǝ belabekǝ lǝ edu esu diyo . ”
Mfó nya osani ǝmǝ létaka nnya úfi wǝ belabekǝ nnya údu úsu diyo .
Lefe nǝ betidi bamfó dínyǝ nyamfoo , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ nnya bátɛsǝ Onanto bǝ úfi ǝsuǝale nyamfo eto okle útǝ betidi .
Yesu édu mfó nya se ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ nwǝ laafo umǝnko utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Mateo wǝ nsi lǝ wǝ keyifokɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Mateo létaka útǝkǝko wǝ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu nsi ɔnlɛ lesa budi lǝ Mateo eto diyoo , mba laafo umǝnko kpǝ ku babuayifo bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bákɔ ku Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ǝsuǝ lǝ lesakedikɔ mfó .
Mfó nya Farisifɔ ba dínyǝ nyamfoo , lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi bǝnkǝ , “ Beso mi oteasa ku mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo leedi lesa kakɔ ? ”
Yesu ánɔ lesa nǝ bátɛyi nyaso útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba nkpe ǝsuǝale manhiã ofanyǝ enso mba ni befimfi hã .
Bisu lǝ bisu bɛbɛbɛ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto kasɔ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ maabɛbɛ , nya inni bebukilolo kǝtǝ kedi . ’ Mǝmbǝ miǝ mǝǝbǝ nlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ , bomu babuayifo eso mimbǝ . ”
Mfó nya Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto bakasebi díbǝ bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bonko Farisifɔ laakle kɛnyɛ lǝ lefe lefe ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ fǝ bakasebi laankle kɛnyɛ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bibubibu biǝ okafɔsǝ eto baklobo ba nkpe lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ yifo mǝ ǝsuǝ yooyooyoo ku kaminsǝ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe onkpe lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ ? Yanle bǝ ibǝ nko kulefe ! Fɛɛ diyi ditsyuǝ ebubǝ nǝ ǝsuǝ bookpa okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ bedunko lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ . Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , bookle kɛnyɛ bǝsiǝ .
“ Kuutsyuǝ saa emfi kafia eto lefianku fɔfɔ katale kǝtǝkǝ lǝ kakoko ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lefianku fɔfɔ nǝmǝ ebunǝ ni ǝsuǝ dilǝkǝ lǝ lekoko nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ dibiǝ koko nǝmǝ ebola disensǝ lekpe .
“ Nko ke kuutsyuǝ saa leemfi nte fɔfɔ kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe koko kafo itsyise nte bomǝ ebɔkpɔ itǝ otobǝ ǝmǝ eboba nya nte bomǝ luuwi nya otobe ǝmǝ loobia . Bomu beefi nte fɔfɔ kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe fɔfɔ kafo . Nya asakpa ǝnuǝ nyamǝ ebutsyǝ kukɔnɔ . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu nlɛ mǝ etiki budinkoo , Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya óse akonki , ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi ǝkpǝ mɔmɔmɔmɔ , tsya bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ efi fǝ ani ǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ otaka . ”
Nyaso Yesu átaka útǝkǝko wǝ ku wǝ bakasebi .
Se ɔntɔɔ , usionko utsyuǝ wǝ kɔtɔ díkakpo lǝ lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ǝsuǝ tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu kama nya útidi wǝ awu eto kotosi .
Úyifo nko nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ntidi wǝ awu koo , mɔ bufi ebɔyɛ mɛ . ”
Yesu átsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ únyǝ wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muǝ utu alɛ , mɔ ubi . Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . ” Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ tututuu , bufí bomǝ ǝyuǝ wǝ .
Nnya kamaa , Yesu ésu katsyakɔ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo nya se únyǝ mba leefe nkpatsyaku ku mba nlɛ bofa kewi nkuu ,
ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa bɔ usu lekple , disiobi nǝmǝ mǝnkpǝ , bomu selabe ete onlabe . ” Mfo bétsyiko wǝ bumǝ .
Nya se bála betidi bamǝ babɔsɛɛ , Yesu édufǝ diyo nǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ nlabe , nya ɔ́kɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni , nya ótaka úsiǝ .
Ditiki nǝmfo ésensǝ léba lékpo lǝ kasɔ kamǝ eto lekpake nǝmfó kenke .
Se Yesu dídu mfó ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , bǝnǝmba inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ átaka bǝtǝkǝko wǝ ku kudu bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Oka , David eto ubi ! Nyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
Nya se Yesu dísu údufǝ diyoo , bǝnǝmba inuǝ bamǝ edufǝ mfó . Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo bɛnɔ biǝ moofo mi botsya ? ” Mfó bǝmǝnkli kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɛɛ ! Bofo bɔnɔ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítidi mǝ ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ fe kase befo bɛnɔ . ”
Nya ete mǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini . Nya Yesu díkǝ mǝ ato kekleke nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kuutsyuǝ saa nyamfo . ”
Fɛɛ se bédu mfóo , bábe ditiki nǝmfo letsya utidi sa anɔ lǝ lɛkpɔ nǝmfó kenke itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Se betidi bamfo dídu bantɔɔ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua dítǝ ɔnnlɛ etiki bofo budi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ .
Óla lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ úlǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya utidi ǝmǝ dítsyiko etiki budi . Nyamfo éyifo betidi ba ńyǝ mfó yanii , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boǝnnyǝ tɔ nyamfo eto okle bunyǝ kulefe lǝ Israel eto kasɔ ! ”
Fɛɛ Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Awɔnɔ bua eto oka wǝ lǝǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale , nya úfi ɔnlɛ awɔnɔ bua nyamfó bola kǝlǝkǝ nɛ . ”
Yesu áyɛ ótsyilama kǝmǝ ku mbuto bo nkpe lǝ lekpake nǝ lɛfi mfó . Óte asa lǝ Yedafɔ eto ntsyakɔ . Óbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya óte asa itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ótsya betidi efimbi efimbi kenke .
Nya se únyǝ sitiditu siamǝǝ , mǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo itsyise ǝsuǝ ába mǝ , nya bánkɛ ɔwɔnsǝkotsyuǝ saa , nya beyifo fe basamu ba lǝmbǝ obebe .
Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bɛkuɛnke bia díkayo bulǝkǝ fui , fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ emfui .
Nyaso bɛlɛ ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lekpakpa lǝ otsyese beyifoyifo lǝ bǝbǝ bawunsǝ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ bɛkuɛnkǝ biamǝ . ”
Yesu ákpadi wǝ batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ɔ́kɔ nya útǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bala awɔnɔ bua bǝlǝkǝlǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya lǝ batsya mǝ efimbi , efimbi saa tsya .
Batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto aye ni Simon wǝ bensi baakpo Petro ku wǝ ɔyimi Andrea ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimi wǝ baakpo Yohanes baa ni Sebedeo eto bebi
ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ku Toma ku Mateo wǝ laafo umǝnko ku Yakobo wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubi ku Tadeo
ku Simon wǝ ditsyi Kana ku Yuda Iskariot wǝ dídu Yesu útǝ .
Yesu ǝtsyǝ lefosi betidi inuǝ bamfo kusu nya ótsyese mǝ nya úkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ , “ Biensu betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto kasɔ nye bidufǝ Samariafɔ eto umǝ saa tsya kafo .
Bomu bisu Israel bebi ba diyifo fe basamu ba lénya kusu ɔflɔ .
Bisu bebe letsya biǝnkǝ , ‘ Onanto eto Sekakedidi eboyo selo . ’
Betsya befimfi lǝ betakasǝ mba díkpǝ . Betsya mba nlɛ bufisia bufi , lǝ bela awɔnɔ bua bitsyiko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Bíanya ǝsuǝale nyamfo bitsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ nyaso mi tsya biemfi nnya bete befo atabi .
Bientsyi atabi saa lǝ mi katobe .
Mi kuutsyuǝ mentsyi otobe fe mba laatɔ asa , awu nuǝfǝ , afɔkpa nye ɔlɛ uyi ɔyɛ kusu . Uyifoyifo ǝńyǝ utǝ lesa nǝ wuudi .
“ Lǝ bidufǝ umǝ nye kebuto kǝtsyuǝǝ , bɛbɛbɛ utidi sɛɛ wǝ loola nkǝ woafo mi . Bɛsɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ bɛkɛ mfo isu ese lefe nǝ biudu .
Lǝ bidufǝ diyo ditsyuǝ , bisiǝsǝ mǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Diyuǝ itǝ mi . ’
Lǝ báfo mi ku kafo faa , bitǝ lǝ mi diyuǝ eto kǝsiǝ kamfó lǝ kǝsiǝ ku diyo nǝmfó kenke eto utsyuǝ saa . Nya lǝ bamfo mii , diyuǝ eto kǝsiǝ kamfó bǝ mi ɔflɔ .
Nya lǝ diyo nye umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi mámfo mi nye báni bámfo mi ditikii , nyalɛ bidu mfó lǝ bɛflɛ mi nkpafo eto site bekpo lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝ Onanto lookponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo ǝsuǝǝ , wuunyǝ Sodom ku Gomora eto betidi kaminsǝ kulaa tsya oso umǝ ǝmfo eto bale .
“ Bɛlɔ bɛnɔ ! Nlɛ mi botsyese fe basamu lǝ bekiti eto nti . Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ fe bawa seka , nya bɛlɛ mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ fe ablonima .
Bebe mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , itsyise betidi ebumuǝ mi , bakpa mi besuko akpokakpokɔ . Bɔɔblɛ mi lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ .
Lǝ mɔ disi esoo , bookponko mi akpo lǝ Aba eto beninǝ ku baka eto ǝnǝmi . Lǝ mfóo , bɛtɛyi mǝ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
Lǝ bákpa mi bésuko lekpokakpokɔɔ , biembu disi lǝ lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi , nye kase biɔtɛyi nnya . Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ayoo , boote mi lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi .
Itsyise inni mi loote etiki nnya buidi , bomu mi Anto Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ luudi etiki ɔyɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
“ Betidi ebudu mǝ bayimi bǝtǝ bǝ balo . Nya antomǝ tsya luuyifo nko ke ku mǝ bebi . Bebi ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ antomǝ ǝsuǝ bedu mǝ bǝtǝ bǝ balo .
Utsyuǝ saa ebukisi mi lǝ mɔ disi eso . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luuńyǝ kekleke lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ isu ese kalosǝkɔɔ , boofo wǝ lǝ nkpǝ .
Lǝ bati mi kama lǝ umǝ ɔnii , bitsyetsyi bisu umǝ bamba . Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , biembuyifo mi keyifo belosǝ lǝ Israel eto kǝmǝ ka kenke fɛ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi luubǝ .
“ Okasebi saa aanso wǝ oteasa . Odomunyǝ saa tsya aanso wǝ onamute .
Nyasoo , ele bǝ imi , okasebi saa nkǝ wuubǝ utsyǝ fǝ wǝ oteasa seka . Nya ndomunyǝ tsya luubǝ utsyǝ fe wǝ onamute . Nya lǝ bákpadi oyosate utsyuǝ bǝ Awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko nyaalɛ nte aye bua nya eto okle bembokpo diyo nǝmǝ eto bebi ?
“ Nyaso biante betidi sikpi , itsyise lesa saa nǝ ǝsuǝ béti asa bakulaa , bɔɔsini asa lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , nya asakulakula saa ebɔbɔɔ lekple banɔ .
Lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lǝ ketuntu lefee , bɛtɛyi nnya lǝ kalekpakpa ǝsuǝ . Nya lesa nǝ batɛyi mi lǝ kawɛ ǝsuǝ , bebe nya letsya lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔnɔ .
Biante mba ini etidisuǝ ete boofo bolo fɛ bembofo okla bolo sikpi . Bomu bete Onanto wǝ loofo utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku lɛwɔnɔ bolo lǝ ute wǝ laatonsǝ asa sikpi .
Lǝ efi kablɛ kanii , foofo ntsyuɛ nnuǝ boya tsyaa , ke kani kplo embukpǝ lǝ inni Boanto Onanto eto lelabi .
Nya mimii , Onanto yi mi disi eto sɛwɔni eto leklabi kenke .
Nyaso biante sikpi , itsyise befo koya beso baklɔbɛ kpǝ .
“ Utsyuǝ saa wǝ luulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ betidi nti ɔtɛyi nkǝ uyifo mɔ olee , mintsya ebofo wǝ fe moole lǝ mɔ Anto Onanto eto ǝnǝmi kato .
Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ áni mɛ lǝ betidi ba tã eto ǝnǝmii , mintsya ebɔni wǝ lǝ mɔ Anto wǝ kato eto ǝnǝmi .
“ Biembu biǝ mbǝ diyuǝ kabokokɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ . Owo lo ! Mǝmbǝ diyuǝ kabokokɔ , bomu kabia !
Mbǝ miǝ mǝǝnǝ kabia nkpe ‘ lǝ bebisaibi ku mǝ antomǝ lenti , lǝ bebisiobi ku mǝ ambemǝ lenti , lǝ bebisiǝ ku mǝ bese ambe mǝ lenti .
Nya utidi eto olo sitintii , ebutsyi wǝ kosate eto diyo kafo . ’
“ Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laala wǝ anto nye ambe oso mɛɛ , mǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi . Nko ke ini bǝ utsyuǝ saa ke laala wǝ ubisaibi nye ubisiobi kulaa tsya oso mɛɛ , yǝnńyǝ itǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi .
Utsyuǝ saa ke dímentsyi wǝ uyikabie ɔyɛ mɔ kayɛkɔ utǝkǝko mɛɛ , mǝnńyǝ utǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi .
Utsyuǝ saa ke lela nkǝ waata wǝ nkpǝ eto disii , ebonyansǝ mu . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ lǝ mɔ butǝkǝko esoo , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo sitinti .
“ Utsyuǝ saa ke loofo mii , mɔ ofo . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke loofo mɛɛ , ofo nwǝ létsyese mɛ tsya .
Utsyuǝ saa ke loofo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi nkǝ uyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi esoo , ebunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ unyɛlǝkǝtidi eto kayofofo ka woofo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Utsyuǝ saa ke loofo utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ itsyise uyifo ɔsɛɛnyǝ esoo , wǝ ku utidi ǝmǝ ebofo kayofofo itsyi lǝ keyifo ka úyifo eso .
Bebe nyamfo kukɔnɔ bǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luutǝ ntu yududu eto lɛkɔbetɔ mɔ bakasebi bamfo eto utsyuǝ lǝ mǝ nti lǝ mɔ disii , ebunyǝ kayofofo lǝ nnya eso kokooko . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu dílǝkǝ wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamfo útsyǝ mǝ kusu ólosǝǝ , údu mfó úsu óte asa nnya óbe nnya letsya lǝ kǝmǝ kamǝ ku nka letsyilama mfó .
Lefe nǝmǝǝ , se Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes wǝ nkpe lǝ Aba eto diyo lɛnɔ asa nnya Yesu nlɛ buyifoo , ókpe wǝ bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ Yesu ɔflɔ .
Bésu bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo . Fǝ ni utidi wǝ Yohanes lɛtɛyi nkǝ ǝǝbǝ bubǝǝ , lee bobe obamba kusu ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bisinkli bisu bɛtɛyi Yohanes asa nnya bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ ku nnya bɛnlɛ bunyǝ .
Bǝnǝmba lɛ bunyǝ , nya mba leba bankpo lǝ kasɔ lɛ bɔyɛ . Mba nlɛ bufisia bufi eto ǝsuǝ lɛ bokpa , batoti lɛ bɔnɔ , balɛ bekpǝnkpǝ botakasǝ kǝnyǝnsǝ , nya banlɛ bakombo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔtɛyi .
Diyuǝ itǝ mba dimǝnyǝ kabua saa lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Se Yohanes eto bakasebi bamǝ dídu bantɔɔ , Yesu édi betidi bamǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Yohanes ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Se bísu Yohanes ɔflɔ lǝ mfimintii , be béfo bɛnɔ biǝ biunyǝ ? Lefanto nǝ ufiebi nlɛ bɔsɔ kafe lee ?
Be bísu kabekɔ fɛɛ ? Utidi wǝ nkpe bikǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ bia laanɔ bobe lee ? Betidi ba laakpe bikǝ biamfo eto oklee , Lekayo baakɛ .
Bɛtɛyi mɛ lesa nǝ kon bísu kabekɔ ! Biǝ biesu bebe Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi lee ? Ee , lǝ sitinti wǝ uni nɛ . Fɛɛ nwǝ bínyǝǝ , so Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kulaa tsya .
Itsyise Yohanes ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝnkǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mootsyese mɔ ɔtɔnkpe ntɔnsǝ fǝ bubǝ lǝ ubǝ ɔlɔ fǝ kusu utsyǝ . ’
Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes amɔ oso utsyuǝ saa wǝ usio léle lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Fɛɛ nwǝ nso bɔfɛ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔɔ , amɔ oso Yohanes ǝmǝ .
Idu lǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto lefe ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , balɛ bota kekleke ku kǝnǝmisɛ lǝ kato eto sekakedikɔ siamǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mba ńyǝ lǝ se ǝsuǝ ku kǝnǝmisɛ tinti lɛ bokplatsya bǝ beeti se bubǝ kusu .
Ibǝ ese lǝ Yohanes eto lefee , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku Moses eto afi edi etiki itsyi lǝ sekakedikɔ siamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ bela biǝ biafo mɔ dítiki bɛnɔɔ , Yohanes ni Elia , wǝǝ eto bubǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ .
Nwǝ ato nkpee , utsyue ato lǝ ɔnɔ .
“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , be muufi mmi eto betidi nkatesǝ ko ? Beyifo fe bekpefi ba laakpe kɔyɛ lǝ asi . Lekpa lɔni afa kakpadi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ katɛyi nkǝ ,
‘ Búse kusiǝkpakpa eto ese butǝ mi , Fɛɛ bɛni kewui buwui . Bóto keku eto ese butǝ mi , Fɛɛ bienwi nku . ’
Itsyise lefe nǝ Yohanes díbǝǝ , ókle kɛnyɛ nya wǝnnǝ nte . Nya utsyuǝ saa lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Utsyi lɛwɔnɔ bua . ’
Fɛɛ se Utidi Eto Ubi díbǝǝ , údi únǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Be utidi ǝmfo ! Uyifo udikpuu ku utenǝ , mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ ! ’ Fɛɛ utidi eto eyifosa ǝsuǝǝ , nya woǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto kobe ko nkpe wǝ kate nɛ . ”
Kǝmǝ ka ǝsuǝ Yesu díyifo ayanisa kpǝ eto betidi mántsyi báwuninsǝ bafo banɔ . Nyaso ílǝ wǝ itǝ mǝ .
Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ fǝ Korasim ! Nya mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ fǝ Betsaida ! Lǝ ayanisa nnya béyifo lǝ mi ete béyifo lǝ Tiro ku Sidon innii , eni mfó eto betidi ebɔtsyi bawuninsǝ kokoko , befi atoku eto mfia beti , bediki ntɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ ete bǝ bani mǝ abua .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , Onanto ebunyǝ Tiro ku Sidon eto kǝmǝ kaminsǝ eso mi .
Nya fǝ Kapernaum , bubu fanlɛ fǝ Onanto ebobesǝ fǝ kato ? Boobokosǝ fǝ kasɔ bato fǝ bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝ ke ! Lǝ ayanisa nnya minyifo lǝ fǝ ete mínyifo lǝ Sodom , eni usi okpe eyo mmi !
Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ lekpo yi fɛfɛɛ , Onanto ebunyǝ Sodom kaminsǝ tinti oso fǝ ! ”
Lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Anto , kato ku kasɔ eto Onamute . Maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise ǝlǝkǝ asa nnya lɛkula babesibe ku bekuente áté mba lennyi kulesa .
Ee , Anto , sitinti , nko fála fǝ ibǝ itǝ nɛ .
“ Mɔ Anto éfi asa nnya kenke útǝ mɛ . Kuutsyuǝ saa enyi Ubi ǝmǝ enso Anto . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa enyi Anto ǝmǝ enso Ubi ǝmǝ ku mba Ubi ǝmǝ laala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ oté .
“ Bibǝ mɔ ɔflɔ mimba ntsyi bike kinkinki bia nlɛ mi bulǝ , lǝ ntǝ lǝ bitsyǝ ɔnwɛ .
Bibǝ lǝ busie mɔ bitsyike butǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bekase asa bitsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ , itsyise nkpe lefonǝ nya mimbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise bitsyikǝ bia muutsyisǝ mi ǝyuǝ , nya bitsyikǝ bia muutsyisǝ mi tsya eyifo fomfloo . ”
Lǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ésu báyɛ akpa eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ kafo báfe lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . Se kukpɛnsǝ lɛlɛ wǝ bakasebi bamǝǝ , bétsyiko edisa nyamǝ bufǝsǝ kayimi .
Se Farisifɔ bamǝ dínyǝ nyamfoo , bátɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ bakasebi éyifo lesa nǝ díńyǝ lǝ bo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto afi ǝsuǝ ! ”
Mfó Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla lesa nǝ Oka David díyifo lǝ lefe nǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛlɛ wǝ ku wǝ betidi ?
Údufǝ Onanto eto diyo , nya wǝ ku wǝ betidi dífi lesa nǝ bákpo atsyɔ bǝtǝ Onanto bédi , lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu nko , ini mba lǝǝtǝ Onanto kedi hã nkpe kusu beedi lebolo nǝmǝ .
Nye bíankla lǝ Moses eto afi biǝnkǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi saa , besumunyǝ ba nkpe lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo ékeyifo asa nnya díńyǝ lǝ diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , tsya fɛɛ bánlo mǝ dikpi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ?
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝǝ , lesaatsyuǝ kpe mi lenti mfo nǝ lɛmɔ lenso Disumuyo Kplɛ .
Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , ‘ Kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ni lesa nǝ maabɛbɛ , inni bebuki eto keditǝtǝ . ’ Lǝ bǝ bɛnɔ nyamfo kasɔ tutuutuu , eni biembokpo akpofukutu belo betidi ekpi .
Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ni Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto Onamute . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dídu úsu Yudafɔ eto Katsyakɔ kǝtsyuǝ .
Mfóo , úsu únyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ eto kɔni , kɔni díkpǝ . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákɛ mfó ba léla bǝ bábɛbɛ etiki bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ óta kɔfi ubu , nyaso bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu bǝ batsya ufimfi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ? ”
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ mi utsyuǝ eto osamu ákpia údufǝ lǝ dibiǝku ǝsuǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , wǝmbunǝ wǝ ulǝkǝ ?
Fɛɛ utidi afo koya oso osamu ! Nyalɛ , bo kɔfi mǝntǝ bo kusu nkǝ bɔwunsǝko kuutsyuǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . ”
Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi osani wǝ eto kɔni díkpǝ nkǝ , “ Nǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue . ” Únǝ ko útsyue , nya kɔni komǝ disi kótsya wǝ fe kase kunuǝfǝ komǝ nte .
Nya Farisifɔ ba díńyǝ mfó dídu nya béfi nsusu bǝ boolo Yesu .
Se Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bákle kɛnyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , údu mfó , nya betidi kpǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ . Ótsya befimfi kenke .
Nya úti mǝ kusu nkǝ bǝntǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bate bǝ wǝ uni .
Ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nko bǝ lǝ Onanto eto nnya ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ sitinti nkǝ ,
“ Nwǝ mfo ni mɔ uyifoyifo wǝ mínlǝkǝ mintsyǝ , nwǝ maala , nya mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ tinti . Muutǝ mɔ Lɛwɔnɔ lǝ dibǝ disiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya woobe mɔ lekpokponkpo letsya utǝ kawunsiǝ kenke .
Weembunǝ etiki ku betidi nye ofã kuutsyuǝ , nya bǝmbɔnɔ wǝ etiki ku bofa lǝ obia .
Wɔɔkɛ dibusǝ utǝ mba lǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale . Nya wuunyǝ mba diyifole saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kaminsǝ . Wɔɔlɛnko nko kekleke isu ese lefe nǝ mɔ ɔnukualɛ eto lekpokponkpo luutǝkǝ kato .
Nya betidi ba kenke luufi mǝ kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ . ”
Mfó nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ lékpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ awɔnɔ bua nlɛ bulǝ , wǝ ni unǝmba nya uyifo nwǝ lendi etiki tsya báboko Yesu ɔflɔ . Yesu átsya wǝ itǝ ófo etiki budi , kǝnyǝ asa tsya .
Ayanisa nnya Yesu díyifo mfó éyifo betidi bamfó yanii , nya bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni nwǝmfo ni Oka David eto ufluflu wǝ bákpo ɔhile bǝtsyǝ ? ”
Se Farisifɔ lɛnɔ nyamfoo , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Woala ɔwɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ ǝsuǝale nya awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko Beelsebul dítǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu áte mǝ nsusu nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sekakedikɔ saa sia laama akpa akpa , kǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ebɔkɛ sɛklɛ . Nya umǝ nye diyo saa nǝ laama akpa akpa kǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , eboba lǝ akpa .
Nyaso lǝ lekpa lɔni lɛ lekpa nuǝfǝ bɔkpɔnko lǝ Obonsam eto sekakedikɔɔ , ete bǝnkǝ dioba akpa , nya diǝmbɔklɛ fɛ dioba lekpo lǝ kasɔ .
Lǝ bɛlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝ awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ maayɛ kala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ bawe eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ mba ntǝkǝko mi laayɛ kala mǝ kǝlǝkǝ ? Lesa nǝ mi kosate eto mba ntǝkǝko mi leeyifoo , lǝ bote bǝ bɛnlɛ sitinti bɔtɛyi .
Inni Beelsebul bomuu , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ni lǝǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale bǝ nla awɔnɔ bua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi ébutsyǝ kasɔ lǝ mi nti koko .
“ Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo botaka kedufǝ lǝ ǝsuǝaletidi eto diyo ete utsyiko wǝ bikǝ butsyi , lenni bǝ ófo ǝsuǝaletidi ǝmǝ bumuǝ kakle fɛ woofo budufǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ketsyi wǝ bikǝ .
“ Utidi wǝ ke lentǝkǝko mɛɛ , uńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya nwǝ ke lanwunsǝko mɛ lǝ bɔsɛketsyue ǝsuǝ eesensǝ nnya .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , boofi abua saa béyifo ku etiki bua saa bédi batsyɛ mǝ , fɛɛ nwǝ ke luudi etiki nnya diíyǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ alɛɛ , bembufi nnya batsyɛ wǝ .
Nya utsyuǝ wǝ ke luudi etiki uńyǝ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝǝ , boofo bufi katsyɛ wǝ , fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke luudi etiki uńyǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , bembufi batsyɛ wǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo lee mbo luubǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
“ Kuyi sɛɛ saa aanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , nya kuyi bua saa tsya aanwɔ ebibi bua . Bǝǝtsyǝ kuyi lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ ebibi nnya koanwɔ ǝsuǝ .
Mimba lɛbɔ bitsyi lǝ bawa eto kafo ǝsuǝ ! Asa sɛɛ aambɔ ketsyi lǝ mi kɛnyɛ ! Itsyise lesa nǝ diyi mi ketu ǝsuǝǝ , nnya mi kɛnyɛ lǝǝlǝkǝ katɛyi nɛ .
Utidi sɛɛ , asa sɛɛ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ nya ini nnya wǝǝlǝkǝ katɛyi nɛ . Nya utidi bua tsyaa , abua nnya nkpe lǝ wǝǝ , nnya wǝǝlǝkǝ katɛyi nɛ .
Nla miǝ ekpa ko mi wee bǝ , lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , utsyuǝ saa ebutǝ etiki bimba saa nnya lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto nkunta .
Itsyise fǝ kosate eto etiki nnya lɛbɔ fǝ lǝ kɛnyɛɛ , nya buufi bakponko fǝ lekpo balofǝ dikpi lee bǝtǝ fǝ lɛbɛ nɛ . ”
Mfó nya afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , bola boǝ yifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ até lǝ bobe . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bebe , mi mmi eto betidi ba leesumu bǝfiǝ ku asa bimba . Bela biǝ biǝnyǝ ayanisa itsyi mɔ ɔflɔ , fɛɛ biembunyǝ ayanisa saa enso nnya dítsyi Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yona ɔflɔ .
Fe kase Yona dísiǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ku ntsye ntsyǝ lǝ lɛkpɛ kplɛ ditsyuǝ eto kafoo , nko ke Utidi Eto Ubi tsya lɔɔkɛ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ku ntsye ntsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ kǝmiǝ nɛ .
Lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , Ninive eto betidi ebuńyǝ balo mi dikpi itsyise bátsyi bawuninsǝ se bánɔ Yona lébe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mi , utsyuǝ kpe mi lenti mfo wǝ lɛmɔ onso Yona .
Lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛɛ , Besio eto Oka wǝ dítsyi Ɔnwɛdikue ebotaka uńyǝ olo mi dikpi , itsyise ɔ́yɛ utsyi taa mfó úsu Oka Salomo ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ usu ɔnɔ Oka Salomo eto abesibetiki . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lesatsyuǝ nǝ nso Oka Salomo eto kobe kpe mi lenti mfo .
“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lǝ bala lɛwɔnɔ bua bǝlǝkǝ lǝ utidi ǝsuǝǝ , diesukayɛ nlebe nlebe bo lekoe kabɛbɛ kasɔnɔkɔ . Nya lǝ diǝnnyǝ kedufǝkɔ saa ,
diatɛyi ni ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Muusinkli nsu kaka mínsiǝ kɔ . ’ Lǝ dibǝ dinyǝ nkǝ mfó te fufuu , bákpa mfó nya betsyue bikǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ ni kafoo .
Diesinkli kesu kakpa awɔnɔ bua akuanse bamba nnya nkpe ale enso ni nya beesinkli kesu kǝsiǝ mfó . Nya lǝ kalokɔɔ , utidi ǝmǝ eto asayifoyifo aabia kaso nnya kɔ . Nko yuutsyǝ itǝ mi mmi eto betidi bua bamfo nɛ . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu nsi nlɛ etiki budi ku betidi bamǝǝ , wǝ ambe ku wǝ bayimisani ǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ lekple mfó nya bála bǝ bedinko wǝ etiki .
Nya betidi ba díńyǝ mfó eto ɔni dísu ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bebe , fǝ ambe ku fǝ bayimisani ńyǝ lǝ lekple bǝ bala bǝ beedinko fǝ etiki . ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni mɔ ambe nya bawe ni mɔ bayimisani ? ”
Nya óté wǝ bakasebi kɔni ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ mɔ ambe ku mɔ bayimisani !
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato eto lelabii , wǝ ni mɔ ɔyimisani ku mɔ ɔyimisio ku mɔ ambe nɛ . ”
Diyi nǝmfó kee , Yesu édu lǝ diyo úsu lekpo kɛnyɛ . Úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ útsyiko asa boté .
Betidi ba díbǝ bátsyilama wǝ efui tinti eso údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ , nya sitiditu siamǝ díńyǝ lǝ utuflɔ mfó .
Údi mǝ etiki kpǝ ɔ́yɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , utsyuǝ uni ésu úsǝ eyibibi lǝ ɔkuɛ .
Se ɔnlɛ eyibibi nyamǝ busǝǝ , ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ nya baklɔbɛ díbǝ básɛ nnya bámini .
Eyibibi nyamǝ ǝtsyuǝ tsya álo ékpo lǝ abanse ǝsuǝ , kaka sitǝ lemfui . Íkǝ mlǝ itsyise site siamǝ memfui .
Fɛɛ se kofe lefaa , eyibibi nyamǝ díkǝǝ , áblobe nya íkpǝ itsyise nnya keyudu méndufǝ isu kasɔ etsyo .
Eyibibi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ biyu nti . Nya se íkee , biyu biamǝ áto íti nnya .
Fɛɛ eyibibi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nya se íkǝ ébee , ɛnwɔ ebibi . Ǝtsyuǝ anwɔ kolofa , ǝtsyuǝ tsya awosi akua , nya ǝtsyuǝ tsya lɛnwɔ awosi ǝtsyǝ . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ke ato nnya laanɔ asa nkpee , nɔ ! ”
Nya Yesu eto bakasebi díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso feedi betidi etiki kayɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mimii , béfi kato eto sekakedikɔ eto asakulakula bǝtǝ mi , fɛɛ inni betidi bamba .
Utidi wǝ ke asa ntee , buusi bǝtǝ wǝ bawunsǝ nya wɔɔkɛ kpǝ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , nnya nte wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ nnya bafo wǝ lǝ ani .
Nnya eso meedi mǝ etiki kayɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ ni nkǝ , balɛ asa bunyǝ ku ǝnǝmi , fɛɛ bǝǝnnyǝ kǝtsyǝ lekpo . Balɛ bɔnɔ , tsya fɛɛ baannɔ nye banɔ kasɔ .
Nyaso Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto nnya ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ ǝbǝ itǝ nko bǝ , ‘ Betidi bamfo ebɔnɔ bãã , fɛɛ bǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ ! Boonyǝ asa bãã , fɛɛ bǝmbunyǝ ekpanko mǝ
Itsyise disi ǝkpǝ betidi bamfó . Lenni nko inii , eni mǝ ǝnǝmi ebunyǝ asa wuee . Mǝ ato tsya ebɔnɔ asa nnya mǝ nsusu tsya lɔɔnɔ asa kasɔ , nya bɔɔtsyi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝ mɛ , nko Onanto lɛtɛyi nɛ , nya mootsya mǝ bufi . ’
Fɛɛ mii , disiɛkpɛ kpe mi tinti , itsyise mi ǝnǝmi ǝǝnyǝ asa nnya mi ato tsya laanɔ asa .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku basɛɛ kpǝ ábɛbɛ bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ asa nnya bɛnlɛ buunyǝ , fɛɛ bǝnyǝ nya lǝ banɔ asa nnya bɛnlɛ bɔɔnɔ , fɛɛ bánnɔ . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ lǝ nlǝkǝ nwǝ dísǝ eyibibi eto lekpá eto kasɔ nte mi .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi eto letsyabebe fɛ woannɔ ni kasɔɔ , eyifo fe eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ usunte ɔflɔ nya olontidi ǝmǝ lǝǝbǝ kǝnǝ nnya báto mfó kǝlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi .
Eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ kabansesɔɔ , ńyǝ itǝ betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya baafo ni ku disuǝyuǝ lamfolamfo .
Fɛɛ se dianyɛ kedufǝ lǝ mǝ ketu kesu kǝmiǝ esoo , diǝnsiǝ lǝ mǝ kaklɛ . Nyaso lǝ bulǝ nye kamatiti kǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ iku lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ esuǝǝ , yealo mǝ ani lamfolamfo nya bǝǝtǝ disi .
Eyibibi nnya dídufǝ lǝ biyu nti ni betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ . Fɛɛ disibubu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ ku ke setabikɛ sia laawɛ utidi kakpee , aato keti ditiki nǝmǝ , itǝ diannwɔ ebibi .
Nya eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ni betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya baanɔ ni kasɔ . Nya dianwɔ ebibi , ǝtsyuǝ kolofa , ǝtsyuǝ awosi akua , nya ǝtsyuǝ tsya awosi ǝtsyǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpá bamba nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale utsyuǝ wǝ díse eyibibi sɛɛ lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ .
Lǝ ketsye eto lefe nǝ utsyuǝ saa nlabe selabee , olontidi utsyuǝ ésu úsǝ eyibibi wuliwuli ókpo lǝ akpa nyamǝ nti nya údu .
Se eyibibi nyamǝ lébe itsyiko bɔnwɔɔ , sefa sia olontidi ǝme dísu úse ókpo lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ tsya étsyiko ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ kate .
“ Mfó nya ɔkuɛnsate eto beyifoyifo dísu bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Boanto , búnyǝ boǝ eyibibi sɛɛ fesǝ lǝ fǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . Nya se sefa siamfo dítsyi ? ’
“ Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Olontidi utsyuǝ díyifo nyamfo nɛ . ’ “ Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Ala fǝ busu busu sefa siamǝ bulǝkǝ ? ’
“ Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Owo , itsyise lǝ bisu sefa siamǝ kesukɔ kǝlǝkǝǝ , biofo akpa eto ǝtsyuǝ tsya busu kǝlǝkǝ ku sefa siamǝ .
Bitǝ lǝ sefa siamǝ ku akpa nyamǝ lǝ ińyǝ isu ese dilǝkǝfe . Lefe nǝmfóo , muutǝ beyifoyifo bamǝ tɔ̃ baka sefa siamǝ bulǝkǝ kakle etsyu , etsyu batonsǝ fɛ lǝ batɔ bǝlǝkǝ akpa nyamǝ . Nya lǝ bekpa ebibi nyamǝ bekpo lǝ mɔ kenwu ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpá bamba ditsyuǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale utidi wǝ léto diyibibi kɛkɛ ditsyuǝ lǝ wǝ kasɔ .
Diyifo diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ lǝ ni bǝtsyuǝ nti . Fɛɛ lǝ díkǝ lébee , diamɔ kafiani kuyi ko laaso bɔmɔ lǝ ko bǝtsyuǝ kenke nti . Diesense kalɛ nya baklɔbɛ lǝǝbǝ kato ayo lǝ ko kalɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa bamba nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ nte . Site fe usio wǝ dífi ǝyǝnkisǝsa otsyakasǝ ku ntabinamfo eto utu utsyuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ nnamfo wɔwɔ bomǝ kenke letaka . ”
Yesu éfi akpá óte betidi bamǝ asa nyamfo kenke . Wéndi mǝ etiki saa nnya dímanyɛ lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ .
Úyifo nko itǝ lǝ ditiki nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi utsyǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nkǝ , “ Muudi mǝ etiki nyɛnko lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ . Muudi mǝ etiki nnya nkpe lǝ kakula ǝsuǝ idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke . ”
Yesu édu lǝ betidi bamǝ ɔflɔ nya úsu diyo . Nya wǝ bakasebi díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ lekpá nǝ fátɛyi bo itsyi lǝ sefa wunyɛwunyɛ sia lɛkɛ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ kasɔ ate bo . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nwǝ dísǝ eyibibi sɛɛ nyamǝ ni mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi .
Ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ni kawunsiǝ . Nya eyibibi sɛɛ nyamǝ ni mba nkpe lǝ sekakedikɔ siamǝ . Sefa siamǝ ni betidi ba ni olontidi ǝmǝ eto bale .
Nya olontidi wǝ dísǝ sefa bua siamǝ ni Obonsam . Bidikǝ dilǝkǝfe ni kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ . Nya mba lǝǝlǝkǝ bidike biamǝ ni Onanto eto batɔnkpe .
“ Fe kase baakpa sefa kǝtsyǝ ditsyu katonsǝǝ , nko ke yuubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ nɛ .
Mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ebotsyese mɔ batɔnkpe lǝ bǝlǝkǝ asa nnya lǝǝtǝ boeyifo abua ku babuayifo kenke betsyiko Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
Boofi mǝmblɛ bato bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ . Mfó boowi nku bayimi animi !
Nya Onanto eto betidi luuyǝnde fe kofe lǝ mǝ Onanto eto umǝ . Mba ato nkpee , tsyue ato lǝ banɔ !
“ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale bikǝ bia lefo koya béfi bákula lǝ ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ , nya utsyuǝ dísu ɔ́kɛ nnya nya úsi úfi ɔ́kula . Únyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , nyaso úsu úfi wǝ lesa saa óte nya úfí úsu óya ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale nwǝ laate bikǝ wǝ nlɛ atsyabi nnya laanɔ bobe tinti bɔbɛbɛ .
Se úsu únyǝ ɔni wǝ lefo koya tinti onsoo , úfi lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ úsu óte nya úsu óya otsyabi ǝmǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ esi sele asabu nnya báta bákpo lǝ lekpo , nnya bǝlǝkǝ akpɛ ate ate kpǝ .
Nya lefe nǝ asabu nyamǝ díyii , bǝnǝ nnya bábɔnko lǝ ntu báboko ditukpenkpe nya bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ nya básɛ akpɛ nyamǝ bǝlǝkǝ . Básɛ edidi bákpo lǝ etsyitsya , nya básɛ nnya beendi béwui .
Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalokɔ nɛ . Onanto eto batɔnkpe ebubǝ bǝlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ betsyiko lǝ babua nti .
Nya booto babuayifo bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ . Mfó nya nkuwiwi ku anyiyimiyimi lɔɔkɛ . ”
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ asa nyamfo kasɔ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Ee . ”
Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ , afi eto oteasa saa wǝ léfiani Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto okasebi , ale Onamute utsyuǝ wǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ bike fɔfɔ ku bekoko lǝ mi kakulakɔ kaboko lekple . ”
Nya se Yesu lɛtɛyi akpá nyamfo kenke ólosǝǝ , údu mfo .
Úsinkli úsu mǝ umǝ , nya óte asa lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ . Nya betidi ba lɛnɔ wǝ asatetee , íyifo mǝ yanii , nya bátɔ bǝ , “ Sieti nwǝ mfo lékase kobe komfo eto okle útsyiko ? Nya sie únyǝ ǝsuǝale nnya ufi ɔnlɛ ayanisa nyamfo buyifo kate ?
Inni wǝ ni nwǝ laawoe keyi eto ubi ǝmǝ lee ? Nya eni Maria tsya ni wǝ ambe , nya wǝ bayimisani tsya ni Yakob , Yosef , Simon ku Yuda , nya wǝ bayimisio kenke tsya nkpe bo lenti mfo lee ?
Nya lǝ sieti ɔkɛ wǝ kobe ku ǝsuǝale nyamfo eto okle utsyiko ? ”
Nko ini bǝ wǝ asa eyifo mǝ kɛnyɛlele , nyaso báni wǝ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi kpe dibu lǝ kalebe saa , enso wǝ umǝ ku wǝ batokpenyǝ hã eto nti bǝ beembu wǝ . ”
Se bámfo bánɔ esoo , Yesu ményifo ayanisa kpǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Herodes wǝ dídi Seka Lǝ Galilea eto kasɔɔ , ánɔ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ beyifoyifo nkǝ , “ Utidi emfo ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes wǝ bátakǝsǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , nyaso onkpe ǝsuǝale weeyifo ayanisa kate nɛ . ”
Ɔ́tɛyi nko itsyise Herodes ni nwǝ dítǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo . Úyifo nko lǝ Herodia wǝ ni wǝ ɔyimi Filipo eto usiǝ eso .
Itsyise Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes átɛyi Herodes nkǝ , “ Onanto eto kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ fi fǝ ɔyimi eto usiǝ Herodia . ”
Nyamfo eso Herodes ála nkǝ lǝ balo Yohanes . Fɛɛ óte Yudafɔ eto betidi sikpi , itsyise bébu Yohanes fe Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
Diyi lɔnii , se Herodes nlɛ wǝ leleyi budii , ókpadi betidi bǝbǝ . Nya Herodia eto ubisiobi díbǝ uwi kewi lǝ betidi kpǝ bamǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Nyamfo ákpe Herodes disuǝyuǝ tinti .
Mfó útsyǝ kɛnyɛ útǝ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ lesa saa bǝ muutǝ fǝ lesa nǝ ke fatɔ ! ”
Wǝ ambe ǝtǝ ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Tǝ mɛ mɔmɔ mɔmɔ mfoo , Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto disi nǝ béfi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Lesa nǝ disiobi nǝmfo lɛtɔ ǝlǝ Herodes efensɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ kɛnyɛ ka úkǝtsyǝ lǝ wǝ beninǝ ku mba ókpadi óboko mfó eto ǝnǝmi esoo , útǝ nkǝ beyifo lǝ disiobi nǝmǝ eto nnya ɔtɔ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ wǝ .
Nyaso ókpe utidi úsu óla Yohanes wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ Aba eto diyo eto disi .
Béfi disi nǝmǝ nkpe lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ disiobi nǝmǝ nya wuntsya dífi ni úsu útǝ wǝ ambe .
Yohanes eto bakasebi ǝbǝ bétsyi wǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bésu bébike , nya bésu bátɛyi Yesu .
Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bálo Yohanes , úsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ údu mfó úsu kaka lɛbiɔ . Fɛɛ se betidi lɛnɔ nkoo , bédu lǝ mǝ kǝmǝ , báyɛ akpa bésu kaka onkpe .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo . Nya se únyǝ sitiditu siamǝ , mǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo nya ótsya mba ni befimfi .
Ditsyitsyo nǝmfóo , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Kale ebolo , nya mfo tsya atsyo ku umǝ . Nyaso yani betidi bamfo lǝ besu mbuto bo nkpe mfó lǝ besu baya lesatsyuǝ bedi . ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ bedu . Mi kosatee , bitǝ mǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ bedi . ”
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ nte bo ete ni abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi nnya beboko mɛ mfo . ”
Ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamfó nkǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ sefa ǝsuǝ . Nya ufi abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ nyamǝ , nya óbesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani . Úbudi abolo nyamǝ nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi . Nya bakasebi bamǝ tsya dífi nnya bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ .
Utsyuǝ saa édi úmi . Nya se wǝ bakasebi lɛsɛ nnya bédi díbuu , íyi etsyitsya lefosi ǝnuǝ .
Basani ba dídi lesa nǝmǝ eyifo fe basani akpi anɔ . Fɛɛ bánkla besio ku bekpefi bákpe lenti .
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ bakasebi lébe bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ bákatɔ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto lekpake nǝ nse . Wǝ akɛ mfó nkǝ lǝ utsyǝ betidi bamǝ kusu .
Se útsyǝ betidi bamǝ kusu olosǝǝ , wǝ mate ábe úsu kɔtini kato úsu óto ola . Se ketsye lefe léyoo , wǝ mate hã ákɛ mfó .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ébɔyɛ ótsyo . Ufiebi lɛ bɔsɔ kekleke ketinkǝsǝ kufuǝ komǝ , nya ntu nlɛ bɔsɔ kedufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo fe wuufusǝ .
Nya fe kolensiǝntu kplɛ eto abombo ǝtsyǝ ku olosiǝ eto abombo akua nti sekaa , Yesu áyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ úbǝ údufǝ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ ɔflɔ .
Lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ mfóo , báte sikpi nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔkɔ uni ! ” Nyaso bétsyiko bofa ku sikpi bembembe !
Fɛɛ Yesu édi mǝ etiki lamfolamfo ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bekpe utu ! Mɔ uni ! Biante sikpi ! ”
Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ fǝ uni sitintii , tǝ lǝ nyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ mbǝ ntu fǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝ ! ” Nya Petro lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo nya útsyiko bɔyɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ kesu Yesu ɔflɔ .
Fɛɛ se únyǝ kase ufiebi ǝmǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ alee , sikpi ǝmuǝ wǝ nya útsyiko bonya kedufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ kǝmiǝ . Mfó nya Petro lefã ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , fo ǝtǝ mɛ ! ”
Lamfolamfo Yesu ǝnǝ kɔni útsyue , ɔ́kɔbe wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ bofokanɔ lǝ mɛ ǝmbǝ ale ! Beso fáyaki ? ”
Se mǝ inuǝ bamǝ dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafoo , ufiebi ǝmǝ ko lɛyɛ bɔsɔ .
Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ lése akonki básumu wǝ . Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto ubi feni sitinti ! ”
Se báyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ báyo ditukpenkpe nǝ nsee , báyifǝ lǝ Genesaret eto kasɔ .
Mfoó , betidi bamǝ ǝnyǝ Yesu bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nyaso bésu bákpa befimfi ba kenke nkpe lǝ lekpake nǝmfó báboko Yesu ɔflɔ .
Bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ utǝ lǝ befimfi lǝ betidi wǝ awu eto atosi ete . Nya mba kenke dítidi wǝ awu eto atosii , mǝ bufi ǝyuǝ mǝ .
Nya Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ku afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Yerusalem díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
“ Beso fɛ fǝ bakasebi leenyifo lǝ bo banamǝ eto akpa ǝsuǝ ? Bǝǝmflǝ mǝ ani kukɔnɔ fe kase bo akpa laate fɛ beedi lesa ! ”
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya beso biani nya bienyifo lǝ Onanto eto afí ǝsuǝ fɛ biǝtǝkǝko mi batekoko , banakoko eto asatete kama ?
Itsyise Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . Nya utidi wǝ laakpadi wǝ anto ku ambe diye bua ditsyuǝǝ , ele bǝ balo wǝ . ’
Fɛɛ mi áte biǝ utidi nwǝ lesatsyuǝ nte nkǝ woofo ni bufi kawunsǝko wǝ anto nye ambe fɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mfi lesa nǝmfo ntsyǝ kɛnyɛ miǝ muufi ni ntǝ Onanto . ’
Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , yensi fe bǝ bebu mǝ anto mǝ . Kusu komfo ǝsuǝ nya biayɛ kani Onanto eto kɔfi itǝ lǝ bitǝkǝko mi kosate eto asatete kama nɛ .
Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Asa nnya Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛtɛyi útsyǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Betidi bamfo efi mǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki fufu balɛ mɛ dibu butǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ mǝ utu kǝmiǝǝ , baanla mɛ .
Bimba ete beeyifo mɔ keyifo . Itsyise kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto asa ete baate lǝ mɔ ale eto kɛnyɛ . ’ ”
Mfó nya Yesu lékpadi sitiditu siamǝ oboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ asa nyamfo kasɔ !
Inni lesa nǝ leedufǝ utidi eto kɛnyɛ laabiasǝ wǝ , bomu etiki nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛɛ , nnya laabiasǝ wǝ nɛ . ”
Nya wǝ bakasebi díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Eyi fǝnkǝ se Farisifɔ lɛnɔ asa nnya fátɛyii , éla mǝ kɛnyɛ lele tinti ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kuyi saa kuyi ko mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe Kato dímantoo , boosu ko bewi .
Nyaso biankpe mǝ kɛnyɛ . Bete fe bǝnǝmba ba nyɛnko bǝnǝmba bamba . Nya lǝ unǝmba ɔni yɛnko unǝmba bambaa , mǝ inuǝ ba tã ebudu banɔ bedufǝ lǝ kubiǝ kafo . ”
Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ lekpa nǝmfo kasɔ ate bo . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ betidi ba laannɔ asa kasɔ ete binsi binii ?
Binyi biǝ lesa saa nǝ didufǝ utidi lǝ kɛnyɛ , ayɛ kedufǝ wǝ lǝ kafo , nya weesie ni kabɔsǝ fe ɔflɔ kewi ?
Fɛɛ etiki nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ , aabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Nya nyamfo lǝǝtǝ utidi laanansǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kesumu eto kusu ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Itsyise itsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ nya diǝtǝ weeyifo asa bua fe ditidilo , sɛsɔnɔdi nye disenkpo , setsyetɔ , kuyu ku bidiatɛyitɛyi ku betidi eto ayebiasǝbiasǝǝ , laabɔ ketsyi nɛ .
Asa nyamfo eto kakle laanansǝ utidi nɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ utidi mǝmflǝ kɔni fɛ udi lesa fe kase Farisifɔ laatee , nyamfo aannansǝ utidi . ”
Yesu édu mfó úsu lekpake nǝ lɛfi kǝmǝnkplɛ inuǝ ka ni Tiro ku Sidon ɔflɔ .
Mfó nya Kana eto usio utsyuǝ díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ , nya ókafã bembembe kalɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute , Oka David eto kafo eto ubi , nyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! Lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝbǝ disi lǝ mɔ ubisiobi ǝsuǝ nya dítǝ ɔnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ fefe ! ”
Fɛɛ Yesu ménfe kɛnyɛ ɔtɛyi wǝ kulesa . Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi lɛnyi besu balɛ wǝ lekpakpa bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ La wǝ lǝ udu , itsyise utǝkǝko bo ɔlɛ bofã ketisǝ bo ato ! ”
Nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Israel bebi nte fe basamu ba lénya ɔflɔ hã Onanto lékpe mɛ nkǝ nsu . ”
Mfó nya usio ǝmfo díbǝ óse akonki lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute , wunsǝko mɛ ! ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Yanlɛkɛ bǝ befi bekpefi eto didisa bato bakpe mǝ bakpa . ”
Usio ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Onamute , ite nko sitinti . Fɛɛ bakpa bamǝ tsya aafo didisa wɛlɛwɛlɛ nǝ lélo lékpo kasɔ lǝ mǝ onamute eto ɔpunu kalɔ budii . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Eyifo usio wǝ nkpe bofokanɔ tinti ! Lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛɛ , lǝ ibǝ itǝ fǝ . ” Nyaso lǝ lefe nǝmǝ tutuutu wǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ ǝmuǝ ale .
Yesu édu mfó , nya ɔyɛ lǝ Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ óbe kɔtini kutsyuǝ nya úsiǝ kasɔ .
Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bákpa mba léba bankpoo kasɔ , bǝnǝmba , abafa , bamumu , ku befimfi bamba kpǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ , nya ótsya mǝ bufi .
Iyifo betidi bamǝ yanii se bǝnyǝ bamumu nlɛ etiki budi , mba léba bankpoo kasɔ nlɛ botaka kayɛ , abafa nlɛ bɔyɛ , bǝnǝmba nlɛ asa bunyǝ nya bátɛsǝ Israel eto Onanto .
Yesu ákpadi wǝ bakasebi óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitiditu siamfo eto asa lɛ mɛ kaminsǝ , itsyise bǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ diyi tsyǝfǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ nɛ , nya kulesa ente mɔmɔ boodi . Manla miǝ lǝ yani mǝ lǝ bedu ku kafo fufu , lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ isu enako mǝ lǝ kusu . ”
Wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti buunyǝ didisa butǝ mǝ lǝ mfimnti mfo bǝ lǝ betidi ba kpenkpe mfo lǝ bedi bemi ? ”
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Didisa lesia nte mi ? ” Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abolo akuanse ku akpɛ kɛkɛ asiani ete nte . ”
Nyaso Yesu átɛyi sitiditu siamǝ nkǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ .
Úfi abolo akuanse ku akpɛ nyamǝ , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úbudi nnya nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ . Nya bésie nnya bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ .
Mǝmblɛ édi lesa nǝmǝ bemi . Nya se básɛ nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ nnya díbuu , íyi etsyitsya akuanse .
Basani ba dídi lesa nǝmǝ eboyo akpi ana . Fɛɛ bánkla besio ku bekpefi bakpe lenti .
Se Yesu dítsyǝ betidi bamǝ kusu olosǝǝ , údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya údu úsu Magadan eto lekpake eti .
Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ bato wǝ babe . Nyaso bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ ate bo lǝ bote boǝ etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ sitinti . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ kofe lɛ diyo budufǝ nya binyǝ asɔmiloku lɛsɛ hǝǝ , biatɛyi biǝnkǝ kalesɛ ebusiǝ kusɛɛ .
Nya kolesiǝntu lǝ kofe lɛ boto nya kawunsiǝ ditsyiko bona tũũ , biatɛyi biǝnkǝ ɔsɔmi ǝbǝ bɔni . Bialɛ ola akafo bote kase kawunsiǝ luubǝ kǝtsyǝ lǝ binyǝ asɔmiloku eto ditsyǝbi . Fɛɛ beso biǝmbofo asa nnya luubǝ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ bote !
Mi mmi eto betidi bua ba leesumu bǝfiǝ ! Bela biǝ nyifo ayanisa nte mi lǝ binyǝ ? Kulefe , membuyifo ! Ayanisa nnya eto okle boote mi ete ni nnya díbǝ lǝ Yona ǝsuǝ . ” Nyaso ótaka údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Se bakasebi bamǝ lɛyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bésu ni lekpake nǝ nsee , bǝnyǝ bǝ báta ǝsuǝ béntsyi dídisa saa bésuko .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini lǝ Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ eto ǝyǝnkisǝsa nnya baakpe lǝ asa ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó nya bétsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nnya bóentsyi didisa saa eso ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi mmǝǝ . ”
Yesu áte lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyi , nyaso ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ mi nti itsyi lǝ didisa nǝmǝ bíentsyi eso ǝsuǝ ? Mi bofokanɔ emfui !
Nyaso biannɔ tɔ asa kasɔ ? Biankloma tɔ lefe nǝ mínsie abolo anɔ míntǝ betidi akpi anɔ dídi bémi ? Nya etsyitsya asia nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ dibu díyi ?
Nya abolo akuanse nya mímfi míntǝ betidi akpi anaa , etsyitsya asia díyi se békpa nnya díbu ?
Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ biannɔ kasɔ biǝ inni didisa ǝsuǝ míndi mi etiki mintsyiko ? Bebe sinini lǝ Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ lǝ mǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa ǝsuǝ ! ”
Nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ bakasebi bamǝ lɛnɔ kasɔ bǝ inni ǝyǝnkisǝsa ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ mǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ nɛ . Bomu lǝ asa nnya Farisifɔ ku Sadukifɔ laate ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ .
Yesu ésu lekpake nǝ lɛfi Kaisarea Filipi eto umǝ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Owoe betidi laatɛyi bǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ni ? ”
Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtsyuǝ bǝ fǝ ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes . Bǝtsyuǝ tsya bǝ fǝ ni Elia , nya babamba tsya bǝ Yeremiya nye Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi bamba utsyuǝ feni . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya mi nkpǝ ? Owoe biatɛyi biǝ wǝ mini ? ”
Simon Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . Fǝ ni Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ eto Ubi . ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Simon , Yona eto ubi , átɛyi nnya ɛlɛkɛ . Itsyise ɔnukualɛ ǝmfo mámbɔ utsyi lǝ utidinini saa eto kɛnyɛ . Bomu mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe katoo , wǝ dílǝkǝ nnya óte fǝ nɛ .
Nyaso nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ fǝ Petro , fǝ diye ni leba . Nya leba nǝmfo ǝsuǝ mooto mɔ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ ńyǝnsǝ , nya ukpǝ eto ǝsuǝale kulaa tsya embutǝkǝ ni kato .
Muufi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto kasafui ntǝ fǝ . Lesa saa nǝ fookle lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bookle ni kato . Nya lesa saa nǝ foonyankli lǝ kasɔ mfoo , boonyankli ni tsya kato . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lékpe wǝ bakasebi kɔfi nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kuutsyǝ saa biǝnkǝ mɔ ni Nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
Idu lǝ lefe nǝmfó ɛntɔɔ , Yesu étsyiko wǝ bakasebi etiki bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ wuee nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ nsu Yerusalem lǝ nsu nyǝ kanyi lǝ beninǝ , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku lǝ afi eto bateasa eto ani . Boolo mɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ mɛ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nsinkli mbǝ nkpǝ . ”
Petro ákpa wǝ úsuko lɛkpɔ , nya utsyiko buyǝnki kakpe wǝ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Kulefe , Bonamute ! Nyamfo eto okle okakaaka ! Yǝmbǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kulefe , kulefe ! ”
Yesu átsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ ɔ́tɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Obonsam , du mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ ! Eyifo nwǝ eto eyifosa dińyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise fǝ nsusu bomfo menyifo Onanto eto nle , bomu utidinini eto nle . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ wǝǝtǝkǝko mɛɛ , ele bǝ ɔni wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ utsyi wǝ uyikabie utǝkǝko mɛ .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laala nkǝ waata wǝ nkpǝ eto disii , woonyansǝ mu . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ lǝ mɔ butǝkǝko ǝsuǝǝ , wuunyǝ mu .
Nte kutǝkǝ ko utidi luunyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ kenke afiani wǝ bele nya ónyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ . Nye be utidi luufi oflomako bǝ lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ebubǝ ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ , nya moofo utsyuǝ saa kayo lǝ keyifo ka úyifo ǝsuǝ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ wuee minkǝ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ kpe mi lenti mfo ba lembukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi dibǝ fe Oka . ”
Eyi akua kamaa , Yesu ákpa Petro ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimi Yohanes mate úsuko kɔtini ko letaka eto disi kato .
Se bǝńyǝ mfóo , bǝnyǝ bǝ Yesu eto ǝsuǝ áfloma . Wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛ buyǝnde fe kofe , nya awu nnya onkpe diflubi futututu ɛnlɛ boto lǝ ǝnǝmi .
Mfó nya bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ dínyǝ Moses ku Elia banlɛ etiki budi ku Yesu .
Nya Petro lébesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ɛlɛkɛ tinti bǝ búbǝ mfo ! Lǝ aalaa , mooto ebu ǝtsyǝ . Fǝ lɔni , Moses lɔni nya Elia tsya lɔni . ”
Se ɔnlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyii , lɛsɔmiloku nǝ nlɛ buyǝnde ábɔ díti mǝ , nya bánɔ ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi lɛsɔmiloku nǝmǝ kǝmiǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mɔ Ubi lala , wǝ ǝsuǝ mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ . Bitsyue wǝ koto ! ”
Se bakasebi itsyǝ bamfo lɛnɔ ɔkɔɛ ǝmfoo , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti nya béfi ǝnǝmi béfusǝ kasɔ .
Yesu ésu mǝ ɔflɔ nya útidi mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Betaka bińyǝ ! Biante sikpi ! ”
Se bátakasǝ ǝnǝmi bábe katoo , bǝnnyǝ kuutsyuǝ saa enso Yesu mate hã .
Se banlɛ bɔyifǝ lǝ kɔtini komǝ kǝbǝ kasɔɔ , Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kutsyuǝ saa lesa nǝ bínyǝ mfo isu ese lefe nǝ batakasǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ mimbǝ . ”
Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso afi eto bateasa laatɛyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ Elia ka bubǝ ɔtɔnsǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Sitinti ele bǝ Elia ka bubǝ ɔtɔnsǝ bǝ lǝ ɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ .
Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Elia ébubǝ koko , tsya bǝnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya béyifo wǝ disale nǝ kee bála . Nko ke booyifo mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi tsya disiale nɛ . ”
Mfó bakasebi bamǝ léte bǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ɔnlɛ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi díbǝ báyo sitiditu siamǝ ɔflɔ , osani utsyuǝ ǝbǝ óse akonki lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nyǝ mɔ ubisaibi ǝmfo kaminsǝ ! Ɔlɛ budukanɔ eto bufi bufi nya ɔnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ tinti . Lefe kpǝ weedu kanɔ kedufǝ lǝ ute nye ntu ǝsuǝ tsya .
Nkpa wǝ mboko fǝ bakasebi ɔflɔ , fɛɛ bámfo wǝ botsya . ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mii , mmi eto betidi , beso biamfo mɛ kanɔ nya bitidi ato mǝ ? Nte lefe nǝ eto okle ele bǝ nkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ ? Nte lefe nǝ eto lefe ele bǝ mfi nnǝ mi ! Bekpa osaibi ǝmǝ beboko mɛ mfo ! ”
Mfó Yesu léto ɔkɔɛ ókpe lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝ nlɛ dikpefi nǝmǝ bulǝ nya lɛbɔ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ! Nya bufi bomǝ díyuǝ wǝ lamfolamfo .
Kamaa , bakasebi bamǝ mate ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bóamfo lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ bola kǝlǝkǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi bofokanɔ mǝmmuǝ ale . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ mi bofokanɔ te fenkǝ diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ kenkee , ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ bǝ biofo kɔtini komfo bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Nyi mfo , esu mǝ ! ’ Nya yuubǝ itǝ . Kulesa ǝmbǝ biǝmbofo buyifo .
Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ olatoto ku kɛnyɛklekle ǝsuǝ hã fɛ biofo lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo eto okle bola kǝlǝkǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ bakasebi bamǝ kenke díbǝ bátsya lǝ Galilea , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Boofi Utidi Eto Ubi bakpe betidi lǝ ani ,
nya boolo wǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ oboko nkpǝ . ” Nyamfo álo bakasebi bamǝ ani .
Lefe nǝ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi díbǝ bédufǝ Kapernaum , Yudafɔ eto mba laafo Disumuyo eto oko ǝbǝ bátɔ Petro bǝnkǝ , “ Mi oteasa tsya aafó Disumuyo eto oko ǝmǝ ? ”
Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , woafó . ” Nya se Petro dísu údufǝ diyo , Yesu áka wǝ bɔtɔ nkǝ , “ Simon , be ni fǝ nsusu ? Bawoe eto ani ele bǝ bafo oko bǝtǝ kawunsiǝ eto baka ? Bǝmǝnyǝ eto ani lee bafɔ ? ”
Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bafɔ . ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ ete bǝ yanle bǝ bǝmǝnyǝ fo oko saa nɛ .
Fɛɛ se boanla boǝ boata kuutsyuǝ saa bubu esoo , su ditumbukplɛ eto kɛnyɛ lǝ ata osakɛ . Lɛkpɛ tutɛ nǝ fuulǝkǝǝ , ebunyǝ atabi lǝ ni kɛnyɛ nnya looyo afo boofǝ eto oko ǝmǝ . Lǝkǝ nya , lǝ esu afo bokufǝ eto oko . ”
Lefe nǝmfóo , bakasebi bamǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ni ɔkplɛnyǝ kenke lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ? ”
Lǝ nyasoo , Yesu ákpadi dikpefi kɛkɛ ditsyuǝ úbǝ úńyǝnsǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ biamfloma mi ditsyǝbi biyifo fe bekpefii , biembudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
Utidi wǝ ni ɔkplɛnyǝ kenke lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔɔ , wǝ ni utidi wǝ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe dikpefi nǝmfo eto okle .
“ Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ loofo bekpefi bamfo eto utsyuǝ lǝ mɔ disii , mɔɔ ini ófo .
“ Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ ebutǝ bekpefi ba léfo mɛ bánɔ mfo eto ɔni kplo lǝ onya kusu lǝ mɔ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso lǝ befi ukue batsyasǝ lǝ kukuǝ kplɛ bakpe wǝ lǝ simuǝ bato wǝ bakpe lǝ lekpo eto kaka letsyo , lǝ unǝ ntu ukpǝ .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ itǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa nnya loofo butǝ utidi dufǝ lǝ lebua lǝ onya kusu ! Asa nyamfo eto okle ebubǝ kokooko . Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ itǝ nwǝ ǝsuǝ nyamfo lɔɔyɛ ibǝ .
Lǝ fǝ kɔni nye kokpa ǝǝtǝ feeyifo lebua , la ko ǝlǝkǝ ato akpe . Ɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ bǝ yɛ edufǝ lǝ nkpǝ kǝmiǝ kɔni kɔnwɛ nye kokpa kɔnwɛ enso bǝ yɛ ani ǝnuǝ nye akpa ǝnuǝ lǝ befi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ .
