Nya lǝ fǝ dinǝmi ǝǝtǝ feeyifo lebua , lǝkǝ ni ato akpe ! Ɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ bǝ nyǝ nkpǝ ku dinǝmi lɛwɛ enso bǝ kɛ ǝnǝmi ǝnuǝ lǝ befi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku manlo kǝmiǝ .
“ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ biemfi ekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo eto kuutsyuǝ fe mba dimanle kulesa . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ bakpe Onanto eto batɔnkpe kato ba lǝǝnyǝ lǝ mɔ Anto eto ǝnǝmi lefe saa lǝ mǝ kutsyǝ .
Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ǝbǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo betidi ba lénya kusu lǝ nkpǝ .
“ Lǝ utsyuǝ kpe basamu kolofa kɔni , nya ɔni lénya lǝ mǝ ntii , be bibu biǝ wuuyifo ? Weemboyani awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ bamǝ utsyǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝ mfó bekedi , nya wuusu ɔbɛbɛ ɔni ǝme lénya ?
Nya lǝ únyǝ wǝǝ , mɔtɛyi mi miǝ wuunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ enso awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ba dímanya mfó ǝsuǝ .
Nko ke inte itǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato nɛ , nkǝ woannla nkǝ bekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo eto kuutsyuǝ lǝ onya .
“ Lǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ áta fǝ úbuu , su wǝ ɔflɔ , lǝ ǝlǝkǝ wǝ botakebu ate wǝ . Nya tǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ ɛkɛ lǝ fonko wǝ eto nti ete . Lǝ ɔ́nɔ fǝ kasɔɔ , te fǝ esinkli eyifo lɔni ku fǝ ɔyimi nɛ .
Fɛɛ lǝ wǝmbɔnɔ fǝ kasɔɔ , tǝ lǝ betidi inuǝ nye itsyǝ lǝ banɔ ko mi lǝ adansiɛ seka eso , fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi .
Nya lǝ mfó tsya ɔni woannɔ kasɔɔ , nyalɛ tǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ lǝ banɔ . Nya lǝ mfó tsya woannɔ kasɔɔ , lǝkǝ ato lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ fe utidi wǝ lǝmbǝ bofokanɔ nye nwǝ laafo umǝnko .
“ Nyaso nlɛ mimblɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ lesa saa nǝ biokle lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bookle ni kato . Nya lesa saa ke bionyankli lǝ kasɔ mfoo , boonyakli ni kato tsya .
“ Nya nsi nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi tsya minkǝ , lǝ mi inuǝ eto kɛnyɛ eyifo kani lǝ kasɔ mfo bɛnlɛ lesaatsyuǝ bɔtɔɔ , mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato ebuyifo ni utǝ mi .
Itsyise kaka mi inuǝ nye itsyǝ letsya lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , nkpe mi lenti . ”
Nya Petro lɛnyi ɔ́fi Yesu nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ ata mɛ ubuu , sesia ele bǝ mfi ntsyɛ wǝ ? Sekuanse lee ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni sekuanse ete ! Bomu awosi akuanse eto sekuanse .
“ Itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ te fe Oka wǝ lela nkǝ weebu nkunta ku wǝ beyifoyifo .
Kase útsyǝ kasɔ koo , bákpa osani utsyuǝ wǝ nsi wǝ kayo kplɛ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ .
Kulesa ente wǝ wuufi ofo kayo kamǝ esoo , oka ǝmǝ ǝtǝ nkǝ bate wǝ ku wuusiǝ ku wǝ bebi ku lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ lǝ befi bafo kayo kamǝ .
“ Itǝ uyifoyifo ǝmfo áse akonki lǝ oka ǝmǝ ǝnǝmi ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Tsyǝ ǝsuǝ ko mɛ , moofo fǝ kayo kamǝ kenke . ’
Wǝ asa ǝnǝ oka ǝmǝ kafo , nyaso úfi kayo kamǝ kenke ɔ́tsyɛ wǝ nya óyani wǝ údu .
“ Nya se uyifoyifo ǝmfo díduu , ótsyako wǝ uyifotsyuǝ , wǝ dísiǝ wǝ sika flubia sɛkɛ eto kayo . Mfó nya úmuǝ wǝ lǝ ale ǝsuǝ lǝ simuǝ ku lɛkɔɛlonlobi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fo mɛ kayo ka fensi mɛ ! ’
“ Wǝ uyifotsyuǝ ǝmǝ álɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Tsyǝ ǝsuǝ ko mɛ , moofo fɛ kayo ka kenke minsi fǝ ! ’
“ Fɛɛ ɔ́ni nya útǝ nkǝ beti wǝ bakpe lǝ Aba eto diyo isu ese lefe nǝ woofo kayo ka kenke unsi wǝ .
Se wǝ beyifotsyuǝ dínyǝ lesa nǝ díbǝǝ , ílǝ mǝ tinti nya bésu bátɛyi Oka ǝmǝ lesa saa nǝ díbǝ .
“ Nyaso ókpadi wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ ndomunyǝ bua ! Mfi fǝ kayo ka fensi mɛ kenke ntsyɛ fǝ itsyise álɛ mǝ lekpakpa eso .
Kase mínyǝ fǝ kaminsǝǝ , nko ke ele bǝ eni fintsya nyǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ uyifoyifo kaminsǝ nɛ . ’
Kafo ányi Oka ǝmǝ tinti nya útǝ nkǝ bǝnǝ wǝ koto bakpe wǝ lǝ diyo isu ese lefe nǝ woofo kayo kamǝ kenke olosǝ . ”
Mfó Yesu lélosǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke mɔ Anto wǝ nkpe kato luuyifo utsyuǝ saa lǝ mi nti wǝ lembufi ɔtsyɛ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ itsyi taa wǝ lɛkɔɛsi ke nɛ . ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi asa nyamfo ólosǝǝ , údu lǝ Galilea úsu Yudea eto lɛkpɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ Yordan eto ketu eto lekpake nǝ nse .
Betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ nya ótsya mǝ efimbi , efimbi mfó .
Mfó nya Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ baato wǝ babe , nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bo kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ osani ni wǝ usiǝ lǝ kusu saa ola ǝsuǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Biankla tɔ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ bǝ taa ketsyikokɔɔ , nwǝ díyifo kawunsiǝǝ , usio ku osani úyifo betidi ?
Nya Onanto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani luudu lǝ wǝ anto ku ambe utsyǝ nya wuufi kusiǝ , nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ loofiani utidi ɔni . ’
Itsyise lǝ nnya kamaa , bensiyifo betidi inuǝ . Bomu bafiani utidi ɔni . Nyaso yanle bǝ utidi sense lesa nǝ Onanto dífi ɔ́kɔ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ . ”
Farisifɔ bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ beso Moses dítǝ kusu nkǝ ele bǝ osani tǝ wǝ usiǝ kukue nkǝ ɔlɛ wǝ bɔni fɛ lǝ ɔni wǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi letotidi eso Moses dítǝ kusu nkǝ bɛni bese ku bǝsiǝ nɛ . Yɛntsyǝ nko lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ .
Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ osani wǝ ke lɛni wǝ usiǝ , nya inni lǝ disenkpo eso nya úsu úfi usio bambaa , ókpo kusiǝ . ”
Wǝ bakasebi átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ nko usǝ ku usiǝ eto nti eto etiki ntee , nyalɛ ɛlɛkɛ eso lǝ bemfi kusiǝ nye bǝnsiǝ kusǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Inni utsyuǝ saa loofo asatete nyamfo bofo nko , enso mba Onanto dítǝ nnya nko hã .
Esu kpǝ kpe nyaso betidi leemfi bǝsiǝ . Bǝtsyuǝ nko bále mǝ nɛ . Bǝtsyuǝǝ , betidi díyifo mǝ nko . Bǝtsyuǝ tsya emfi bǝsiǝ itsyise bala bǝ beefi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto keyifo . Nwǝ loofo wǝ ǝsuǝ bufi kǝtǝ asatete nyamfoo , tǝ lǝ uyifo nko . ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa bekpefi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ ufi ani utǝkǝ lǝ mǝ , lǝ oto ola utǝ mǝ , fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi ényenki bákpe betidi bamǝ .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ bekpefi kusu lǝ bǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ , nya bienti mǝ kusu , itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo fǝ mba laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe ekpefi bamfo eto okle eto kale . ”
Nya Yesu dífi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ókpo mǝ atsyɔ , nya údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Osani utsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ diyi lɔni nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , nte lesa sɛɛ nǝ ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
Mfó Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Beso fanlɛ mɛ kasɛɛ ka ele bǝ beyifo bɔtɔ ? Utidi ɔni hã nkpe wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ . Lǝ ala fǝ ǝǝnyǝ nkpǝ manloo , yɛ lǝ Onanto eto afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Nte afi nnya ? ” Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Manlo utidi , mendi sɛsɔnɔ , menyu , manla fuutsyuǝ kɛnyɛ ,
bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe , nya lǝ ala fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe kase faala fǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó nya okosobi ǝmfo dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mbuyifo lǝ afi nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝ . Be disi ibu bǝ nyifo ? ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ aala fǝ aaflɔɔ , su lǝ esu efi fǝ lesa saa nǝ nte fǝ ate . Nya lǝ efi atabi nnya fǝnyǝ esu ǝtǝ bakombo , nya fuunyǝ bikǝ ǝtsyǝ kato nɛ . Nyamfo eto kamaa , sinkli ǝbǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
Fɛɛ se okosobi ǝmǝ lɛnɔ nyamfoo , údu ku bulǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Itsyise bikǝ kpǝ akɛ wǝ .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ wuee minkǝ , yɔɔkɛ ale itǝ batabinyǝ bǝ bedufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
Nsi nlɛ bɔtɛyi bio minkǝ , iyuǝ itǝ ɔtɔmini ku lekoko bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ okabikǝ eto ofo ofe enso bǝ otabinyǝ dufǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
Lefe nǝ bakasebi bamǝ lɛnɔ nyamfoo , íyifo mǝ yanii , nyaso bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe ko luunyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
Yesu ábe mǝ tũũ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kawunsiǝ eto utidi saa ǝmbofo nyamfo buyifo . Fɛɛ Onanto , wǝ ebofo lesa saa buyifo . ”
Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bee ! Bóayani lesa saa bútsyǝ bǝ lǝ butǝkǝko fǝ . Be bo luunyǝ ? ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lefe nǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , luubǝ lǝ mɔ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ mbǝ nsiǝ lǝ mɔ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ fɔfɔ kamǝǝ , mi lefosi inuǝ ba dítǝkǝko mɛ tsya ebusiǝ lǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bekponko Israel bebi eto lefosi mmfo nnuǝ bomǝ lekpo .
Nyaso utsyuǝ saa wǝ léyani diyo nye bayimisani nye bayimisio nye anto nye ambe nye bebi nye kakuɛ utsyǝ nkǝ lǝ utǝkǝko mɛ esoo , ebunyǝ nnya kayofofo kolofa ku kama . Nya Onanto ebutǝ wǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalosǝkɔ .
Fɛɛ betidi kpǝ ba ntɔ sɛtɔ mɔmɔɔ , ebubǝ bafe kama . Nya mba ntǝkǝ kama mɔmɔɔ , ebubǝ bafe batɔ sɛtɔ .
“ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale eyibibi eto ɔkuɛmfo utsyuǝ wǝ létaka ku olesiǝtu nkǝ weesu ɔbɛbɛ diyi eto beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ lǝ beyifo keyifo bǝtǝ wǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ .
Ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ ku beyifoyifo bamǝ átɔnɔ lǝ diyi eto keyifo eto kayofofo ǝsuǝ , ini sika flubia sɔni eto atabi , nya bédu bésu eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ .
“ Se ɛsɔ abombo ɔwɔnɔmbǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ esi úsu asi nya únyǝ se basani bǝtsyuǝ ńyǝ mfó banlɛ kulesa buyifo .
Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mi tsya su biyifo keyifo lǝ mɔ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ lǝ mfo mi kayo ka dińyǝ itǝ . ’
Nyaso bésu ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . “ Nya lǝ lefosi abombo ǝnuǝ ku lǝ kakɔmi eto abombo ǝtsyǝ eto lefee , usi úyifo nko ke .
Se ibu sɛkɛ lǝ abombo anɔ lǝ ɛsɔɔ , usi úsu asi mfó nya únyǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ nsi ńyǝ mfó . Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Beso binyǝ mfo diyi wɔlɔlɔlɔ bɛnlɛ diyi bobiasǝ keyifo menyifo menyifo ? ’
“ Bǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝntǝ bo keyifo nkǝ buyifo . ’ “ Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nyalɛ , mi tsya su mɔ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ bisu biyifo keyifo . ’
“ Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ átɛyi beyifoyifo eto uninǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kpadi beyifoyifo bamǝ lǝ afo mǝ kayo , tsyiko lǝ mba díbǝ fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ , lǝ esu alosǝ lǝ mba leka bubǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
“ Báfo betidi ba díbǝ keyifo ku ditsyitsyo eto abombo anɔ eto utsyuǝ saa sika flubia sɔni sɔni .
Nya se éyo mba leka keyifo bubǝ ku olesiǝǝ , bébu bǝ boofo mǝ kayo baso mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Fɛɛ mǝ tsya eto utsyuǝ saa áfo diyi eto kayofofo kani kamǝ , ini sika flubia sɔni .
Se báfo atabi nyamǝǝ , betsyiko bunyenki kakpe ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ bǝnkǝ ,
‘ Betidi fɛfɛ ba báfo éyifo keyifo lebombosɔsɔ lɔni hã , nya bomba mfo díńyǝ lǝ kofe buyifo keyifo diyi wɔlɔlɔlɔ tsyaa , kayofofo kani ete bǝtǝ bo ! ’
“ Mfó ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ ɔni nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyimitsyuǝ , nɔ . Mántafa fǝ . Lee , inni diyi lɔni eto keyifo eto kayofofo ka ni sika flubia sɔni ǝsuǝ bókpe asi ?
Nyaso fo fǝ kayofofo lǝ edu esu diyo . Iyifo mɔ lelabi miǝ mǝǝtǝ utidi fɛfɛ ǝmfo kayofofo fe kase mínkǝtǝ fǝ ke .
Lee , mimbǝ kusu meeyifo ku mɔ atabi kase maala ? Lee , mɔ kafoɛkpɛ ka meeyifo nlɛ fǝ ǝnǝmi bɔsɛ ? ’ ”
Nyaso Yesu álosǝ ɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi ba ni bafɛfɛ ebofiani betutɛ nya mba ni betutɛ loofiani bafɛfɛ . ”
Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ lɛyɛ bantɔ lǝ Yerusalem , ókpa mǝ úsuko lɛkpɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Bɛnɔ , bɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem kaka boomuǝ Utidi Eto Ubi bakpe lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani . Nya boolo wǝ dikpǝnkpi .
Nya boofi wǝ bakpe lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto ani bǝ bakpe wǝ kofani , bablɛ wǝ , basɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ukpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ nkpǝ . ”
Nya Sebedeo eto usiǝ lékpa wǝ bebi inuǝ óboko nya base akonki lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ ɔwunsǝko mǝ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ? ” Mfó usio ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Tsyǝ mɛ kɛnyɛ fǝnkǝ lǝ edufǝ lǝ fǝ sekakedikɔɔ , ebusiǝsǝ mɔ bebisaibi inuǝ bamfo , ɔni lǝ fǝ kodiani nya unuǝfǝ lǝ fǝ kǝmǝni . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔtɔ . Kanyi ka mǝǝbǝ bunyǝǝ , mi tsya ebofo ke butsyi ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Ee , boofo . ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti , biofo butsyi . Fɛɛ mimbǝ kusu mǝǝlǝkǝ futsyǝ luusiǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani nye kǝmǝni . Nsiǝkɔ bomfo te ítǝ betidi ba mɔ Anto lɛlɔ utsyǝ itǝ mǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ bakasebi lefosi fɛfɛ lɛnɔ bayimi inuǝ bamfo eto etiki nyamfoo , kafo ányi mǝ tinti !
Nyaso Yesu ákpadi mǝ ɔkɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyi biǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto baka kpe ǝsuǝale kenke lǝ mǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya mǝ batɔnkotɔnko tsya nkpe ǝsuǝale kekleke lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ inni nko ele bǝ itsyǝ lǝ mimba lefo bɛnɔ nti . Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti aala nkǝ weeyifo ɔkplɛnyǝ , ele bǝ uyifo uyifoyifo utǝ bafɛfɛ .
Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti aala nkǝ weeyifo ututɛɛ , ele bǝ uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ uyifoyifo utǝ bafɛfɛ kenke .
Nko ke ini nɛ bǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , mǝmbǝ miǝ besumu mɛ . Bomu bǝ lǝ nsumu nya lǝ mfi mɔ nkpǝ ntǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto disi . ”
Kase Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi nlɛ budu lǝ Yeriko eto umǝ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko mǝ .
Bǝnǝmba inuǝ ba nsi lǝ kusu ɔflɔɔ , ánɔ bǝ Yesu ǝbǝ ɔlɛ bofe , nyaso bétsyiko bofa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , Oka David eto ubi ! Nnyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
Betidi bamǝ átɛyi bǝnǝmba bamǝ bǝnkǝ bedika . Fɛɛ mfe bomu báfa bembembe enso bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , Oka David eto ubi ! Nyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
Yesu ǝkǝnǝ únyǝ nya ókpadi mǝ nkǝ bǝbǝ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be bela biǝ nyimfo ntǝ mi ? ”
Mfó bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Anto , bola boǝ tǝ lǝ bunyǝ asa . ”
Mǝ asa ǝnǝ Yesu kafo nya utidi mǝ ǝnǝmi . Lamfolamfo , mǝ ǝnǝmi ásini nya bǝnyǝ asa , nya bǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lɛnyi bafi Yerusalem nya bédufǝ Betfage lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ála wǝ bakasebi inuǝ ɔ́tɔnsǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bikatɔ lǝ kebuto ka nkpe sɛtɔ mfó . Mfóo , biunyǝ ɔflimu wǝ nńyǝ lǝ ukuǝ nya wǝ ubi nńyǝ wǝ lǝ akɔ . Nyankli wǝ ku ukuǝ lǝ akpa mǝ aboko mɛ .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ átɔ mi lesaatsyuǝǝ , bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute lɛ mǝ bohiã . ’ Ete booyani mǝ lamfolamfo bǝtǝ mi . ”
Nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi utsyuǝ lɛtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ ,
“ Bɛtɛyi Sion eto umǝnkplɛ eto betidi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bebe , mi Oka lɛ mi ɔflɔ bubǝ ! Obokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya unsi lǝ ɔflimu ku ubi ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ . ’ ”
Nyaso bakasebi inuǝ bamfó ésu nya béyifo fe kase Yesu lékpe mǝ nkǝ beyifo .
Bákpa ɔflimu ku ubi ǝmǝ báboko , nya béfi mǝ mfia bésensǝ bákpo lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ nya Yesu lébe úsiǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ keyudu boto . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya léla sekabe ku keyilɛ bésensǝ bákpo lǝ kusu .
Nya betidi ba ntɔ ku mba ntǝkǝ kenke nlɛ bofa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu , itǝ Oka David eto ubi wǝ nlɛ bubǝ o-o ! Atɛsǝ itǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye usuǝ ! Yuu , yuuduu itǝ Onanto ! ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu dídufǝ Yerusalem , umǝ ǝmǝ kenke ko dítinkǝ . Nya betidi lɛtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe uni ? ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesu wǝ dítsyi Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ nɛ ! ”
Yesu ésu údufǝ Disumuyo Kplɛ nya óla betidi ba kenke nlɛ bikǝ bote ku booya mfó úlǝkǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ . Úkǝ kapunu ka betidi nlɛ atabi bofloma ku mba laate ablonima eto akpomɛ uwui .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bookpo mɔ diyo nkǝ , ola katokɔ . ’ Fɛɛ mi efi ni bíyifo beyu eto kabiɔkɔ ! ”
Nya bǝnǝmba ku abafa díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ Disumuyo mfó nya Yesu létsya mǝ bufi .
Se besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa dínyǝ ayanisa nya Yesu nlɛ buyifo ku bekpefi ba nlɛ kudu bokpo katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Oka David eto ubi , ” lǝ Disumuyo mfóo , kafo ányi mǝ tinti .
Nyaso bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Alɛ lesa nǝ bekpefi bamǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi mfó bɔnɔ ? ” Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ bɔnɔ . Nya nyi tsya minkǝ békla nyamfo lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝ , ‘ Ǝtǝ bekpefi ku bebisambi fǝ befi atɛsǝ nnya lɛflɔ tinti bǝtǝ fǝ . ’ ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édu lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bamfó ɔflɔ nya úsu údufǝ Betania eto umǝ kaka úsu ólabe .
Se kale dísiǝ nya se úsinkli ɔnlɛ umǝ bubǝ ku olesiǝǝ , kukpǝnsɛ álɛ wǝ .
Únyǝ kudiyi kutsyuǝ lǝ kusu ɔflɔ mfó nya ɔ́tsyi úsu ko ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ wǝnnyǝ kulesa lǝ ko enso ko afanto . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi kuyi komǝ nkǝ , “ Ensiembɔnwɔ ebibi kulefe tsya . ” Lamfolamfo kudiyi komǝ áblobe .
Se bakasebi bamǝ dínyǝ nkoo , éyifo mǝ yanii . Nya bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Be dítǝ bǝ kudiyi komfo léblobe nko mmǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ bekpe bofokanɔ bo lǝmbǝ kayakii , biofo nnya mínyifo kudiyi komfo buyifo . Fɛɛ inni nyamfo mate . Bomu biofo kɔtini komfo bɔtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Nyi lǝ mfo esu edufǝ lǝ lekpo kafo , ’ nya yuubǝ itǝ nko .
Nya lesa saa nǝ biɔtɔ Onanto lǝ olatoto ǝsuǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , biunyǝ ni . ”
Se Yesu dísinkli úbǝ Disumuyo Kplɛ mfó nya ɔnlɛ asa botee , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte ǝsuǝale nnya fankpe feeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle ? Nya owoe dítǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale nyamfo ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mintsya mɔɔtɔ mi ditiki lɔni hã nnɔ . Nya lǝ bitǝ mɛ mbuayɛɛ , mɔɔtɛyi mi ǝsuǝale nnya minkpe meeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle .
Owoe ɔflɔ Yohanes léfo ǝsuǝale fɛ úflǝsǝ betidi ntuu ? Onanto ɔflɔ lee , nye lǝ utidi ɔflɔ ? ” Mfó bétsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ kanɔ bǝ , “ Be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ Onanto ɔflɔɔ , wɔɔtɔ bo nkǝ , ‘ Nyalɛ beso biamfo Yohanes bɛnɔ ? ’
Fɛɛ lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ utidi ɔflɔɔ , bɔlɛ sikpi bote lesa nǝ betidi luuyifo , itsyise mǝmblɛ áfo bánɔ bǝ Yohanes eyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi . ”
Nyaso bǝtǝ Yesu mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bunyi kaka ófo ǝsuǝale utsyiko . ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke mintsya lɛmbɔtɛyi mi kaka mímfo ǝsuǝale mintsyiko fɛ meeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle nɛ . ”
“ Ntsyǝ bibu itsyi lǝ ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ? Utidi utsyuǝ ákɛ wǝ lɛkɛ bebisaibi inuǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi uninǝle nkǝ , ‘ Ubi , su eyifo keyifo lǝ mɔ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ mmi . ’
“ Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Mǝmbǝ busu . ’ Fɛɛ kamaa , ɔ́tsyi wǝ nsusu ɔ́wuninsǝ nya úsu .
“ Anto ǝmǝ ésu wǝ ubi nuǝfǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nko ke . Wǝ átɔnɔ nkǝ , ‘ Yo o-o , nto , muusu . ’ Fɛɛ wénsu .
“ Mǝ inuǝ bamǝ eto ntii , mǝ owoe díyifo lǝ mǝ anto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Uninǝle ǝmǝ . ” Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ minkǝ beyu ku basɔnɔdi lɛ mi bofe kaaka mi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufǝ .
Itsyise Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ote mi kusu sɛɛ ko biɔyɛ , fɛɛ bíamfo wǝ bɛnɔ . Fɛɛ beyu ku basɔnɔdi bomu áfo wǝ bánɔ . Nya se bínyǝ nyamfo bítsyǝ lekpo tsyaa , bíamfloma mi nsusu biǝ biafo wǝ bɛnɔ .
“ Bɛnɔ lekpa bamba nǝmfo . Ɔkuɛmfo utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ wǝ léfo eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ , nya ókpe ɔkpɔ otsyilama wǝ . Óto kaka beeke eyibibi eto nte kǝlǝkǝ nya óto nwǝ laase ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ eto kǝsiǝkɔ . Nya úfi ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ókpe beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ani nkǝ bakase wǝ , nya údu úsu kusu .
Se lefe léyo bǝ balɛ eyibibi nyamǝǝ , ɔkuɛnsate ǝmfo ákpe wǝ ndomufɔ nkǝ besu bafo wǝ kedikɔ baboko wǝ .
“ Ɔkuɛmfo eto beyifoyifo bamfo ǝmuǝ wǝ ndomufɔ bamfo nya báblɛ ɔni , bálo ɔni , nya bákpɔ ɔni tsya aba .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , osate ǝmǝ esi ótsyese ndomufɔ bamba ba nso mba kɔ utu . Nya beyifoyifo bamǝ disi béyifo mǝ tsya nko ke .
Kalosǝkɔɔ , óla wǝ kosate eto ubi ótsyese mǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mfo nnɔ miǝ boobu mɔ ubi babe . ’
“ Fɛɛ se beyifoyifo bamǝ dínyǝ wǝ ubi ǝmfoo , bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ ɔkuɛmfo eto ubi wǝ lǝǝkǝ bikǝ biamǝ budii . Bibǝ lǝ bolo wǝ lǝ bɔlɛ wǝ kedikɔ bofo . ’
Nyaso bǝmuǝ wǝ nya báto wǝ bakpe lǝ ɔkpɔ ǝmǝ eto kama , nya bálo wǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , lǝ eyibibi eto ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ ǝbǝǝ , be wuuyifo beyifoyifo bamǝ ? ”
Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Woolo betidi bua bamfó kaminsǝ mǝnyǝmǝnyǝ , ufi eyibibi eto ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ okpe beyifoyifo bamba ba luutǝ wǝ , wǝ kutsyǝ lǝ balɛ eyibibi nyamǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla tɔ lesa nǝ nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti . Bonamute ni nwǝ díyifo nyamfo . Sitintii , iyifo lesa nǝ laanɔ bobe tinti ! ’ ”
Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ boofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ lǝ mi ani befi bǝtǝ betidi ba lɔɔnwɔ ebibi nnya lɛlɛkɛ .
Nya utsyuǝ saa ke lɔɔtsyinini udu ɔnɔ lǝ leba nǝ báni mfó ǝsuǝǝ , wuufǝsǝ blublublu . Nya lǝ ibǝ bǝ leba nǝmǝ tsya asɔ utsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , dioba wǝ dikuǝ wǝ blublublu . ”
Lefe nǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ lɛnɔ Yesu eto akpá nyamfoo , báte bǝ mǝ ɔnlɛ .
Nyaso bála bǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ báté sitiditu siamǝ sikpi , itsyise mǝmblɛ kenke ébu Yesu fe Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
Yesu esi óté mǝ asa ɛyɛ lǝ akpá ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
“ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ te fe mmǝ . Lefe lɔnii , Oka utsyuǝ édi kusiǝkpakpa eto diyisɛɛ útǝ wǝ ubisaibi .
Óla wǝ beyifoyifo ókpe nkǝ besu bakpo betidi ba ókla utsyǝ nkǝ bafe bǝbǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ . Fɛɛ bánla bǝ bǝǝbǝ .
“ Nyaso óla wǝ beyifoyifo bamba ókpe nkǝ batɛyi betidi ba ókla utsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Lesalidife nǝmǝ eboyo ! Bálo mɔ banantsyui ku banatsyui eto akpɔ nnya nkpe ayinkua bufi bɔlɛ mi kama bobe . Nya búkalɔ lesa saa bútsyǝ . Nyaso bibǝ kusiǝ komǝ kakpakɔ ! ’
“ Fɛɛ mbamǝ bákla eto kuutsyuǝ saa mémbu wǝ úbǝ . Bomu bédu bésu nlebe bamba bo bála . Ɔni édu úsu wǝ ɔkuɛ , nya obamba tsya dídu usu wǝ bikǝkatekɔ .
Nya babamba tsya dímuǝ beyifoyifo bamǝ nya báblɛ mǝ nya bálo mǝ .
Oka ǝmǝ ǝnyǝ ɔblɔ tinti , nya ótsyese wǝ bamamanyǝ nya bésu bálo bewudifɔ bamǝ kenke nya bátonsǝ mǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ .
“ Nyaso ókpadi wǝ beyifoyifo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ubi eto kusiǝkpakpa eto diyisɛɛ didi nǝmǝ eto lefe éboyo . Fɛɛ betidi ba mínkla miǝ bǝbǝ diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ mǝnńyǝ itǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ .
Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , bisu umǝ eto kesunte lǝ bekpadi utsyuǝ saa wǝ ke biunyǝ biǝ bǝbǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ mfo . ’
Mfó nya beyifoyifo bamǝ dísu kesunte nya bákpadi utsyuǝ saa wǝ bǝnyǝ , babua ku basɛɛ kenke nya kusiǝkpakpa eto diyo nǝmǝ díyi kenke .
“ Nya se Oka ǝmǝ díbǝ diyo nǝmǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ obe betidi ba díbǝ mfóo , únyǝ osani wǝ dímankpe awu nnya baakpe kesu kusiǝkakpakɔ .
Oka ǝmǝ átɔ wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔhɔ , ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ ǝbǝ mfo se fǝmankpe kusiǝkakpa eto awu ? ’ Fɛɛ wámfo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ .
“ Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ beyifoyifo nkǝ , ‘ Bekpe wǝ amla lǝ ani ku akpa , lǝ beto wǝ bekpe lǝ ketuntu ka nkpe lekple . Mfó wuuwi keku ɔyimi animi nɛ . ’ ”
Nya Yesu lélosǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto ákpadi betidi kpǝ , fɛɛ esiani ete úlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ nti . ”
Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ésu bákpe disi lǝ kase bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ Yesu ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto etikididi ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bátsyese mǝ bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ ku betidi ba ntekeko Herodes eto ditsyukpa kama lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya se bésuu , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝ eyifo ɔnukualɛtidi nya faate Onanto bofokanɔ eto asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ sitinti , itsyise aambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi keyifo lesa saa . Nya ememfi kukǝtsyuǝ lǝ betidi eto etikididi ǝsuǝ tsya .
Nyaso tɛyi bo lesa nǝ febu . Bo kɔfi ǝtǝ bo kusu nkǝ bofó umǝnko butǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ lee , yǝntǝ kusu nko ? ”
Fɛɛ se Yesu mfe nyi mǝ nsusu bua esoo , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Beso biala biǝ biato mɛ bebe ?
Bete mɛ atabi nnya biefi kafo umǝnko ǝmǝ lǝ mbe . ” Béfi atabi nyamǝ báboko wǝ .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe báta bǝtǝkǝ mfo , nya owoe eto diye báwɔni bǝtǝkǝ mfo ? ”
Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ale ini . ” Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi lesa nǝ ni Kaisare eto ale bitǝ Kaisare . Lǝ bífi lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto léle bitǝ Onanto . ”
Se bánɔ nyamfo , íyifo mǝ yanii nya bédu wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ .
Diyi nǝmfo kee , Sadukifɔ ba laatɛyi bǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ensiembotaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝǝ , ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ ku etiki ǝtsyuǝ .
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , Moses átɛyi bo nkǝ , lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝkpǝ nya óyani wǝ usiǝ utsyǝ nya wonko wǝ dímanle bebii , elebɛ osani ǝmǝ eto ɔyimisani fi ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ ufi . Lǝ wonko wǝ ale bebii , boofi bebi bamǝ fe osani ǝmǝ díkpe eto bebi .
Mɔmɔɔ , ibǝ bǝ bayimisani ekuanse ǝsiǝ lǝ bo nti mfo . Ɔyimisani ninǝ kenke éfi usio , nya wonko wǝ mánle fɛ osani ǝmǝ díkpǝ . Nya wǝ ɔyimisani wǝ ntǝkǝ wǝ kama dífi ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ .
Nko ibǝ ɔyimisani nuǝfǝ ku utsyǝfǝ isu ese okuansele mǝmblɛ dífi usio ǝmǝ bafia nya mǝ nti kuutsyuǝ ku usio ǝmǝ mánle fɛ békpǝ .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , usio ǝmǝ tsya ǝbǝ úkpǝ .
Mɔmɔɔ , lǝ diyi nǝ bekpǝnkpǝ lootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝǝ , owoe eto usiǝ wuudi se mǝmblɛ kenke díkefi wǝ bǝnyǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bénya kusu tinti . Itsyise biannɔ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue komǝ kasɔ , nya binyi kulesa lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ bekpǝnkpǝ esi bataka bǝbǝ nkpǝǝ , bootsyǝ fe Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba nkpe lǝ Onanto eto kato , nya bembufi bǝsiǝ nye bǝsiǝ besǝ tsya .
Nya bíankla asa nnya Onanto lɛtɛyi mi itsyi lǝ bekpǝnkpǝ eto botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ ǝsuǝ ? Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
‘ Mɔ ni Abraham eto Onanto ku Isak eto Onanto ku Yakob eto Onanto ! ’ Uyifo mba nkpe nkpǝ eto Onanto inni mba díkekpǝ . ”
Se sitiditu siamǝ lɛnɔ asa yamfoo , íyifo mǝ yanii , lǝ wǝ asatete ǝsuǝ .
Se Farisifɔ lɛnɔ bǝ Yesu asɔ Sadukifɔ kasɔɔ , bésu bátsya .
Nya mǝ ɔni wǝ ni afi eto oteasa , ála nkǝ lǝ ɔtɔ Yesu etiki ǝtsyuǝ lǝ umuǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ etiki ǝsuǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Oteasa , nte kɔfi ko nso bofe lǝ afi nyamǝ kenke nti ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ La fǝ Onamute wǝ ni fǝ Onanto ku fǝ utu kenke ku fǝ lɛwɔnɔ kenke ku fǝ nsusu kenke .
Kɔfi komfo ni kɔkplɛ kenke ko nso bofe tsya nɛ .
Kunuǝfǝ ko lefe lele ko ni , ‘ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe kase faala fǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
Moses eto kɔfi komǝ ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asatete kenke kpǝsǝ lǝ afi ǝnuǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . ”
Se Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ létsyaa , Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Ntsyǝ ni mi nsusu lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ Ǝsuǝ ? Owoe eto ubi uni ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Oka David eto ubi uni . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nko inii , ntsyǝ fɛ Oka David ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , lékpadi wǝ nkǝ Onamute . Oka David átɛyi nkǝ ,
‘ Bonamute átɛyi mɔ Onamute nkǝ , “ Siǝ mfo lǝ mɔ kodiani isu ese lefe nǝ muutǝ efi fǝ akpa ǝtǝkǝ fǝ balo lǝ disinti . ” ’
Nya lǝ Oka David ákpo Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nkǝ Onamutee , ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ Nwǝ ǝmǝ esi uyifo Oka David eto ubi ? ”
Mǝ nti eto kuutsyuǝ mámfo Yesu mbuayɛ butǝ . Nya idu dinǝmfo entɔɔ , mǝ kuutsyuǝ ménsifo wǝ ditiki saa bɔtɔ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édi sitiditu siamǝ ku wǝ bakasebi etiki .
Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ kpe ǝsuǝale , bǝ baté Moses eto kɔfi komǝ .
Nyaso ele bǝ biyifo lǝ lesa nǝ ke batɛyi mi ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ . Fɛɛ biǝntǝkǝko mǝ eyifosa kama itsyise bǝǝnsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ asa nnya baate ǝsuǝ .
Baakle bikǝ bia nkpe kalende ku nkpe ale ku butsyi ketsyisǝ betidi , tsya fɛɛ bembokpe fǝ lɛ kɔni etsyi bikǝ biamǝ .
“ Beeyifo lesa saa bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ mǝ . Be Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto etiki nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ mǝ nto ku anii , be kase báwɔni nya ɛmɔɔ , ku kase bankpimi nnyaa ! Be kase tsya aboyo nnya mfaka lǝ mǝ awu nnya bankpe eto nyɛ ǝsuǝ dikulǝǝ !
Baala nkplɛkɔ sɛɛ busiǝ lǝ eyi kedikɔ ku nsiǝkɔ bo bebu bǝtsyǝ bakplɛnyǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ .
Baala bǝ betidi kǝsiǝsǝ mǝ kǝbǝ kasɔ ku dibu lǝ asi bakpadi mǝ bǝ Oteasa .
“ Yanle bǝ bakpadi mi bǝ Oteasa itsyise mimblɛɛ , bayimi bini lǝ bǝtsyuǝ nya Oteasa ɔni kplo nkpe mi .
Nya yanle bǝ bekpadi kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ kasɔ mfo biǝ mi Anto , itsyise Anto ɔni hã nkpe mi lǝ kato .
Biǝntǝ bakpadi mi Ɔtɔnkotɔnko , itsyisee Ɔtɔnkotɔnko ɔni hã ete nkpe bo , wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
Nwǝ ni ɔkplɛnyǝ lǝ mi nti yifo nwǝ ni mi uyifoyifo .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ laabesǝ ǝsuǝ katoo , boobokosǝ wǝ kasɔ . Nya nwǝ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , boobesǝ wǝ kato .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi , afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Mi díti Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto kusu bekpe betidi , nya mi kosate endufǝ mfó , nya bieti betidi bamba ba nlɛ bokplatsya kekleke tsya kusu biǝ bendufǝ .
Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Mi ni ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi . Biesu bakɔbǝsiǝ ɔflɔ biǝ biawunsǝko mǝ , fɛɛ biawɛ mǝ kalɛ mǝ lesa saa kafo . Nya biato kala kɛntsyɛ bimba . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mi kotonǝnǝ ebɔkɛ ale eso !
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi bini ! Biayila lekpo akpa akpa ku biayɛ kafe lǝ nsɔ nsɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ bilǝkǝ utidi ɔni eto okla bitǝ Onanto . Nya lǝ befo utsyuǝ buyifo nkoo , biatǝ woabia nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝ udufǝ lǝ ditefɛnku nǝme kǝmiǝ enso mi kosate kulaa tsya !
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi , bǝnǝmba ba ni batɔnkotɔnko ! Biatɛyi biǝ , ‘ Lǝ utsyuǝ akpadi Disumuyo eto diyee , yeambiasǝ kulesa . Fɛɛ lǝ okpadi sika sia nte lǝ Disumuyo mfóo , nnya akle wǝ bǝ uyifo lǝ akpadi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ kokooko . ’
Bǝnǝmba eto bamumu ! Nte nnya nso bofe , sika siamǝ lee , Disumuyo ka dítǝ sika siamǝ díyifo kɛnkɛ ?
Biate tsya biǝ , ‘ Lǝ utsyuǝ ataninko Disumuyo eto lebaa , kataninko kamǝ mankle wǝ , fɛɛ lǝ otaninko ǝtǝsa nnya ntǝkǝ lǝ Disumuyo eto leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nnya akle wǝ . ’
Nya ntsyǝ béba ǝnǝmi mmǝ ! Nte nnya nso bofe , ǝtǝsa nnyamǝ lee , Disumuyo eto leba nǝ dítǝ ǝtǝsa nnyamǝ díyifo kɛnkɛ .
Nyaso lǝ utidi éfi Disumuyo eto leba nǝmǝ óka ntamuu , ɔlɛ mu boka ɛyɛ lǝ keditǝtǝ eto leba nǝmǝ ku keditǝtǝ kenke ka ntǝkǝ lǝ leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ óka ntamu okpadi Disumuyo Kplɛɛ , ɔlɛ mu boka kakpadi Disumuyo ku Onanto we nsi lǝ mfó tsya .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ákpadi katoo , ɔlɛ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ ku nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ni bokpadi .
“ Mǝǝtǝ mi mbɔbɔɛ , mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Mi ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Biefi kayoma eto bekolenkǝ bia laanyi fififi bia biakpe eto lekpafosile kǝtǝ Onanto , fɛɛ bɛni nya bienyifo lǝ kɔfi eto asa tete nnya nso bofe ǝsuǝ , nnya ni bɔyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ , ku ɔnukualɛdidi . Nyamfo ele bǝ biyifo bifi bekpe lǝ afɛfɛ nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mi batɔnkotɔnko ba ni bǝnǝmba ! Biayɛ ekubi kǝlǝkǝ lǝ nte ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ asa nnya biamini amɔ eso ɔtɔmini ku lekoko .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Biǝflǝ mi akɔbe ku kakpɛ eto kama , fɛɛ nnya kafoo eyi ku asa bua fe kase mi tsya lebia nya biyi ku asa nnya béfo lǝ ǝsuǝale ku lǝ mɔ hã ete eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fǝ Farisinyǝ unǝmba , tsyiko fǝ lɛkɔbe buflǝ lǝ kafo , ete ni kama tsya ebole kɛnkɛnkɛ .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi bini ! Bite fe edi nnya bákua bǝńyǝnsǝ laanɔ bobe . Fɛɛ nnya kǝmiǝ eyi ku bakɔ bubu ku ekubi biabia .
Nko ke bele betidi ba lɛlɛkɛ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi , fɛɛ biyi ku kawɛ ku ditsyǝbi bua .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ ! Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi ! Bieku edi sɛɛ kǝtǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba dísiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ nya bialɔ nnya kukɔnɔ .
Nya biatɛyi biǝ , ‘ Lǝ nnya ete busiǝ nkpǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bo banamǝ dísiǝǝ , eni bienyifo lesa nǝ béyifo , balo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi . ’
Nyaso befo nnya sitinti biǝ , mi eyifosa afo nnya ekpe bǝ biyifo mba lélo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto befluflu .
Nyaso bisukosǝ lǝ belosǝ lesamǝ mi banamǝ dítsyǝ kasɔ .
“ Mi betidi bua , biyifo fe bawa eto bebi eto bebi ! Bibu biǝ biofo butsyetsyi kedu lǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ lǝ ditefɛnku manlo ǝsuǝ ?
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , mootsyese mi Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , babesibe ku bateasa , Biolo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ , bɛsɔ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ uyikabie , nya biɔblɛ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ Disumuyo , nya biutǝkǝko mǝ idu lǝ umǝ isu umǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , kotonǝnǝ itǝ mba lélo betidi ba dímenyifo kabua saa ebutǝkǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , idu lǝ Abel wǝ dímenyifo ɔsɛɛ nyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi eto kɔtɔ , isu Sakaria , Barakia eto ubi , nwǝ belo lǝ Disumuyo ku kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba eto nti eto kɔtɔ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ kɔtɔ komfó kenke tǝkǝ mmi mba nsi nkpǝ mmi lǝ ǝsuǝ .
“ Yerusalem , Yerusalem , fǝ lélo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nya fákpɔ Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba ótsyese aba ! Nla sesia sesia miǝ maasɔ fǝ betidi lebo lǝ mɔ akɔ , fe kase ukusɛsiǝle laakpa wǝ bebi kakpe lǝ wǝ mbamba kalɔ , fɛɛ biǝntǝ kusu nko .
Lǝ nnya esoo , fǝ Disumuyo ebubu kǝtsyǝ fufu .
Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi miǝ , biensi embunyǝ mɛ bio isu se lefe nǝ bɛtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Onanto kpo nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ atsyɔ . ’ ”
Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ Disumuyo mfo ɔntɔɔ , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ baaté wǝ kase báto Disumuyo nǝmǝ ku ke ayo kenke .
Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛlɔ bebe nyamfo kukɔnɔ . Itsyise nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ booba ayo nyamfo kenke , bǝ lɛ leba lɔni embubu ditǝkǝ lǝ ni utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Boosensǝ nyamblɛ bewui . ”
Se Yesu dísu unsi lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ buɛɛ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo lefe nǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ luubǝ ku lesa nǝ luubǝ nnya loote bǝ fǝ businkli kǝbǝ eto lefe eboyo . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ kuutsyuǝ saa manwɛ mi okpe .
Betidi kpǝ ebubǝ ba luufi mɔ diye bǝbǝ batɛyi mi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Nwǝ Ǝmǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ , ’ bǝ lǝ bawɛ betidi kpǝ bakpe .
Biɔnɔ ama eto kudu ku ama eto etiki lǝ katsyontsyokɔ ku kaka lɛfi . Fɛɛ bíǝntǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ ekpe mi sikpi . Ele bǝ asa nyamfo bǝ , fɛɛ yante bǝ kalosǝkɔ eboyo tɔ .
Nsɔ eto betidi ebɔkpɔ ama ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Nya sekakedikɔ ebotaka sińyǝ lǝ se utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya kukpɛnsɛ luubǝ lǝ nlebe kpǝ . Nya nsɔ tsya luutinkǝ lǝ nlebe nlebe .
Nyamfo kenke ebuyifo fe kase kalelefo lǝǝtsyǝ usio kasɔ ku bunǝ .
“ Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , boomuǝ mi befi mi bakpe lǝ ani bǝtǝ bǝ bate mi ohiã , nya boolo mi kulaa tsya . Kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ebukisi mi lǝ mɔ disi eso .
Betidi kpǝ ebonyansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ . Boofi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bakpe lǝ ani bǝtǝ balo nya bookisi mǝ bayimi bǝtsyuǝ .
Betidi kpǝ ebɔbɔ batɛyi bidia bǝnkǝ mǝ ni Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nya bɔɔwɛ betidi kpǝ bakpe .
Abuayifoyifo ebufui ekpe nya mba dikafo banɔ kpǝ eto lelabi itǝ bǝtsyuǝ lɔɔni .
Fɛɛ nwǝ luunyǝ kekleke isu ese kalosǝkɔ , ebunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Boobe Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ kawunsiǝ bafia , itǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ uńyǝ kusu ɔnɔ ni , nnya kama fɛ kalosǝkɔ luubǝ nɛ .
“ Buinyǝ ekpinsa nyamǝ luubǝ ińyǝ lǝ kakɛnkɛkɔ kamǝ fe kase Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi Daniel lɛtɛyi útsyǝ . Yuuńyǝ lǝ kakɛkɛnkɔ kamǝ . Nya fǝ ke lékla kukue komfoo , nɔ nyamfo kasɔ wuee .
“ Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , mimba nkpe lǝ Yuda eto kasɔ , tsyetsyi besu atini ǝsuǝ .
Utidi wǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ diyo disi , wanyifǝ ubǝ kasɔ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ufi kulesa lǝ wǝ diyo kafo .
Utidi wǝ nkpe lǝ ɔkuɛ mensi sinkli ubǝ oto nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ufi wǝ kafia .
Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ bafonlɛ ku bebiambe ba nlɛ bebisambi bɔyimisǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
Bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa biǝ mmi ditsyetsyife nǝmǝ mǝntǝkǝ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nye Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise kayinyǝnyǝ kekleke ka luubǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ke okle mǝmbǝ tɔ kǝnyǝ itsyi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ketsykokɔ ke . Nya ke okle tsya ensiembubǝ kǝnyǝ .
Fɛɛ Onanto ébose nnya uyi útsyǝ nkǝ wuulǝkǝ eyi nyamǝ ubu . Lenni nko esoo , eni utidi sa embubu usiǝ lǝ nkpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ betidi ba Onanto díkǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ esoo , wuulǝkǝ eyi nyamǝ ubu .
“ Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ átɛyi mi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Nnyǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nkpe mfo o-o , ’ nye ‘ Nnyǝ wǝ nkpe mmǝǝ , ’ mamfo wǝ anɔ .
Itsyise badia ba laatɛyi bǝ mǝ ni mba Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ ku mba tsya bǝ mǝ ni Onanto Eto Bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ebotaka bǝbǝ . Nya booyifo ayanisa kplɛ kplɛ kpǝ bate , bǝ lǝ boofo kulaa tsya , bɔɔwɛ betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ bakpe .
Bɛnɔ biǝ mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo ntɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ lǝ leyo .
“ Nye lǝ betidi átɛyi mi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Okpe lǝ mfimintii , ’ biensu bebe . Nye lǝ bátɛyi mi bǝ ‘ Okpe lǝ diyo kafo mfoo , ’ biamfo bɛnɔ .
Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi eto bubǝ ebutsyǝ fe kase kato laato ɔsi mia mia , lǝ kofekatokɔ kǝnyǝndǝ kakpo lǝ kofe eto diyokedufǝkɔ seka .
Kaka lesakpǝnkpǝ ntee , mfo ebintsyǝ lǝǝsiǝ nɛ .
“ Lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo eto kamaa , kofe ebona tũũ , nya kofande tsya ensiembuyǝnde , nya befandebi loolo bitsyi kato , nya kato eto ǝsuǝale luutinkǝ nya yɔɔnyi lǝ nnya ńyǝnkɔ .
“ Nya Utidi Eto Ubi eto ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ lɔɔbɔ bǝnyǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ . Nya kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke luuwi nku lǝ bǝnyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ntǝkǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ lǝ diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale kplɛ ǝsuǝ .
Buufe kakpatsyaku kplɛ nya wootsyese wǝ batɔnkpe kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ ana nyamǝ , nya bookpa betidi ba úlǝkǝ útsyǝ idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto disi lɔni isu disi nǝ .
“ Bekase asa itsyi lǝ kudiyi ǝsuǝ lǝ kase koata kabɔ afanto fɔfɔ . Lefe nǝ binyǝ kudiyi ditsyiko bota kǝlǝkǝ afantoo , biate biǝ kasɔminte boyo kalo .
Nko ke lǝ binyǝ asa nnya kenke mínkatɛyi míntɔnsǝǝ , bete biǝ kalosǝkɔ kamǝ eboyo kalo .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ fɛ mba nsi nkpǝ mfo luukpǝ balo .
Kato ku kasɔ ebubǝ kafe , fɛɛ mɔ etiki embubǝ efe kulefe .
“ Kuutsyuǝ saa enyi diyi nye lefe nǝmǝ kalosǝkɔ luubǝ . Onanto eto Batɔnkpe nye Ubi ǝmǝ kulaa tsya enyi . Anto hã nyi .
Utidi Eto Ubi eto bubǝ ebuyifo fe kase íbǝ lǝ Noa eto lefe .
Lǝ lefe nǝ lɛtɔ ntu eto buyi bomǝǝ , betidi ékedi , bǝkǝnǝ , basani ku besio ákakpa bǝtsyuǝ isu ese diyi fɛfɛ nǝ Noa dídufǝ lǝ kufue komǝ kafo .
Fɛɛ bánte lesa nǝ nlɛ bubǝ isu ese lefe nǝ ɔsɔmi lɛni , ntu díyi bókpa mǝmblɛ kenke búdunko . Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi eto dibǝfe tsya nɛ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , basani inuǝ ebuńyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ bekeyifo keyifo fɛ wookpa ɔni udunko nya uubu ɔni bǝtsyǝ .
Besio inuǝ ebuńyǝ bǝkǝkuǝ antabi , fɛɛ Onanto ebutsyi ɔni udunko nya uubu ɔni utsyǝ .
“ Nyaso bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ , itsyise binnyi diyi nǝ mi Onamute luubǝ .
Lǝ oyosate áte dinǝ uyu luubǝ wǝ keyukɔ , eni wuutǝkǝ ǝnǝ ukase ni . Nya weembutǝ kusu nkǝ uyu ǝmǝ dufǝ , oba wǝ diyo uyu wǝ .
Nko ke ele bǝ fintsya muǝ ǝsuǝ ǝtsyǝ , itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ ebubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ fannlɛ wǝ kusu bobe .
“ Owoe ni uyifoyifo sɛɛ wǝ ni obesibe ? Wǝ ni uyifoyifo wǝ , wǝ Onamute dífi útsyǝ lǝ wǝ beyifotsyuǝ eto kɛnyɛ , nkǝ úkǝtǝ mǝ lesa lǝ lefe ǝsuǝ .
Nte disuǝyuǝ nǝ eto okle yuudi itǝ uyifoyifo ǝmfo lǝ wǝ Onamute ǝbǝ unyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ buyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ !
Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Onamute ǝmfo ebufi uyifoyifo ǝmfo utsyǝ lǝ wǝ bikǝ kenke eto kɛnyɛ .
Fɛɛ lǝ uyifoyifo bua unii , wɔɔtɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Onamute embubǝ mɔmɔ ! ’
Nyaso wuutsyiko wǝ beyifoyifotsyuǝ bɔblɛ , nya ukedi , ukǝnǝ ku betekpe .
Nya wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ ebubǝ lǝ diyi lɔni nǝ ɔnlɛ wǝ kusu bobe ku lefe nǝ unnyi .
Onamute ǝmǝ ebunǝ wǝ koto sitinti . Nya wuunǝ wǝ koto kekleke fe kase ińyǝ itǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi seka ! Mfó nya wuuwi keku wɔɔyimi animi !
“ Lefe nǝmfóo , mmǝ seka Onanto eto sekakedikɔ luutsyǝ nɛ . Yuutsyǝ fe mbitɛ lefosi ba léto mǝ kakandiɛ bǝ beesu batsyako ɔkafɔse utsyuǝ .
Mǝ nti eto ɛnɔ eeninǝ , nya ɛnɔ fɛfɛ tsya eyifo babesibe .
Ɛnɔ ba leeninǝ étsyi kakandiɛ , fɛɛ béntsyi nnuǝbi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ báwunisǝ .
Nya babesibe bamǝ alɛɛ , mǝ étsyi nnuǝbi báwunsǝ lǝ mǝ asa ǝsuǝ ku kakandiɛ kamǝ .
Se Okafɔse ǝmǝ léfe kama ku bubǝ esoo , mbitɛ bomǝ étsyiko selabe butinkǝ nya bálabe selabe .
“ Ntsyenti lefee , bánɔ kudu bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ okafɔse ǝmǝ nlɛ bubǝ ! Betaka , bibǝ betsyako wǝ ! ’
“ Mfó nya mbitɛ bomǝ létaka nya bábesǝ mǝ kakandiɛ eto ute kato .
Nya mba leeninǝ lɛtɛyi babesibe bamǝ bǝ , ‘ Bitǝ bo mi nnuǝbi bomǝ eto ntsyuǝ itsyise bo kakandiɛ lɛ bɔni . ’
“ Nya babesibe bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bo nnuǝbi emboyo itǝ bo ku mi , nyaso bisu mba laate ɔflɔ , lǝ bisu beya butsyuǝ bitǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
“ Nya kase bésu mu kayakɔ koo , okafɔse ǝmǝ ǝbǝ údufǝ . Mbitɛ ɛnɔ ba dímuǝ ǝsuǝ ǝkǝko wǝ bédufǝ lǝ kaka banlɛ kusiǝ komǝ bokpa mfó nya béti siku .
“ Kamaa , mbitɛ fɛfɛ bomǝ tsya ǝbǝ bédufǝ nya bétsyiko siku bɔsɔ katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Boanto , Boanto ! Sini bo lǝ budufǝ ! ’
“ Nya okafɔse ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kulefe , minnyi mi ! ’ ”
Mfó nya Yesu lélosǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyaso bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyuǝ , itsyise binyi diyi nye lefe nǝ muubǝ .
“ Lefe nǝmfóo , Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ebutsyǝ fe mmǝ . Lefe lɔnii , Osani utsyuǝ akɛ , wǝ léla nkǝ lǝ usu kusu kutsyuǝ nyaso ókpadi wǝ beyifoyifo nya úfi wǝ bikǝ ókpe mǝ lǝ ani .
Útǝ utsyuǝ saa lesa nǝ wuukefi keyifo lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ , nya ɔnii , útǝ wǝ sika eto atabi akpi anɔ . Nya obambaa , útǝ wǝ akpi ǝnuǝ . Utsyǝfǝǝ , útǝ wǝ kɔkpi kɔni . Nya údu úsu wǝ kusu komǝ .
Uyifoyifo wǝ léfo atabi eto akpi anɔɔ , ésu ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya únyǝ akpi anɔ útǝkǝsǝ .
Nko ke nwǝ bǝtǝ akpi ǝnuǝ tsya dínyǝ akpi ǝnuǝ útǝkǝsǝ .
Fɛɛ uyifoyifo wǝ bǝtǝ sika eto atabi kɔkpi kɔnwɛɛ , úsu úku dibiǝ nya úfi wǝ Onamute eto atabi nyamǝ ɔ́kula mfó .
“ Lǝ lefe kɛntsye eto kamaa , beyifoyifo bamfo eto Onamute ǝmǝ ésinkli úbǝ nya údufǝ lǝ nkunta ku mǝ .
Uyifoyifo wǝ léfo sika eto atabi akpi anɔ , éfi akpi anɔ bamba óboko nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , ǝtǝ mɛ sika eto akpi anɔ , nya mínyǝ akpi anɔ bamba mínkpe . ’
“ Wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Alɔ éyifo , uyifoyifo sɛɛ . Éyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nya fálɛ asa sɛkɛ ola , nyaso muufi fǝ ntsyǝ lǝ asa kpǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Dufǝ ǝbǝ lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝnko mɛ disuǝyuǝ ! ’
“ Nya uyifoyifo nuǝfǝ wǝ bǝtǝ sika eto akpi ǝnuǝ tsya díbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , ǝtǝ mɛ sika eto atabi akpi ǝnuǝ nya mínyǝ akpi ǝnuǝ bamba mínkpe . ’
“ Wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Uyifoyifo sɛɛ , éyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ tinti ! Se fálɛ asa sɛkɛ ola lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ esoo , muufi fǝ ntsyǝ lǝ kpǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝnko mɛ disuǝyuǝ ! ’
“ Mfó nya uyifoyifo wǝ léfo sika eto atabi kɔkpi kɔnwɛ tsya díbe nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nyi minkǝ eyifo utidi wǝ eto asa nkpe ale nnya fǝǝfǝsǝ asa lǝ kaka fámanto kuǝtsyuǝ . Nya faalɛ asa lǝ kaka fémense kulesa .
Nya se mínte sikpi esoo , mfi fǝ atabi nyamǝ nya mínku dibiǝ mímfi nnya mínkpe . Nyaso nyǝ fǝ atabi ni nyamfo . ’
“ Wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ uyifoyifo bua , ɔflɔ́ . Eyi fǝ meefi lesa kaka lǝ mánkpe nya mǝǝfǝsǝ asa lǝ kaka mánto kulesa .
Nyalɛ beso fémemfi mɔ atabi ésuko atabi kǝtsyǝkɔ bǝ lǝ mbǝǝ , lǝ nnyǝ nnya kutǝkǝ ? ’
“ Mfó nya onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔmɔ , lɛ atabi nyamfo afo lǝ wǝ ani lǝ befi nnya bitǝ nwǝ nkpe akpi lefosi . ’
Itsyise utidi wǝ nkpe asaa , wǝ ke bonsi boofi ditsyuǝ bakpe bawunsǝ nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , sɛkɛɛ nte wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ ni bafo wǝ lǝ ani .
Nya uyifoyifo bimba ǝmfo alɛɛ , beto wǝ bekpe lǝ ketuntu ka nkpe lǝ lekple . Kaka mfóo , wuwi keku unǝ wǝ animi .
“ Lefe nǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ luubǝ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenkee , wuusiǝ lǝ wǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nya kawunsiǝ eto ese eto betidi kenke lɔɔbɔ bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya wuusǝnsǝ mǝ lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ fe kase nwǝ laayɛnko bebuki leesǝnsǝ basamu kǝlǝkǝ lǝ bate nti .
Wuuńyǝsǝ betidi sɛɛ lǝ wǝ kodiani , nya wuutǝ mba ni betidi bua ńyǝ lǝ wǝ kǝmǝni .
“ Nya Oka ǝmǝ lɔɔtɛyi mba ńyǝ wǝ lǝ kodiani nkǝ , ‘ Bibǝ , mi mba mɔ anto lékpo atsyɔ ! Bibǝ bidufǝ lǝ sekakedikɔ ka bálɔ bǝtsyǝ itǝ mi idu taa kawunsiǝ eto ketsyikokɔ ke .
Kukpɛnsɛ álɛ mɛ nya bítǝ mɛ lesa míndi , utukuɛ álɛ mɛ , nya bítǝ mɛ ntu mínnǝ . Nyifo ɔfɔ nya béfo mɛ békpe lǝ mi ayo .
Lefe nǝ mínyɛ leyaa , bítǝ mɛ kafia nti . Nya lefe nǝ mínlɛ bufii , bɛlɛ mɛ ola . Lefe nǝ bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo , bíbǝ bebe mɛ . ’
“ Mfó nya betidi sɛɛ bamǝ lɔɔtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , dimanfe búnyǝ kukpɛnsɛ nlɛ fǝ fɛ bútǝ lesa fédi , nye bútǝ fǝ ntu fǝnǝ ?
Dimanfe búnyǝ fǝ ɔfɔ fɛ bófo fǝ nye fányɛ leya bútǝ fǝ kafia féti ?
Dimanfe bɔ́nɔ bǝ alɛ bufi nye bǝ akɛ lǝ diyo fɛ búbǝ bóbe fǝ ? ’
“ Mfó nya Oka ǝmǝ luutǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lefe saa nǝ fáwunsǝko utsyuǝ wǝ lǝmbǝ dibu saa lǝ mɔ bayimi bamfo ntii , mɔ féyifo fǝtǝ . ’
“ Mfó wɔɔtɛyi mba ńyǝ lǝ wǝ kǝmǝni nkǝ , ‘ Bidu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , mi mba Onanto díkudi ! Bisu bidufǝ lǝ ditefɛnku manlo nǝ Onanto létsyaka útǝ Obonsam ku wǝ batɔnkpe !
Kukpɛnsɛ álɛ mɛ , fɛɛ bɛni bíǝntǝ mɛ lesa ndi . Utukuɛ álɛ mɛ , fɛɛ bíǝntǝ mɛ ntu nko ke .
Nyifo ɔfɔ wǝ díbǝ ɔ́sɔnɔ mi , tsya bíamfo mɛ . Nyɛ leya tsya bíenti mɛ kafia . Nnɔ bufi , bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo , fɛɛ bíǝmbǝ bisiǝsǝ mɛ . ’
“ Mfó buutǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Boanto , lemanfe búnyǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛlɛ fǝ , nye ututkuɛ lɛ fǝ , nye féyifo ɔfɔ , nye fányɛ leya , nye fanlɛ bufi , nye fakɛ lǝ diyo fɛ bóǝmbǝ bobe nye bɔ́wunsǝko fǝ ? ’
“ Oka ǝmǝ ebutǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lefe nǝ eto lefe bíenyifo kasɛɛ bítǝ betidi ba bíembu kulesa lǝ mɔ bǝtsyuǝ bamfo ntii , mɔ uni bíenyifo kulesa bitǝ ! ’ ”
Yesu átɛyi ólosǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso boofi mba mfo batsyese kanyi kǝnyǝkɔ itǝ manlo manlo . Nya betidi sɛɛ bamfóo , mǝ ebunyǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalokɔ kulefe kulefe . ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi asa nyamfo kenke ólosǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ ,
“ Iyifo mi bote bǝnkǝ ibu eyi ǝnuǝ lǝ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi nǝmǝ lǝ leyoo , nya boofi Utidi Eto Ubi bǝtǝ bǝ basɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ dísu bátsya lǝ Usumunyǝ ninǝ Kenke Kayafa eto diyo .
Befi nsusu bǝ boomuǝ Yesu kalɔkalɔ lǝ balo wǝ .
Bátɛyi tsya bǝnkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ bumuǝ wǝ lǝ diyi nǝmǝ budi kǝmiǝ , lenni nko betidi bamǝ ebunyǝnki bataka bǝńyǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu ésu Simon wǝ dífi bufi sia eto diyo lǝ Betania .
Lefe nǝ Yesu nsi ɔnlɛ budii , usio utsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , wǝ dítsyi nnuǝbi alabasta eto dituntu nǝ ókpo nnuǝbi tɔ bo laanyi fififi , bo léfo koya tinti óboko mfó , nya úfi mu ókpo Yesu lǝ disi .
Se Yesu eto bakasebi dínyǝ nyamfoo , kafo ányi mǝ . Bátɔ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso óbiasǝ nnuǝbi bomfo nko ?
Boofo nnuǝbi bomfó boté itǝ koya kplɛ , befi atabi nyamǝ bǝtǝ bakombo ! ”
Se Yesu lɛnɔ lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyii , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ usio ǝmfo bule ? Lesa sɛɛ dini úyifo útǝ mɛ .
Bakombo kpe mi lenti lefe saa . Fɛ , mɔɔ inni lefe saa mɔɔkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ .
Se usio ǝmfo dífi nnuǝbi bomfo ókpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , ɔ́lɔ mɛ utsyǝ itǝ mɔ bubike .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ kawunsiǝ eto kaka ke boobe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo letsyaa , boofi nnya usio ǝmfo díyifo bakakloma wǝ . ”
Mfó nya bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni , wǝ baakpo Yuda Iskariot dísu besumunyǝ ninǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya úsu ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be biutǝ mɛ lǝ ndu Yesu ntǝ mi ? ” Bákla sika flubia fosi ǝtsyǝ béfi bǝtǝ wǝ .
Idu lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , útsyiko esu bɔbɛbɛ kase wuudu Yesu utǝ mǝ .
Lǝ Abolo Menyenki eto Eyididi eto diyi tutɛ ǝsuǝǝ , bakasebi bamǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sie faala fǝ bɔlɔ butsyǝ butǝ fǝ itǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyi nǝmǝ budi ? ”
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu osani utsyuǝ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ lǝ bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝ , ‘ Oteasa nkǝ , “ Mɔ lefe éboyo . Mɔ ku mɔ bakasebi ebudi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa nǝmǝ lǝ fǝ diyo . ” ’ ”
Bakasebi bamǝ éyifo fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ , nya bánwa Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa nǝmǝ bǝtsyǝ mfó .
Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ itǝ lesa budi .
Lǝ lesa nǝmǝ kedikɔɔ , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , mi nti eto ɔni ebudu mɛ utǝ . ”
Ditiki nǝmfo ǝlǝ bakasebi bamǝ tinti nya bétsyiko wǝ bɔtɔ ɔni ɔni bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , mɔ fanlɛ lee ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ bonko wǝ nlɛ kɔni bokpe lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni kedi uni luudu mɛ utǝ .
Mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ebukpǝ fe kase báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ itǝ utidi wǝ luudu Utidi Eto Ubi utǝ . Lǝ nnya ete bánle utidi ǝmǝ eni ɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso . ”
Yuda wǝ lǝǝbǝ Yesu budu kǝtǝ tsya átɔ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , sitinti inni mɔ fanlɛ , lee ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝ lɛtɛyi . ”
Se banlɛ lesa budii , Yesu éfi abolo , nya ɔ́sɔ ani nya úbudi wǝ nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Befo lǝ bidi . Nyamfo ni mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nɛ . ”
Nya úfi lɛkɔbe ku nte nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úfi útǝ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimblɛ fo binǝ .
Nyǝ mɔ kɔtɔ ko ni kakle lǝ Onanto ku wǝ betidi eto nti . Kɔtɔ ko minfi minlɛ bokpo kasɔ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto disi , bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , mensiembunǝ nte bomfo eto okle isu ese lefe nǝ mɔ ku mi luunǝ nte fɔfɔ lǝ mɔ Anto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , bésǝ kusǝ bátɛsǝ Onanto , nya bédu bésu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mmi eto ketsye kamfoo , mimblɛ ebutsyetsyi bidu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , nya mɔ mate luubu . Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebolo nwǝ lǝǝtsyǝ basamu bamǝ nya basamu bamǝ luusǝnsǝ . ’
Fɛɛ lǝ batakasǝ mɛ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , mɔɔtɔ mi sɛtɔ nsu Galilea . ”
Petro éfe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Lǝ bafɛfɛ kenke ani fǝ tsyaa , memboyani fǝ ntsyǝ kulefe ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ ketsye kamfo fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ , ǝbɔtɛyi sitsyǝ fǝnkǝ enyi mɛ . ”
Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mǝmbɔni fǝ kulefe , lǝ ibǝ bǝ bonko fǝ kpe kulaa tsya . ” Nya bakasebi fɛfɛ kenke tsya lɛtɛyi nko .
Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dísu kaka baakpo Getsemane , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisiǝ mfo lǝ nsu sɛtɔ mǝ nsu nto ola . ”
Ókpa Petro ku Sebedeo eto bebi inuǝ bamǝ ɔ́yɛnko . Údufǝ lǝ kawɛndo ǝsuǝ , nya útsyiko butinkǝ kekleke .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kanyi ka nkpe mɛ lǝ utu fui tinti bǝ kába mɛ ǝsuǝ . Bisiǝ mfo lǝ bikase ku mɛ . ”
Ɔ́yɛ úsu sɛtɔ sɛkɛ nya ókpo lǝ kasɔ úfusǝ ǝnǝmi , nya óto ola nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , lǝ yɔɔlɛkɛɛ , takasǝ bulǝ bomfo lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ menyifo lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ bomu lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
Se úsinkli úsu bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ , únyǝ nkǝ bálabe selabe , nya ɔ́tɔ Petro nkǝ , “ Nyaso mi basini bamfo embofo ǝnǝ butǝkǝ ku mɛ itǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni hã ete ?
Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ beto ola bǝ biembudufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lɛ bola , fɛɛ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ayɔkpɔ . ”
Yesu esi úsu dinuǝfǝ úsu oto ola ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , lǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝ mǝǝbǝ bunǝ mfo embofe mɛ , nya iyifo fǝ lelabi bǝ nnǝ ni kokooko , nyalɛ tǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ”
Se úsinkli úbǝ bioo , únyǝ nkǝ bakasebi bamǝ si balɛ selabe ko , nya bannlɛ ǝnǝmi bofo buminkli kulaa tsya .
Yesu esi údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ ditsyǝfǝ úsu óto ola fe kase óto ibǝ éfe .
Nya úsinkli úbǝ bakasebi bamǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisi belabe selabe bɛlɛ ɔnwɛ butsyǝ ? Bebe ! Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ befi Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ bakpe lǝ betidi bua eto ani .
Betaka lǝ budu . Bebee , nwǝ nlɛ mɛ budu kǝtǝ ebɔfi . ”
Yesu ǝńyǝ ɔlɛ mǝ etiki budinko fɛ Yuda wǝ ni lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni díbǝ údufǝ . Betidi ba ni besumunyǝ ninǝ ku batɔnkotɔnko ba bǝlǝkǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ , nya béntsyi nlande ku keyi .
Udundukǝtǝ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ báte batɔnsǝ bǝ , “ Utidi wǝ mɔɔbuta nsiǝsǝǝ , wǝ ni utidi wǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ nɛ . Bimuǝ wǝ . ”
Yuda ésu Yesu ɔflɔ nya lǝ kase únyǝ wǝ koo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , diyuǝsǝ itǝ fǝ . ” Mfó nya ɔ́buta wǝ .
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ɔhɔ , kɔse lǝ eyifo lesa nǝ fǝbǝ keyifokɔ ! ” Mfó nya betidi bamǝ díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bǝmuǝ wǝ nya bákɔbe wǝ kekleke .
Mba ntǝkǝko Yesu eto ɔni ǝlǝkǝ wǝ kalande nya ówe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ eto ndomunyǝ eto koto .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fi fǝ kalande akpe lǝ ke kakpekɔ . Betidi ba leetsyi kalande lǝ betidi ǝsuǝǝ , kalande ǝsuǝ baayɛ kǝkpǝ .
Biante biǝ moofo bɔwunsǝko bɔtɔ ketsyiko mɔ Anto ɔflɔ lee , nya lamfolamfoo , wootsyese wǝ batɔnkpe eto bamamanyǝ eto akpa lefosi ǝnuǝ itsyi kato ?
Fɛɛ lǝ ibǝ nkoo , ntsyǝ fɛ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue luubǝ itǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu dítsyi ǝnǝmi útǝ sitiditu siamǝ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ bitsyi keyi ku nlande bibǝ biǝ bibǝ mɛ kǝmuǝkɔ fe nwǝ ńyǝ lǝ Aba ǝsuǝ ? Diyi saa , nkɛ lǝ Onanto eto kesumuyo mfó nkate asa , fɛɛ bíǝmmuǝ mɛ .
Asa nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ nko bǝ lǝ asa nnya bǝnyǝlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ” Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi kenke dítsyetsyi bédu lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Mba dímuǝ Yesu ákpa wǝ bésuko Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Kayafa eto diyo kaka besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa létsya bensi .
Petro ǝtǝko mǝ kama kama úsu taa Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto lekpata kafo . Úsu úsiǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ obe kase ditiki nǝmǝ dubǝ ibǝ .
Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku bakponkpo ba dísiǝ mfó kenke ábɛbɛ betidi ba luubǝ bala etiki bǝtǝkǝ Yesu lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu balo wǝ .
Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ kulesa saa , ite bǝ betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bála bidia bǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ tsyafɛ . Betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ
nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mooba Onanto eto kesumuyo nǝmfo , nya lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muusinkli nto ni nńyǝnsǝ . ’ ”
Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke átaka úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Anlɛ etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi kǝtǝkǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mfo bɔnɔ ? Ǝmbǝ Kulesa fɔɔtɛyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? ”
Fɛɛ Yesu édi bi , wóantɛyi kulesa . Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ esi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto wǝ nsi nkpe eto diye ǝsuǝǝ , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ tɛyi bo lǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi wǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , ite fǝ kase fátɛyi . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , buinyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi se unsi lǝ Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto kodiani . Nya biunyǝ se unsi lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ utsyi kato ɔnlɛ bubǝ ! ”
Lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ áfuadi wǝ awu ku lɛblɔfi nya ófa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Édi mbusiotiki ! Boensihiã badansiɛ saa ! Bíɔnɔ mbusiotiki nnya údi mfo !
Ntsyǝ bibu ? ” Mǝmblɛ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Údi dikpi nya uńyǝ utǝ ukpǝ ! ”
Nya bétufǝ ntufǝ bákpo wǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi nya báblɛ wǝ . Nya mba lɛsɔ wǝ lǝ atosi ,
átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ fenii , tɛyi bo futsyǝ lɛsɔ fǝ ! ”
Petro ǝsiǝ lǝ lekple lǝ kpakpaakpe mfó fɛ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto usumubisiobi díbǝ mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu wǝ ditsyi Galilea eto kasɔ . ”
Fɛɛ ɔ́ni nnya lǝ betidi bamfo kenke eto ǝnǝmi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mante lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo ! ”
Nya údu mfó úsu úńyǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto kesie . Usumubisiobi bamba tsya ǝnyǝ Petro nya ɔ́tɛyi mba díńyǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Wuntsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
Bio Petro esi ɔ́ni nya óka ntamu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Minyi osani ǝmǝ ko ! ”
Yanklɛ fɛ mba ńyǝ mfo díbǝ bátɛyi Petro bǝnkǝ , “ Ɛkpɛ mǝ ɔni feni , itsyise fǝ etikididi ǝǝlǝkǝ fǝ kate wuee . ”
Nya Petro lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ lesa saa bǝ ɔnukualɛ minlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ Onanto lǝ unǝ mɛ koto lǝ sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyi ! ” Lefe nǝmfo tutuutu nnya ukusɛ dítǝ kɛnyɛ .
Nya Petro lékloma lesa nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛɛ , ǝbɔtɛyi sitsyǝ fǝnkǝ enyi mɛ . ” Ɔ́bɔ úsu lekple nya úwi keku kekleke .
Se kale dísiǝ ku olesiǝtu , Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ kenke átsya nya báse uyi bǝ boolo Yesu .
Bákpe wǝ lǝ amena nya bákpa wǝ bésu bákpe Romafɔ eto Aba eto Uninǝ Pilato lǝ ani .
Se Yuda , wǝ dídu Yesu lɛnɔ nkǝ bálo wǝ dikpǝnkpii , ífi wǝ tinti , nya úsinkliko sika flubia awosi ǝtsyǝ nyamǝ úsuko besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ bamǝ .
Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyifo kabua bǝ mfi utidi wǝ dímenyifo kabua ntǝ miǝ balo ! ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyamfo manka bo nkpǝ . Fǝ etiki ni nyamfó ! ”
Yuda éfi atabi nyamǝ óto ókpe lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo mfó , nya usu ókpe ukuǝ úkpe .
Nya besumunyǝ ninǝ bamfó lɛsɛ atabi nyamǝ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atabi nyamfo eyifo kɔtɔ eto atabi , nya iyifo lesa nǝ ńyǝ lǝ bo kesumu eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ bǝ bufi atabi nyamfo bokpe lǝ bo kesumu eto otobe . Bo kɔfi eti nyamfo kusu . ”
Se bákpe disii , báse nya uyi bǝnkǝ befi atabi nyamǝ bésu báya Asa eto Otonto eto Kasɔ itǝ bafɔ eto kebikekɔ .
Nyamfo esoo , bǝtǝkǝ kasɔ kamǝ diye bǝ Kɔtɔ eto Kasɔ ibǝ ese lǝ mmi .
Itǝ lesa nǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yeremia lɛtɛyi útsyǝ díbǝ itǝ nkǝ , “ Béfi sika flubia eto atabi fosi ǝtsyǝ , nya Israelfɔ lɛtɔnɔ bǝ boofo lǝ wǝ disi
béfi báya Otonto eto Kasɔ , fe kase Bonamute léla nkǝ nyifo . ”
Bákpa Yesu báboko Romafɔ eto Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Ninǝ Pilato eto ǝnǝmi . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee . Átɛyi kukɔnɔ . ”
Fɛɛ wántɛyi kulesa itsyi lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ eto nyɛ bo banlɛ bola kǝtǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mfó nya Pilato lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ mfo manka fǝ lee ? ”
Fɛɛ íyifo Aba eto uninǝ ǝmǝ yani tinti se Yesu lɛni wémfe kɛnyɛ útǝ mbuayɛ saa .
Ídi Aba eto uninǝ lesa nǝ úkeyifo lɛlɛ saa lǝ bǝǝbǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyi budi , bǝ oyani mba béti bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo eto ɔni wǝ betidi kpǝ bamǝ lɛtɔ , utǝ mǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , mba bákpe lǝ diyo mfó eto ɔni akɛ , wǝ betidi nyi kukɔnɔ nya baakpo wǝ bǝ Baraba .
Nyaso lefe nǝ betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyaa , Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe biala biǝ nyani ntǝ mi ? Baraba lee , lee Yesu wǝ betidi laakpo bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ? ”
Úyifo nko itsyise óte nkǝ kekisi eso Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamfo lékpa wǝ báboko .
Lefe nǝ Pilato nsi ɔnlɛ lekpo nǝmǝ bokpoo , wǝ usiǝ átsyese wǝ ɔtɔnkpe nkǝ , “ Lǝkǝ fǝ ani lǝ utidi wǝ dímenyifo kabua saa mfo eto etiki ǝsuǝ , itsyise nsiǝ kola kǝnǝ eto ketsye itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya dítǝ sikpi dímuǝ mɛ tinti ! ”
Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ábiasǝ betidi ba létsya mfo eto ato bǝnkǝ batɔ Pilato lǝ oyani Baraba utǝ mǝ lǝ balo Yesu .
Fɛɛ Pilato átɔ betidi ba létsya mfó nkǝ , “ Betidi inuǝ bamfo eto nti , nte nwǝ bela biǝ nyani ntǝ mi ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Baraba ! ”
Nya Pilato dísi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , be ele bǝ nyifo ku Yesu wǝ baakpo bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ mɔmɔ ? ” Mǝmblɛ kenke ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ ! ”
Fɛɛ Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kabua ka úyifo ? ” Mfóo , bétsyiko bofa bembembe katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
Se Pilato dínyǝ nkǝ wensiembofo kulesa buyifo lenni bulǝ ebubǝǝ , úfi ntu nya úflǝ ani lǝ sitiditu nǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ mɔ ani , nnyǝ mɔ akpa , mɔ ani ǝmbǝ lǝ osani ǝmfo eto bolo ǝsuǝ ! Mi etiki ini . ”
Sitiditu siamǝ kenke ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ ukpǝ bǝ utǝkǝ lǝ bo ku bo bebi lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
Mfó nya Pilato léyani Baraba útǝ mǝ . Nya se útǝ báblɛ Yesu bálosǝ , óyani wǝ útǝ nkǝ básɔ wǝ lǝ uyi ǝsuǝ .
Nya Pilato eto bamamanyǝ lékpa Yesu bésuko Aba eto uninǝ eto diyo , nya bamamanyǝ ba kenke díbǝ bátsyilama wǝ .
Bǝlǝkǝ wǝ awu lǝ ǝsuǝ nya béfi awu sia bákpe wǝ .
Nya béfi biyu bédi lekpakpa bétsyisǝ wǝ lǝ disi fɛ béfi uyi bákpe wǝ lǝ kodiani . Nya báse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi fe oka seka nya bǝmǝ wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu , ! Yudafɔ eto Oka lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ kɛntsyɛɛ ! ”
Bétufǝ ntufǝ bákpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bálɛ uyi ǝmǝ báfo básɔ wǝ lǝ disi .
Se bǝmǝ wǝ bálosǝ nkoo , bǝlǝkǝ wǝ awu sia nyamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya besi béfi wǝ awu nyamǝ bákpe wǝ . Nya bákpa wǝ báyɛnko bésu wǝ kasɔkɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝ bédu lǝ umǝ báyɛ bantɔɔ , bátsyako osani utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi Kirene wǝ baakpo Simon . Bamamanyǝ bamǝ áhiɛ wǝ bǝ ofo Yesu eto uyikabie komǝ utsyi .
Nya bésu báyo kaka baakpo Golgata eto kasɔnɔnɔ ni Ditidisikɔbe ku kalua .
Bǝtǝ Yesu nte bo bátsyakasǝ ku kofa ko nkpe kalo bǝ unǝ . Fɛɛ se útu mu óbee , ɔ́ni wǝnnǝ mu .
Mfó nya bamamanyǝ bamǝ lɛsɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ , nya bákpo asa basɛɛ fɛ bésie wǝ awu bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Nya kamaa , bǝsiǝ mfó bákase wǝ .
Lǝ wǝ disi katoo , báwɔni asa bámanklasǝ lǝ uyi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nnya báwɔni bǝnkǝ lesa nǝ eso bálo wǝ ni bǝ , “ Nnyǝ Yesu , Nwǝ Ni Yudafɔ Eto Oka . ”
Básɔ beyu inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ bákɔ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Ɔni áfaka lǝ wǝ sediani nya ɔni tsya léfaka lǝ wǝ simǝni .
Betidi ba kenke lɛyɛ mfó étinkǝsǝ mǝ esi nya báka Yesu fefe .
Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ni nwǝ lɛtɛyi fǝnkǝ eboba Desumuyo Kplɛ akpo lǝ kasɔ , esinkli ato ni ǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ ! Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ Onanto eto Ubi feni ! Yifǝ lǝ uyikabie komǝ ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ kasɔ . ”
Nko ke besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ eto beninǝ tsya dímǝ wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ,
“ Ófo betidi bamba lǝ nkpǝ , fɛɛ wǝmbofó wǝ ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ ! Lǝ Yudafɔ eto Oka unii , ɔyifǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ mɔmɔ ubǝ , lǝ bofo wǝ bɔnɔ !
Ófó Onanto ɔ́nɔ , nya waakpadi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ Onanto eto Ubi . Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bobe lǝ Onanto aala wǝǝ , lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ mɔmɔ lǝ bobe ! ”
Nko ken beyu ba ku wǝ básɔ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ tsya léka wǝ nɛ .
Idu lǝ kakɔmi eto abombo lefosi ǝnuǝǝ , kawunsiǝ kenke ána tũũ isu ese lǝ ketsyitsyokɔmi eto abombo ǝtsyǝ .
Fe abombo ǝtsyǝ etii , Yesu áfa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Eli , Eli , lama sabaktani ? ” Nyamfo eto kasɔ ni , “ Mɔ Onanto , mɔ Onanto ! Beso fáyani mɛ fǝtsyǝ ? ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ díńyǝ mfó ánɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔlɛ Elia bokpadi ! ”
Mǝ ɔni étsyetsyi nya úfi okosa wǝ bákpe lǝ nte eto sonkpe , nya úfi mu ku uyi úsuko nkǝ lǝ utǝ wǝ lǝ unǝ .
Fɛɛ betidi bamba átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bińyǝ lǝ bobe ! Bitǝ lǝ bobe lǝ Elia ebubǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko kuyi komfo ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu esi ófa bembembe nya úkpǝ .
Lamfolamfoo , Disumuyo Kplɛ eto kafia kplɛ dísie lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ itsyi kato ibǝ kasɔ . Nya kasɔ kamǝ kenke dítinkǝ , nya aba léba .
Edi ásini , nya Onanto eto betidi kɛnkɛ kpǝ ba díkekpǝ létaka bǝbǝ nkpǝ .
Bábɔ lǝ mǝ edi kafo nya se Yesu létaka útsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝǝ , bésu Yudafɔ eto Umǝ Kɛnkɛ ǝmǝ kafo kaka betidi kpǝ dínyǝ mǝ .
Se Omamanyǝ ninǝ ku bamamanyǝ ba díńyǝ bákase Yesu dínyǝ kase kasɔ dítinkǝ ku asa nnya díbǝ mfó kenkee , sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti ! Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sitintii , utidi ǝmfo éyifo Onanto eto Ubi . ”
Besio kpǝ ba dítsyi Galilea ba díkawunsǝko Yesu ǝńyǝ lǝ kɔsɛsɛ bákabe asa nnya díbǝ .
Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ni Maria Magdalene , ku Maria wǝ ni Yakobo ku Yosef eto ambe ku Sebedeo eto usiǝ .
Se éyo ditsyitsyo lefee , otabinyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Yosef , nya úyifo Yesu eto okasebi wǝ ditsyi Arimatea ǝbǝ .
Úsu Pilato ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo Yesu eto ɔkɔ . Pilato ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ befi ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bǝtǝ Yosef .
Nyaso Yosef áfo ɔkɔ ǝmǝ nya úfi kafia flubia kǝtsyuǝ úmli wǝ .
Nya úfi wǝ úsu úbikǝ lǝ kebikekɔ lǝ wǝ kosate eto kudi fɔfɔ ko bǝlǝkǝ lǝ koba kǝmiǝ . Nya ominansǝ leba nǝ lɛmɔ úti ko kɛnyɛ nya údu .
Maria Magdalene ku Maria nuǝfǝ ǝsiǝ mfó balɛ kudi komǝ bobe .
Nya se kale disiǝ nya ini Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii esoo , usumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ ésu Pilato ɔflɔ .
Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Uninǝ , lefe nǝ odiantidi ǝmǝ dísiǝ nkpǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nkpǝǝ , bootakasǝ mɛ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kama . ’
Nyaso tǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ lǝ base kudi komǝ kukɔnɔ isu ese diyi tsyǝfǝ nǝmǝ , kase wǝ bakasebi lembusu beyu ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bedunko batɛyi betidi bǝnkǝ ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ . Lǝ ibǝ nkoo , sidia sia bɔɔtɛyi ǝbɔkɛ seso nsia kɔ . ”
Mfó nya Pilato lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ lǝ besu base kudi komǝ fe kase boofo . ”
Nyaso bésu bálɔ béti leba nǝ béti lǝ kudi komǝ kɛnyɛ kekleke bǝtsyǝ ko lekpo , bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ etidi ni lǝ bǝnyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya bǝtsyǝ bamamanyǝ bǝ base ko .
Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto kamaa , ǝni Kɔsida eto kolensiǝntoo , Maria Magdalene ku Maria nuǝfǝ ésu bǝ besu babe kudi komǝ .
Lamfolamfoo , kasɔ étinkǝ kekleke . Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ áyifǝ utsyi kato úbǝ ɔ́minansǝ leba kplɛ nǝmǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ ni ǝsuǝ .
Wǝ ditsyǝbi ékeyǝnde fe kase ɔsi laato nya wǝ awu diflubi futututu fe aklala seka .
Sikpi ǝmuǝ mba nlɛ mfó bose nya bétinkǝ tinti , nya bákpo kasɔ mfó fe bukpǝ békpe .
Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfó édinko besio bamǝ etiki nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Nnyi miǝ Yesu wǝ básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ .
Umbǝ mfo ! Bátakasǝ wǝ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi ɔtɔnsǝ . Bibǝ bebe kaka ólabee .
Mɔmɔɔ , bisu mlǝ lǝ bisu bɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi biǝ , ‘ Bátakasǝ wǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , nya ɔntɔ mi sɛtɔ úsu Galilea . Mfó biunyǝ wǝ nɛ . ’ Bekloma nnya míntɛyi mi mfo . ”
Nyaso bédu lǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ lǝ sikpitete ku disuǝyuǝ tsya ǝsuǝ . Nya bétsyetsyi bǝ beesu batɛyi wǝ bakasebi .
Lamfolamfoo , Yesu átsyako mǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ itǝ mi . ” Báyɛ bétu wǝ bábokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bákɔbe wǝ lǝ akpa nya bésumu wǝ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi . Bisu bɛtɛyi mɔ bayimi biǝ besu Galilea , mfó buunyǝ mɛ nɛ . ”
Lefe nǝ besio bamfó dísinkli bantɔɔ , bamamanyǝ ba lése kudi komǝ ésu umǝ nya bátɛyi besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ asa nnya kenke díbǝ mfó .
Besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ákpe disi béfi nsusu . Bǝtǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ atabi eto akplɛ ,
nya bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ lefe nǝ bélabe selabe ku ketsyee , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ béyu wǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ bédunko .
Nya lǝ Romafɔ eto Aba eto uninǝ anɔ nyamfoo , buutǝ ɔnɔ kasɔ boǝ inni mi díyifo kulesa , nyaso yanle bǝ balo mi dikpi . ”
Bamamanyǝ bamǝ áfo atabi nyamǝ nya béyifo fe kase bátɛyi mǝ . Nyaso nyamfo ni ditiki nǝ lɛyɛ létsyilama Yudafɔ ntii taa mmi nɛ .
Lǝ nnya eto kamaa , bakasebi lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ábe bésu kɔtini ko nkpe lǝ Galilea ǝsuǝ kaka Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ utsyǝ .
Se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bésumu wǝ , ite bǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ áyaki tsya .
Yesu ányi ɔfi mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto éfi kato ku kasɔ kenke eto ǝsuǝale útǝ mɛ .
Nyaso bisu kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ɔflɔ lǝ biyifo mǝ mɔ bakasebi . Biflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ Anto ku Ubi ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto diye ǝsuǝ ,
nya bete mǝ bǝ betsyue lesa saa nǝ mínte mi koto . Nya lǝ sitintii , mɔɔkɛ ku mi lefe saa , isu ese lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ . ”
Nyamfo ni Ditiki Sɛɛ itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Onanto kosate eto ubi ǝsuǝ eto ketsyikokɔ .
Lǝ lefe kɛntsyɛ nǝ léfe mǝǝ , Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi Yesaya áwɔni utsyǝ nkǝ Onanto átɛyi wǝ ubi nkǝ , “ Mootsyese ɔtɔyɛ ntɔnsǝ . Wǝ lɔɔlɔ betidi utsyǝ itǝ fǝ bubǝ .
Ǝbɔnɔ se nkomǝ eto utidi ǝmfo luusu kabe letsya lǝ mfiminti akatɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ . Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ itǝ wǝ bubǝ . ’ ”
Nko eto ɔtɔyɛ ǝmǝ ni Yohanes . Wǝ ni díbǝ ɔkɛ lǝ mfiminti kaka úkǝflǝsǝ betidi ntu lǝ ketu fe kase Yudafɔ leeyifo . Nya ɔnlɛ bofa kabe letsya nkǝ ele bǝ betidi tsyi mǝ akɔɛsi bawuninsǝ lǝ bayɛ asa bua buyifo lǝ bafo ntu flǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ .
Betidi kpǝ etsyi Yudea eto kasɔ ku mǝ umǝnkplɛ wǝ baakpo Yerusalem nya bésu mfiminti bomfó bǝ lǝ banɔ Yohanes eto kɔtɔ ko bákpe wǝ eto etiki . Bǝlǝkǝ mǝ abua báte Onanto nya Yohanes díflǝsǝ mǝ ntu lǝ ketu ka baakpo Yordan .
Yohanes ákpe ɔflimu eto bisǝ eto awudindi nya úfi kubukikuǝ eto abɔsu ókle wǝ nkɛ . Didisa nǝ úkǝdi didi bablɔ ku bǝkpǝsǝ .
Wǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ ditsya bobe ni nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ntǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , so mɛ famfamfa nya yǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ ńyǝ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ nyifo wǝ keyifo blɛmblɛ .
Mɔɔ , ntu eto buflǝsǝ eto lekpa ete maafo buyifo . Fɛɛ wǝ ebufi Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ uflǝsǝ mi ntu . ”
Yanklɛ fɛ Yesu ditsyi umǝ wǝ baakpo Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ , ubǝ udufǝ , nya Yohanes díyifo wǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Yordan .
Lǝ kase Yesu nlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ kabe katoo , únyǝ nkǝ Onanto eto kato lɛ bɔsini nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lɛyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lɛblɛkpa eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ .
Nya bánɔ ɔkuɛ ditsyi kato ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni mɔ ubi wǝ mankeko , nya mǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ fǝ . ”
Lamfolamfo , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ákpa Yesu úsuko mfiminti bomǝ kafo .
Wǝ mate ǝsiǝ mfó eyifosi ana . Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , Obonsam áto Yesu óbe . Nya Onanto eto batɔyɛ díbǝ bawunsǝ ko wǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyoo , Yesu édu mfó úsu Galilea úsu údi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mfó .
Ɔkɛ mfó katɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe sɛɛ nǝmǝ eboyo . Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto lefe ǝbɔfi . Bisinkli lǝ mi asa bua eto kama lǝ befo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bɛnɔ . ”
Se Yesu nlɛ botsyilama lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝ nkpe lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ ɔflɔɔ , únyǝ mba lǝǝlǝkǝ akpɛ inuǝ , ba ni Simon ku wǝ ɔyimisani Andreas , ba nlɛ mǝ asabu bota mfó .
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bitǝkǝko mɛ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , nya moote mi kase biulǝkǝ betidi bitǝ Onanto . ”
Lamfolamfo báyani mǝ asabu bǝtsyǝ nya bátaka bǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
Ɔ́yɛ úsu sɛtɔ sɛkɛ nya únyǝ bayimisani inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi ba ni Yakobo ku Yohanes . Besi mǝ ɔklɔ kafo balɛ mǝ asabu bɔlɔ .
Kase Yesu dínyǝ mǝ koo , ókpadi mǝ nkǝ bǝtǝkǝko wǝ . Mǝ tsya átaka akpa akpa báyani mǝ anto Sebedeo ku wǝ beyifoyifo bǝtsyǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo bǝtǝkǝko Yesu .
Yesu ku mba ntǝkǝko wǝ ésu bédufǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Kapernaum . Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ mǝ mfó eto busu ǝsuǝ eto kamaa , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya útsyiko mǝ Anantotiki bote .
Iyifo mba kenke lɛnɔ wǝ asatete nyamǝ yanii , itsyise ɛbɔ lete lǝ mba laate asa itsyi lǝ Yudafɔ eto afi ǝsuǝ . Bomu wǝ asatete eyifo nnya nkpe kalende nya itsyi taa wǝ utu kǝmiǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ tutuutuu , osani utsyuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nsi wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ akɛ lǝ katsyakɔ kamǝ mfó ,
nya ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ , be fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo ? Bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ ǝǝbǝ atsylɔsǝ bo lee ? Nyi futsyǝ feni . Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ wǝ ótsyese nɛ . ”
Yesu éti lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ kusu nya ókpe ni kɔfi nkǝ , “ Dika , nya lǝ abɔ lǝ osani ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo étinkǝsǝ osani ǝmǝ keklekle nya dítǝ ófa bǝmbǝǝmbǝ fɛ lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Itǝ iyifo mba kenke díńyǝ mfó yanii , nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte asatete fɔfɔ nnya eto okle nɛ ? Utidi ǝmfo kpe ǝsuǝale woafo etiki budi ku awɔnɔ bua nya beetsyue wǝ etiki ato . ”
Itǝ esoo , Yesu eto diye áyɛ letsyo lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ kenke .
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ku Yakobo ku Yohanes édu lǝ katsyakɔ kamǝ nya bésu Simon ku Andreas eto diyo .
Se bésu bédufǝ mfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , Simon eto usiǝambe áyila , atikesi ǝmuǝ wǝ olabe .
Nyaso Yesu ésu wǝ ɔflɔ , nya ɔ́kɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni ótakasǝ úńyǝnsǝ . Lamfolamfo wǝ bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝ nya ótaka útǝ mɛ lesa bédi .
Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , betidi ákpa befimfi kenke ku mba awɔnɔ bua díkakpe bulǝ kpǝ báboko Yesu bǝ lǝ otsya mǝ bufi .
Nya umǝ ǝmǝ kenke eto betidi díbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ kesie mfó bánlɛ bobe .
Yesu átsya betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ bufi ateate bufi nya óla awɔnɔ bua lǝ betidi kpǝ ǝsuǝ ku mba awɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise Yesu yi nkǝ awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ yi futsyǝ uni , nyaso wántɔnɔ nkǝ awɔnɔ nyamǝ tɛyi kulesa itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Kolensiǝnto fɛ kale luusiǝǝ , Yesu átaka ɔ́bɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ . Úsu kaka kutsyuǝ saa lǝmbǝ nya óto ola útǝ Onanto .
Kamaa , Simon ku wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ ésu bábɛbɛ Yesu .
Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ǝbǝ ɔlɛ fǝ bɔbɛbɛ . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ busu umǝ bamba . Efe bǝ ndi Anantotiki lǝ mfó tsya , itsyise nyamfo ni mɔ keyifo ka mimbǝ keyifokɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
Nyaso ɔ́yɛ ótsyilama Galilea eto kasɔ kenke , nya úkedi Anantotiki nyamǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ kpǝ nya óla awɔnɔ bua ɔ́bɔsǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ tsya .
Osani utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ bufisia bufi ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Óse akonki ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ lǝ ɔwunsǝko wǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ alaa , ebofo mɛ botsya nya yuuyuǝ mɛ tsya . ”
Wǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝnǝ Yesu kafo , nyaso únǝ wǝ kɔni nya útidi wǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nla nko . Fǝ ǝsuǝ kenke lǝ yele . ”
Lamfolamfo bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ wǝ .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ udu , nya ókpe wǝ kɔfi keklekle nkǝ ,
“ Mǝnńyǝ lǝ kusu atɛyi betidi nnya dibǝ , bomu su lǝ efi fǝ ǝsuǝ esu ate Onanto eto Usumunyǝ . Lǝ efi nkpata bo Mose eto kɔfi lɛtɔ esuko . Nyamfo luulǝkǝ ete bǝnkǝ bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ fǝ nɛ . ”
Tsya lefe nǝ nwǝ ǝmǝ dídu ɔntɔɔ , útsyiko bofa katɛyi kase Yesu létsya wǝ . Lǝ nnya esoo , Yesu ménsifo umǝ saa busu , itsyise betidi kpǝ lɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ . Nyamfo esoo , Yesu kosate átsyimɛ lǝ umǝmflɔ kaka kuutsyǝ lǝmbǝ . Nya betidi ditsyi nlebe nlebe kpǝ , bǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó .
Lǝ eyi ǝtsyuǝ eto kamaa , úsinkli úsu Kapernaum nya lǝ wǝ businki kǝbǝ ǝsuǝǝ , betidi ánɔ bǝ úsinkli úbǝ oto .
Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ diyo nǝ ɔkɛ , ku ni kayoma kenke . Nya ɔkɛ mfó úkedi mǝ etiki .
Mfó nya betidi ena léboko ufimfi wǝ léba onkpo kasɔ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya se banlɛ kusu bunyǝ lǝ bayɛnko wǝ lǝ kesie bedufǝnko wǝ diyo kafo lǝ kase betidi mfui esoo , bésu bábe letsya bǝlǝkǝ ofo nya báyɛnko ufimfi ǝmǝ ku wǝ belabekǝ báyifǝsǝ bǝtsyǝ le Yesu eto akɔ .
Se Yesu dínyǝ kase sɔ̃ɔ̃ báfo bánɔ bǝ woofo ufimfi ǝmǝ botsya esoo , Yesu átɛyi nwǝ léba onkpo kasɔ ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ . ”
Fɛɛ afi eto bateasa ba lɛkɛ mǝ lenti mfó ebu lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi ǝsuǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ,
“ Beso woatɛyi nko ? Ɔlɛ mbusiotiki budi . Onanto hã laafo abua bufi katsyɛ ! ”
Yesu áte mǝ nsusu nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ nyamfo lǝ mi ?
Nte nya diyuǝ enso bɔtɛyi , ‘ Mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ , ’ lee ‘ Taka lǝ efi fǝ belabekǝ lǝ ayɛ edu ’ ?
Nyaso lǝ itǝ bǝ befo bɛnɔ biǝ Utidi Eto Ubii , nkpe ǝsuǝale bǝ mfi betidi eto abua ntsyɛ le kawunsiǝ kamfo . Bɛnɔ ? ” Mfó ǝmǝǝ , Yesu esi útsyi wǝ ǝnǝmi útǝ ufimfi ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ ,
“ Taka lǝ efi fǝ belabekǝ lǝ esu diyo . ”
Nya osani ǝmfo létaka lamfolamfo úfi wǝ okla nya údu lǝ betidi bamǝ ńyǝ mfó nti . Nyamfo éyifo betidi ba kenke nyǝ mfó yanii . Nya ítǝ béfi atǝsǝ banlɛ Onanto butǝ . Mǝmblɛ átɛyi bǝ bǝnnyǝ tɔ nyamfo eto okle bǝnyǝ .
Nya Yesu disi údu úsu Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ kɛnyɛ nya betidi bamǝ kenke díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó , nya óte mǝ Anantotiki .
Kase ɔ́nlɛ bɔyɛ kafe lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ mfóo , úsu únyǝ Lewi wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubi wǝ nsi lǝ kaka woafo umǝnko . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ ! ” Nyaso Lewi átaka kpla nya útǝkǝko wǝ .
Ketsyitsyokɔmii , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ku betidi kpǝ ba ntǝkǝko wǝ , ésu Lewi eto bǝ lǝ besu bedi lesa ku wǝ . Mba dítǝkǝko wǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ éyifo mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo .
Nya afi eto bateasa ba ni Yudafɔ eto lekpa nǝ baakpo Farisifɔ tsya akɛ mfó . Nyaso lefe nǝ afi eto bateasa ba ni Farisifɔ bamǝ dínyǝ bǝ Yesu si ɔ́lɛ lesa budi ku babuayifo , bátɔ wǝ bakasebi bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝso wonko mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo nsi banlɛ lesa budi ? ”
Se Yesu lɛnɔ etiki nnya bánlɛ budii , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba nkpe ǝsuǝale manhiã ofanyǝ enso mba ni befimfi hã . Mǝmbǝ miǝ mǝǝbǝ nlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ , bomu babuayifo eso mimbǝ . ”
Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ se Yohanes ku wǝ bakasebi ku Farisifɔ lɛkɛ lǝ kɛnyɛkekle ǝsuǝǝ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso fɛ fǝ bakasebi laankle kɛnyɛ fe kase Yohanes eto bakasebi ku Farisifɔ laakle ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ lǝ lekpa seka ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ Okafɔsǝ eto bakloboo , bani lesa budi lǝ kusiǝ kakpakɔ kamǝ ? Lee , yanle bǝ bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ nkpe mǝ lentii ?
Yuubǝ diyi ditsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ lǝ mǝ nti , baklobo bamǝ ebokle kɛnyɛ beyifo yoyoyo .
Kuutsyuǝ saa emfi lefianku fɔfɔ kaka kama lǝ kafia koko ka nlɛ bola ǝsuǝ , lefianku fɔfɔ nǝmǝ ebunǝ kafia koko kamǝ kala lǝ bǝflǝ kǝ , nya luutǝ dibiǝ koko nǝmǝ sǝnsǝ lɛmɔ leso kɔ .
Nnya kamaa , bankpo ntǝ fɔfɔ lǝ kubukikuǝtobe koko wǝ bákakpo ntǝ bǝnyǝ kafo . Ntǝ fɔfɔ bomǝ ebɔkpɔ bobe kato itǝ bǝ kubukikuetobe koko ǝmǝ ebola itǝ bǝ ntǝ ku kubukikuǝtobe ǝmǝ ebuyifo asɔsɔ . Bomu ntǝ fɔfɔɔ , ubukikuǝtobe fɔfɔ ǝsuǝ baakpo mu . ”
Lefe lɔni lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi nyɛ lǝ anta eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ banlɛ bofee , bǝfǝsǝ anta ǝtsyuǝ balɛ bɔyimi .
Nyaso Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso fǝ bakasebi lǝǝyifo nko ? Bo kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ beyifo nko lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . ”
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Biankla lǝ Onanto eto Kukuǝ Kɛnkɛ eto Awɔnisa lesa nǝ Oka David díyifo ? Lǝ lefe nǝ kukpǝnsɛ lɛlɛ wǝ ku wǝ bayɛtsyuǝǝ , Oka David ésu kaka bǝǝtǝ Onanto kedi lǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ baakpo Abiatar eto lefe . Úlǝkǝ didisa kɛnkɛ nǝ ntǝ mfó itǝ mba lǝǝtǝ wǝ kedi hã lǝ Disumuyo údi nya útǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ tsya ditsyuǝ bédi . Moses eto kɔfi mǝntǝ nkomǝ eto diyifobi nǝmfo kusu , tsya bántɛyi mǝ kulesa . ”

Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝtsyǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi itǝ utidi eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ . Inni utidi bǝtsyǝ itǝ diyi nǝmǝ eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ .
Nyaso mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubii , mɔ ke ni Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto Onamute . ”
Lǝ lefe bamba ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu esi úsu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ . Utsyuǝ akɛ mfó wǝ eto kɔni díkpǝ konyoma .
Betidi ba lɛkɛ mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ ńyǝ balɛ bobe lǝ wootsya utidi ǝmǝ lǝ ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ babe lǝ buunyǝ etiki lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Yesu ákpadi utidi ǝmǝ eto kɔni díkpǝ útsyǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
Nya útsyi wǝ ǝnǝmi útǝ betidi bamǝ kenke nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ utidi yifo kasɛɛ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi , lee Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eyifo diyi nǝ utidi loobiasǝ asa ? Iyifo diyi nǝ bǝǝtǝ nkpǝ , lee iyifo diyi nǝ baa biasǝ nkpǝ ? ” Fɛɛ bámfo wǝ kulesa bɔtɛyi .
Yesu étsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ nya óbe mǝ ku lɛblɔfi itsyise ílǝ wǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi se bánla bǝ baawunsǝko mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eso . Nya ɔ́tɛyi ufimfi ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue . ” Únǝ ko útsyue . Nya ete kɔni komǝ létsya wǝ .
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Farisifɔ bamǝ édu nya bésu bátsya ku Herod eto betidi nya bákpe disi lǝ kase bɔɔyɛ balo Yesu .
Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lɛyɛ bésu Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ ɔflɔ . Nya sitiditu kplɛ sia ditsyi Galilea ku Yudea ku Yerusalem ku Idumia eto kasɔ ku mba ditsyi Yordan eto ketu eto lekpake nǝ nse ku mba ditsyi Tiro ku Sidon tsya ǝtǝko wǝ bǝbǝ . Nnya ni bǝnkǝ wǝ ayanisa nnya ɔnlɛ buyifo ǝbɔyɛ etsyo nyaso betidi kpǝ ála bǝ befi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝnyǝ wǝ .

Lǝ lefe nǝmfó se Yesu díkatsya betidi kpǝ esoo , befimfi kpǝ lɛ bokplatsya bǝ lǝ betidi wǝ ko lǝ bǝmuǝ ale . Nyaso Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ babɛbɛ ɔklɔ bǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ utuflɔ , itǝ bǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ ǝbǝ befuii , woofo bobe kǝdufǝ lǝ wǝ kafo .

Lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝsiǝ lǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba díbǝ mfó ǝsuǝ . Lǝ bǝnyǝ , bǝnyǝ Yesu koo , békedu kanɔ nya bákafa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi . ”
Nya Yesu káninko mǝ nkǝ bǝntǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bate futsyǝ uni .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ábe úsu kɔtini disi . Nya mfóo , ókpadi mba óla nkǝ bakɛ ko wǝ .
Betidi bamfo ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya úlǝkǝ lefosi inuǝ lǝ mǝ nti . Nya útǝkǝ mǝ diye nkǝ batɔnkpe . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlǝkǝ mi minkǝ bɛkɛ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ lefe saa . Mootsyese mi lǝ bisu bidi Anantotiki .
Nya biɔkɛ ǝsuǝale bela awɔnɔ bua bitsyiko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
Betidi lefosi inuǝ ba úlǝkǝ eto aye ni Simon wǝ Yesu dítǝ diye nkǝ Petro ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimisani kɛkɛ Yohanes ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi ba Yesu dítǝkǝ diye nkǝ Boanerges eto kasɔ ni nkǝ , beedi etiki ku utǝ fe kase kato laafa kekumi bembembe , bafɛfɛ ni Andreas ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Toma ku Yakobo wǝ ni Alfeo eto ubi ku Tadeo ku Simon wǝ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefe léta mǝ kasɔ disi ku Yuda Iskariot , nwǝ luubǝ ulǝkǝ Yesu utǝ .



Se Yesu dídu mfóo , údu úsu diyo ditsyuǝ . Nya betidi kpǝ esi bǝbǝ mǝ ɔflɔ mfó . Itǝ bǝ ibǝ ɛkɛ ale itǝ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi bǝ bánkɛ lefe kulaa tsya lǝ bedi lesa .
Se wǝ kosate eto betidi lɛnɔ nkoo , bésu bǝ lǝ besu bǝnǝ wǝ besuko diyo , itsyise bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Disi abia wǝ . ”
Nya afi eto bateasa ba ditsyi Yerusalem lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua ǝbǝ disi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Nya awɔnɔ bua eto ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ni nwǝ dítǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale fɛ ɔnlɛ awɔnɔ bua nyamfó bola kabɔnko lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
Nyaso Yesu ákpadi betidi bamǝ nya údi etiki ko mǝ lǝ lekpa ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ Obonsam ebofo wǝ ǝsuǝ bola ketsyiko lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ ?
Lǝ ibǝ bǝnkǝ sekakedikɔ áma se ǝsuǝ lǝ akpaa , nya akpa akpa nyamǝ nlɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ntii , nkomǝ eto sekakedikɔ siamǝ ǝmbofo buńyǝ .
Lǝ diyo ditsyuǝ eto betidi ǝsǝnsǝ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , anto ku anto nlɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , diyo nǝmfó ǝmbofo buńyǝ .
Nyaso lǝ Obonsam ataka uńyǝ ɔnlɛ bɔkpɔ ku wǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ sekakedikɔ sia lema akpa akpaa , sekakedikɔ siamfó ebusǝnsǝ nya wǝ sekakedidi ebolo .
“ Iyifo etiki eto ɔnukualɛ bǝ utidi ǝmbofo botaka kesu ketu ǝsuǝaletidi lǝ wǝ diyo , ketsyi wǝ bikǝ . Fɛ woofo budufǝ lǝ wǝ diyo nǝmǝǝ , tsyisɛ umuǝ ǝsuǝaletidi ǝmǝ okle .
“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Onanto ebufi lebua saa nǝ betidi díyifo ku diye bua saa nǝ baakpadi Onanto ɔtsyɛ .
Fɛɛ diye bua saa nǝ utidi lookpadi Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛɛ , Onanto ǝmbufi ni ɔtsyɛ wǝ kulefe . Itsyise wuufi lebua nǝmfo fenkǝ lebua nǝ wembotasuǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi nyamfo nko itsyise betidi bǝnkǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua kpe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto bayimisani ku wǝ ambe ǝbǝ mfó . Bǝńyǝ lǝ lekple nya bákpe wǝ utidi bǝ bahiã wǝ .
Nyaso betidi ba létsyilama wǝ átɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Be , fǝ ambe ku fǝ bayimisani ńyǝ lǝ lekple bǝ bǝ . ”
Nyaso Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni mɔ ambe ? Bawoe ni mɔ bayimisani ? ”
Nya ótsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi nya óbe betidi ba nsi letsyilama wǝ mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bee , nyǝ mbamfo ni mɔ ambe nye mɔ bayimisani .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo Onanto eto lelabii , wǝ ni mɔ ɔyimisani nye mɔ ɔyimisio , nye mɔ ambe nɛ . ”
Yesu esi ésu Galilea eto ditumbukplɛ flɔ nya ɔnlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ bote . Nya lǝ kase betidi ba létsyilama wǝ mfui esoo , údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ kafo lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ , nya úsiǝ kasɔ . Nya betidi bamǝ díńyǝ lǝ ntu kɛnyɛ fɛ Yesu dídi ko mǝ etiki .
Lefe kpǝ lǝ wǝ asatete ǝsuǝǝ , údi etiki ɔ́yɛnko lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ lǝ ufi ulǝkǝ asa nnya óla nkǝ loote mǝ kasɔ . Asa nnya óte mǝ ni nkǝ .
“ Bɛnɔ ! Lefe lɔnii , ɔkuɛmfo ɔni ésu ɔkuɛ nkǝ lǝ usu usiǝ eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ eyibibi nyamǝ busǝǝ , íbǝ bǝ ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ usunte ɔflɔ , nya baklɔbɛ díbǝ básɛ nnya bámini .
Ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ aba ǝsuǝ , kaka sitǝ lemfui . Nyaso eyibibi nyamfo ǝkǝ mlǝ .
Fɛɛ se kofe lébe kɛnyɛɛ , éblobe nya íkpǝ . Nnya ni bǝ , nnya keyudu mǝnnyǝ didisa itsyi lǝ aba nyamǝ eso .
Eyibibi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ ésu ékpo lǝ biyu nti . Nya kanyi kamǝ léto kéti nnya . Nyaso yámfo bɔnwɔ .
Nya íbǝ bǝ ǝtsyuǝ álo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya íkǝ , nya yébe kukɔnɔ nya yɛnwɔ ebibi . Nya ǝtsyuǝ lɛnwɔ ebibi fosi ǝtsyǝ , ebibi fosi akua , ǝtsyuǝ lɛnwɔ kolofa . ”
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso fǝ ke nkpe atoo , tsyuǝ ato kukunɔ lǝ anɔ . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu mate insii , wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ku mba lǝǝtǝkǝko wǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝ ulǝkǝ lekpa nǝmǝ kasɔ ote mǝ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimii , béfi Onanto sekakedikɔ eto akulasa bǝtǝ mi . Fɛɛ mba díbuu , nye bafɛfɛ ba lentǝkǝko mɛ , ǝbɔnɔ mɔ asatete nyamǝ ɛyɛ lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ hã .
Nyaso íbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni útsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Buukabe tsyaa , bǝǝmbunyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Buukǝtsyue ato tsyaa , bǝǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ . Nnya ni bǝ lǝ banɔ nye bǝnyǝ tsyaa , bǝǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ . lǝ betsyi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝ Onanto , bǝ lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ . ’ ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Biannɔ lekpa nǝmfo eto kasɔ ? Ntsyǝ fɛ biofo lekpa bamba saa kasɔ bɔnɔ ?
Ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ lɛ Onanto eto etiki busǝnsǝ .
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ale kase eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ luubǝ ekpo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ . Lǝ kase banlɛ bɔnɔɔ , ete Obonsam ǝǝbǝ nya wǝǝnwǝ nnya kǝlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ .
Betidi bamba tsya ale eyibibi nnya lǝǝbǝ kakpo lǝ aba ǝsuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ banlɛ nnya bɔnɔɔ , yeakpe mǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Tsya ditiki nǝmǝ eto keyudu ǝnńyǝ kasɔ kukɔnɔ . Baafo kanɔ itǝ lefe kliminti ete . Nya lefe nǝ ke kǝnǝ nye bulǝ sɛkɛ díbǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ esoo , beesinkli kama .
“ Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ tsya te fe eyibibi nnya díbǝ íkǝ lǝ kanyi nti . Nya mbamfó ni betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ .
Fɛɛ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bulǝ ku atabi bɔbɛbɛ kekleke ku ǝsuǝ eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ ku kawunsiǝ eto kamini bɔbɛbɛ aafo mǝ ketu . Nyamfo laakle kemli ditiki nǝmǝ itǝ bǝ diamfo ebibi bɔnwɔ .
“ Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ te fe eyibibi nnya lélo ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Baafo etiki nyamǝ ku utu faa , nya baanwɔ ebibi kpǝ . Ǝtsyuǝ aanwɔ ebibi fosi ǝtsyǝ , nye awosi akua nye kolofa . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi aato okandiɛ kefi kakpe lǝ ditsyitsya kalɔ nye lǝ mpa kalɔ ? Inni okandiɛ eto kǝtǝkǝkɔ baato okandiɛ kǝtǝkǝ ?
Lesa nǝ ke nkpe lǝ kakula ǝsuǝǝ , ǝbɔbɔ lǝ lekple utidi saa nyǝ . Lesa nǝ ke nkpe lǝ kakula ǝsuǝ ǝbɔbɔ tɛnklɛ utsyuǝ saa nyǝ .
Nyaso lǝ bekpe atoo , bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ ! ”
