Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bifi mi ato bekpe kukɔnɔ lǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Kase faakla asa yeeyi kaba kakpo kǝtǝ utidii , nko ke eto okle Onanto lookla utǝ fintsya nɛ !
Utidi wǝ ke asa ntee , buusi bǝtǝ wǝ bawunsǝ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , nnya nte wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ nnya bafo wǝ lǝ ani . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ale osani wǝ laato eyibibi .
Diyi saa woalabe kataka , nya nkomǝ eto eyibibi nyamǝ nlɛ bukǝ kabe . Fɛɛ unnyi kase asa nlɛ butsyǝ nkomǝ .
Nnya ni bǝnkǝ kasɔ ka báto diyibibi nǝmǝǝ , ke laalɛ ni ola nko . Tutɛ , lǝ díkǝǝ , díabɔ afanto , nya uyi laabɔ . Nya lǝ ébee , yeawɔ ebibi kpǝ .
Lǝ ebibi nyamǝ ábe ɛsɛɛ , ɔkuɛmfo ǝmǝ ǝbǝ kala nnya . Itsyise nnya lɛlɛfe eboyo . ”
Yesu átɔ nkǝ , “ Be muufi nkatesǝ ku Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Nte lekpa nǝ ele bǝ mfi nlǝkǝ nyamfo eto kasɔ ?
Ite fenkǝ utidi éfi diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ úsu óto .
Lefe ditsyuǝ eto kamaa , diǝkǝ kafiani kuyi . Nya nkomǝ eto kuyi komfo laamɔ kaso ɔkuɛ eto ediyi fɛfɛ kenke . Koata kalɛ kpǝ . Nya baklɔbɛ laato ayo lǝ kuyi komǝ eto kalɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu édi mǝ etiki nyamfo lǝ kase utsyuǝ sa loofo kasɔ bɔnɔ .
Etiki saa wuudi mǝǝ , woatɛyi nnya kayɛ lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ itǝ kusu bǝ wonko wǝ bakasebi bamǝ hã sii , nya fɛ wǝǝlǝkǝ nnya kasɔ kate mǝ nɛ .
Diyi nǝmfó eto ditsyitsyo lefee , Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bɔyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmfo busu ni lekpake nǝ nse . ”
Nyaso bédu lǝ betidi ǝto ditsyukpa nǝmfo ɔflɔ bésu bedufǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ wǝ Yesu dísiǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bétsyiko ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyila . Kaklɔ bamba tsya ǝńyǝ mfó .
Yanklɛ fɛ ufiebi ko dítsyiko bɔsɔ bembembe nya ɔ́sɔ ntu ókpo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya ibu sɛkɛ lǝ ntu lǝ buyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ lǝ onya udu fǝ lǝ ntu kasɔ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Yesu ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto kama , úfi wǝ disi útǝkǝ lǝ esunde ǝsuǝ nya ɔnlɛ selabe . Nyaso básanklisǝ wǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , ɛnlɛ fǝ bulǝ bǝnkǝ boǝbǝ bukpǝ ? ”
Yesu átaka úńyǝ nya ófa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ufiebi , yɛ bɔsɔ ! ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi ntu bomǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Ntu yɛ bonwa ! ” Nya ufiebi ǝmǝ disinkli ɔ́yɛ bɔsɔ , nya ntu bomǝ eto ǝnǝmi disinkli búyuǝ buɛɛ kananaa .
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Beso biate sikpi mmǝ ? Bíamfo tɔ bɛnɔ ? ”
Sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ sefensǝ , nya bétsyiko mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ko ni utidi ǝmfo ? Bǝ ntu bomǝ ku ufiebi kenke etsyue wǝ etiki koto ! ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu bésu Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ eto situma sia nse lǝ Gerasefɔ eto kasɔ .
Le kase Yesu lɛbɔ le ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo koo , osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝbǝ ótsyako wǝ . Osani ǝmfo ábɔ lǝ edi nnya lɛfi mfó nti .
Itsyise mfó úkǝsiǝ nɛ . Lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mmǝǝ , betidi ba kenke mámfo wǝ bumuǝ kakpe lǝ amana .
Lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bákafo wǝ ani ku akpa bokle . Fɛɛ wókala nnya bufǝsǝ kabɔ . Utidi ǝmfo akɛ ǝsuǝale tinti , itǝ bǝ kutsyuǝ saa mánkamfo wǝ bumuǝ kǝtsyǝ .
Kǝtsyǝ ku kakɔmi kenke úkatsyilama lǝ betidi eto edi ku atini nyamǝ nti , nya úkakpo kudu , ékefi abambi katsya wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Utidi ǝmfo ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ fɛ únyǝ Yesu . Nyaso útsyetsyi úsu óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi .
Nya ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto Fanlonlo eto Ubi ! Be nkpe lǝ mɔ ku fǝ lenti mfo ? Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , se mɛ uyi lǝ Onanto eto diye ǝsuǝ fǝnkǝ embunǝ mɛ koto ! ”
Ɔ́tɛyi nkomǝ , itsyise ɔ́nɔ bǝ Yesu Yesu áto ɔkuɛ nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua bɔ lǝ osani ǝmfo ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ baakpo fǝ ? ” Nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ baakpo omantsya itsyise bomba nkpe lǝ nwǝ mfo ǝsuǝǝ , bufui . ”
Nya ɔ́lɛ Yesu lekpakpa nkǝ woanla mǝ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , bakplako kpǝ ǝńyǝ lɛ kɔtini komǝ ɔflɔ balɛ budi .
Nya awɔnɔ nyamfo lɛlɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ , “ La bo akpe lǝ bakplako ba ńyǝ lǝ mmǝ , lǝ budu budufǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya ɔ́tɔnɔ útǝ mǝ , nya awɔnɔ nyamǝ lɛbɔ lǝ osani ǝmfo ǝsuǝ nya bédu bésu bédufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bakplako bamǝ kenke , ba eto utu luuyifo fe akpi ǝnuǝǝ , dítsyetsyi bésu báwunini lǝ kɔtini komǝ eto kotosi bésu bédufǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ nya bánya bátsylɔ kenke .
Nya mba nlɛ bakplako bamǝ bobee , dítsyetsyi bésu umǝ ǝmǝ ku mba lɛkɛ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó , nya bésu batɛyi betidi ba kenke lesa nǝ díbǝ . Mba bátɛyi ésu mfó , bésu bábe lesa nǝ díbǝ .
Nya lefe nǝ bǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ utidi wǝ awɔnɔ bua kpǝ dísiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mfó . Nya únsi lǝ kasɔ , ónkpe awu , íkakpa ko wǝ . Nya sikpi dímuǝ mǝmblɛ kenke .
Betidi ba leka wǝ búnyǝǝ , átɛyi lesa saa nǝ díbǝ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ku bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bálɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝ udu lǝ mǝ kasɔ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu nlɛ budufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ awɔnɔ bua dísiǝǝ , alɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Tɔnɔ lǝ ntǝkǝko fǝ lǝ bukayɛ katsyilama . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu mántɔnɔ . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sinkli esu fǝ betidi ɔflɔ lǝ atɛyi mǝ kase Onamute ǝmǝ lɛwunsǝ ko fǝ ku kase únyǝ fǝ kaminsǝ . ”
Nyaso osani ǝmfo édu úsu ótsyilama Kǝmǝ Lefosi kamǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamǝ lesa saa nǝ Yesu díyifo útǝ wǝ . Nya íyifo mba lɛnɔ nnya yanii .
Yesu ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ úsinkli úsu ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto Yudafɔ eto lekpake nǝ nse . Se úsu údufǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto kɛnyɛ mfóo , betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bátsyilama wǝ .
Nya Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ ɔni utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Yairo ǝbǝ mfó . Se únyǝ Yesuu , óse akonki lǝ wǝ akɔ .
Nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa kekleke nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi kɛkɛ lɛ bufi kekleke . Nyaso bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ efi fǝ kɔni ǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ bǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ imuǝ wǝ ale lǝ ɔkɛ nkpǝ . ”
Nyaso Yesu átaka útǝkǝko wǝ . Nya lǝ kase betidi ba díkǝko Yesu difui esoo , bátsyilama wǝ se bántɔ .
Nya usio utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ mǝ nti , wǝ kɔtɔ díkakpo lǝ lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ǝsuǝ .
Ɔkɛ lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe mba leeyifo afa díkǝtǝ wǝ afa kulaatsya . Wóbiasǝ wǝ atabi kenke ótsya bufi bomfo , tsya bufi bomǝ mányuǝ wǝ . Kato bomu bóbe .
Ɔ́nɔ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ , nyaso útǝkǝko betidi ba dítǝkǝko Yesu kama .
Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mfó wǝ awu butidi koo , eni bufi bomǝ ǝbɔyɛ mɛ . ”
Nyaso lefe nǝ útidi Yesu eto awuu , kɔtɔ komǝ díkakpo wǝǝ , ála kplo lamfolamfo ! Nya únyǝ utsyǝ lekpo lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ wǝ bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝ , nyaso kanyi ka ɔnlɛ bunyǝǝ , álo .
Lamfolamfo Yesu áte nkǝ ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ ábɔ wǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso úkǝnǝ úńyǝ , nya ɔ́tsyi ɔwuninsǝ , nya ɔ́tɔ betidi bamǝ ntǝkǝko wǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe ni futsyǝ dítidi mɛ awu ? ”
Wǝ bakasebi bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be kase betidi bamfo letsyilama fǝ . Beso faatɔ fǝ , owoe ni futsyǝ dítidi fǝ ? ”
Tsyaa , Yesu esi úkǝnǝ úńyǝ ɔlɛ ǝnǝmi botsyilamasǝ kabe lǝ woofo futsyǝ dítidi wǝ bunyǝ .
Usio ǝmǝ mfó ǝnyǝ utsyǝ lekpo nkǝ lesatsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso lǝ sikpitete ku ketinkǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́bɔ úbǝ óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto akɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , lesa nǝ díbǝ .
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi , fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . Su lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fǝ kanyi ensiǝmbu sinkli kǝbǝ bio . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu nlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyii , batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ étsyi Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kamǝ eto uninǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo bǝbǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ébukpǝ koko . Beso fensi fanlɛ Oteasa ǝmfo bulǝ ? ”
Yesu méntsyue ditiki nǝ mba nlɛ bɔtɛyi mfó ato . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi Yairo nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi , fo anɔ ete . ”
Nya Yesu lékpa Petro ku Yakobo ku wǝ ɔyimisani Yohanes mate hã , nya bésu Yairo eto diyo .
Nya lefe nǝ bédufǝ diyo nǝmǝ , nya Yesu dínyǝ kase banlɛ kanyi bunyǝ kakpo edu kewi nkuu ,
údufǝ lǝ mǝnti nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be léboko kudu komfo bokpo ? Beso bɛnlɛ nku ? Dikpefi nǝmfó ménkpǝ . Selabe ete onlabe . ”
Se ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , betidi ba ńyǝ mfó étsyiko wǝ bumǝ . Nyaso Yesu ǝtǝ nkǝ mǝmblɛ bɔ besu lekple , nya útǝ ubi ǝmǝ eto anto ku ambe ku wǝ bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ nkǝ bedufǝ kaka ubi ǝmǝ díkpe ónlabe lǝ kasɔ .
Yesu ákɔbe usiobi kɛkɛ ǝmǝ lǝ kɔni nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Talita Koumu . ” Nya kasɔ lǝ sele siamǝ ni nkǝ , “ Disiobi , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , taka ǝńyǝ ! ”
Lamfolamfo , disiobi nǝmǝ nǝ dikafo lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝǝ , átaka úńyǝ nya útsyiko bɔyɛ katsyilama . Se íbǝ nkoo , íyifo mǝmblɛ yanii .
Nyaso Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato kekleke nkǝ bantɛyi kuutsyuǝ saa . Nya kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ wǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ udi . ”
Yesu édu mfó úsu wǝ umǝ kaka úsiǝ óbe , ku wǝ bakasebi .
Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝǝ , úsu ɔlɛ Anantotiki búdi lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó . Nyaso íyifo betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ wǝ asatetee yanii . Bátɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti ókase etiki nyamfo eto okle utsyiko ? Nte kobe ko eto okle nkpe wǝ bǝ woafo ayanisa nyamfo eto okle buyifo ?
Inni wǝ ni Maria eto ubi wǝ ni nwǝ laawe keyi ? Lee inni wǝ ni Yakobo ku Yose ku Yuda ku Simon eto ɔyimisani ? Nya wǝ bayimisio tsya nkpe mfo ! ” Nyaso betidi bamfo mámfo wǝ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto unyǝlǝkǝtidi kpe dibu lǝ nlebe kpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto umǝǝ , lǝ wǝ betidi ntii , ku lǝ wǝ kosate eto diyo eto betidi eto ǝnǝmii , umbǝ dibu saa . ”
Nnya ni bǝnkǝ wǝ kosate eto umǝ eto betidi mámfo wǝ banɔ , etiki nyamfo éyifo Yesu yanii tinti . Lǝ nyamfo eso wóamfo ayanisa kpǝ buyifo mfó enso nnya úfi wǝ ani útǝkǝ befimfi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya mǝ bufi díyuǝ mǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu átsyilama mbuto bo letsyilama mfó , kate Anantotiki nyamǝ .

Nya ókpadi wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ utsyǝ , nya óla mǝ ótsyese inuǝ inuǝ . Útǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ baso awɔnɔ bua ani .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi kuutsyuǝ saa manlɛ kulesa usuko kusu komǝ , enso uyi wǝ baalɛɛ kɔni hã . Bientsyi didisa nye otobe fenkǝ mba laatɔ asa kafe . Bientsyi atabi lǝ mi katobe .
Bekpe mi afɔkpa , tsya bientsyi akpesa bamba saa enso nnya benkpe . ”
Usi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kaka kee bafo mii , bɛkɛ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ biuudu .
Lǝ bídufǝ umǝ utsyuǝ nya betidi bamfó dímamfo mi nye báni bǝ beembutsyue mi ditiki kotoo , bidu lǝ bɛflɛ mi nkpafo eto sitǝ bekpo mfó . Nyamfo loote Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ eto ditsyǝbi nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ itǝ mǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . ”
Nyaso bakasebi bamǝ édu bésu bátsyilama bédi Anantotiki nyamǝ budi kafe bǝ utsyuǝ saa sinkli lǝ abuayifoyifo kama .
Bála awɔnɔ bua kpǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . Nya bédiki befimfi kpǝ nnuǝbi itǝ bǝmuǝ ale .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Oka Herodes ákanɔ asa nnya kenke nlɛ búbǝ bɔ́nɔ , itsyise Yesu eto diye áyɛ letsyo ésu kalebe saa . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yohanes wǝ ni ntuflǝsǝtidi ésinkli úbǝ nkpǝ ! Nyaso onkpe ǝsuǝale ɔnlɛ ayanisa buyifo nɛ ! ”
Bǝtsyuǝ tsya ákatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia . ” Betsyuǝ tsya bǝ , “ Wǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi , itsyise útǝ fe Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ɔni . ”
Lefe nǝ Herodes lɛnɔ nyamfóo , wuntsya átɛyi nkǝ , “ Yohanes wǝ útǝ bála disi uni disi ósankli utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ ! ”
Ɛtɔnsǝǝ , Herodes kosate dítǝ kusu nkǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes , nya útǝ kusu nkǝ bakle wǝ , befi wǝ bakpe lǝ diyo . Herodes éyifo nyamfo itsyi lǝ Herodia wǝ úsu úfi , wǝ dídi wǝ ɔyimi Filipo eto usiǝ eso .
Yohanes ákatɛyi Herodes nkǝ , “ Yanlɛkɛ bǝ fo fǝ ɔyimisani eto usiǝ efi . ”
Nyaso Yohanes eto etiki ǝkǝlǝ Herodia , nyaso úkǝkisi wǝ . Nya ɔ́bɛbɛ kusu nkǝ lǝ olo wǝ .
Tsyaa , wámfo kusu bunyǝ lǝ Herodes eso . Itsyise Herodes áte Yohanes sikpi se unyi nkǝ Yohanes éyifo ɔnukualɛtidi ku utidi wǝ díyifo kɛnkɛ eso . Nyaso úkase wǝ . Lefe kpǝ , óla nkǝ lǝ úkanɔ wǝ asatete , ite bǝ wǝ etiki nyamǝ káto wǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi lɛ ɔ́nɔ nnya tsya fɛ .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , íbǝ bǝ Herodia ǝnyǝ kusu ko ɔnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ . Diyi nǝmfó didi Herodes eto leleyi . Herodes ákpadi wǝ beninǝtidi lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ ku wǝ bamamanyǝ eto beninǝ ku Galilea eto kasɔ eto beninǝ kplɛkplɛ lǝ wǝ lesakedikɔ .
Herodia eto kebitɛ ǝbǝ mfó úwi kewi ókpe disuǝyuǝ nya Oka Herodes ku wǝ bahɔ lǝ lesakedikɔ mfó tinti . Nyaso Oka Herodes átɔ kebitɛ kamǝ nkǝ , “ Be faala fǝ lǝ ntǝ fǝ ? ”
Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ mɔ lekankpomɛ , minkǝ muutǝ fǝ lesa nǝ ke fɔɔtɔ mɛ , lǝ mɔ sekakedikɔ eto kutsyǝ kulaa tsya ! ”
Nyaso usiobi ǝmfo átaka úsu ɔ́tɔ wǝ ambe nkǝ , “ Be ele bǝ ntɔ ? ” Nya wǝ ambe lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tɔ wǝ Yohanes Ntuflǝsǝtidi eto disi . ”
Disiobi nǝmfo ésinkli kpla dísu diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya ɔ́tɛyi Herodes nkǝ , “ Nla minkǝ la Yohanes Ntuflǝsǝtidi eto disi ǝtǝkǝ lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ mɔmɔmɔmɔ ! ”
Nyamfo ába oka Herodes lɛkɔɛsi , fɛɛ wǝnsiǝmbofo ntamu bo óka utsyǝ lǝ beninǝtidi bamfó eto ǝnǝmi butu .
Lǝ nyaso ókpe wǝ oblafɔ lamfolamfo nkǝ usu ola Yohanes eto disi lǝ ufi oboko . Nya oblafɔ ǝmfó dídu úsu Aba eto diyo nǝ baakpe betidi , mfó úsu óla Yohanes eto disi .
Kamaa , úfi disi nǝmǝ útǝkǝ lǝ ɔkpɛ tɛnklɛ ǝsuǝ nya úfi ni oboko disiobi nǝmǝ . Nya wuntsya dífi ni úsu útǝ wǝ ambe .
Lefe nǝ Yohanes eto bakasebi lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , bésu báfo wǝ ɔkɔ bésu bébikǝ .
Batɔnkpe ba Yesu lékpe nkǝ besu batsyilama lekpake mfóo , ésinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ nnya kenke bésu beyifo ku asa nnya báte .
Nya kaka mǝ ku Yesu lɛsɔnɔ eto betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ búbǝ kédu étsyiko bufui . Nyaso Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi mánkɛ lefe lǝ bedi lesa kula tsya . Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bo hã lǝ busu kaka lɛbiɔ lǝ busiǝ mfó butsyǝ ɔnwɛ sɛkɛ . ”
Nyaso bésu bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ lǝ besu kaka betidi lǝmbǝ .
Fɛɛ lefe nǝ bántɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya bétsyetsyi bátɔ sɛtɔ bésu baka mfó budufǝ fɛ Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dísu bédufǝ mfó .
Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ únyǝ sitiditu siamǝǝ , mǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo itsyise bǝtsyǝ fe basamu ba lǝmbǝ obebe . Nyaso útsyiko mǝ asa kpǝ bote itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝ ditsyitsyo léyoo , wǝ bakasebi ányi bésu wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Kale bolo . Nya kase mfo diyifo ntɛntii , bǝǝmbunyǝ kulesa bedi .
Nyaso lǝkǝ mǝmblɛ kusu lǝ bedu . Lǝ bedufǝ kǝmǝ ku mbuto bo lɛfi mfoo , boofó lesatsyuǝ bunyǝ kaya kedi . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi kosatee , bitǝ mǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ bedi . ” Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyamfó ebofo fe utsyuǝ eto afa mflamfla eto kayofofo ! Ala fǝ bobiasǝ nyamfo lǝ mǝ budi ǝsuǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Abolo asia bɛnlɛ ? Bisu bebe ! ” Nya se bésu bábee , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ ete ntǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ bǝtǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ kenke lǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ sefa siamǝ ǝsuǝ mfó lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso betidi bamfo kenke ǝsiǝ kasɔ lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa ǝsuǝ ǝtsyuǝ fe betidi kolofa nya ǝtsyuǝ fe betidi awosi anɔ .
Nya Yesu dífi abolo ku akpɛ nyamǝ , nya se óbe kato , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani . Nya úbudi abolo nyamǝ nya úfi nnya útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ bǝsiǝ bǝtǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa nyamǝ . Nya úsiǝ akpɛ nyamɛ tsya nko útǝ mǝ .
Mba kenke lɛkɛ mfó édi bémi .
Nya se wǝ bakasebi lɛsɛ didisa nǝ díbu bakɔɔ , díyi lefosi etsyitsya kplɛ ǝnuǝ .
Nya mba dídi lesa nǝmfo eto basani mate éyifo betidi akpi anɔ .
Lamfolamfo Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ bedufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ lǝ besu umǝ wǝ baakpo Betsaida , lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto lekpake nǝ nse . Nya útǝ nkǝ sitiditu siamǝ sǝnsǝ sidu .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , wuntsya édu óbe kɔtini komǝ nkǝ lǝ usu oto ola .
Se éyo ketsyee , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ áyo ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto ntinti , Yesu mate hã díbu uńyǝ mfó .
Únyǝ nkǝ wǝ betidi édufǝ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ ku kase bánlɛ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ bofo bonwa itsyise ufiebi lɛ bɔsɔ kǝlǝ mǝ . Nyaso lǝ kolensiǝnto kplɛɛ , Yesu áyɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ úsu mǝ ɔflɔ eti nkǝ lǝ ɔyɛ ofe .
Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔkɔ ni . ”
Mǝmblɛ áte sikpi se bǝnyǝ wǝ . Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ lamfolamfo nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Mɔ uni ! Bimuǝ utu bɛlɛ ! ”
Nya óbe údufǝ lǝ mǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo , nya ete ufiebi ǝmǝ lɛyɛ bɔsɔ . Nyamfo éyifo wǝ bakasebi yanii ku kafɔsu .
Itsyise bánte kase ko íbǝ fɛ útǝ betidi akpi anɔ bamfo lesa bédi banɔ . Mǝ nsusu mánkpa ko mǝ lǝ nyamfó ǝsuǝ , itsyise bámfo wǝ bánɔ .
Se bédufǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto lekpake nǝ nsee , báyifǝ lǝ Genesaret eto kasɔ . Nya bátsyasǝ mǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ mfó .
Kase báyifǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ koo , betidi ǝtsyǝ Yesu lekpo .
Nyaso betidi bamǝ étsyetsyi bésu bátɛyi mǝ betidi kenke lǝ kasɔ kamǝ . Nya kaka ke bánɔ bǝ Yesu kpee , bétsyi befimfi lǝ mǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya kaka ke Yesu dísu koo , umǝ ni o-o , kebuto keni o-o , betidi ko díketsyi mǝ befimfi kaboko obia nya bánlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ utǝ lǝ betidi wǝ awu eto atosi ete . Nya mba dítidi nnyaa , ǝmuǝ ale .
Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa ba dítsyi Yerusalem ǝbǝ bátsyilama Yesu .
Bǝnyǝ bǝ wǝ bakasebi si balɛ lesa budi nya bǝtsyuǝ mǝmflǝ mǝ ani fe kase Farisifɔ laate betidi bǝ ele bǝ bǝflǝ .
Bǝnyǝ nyamfo bǝtsyǝ lekpo itsyise Farisifɔ ku Yudafɔ fɛfɛ kenke eeyifo lǝ mǝ batekoko , banakoko eto akpa nnya báyani bǝtsyǝ nya báte mǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ báya lesa saa betsyiko bikǝkatekɔ tsyaa , ele bǝ bǝflǝ mǝ ani fɛ lǝ bedi . Nya ele bǝ beyifo lǝ afi kpǝ nnya bǝbǝ bétu , fe kase bǝǝflǝ akɔbe ku ekplibi ku kalɔtsyi .
Lǝ nyaso Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso fǝ mba ntǝkǝko fǝ lǝǝnyifo lǝ bo batekoko ku banakoko eto akpa ǝsuǝ ? Nya banlɛ asa budi lǝ mǝ ani mǝflǝmflǝmflǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi bini ! Lesa nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛwɔni ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , íbǝ ítǝ sitinti ! Ɔ́tɛyi bo nkǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Betidi bamfoo , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto dibu ete bǝǝtǝ mɛ , banla mɛ itsyi lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi .
Bimba ete ini bǝ bálɛ mɔ lelabi buyifo . Baate kawunsiǝ eto afi nnya betidi dítsyǝ fenkǝ mɔ afi ini . ’
Nnya lete bǝ bifi mɔ kɔfi bɛkula nya bɛnlɛ mi kawunsiǝ mfo eto akpa boté . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bekpe awɛsu ǝtsyuǝ nnya biefi akayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kani Onanto eto kɔfi budi , keyifo batekoko ku banakoko eto akpa .
Onanato eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Moses áwɔni útsyǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . Ɔ́tɛyi tsya nkǝ fǝǝ ke léka fǝ anto ku fǝ ambee , ele bǝ balo fǝ . ’
Fɛɛ biatɛyi biǝnkǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ utidi ebofo lesa bɔni butǝ wǝ anto ku ambe ba lesa lehiã , ku nsusu bǝ lesa nǝmǝ eyifo kɛnkɛ , kato taflatsyǝ ku nsusu bǝ wuufi lesa nǝmǝ utǝ Onanto bomu eso .
Nya ɛyɛ le bo akpa ǝsuǝǝ , boata Onanto eto kɔfi kebu .
Nko ini bǝ biefi mi bana eto akpa kaninsǝ Onanto eto afi . Nya bieyifo asa bamba kpǝ tsya fe nyamfo eto okle . ”
Lǝ nnya kamaa , Yesu esi ókpadi sitiditu siamǝ nkǝ bányi bafi wǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimblɛ kenke bitsyue mɛ ato lǝ bɛnɔ kasɔ .
Lesa nǝ ke utsyuǝ dídi ókpe lǝ kafo ǝmbutǝ obiasǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ ke ditsyi lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi ɔtɛyii , nnya ni lesa nǝ lǝǝtǝ weeyifo lebua nɛ .
Mimblɛ kenke bitsyuǝ ato lǝ bɛnɔ mɛ kasɔ . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , se údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ úsu diyoo , wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ulǝkǝ lekpa nǝmǝ eto kasɔ ote mǝ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ biannɔ lekpa nǝmfo kasɔɔ , nyalɛ mi nsusu ǝmbǝ kulesa kasɔ bofo bɔnɔ ! Ekpa bǝnkǝ lesa nǝ didufǝ lǝ utidi kafoo , ǝmbutǝ utidi ǝmǝ yifo lebua ,
itsyise yeendufǝ lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Wǝ kafo bomu yuudufǝ nya yɔɔyɛ ɛbɔ lǝ wǝ kafo fe lesa biabia . ” Nyaso nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi mfoo , ate bǝnkǝ didisa saa alɛkɛ itǝ budi .
Nya úsukosǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ utsyuǝ eto lɛkɔɛsii , ni laabiasǝ utidi nɛ .
Itsyise nsusu bua saa aabɔ ketsyi lǝ utidi eto lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ nya mu lǝǝtǝ wǝǝyifo asa bua nɛ . Asa nyamfó ni fenkǝ , lɛsɔnɔdi ku kuyu ku ditilo ku disǝnkpo , kusiǝ kamafefe ku sidikpuu ,
ku nsusu bua fifi ku kawɛ ku disiale , sidia tɛyitɛyi kabiasǝ utidi eto diye ku nsusu bua kekleke fifi lǝ sisǝ ku sisiǝ ǝsuǝ , nya lǝǝnǝ utidi kakpe lǝ kofani ǝsuǝ , ǝnǝmi sɛsǝsɛsǝ lǝ utidi bamba eto bikǝ ǝsuǝ , diye biasǝbiasǝ , ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ , ebukisa yifoyifo , koto mentsyue mentsyue .
Asa bua nyamfo kenke aabɔ ketsyi lǝ utidi eto lɛkɔɛsi , nya laabiasǝ utidi nɛ . ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édu úsu umǝ utsyuǝ lǝ Tiro eto kasɔ . Úsu diyo ditsyuǝ kaka wóanla nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa te nkǝ okpe mfó , tsyafɛ wóamfo bɔbiɔ .
Mfóo , se usio utsyuǝ wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nlɛ wǝ ubi bulǝ lɛnɔ nkǝ Yesu kpe lǝ mfóo , úbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ akpa akpa nya óse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
Usio ǝmfo enni Yudanyǝ . Bále wǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Foinike lǝ Siria eto kasɔ . Nya ɔ́lɛ Yesu lekpakpa nkǝ ola lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ɔbɔnko lǝ wǝ ubi ǝsuǝ .
Nya Yesu lékpasǝ wǝ nkǝ , “ Tutɛɛ , tǝ bekpefi lesa etɔ . Yanlɛkɛ bǝ befi bekpefi eto lesa bǝtǝ bakpa . ”
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ usio ǝmfo ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ao , mɔ Onamute , bakpa bamǝ lǝ ɔpunu kalɔ lǝ lesakedikɔ mfóo , ebunyǝ lesa nǝ bekpefi bamǝ nlǝ budi eto nǝ lookpoo kasɔ bedi . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ kase fǝtǝ mbuayɛ mfo esoo , du esu diyo . Ebunyǝ se lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ díkayani fǝ ubi ǝmǝ . ”
Nyaso usio ǝmfo édu úsu diyo . Lǝ mfóo , únyǝ nkǝ wǝ ubi labe lǝ wǝ kalabekɔ , nya lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ lénsisi wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Se Yesu lídu lǝ Tiro eto lekpake mfóo , ɔ́yɛ lǝ Sidon úsu Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ kama kaka Kǝmǝ Lefosi kamǝ nkpe eti .
Nya mfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa utidi utsyuǝ wǝ ni ototi ku ɔmumu báboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ utǝkǝ ani lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso Yesu ákpa wǝ usuko lɛkpɔ kaka betidi ku kudu lǝmbǝ , nya úfi wǝ animi ókpe wǝ lǝ ato . Útufǝ ntufǝ ókpo lǝ wǝ animi nya ɔ́kɔbe utidi ǝmǝ eto odiakami .
Nya Yesu lébesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi óbe kato nya ɔ́wɔnɔ fũũ , nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Hefata , ” eto kasɔ ni bǝǝ , “ Sini ! ”
Lamfolamfo , osani ǝmǝ eto ato ásini nya wǝ odiakami tsya lényankli nya ófo etiki budi .
Yesu ákpe betidi ba dinyǝ mfó kɔfi nkǝ bántɛyi utidi saa kulesa , itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ bǝnyǝ mfó . Fɛɛ bimbaa ete ɔ́ninko mǝ , itsyise kase ókpe mǝ kɔfii , nko kǝ banlɛ nnya bokpantsyasǝ nɛ .
Nya betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ asa nyamfóo , iyifo mǝ naa efensǝ ! Nya bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Wǝǝyifo lesa saa kukɔnɔ . Wǝǝtǝ bamumu leedi etiki , nya batoti tsya laanɔ asa ! ”
Lǝ eyi nyamfó ǝsuǝǝ , betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bátsya mfó . Nya se kulesa dímǝntsyǝ boodi esoo , Yesu ákpadi wǝ bakasebi óboko wǝ akɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Betidi bamfo eto asa lɛ mɛ kaminsǝ , itsyise eyi ǝtsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ni nyamfo se bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ nɛ . Nya mɔmɔɔ , kulesa ente boodi .
Lǝ nyani mǝ beluu , kukpɛnsɛ ebɔlɛ mǝ kola disi lǝ kusu itsyise mǝ bǝtsyuǝ etsyi katsyontsyokɔ . ”
Nya wǝ bakasebi lɛtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se utidi luunyǝ lesa utǝ betidi bamfo lǝ mfiminti mfo bǝ bedi bemi ? ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Abolo asia nte mi ? ” Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abolo akuanse . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝmblɛ nkǝ bǝsiǝ kasɔ . Nya úfi abolo akuanse nyamǝ , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úbudi nnya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ befi bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ kenke . Nya mǝ tsya dífi nnya bésiǝ bǝtǝ mǝ .
Akpɛ asiani tsya ǝtsyǝ . Yesu éfi nnya tsya nya ɔ́sɔ ani . Nya úfi nnya útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ besiǝ nnya tsya bǝtǝ mǝ .
Betidi bamfó kenke édi bémi . Betidi bamǝ eto utu ebuyifo akpi ana . Se bédi bálosǝǝ , bakasebi bamǝ ásɛ abolo wɛlɛwɛlɛ nnya díbu nya íyi etsyitsya kplɛkplɛ akuanse . Nnya kamaa , Yesu ǝlǝkǝ betidi bamfo kenke kusu nya bédu .

Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ báyila ditumbukplɛ bésu Dalmanuta eto lekpake .
Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bétsyiko wǝ etiki bunǝnko lǝ befi bato wǝ babe . Nyaso bátɛyi wǝ bǝ uyifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ ote mǝ lǝ bate bǝ Onanto ɔflɔ útsyi úbǝ .
Nyamfo ǝlǝ Yesu tinti nya óla ɔwɔnɔ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso kon mmi eto betidi laabɛbɛ bǝ bǝǝnyǝ ayanisa fɛ lǝ bafo banɔ ? Kulefe , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , membuyifo ayanisa nnya eto okle bela biǝ biǝnyǝ mfo ! ”
Nya údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ , nya úsinkli údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ nya ɔ́yila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ úsu ni lekpake nǝ nse .
Kase banlɛ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyilaa , wǝ bakasebi bamǝ áta ǝsuǝ béntsyi abolo kpǝ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bekpe kobe lǝ bitsyue ato lǝ bɛnɔ etiki itsyi lǝ oka Herodes ku Farisifɔ eto ǝyǝnkisǝsa ǝsuǝ . ”
Lefe nǝmfóo , mǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ dínyǝ mfó bánlɛ etiki búdi katɛyi bǝ , “ Lee nnya buuntsyi abolo kpǝ eso ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkoo ? ”
Fɛɛ se Yesu nyi etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi esoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ etiki lǝ abolo butsyi ǝsuǝ ? Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , biǝnyǝtɔ nye bɛnɔ kasɔ ? Bitidi ato ko !
Bekpe ǝnǝmi , tsya fɛ biǝnnyǝ ! Bekpe ato , tsya fɛ biannɔ !
Bíankloma lefe nǝ ménsie abolo anɔ míntǝ betidi akpi anɔ dídi ? Etsyitsya kplɛ asia nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ díbu díyi ? ” Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lefosi etsyitsya ǝnuǝ . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya lǝ lefe nǝ mínsiǝ abolo akuanse míntǝ betidi akpi anaa , nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ díbuu , etsyitsya asia íyi ? ” Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Akuanse . ”
Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , biante tɔ futsyǝ mini ? ”
Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi dídufǝ Betsaida , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa unǝmba utsyuǝ báboko Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ɔflɔ nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ufi wǝ kɔni utǝkǝ lǝ wǝ .
Yesu ákɔbe nwǝ ǝmǝ lǝ kɔni nya ókpa wǝ ɔ́bɔnko lǝ umǝ nti . Se útufǝ ntufǝ ókpo lǝ unǝmba ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmii , úfi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Alɛ lesatsyuǝ bunyǝǝ ? ”
Nya utidi ǝmǝ létakasǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi óbe kato nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ee , nlɛ betidi bunyǝ , tsya beyifo fe eyi . Fɛɛ balɛ bɔyɛ katsyilama . ”
Nya Yesu disi útidi wǝ ǝnǝmi . Lǝ lefe nuǝfǝ nǝmfoo , utidi ǝmǝ ásini wǝ ǝnǝmi kukɔnɔ , nya wǝ ǝnǝmi lékpa , nya únyǝ lesa saa kukɔnɔ .
Nya Yesu dílǝkǝ wǝ kusu nkǝ udu usu wǝ diyo , wensisinkli usu umǝ ǝmǝ nti .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu mfó bésu kebuto kǝtsyuǝ ka lɛfi Kaisarea Filipi eto kasɔ eti . Nya lefe nǝ bányɛ lǝ kusu bantɔɔ , Yesu édi mǝ etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bɛtɛyi mɛ , futsyǝ betidi laatɛyi bǝ wǝ mini ? ”
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ fǝ ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto mba lǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto mba kɔ eto okle ɔni . ”
Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Mimi nkpǝ , owoe biebu biǝ wǝ mini ? ” Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni nwǝ Onanto lékpo ɔhile útsyǝ . ”
Nya Yesu díkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ bántɛyi ku utsyuǝ saa , lesa nǝ benyi itsyi lǝ wǝ mfo .
Nya Yesu dítsyiko wǝ bakasebi asa ǝtsyuǝ bóte , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ bǝ Utidi Eto Ubi nyǝ kanyi lǝ Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani , bani wǝ . Boolo wǝ , tsya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝǝ wootaka . ”
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nyamfo ókpasǝ , bǝ lǝ banɔ kasɔ . Nya Petro lékpa wǝ usuko ɔflɔ wonko wǝ inuǝ , nya ɔ́ninko wǝ .
Tsyaa , se Yesu díkǝnsǝ óbe wǝ bakasebii , údi etiki ku lɛblɔfi ókpe Petro nkǝ , “ Obansam , du mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ ! ” Nya ɔlɔ bɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Anla asa nnya Onanto lala , bomu nnya betidinini lala ! ”
Nyaso Yesu ákpadi betidi eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ ku wǝ bakasebi óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ utsyuǝ ala nkǝ wǝǝtǝkǝko mɛɛ , ele bǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ato ku wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ alasa ǝsuǝ nya lǝ utsyi wǝ uyikabie utǝkǝko mɛ .
Itsyise nwǝ ke lela nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ nkpǝǝ , woo nyansǝ mu . Nya utidi wǝ ke loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ lǝ mɔ disi ku lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo esoo , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Nte kutǝkǝ ko utudi luunyǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ kenke afiani wǝ bele fɛ wǝnnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
Nye be utidi luufi ofloma ko bǝ lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
Mɔmɔ mfoo , betidi kpǝ lǝ asa bua buyifo ketsyi kama kakpe Onanto . Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ efi mɔ ku mɔ asatete fe afanisa mɔmɔɔ , wuuntsya ebudi kofani lǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ɔflɔ lǝ lefe nǝ muubǝ ku Onanto eto Batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ ku lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ǝmbukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ biunyǝ Onanto ǝmǝ eto sekakedikɔ luubǝ ku ǝsuǝale . ”
Eyi akua eto kamaa , Yesu ákpa Petro , ku Yakobo ku Yohanes bésu kɔtini kutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Mǝ hã dísu bǝsiǝ mfó . Lefe nǝ bakasebi bamfo ńlɛ bobee , bǝnyǝ bǝ Yesu eto ditsyǝbi áfloma .
Nya wǝ awu nnya onkpe léfloma íflubi futututu enso kase utidi luuflǝ wǝ bikǝ ku ntu biole nya bɛnlɛ buyǝnde .
Nya bǝnyǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba koko , Mose ku Elia lɛbɔ bánlɛ etiki budi ku Yesu .
Sikpi ǝmuǝ bakasebi bamǝ kenke itsyise bánte lesa nǝ bánlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nya Petro wǝ dímante lesa nǝ woatɛyi , lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , bo mfo eto bubǝ alɛkɛ tinti . Tǝ lǝ boto ebu ǝtsyǝ . Lɔni itǝ fǝ , lɔni itǝ Mose , nya lɔni tsya itǝ Elia . ”

Nya lɛsɔmiloku ditsyuǝ díbǝ díti mǝmblɛ kenke , nya bánɔ ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ asɔmiloku nyamǝ ǝsuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni mɔ ubi lala wǝ mankeko . Bitsyue wǝ koto . ”
Akpaakpa mfóo , bátsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi tsya bǝnyǝ kuutsyuǝ saa enso Yesu hã ńyǝ ku mǝ mfó .
Lefe nǝ bésinkli banlɛ kɔtini komǝ bɔyifǝ kǝbǝ kasɔɔ , Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ , “ Biantɛyi kuutsyuǝ lesa nǝ bínyǝ mfo isu ese bǝ , mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ataka ntsyi ɔkɔmǝ mbǝ . ”
Béti etiki nyamfo bákpe lǝ mǝ nti , fɛ lǝ mǝ mate sii , nya bákatɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be ni bǝ wootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ eto kasɔ ? ”
Nya bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Beso afi eto bateasa bamǝ laatɛyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia tɔ Kristo eto bubǝ ? ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti baatɛyi . Ele bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia tɔ Kristo eto bubǝ lǝ ubǝ ɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ . Fɛɛ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ tsya bǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ebudi ohiã tinti nya bɔɔni wǝ . Be bibu biǝ nyamfo tsya lɛ bote ?
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia búbǝ koko . Fɛɛ betidi mámfo wǝ ku dibu . Bomu béyifo wǝ kase ke bála . Nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto eto bɛnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ . ”
Lefe nǝmfóo , se Yesu ku bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ dísinkli bǝbǝ bakasebi fɛfɛ ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ bǝ betidi kpǝ ńyǝ bátsyilama mǝ , nya afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ nlɛ mǝ etiki bunǝ nko .
Se betidi bamfó kenke dínyǝ Yesu nlɛ bubǝǝ , íyifo mǝ yanii , nya bétsyetsyi bésu bátsyako wǝ bǝsiǝsǝ wǝ .
Yesu ɔ́tɔ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kǝnǝ ka mi ku mǝ nlɛ ? ”
Nya osani utsyuǝ wǝ ńyǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , nkpa mɔ ubi mboko fǝ ɔflɔ , itsyise lɛwɔnɔ bua si wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ waamfo etiki budi .
Lefenǝ ke lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo nlɛ wǝ bulǝǝ , dietsyi wǝ kasɔ lǝ kasɔ , nya efu laabɔ wǝ lǝ kɛnyɛ nya woayimi anyi , nya wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke laasie kǝklǝkǝ . Nya mínkpa wǝ mimboko fǝ bakasebi minkǝ lǝ batsya wǝ , fɛ bamfo . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ei ! Mii , mmi eto betidi , mi bofo kanɔ ǝmbǝ ale ! Nte lefe nǝ eto okle ele bǝ bonko mi yɛ fɛ lǝ befo bɛnɔ ? Nye nte lefe kɛntsyɛ nǝ ele bǝ nyɛnko mi fɛ lǝ bɛnɔ asa kasɔ ? Bekpa ubi ǝmǝ beboko mɛ ! ”
Nya bákpa wǝ búsuko Yesu . Nya kase lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmfo dínyǝ Yesu ko , dítinkǝsǝ ubi ǝmǝ nya dínǝ wǝ lɛɛsɔ lǝ kasɔ lɛnlɛ bowaninsǝ , akaminansǝ lǝ kasɔ , nya efu nlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ anto nkǝ , “ Se ítsyiko wǝ buyifo mǝǝ , yɔ́ɔ klɛ ? ” Osani ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ítsyǝ wǝ kasɔ lǝ wǝ sikpefi lefe ke .
Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ aakplatsya sesiasesia nkǝ lǝ lelo wǝ , lǝ ibǝ nkoo , dietǝ nkǝ lǝ udu ɔnɔ udufǝ lǝ utǝ nye ntu ǝsuǝ . Nlɛ fǝǝ lekpakpa , nyǝ bo kaminsǝ , lǝ ebofo lǝ awunsǝ ko bo ! ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso faatɛyi mɛ fǝnkǝ lǝ moofo ? Lesasa ebofo bubǝ kǝtǝ lǝ afo mɛ ɔnɔ . ”
Lamfolamfo , ubi ǝmǝ eto anto átɛyi bembembe nkǝ , “ Mfo nnɔ , tsyaa bumbǝ ale kpǝ . Wunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ bofo kanɔ lǝ bumuǝ ale . ”
Nya lefe nǝ Yesu dínyǝ nkǝ betidi kpǝ lǝ bɔkpɔ lǝ banyi bafi mǝǝ , údi lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo etiki nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝ lǝǝtǝ betidi lannɔ ku leendi etiki , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ bɔ lǝ ubi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ , nya mensi sinkli edufǝ lǝ wǝ kulefe kulefe bio ! ”
Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo áfa bembembe , nya dítinkǝsǝ wǝ kekleke nya lɛbɔ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Ubi ǝmfo álabe mfó fe bukpǝ ukpǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ ńyǝ mfó nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ukpǝ ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛkɔbe ubi ǝmǝ lǝ kɔni nya ótaka úńyǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo eto kama se Yesu dídufǝ diyo ditsyuǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ buɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bo dímamfo lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Siankpa utidi ǝmǝ éboto ola sesia sesia sesia nya ókle kɛnyɛɛ , nya fɛ woofo lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo eto okle bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu mfó báyɛ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Yesu mánla nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa te kaka onkpe ,
itsyise úkate wǝ bakasebi asa . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Osani utsyuǝ ebufi Betidi kenke eto Ubi utǝ , nya wuufi wǝ utǝ betidi nkǝ balo . Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , wuusinkli otaka ubǝ nkpǝ . ”
Tsya bánnɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ mfo eto kasɔ , nya báte sikpi ku kase bɔɔtɔ wǝ ditiki nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mfo eto kasɔ .
Se bésu bédufǝ Kapernaum eto umǝǝ , bésu bédufǝ diyo lɔni . Mfóo , Yesu átɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Nte ditiki nǝ bɛnlɛ bunǝ lǝ mi nti se bɔ́nlɛ bubǝ ? ”
Tsya bǝntǝ wǝ mbuayɛ saa . Itsyise se bánlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝkǝnǝ etiki bǝ bala bǝ baate utsyǝ wǝ ni ɔkplɛ kenke lǝ mǝ nti .
Nya Yesu dísiǝ lǝ kasɔ nya ókpadi wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi futsyǝ lela nkǝ weedi ɔkplɛnyǝ kenke lǝ mi ntii , ele bǝ uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ fenkǝ nwǝ lǝmbǝ kulesa nti , nya wuusumu wǝ bǝtsyuǝ . ”
Nya útǝ dikpefi díbǝ únyǝ lǝ mǝ sɛtɔ . Nya útsyi dikpefi nǝmfo útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ akpa nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Utsyuǝ saa léfo dikpefi lǝ mɔ disii , mɔ ni ófo . Nya utsyuǝ saa loofo mɛɛ , inni mɔ mate ete ofo . Bomu ófo mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ tsya . ”
Nya , okasebi wǝ baakpo Yohanes lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , búnyǝ osani utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ awɔnɔ bua bóla lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ . Nya búti wǝ kusu buǝ usinkli ɔyɛ , itsyise umbǝ lǝ bo nti . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bienti wǝ kusu , itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo ayanisa lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , ǝmbudi mɔ etiki bua .
Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ lǝǝnnyǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝǝ , bonko wǝ eyifo bani .
“ Nya mǝtǝ lǝ bete biǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luutǝ mi ntu nkǝ binǝ itsyise biyifo mɔ balee , Onanto ebofo wǝ nnya kayo .
“ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ utidi utsyuǝ ǝtǝ bǝ dikpefi nǝ díkǝnyǝ bofokanɔ lǝ mɛ ésinkli kama lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , wuunyǝ kotonǝnǝ tinti . Lǝ befi ukuǝ bátsyasǝ lǝ lebambi kplɛ ǝsuǝ befi bakpe wǝ lǝ simuǝ befi wǝ bato bakpe lǝ ditumbukplɛ , yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso .
“ Nyaso lǝ fǝ kɔni kɔni abiasǝ fǝ bofokanɔɔ , tɔnɔ lǝ ala ko ǝlǝkǝ ! Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ yɛ kɔni kɔwɛ esu nkpǝ manlo kǝmiǝ enso bǝ kɛ ani ǝnuǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ oto fǝ okpe lǝ ditǝfɛnku ǝsuǝ kaka baatonsǝ asa bua .

Nyaso lǝ fǝ kokpa kɔni laabiasǝ fǝ bofokanɔɔ , la ko ǝlǝkǝ . Ɛlɛkɛ eso bǝ kɛ kokpa kɔwɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo , enso bǝ akpa ǝnuǝ kɛ fǝ lǝ bato fǝ bakpe lǝ utǝ ǝmǝ kǝmiǝ .

Nya lǝ fǝ dinǝmi aakpa fǝ kesuko asa bua kǝmiǝǝ , nǝ ni ǝlǝkǝ . Ɛlɛkɛ eso lǝ akpe dinǝmi lɛwɛ nya fedufǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ enso bǝ kɛ ǝnǝmi ǝnuǝ lǝ befi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ utǝ manlo kǝmiǝ ,
wǝ eto asa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Ekuklubi nnya laabiasǝ asa mfóo , ǝǝnkpǝ kulefe . Nya ute wǝ laatonsǝ asa mfóo , aanni kulefe . ’
Itsyise fe kase beefi mba kakpe lǝ didisa dialɛkɛɛ , nko kǝ Onanto leefi kanyinyǝnyǝ eto utǝ kakpasǝ wǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nɛ .
“ Mba alɛkɛ . Fɛ lǝ bóyansǝ mu kamini , ǝnsiǝmbofo kamini bokpe lǝ mu bio . Nyaso , tǝ mba eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ lǝ bɔkɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ bisiǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ku mi bǝtsyuǝ . ”
Nya se Yesu dídu mfó , ɔ́yila Yordan eto ketu úsu Yudea eto kasɔ . Betidi kpǝ esi bǝbǝ bátsyilama wǝ mfó tsya , nya úkate mǝ asa mfó itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ fe kase úkala buyifo .
Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ itǝ kusuu , lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ Onanto eto kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu bǝnkǝ osani ɔni wǝ usiǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu tsya lítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kɔfi ko Mose lékpe mi ? ”
Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Mose ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ osani wǝ ke lensianla wǝ usiǝǝ , ɔwɔni kukuǝ lǝ utǝ wǝ bote fɛ lǝ oyani wǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Moses wǝǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi áwɔni nyamfo nko útǝ mi itsyi lǝ mi letotidi eso .
Taa kawunsiǝ eto diyifofee , Onanto éyifo osani ku usio , fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Kukue Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
Awɔnisa Eto Kukuǝ Kɛnkɛ átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani du lǝ wǝ anto ku ambe ɔflɔ usu ɔkɔ ku wǝ usiǝ ,
nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ loofiani ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni . ’ Nyaso lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , bafiani utidi ɔni . Inni inuǝ !
Nyaso betidi ba Onanto lɛkɔ banii , kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi saa ǝmbǝ kusu wǝǝsǝnsǝ mǝ nti . ”
Kama se bésu bédufǝ lǝ diyo kǝmiǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ asa itsyi lǝ lǝsanǝ ɔ́tɛyi lǝ kɔfi komfó ǝsuǝ .
Yesu ǝlǝkǝ kasɔ óte mǝ nkǝ , “ Osani wǝ looyani wǝ usiǝ usu nya úfi obambaa , udi kɔsɔnɔ , ota wǝ usiǝ koko ǝmǝ ubu .
Nko ke lǝ usio ani wǝ usiǝ nya usu usiǝko úsiǝ kusǝ bamba tsyaa , wuntsya akpo kusǝ óta wǝ usiǝ koko ǝmǝ úbu . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ tutuutuu , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpa mǝ bebi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ ufi wǝ ani utǝkǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ okpo mǝ atsyɔ . Fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi ǝnyǝnki bákpe mǝ .
Se Yesu dínyǝ nyamfoo , kafo ányi wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ ekpefi lǝ bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ , bienti mǝ kusu . Itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ tǝ itǝ mba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe kase ekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo leeyifo .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ utidi wǝ ke lǝmbofo Onanto eto Sekadidi fe kase dikpefi kɛkɛ laabokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , wǝmbudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ kulefe . ”
Nya ɔ́buta dikpefi saa , útǝkǝ wǝ kɔni nya ókpo mǝ atsyɔ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu létaka úńyǝ lǝ uluu , osani utsyuǝ étsyetsyi úbǝ óse akonki lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi , nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa Sɛɛ , be ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Eyi lesa nǝ eso fakpadi mɛ fǝ , ɔsɛɛ ? Utidi saa meenyifo ɔsɛɛ , enso Onanto .
Eyi Onanto eto afi nnya kenke . Manlo utidi , mankpo kusǝ nye mamfe fǝ usiǝ kama , menyu , mantɛyi sidia lǝ fuutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ nye ala wǝ kɛnyɛ , manwɛ utidi lǝ afo wǝ bikǝ , bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . ”
Osani ǝmfo esi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , idu lǝ mɔ sikpefi ibǝ ese lǝ mii , nlɛ afi nyamfo kenke budi . ”
Yesu ábe wǝ ku lelabi nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lesakpa lɔni hã dibu ele bǝ yifo . Su lǝ esu efi fǝ bikǝ bia kenke nte fǝ ate , lǝ efi atabi nyamfó efi ǝtǝ bakombo . Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , ebofiani otabinyǝ lǝ Onanto eto . Nyamfo eto kamaa , du lǝ ǝbǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ lefe saa ! ”
Se osani ǝmfo lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , élo wǝ ani nnya údu ku nkuɛnlo , itsyise bikǝ kpǝ kpe wǝ .
Yesu átsyi ɔwininsǝ nya ótsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi óbe wǝ bakasebi nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ekpe ale tinti fɛ batabinyǝ loofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufǝ . ”
Ditiki nǝmfo ábiasǝ wǝ bakasebi bamfo eto nsusu . Fɛɛ Yesu esi átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bebi , bɛnɔ kase enkpe ale itǝ batabinyǝ bǝ bǝnyǝ kusu bedufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ !
Mǝ mfó budufǝ kpe ale eso kase ɔdɔmini ku lekoko lɔɔyɛ lǝ okaasa eto ofo ofe ! ”
Se ɔ́tɛyi mǝ ditiki nǝmfoo , isi ébiasǝ mǝ nsusu ekpe blɛmblɛ ! Nya banlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe ko luunyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
Nyaso Yesu ábe mǝ tũũ , nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi saa ǝmbǝ loofo nyamfo buyifo . Fɛɛ wǝ Onantoo , wǝ ebofo lesa saa buyifo . ”
Nya Petro dídi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bóyani bo lesa saa butsyǝ bubǝ butǝkǝko fǝ ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkɛ mimi ebunyǝ bikǝ kpǝ enso mbia béyani bitsyǝ . Itsyise utidi saa wǝ léyani wǝ oto nye bayimisani nye bayimisio , nye ambe , nye anto , nye wǝ bebi , nye wǝ ɔkuɛ útsyǝ lǝ mɔ butǝkǝko esoo , nya lǝ usǝnsǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfoo ,
wuunyǝ asa nyamfó eto nnya kolofa ku kama lǝ kasɔ kamfo . Wuunyǝ kato ku bayimisani ku bayimisio , ku ambemǝ ku bebi ku kakuɛ kpǝ . Fɛɛ betidi ebokpe wǝ bulǝ tsya . Nya nyamfo eto kamaa , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo lǝ kawunsiǝ fɔfɔ ka luubǝ .
Fɛ betidi kpǝ ba ntɔ sɛtɔ mɔmɔɔ , ebubǝ bafe kama . Nya mba nkpe kama mɔmɔɔ , mǝ loofe batɔ sɛtɔ nɛ . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ bányɛ lǝ kusu baatɔ lǝ Yerusalem eeto umǝǝ , Yesu átɔ sɛtɔ fɛ wǝ bakasebi dítǝkǝ . Nya bulǝ butsyuǝ eto okle dídufǝ lǝ bakasabi bamfó ǝsuǝ nya sikpi dímuǝ betidi ba ntǝkǝko mǝ tsya . Yesu esi ókpadi wǝ bakasebi nya ókpa mǝ úsuko kaka kudu lǝmbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ asa nnya lǝǝbǝ wǝ butu .
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ ! Bɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ kaka boomuǝ mɛ , mɔɔ ni Utidi Eto Ubi , nya boofi mɛ bakpe lǝ besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani . Boolo mɛ dikpǝkpi nya buufi mɛ bakpe lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto ani .
Nya bookpe mɛ kɔfiɔ , nya bootufǝ ntufǝ bakpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , bablɛ mɛ , balo mɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muusinkli ntaka mbǝ nkpǝ bio . ”
Nya Sebedeo eto bebi ba ni Yakobo ku Yohanes díbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bankǝ , “ Oteasa , bokpe kǝtsyuǝ boǝ boatɛyi lǝ eyifo ǝtǝ bo . ”
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be ini ? ”
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ fǝ lekankpomɛ lǝ fǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , bo tsya aala boǝ lǝ bubǝ busiǝ lǝ fǝ akɔ mfó . Bo ɔni lǝ usiǝ lǝ fǝ kodiani nya unuǝfǝ tsya lǝ usiǝ lǝ fǝ kǝmǝni . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔtɔ ! Befo bɛnɔ biǝ biofo ntu bunǝ lǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝ mǝǝnǝ ǝsuǝ ? Nya biofo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝ moofo lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo bofoo ? ”
Nya bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Boofo . ” Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ee , biofo bunǝ lǝ lɛkɔbe bua nǝ eto okle mǝǝnǝ , nnya biofo ntu flǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝ eto okle maafo mfo .
Fɛɛ mimbǝ kusu bǝ nlǝkǝ utidi wǝ luusiǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani nye kǝmǝni . Mɔ Anto wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ betidi ba úkalɔ mfó utsyǝ útǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ bakasebi lefosi fɛfɛ lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , bǝnyǝ ɔblɔ bákpe Yakobo ku Yohanes .
Nyaso Yesu ákpadi mǝmblɛ kenke utsyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyi biǝnkǝ Aba eto beninǝ kpe ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ mǝ kalɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya nkomǝ eto beninǝ tidi bamfó akɛ ale ǝkǝlǝkǝ kayinkǝ mba nkpe mǝ kalɔ .
Fɛɛ yanle bǝ itsyǝ nko lǝ mi nti . Lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ aala nkǝ weedi ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ele bǝ obokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ usumu bafɛfɛ .
Nya lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woafo diye kplɛɛ , ele bǝ uyifo nwǝ lǝǝnnǝ ǝsuǝ , laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kabɛbɛ bafɛfɛ eto lɛlɛkǝsǝ .
Itsyise Utidi Eto Ubi kulaa tsya mǝmbǝ nkǝ besumu mɛ . Bomu bǝ lǝ usumu betidi lǝ ufi wǝ nkpǝ utǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto dilǝkǝ . ”
Nnya kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ésu Yeriko . Nya se banlɛ budu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝǝ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko mǝ . Nya lefe nǝ bányɛ kusuu , báfe unǝmba utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Bartimeo eto kasɔ ni Timeo eto ubi . Nya unsi mfó ɔnlɛ asa bɔtɔ .
Se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ uni nlɛ bofee , ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yesu ! David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
Betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ bofe mfó ǝnyǝnki bákpe wǝ bǝnkǝ usinkli ɔyɛ kudu komǝ . Tsya mfe fɛ usi ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
Nya se Yesu lɛnɔ nkoo , úkǝnǝ úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bekpadi wǝ bitǝ mɛ . ” Nyaso bákpadi unǝmba ǝmfo bátɛyi bǝ , “ Nyǝ disuǝyuǝ ! Taka mlǝ , itsyise ɔlɛ fǝ bokpadi . ”
Lamfolamfo , úlǝkǝ wǝ awu kato óto ókpe , nya ótaka úńyǝ , nya úsu Yesu flɔ .
Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be faala fǝ nyifo ntǝ fǝ ? ” Unǝmba ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , tǝ lǝ mɔ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛsini lǝ nkǝnyǝ ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su . Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . ” Nya lamfolamfo , wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini nya útsyiko asa bunyǝ . Nya útǝkǝko Yesu , nya mǝmblɛ lídu .
Lefe nǝ bányi bafi Yerusalem nya bédufǝ Betfage ku kaka letsyilama Betania mfóo , báyo Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini . Nya mfó Yesu lékpe wǝ bakasebi inuǝ nkǝ beákatɔ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bidufǝ umǝ tutɛɛ , biunyǝ biǝnkǝ bátsyasǝ ɔflimubi wǝ ku ukuǝ , wǝ ku utsyuǝ saa dímǝsiǝ tɔ unyǝ . Benyankli wǝ lǝ ukuǝ lǝ bifi wǝ beboko mɛ .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ átɔ mi nkǝ , ‘ Beso bɛnlɛ wǝ bulǝkǝ ? ’ bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝ mi Onamute ahiã wǝ , nya businkli bufi wǝ boboko mlɛ . ”
Nyaso betidi inuǝ bamfo ésu nya bǝnyǝ bǝ ɔflimubi ńyǝ lǝ ukuǝ , úńyǝ lǝ futsyǝ eto kǝsiǝ . Nya bǝlǝkǝ wǝ ku ukuǝ ǝmǝ .
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba ńyǝ mfó átɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be bɛnlɛ wǝ bonyankli keyifo ko ? ”
Bátɛyi mǝ fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ . Nya mǝ tsya dítǝ mǝ kusu bǝ banyankli wǝ .
Se báboko Yesu ubuki ǝmfoo , béfi mǝ mfia bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ubuki ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya Yesu lébe úsiǝ lǝ wǝ .
Betidi kpǝ éfi mǝ mfia bǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ , bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝfǝsǝ kalɛ ku afanto lǝ kaflɔ bésense bákpo lǝ kusu bǝ lǝ ɔyɛ ofe .
Betidi ba kenke ntɔ sɛtɔ ku mba ntǝkǝ kamaa káfa bembembe kákatɛyi bǝ , “ Hosiana ! Bɔlɛ atɛsǝ butǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Onanto eto diye ǝsuǝ .
Bifi atɛsǝ bitǝ bo ona Oka David eto sekakedikɔ sia nlɛ bubǝ . Hosiana itǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe kato fanlofanlo . ”
Se údufǝ Yerusalem , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo . Nya ótsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi ɔ́lɛ ola óbe lesa saa nǝ nkpe mfó . Fɛɛ se kale mfe nlɛ bolo esoo , údu úsu Betania ku wǝ bakasebi .
Se kale dísiǝ , bédu lǝ Umǝ Betania bánlɛ bubǝǝ nya kukpɛnsɛ étsyiko Yesu bɔlɛ .
Únyǝ kɔsɛsɛ nkǝ kuyi kutsyuǝ ko laawɔ eyibibi baakpo fiki ko léta afanto kpǝ nyǝ mfó . Nyaso úsu nkǝ weesu obe lǝ kɔ́nwɔ ebibi . Fɛɛ se úsu údufǝ kuyi komǝ kalɔɔ , únyǝ nkǝ kóanwɔ ebibi saa . Afanto hã kóto . Lefe nǝ ele bǝ kusi kɔnwɔ tsya mányo tɔ .
Nyaso Yesu édi kuyi komǝ etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ensiembɔnwɔ ebibi bio . ” Wǝ bakasebi ánɔ se ɔ́tɛyi nko .
Se bésu bédufǝ Yerusalem , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo , nya útsyiko betidi ba nlɛ asa bote ku mba nlɛ bikǝ bote lǝ diyo nǝmǝ bola , úkǝ mba nlɛ atabi bofloma eto kapunu úwi . Nya úkǝ mba nsi banlɛ ablonima tsya bote eto akpomɛ úwi itsyise wóanla nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ubǝ ukayɛ lǝ Disumuyo ɔflɔ mfó kafe ku mǝ bikǝ .
Nya wóantɔnɔ nkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa fi kulesa úbǝ katekɔ lǝ kesumukɔ eto diyo nǝmǝ mfó .
Nya óte betidi bamfó asa ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bawɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bookpo mɔ diyo , diyo nǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi luubǝ bato ola bǝtǝ Onanto . ’ Fɛɛ mimi éfi ni bíyifo beyu eto kabiɔkɔ katafa betidi . ”
Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ba lɛkɛ mfó ánɔ etiki nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi . Nyaso bábɛbɛ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ balo wǝ . Tsyaa balɛ sikpi bote ɛyɛ lǝ kase betidi ba tã laala wǝ asatete eso .
Se éyo ditsyitsyo lefee , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ ǝmǝ .
Se kale dísiǝ eto olesiǝǝ , nya se bányɛ lǝ kusu bánlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝnyǝ bǝ kudiyi komǝ ébukpǝ koko kenke taa ko keyudu ke .
Petro ákloma lesa nǝ díbǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , be kuyi komǝ fékudii , kúkpǝ ! ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo Onanto bɛnɔ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ lɔɔtɛyi kɔtini komfo nkǝ kɔnyi kusu kudufǝ lǝ lekpoo , nya wanyaki lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi , nya ófo ɔ́nɔ nkǝ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi ebubǝ itǝǝ , Onanto ebuyifo nnya utǝ wǝ .
Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lesa nǝ ke biɔtɔ Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ olatoto ǝsuǝǝ , befo bɛnɔ biǝ dioka mi kɔni . Onanto ebuyifo lesa nǝ mǝ utǝ mi .
Nya lǝ bibǝ ola katokɔ kǝtǝ Onanto nya bekloma biǝ utidi utsyuǝ áta mi úbuu , bifi bɛtsyɛ wǝ itǝ bǝ mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato tsyaa , lǝ ufi mi asa bua ɔtsyɛ mi .
Fɛɛ lǝ biemfi bɛtsyɛ wǝǝ , mi Anto wǝ nkpe kato tsya ǝmbufi ɔtsyɛ mi . ”
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édufǝ Yerusalem . Nya Yesu nyɛ lǝ kesumukɔ mfó botsyilamaa , nya besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ eto beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe dítǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale fɛ feeyifo asa nyamfo ? Nya owoe tsya dítǝ fǝ kusu nko ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Tutɛɛ , mɔɔtɔ mi ditiki lɔni hã . Nya lǝ bitǝ ni mbuayɛɛ , mɔɔtɛyi mi nwǝ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ minlɛ asa nyamfo buyifo .
Bɛtɛyi mɛ kaka Yohanes léfo ǝsuǝale utsyiko fɛ úflǝsǝ betidi ntu ? Ǝsuǝale nyamǝǝ , Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi lee utidi ete dítǝ wǝ kusu ? ”
Bétsyiko etiki nyamfo bunǝ lǝ mǝ nti , nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ele bǝ bɔtɛyi kɛɛ ? Lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ nkomǝ eto ǝsuǝale nyamǝ etsyi Onanto ɔflɔɔ , wɔɔtɔ bo nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ nko inii , beso bíamfo Yohanes bɛnɔ ? ’
Fɛɛ lǝ bɔtɛyi wǝ boǝ , utidi ete letsyese wǝ tsyaa ! ” Balɛ sikpi bote kase bɔtɛyi nko tsya itsyise utsyuǝ saa áfo ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yohanes eyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
Nyaso bátɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bunyi . ” Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mintsya ǝmbɔtɛyi mi itsyi lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya minkpe eso fɛ maafo nyamfo buyifo ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa nkǝ , “ Lefe lɔnii , osani utsyuǝ áfo nte eto eyi eto ɔkuɛ . Nya ókpe ɔkpɔ ótsyilama wǝ . Nya úlǝkǝ dibiǝ lǝ koba ǝsuǝ kaka wuukǝkǝ eyibibi nyamǝ eto ntu ukakpo . Nya óto kalebe kani letaka kaka bookǝnyǝ bakase ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ . Nya úfi ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ókpe lǝ wǝ beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ eto ani nkǝ bakase wǝ , lǝ lesa nǝ ke bǝnyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝǝ , lǝ befi baboko lǝ besie bǝtsyuǝ . Nya údu úsu kusu .
Se lefe léyo bǝ balɛ eyibibi nyamǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ ákpe mǝ wǝ uyifoyifo ɔni nkǝ lǝ bɔɔlɛ eyibibi nyamǝǝ , lǝ batsyɛ nya lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ lǝ osani ǝmǝ lǝ ofo wǝ lekpa oboko wǝ .
Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamfo ko dímuǝ wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmfo báblɛ nya bála wǝ bátsyese nya údu anifufu .
Nya osani ǝmfo disi ótsyese uyifoyifo bamba . Nya se úsuu , beyifoyifo bamfo lɛblɛ wǝ nya ófo lefabe lǝ disi , nya bákpe wǝ kofani tinti .
Nya osani ǝmfo disi ótsyese wǝ uyifoyifo bamba bio , nya báblɛ wuntsya nya bálo wǝ . Nnya kamaa , usi ótsyese wǝ beyifoyifo kpǝ . Nya báblɛ bǝtsyuǝ nya bálo bafɛfɛ .
“ Utidi wǝ dibu wǝ bio wootsyese wǝ ni osani ǝmfo kosate eto ubi lala . Lɛfɛfɛɛ , ótsyese wǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mfo nnɔ miǝ boobu mɔ ubi . ’
“ Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ átɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nyǝ nwǝ luudi Bonamute eto bikǝ . Bibǝ lǝ bumuǝ wǝ bolo , lǝ bɔlɛ wǝ kedikɔ bofo bofianinsǝ bo kale . ’
Nyaso bǝmuǝ ubi ǝmfo . Nya bálo wǝ . Béfi wǝ bǝduǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ eto kama . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be befo bɛnɔ biǝ osani ǝmfó ebuyifo ? Mɔɔtɛyi mi minkǝ wuusu mfó usu olo beyifoyifo bamfó , ɔlɛ ɔkuɛ ǝmfo ofo okpe betidi bambaa kɔni .
Ntɔ bíankla lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ kaka bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti .
Bonamute ni nwǝ díyifo nyamfo . Iyifo lesa nǝ laanɔ bobe sitinti ! ’ ”
Nya se bánɔ nyamfoo , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ákplatsya kekleke bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ Yesu . Itsyise bǝnyǝ bǝ lekpa nǝmǝ ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ báte sitiditu sia ńyǝ mfó sikpi . Nyaso bédu lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Kamaa , bátsyese Farisifɔ ku Herodes eto betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ besu betsyue wǝ etikididi ato lǝ bǝnyǝ kabua lǝ wǝ esuǝ .
Se bésu wǝ ɔflɔɔ , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝ fǝǝ , ɔnukualɛtidi feni . Nya eentsyi fǝ etiki kawuninsǝ lǝ ǝdufǝ betidi ǝnǝ . Aante betidi eto ǝnǝmi sikpi , ɔkplɛ lee , ɔkɛkɛ . Nya ni bǝ Onanto eto kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ hã faate saa kayɛnko . Nyaso tɛyi bo lǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ boko oko butǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ Kaisare
Bofo lee boamfo ? ” Fɛɛ Yesu yi mǝ nkǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi beni , nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso biala biǝ biato mɛ bebe ? Beboko mɛ atabi lǝ mbe . ”
Báboko wǝ ani . Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe eto disi ku diye ntǝkǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ mfo ? ” Mfó bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝ , “ Okankplɛ Kaisare ni . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso bifi lesa nǝ ni Okankplɛ Kaisare eto lele bitǝ wǝ . Lǝ bifi lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto lele bitǝ Onanto . ” Lǝ nyamfo esoo , iyifo mǝ naa .
Sadukifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Mǝ laate bǝnkǝ lǝ utidi ǝkpǝǝ , woensibusinkli otaka ubǝ nkpǝ . Bǝbǝ bǝ bátɔ Yesu ditiki ditsyuǝ .
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , Moses áwɔni lǝ afi nnya útǝ bo nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝkpǝ nya óyani wǝ usiǝ utsyǝ nya bánle bebi saa , nyalɛ ele bǝ osani ǝmfo eto ɔyimisani , fi usio ǝmǝ ufi . Nya wǝ ku ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ lǝ bale bebi . Nya bebi bamfóo , betidi ebunyǝ mǝ fe osani wǝ dimankɛ ubi saa eto bale . ’
Nya íbǝ lefe lɔni bǝ , bayimisani ekuanse ǝsiǝ . Ututǝ éfi kusiǝ nya úkpǝ le lefe nǝ bánle ubi saa .
Nya unuǝfǝ tsya dífi wǝ , nya wuntsya díkpǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe wonko usio ǝmfo dímanle ubi saa . Nko kǝ íbǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ banle ubi saa .
Nko íbǝ bǝ mǝ ekuanse ba kenke éfi usio emfo bafia . Fɛɛ mǝmblɛ kenke ǝkpǝ lefe nǝ mǝ ku usio ǝmfo dímanle bebi saa . Nnya kama kamaa , usio ǝmfo tsya ǝkpǝ .
Mɔmɔɔ , nnya ni bǝnkǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ kenke lootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝǝ , mǝ nti eto owoe luudi usio ǝmfo eto usǝ se mǝ betidi ekuanse bamǝ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝǝ , dikefi wǝ fe kusiǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni nko ini kulaa . Nnyǝ minkǝ bíannɔ ditiki nǝmfo kasɔ , itsyise biannɔ etiki nya nkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ eto kasɔ nya binyi Onanto eto ǝsuǝale . Nyaso beta wǝ bibu .
Lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ lootakaa , bootsyǝ fe Onanto eto batɔnkpe , nyaso bembufi bǝsiǝ nye bǝsǝ .
Nya lǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ eto businkli kataka ǝsuǝ , Moses áwɔni lesatsyuǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ itsyi lǝ biyu eto eyi kpufɛɛ nnya díńyǝ utǝ ǝsuǝ . Onanto lídi wǝ etiki . Lee biankloma ? Mfó ɔ́wɔni nkǝ Onanto átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Abraham eto Onanto ku Isak eto Onanto ku Yakob eto Onanto tsya . ’
Nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ betidi ba díkǝkpǝ ebusinkli bǝbǝ nkpǝ , nya wǝ kǝ ni mǝ Onanto . Fɛɛ mi bíonya ɔnukualɛsu komfo koko ! ”
Afi eto oteasa wǝ díńyǝ mfó ánɔ etiki nya banlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nya ánɔ nkǝ Yesu ǝtǝ etiki nyamǝ eto mbuayɛ kukɔnɔ . Nyaso ɔ́nyi úsu Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Nte kɔfi ko ni nko nso bofe lǝ afi nnya kenke nti ? ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kɔfi ko nso bofe ni nko báwɛni bǝnkǝ , ‘ Israel eto betidi , bɛlɔ bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ ! Onanto ni bo Onamute , nya Onanto ɔni hã nkpe .
Nyaso ele bǝ ala Onanto wǝ ni fǝ Onamute ku fǝ utu kenke , ku fǝ lɛwɔnɔ kenke ku fǝ nsusu kenke , ku fǝ ǝsuǝale kenke . ’
Nya kɔfi ko nsi ntǝkǝ lǝ nkomfo eto kama ni bǝ , ‘ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe kase faala fǝ ǝsuǝ . ’ Kɔfi saa ensibǝ ko ntǝkǝ afi nyamfo kato . ”
Nya osani ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , átɛyi nnya kukɔnɔ ! Lesa nǝ fátɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ bǝ Onanto ni bo Onamute , wǝ kama Onanto saa ensibǝ .
Nya ele bǝ Utidi saa la Onanto itsyi lǝ wǝ utu ku wǝ nsusu kenke ku wǝ ǝsuǝale kenke . Nya ele bǝ ola wǝ utiditsyuǝ fe kase woala wǝ ǝsuǝ . Ɛlɛkɛ eso bǝ utidi di afi ǝnuǝ nyamfo , eso bǝ ufi bebuki ku keditǝtǝ bamba utǝ Onanto . ”
Se Yesu dínyǝ kasɔnɔnɔ ka ǝsuǝ osani ǝmfo lɛyɛ útǝ mbuayɛɛ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ alɛɛ , ibu sɛkɛ ete lǝ edufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ” Nyamfo eto kamaa , kuutsyuǝ saa mensi kpe ɔkɔɛ nkǝ woatɔ Yesu kulesa tsya .
Lefenǝ Yesu lɛkɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo ɔnlɛ Anantotiki bote mfóo , ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ afi eto bateasa bamǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Utidi wǝ Nlɛ Bubǝǝ , ábɔ utsyi Oka David eto kafo ?
Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ áwunsǝko Oka David átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto átɛyi mɔ Onamute nkǝ , “ Siǝ mfo lǝ mɔ kodiani isu ese lefe nǝ muutǝ efi fǝ akpa ǝtǝkǝ fǝ balo lǝ disinti . ” ’
Nyalɛ lǝ David kosate lǝ Utidi wǝ Nlɛ Bubǝ bokpo nkǝ wǝ Onamutee , nyalɛ ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ wǝ kosate loofo David eto kafo eto ubi budi ? ” Nya betidi kpǝ dínyǝ banlɛ etiki nnya Yesu nyǝ ɔnlɛ budi bɔnɔ ku disuǝyuǝ .
Se Yesu nlɛ betidi bamfó asa botee , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini lǝ afi eto bateasa ǝsuǝ . Baala awu kplɛ bokpe nya baala bɔyɛ kafe kaka betidi luunyǝ mǝ bǝsiǝsǝ ku dibu .
Bala nsiǝkɔ kplɛ busiǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ ku lǝ asakedikɔ .
Bǝlǝkǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ kɔhɔ . Kamaa , baalɛ mǝ bikǝ kafo . Nya bato kala kɛntsyɛɛ kate ǝsuǝ bǝ beyi Onanto . Mǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝbɔkɛ ale eso betidi fɛfɛ eto ale ! ”
Nya Yesu díkǝnǝ úsiǝ lǝ kedi kǝtǝkɔ lǝ Disumuyo kaka banlɛ atabi boko , nya únsi ɔnlɛ bobe kase betidi nlɛ bofe kesu kako asa . Batabinyǝ kpǝ áko atabi kpǝ .
Nya ɔkɔsiǝ okombo utsyuǝ tsya díbǝ ófe nya úfi atabi sɛkɛ úsu óko .
Nya Yesu lékpadi wǝ bakasebi utsyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , ɔkɔsiǝ okombo ǝmfo eto atabi nnya ókoo , édufǝ ǝnǝ eso nnya betidi bamfo kenke léko .
Sitintii , betidi bamfo kpe kɔni kalende . Fɛɛ nnya nte mǝ eto sɛkɛ ete baboko . Nya usionko ǝmfo alɛɛ , ite bǝ okombo ni tsyaa , ufi lesa nǝ ntǝ wǝ kenke úbǝ óko . Lesa nǝ ele bǝ wuufi oya lesa udii , nnya ni lesa nǝ úfi úbǝ óko mfo nɛ . ”
Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfóo , wǝ bakasebi eto ɔni átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , be aba nnya laanɔ bobe mfo beefi báto diyo kplɛ nǝmfo ku kase baato nii ! Dianɔ bobe ! ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛlɔ bebe diyo kplɛ nǝmfo kukɔnɔ , itsyise aba nya béfi báto ni eto lɛɛ lɔni embubu ditǝkǝ lǝ ni utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ ! Diyo nǝmfo kenke eboba lekpo lǝ kasɔ nnya aba nyamfó kenke looba isensǝ ekpo . ”
Yesu édu úsu úsiǝ lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini komǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mfóo , úsiǝ ɔnlɛ Disumuyo nǝmǝ bobe katsyese . Nya Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohanes ku Andreas hã díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
“ Onamute , dimamfe ayo nyamfó looba ? Tɛyi bo asa nnya luubǝ lǝ bote boǝ lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ nkomǝ eto asa nyamfo ebubǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini , nya biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpe .
Betidi kpǝ ebubǝ lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ nya bɔɔtɛyi mi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Nnyǝ mɔ ni nwǝ bákpo ɔhile ǝmǝ , ’ nya bɔɔwɛ betidi kpǝ bakpe .
Nya yenyifo mi bulǝ lǝ bɛnɔ ama eto kɔsɔ lǝ mi ɔflɔ nye lǝ katsyontsyokɔ . Ele bǝ asa nyamfo eto kakle bǝ . Tsya inni nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalokɔ eboyo .
Kasɔ ka ebotaka nka lema . Nya sekakedikɔ ka ebotaka nka lema . Nsɔ ebutinkǝ lǝ kalebe saa , nya kukpɛnsǝ luubǝ . Asa nyamfo ebuyifo fe kase kalefo lǝǝnǝ usionko .
“ Ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ lǝ mi kosate bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ . Boomuǝ mi bakpa mi besuko Yudafɔ eto beninǝ eto ǝnǝmi . Bɔɔblɛ mi lǝ ntsyakɔ . Boolǝkǝ mi bǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ baka ku nsɔ eto beninǝ eto ǝnǝmi lǝ mɔ disi eso , nya biɔtɛyi mǝ ditiki itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
Tsya fɛ kalosǝkɔ luubǝǝ , yuubǝ bǝ batɛyi kawunsiǝ eto ǝsǝ kenke eto betidi Onanto eto ditiki nǝmfo .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bǝmuǝ mi besuko lekpokakpokɔɔ , biembu disi bɛtɔnsǝ itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayoo , lǝ bɛtɛyi ditiki nǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lookpe mi kɛnyɛ nkǝ bɛtɛyi . Itsyise inni mi kosate lǝǝbǝ etiki budi . Bomu Onanto eto Lɛwɔni loote mi lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi .
“ Ɔyimi ebudu ɔyimi utǝ bǝ balo . Nya antomǝ tsya luuyifo nko ke ku mǝ bebi . Bebi ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ antomǝ ǝsuǝ bedu mǝ bǝtǝ bǝ balo .
Bookisi mi lǝ mɔ disi . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ luunyǝ kekleke lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ isu ese kalosǝkɔɔ , Onanto ebulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ kotonǝne ko bǝtsyǝ itǝ babuayifo ǝsuǝ .
“ Mɔmɔɔ , bifǝ ato lǝ bɛlɔ bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ . Lǝ binyǝ lesa nǝ Onanto leekisi nlɛ bubǝ lǝ wǝ Disumuyo kɛnkɛ , ka nlɛ mfo kɔfiɔ bokpe nya dimanle bǝ ɛkɛ mfoo , betidi ba nkpe lǝ Yuda tsyetsyi besu babiɔ lǝ atini ǝsuǝ .
Nwǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ditsya ǝsuǝǝ , mensi bu disi nkǝ woayifǝ ubǝ ufi kulesa lǝ wǝ diyo .
Utsyuǝ wǝ nńyǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ membu disi nkǝ wǝǝsinkli ubǝ oto nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ufi wǝ kafia .
Lefe nǝmfó ebɔkɛ ale tinti itǝ besionko ba ni bafondɛ , nye mba nlɛ bebisambi ba nlɛ bɔyimi .
Bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa bǝ lefe nǝmǝ mǝntǝkǝ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe !
Itsyise bulǝ bo luubǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , ǝbɔkɛ ale leso mbo ke díkǝbǝ bófe saa idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ibǝ ese mi eto lefe nǝmfo . Nya bulǝ bomfo eto okle ensiembubǝ inyǝ kulefe .
Fɛɛ Onanto ǝbɔtɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ wuulǝkǝ eyi nyamǝ ubu . Itsyise lenni nkoo , kuutsyuǝ saa embubu usiǝ . Tsya lǝ wǝ betidi ba úkǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ esoo , wuulǝkǝ lefe nǝmǝ ubu .
“ Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ atɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Nnyǝ Kristo mfo , ’ nye utsyuǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Nyǝ wǝ nkpe mmǝǝ , ’ mamfo anɔ !
Itsyise mba luuyifo mǝ ǝsuǝ fe Kristo nye Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidii , kpǝ ebotaka bǝńyǝ . Booyifo ayanisa kpǝ ku asa nnya nkpe sikpi , itǝ bǝ lǝ boofoo , bɔɔwɛ Onanto eto betidi ba úkǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ taa kɔ kulaa tsya bakpe .
Nyaso bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ ! Ńtɛyi mi lesa saa ntɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ lǝ leyo .
“ Nya lǝ eyi nnya luutǝkǝ lǝ bulǝ bomfo eto kamaa , ‘ kofe ǝmbofa bio , nya kofande tsya lembuyǝnde .
Befandebi ebuyifo fe bofankli bɛnlɛ ketsyi kato kǝbǝ kasɔ , nya kato eto asa kenke luutinkǝ . ’
“ Lefe nǝmfóo , betidi ebunyǝ mɛ , Utidi Eto Ubi , nlɛ bubǝ lǝ asɔmiloku ǝsuǝ . Nya muubǝ ku Onanto eto ǝsuǝale lǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nya mootsyese mɔ kato eto batɔnkpe kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ ana nyamǝ lǝ nsu nlǝkǝ mɔ betidi ba mínkǝlǝkǝ míntsyǝ itsyi lǝ kawunsiǝ eto lekpake nǝmfo isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ ka nse .
“ Bekase asa itsyi lǝ koto ǝsuǝ . Lǝ ibǝ bǝ binyǝ se kuyi komfó lɛ afanto fɔfɔ bulǝkǝǝ , eté mi bǝ kasɔmite ǝbɔfi .
Nko ke lǝ ibǝ bǝ binyǝ asa nnya míntɛyi mi mfo lɛ kasɔ butsyǝ ku bubǝǝ , ete biote biǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kalosǝkɔ ǝbɔfi nnya ikǝbǝ eyo fǝ kǝsiǝ pɛɛ !
Sitinti nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ itǝ fɛ efe nǝmfo eto betidi luukpǝ balo .
Kato ku kasɔ kenke ebubǝ kafe . Fɛɛ mɔ ditiki embubǝ lefe kulefe .
“ Tsyaa , kuutsyuǝ saa enyi diyi nye lefe nǝ asa nyamfo luubǝ itǝ , Onanto eto batɔnkpe ku mɔ , Onanto eto Ubi kulaa tsya enyi , enso mɔ Anto hã nyi .
Bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itsyise binyi lefe nǝ nyamfó luubǝ itǝ .
Mɔ bubǝ ebuutsyǝ fe kase osani utsyuǝ luudu lǝ wǝ umǝ nkǝ wǝǝsu kusu , nya óyani wǝ beyifoyifo utsyǝ lǝ diyo . Útǝ utsyuǝ saa keyifo ka wuukeyifo . Nnya kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ laase wǝ diyo nkǝ ɔlɔ ose wǝ diyo kekleke .
“ Nko kǝ ele bǝ mi tsya muǝ ǝsuǝ binyǝ . Itsyise binnyi lefe nǝ mi Oyosate luubǝ udufǝ . Yoofo bubǝ bǝ wuubǝ ku kakɔmi lefe , nye ntsyetsyi , nye kolensiǝnto kplɛ ko bekusɛ lǝǝtǝ kɛnyɛ , nye olesiǝ .
Lǝ ibǝ bǝ ubǝ ofuaa , yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ ubǝ unyǝ mi bɛnlɛ selabe .
Lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mfoo , nlɛ nnya bɔtɛyi itǝ betidi ba ta . Nnya ni bǝ bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ . ”
Ibu eyi ǝnuǝ fɛ lǝ Yudafɔ lǝ bedi mǝ eyi nnya baakpo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila ku Nnamfokuã Eto Abolo Eto Eyi , nyna beefi kakloma mǝ budu lǝ Egipte . Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ákɛ mfó békebu disi lǝ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ kalɔkalɔ bǝmuǝ Yesu balo .
Bátɛyi lǝ mǝ nti bǝnkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ ibǝ nko lǝ eyisɛ nyamǝ eto lefe . Itsyise lenni nkoo , betidi ebunyǝ ɔblɔ bataka bǝńyǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ibǝ ekpe bule . ”
Yesu ésu Betania eto umǝ lǝ Simon wǝ díkefi bufisia únyǝ eto diyo . Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu nsi mfó ɔ́nlɛ lesa budii , usionko utsyuǝ wǝ nlɛ nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi eto dituntu nǝ baakpo alabasta ǝbǝ mfó . Baakpo nnuǝbi bomfó , bo lefo koya tintii bǝ naadi . Usionko ǝmfo ásini dituntu nǝmǝ nya ɔ́wuninsǝ nnuǝbi bomǝ ókpo Yesu lǝ disi .
Nyamfo ǝlǝ betidi ba díńyǝ mfó . Nya kafo lɛnyi mǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso woabiasǝ nnuǝbi bomfo nko ?
Eni ofo mu bote kǝnyǝ fe lɛlɛ wɔlɔlɔ eto kayo , ufi usu utǝ bakombo . ” Nyaso béyǝnki bákpe wǝ bákpo wǝ kudu .
Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beyani wǝ kpoo ! Be so biayani wǝ lǝ bɛyɛ wǝ bulǝ ? Lesa sɛɛ úyifo útǝ mɛ .
Bakombo kpe mi lenti lefe saa . Nya biofo mǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ lefe nǝ ke beela . Mɔ alɛɛ , inni lefe saa mɔɔkɛ mi lenti .
Usionko ǝmfo éyifo lesa nǝ wofo buyifo . Úfi nnuǝbi bomfo ókpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́lɔ mɛ utsyǝ itǝ muukpǝ fɛ buubikǝ mɛ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ kaka ke boobe Onanto eto ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , bɔɔtɛyi nnya usionko ǝmfo tsya díyifo mfo kefi kakloma wǝ . ”
Nyaso Yuda Iskariot wǝ ni Yesu eto bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔnii , ésu besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ woote Yesu udi utǝ mǝ .
Ǝsuǝ ǝyuǝ mǝ tinti se bánɔ etiki nnya úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ , nya mǝ tsya lɛtɛyi bǝ buutǝ wǝ atabi . Nyaso Yuda ákabɛbɛ kusu ko wɔɔnyɛ ote mǝ kase boomuǝ wǝ .
Lǝ diyi tutɛ lǝ Nnamfokuã eto Diyididi nǝ baalo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila Eto Asamubi lǝ mǝ lekpa ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se faala fǝ bɔlɔ butsyǝ itǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyisɛ nǝmǝ eto budi ? ”
Nyaso Yesu ǝlǝkǝ bakasebi inuǝ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nti nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi bisu umǝnkpɛ ǝmǝ nya biotsyako utsyuǝ wǝ ntsyi ntu ku ɔlɔtsyi . Bitǝkǝko wǝ bisu diyo nǝ ǝsuǝ wuudufǝ .
Nya lǝ bɛtɛyi Oyosate ǝmǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Oteasa ǝmǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , te bo diyo nǝ kafo wonko wǝ bakasebi luubǝ bedi mǝ lesa lǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila Eto Diyisɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
Mfóo , woote mi diyo nǝ lɛmɔ kafo lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto abanslo kaka bálɔ asa bǝtsyǝ kukɔnɔ itǝ bo . ”
Bakasebi bamfo édu búsu umǝ , nya bǝnyǝ lesa saa fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ . Nya béyifo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila ǝmfo eto lesa nǝmǝ bǝtsyǝ mfó .
Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ ésu mfó .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bénsi bánlɛ búdii , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mi ɔni wǝ bonko wǝ nlɛ kɔni bokpe lǝ ɔkpɛ kedi lesa mfoo , ebote mɛ udi . ”
Ditiki nǝmfo éyifo mǝ buɛɛ ku sikpi , nya bétsyiko wǝ bɔtɔ ɔni , ɔni , bǝnkǝ , “ Sitinti , nyi miǝ inni mɔ ni fanlɛ , lee mɔ ni ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi lefosi inuǝ eto ɔni ni . Nya ni bǝ bonko wǝ nlɛ kɔni bokpe lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni mfo kedi .
Mɔ , wǝǝ ni Utidi Eto Ubi ebukpǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ ilǝ mɛ itǝ futsyǝ ǝmǝ itsyise woǝbǝ ohiã bunyǝ fefe . Lǝ nnya ete bánle utsyǝ ǝmfóo , eni yɔɔlɛkɛ eso ! ”
Lǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bánlɛ lesa búdii , Yesu éfi abolo ǝtsyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ úkasɔ Onanto anii , úbudi nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ nnya úsie ni útǝ wǝ bakasebi . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Befo nyamfo lǝ bidi . Nyamfo ni mɔ usuǝ eto sinǝ nɛ . ”
Nya úfi lɛkɔbe ku nte , nya se ɔ́sɔ Onanto anii , úfi útǝ mǝ nya bǝnǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ni mɔ kɔtɔ ko muufi ntǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ eto disi , ko Onanto luufi uyifo ketsyue fɔfɔ lǝ wǝ ku wǝ betidi eto nti .
Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mensiǝmbunǝ nte fɔfɔ bomfo bio , isu ese lefe nǝ muunǝ nte fɔfɔ bomfo eto okle lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
Nya bése kusǝ béfi bátɛsǝ Onanto nya bédu bésu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini .
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Mi utsyuǝ saa ebutsyetsyi óyani mɛ utsyǝ . Itsyise Onanto átɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , fe kase báwɔni bǝtsyǝ bǝ ‘ Moolo nwǝ laase basamu bamǝ , nya wǝ basamu luusǝnsǝ . ’
Fɛɛ lǝ ntaka ntsyi lǝ ɔkɔmǝ mbǝǝ , mɔɔtɔ mi nsu Galilea . ”
Nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛ mǝmbutsyetsyi ndu fǝ lǝ ɔflɔ kulefe , lǝ ibǝ bǝ bafɛfɛ kenke ebuyifo nko kulaa tsya . ”
Yesu átɛyi Petro nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ dinuǝfǝ lǝ kǝtsyǝ kamfoo , fǝ kosate ǝbɔni mɛ sitsyǝ . ”
Petro esi óse wǝ uyi óka ntamu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝnkǝ balo bonko fǝ tsyaa , mǝmbɔni fǝ ntɛyi minkǝ minyi fǝ . ” Nnya ke wǝ bakasebi bamǝ tsya lɛtɛyi nɛ .
Nya bédu Getsemane . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bisiǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo lǝ nsu nto ola . ”
Nya ókpa Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohanes ɔ́yɛnko . Nya se lesa nǝ nlɛ wǝ bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nlɛ wǝ bulǝ esoo ,
ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wininsǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo lɛ mɛ bulǝ lǝ utu ku kanyinyǝnyǝ itǝ ukpǝ . Bianlabe selabe . Bińyǝ bisǝkǝ mɛ mfo . ”
Se ɔ́nyi úsu sɛtɔ sɛkɛɛ , ókpo lǝ kasɔ nya óto ola ɔ́lɛ wǝ anto lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Lǝ yuuyifo fǝ lelabii , nyalɛ tǝ bulǝ bomfo lǝ bofe mɛ . ”
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , Onanto ! Aafo lesa saa buyifo . Lǝ aalaa , nyalɛ takasǝ bulǝ bomfo lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Tsya inni lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ bomu lǝ fǝ lele ǝsuǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ úsinkli úbǝ wǝ bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔɔ , úbǝ únyǝ nkǝ bálabe selabe . Nya ɔ́tɔ Simon Petro nkǝ , “ Simon , selabe fanlɛɛ ? Ǝmbofo ǝnǝ butǝkǝ lebombosɔsɔ lɔni kplon tsya ete ? ”
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ bisiǝ bikato ola bǝ biǝmbudufǝ lǝ botoo kabe ǝsuǝ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lɛ bola , fɛɛ ǝsuǝale ǝmbǝ . ”
Úsinkli úsu bio nkǝ weesu oto ola fe ditutɛ ke .
Úsinkli úbǝ wǝ bakasebi ɔflɔ bio nya usi úbǝ únyǝ nkǝ besi bálɛ selabe . Bánlɛ mǝ ǝnǝmi bofo buminkli . Nya bánte lesa nǝ bɔtɛyi wǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Se úsinkli úbǝ ditsyǝfǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bola bela biǝ bialabe bitsyǝ ɔnwɛ ? Isiǝ , betaka ! Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo . Bebe ! Ubǝ mɔ , Onanto eto Ubi , bufi kakpe babuayifo eto ani . Bebe mǝǝ , se baankpee kusu banlɛ bubǝ .
Betaka lǝ busu botsyako mǝ . Bebe nwǝ dífi mɛ ókpe mǝ lǝ ani nlɛ bubǝǝ . ”
Mǝ ku Yesu si bǝńyǝ mfó bálɛ etiki fɛ Yuda wǝ ni lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni díbǝ . Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ ǝmǝ eto beninǝ kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ bǝbǝ . Bétsyi keyi ku nlanle .
Nwǝ dídu wǝ útǝ mfóo , ébɔtɛyi betidi bamfo utsyǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ biunyǝ muusiǝsǝ mfiɔ lǝ kolaa , wǝ ni nwǝ ǝmǝ nɛ . Bimuǝ wǝ , lǝ bekpa wǝ bidunko . ”
Nyaso se Yuda lɛyɛ úsu útu Yesu , ókpadi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa ! ” Nya ɔ́fiɔ wǝ lǝ kola .
Nyaso bǝmuǝ Yesu nya bákɔbe wǝ kekleke .
Nya mba díńyǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ eto ɔni dílǝkǝ wǝ kalanle nya óla Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto odomunyǝ eto koto .
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ bitsyi keyi ku nlanle fɛ lǝ bibǝ bimuǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuale ǝsuǝ fe uyu mini ?
Bo ku mi ete lɛkɛ lǝ Disumuyo mfó diyi saa , nya minkɛ mfó mínkate Anantotiki nyamǝ mfó tsya bíǝmmuǝ mɛ . Bǝ lǝ kase Onanto eto Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ lɛtɛyi utsyǝǝ , lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ”
Nya wǝ bakasebi kenke dítsyetsyi báyani wǝ bǝtsyǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ mfoo , okosobi utsyuǝ wǝ nti kafia ǝsuǝ ntǝkǝko wǝǝ , ǝnyǝ lesa nǝ kenke díbǝ . Bamamanyǝ bamǝ ála lǝ bǝmuǝ okosobi ǝmfo . Fɛ ini wǝ kafia ete bákɔbe , nya ɔ́kpɔ
ɔ́bɔ mǝ lǝ ani . Nya útsyǝtsyi údu leyaleya . Nya óyani wǝ kafia ókpe mǝ lǝ ani .
Nya bákpa Yesu bésuko Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto diyo . Mfó nya besumunyǝ beninǝ bamǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa létsya bénsi . Mǝ ni Yudafɔ eto beninǝ .
Petro ǝtǝkǝko mǝ kama kama nya úsu údufǝ lǝ usumunyǝ ninǝ eto diyo nǝmǝ . Nya úsu úsiǝ lǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ ɔ́nlɛ ute bɔyifǝ .
Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ kenke ba dísiǝ mfó ákplatsya babe lǝ boofo kabua kǝtsyuǝ bunyǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ lǝ bayɛ bǝmuǝ wǝ balo . Tsya bámfo kabua saa bunyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bedi etiki bátɛyi bidia lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , tsyaa mba díbǝ eto etiki áta ibu lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya bǝtsyuǝ létaka bátɛyi nya bála wǝ kɛnyɛ bǝnkǝ ,
“ Bɔnɔ bǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mooba Onanto eto Disumuyo nǝ báto mfo , tsya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , muusinkli nto lebamba nǝ bémfi betidi eto ani báto . ’ ”
Fɛɛ mǝ tsya eto etikididi mánkate ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto ale .
Usumunyǝ ninǝ kenke átaka úńyǝ lǝ mǝ nti nya ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Anlɛ etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɔ bɔnɔ ? Embutǝ mbuayɛ ? Be nkpe fǝ fɔɔtɛyi ? ”
Tsya Yesu édi bi , wémfǝ kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi kulesa . Usumunyǝ ninǝ kenke ǝmfo esi ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Nwǝ mǝ Bákpo Ɔhile , Onanto ǝmǝ boatɛsǝ eto Ubi ? ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni . Nya biuunyǝ Utidi Eto Ubi se unsi lǝ Ǝsuǝaletidi Onanto eto kodiani . Nya biunyǝ se unsi lǝ asɔmiloku utsyi kato ɔnlɛ bubǝ ! ”
Lǝ lefe nǝmfó tututuu , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmfo kosate ko léfuadi wǝ awu ku lɛblɔfi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝnkǝ bee ? Badansiɛ sa nńsife itǝ bo bio itsyi lǝ mba ńyǝ mfo kama !
Údi mbusiotiki úńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ! Ntsyǝ binyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? ” Nya mǝmblɛ lɛtɔnɔ bálo wǝ dikpi bǝ ele bǝ ukpǝ .
Mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ étsyiko ntufǝ butufǝ kákpo Yesu . Nya bákle wǝ ǝnǝmi nya bétsyiko wǝ bɔsɔ . Nya bánlɛ wǝ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo futsyǝ lɛsɔ fǝ ! ” Nya bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ lékpa Yesu bédunko , nya básɔ wǝ lǝ atosi .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Petro ébubǝ úsi lǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ eto diyo fɛ usiobi wǝ nkpe wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ díbǝ .
Lefe nǝ únyǝ Petro nsi lǝ uté ɔflɔ ɔnlɛ wǝ bɔyifǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya ébutǝkǝko Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ ǝnyǝ ! ”
Nya Petro dítudi kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bee ? Mánnɔ lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo eto kasɔ ! ” Nya ótaka údu úsu úńyǝ lǝ kesiǝ ɔflɔ . Kase óyo kǝsiǝ kamǝ ko ukusǝ ko dítǝ kɛnyɛ .
Usiobi ǝmfo esi úbǝ mfó úbǝ óbe wǝ , nya usi útsyiko betidi ba díńyǝ mfó bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Osani ǝmfo eyifo mǝ nti eto ɔni ! ”
Tsya Petro esi útudi kɛnyɛ nko ke . Yanklɛ fɛ mba ńyǝ mfó lɛtɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yanle bǝ ani fǝ enni mǝ ɔni , itsyise fintsya etsyi Galilea eto kasɔ . ”
Nya Petro léfa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ekpe lǝ Onanto bǝ lǝ sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyii , lǝ unǝ mɛ koto ! Minyi utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bɛnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko mfo ! ”
Lamfolamfo , ukusɛ ko disi útǝ kɛnyɛ dinuǝfǝ , nya Petro lékloma nkǝ Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ dinuǝfǝǝ , ǝbutudi kɛnyɛ sitsyǝ fǝ enyi mɛ . ” Nya ílǝ Petro lǝ utu nya úwi keku .
Olesiǝnto ǝmfóo , besumunyǝ ninǝ , átsya ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku Yudafɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko kenke . Se béfi nsusu lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝ ku kase bɔɔyɛ ku nnya . Bákle Yesu nya bákpa wǝ bésuko Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Ninǝ itǝ Romafɔ eto Aba wǝ baakpo Pilato ɔflɔ .
Mfóo , Pilato átɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ? ” Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ee , lǝ kase fanlɛ bɔtɛyi . ”
Besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ála etiki kpǝ bǝtǝkǝ Yesu .
Nyaso Pilato esi ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ǝmbulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ etiki saa ǝsuǝ ? Tsyue koto lanɔ etiki nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
Tsya , Yesu ménsitɛyi kulesa , nyaso íyifo Pilato yanii !
Lefe saa lǝ eyo nkomǝ eto diyididi ǝsuǝǝ , íyifo Pilato eto lekpa nǝ ókayani betidi bua ba bákpe lǝ diyo eto ɔni wǝ bála kǝtǝ mǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , bǝmuǝ osani wǝ baakpo Baraba bákpe le diyo . Úyifo futsyǝ lɛkɛ lǝ betidi ba létaka bǝnyǝ lǝ Romafɔ eto Aba ǝsuǝ nti . Nya lǝ kudu ko bákpo bǝlǝ betidi ku betidi ba bálo esoo , bǝmuǝ wǝ ku mba dítǝkǝko wǝ bákpe lǝ a Aba eto diyo .
Nyaso se betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyaa , bátɛyi Pilato bǝnkǝ okloma kase wǝǝnyǝ mba baakpe lǝ ayo kaminsǝ fe kase wókala buyifo lɛlɛ saa .
Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bela biǝnkǝ nyani Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ntǝ mi ? ”
Pilato átɔ mǝ nko itsyise óte nkǝ kekisi ǝsuǝ eso besumunyǝ ninǝ lékpa Yesu báboko wǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ lídi betidi bamǝ bákpe bǝnkǝ bátɛyi Pilato bǝnkǝ , óyani Baraba bomu utǝ mǝ .
Pilato esi údi betidi eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ etiki nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be bela biǝ nyifo ku utidi ǝmǝ biakpo biǝ Yudafɔ eto Oka mfo ? ”
Nya báfa bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
Pilato átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte kabua ka úyifo eso ? ” Tsya , mǝmblɛ esi báfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
Se Pilato léla nkǝ weeyifo lǝ mǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ esoo , óyani Baraba útǝ mǝ . Nya útǝ béfi kekuefiofio báblɛ Yesu , nya úfi wǝ ókpe lǝ bamamanyǝ eto ani nkǝ besu basɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Bamamanyǝ bamǝ ákpa Yesu bésuko Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Ninǝ eto diyo nya bákpadi bamamanyǝ fɛfɛ bǝ bǝbǝ mfó .
Nya béfi kafia sia eto awu bákpe Yesu fe Oka nya béyifo biyu eto lekpakpa béti wǝ lǝ disi fe lekankpakpa .
Nya banlɛ wǝ kɔfiɔ bokpe ákatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yuu , yuuduu , ! Yudafɔ eto Oka lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ kɛntsyɛɛ ! ”
Básɔ wǝ lǝ disi ku lekete nya bétufǝ ntufǝ bákpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya báse akonki lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ bákpe disi kasɔ ku dibu bǝtǝ wǝ .
Se bǝmǝ wǝ nya bákpe wǝ kofani bálosǝǝ , bǝlǝkǝ awu sia nyamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bésinkliko nnya ókpe kɔ bákpe wǝ . Nya bákpa wǝ bésuko kaka bɔsɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝ bántɔɔ , bátsyako osani wǝ baakpo Simon wǝ ditsyi dibutu ɔ́ntɔ lǝ Yerusalem . Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamǝ áhiɛ wǝ bǝnkǝ ɔwunsǝko Yesu lǝ utsyinko wǝ uyikabie ǝmǝ . Simon ǝmfó etsyi Sireni eto kasɔ , nya wǝ bebi ni Aleksandra ku Rufo .
Bákpa Yesu bésuko kaka baakpo Ditidisikɔbe .
Mfó bǝtǝ wǝ nte bo bátsyakasǝ ku kofa ko loobokosǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamǝ kasɔ bǝ unǝ , fɛɛ Yesu áni wǝnǝǝ .
Nnya kamaa , bamamanyǝ bamǝ ásɔ wǝ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nya béfi afetu bákpo básɛ lǝ bate lekpa nǝ luutu utsyuǝ saa fɛ bésense awu nyamǝ bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Básɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ lǝ olesiǝ ǝmfó eto abombo ɔwɔnɔmbǝ lefe .
Nya báwɔni asa lɛ otabo kɛkɛ ǝsuǝ básɔ lǝ wǝ disi kato nnya nlɛ bote lesa nǝ eso bálo wǝ ni bǝnkǝ , “ Ǝnyǝ Yudafɔ Eto Oka . ”
Nya básɔ beyu inuǝ tsya lǝ eyi ǝsuǝ báwunsǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Ɔni áfaka lǝ wǝ kodiani eto kutsyǝ nya ɔni tsya léfaka lǝ kǝmǝni .

Mba kenke lɛyɛ mfó bafe étinkǝsǝ mǝ esi bákpe Yesu kɔfiɔ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɛhɛɛ ! Inni fǝ lɛtɛyi fǝ eboba bo Disumuyo kplɛ akpo lǝ kasɔ esinkli ato kǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ kɛɛ ?
Yifǝ ǝbǝ kasɔ lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko ukpǝ eto ani lǝ bobe ! ”
Nko kǝ basumufɔ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa bamǝ tsya dímǝ wǝ bátɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Úlǝkǝ betidi bamba utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ wembofo wǝ ǝsuǝ bulǝkǝ ketsyiko lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ !
Lǝ wǝ baakpo Israelfɔ eto oka , wǝ ni Kristo ǝmǝǝ , wǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ sitintii , ulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ɔyifǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ubǝ kasɔ bǝ lǝ bofo bɔnɔ ! ” Betidi inuǝ ba básɔ bafakasǝ lǝ eyikabie ǝsuǝ ku Yesu mfóo , tsya áka wǝ .
Se éyo kakɔmi lefee , kasɔ mfó kenke ko léna . Nya ítsyǝ nko ísu ése abombo etsyǝ .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Yesu áfa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Eli , Eli , lama sabaktani ? ” Etiki nyamfo eto kasɔ ni bǝ , “ Mɔ Onanto , mɔ Onanto ! Beso fáyani mɛ fǝtsyǝ ? ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ díńyǝ mfó ánɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi , nya bátɛyi bǝtsyuǝ bǝ , “ Ɔlɛ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia bokpadi . ”
Mǝ ɔni étsyetsyi úsu úfi okosa wǝ bákpe lǝ ntǝ eto sonkpe ǝsuǝ nya óbesǝ wǝ kato ku uyi útǝ Yesu nkǝ unǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi bafɛfɛ nkǝ , “ Bińyǝ lǝ bobe ! Bitǝ lǝ bobe lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia ebubǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ uyikabie komfo ǝsuǝ ! ”
Nya Yesu léfa bembembe nya úkpǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ tutuutuu , kafia kplɛ ka léfakanya kéti Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo eto Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke eto ǝnǝmii , léfuadi lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ itsyii kato ibǝ kasɔ .
Nya se omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lɛnɔ Yesu eto bofa nya únyǝ kase úkpǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Sitinti utidi ǝmfo eyifo Onanto eto Ubi . ”
Besionko bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ bákabe . Maria Magdalene ku Salome ku Maria nwǝ eto bebi ni Yakobo kɛkɛ ku Yosef , akɛ mǝ lenti .
Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛkɛ lǝ Galileaa , mǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ bákawunsǝ ko wǝ nɛ . Besionko bamba kpǝ ba dítǝkǝko wǝ bésu Yerusalem tsya ǝńyǝ mfó .
Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ lǝ diyi nǝ bǝǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ lǝ kofe edufǝ diyoo , lǝ bedi Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto diyi . Nya se kale nlɛ boloo ,
Yudafɔ eto okponkpo ɔni wǝ baakpo Yosef wǝ ditsyi Arimatea eto uninǝ , ákpe ɔkɔɛ úsu únyǝ Pilato . Yosef éyifo Yudafɔ eto Uninǝ kplɛ wǝ lɛkɛ dibu nya úkabe kusu itǝ Onanto eto Sekakedidi eto bubǝ . Se óyo Pilato ɔflɔɔ , ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ utǝ wǝ kusu lǝ usu ulǝkǝ Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ usu ubikǝ fɛ lǝ eyo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝmǝ .
Se Pilato lɛnɔ nkǝ Yesu ébukpǝ kokoo , íyifo wǝ naa . Nyaso ókpadi wǝ omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ etsyuesa nyamfó eto kɛnyɛ , nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ lǝ sitinti ini bǝ Yesu ébukpǝ koko .
Nya se uninǝ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ ɔnukualɛ inii , Pilato ǝtǝ Yosef kusu nkǝ usu ulǝkǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ .
Nya Yosef dísu úlǝkǝ Yesu eto ɔkɔ nya úfi kafia kpaa fɔfɔ ka óya úmli wǝ . Nya úfi wǝ úsu úbikǝ lǝ kudi ko bǝlǝkǝ lǝ koba kǝmiǝ bǝtsyǝ koko lǝ kɔtini ɔflɔ . Nya útǝ nkǝ baminansǝ leba kplɛ lɔni beti lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Maria Magdalene ku Maria wǝ ni Yosef eto ambe ǝńyǝ mfó nya bábe kaka bébikǝ Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ .
Kǝsiǝsǝ eto ditsyitsyoo , lefe nǝ békedi Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi bálosǝǝ , Maria Magdalene ku Maria wǝ ni Yakobo eto ambe ku Salome ésu báya nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi bǝnkǝ beesu bediki Yesu eto ɔkɔ .
Nyaso se kale dísiǝ kɔsida eto olesiǝǝ , bátaka bésu kudi komǝ eti .
Se bántɔɔ , bákatɔ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe buunyǝ lɔminansǝ leba kplɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ utǝ bo ? ” Bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ nko itsyise leba nǝmǝ amɔ tinti . Nya se bésu bédufǝ mfóo , bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ futsyǝ ébubǝ ɔ́minansǝ leba nǝmǝ lǝ mfó .

Nyaso se bédufǝ kudi komǝ kafoo , bǝnyǝ okosobi utsyuǝ se únsi lǝ kodiani . Nya ónkpe awu nnya diflubi futututu ! Difufu ǝmuǝ mǝ .
Nya okosobi ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Nyi minkǝ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝmǝ bɛnlɛ bɔbɛbɛ , nwǝ básɔ báfakǝsǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Umbǝ mfo ! Ótaka okpe nkpǝ ! Bebe ! Mfo bálabesǝ wǝ nɛ .
Nyaso bisu bɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi ku Petro tsya biǝnkǝ , ‘ Yesu tɔ mi sɛtɔ , ɔtɔ lǝ Galilea . Mfó ti biunyǝ wǝ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi mi utsyǝ . ’ ”
Nyamfo ákpe besionko bamǝ difufu , nya bédu lǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ ku ketinkǝ , bánte lesa nǝ beeyifo , nya bákpe etsyi ani . Kase bánkpe lǝ kusu bántɔɔ , bántɛyi kuutsyuǝ kulesa , itsyise sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ .
Se Yesu létaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ Kɔsida komfo eto olesiǝǝ , utidi tutɛ wǝ úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte ni Maria Magdalenyǝ , nwǝ ǝsuǝ óla awɔnɔ bua akuanse utsyiko lǝ lefe nǝ ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Úsu ɔ́tɛyi Yesu eto bayɛtsyuǝ ba nlɛ nku buwi lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝmǝ eso .
Nya se Maria lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ Yesu kpe nkpǝ nya únyǝ wǝǝ , bámfo wǝ bánɔ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte bakasebi inuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bányɛ lǝ kusu bántɔ . Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ betsyǝ lekpo mlǝ .
Kama se bésu bátee , bésinkli bésu bátɛyi bafɛfɛ . Tsyaa , mbamǝ mámfo mǝ bánɔ .
Fɛfɛfɛɛ , Yesu ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ lefosi bakasebi ɔnwɛ lǝ lefe nǝ bénsi bánlɛ budi . Nyaso únyenki ókpe mǝ lǝ kase mǝ bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale , nya betidi ato fefe , se bamfó betidi ba díkǝnyǝ wǝ se ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ bofo kanɔ .
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu kawunsiǝ kenke lǝ bebe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ditsya bitǝ betidi ba kenke .
Utidi wǝ lefo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ɔnɔ nya utǝ bǝǝflǝsǝ wǝ ntuu , Onanto ebufi wǝ abua ɔtsyǝ wǝ . Nya utidi wǝ dimamfo ɔnɔɔ , Onanto embofo wǝ .
Nya Onanto ebutǝ bafokanɔfɔ lǝ mɛɛ , ǝsuǝale beyifo ayanisa kpǝ . Boola awɔnɔ bua lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝ . Bɔɔtɛyi belebele kpǝ bia benyi .
Nya lǝ bǝmuǝ owa nye bǝnǝ kenii , yembuyifo mǝ kabua saa . Lǝ bǝtǝkǝ befimfi anii , boomuǝ ale . ”
Lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu dídi mǝ etiki ólosǝ mfó eto kamaa , Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato kaka wuunsi lǝ kakplɛkɔ lǝ wǝ Anto ɔflɔ lǝ kodiani .
Nya wǝ batɔnkpe létsyilama nlebe saa kenke bátɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Nya Onamute ǝmǝ dísiǝ ko mǝ ɔ́wunsǝko mǝ nya béyifo ayanisa nnya lete bǝ mǝ ditiki nǝmǝ eyifo ɔnukualɛ ɛyɛ lǝ ayanisa kpǝ nnya béyifo ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ ɔyimisani Tiofilo , betidi kpǝ ákplatsya kase boofo , lǝ bawɔni lesa saa nǝ díbǝ lǝ bo nti bǝtsyǝ .
Báwɔni nnya fe kase betidi ba dínyǝ asa nyamfó lɛtɛyi bo idu lǝ nnya kasɔ ketsyikokɔ nya bábe Onanto eto Ditiki nǝmǝ letsya báte tsya .
Nyaso , Tiofilo lala , se míndufǝ lǝ asa nyamfo mínto nnya mímbe kenke idu lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ke esoo , mfi nsusu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ minkǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ nwɔni asa nyamfo lǝ ekpa ɛyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ mfi ntǝ fǝ .
Nlɛ nyamfo buyifo nko bǝ lǝ ǝnyǝ ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝmǝ bǝ lǝ ate asa nnya báte fǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝ Herodes lídi seka lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto eto usumunyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Sakaria akɛ mfó . Ɔ́bɔ utsyi lǝ besumunyǝ ba lǝǝtǝ kedi eto ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Abia ǝsuǝ . Sakaria eto usiǝ wǝ baakpo Elisabet tsya ábɔ utsyi lǝ Onanto eto Usumunyǝ wǝ baakpo Aaron éto kafo ǝsuǝ .
Usǝ ku usiǝ bamfo ǝsiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ . Nya béyifo lǝ wǝ afi kenke ǝsuǝ kukunɔ .
Ubi saa mankɛ mǝ , itsyise Elisabet anle . Nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ tsya ébobe báfe .
Diyi lɔnii , Sakaria akɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Kedikǝtǝkɔ ɔlɛ wǝ Kesumuyifo buyifo itsyise wǝ ditsyukpa ítu .
Nya lǝ mǝ kesumu eto lekpa ǝsuǝǝ , bákpo básɛ bǝnyǝ bǝ Sakaria ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ ítǝkǝ . Nyaso wǝ ni nwǝ bǝlǝkǝ bǝ usu otonsǝ elufui utǝ Onanto lǝ Kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya údufǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ .
Nya lefe nǝ ɔkɛ mfó ɔnlɛ elufui botonsǝǝ , betidi fɛfɛ ǝńyǝ lǝ lekple balɛ ola boto .
Mfó Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ kaka ɔnlɛ elufui botonsǝ eto sediani dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ .
Se Sakaria dínyǝ wǝǝ , óyakla nya óte sikpi tinti .
Fɛɛ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe emfó átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sakaria , mante sikpi ! Onanto ánɔ fǝ olatoto , nya fǝ usiǝ Elisabet ebole ubisaibi utǝ fǝ . Nya fuutǝkǝ wǝ diye fǝnkǝ Yohanes .
