Lǝ wǝ bole ǝsuǝǝ , ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti . Nko ke tsya betidi kpǝ luunyǝ disuǝyuǝ nɛ .
Woofiani utidi kplɛ lǝ Bonamute eto ǝnǝmi . Yanle bǝ unǝ ntǝ bo nkpe ale nye ntǝ saa eto okle tsya . Nya idu lǝ wǝ lelefee , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ebusiǝ ko wǝ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Israel bebi ebusinkli bǝbǝ mǝ Onamute Onanto ɔflɔ .
Wǝ ni nwǝ lɔɔtɔ Bonamute eto bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ku utu bokpe ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia dítsyǝ . Nya wuutǝ diyuǝ luubǝ bebi ku antomǝ nti . Nya wuunǝ koto tsyuetsyue okpe lǝ betidi ba ditidi ato ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bekefi nsusu sɛɛ bayɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ Bonamute eto betidi lǝ bǝsiǝ bakabe kusu itǝ wǝ bubǝ . ”
Mfó nya Sakaria lɛtɔ ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfó nkǝ , “ Be luutǝ bǝ mfo nyamfo nnɔ ? Itsyise mbobe mfiani uninǝsǝ nya mɔ usiǝ tsya díkafiani uninǝsiǝ . ”
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni Gabriel wǝ lǝǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Wǝ létsyese mɛ nkǝ ntɛyi fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo .
Fɛɛ ámamfo mɔ kɛnyɛ eto dikiti nǝmfo ánɔ . Ite bǝ ámamfo anɔ tsyaa , yuubǝ itǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto dítsyue útsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Se fámamfo ánɔ eso ebofiani ɔmumu isu ese lefe nǝ diyi nǝmǝ léyo fɛ fǝ odiakami looyankli edi etiki . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ asa nyamfo kenke díbǝǝ , íyifo betidi ba kenke díńyǝ bensekǝ Sakaria lǝ lekple mfó yanii , itsyise bánte lesa nǝ eso éfo wǝ lefe kpǝ nko lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ nko .
Se ɔ́bɔ úbǝ lekplee , wénsifo mǝ etiki budinko . Nyaso bǝnyǝ bǝ únyǝ bulǝkǝkate butsyuǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ mfó . Nyaso ɔ́nnlɛ etiki bofo budi nɛ , ini ani ete úfi ɔ́nlɛ mǝ etiki budi .
Se Sakaria eto kesumu eto lefe léloo , úsinkli úsu diyo .
Nyamfó eto kamaa , Elisabet ésu ɔ́lɛ kafo , itǝ eso wénsikabɔ kesu umǝ bio . Nya ɔ́kula ǝsuǝ itǝ afa anɔ sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
Lǝ nnya eso Elisabet átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , be asa nnya Bonamute díyifo útǝ mɛɛ , nya úlǝkǝ kofani lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi . ”
Lǝ Elisabet eto kafolɛlɛ eto kofa kuande ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto átsyese wǝ ɔtɔnkpe Gabriel nkǝ usu umǝ wǝ baakpo Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ .
Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo étsyi kɛnyɛ úsuko kebitɛ ka bátɔ bǝtǝ osani wǝ baakpo Yosef wǝ ditsyi Oka David eto kafo . Kebitɛ kamǝ eto diye ni Maria .
Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo ǝbǝ Maria ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nsiǝsǝ fǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ! Fǝǝ bǝnǝ kafo ! Bonamute si ko fǝ . ”
Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmfo eto kɛnyɛ ka óboko éyifo Maria yanii , nya itǝ wǝ disibubu lǝ kǝsiǝ kamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Maria , mante sikpi . Onanto ǝnǝ fǝ kafo tinti .
Ebɔlɛ kafo nya foole ubisaibi , nya fuutǝkǝ wǝ diye fǝ Yesu .
Woofo diye tinti nya bookpo wǝ bǝ Onanto wǝ ni Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto ubi . Nya Boanto Onanto luutǝ nkǝ ubi ǝmǝ di seka fe wǝ ona Oka David ke .
Nya wuudi seka lǝ Yakob eto kafo eto bebi ǝsuǝ isu manlo manlo . Nya wǝ sekakedikɔ embolo kulefe kulefe . ”
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Maria átɔ Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ nyamfo loofo bubǝ kǝtǝ , se minyi osani ? ”
Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ebɔyifǝ disiǝ lǝ fǝ nya Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke eto ǝsuǝale loola disiǝ lǝ fǝ . Nyaso ubi wǝ foole ebuyifo Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ nya bookpo wǝ bǝ Onanto eto Ubisaibi .
Mɔmɔɔ , nla miǝ lǝ ate fǝ , fǝ otokpenyǝ wǝ baakpo Elisabet wǝ ni uninǝsiǝ wǝ baakpo okonɔ , fe ɔ́lɛ kafo kofa kuande nɛ .
Itsyise kulesa ǝmbǝ ale itǝ Onanto eto buyifo . ”
Nya Maria lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bee , Boanto Onanto eto uyifoyifo mini . Utǝ ibǝ itǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase fátɛyi . ” Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ dídu .
Lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Maria ǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ mlǝmlǝmlǝ nya ɔ́kɔse úsu Yudea eto umǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ atini nti . Usu Sakaria eto diyo nya úsiǝsǝ Elisabet .

Se Elisabet lɛnɔ Maria eto kǝsiǝ kamǝǝ , ubi wǝ lɛkɛ wǝ lǝ kafo ko lɛkpɔ , nya Elisabet díyi ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kenke .
Mfó nya óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bákpo fǝ atsyɔ lǝ besio kenke nti , nya bákpo ubi wǝ fǝǝbǝ bole tsya atsyɔ !
Fɛɛ ntsyǝ minyǝ disi ɛkpɛ mmǝ bǝ mɔ Onamute eto ambe lǝ ubǝ mɔ ɔflɔ ?
Akpa akpa se mínɔ fǝ kǝsiǝǝ , ubi wǝ nkpe mɛ lǝ kafo ábe ósa ku disuǝyuǝ .
Disuǝyuǝ itǝ fǝ sitinti , itsyise áfo kɛnyɛ ka Bonamute létsyese fǝ ánɔ bǝ yuubǝ itǝ nko . ”
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , nya Maria lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ okla lɛ mɔ Onamute bɔtɛsǝ .
Nya mɔ lɛwɔnɔ nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ lǝ fǝ Onanto wǝ ni mɔ Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ ,
itsyise ókloma únǝ mɛ kafo , mɔ , wǝ uyifoyifo wǝ dimanle kulesa . Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ebokpo mɛ bǝ nwǝ bákpo atsyɔ .
Itsyise Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke éyifo asa kplɛ útǝ mɛ , nya wǝ diye eyifo kɛnkɛ .
Wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ kpe lefe saa itǝ wǝ bebi eto bebi ba kenke lǝǝtǝ wǝ dibu .
Wǝ kɔni éyifo asa kplɛ , nya úsensǝ mba laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ mǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ .
Óbokosǝ baka kplɛ kasɔ lǝ mǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ , nya óbesǝ mba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , kato .
Útǝ nkǝ betidi ba kukpɛnsɛ nlɛ kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ asa sɛɛ bedi bemi tɔ , nya óla batabinyǝ ótsyese ani fufu .
Ókloma kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ útǝ bó bana eto bana , nya úbǝ ɔnlɛ Israel eto kuse eto betidi kenke bɔwunsǝko .
Ókloma ɔlɛ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ bufi kǝtǝ Abraham ku wǝ bebi eto bebi isu manlo manlo ! ”
Maria ákɛ lǝ Elisabet ɔflɔ fenkǝ afa ǝtsyǝ fɛ úsinkli úsu oto .
Se Elisabet eto ubi eto lelefe léyoo , óle ubisaibi .
Nya Elisabet eto bayotsya ku wǝ batokpenyǝ lɛnɔ asa sɛɛ nnya Bonamute ǝmǝ díyifo útǝ wǝ . Nya mǝmblɛ dínyǝnko wǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
Se ubi ǝmǝ léfo eyi mflamflaa , bǝbǝ bǝnkǝ baala wǝ lelo nya bála bǝ lǝ befi wǝ anto eto diye Sakaria bǝtǝkǝ wǝ .
Fɛɛ wǝ ambe mántɔnɔko mǝ nko nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kpa o-o ! Bifi diye Yohanes bitǝkǝ wǝ . ”
Mfó bétsyiko etiki bunǝ ku wǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ otokpenyǝ saa ǝmbǝ baakpo nko . ”
Nya bátɔ wǝ anto lǝ ani eto eyifosa ǝsuǝ bǝ ote diye nǝ woala nkǝ bǝfi bǝtǝkǝ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ .
Mfó nya Sakaria léfo leba nǝ ǝsuǝ baawɔni asa kǝtǝkǝ nya ɔ́wɔni nkǝ , “ Wǝ diye ni Yohanes . ” Nya íyifo mǝmblɛ yanii .
Lamfolamfo Sakaria étsyiko etiki budi nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto .
Sikpi ǝmuǝ mba wonko mǝ nsi lǝ koyotsya nya ítǝ ditiki nǝmfo dísensǝ dísu kǝmǝ kpǝ lǝ Yudea eto atini ǝsuǝ mfó kenke .
Betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ asa nyamfo etsyiko disi bubu katɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte utidi wǝ eto okle ubi ǝmfo luubǝ ofiani ? ” Itsyise ílǝkǝ ete wuee bǝ , Bonamute eto kɔni tǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mfó nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛyifǝ dísiǝ lǝ ubi ǝmǝ eto anto Sakaria ǝsuǝ nya údi Onanto etiki ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ nkǝ ,
“ Atɛsǝ itǝ Bonamute , Israel eto Onanto , itsyise úbǝ nkǝ woawunsǝko wǝ kuse nya lǝ ulǝkǝ mǝ .
Úlǝkǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ Kplɛ útǝ bo lǝ Oka David wǝǝ ni wǝ eto uyifoyifo eto kafo eto ubi .
Útsyǝ kɛnyɛ kamfó kokooko ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
wuulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ balo ku mba leekisi bo kenke eto ani .
Ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ wuunyǝ bo banamǝ kaminsǝ nya wookloma kɛnyɛ ka ókle ku mǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi bo anto Abraham kɛnyɛ klekle kamfo utsyǝ nkǝ ,
wuulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ bo balo eto ani , nya wookpe bo ǝsuǝale busumu wǝ sikpi manté manté .
Nya wuuyifo bo kɛnkɛ bǝ lǝ buyifo mba nyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ bo nkpǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
Nya fǝ , mɔ ubi , bookpo fǝ bǝnkǝ Onanto wǝ nso kenke eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi . Ɛbɔtɔ̃ Onamute ǝmǝ eto bubǝ nya fɔɔlɔ kusu ǝtsyǝ itǝ wǝ .
Nya ebutǝ wǝ betidi te bǝ boonyǝ bofokǝtǝ itsyise boofi mǝ abua batsyɛ mǝ .
Bo Onanto kpe lefonǝ nya woabe bo ku kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ . Wuutǝ bofokǝtǝ eto diyǝnde bǝ itǝ bo itsyi kato .
Nya wuutǝ diyǝnde nǝmfo nkǝ dibǝ ditǝ lekpasǝ itǝ mba nkpe lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ ku mba nkpe lǝ ukpǝ eto sikpitete ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ okpa bo ɔyɛnko udufǝnko diyuǝ eto kusu ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya ubi ǝmǝ lébe nya ɔkɛ ale lǝ ǝsuǝ ku lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya úsiǝ lǝ mfiminti isu ese lefe nǝ ɔ́bɔ úbǝ Israel eto kuse eto ǝnǝmi .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Romamfɔ eto Okankplɛ Kaisare Augusto ǝtǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bawɔni betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ Roma eto sekakedikɔ eto kasɔ eto aye .
Nya ni betidi eto aye wɔniwɔni tutɛ nɛ , lǝ Aba eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Kirenio eto Sekadidi lǝ Siria eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso utidi saa ésu wǝ umǝ lǝ usu ɔwɔni wǝ diye .
Lefe nǝmfo nya Yosef tsya létaka útsyi Nasaret eto umǝ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ úsu Betlehem eto umǝ lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ lǝ kaka bále Oka David . Yosef ésu mfó itsyise uyifo Oka David eto kafo eto ubi .
Ókpa Maria wǝ bátɔ bǝtǝ wǝ nya ɔnlɛ kafo tsya ɔ́yɛnko nkǝ lǝ ɔwɔni wǝ diye .
Nya lefe nǝ bakɛ lǝ Betlehem mfóo , lefe áyo Maria bǝ ole .
Óle wǝ ubi tutɛ wǝ ni osaibi lǝ diyo nǝ bebuki laalabe . Nya úfi kafia úmini wǝ , nya úfi wǝ ólabesǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ bebuki bamfó leedi lesa , itsyise kasɔnɔkɔ mánkɛ lǝ bafɔ eto kedufǝkɔ .
Lǝ kasɔ kamǝ ǝsuǝ mfóo , mba laabe basamu bǝtsyuǝ akɛ mfo kabe mǝ bebuki ketsye ka kenke .
Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte mǝ nya Onanto ǝmǝ eto diyǝnde ǝyǝnde ekpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eso bate sikpi tinti !
Fɛɛ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi . Mboko mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ looboko disuǝyuǝ ku diyuǝ tinti itǝ betidi ba kenke .
Nya lǝ mmi eto diyi nǝmfoo , bále Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ ni Bonamute Kristo bǝtǝ mi lǝ Oka David eto umǝ .
Nya lesa nǝ biufi binyǝ bitsyǝ lekpoo , ni bǝ biunyǝ ubisambi wǝ béfi kafia bémli nya onlabe lǝ bebuki eto kedikɔ . ”
Lefe nǝmfo tutuutu , Onanto eto batɔnkpe eto ditsyukpa kplɛ lɔni étsyi kato díbǝ bǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte , nya bákɔ ku ɔtɔnkpe ɔni ǝmfó nya banlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ ,
“ Dibu ku atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe kato fanlofanlo , nya diyuǝsǝ itǝ kasɔ eto betidi ba kenke lǝǝdufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ ! ”
Nya lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe bamfo dídu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ bésinkli bésu katoo , mba laabe basamu bamǝ átɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ busu Betlehem lǝ busu bobe asa nnya díbǝ fe kase Boanto dílǝkǝ óte bo . ”
Nyaso bákɔse bésu nya bǝnyǝ Maria ku Yosef ku ubisambi wǝ nlabe lǝ bebuki eto kedikɔ mfó .
Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝ nkoo , bátɛyi lesa saa nǝ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ itsyi lǝ ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝmfo se betidi ba kenke lɛnɔ mba laabe basamu bamǝ eto etiki nyamfoo , íyifo mǝ yani tinti .
Maria ákloma asa nyamfo kenke nya úkebu disi ketsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ etsyo .
Lefe nǝmfóo , se mba laabe basamu bamǝ dísinklii , bátɛsǝ Onanto lǝ lesa saa nǝ bánɔ ku bǝnyǝ tsya ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamblɛ kenke ǝbǝ itǝ pɛpɛɛpɛ fe kase Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ .
Nya lǝ diyi mflamflale ǝsuǝ , se lefe léyo bǝ bala ubi ǝmǝ leloo , bǝtǝkǝ wǝ diye bǝnkǝ Yesu fe kase Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi utsyǝ fɛ bálɛ wǝ kafo .
Lefe áyo itǝ bǝ Yosef ku Maria yifo ǝsuǝ eto okla buflǝ eto lekpa fe kase Moses eto kɔfi lɛtɔ . Nyaso bákpa ubisambi ǝmǝ tsya bésuko Yerusalem bǝ lǝ befi wǝ bakpe Bonamute lǝ ani .
Nko ini báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kɔfi eto kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ubisaibi tutɛ ku ubuki sende tutɛ saa , ele bǝ bǝlǝkǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ kutsyǝ befi bakpe Bonamute lǝ ani . ”
Nyaso bésu Yerusalem bǝ lǝ befi kedi bǝtǝ Bonamute lǝ kase kɔfi lɛtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ablonima ǝnuǝ nye ablɛkpa ǝnuǝ beefi kǝtǝ kedi kamǝ .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , osani utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Simeon ákɛ lǝ Yerusalem . Nya úyifo utidi sɛɛ wǝ laate Onanto sikpi nya uńyǝ ɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ Israel eto bulǝkǝ . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dísiǝko wǝ ,
nya lése wǝ uyi nkǝ weembukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ eto lefe uunyǝ Onanto eto Nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ , wǝ eto etiki Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝ .
Lefe nǝmfoo , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝmǝ ákpa Simeon úsuko Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó . Nya se anto ku ambe bamǝ lékpa ubisambi Yesu ǝmǝ bésukoo , bátɛyi bǝ bǝbǝ bǝ beyifo lesa saa nǝ ele bǝ beyifo bǝtǝ wǝ fe kase kɔfi létee ,
Simeon áfo ubisambi ǝmǝ ɔ́lɛ lǝ wǝ ani , nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Boanto Onanto , mɔmɔɔ , se fékeyifo lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ebofo mɛ kusu bulǝkǝ , mɔ fǝ usumunyǝ , bǝ lǝ nsu lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ kosate ébufi mɔ ǝnǝmi nnyǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝmǝ
fǝtǝ fǝ ubǝ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto betidi kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ ku dinǝmi .
Wǝ ni diyǝnde nǝ luulǝkǝ lesa nǝ faala lǝ lekple lete betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ . Nya wuufi dibu oboko fǝ kusǝ Israel eto betidi eto nti . ”
Asa nnya Simeon lɛtɛyi mfo éyifo Yosef ku Maria yanii .
Nya Simeon lékpo mǝ atsyɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi ubi ǝmǝ eto ambe Maria nkǝ , “ Ubi ǝmfo eyifo Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . Nya wǝ ni Ofomfokǝtǝ nye budukanɔ itǝ Israel bebi kpǝ . Uyifo lekpotsyǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ , nya betidi kpǝ lootaka bǝnyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya wuutǝ nkǝ betidi kpǝ lǝkǝ mǝ nsusu bo bakula bate utsyuǝ saa nyǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ esoo , ebunyǝ kanyi fe kase lesiabi laase utidi eto utu kedunsǝ . ”
Mfó ǝmǝǝ , usio ɔni utsyuǝ wǝ ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi ákɛ mfo baakpo bǝ Hana . Nya wǝ anto Fanuel étsyi Aser eto kafo . Alɛ akuanse hã úsiǝ ku wǝ usǝ fɛ usǝ ǝmǝ díkpǝ . Nya úyifo ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ lébe bembembe . Ófo alɛ fosi mflamfla alɛ ana . Úkesu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfo lefe saa , ákatɛsǝ Onanto ketsye ku kakɔmi nya úkato ola kákle kɛnyɛ tsya .

Lǝ lefe nǝmfó tutuutuu , wuntsya ǝbǝ ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ betidi ba kenke ńyǝ banlɛ Onanto kusu bobe bǝ wuulǝkǝ Yerusalem .
Nya se Yosef ku Maria lélosǝ mǝ lekpa nǝmǝ buyifo fe kase Onanto eto kɔfi letee , bésinkli bésu mǝ umǝ Nasaret lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ .
Ubi ǝmǝ ábe ɔ́bɔ disi nya ɔ́kɛ ǝsuǝale , nya óte kobe tinti . Nya Onanto dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛɛ , Yesu eto anto ku ambǝ ékesu Yerusalem késu kédi diyi nǝ baakpo Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila .
Nyaso se Yesu léfo lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝǝ , bési bésu Yerusalem fe kase békeyifo kɔ seka .
Nya se bédi diyi nǝmǝ bálosǝ nya banlɛ businkli kesu mǝ umǝǝ , Yesu wǝ esi ɔ́kɛ kama lǝ Yerusalem mfó . Fɛɛ wǝ anto ku ambe mánte nko .
Mǝ ébu bǝnkǝ ɔkɛ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti nyaso bédu báyɛ diyi wɔlɔlɔlɔ eto kusu fɛ bétsyiko wǝ bɔbɛbɛ lǝ bahɔ ku batokpenyǝ nti .
Nya se bǝnnyǝ wǝ esoo , bésinkli bésu Yerusalem bésu balɛ wǝ bɔbɛbɛ .
Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝǝ , bésu bǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo kaka wǝ ku Yudafɔ eto bateasa nsi . Mfó úsiǝ ɔnlɛ mǝ asa nnya bánlɛ bɔtɛyi ato butsyue nya ɔnlɛ mǝ etiki bɔtɔ lɔni lɔni kanɔ .
Nya mba lɛnɔ asa nnya díkabɔ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛɛ , íyifo mǝ yanii lǝ wǝ asa kasɔnɔnɔ kpǝ ku kase úfi ɔnlɛ asa nnya bátɔ wǝ kasɔ bulǝkǝ eso .
Íyifo wǝ anto ku ambǝ mǝ yanii se bǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ mfo nko . Nya wǝ ambe lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , ntsyǝso féyifo bo nyamfo eto okle ? Mɔ ku fǝ nto kenke ákɛ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ nya búsu bɔnlɛ botsyilama kabɛbɛ fǝ . ”
Mfo nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Beso ibǝ bǝ bísu bɛlɛ botsyilama kabɛbɛ mɛ ? Binyi biǝ mɔ Anto eto diyo ele bǝ nkɛ lee ? ”
Fɛɛ mǝǝ , bánnɔ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ mfó eto kasɔ .
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝkǝko mǝ nya bédu bésu Nasaret , nya óbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ útǝ mǝ . Nya asa nyamfo kenke lɛkɛ lǝ wǝ ambe eto nsusu kǝmiǝ ɛɛyɛ etsyo .
Nya Yesu lebe ɔ́bɔ disi lǝ kobetete ku lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ófo diye lǝ betidi kenke ku lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Íyifo lɛlɛ lefosi nɔnde se Okankplɛ Kaisare Tiberio lídi seka , Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yohanes wǝ ni Sakaria eto ubi wǝ léfo kɛnyɛ utsyiko Onanto ɔflɔ lǝ lefe nǝ ɔ́kɛ lǝ mfiminti . Nya Pontio Pilato lídi Aba eto unyɛsiǝ lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya Herodes díkedi seka lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmǝ mfóo , Herodes eto ɔyimisani Filipo tsya lídi seka lǝ kasɔ ka baakpo Iturea ku Trakoniti eto lekpake ǝsuǝ . Nya Lisania tsya díkedi seka lǝ Abilene eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , Annas ku Kayafa ni Onanto eto Besumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke .

Nyaso Yohanes áyɛ ótsyilama Yordan eto Ketu eto ditukpenkpe ku lekpake mfó kédi Anantotiki kátɛyi nkǝ , “ Bitsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ lǝ befo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mi abua ɔtsyɛ mi . ”
Nya nko seka ini báwɔni lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto kukue banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi utsyuǝ kpe lǝ mfiminti ɔlɛ bofa katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bińyǝ bikabe kusu itǝ Bonamute . Bimuǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ kukɔnɔ itǝ wǝ bubǝ .
Biti okplo saa okplo nya beba atini ku akpenkpe kenke bekatesǝ . Lǝ bɛtsyɔnsǝ esu nya lebo . Nya nlebe bo diyifo kplobi kplobii , biyifo mu tsyɛtsyɛtsyɛ .
Nya betidi kenke luunyǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ Onanto letsyese nɛ ! ’ ”
Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ bǝ Yohanes flǝsǝ mǝ ntu . Fɛɛ Yohanes átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi mba nte fe bawa eto befluflu ! Owoe lɛlɛ mi kɔlɛ nkǝ bitsyetsyi lǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ko nlɛ bubǝ eto kɛnyɛ ?
Bete lǝ mi eyifosa ǝsuǝ biǝnkǝ bɛtsyi bɛwuninsǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ . Nya biembu biǝ se ini Abraham eto befluflu bini esoo , Onanto embunǝ mi koto . Bɛlɔ bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto ebofo befluflu bulǝkǝ ketsyiko aba nyamfo ǝsuǝ kǝtǝ Abraham .
Bebe se banlɛ kefiebi bǝńyǝ bǝ baala eyi nyamǝ taa keyudu ke . Kuyi saa ko laanwɔ ebibi sɛɛ , boola ko befi bakpe lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝ . ”
Nyaso betidi bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛɛ , be ele bǝ buyifo mɔmɔ ? ”
Mfó nya útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi utsyuǝ wǝ nkpe awu leyo lekpe sinuǝǝ , ufi lekpe lɔni utǝ utidi wǝ lǝmbǝ kuǝtsyuǝ . Nya utidi wǝ didisa nte tsyaa , usie ni nko ke . ”
Mba laafo umǝnko bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝbǝ bǝ bǝflǝsǝ mǝ ntu . Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , be ele bǝ buyifo ? ”
Mfó nya Yohanes lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biamfo umǝnko besonsǝ kase kɔfi dítǝ mi kusu nkǝ befo . ”
Bamamanyǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nya bo nkpǝ ? Be ele bǝ buyifo ? ” Mfó ɔ́tɛyi mǝ tsya nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ mi kayo ka banlɛ mi bofo lǝ kemi mi . Nya lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , biensu bɛnyinkǝ utidi kuutsyuǝ bekpe lǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ befo wǝ atabi saa , nye bela utidi kuutsyuǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ belo wǝ dikpi . ”
Betidi bamfo eto kusubebe esi ébe kato ekpe nya békebu bǝ Yohanes nkpa ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , wǝ bǝńyǝ banlɛ kusu bobe .
Nyaso Yohanes ákpasǝ mǝmblɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , ntu ete meefi kǝflǝsǝ mi . Fɛɛ utidi utsyuǝ tǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔlɛ bubǝ wǝ lɛmɔ nya onkpe ǝsuǝale onso mɛ famfamfa ! Mǝńyǝ tsya kon ntǝ bǝ mbǝ kasɔ miǝ maanyankli wǝ afokpa eto kekue lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ ntǝ wǝ tsya . Nya utidi ǝmfo ebufi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ku uté uflǝsǝ mi fe ntu .
Ɔlɛ wǝ kɔfɛ ko wuufi ɔflɛ wǝ kamɔ ulǝkǝ kofo uwí nya wookpa kamɔ kosate okpo lǝ unwũ . Fɛɛ kofo saa kofoo , wootonsǝ ko lǝ ute wǝ lɛmbɔni kulefe kulefe . ”
Nya Yohanes lídi betidi Anantotiki lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ɔ́lɛ mǝ kɔlɛ nkǝ batsyi mǝ ditsyǝbi ku mǝ nkpǝ bo bensi bawuninsǝ .
Nya se Oka Herodes wǝ ni Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ lɛlɛ wǝ ɔyimi eto usiǝ wǝ baakpo Herodia ófo lǝ ǝsuǝale ku lǝ asa bua kpǝ nya úyifo esoo , Yohanes ǝnyǝnki okpe wǝ .
Idu ɛkɔ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , útǝ bǝmuǝ Yohanes béti bákpe lǝ diyo .
Se Yohanes díflǝsǝ betidi kenke ntu ólosǝǝ , úflǝsǝ Yesu tsya ntu . Nya se Yesu nlɛ ola botoo , kato ásini .
Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ eto ditsyǝbi nte fe lɛblɛkpaa , áyifǝ díbǝ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya bánɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ wǝ dítsyi kato díkatɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni mɔ Ubi lala . Fǝ asa eedufǝ mɛ ǝnǝ tinti . ”
Yesu áfo fe alɛ fosi ǝtsyǝ fɛ útsyǝ wǝ keyifo kasɔ . Betidi eto nsusu ni bǝ wǝ anto ni Yosef wǝ eto anto ni Eli
wǝ eto anto ni Mata wǝ eto anto ni Lewi wǝ eto anto ni Melki wǝ eto anto ni Yanai wǝ eto anto ni Yosef
wǝ eto anto ni Matatia wǝ eto anto ni Amos wǝ eto anto ni Nahum wǝ eto anto ni Hesli wǝ eto anto ni Nagai
wǝ eto anto ni Mahat wǝ eto anto ni Matatia wǝ eto anto ni Semein wǝ eto anto ni Yosef wǝ eto anto ni Yoda
wǝ eto anto ni Yohanan wǝ eto anto ni Resa wǝ eto anto ni Sorobabel wǝ eto anto ni Sealtiel wǝ eto anto ni Neri
wǝ eto anto ni Melki wǝ eto anto ni Adi wǝ eto anto ni Kosam wǝ eto anto ni Elmadam wǝ eto anto ni Er .
wǝ eto anto ni Yosua wǝ eto anto ni Elieser wǝ eto anto ni Yorim wǝ eto anto ni Matat wǝ eto anto ni Lewi
wǝ eto anto ni Simeon wǝ eto anto ni Yuda wǝ eto anto ni Yosef wǝ eto anto ni Yonam wǝ eto anto ni Eliakim
wǝ eto anto ni Melea wǝ eto anto ni Mena wǝ eto anto ni Matata wǝ eto anto ni Natan wǝ eto anto ni David
wǝ eto anto ni Isai wǝ eto anto ni Obed wǝ eto anto Boas wǝ eto anto ni Salmon wǝ eto anto ni Naheson
wǝ eto anto ni Aminadab wǝ eto anto ni Admin wǝ eto anto ni Arni wǝ eto anto ni Hesron wǝ eto anto ni Peres wǝ eto anto ni Yuda
wǝ eto anto ni Yakob wǝ eto anto ni Isak wǝ eto anto ni Abraham wǝ eto anto ni Tara wǝ eto anto ni Nahor
wǝ eto anto ni Serug wǝ eto anto ni Regu wǝ eto anto ni Peleg wǝ eto anto ni Eber wǝ eto anto ni Sala
wǝ eto anto ni Kainan wǝ eto anto ni Arfaksad wǝ eto anto ni Sem wǝ eto anto ni Noah wǝ eto anto ni Lamek
wǝ eto anto ni Metusala wǝ eto anto ni Henok wǝ eto anto ni Yared wǝ eto anto ni Mehaleel wǝ eto anto ni Kainan
wǝ eto anto ni Enos wǝ eto anto ni Set wǝ eto anto ni Adam wǝ eto anto ni Onanto .
Se Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu édu lǝ Yordan eto Ketu mfó . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lékpa wǝ dísuko mfiminti kaka kuutsyuǝ lǝmbǝ .
Mfo nya Obonsam lékplatsya óto wǝ óbe lǝ eyifosi ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝmfó kenke , Yesu méndi kulesa nyaso lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , kukpɛnsɛ álɛ wǝ .
Mfó nya Obonsam lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto eto Ubi fenii , tɛyi lebambi nǝmfo lǝ efiani didisa . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Inni didisa mate lǝǝtǝ utidi nkpǝ . ’ ”
Lǝ nnya kamaa , Obonsam esi ókpa wǝ úsuko kaka letaka fanlofanlo . Nya óte wǝ kawunsiǝ eto asa ku nnya sekakedikɔ kenke lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muufi kawunsiǝ eto ǝsuǝale ku ke setabikɛ ntǝ fǝ , itsyise befi nnya bǝtǝ mɛ , nya moofo nnya bufi kǝtǝ nwǝ ke minla .
Nyaso asa nyamfo kenke ebofiani fǝ ale lǝ akpe disi kasɔ esumu mɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute Onanto hã ele bǝ utidi fi dibu utǝ , okpe disi kasɔ usumu . ’ ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Obonsam ákpa Yesu úsuko Yerusalem lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo eto kaka nso botaka nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto eto ubi fenii , yani fǝ ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ asɔ lǝ kasɔ .
Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebutǝ nkǝ wǝ batɔnkpe ńyǝ bakase fǝ . ’
‘ Bɔɔkɔbe fǝ lǝ ani , itǝ bǝ embutusǝ kokpa lǝ leba ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya . ’ ”
Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Manto fǝ Onamute Onanto abe . ’ ”
Se Obonsam léto Yesu óbe nko ólosǝǝ , údu wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́yɛ wǝ bulǝ itǝ lefe ditsyuǝ .
Nya Yesu dísinkli úsu Galilea eto kasɔ nya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale lɛkɛ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝ diye dísensǝ isu lekpake nǝmfó kenke .
Óte asa lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ nya utidi saa lɛtɛsǝ wǝ asatete .
Lǝ nyamfó eto kamaa , Yesu ésu Nasaret eto umǝ wǝ úsiǝ óbe . Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyii , úsu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ fe kase woala buyifo . Nya ótaka úńyǝ nkǝ lǝ okla asa lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
Mfó nya béfi Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto kukue bǝtǝ wǝ . Ɔ́sini kukue komǝ nya útsyiko bokla lǝ kaka báwɔni bǝnkǝ ,
“ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ si mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ , bédiki mɛ nnuǝbi , itsyise úlǝkǝ mɛ nkǝ mfó Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo mboko bakombo . Nya ótsyese mɛ nkǝ nsu mbe bulǝkǝ eto letsya ntǝ betidi ba bǝmuǝ bakpe lǝ diyo . Nya mba eto ǝnǝmi lébaa , lǝ bǝnyǝ asa . Nya betidi ba báyinkǝ bakpe lǝ kasɔ nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ , lǝ bǝnyǝ bɔbɔkafe .
Nya lǝ ntǝ lǝ bate bǝ Onanto eto lefe nǝ wuulǝkǝ wǝ betidi eboyo . ”
Nya Yesu díti kukue ko mǝ , nya úsinkli ko útǝ wǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ nya úsiǝ kasɔ . Betidi bamǝ kenke éfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya bǝńyǝ banlɛ wǝ bobe kpoo .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nnya eto etiki bɛnɔ mínkla mfoo , ibǝ itǝ lǝ mmi eto diyi nǝmfo . ”
Nya wǝ etiki nnya údi ǝmuǝ mǝ lǝ utu tinti nya kase odiakami tsya létaka wǝ mlǝmlǝmlǝǝ , ǝtǝ iyifo mǝ yanii . Nya bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni Yosef eto ubi ni nwǝ mfo , fɛɛ ? ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyi miǝ biɔtɛyi mɛ lekpa lǝ nnya minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo ǝsuǝ biǝ , ‘ Ofate , tsya fǝ ǝsuǝ . ’ Nya binsi biɔtɛyi mɛ tsya biǝ , ‘ Asa nnya eto okle bɔ́nɔ bǝ éyifo lǝ Kapernaum , yifo nnya lǝ fǝ kosate eto umǝ mfo tsya . ’ ”
Nya Yesu disi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , bǝǝntǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kuutsyuǝ dibu lǝ wǝ kosate eto umǝ .
Ɛkpɛ ini bǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ kpǝ ákɛ lǝ Israel eto kasɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia lɛkɛ . Nya ɔsɔmi lɛyɛ bɔni itǝ alɛ ǝtsyǝ ku kutsyǝ . Nya kukpɛnsɛ kplɛ díbǝ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Onanto mánkpe Elia kɔtɔ nkǝ usu kutsyuǝ saa ɔflɔ lǝ Israel , enso ɔkɔsiǝ utsyuǝ lǝ Sarep eto umǝ lǝ Sidon eto kasɔ .
Nya tsyaa , betidi kpǝ ákɛ ba díkefi bufisia lǝ Israel eto kasɔ lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elisa eto lefe . Fɛɛ wántsya mǝ kuutsyuǝ enso Naeman wǝ ditsyi Siria eto kasɔ mate hã . ”
Se betidi ba lɛkɛ mfó lɛnɔ nyamfoo , kafo ányi mǝ tinti .
Nya bátaka bǝńyǝ nya bála Yesu bǝlǝkǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kafo bésu bǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kɔtini ko ǝsuǝ bála umǝ ǝmǝ eto kotosi ku nsusu bǝ lǝ bǝkǝ wǝ bakpe lǝ kukpio kafo .
Fɛɛ Yesu áyɛ lǝ mǝ nti ɔ́bɔ údu .
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu édu úsu Kapernaum eto umǝ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Mfó nya útsyiko betidi asa bote lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ wǝ etikididi ku ǝsuǝale esoo , wǝ asatete éyifo betidi bamǝ yanii .
Osani utsyuǝ ákɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó wǝ ǝsuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua dísiǝ . Nya ófa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ , be fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo ? Bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ ǝǝbǝ atsylɔsǝ bo lee ? Nyi futsyǝ feni . Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ wǝ ótsyese nɛ ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu léla Lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ ɔ́bɔsǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Yɛ kudu bokpo ! Lǝ abɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ! ” Lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ étsyi osani ǝmǝ ɔ́sɔ lǝ kasɔ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi , nya lɛbɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ dídu . Fɛɛ utidi ǝmǝ mámfo lefabe saa .
Iyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii nya bátɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte etiki nnya eto okle ni nyamfo ? Utidi ǝmfo kpe ǝsuǝle nya wǝǝkumi kakpe awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya asa nnya bátɛyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ mfóo , dísensǝ ɛyɛ ísu kuse komfó kenke .
Yesu édu lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ mfó úsu Simen eto diyo . Atikesi ǝmuǝ Simon eto usiǝambe élabesǝ kekleke . Nya bǝtǝ Yesu léte .
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , úsu úńyǝ lɛ wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ wǝ kalabekɔ , nya óla bufi bomǝ úlǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ bufi bomǝ lɛyɛ wǝǝ , ótaka nya útsyiko lesa bonwa kǝtǝ mǝ .
Nya se kofe nlɛ diyo budufǝǝ , bákpa befimfi ba nlɛ bufi ate ate kenke báboko Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya úfi ani útǝkǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ɔni , ɔni nya ótsya mǝmblɛ bufi .
Awɔnɔ bua kpǝ eto kakle tsya ábɔ lǝ betidi kpǝ ǝsuǝ nya báfa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi kosate ǝmǝ ! ” Fɛɛ Yesu éti awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ kusu nya wǝntǝ kusu nkǝ batɛyi kulesa , itsyise béyi bǝ wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
Se kale disiǝǝ , Yesu édu lǝ umǝ ǝmfó úsu kaka lɛbiɔ . Mfó nya betidi dítsyiko wǝ bɔbɛbɛ katsyilama . Nya se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , bákplatsya bǝ lǝ ɔyɛ budu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ nsu ndi etiki lǝ kǝmǝ bamba tsya itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Sekakedidi ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamfo eso Onanto létsyese mɛ nɛ . ”
Nyaso údi Anantotiki lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ kenke lǝ kasɔ kamǝ .
Diyi lɔnii , se Yesu díńyǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝ baakpo bǝ Genesaret ɔflɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ákpɔ bǝ lǝ banyi bafi wǝ lǝ banɔ Anantotiki nnya ɔnlɛ budi .
Yesu ǝnyǝ nkǝ kaklɔ inuǝ ńyǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ ɔflɔ mfó nya mba laata asabu kǝlǝkǝ akpɛ ébudu bésu mǝ asabu kǝflǝkɔ .
Nya Yesu lébe údufǝ lǝ Simon eto ole kafo , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , onwa ɔklɔ ǝmǝ usuko ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ sɛkɛ . Yesu ǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo nya óte betidi bamǝ asa .
Se óte mǝ asa ólosǝǝ , Yesu átɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Nwa ɔklɔ ǝmǝ esuko kaka ntu letsyo sɛkɛɛ , lǝ fonko fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ lǝ beta mi asabu lǝ bilǝkǝ binǝ . ”
Nya Simon dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ketsye kamfo kenke búyifo keyifo kekleke tsya bóǝnlǝkǝ kulesa . Fɛɛ lǝ kase fátɛyi esoo , muutǝ lǝ bota asabu nyamǝ . ”
Se báta asabu nyamǝǝ , bǝlǝkǝ akpɛ kpǝ itǝ bǝ asabu nyamǝ étsyiko bola .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , básɔ ani bákpadi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba nkpe lǝ ɔklɔ nuǝfǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝbǝ bawunsǝko mǝ . Bǝbǝ nya bǝnǝ asabu nyamǝ bǝlǝsǝ nya binǝ biamǝ díyi kaklɔ inuǝ kamǝ kinkinki ibu sɛkɛ lǝ kanya kedufǝ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ .
Se Simon Petro dínyǝ nnya díbǝ mfoo , óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , mannyi ǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ , itsyise obuayifo mini . ”
Binǝ kpǝ bia bǝlǝkǝ mfó esoo , íyifo wǝ ku wǝ bǝtsyuǝ yanii .
Nko ke íyifo Simon eto bayɛtsyuǝ , Yakobo ku Yohanes ba ni Sebedeo eto bebi tsya nɛ . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi . Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , mfe betidi fuukǝlǝkǝ . ”
Se báyo ditukpenkpee , báyani lesa saa bǝtsyǝ nya bédu bǝtǝkǝko Yesu .
Lefe lɔnii , Yesu ésu umǝ utsyuǝ kaka utidi utsyuǝ nlɛ bufisia bufi . Nya se utidi ǝmfo dínyǝ Yesu , ókpo kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute ! Lǝ aalaa , ebofo butǝ mɔ bufi bomfo yuǝ mɛ . ”
Yesu ǝnǝ kɔni útidi wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nla nko . Lǝ nyasoo , bufi bomǝ yuǝ fǝ . ” Lamfolamfo , bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ wǝ .
Mfó nya Yesu lékpe wǝ kɔfi nkǝ , “ Mantɛyi utidi sa nyamfo . Bomu yɛ tentente lǝ edu lǝ efi ǝsuǝ esu ate Onanto eto usumunyǝ . Wǝ loobe fǝ unyǝ nkǝ ǝmuǝ ale nya uudi fǝ adansiɛ itǝ utidi saa nkǝ sitintii , bufi bomǝ ǝyuǝ fǝ . Nya lǝ efi lɛninsɔ ǝtǝ fe kase Moses eto kɔfi lɛtɔ . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu eto etiki nyamfo ésensǝ ɛyɛ etsyo . Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ bǝ lǝ banɔ wǝ asatete nya lǝ ótsya mǝ bufi bo nlɛ mǝ bulǝ .
Fɛɛ ɔ́kabɔ kesu kaka lɛbiɔ úsu úkato ola .
Diyi lɔni se Yesu lɛkɛ mfó ókaté asaa , Yudafɔ eto ditsyukpa lɔni nǝ baakpo Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa bǝtsyuǝ ba ditsyi nlebe nlebe lǝ Galilea ku Yudea eto nsɔ ku Yerusalem ǝbǝ mfó . Nya Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nnya Yesu leefi katsya befimfi tsya ǝsiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya mfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ étsyi utidi wǝ léba onkpo kasɔ lǝ belabekǝ ǝsuǝ báboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Nya bábɛbɛ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ befi wǝ bedufǝnko diyo kafo lǝ befi wǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi .
Fɛɛ betidi bamǝ eto etu esoo , bámfo kusu bunyǝ . Nko esoo , bétsyi wǝ báyɛnko lǝ diyo eto letsya . Nya bǝlǝkǝ ofo lǝ letsya ǝsuǝ nya báyifǝsǝ wǝ ku wǝ belabekǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi lǝ betidi bamǝ eto nti lǝ diyo kafo mfó .
Nya se Yesu dínyǝ mǝ bofokanɔ esoo , ɔ́tɛyi utidi ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Osani , mfi fǝ abua ntsyɛ fǝ ! ”
Mfó nya Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa dítsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝ , “ Owoe ni nwǝ mfo leedi mbusiotiki kefi wǝ ǝsuǝ kakatesǝ ko Onanto nko ! Onanto hã ni futsyǝ wǝ loofo utidi eto abua bufi katsyɛ wǝ ! ”
Nya se Yesu dínyǝ mǝ nsusu útsyǝ lekpo esoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ nsusu bomfo eto okle bufi ?
Nte nnya nso buyuǝ ku bɔtɛyi , ‘ Befi fǝ abua bátsyǝ fǝ , ’ lee ‘ Taka ǝńyǝ lǝ ayɛ edu ’ ?
Muulǝkǝ nte mi miǝ Utidi Eto Ubi kpe ǝsuǝale lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo bǝ ufi abua ɔtsyɛ . ” Nyaso ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ léba oonkpo kasɔ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ taka lǝ efi fǝ okla lǝ esu diyo ! ”
Mfo ǝmǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ átaka uńyǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ eto ǝnǝmi nya úfi wǝ okla , nya údu ɔ́ntɔ lǝ diyo ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ .
Nyamfó éyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii ! Nya se sikpi dímuǝ mǝmblɛ kenke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ esoo , bátɛsǝ Onanto nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Nte ayanisa nnya búnyǝ mfo mmi mǝǝ ? ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ábɔ útsyi lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo nya únyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ laafo umǝnko wǝ baakpo Lewi nkpe lǝ wǝ keyifokɔ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
Lewi áyani lesa saa útsyǝ nya ótaka útǝkǝko wǝ .
Lewi ǝtǝ bánwa lesa kǝn nya úfi útsyue ɔpunu ókpe Yesu disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ diyo . Nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ mfó ku mba laafo umǝnko tsya .
Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa ba díbǝ katsyakɔ mfó étsyiko etiki bunǝ ku Yesu eto bakasebi katɛyi bǝ , “ Beso biedi kǝnǝ ku mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo bamfo ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba nkpe ǝsuǝale manhiã ofanyǝ enso mba ni Onanto hã .
Mǝmbǝ miǝ mǝǝbǝ nlǝkǝ betidi sɛɛ , bomu babuayifo eso mímbǝ . ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ Yohanes eto bakasebi aakle kɛnyɛ nya baato ola , nya mba ntǝkǝko Farisifɔ tsya leeyifo nko , fɛɛ fǝ bale leedi kǝnǝ lefe saa ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bubu bibu biǝnkǝ baklobo ebofo kɛnyɛ bokle lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ nkpe lǝ mǝ lenti ? Kulefe ! Yembubǝ itǝ nkomǝ !
Fɛɛ diyi ditsyuǝ ebubǝ ni lefe nǝ bookpa okafɔsǝ ǝmǝ bedunko lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , insini utidi saa luubǝ ɔtɛyi mǝ fɛ bookle kɛnyɛ . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Utidi kuutsyuǝ embofuadi kafia fɔfɔ ufi otale kakoko . Lǝ utsyuǝ éyifo nkoo , ebunyǝ fǝ obiasǝ kafia fɔfɔ kamǝ . Nya kakoko kamfó tsya ku kafɔfɔ kamǝ ǝmbɔlɛkɛ itǝ boka kǝtǝkǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya bemfi nte fɔfɔ kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe . Lenni nkoo , nte fɔfɔ bomǝ ebɔkpɔ bobe kato nnya luutǝ kubukikuetobe komǝ la nya nte bomǝ tsya luuwui buyifo nsɔsɔ .
Nyasoo , ntǝ fɔfɔ beefi kakpo lǝ kubukikuetobe fɔfɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nya mɔmɔ tsyaa , utidi kuutsyuǝ ǝnnǝ nte koko kesi kala nkǝ wǝǝnǝ mfɔfɔ lamfolamfo , etsyisee , wɔɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Ntutɛ , bo ni nkokoo , alɛkɛ boso ! ’ ”
Lǝ Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lɔnii , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ákayɛ lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ ko lɛyɛ lǝ anta eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ kafo kafe . Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi dítsyiko anta nnya ńyǝ mfó bufǝsǝ kǝfǝ akayimi .
Mfó nya Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ lesa nǝ bo kɔfi dimǝntǝ bo kusu nkǝ buyifo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ buyifo ? ”
Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ lesa nǝ Oka David díyifo lǝ lefe nǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛlɛ wǝ ku wǝ betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ ?
Oka David ésu údufǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ úsu úfi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ Onanto kedii , údi . Nya útǝ wǝ bǝtsyuǝ tsya ni ditsyuǝ bédi lǝ lefe nǝ iyifo botakebu lǝ bo kɔfi ǝsuǝ bǝ utidi bamba lǝ udi lesa nǝmfo . Kuutsyuǝ sa ǝmbǝ kusu enso Onanto eto Usumunyǝ hã . ”
Lǝ nnya kalosǝkɔɔ , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi Eto Ubii , wǝ ni Onamute itǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nɛ . ”
Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi bamba ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya ɔnlɛ asa bote . Osani utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó wǝ eto kodiani díkpǝ konyoma .
Nya se kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ díkabɛbɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ Yesu bǝ óta kɔfi ubu esoo , béfi ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kekleke balɛ bobe lǝ wootsya bufi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
Fɛɛ se Yesu dínyǝ mǝ nsusu utsyǝ lekpo esoo , ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ abɔ ǝbǝ sɛtɔ mfo . ” Nya osani ǝmǝ létaka úbǝ úńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be kɔfi dítǝ bo kusu nkǝ buyifo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ? Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ buyifo kasɛɛ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lee bǝ buyifo kabua ? Nye , ɛlɛkɛ bǝ bafo utidi lǝ nkpǝ lee babiasǝ mu bomu ? ”
Yesu átsyilamasǝ ǝnǝmi óbe mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nǝ fǝ kɔni etsyue , nya úyifo nko . ” Nya wǝ kɔni komǝ létsya wǝ .
Nyaso mǝmblɛ kenke éyenki ku lɛblɔfi nya bétsyiko nsusu bufi lǝ lesa nǝ boofo Yesu buyifo ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , Yesu ábe úsu kɔtini disi . Ɔ́kɛ mfó óto ola útǝ Onanto ketsye kamfó kenke .
Se kale dísiǝǝ , ókpadi wǝ bakasebi kenke útsyǝ nya úlǝkǝ lefosi inuǝ ba útǝkǝ diye nkǝ wǝ Batɔnkpe .
Mǝ ni Simon wǝ útǝkǝ diye nkǝ Petro ku wǝ ɔyimi Andreas ku Yakobo , Yohanes ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ,
ku Mateo ku Tomas , ku Alfeo eto ubi Yakobo ku Simon wǝ baakpo bǝ utidi wǝ laakpɔ kǝtǝ wǝ umǝ
ku Yakobo eto ubi Yuda ku Yuda Iskariot wǝ léfiani nwǝ lídu Yesu útǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu ku wǝ batɔnkpe lɛyifǝ bétsyi kɔtini koǝ eto disi bǝbǝǝ , bǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ kaka diyifo tsyɛ tsyɛ tsyɛ nya mba dítǝkǝko wǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ ákɛ mfó nya sitiditu kplɛ sia dítsyi Yudea eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ kenke ku Yerusalem eto kǝmǝ ka lɛfi lekpo kɛnyɛ ka ni Tiro ku Sidon .
Bǝbǝ bǝ lǝ banɔ asa nnya Yesu díkate ku lǝ otsya mǝ efimbi kpǝ nnya banlɛ . Betidi ba awɔnɔ bua díkelǝ tsya ǝbǝ nya ótsya mǝ bufi .
Betidi bamfo kenke ákplatsya bǝ lǝ betidi Yesu lǝ mǝ efimbi lǝ ɛyɛ mǝ , itsyise ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ eto okle ákabɔ ketsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ nnya díkatsya betidi bamǝ kenke .
Yesu átakasǝ ǝnǝmi óbe wǝ bakasebi , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mi bakombo , itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eyifo mi kale !
Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mimba kukpɛnsǝ nlɛ mɔmɔ , itsyise biumi ! Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mimba nlɛ nku mɔmɔ , itsyise biumǝ simǝ !
Ǝsuǝ ebuyuǝ mi lǝ betidi eekisi mi , nya baani mi , nya baaka mi , nya baatɛyi mi bǝnkǝ bekpe ditsyǝbi bua lǝ mɔ wǝ ni Utidi Eto Ubi eso !
“ Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ , lǝ biwi kewi ku disuǝyuǝ , itsyise Onanto ebutǝ mi kayofofo kplɛ lǝ Onanto eto oto kato . Itsyise asa nyamfo eto okle mǝ bana díyifo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba lɛkɛ kɔ kenke nɛ .
Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ itǝ mi batabinyǝ , itsyise bíofo mi disuǝyuǝ eto kayofofo lǝ kasɔ mfo !
Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mimba díkedi bími mɔmɔ , itsyise kukpɛnsɛ ɛbɔlɛ mi ! Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mimba nlɛ simǝ bumǝ mɔmɔ , itsyise mi asa ebɔkɛ kaminsǝ nya biuwi nku !
Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi mba betidi kenke laatɛsǝ mɔmɔ , itsyise nko ke ibǝ bǝ mǝ banamǝ lɛtɛsǝ betidi ba lɛwɛ betidi bǝ mǝ ni Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nɛ .
“ Fɛɛ mimba nlɛ mɔ etiki bɔnɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bela mi balo lǝ biyifo kasɛɛ bitǝ mǝ .
Nya betidi ba leekudi mii , bekpo mǝ atsyɔ . Nya betidi ba laalo fǝ sɛsi nye beeyifo disialee , to ola lǝ mǝ disi .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ásɔ fǝ lǝ kotosii , tsyi nkonse tsya ǝtǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ éfi fǝ awu katoo , tǝ lǝ ufi nnya kalɔ tsya lǝ woala .
Utidi saa wǝ laadia asa lǝ fǝ ɔflɔɔ , tǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ utsyuǝ éfi fǝ lǝsatsyuǝǝ , mantɛyi fǝ usinkliko ni oboko .
Lesa nǝ faala fǝ beyifo bǝtǝ fǝǝ , ni ke ele bǝ fintsya yifo ǝtǝ betidi nɛ .
“ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ betidi ba laala mi ete mi tsya laalaa , nte atɛsǝ nye lɛninsɔ nǝ biunyǝ bitsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? Mba ni babuayifo tsya aala betidi ba laala mǝǝ .
Nya lǝ betidi ba díyifo fǝ kasɛɛ ete fintsya leeyifo kasɛɛ kǝtǝǝ , nte lɛninsɔ nǝ ele bǝ befi bǝtǝ fǝ ? Mba ni babuayifo tsya eeyifo nkoo .
Nya lǝ betidi ba ni mba leesinkli kǝbǝ kǝtsyǝ fǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ hã faadia asa kǝtǝǝ , beso faala fǝ batɛsǝ fǝ ? Babuayifo tsya aaba kǝtǝ mǝ bayɛtsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bǝtsyǝ mǝ nnya lǝ kɛnyɛ !
Bomuu , bela mi balo lǝ biyifo mǝ kasɛɛ . Beba asa bitǝ mǝ , nya biambe kusu biǝ besinkliko kulesa bǝbǝ bǝtsyǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ kokooko . Lǝ biyifo nkoo , biunyǝ kayofofo kplɛ lǝ nnya disi . Nya bookpo mi bǝ Onanto wǝ ni Onanto Fanlofanlo eto bebi . Itsyise Onanto kpe kafoɛkpɛ itǝ mba lǝǝnnyǝ kasɛɛ kǝtsyǝ lekpo ku mba nkpe disiale kulaa tsya .
Biyifo mba lǝǝnyǝ asa kaminsǝ fe kase mi Anto Onanto lǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ .
“ Biankponko betidi bamba akpo lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ɔyɛ mi lekpo bokponko . Bianlo betidi dikpi , lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ɔyɛ mi dikpi bolo , bifi asa bɛtsyɛ betidi lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ ufi ɔtsyɛ mi .
Ele bǝ bitǝ betidi asa bǝ lǝ Onanto tsya lǝ utǝ mi asa . Lǝ sitintii , Onanto ebuyisǝ mi kenwu keyi kaba kakpo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ eso . Kase faaklá asa yeyi kaba kakpo kǝtǝ utidii , nko eto okle ke Onanto looklá utǝ fǝ nɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa nkǝ , “ Unǝmba anyɛnko wǝ unǝmbatsyuǝ . Lenni nkoo , mǝ inuǝ ba tã ebudu banɔ bedufǝ lǝ dibiǝ kafo .
Okasebi saa ante kaso wǝ oteasa . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ okasebi ǝmǝ lelosǝ asa bokasee , wǝǝtsyǝ fe wǝ oteasa ke .
“ Ntsyǝ fɛ fanlɛ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lǝ dinǝmi bobe fɛ fannlɛ dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ lele bunyǝ ?
Ntsyǝ fɛ foofo fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , ‘ Lekpakpa , tǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ dikubi kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi ’ se dikubi kplɛ ntǝkǝ lǝ fǝ kosate eto lele ǝsuǝ ? Fǝ , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto utidi ! Ka dikubi kplɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ dinǝmi bulǝkǝ fɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ kusu ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto lele kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝ lǝ wǝ lele .
“ Kuyi sɛɛ aannwɔ ebibi bua , nya kuyi bua tsya laannwɔ ebibi sɛɛ .
Kuyi saa eto ebibi ǝsuǝ beefi kǝtsyǝ ko lekpo . Banlɛ koto eto awɔnsa lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ , nya banlɛ awɔnsa nya beedi lǝ otonkpa tsya ǝsuǝ .
Utidi sɛɛ saa , asa sɛɛ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ nnya leetsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Nya utidi bua tsya lǝǝlǝkǝ asa bua kate ketsyiko lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Itsyise asa nnya nkpe lǝ utidi eto utu kǝmiǝǝ , nnya ni lesa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ nɛ .
“ Beso biakpadi mɛ biǝ Bonamute , Bonamute , fɛ bienyifo lǝ lesa nǝ maatɛyi mi ǝsuǝ ?
Utidi saa wǝ lǝǝbǝ mɛ ɔflɔ nya wǝǝbǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ɔnɔ lesa nǝ maatɛyi nya weeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , moote mi futsyǝ eto okle uni .
Ute fe utidi wǝ laato diyo nya óba kakplo nya óse ni unyǝnsǝ lǝ aba ǝsuǝ fɛ óto diyo nǝmǝ unyǝnsǝ . Se ketu díyi nya káyɛ mfó káfee , kulesa ményifo diyo nǝmǝ , itsyise dińyǝ lǝ kǝńyǝkɔ sɛɛ .
Fɛɛ utidi saa wǝ laanɔ mɔ ditiki nya woenyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝǝ , uyifo fe utidi wǝ léto diyo nya wánse ni lǝ kasɔ ka nkpe ale ǝsuǝ nya wénku kasɔ fɛ útsyiko ofatiǝ ǝmǝ bose lǝ umuǝ sui . Nyaso lefe nǝ ketu díyi kába káyɛ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ ɔflɔ káfee , léba kenke lékpo lǝ kasɔ ! ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi betidi bamfo asa nyamfo kenke olosǝǝ , údu úsu Kapernaum .
Romafɔ eto omamanyǝninǝ utsyuǝ akɛ mfó nya ɔkɛ uyifoyifo wǝ eto asa óla tinti . Uyifoyifo ǝmǝ ánɔ bufi kekleke , nya ɔkɛ lǝ ukpǝ ku menkpǝ eto nti .
Se uninǝ ǝmfo lɛnɔ Yesu eto kɔsɔɔ , ókpe Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ batɛyi wǝ lǝ ubǝ otsya wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ utǝ wǝ .
Bǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa kekleke bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo ǝńyǝ utǝ bǝ wunsǝko wǝ ,
itsyise woala bo kuse eto betidi . Nya wǝ kosate léto bo katsyakɔ útǝ bo . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eso Yesu átaka útǝkǝko mǝ . Yesu ménsitsyonko diyo nǝmǝ fɛ uninǝ ǝmfo lékpe wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ besu batɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boanto , mensilǝ ǝsuǝ fǝ ǝǝbǝ . Itsyise mɔɔ , mǝnńyǝ ntǝ bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ mɔ diyo .
Nya mǝnńyǝ ntǝ tsya bǝ mbǝ ntsyako fǝ , nńyǝ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi . Nyasoo , fǝ tɛyi ditiki ete , mɔ uyifoyifo eto ǝsuǝ ebumuǝ ale .
Mintsya nyifo uninǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ beninǝ ba nsi nso mɛ eto ǝsuǝale eto kalɔ . Nya nkpe bamamanyǝ ba nkpe mɛ kalɔ . Lǝ ntɛyi nwǝ miǝkǝ , ‘ Su , ’ woesu . Nya lǝ ntɛyi obamba tsya miǝ , ‘ Bǝ , ’ wǝǝbǝ . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mɔ uyifoyifo miǝ , ‘ Yifo mmǝǝ , ’ woǝyifo . ”
Se ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , íyifo Yesu yanii . Mfó ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ ɔ́tɛyi sitiditu sia ba dítǝkǝko wǝ mfó nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ mǝnyǝ tɔ bofokanɔ bomfo eto okle lǝ Israelfɔ nti tɔ kulatsya ! ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya betidi ba bátsyese mfó dísinkli bésu oto nya bǝnyǝ bǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ eto bufi ǝyuǝ wǝ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ésu umǝ wǝ baakpo Naim , nya wǝ bakasebi ku betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ bésu .
Lefe nǝ óyo umǝ ǝmǝ eto kabɔsiee , ótsyako bǝtsyuǝ ba nlɛ keku nya banyɛ banlɛ bɔbɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Ɔkɔsiǝ eto ubi ɔni kplo eto ɔkɔ ni wǝ béntsyi banlɛ bɔbɔnko bantɔ kebikǝkɔ nɛ . Nya umǝ eto betidi kpǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ .
Se Yesu dínyǝ usio ǝmfoo , wǝ asa álɛ wǝ kaminsǝ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sinkli ayɛ keku . ”
Yesu édufǝ mǝ lenti nya útidi ɔkɔ ǝmǝ , nya mba ntsyi wǝ ǝmǝ díńyǝ . Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Okosobi ! Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ taka ! ”
Nya ɔkɔ ǝmǝ létaka úsiǝ nya útsyiko etiki budi . Nya Yesu dífi wǝ ókpe wǝ ambe lǝ kɔni .
Íyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii ku sikpi tinti , nya bátɛsǝ Onanto . Lǝ nyamfo eso bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ ale tinti ǝbǝ údufǝ bo lenti ! Onanto áyifǝ úbǝ nkǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ betidi ! ”
Yesu eto etiki nyamfó esensǝ éba ékpo lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ ku lekpake nǝmfo kenke .
Lefe nǝmfóo , se Yohanes eto bakasebi lɛtɛyi Yohanes asa nyamfoo , ókpadi inuǝ lǝ mǝ nti ,
nya óla mǝ ótsyese Bonamute Yesu ɔflɔ ku kɛnyɛ kamfo nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni utidi wǝ bǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ lee , lee buńyǝ bukabe utidi bamba kusu ? ”
Nyaso se bǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔɔ , batɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ni nwǝ lékpe bo nkǝ bubǝ bɔtɔ fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ ni utidi wǝ bǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ lee , lee buńyǝ bukabe utidi bamba kusu ? ’ ”
Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu átsya betidi kpǝ bufi nya óla awɔnɔ bua , nya útǝ bǝnǝmba kpǝ dínyǝ asa .
Mfoti ǝmǝ nya útǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɛyi Yohanes eto batɔnkpe nkǝ , “ Bisinkli bisu bɛtɛyi Yohanes asa nnya bínyǝ ku nnya bɛnɔ banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝnǝmba lɛ bunyǝ , mba léba bankpoo kasɔ lɛ bɔyɛ kafe , mba nlɛ bufisia bufi eto ǝsuǝ lɛ bokpa , batoti lɛ asa bɔnɔ , bǝkpǝnkpǝ lɛ botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ , nya maatɛyi bakombo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
Disuǝyuǝ itǝ utidi wǝ dímǝnnyǝ kabua lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Se Yohanes eto batɔnkpe dídu eto kamaa , Yesu étsyiko etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ Yohanes ǝsuǝ kate betidi bamfó nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ bɛbɔ bisu kaka Yohanes nkpe lǝ mfiminti mfóo , be ni lesa nǝ bibu biǝ biusu binyǝ ? Utidi wǝ nte fe lefanto nǝ ufiebi nlɛ bɔsɔ ketinkǝsǝ lee ?
Be tutuutu ni lesa nǝ bísu kabekɔ ? Lee Utidi wǝ nkpe awu nnya laanɔ bobe ? Betidi ba laakpe awu nnya lefo koya nya beedi nkpǝǝ , mǝ kakɛnkɔ ni bakankplɛ eto ayo .
Bɛtɛyi mɛ lesa nǝ bísu kabekɔ ! Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi utsyuǝ bísu kabekɔ ? Lǝ sitintii , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ oso Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
Itsyise Yohanes ǝsuǝ eto etiki nya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi ni nkǝ , ‘ Mootsyese mɔ ɔtɔnkpe ntɔnsǝ fǝ bubǝ , nya wɔɔtɔ ɔlɔ kusu utsyǝ utǝ fǝ bubǝ . ’ ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Yohanes so utidi saa wǝ bale lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ni ɔkɛkɛ kulaa tsya lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ , so Yohanes . ”
Ɛtɔnsǝǝ , betidi bamǝ kenke ánɔ Yohanes eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ údi nya titlu mǝ ku mba laafo umǝnko tsya áfo lesa nǝ Onanto nlɛ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko mǝ ɔflɔɔ , ku mǝ ketu kenke nya Yohanes díflǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
Fɛɛ Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa kplɛ áni lesa nǝ ni Onanto eto ketsyue itǝ mǝ nya bántɔnɔ bǝ Yohanes flǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
Yesu ésukosǝ wǝ etiki sɛtɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , be ele bǝ mfi mi mmi eto betidi nkatesǝ ko kɛɛ ? Ntsyǝ bente kɛɛ ?
Bete fe bekpefi kɛkɛ ba laakpe kɔyɛ lǝ obia . Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ lɛ kudu bokpo katɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝ , ‘ Búsǝ kusiǝkpakpa eto ǝsǝ bútǝ mi , fɛɛ bíenwui kewui ! Búsǝ keku eto ǝsǝ bútǝ mi , tsya bíenwi nku . ’
Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ǝbǝ , nya ókle kɛnyɛ , nya wǝnnǝ ntǝ saa tsya , fɛɛ bɛlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Lɛwɔnɔ bua si wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
Nya Utidi Eto Ubi tsya díbǝ nya wǝǝ , údi únǝ . Nya bɛnlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bebe udikpu ku utǝnǝ ǝmfoo ! Uyifo mba laafo umǝnko ku babuayifo eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ ! ’
Fɛɛ betidi ba kenke lǝǝtǝkǝko Onanto eto kobe kamaa , balɛ bulǝkǝ kate lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ bǝ nnya ni kobe tinti nɛ . ”
Farisinyǝ utsyuǝ ákpadi Yesu nkǝ ubǝ udi lesa lǝ wǝ diyo . Nya se Yesu dísu mfóo , úsiǝ kasɔ lǝ ɔpunu ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ udi lesa .
Usio wǝ dísiǝ nkpǝ bua utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Nyaso se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu ǝbǝ Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo lesakedikɔɔ , úfi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi bo nkpe lǝ dituntu nǝ laanɔ bobe ǝsuǝ úsuko mfó .
Úsu úńyǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya úwi binǝntu okpo wǝ lǝ akpa . Nya usio ǝmǝ dífi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si binǝntu bia lékpo lǝ Yesu eto akpa mfoo , nya ɔ́kɔbe wǝ akpa ɔnlɛ bɔfiɔ ku lelabi . Nya úfi nnuǝbi bomǝ ókpo lǝ Yesu eto akpa tsya .
Se Farisinyǝ wǝ lékpadi Yesu dínyǝ nyamfoo , úbu disi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ utidi ǝmfo ete ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi tintii , eni ele bǝ ote usio wǝ eto okle díbǝ ɔnlɛ wǝ butidi mfo , eni óte nkpǝ bua bo tsya unsi ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Simon , nkpe lesatsyuǝ nǝ minla miǝ matɛyi fǝ . ” Nya Simon lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Oteasa , tɛyi mɛ . ”
Yesu ǝtsyǝ kasɔ ɔ́tɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Utidi utsyuǝ ákɛ mfo wǝ díkaba atabi ukǝtǝ betidi , nya betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ dísiǝ wǝ kayo . Ɔni dísiǝ wǝ sika eto atabi akpi alofa anɔ . Nnya unuǝfǝ dísiǝ wǝ atabi akpi fosi anɔ .
Se kulesa dímǝtsyǝ mǝ boofo kayo kamǝ esoo , úfi kayo kamǝ kenke ɔ́tsyɛ mǝ . Nya betidi inuǝ bamfo eto ntii , owoe fafo fanɔ fǝ woola otabinyǝ ǝmfo oso ? ”
Nya Simon lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mfo nnɔ miǝ utidi wǝ úfi kayo ka nso utu ɔ́tsyɛ . ” Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Átɛyi ɛlɛkɛ . ”
Yesu étsyi ɔwuninsǝ óbe usio ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi Simon nkǝ , “ Alɛ usio ǝmfo bunyǝ ? Se mímbǝ fǝ ɔflɔɔ , ǝmǝntǝ mɛ ntu fǝ mflǝ akpa . Fɛɛ usio ǝmfo éfi wǝ binǝntu úflǝ mɛ akpa , nya úfi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si nnya .
Ámamfo mɛ ku disuǝyuǝ abuta mɛ alɛ . Fɛɛ idu lǝ lefe nǝ mímbǝ mfo , wóanyɛ tɔ mɔ akpa bɔlɛ kafiɔ .
Fǝǝ , ǝmǝntǝ mɛ nnuǝbi saa fǝ mfi nkpo lǝ disi . Fɛɛ wǝ éfi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi ókpo mɛ lǝ akpa .
Nyaso nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lelabi nǝ úlǝkǝ óte mɛ esoo , ófo abua kpǝ nya úyifo kenke eto bufikatsyɛ . Nya utidi wǝ díyifo abua sɛkɛ béfi bátsyɛ wǝ , nko ke wǝ lelabi tsya lɛfɛ nɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi usio ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Befi fǝ abua batsyɛ fǝ . ”
Se betidi ba tsya dísiǝ lǝ kedikɔ mfo lɛnɔ Yesu eto asa nnya ɔ́tɛyii , batɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ni nwǝ mfo wǝ laafo betidi eto abua kulaa tsya bufi katsyɛ ? ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi usio ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ bofokanɔ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ , nyaso du esu lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya lefe ditsyuǝ eto kamaa , Yesu átsyilama nti bomfo úsu kǝmǝ ku mbuto ntsyuǝ . Nya úkedi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ ba úlǝkǝ tsya ǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
Besio ba Yesu létsya bufi akpa akpa ku mba óla awɔnɔ bua úlǝkǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ tsya ǝkǝtǝkǝko wǝ . Nya utsyuǝ wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mǝ nti ni Maria wǝ baakpo Magdalanyǝ nwǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu léla awɔnɔ bua akuanse úlǝkǝ .
Usio bamba tsya ákɛ lǝ mǝ nti mfó wǝ baakpo bǝ Yohana nwǝ eto usǝ baakpo Kusa wǝ díyifo keyifo lǝ Oka Herodes eto lekpokakpokɔ nya údi uninǝ utsyuǝ wǝ díkabe mfó . Besio kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku nwǝ baakpo Susana tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu nya banlɛ mǝ asa bufi kawunsǝ ko wǝ ku wǝ bakasebi .
Betidi kpǝ éketsyi kǝmǝ ate ate ate kǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ . Nnya lǝ lefe nǝ betidi kpǝ díbǝ bátsyaa , Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ ,
“ Ɔkuɛmfo utsyuǝ ésu nkǝ wǝǝsǝ eyibibi ǝtsyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ eyibibi nyamǝ busǝǝ , íbǝ bǝ ǝtsyuǝ álo ekpo lǝ kusu nya betidi lémankli nya , nya baklɔbɛ lɛsɛ nnya bamini .
Ǝtsyuǝ tsya álo ekpo lǝ akpankplamboe ǝsuǝ . Nya se íkǝǝ , yǝnyǝ ntu ku sitǝ sɛɛ . Nyaso yɛylɔbe nya íkpǝ .
Eyibibi nyamǝ ǝtsyuǝ édufǝ lǝ biyufa nti . Nya biyufa biamǝ lébe bíti eyibibi nyamǝ , nya békle nnya kenke itǝ íkpǝ .
Nya abamba dísu ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya se íkǝǝ , ɛnwɔ ebibi alofa , alofa . ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyaso fǝǝ ke ato nnya laanɔ asa nkpee , tsyue ato lǝ anɔ ! ”
Yesu eto bakasebi átɔ wǝ lekpá nǝmfó eto kasɔ .
Mfó ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto éfi wǝ sekakedikɔ eto asakulakula eto kobe útǝ mi . Fɛɛ betidi bambaa , akpá ǝsuǝ bɔɔnɔ nnya itǝ bǝ , ‘ balɛ bunyǝ tsyaa , bembunyǝ . Nya balɛ bɔnɔ tsyaa , bǝmbǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ . ’
“ Lekpá nǝ míntɛyi eto kasɔ ni bǝ , eyibibi nyamǝ ni Onanto eto ditiki .
Nya eyibibi nnya díbǝ ekpo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ te fe betidi ba laanɔ , fɛ Obonsam ǝbǝ kǝlǝkǝ ditiki nǝmǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi . Nya wǝǝtǝ nkǝ bembofo bofo kanɔ bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ofo mǝ bulǝkǝ .
Nya , nnya díbǝ ékpo lǝ akpankplamboe ǝsuǝǝ , te fe betidi ba lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya báfo ni ku disuǝyuǝ lamfolamfo , fɛɛ díendufǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi sitinti . Nyaso baafo kanɔ itǝ lefe kliminti hã . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ botokabe sɛkɛ díbǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bǝǝtǝ disi .
Eyibibi nya lékpo lǝ biyufa ntii , te fe betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ , fɛɛ kawunsiǝ eto bulǝ ku kǝ asa eto bɔbɛbɛ ku kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kamini eesensǝ keti mǝ , nya yǝǝntǝ kusu bǝ ebibi nyamǝ be , ɛsɛ lǝ balɛ nnya .
Nya eyibibi nnya díbǝ ékpo lǝ kasɔ sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , te fe betidi ba laanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya baafo ni kakpe lǝ utu kǝmiǝ . Nya baabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya bǝǝńyǝ kekleke isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ itǝ bǝ baawɔ ebibi kpǝ .
“ Utidi kuutsyuǝ anto okandiɛ kefi asa keti wǝ nye ufi wǝ usu okpe lǝ lesa kalɔ . Bomu weefi wǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kǝtǝkǝkɔ kaka betidi ba lǝǝbǝ mfó luunyǝ asa wuee .
Lesa saa nǝ béfi bákula lǝ kalebe saa , ebɔbɔ lǝ lekple bǝnyǝ . Nya lesa nǝ ke béti bákpee , ebɔbɔ lǝ lekple bǝnyǝ .
“ Bebe ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ etiki nnya bianɔ ǝsuǝ . Utidi wǝ ke asa ntee , buusi bǝtǝ wǝ bawunsǝ . Nya utidi wǝ ke kulesa lentee , nnya úbu nkǝ ite wǝ tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ nnya bafo wǝ lǝ ani . ”
Yesu eto bayimi ku mǝ ambe ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , fɛɛ bamfó kusu bunyǝ bǝnyǝ Yesu itsyi lǝ sitiditu sia eso .
Utidi utsyuǝ ésu ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Fǝ ambe ku fǝ bayimi ńyǝ lǝ lekple balɛ fǝ bɔbɛbɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝmblɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ambe ku mɔ bayimi ni mba laanɔ Onanto eto ditiki nya beeyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝ . ”
Diyi lɔnii , Yesu édufǝ ɔklɔ kafo ku wǝ bakasebi . Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bɔyila ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ busu lekpake nǝ nse . ” Nyaso bédu bésu .
Se bányɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ bantɔɔ , Yesu álabe selabe . Nya lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ufiebi étsyiko bɔsɔ kekleke nya ntu dítsyiko bɔsɔ kedufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo itǝ bǝ bédufǝ lǝ ukpǝ ku mǝnkpǝ eto nti .
Bakasebi bamǝ ésu básanklisǝ Yesu nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boanto ! Boanto ! Boǝbǝ bukpǝ ! ” Mfó nya Yesu létaka úńyǝ nya óto ɔkɔɛ uti ufiebi ku ntu bo nlɛ bonwa kakpanka , nya nyamblɛ díyuǝ kɛnyɛ nya lesa saa diyuǝ kanana .
Nya ɔ́tɔ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bimbǝ bofokanɔ ? ” Fɛɛ iyifo mǝ naa , nya sikpi tsya dímuǝ mǝ . Nya bátɔ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ko ni utidi ǝmfo ? Woedi ufiebi ku lekpo etiki nya yetsyue wǝ koto ! ”
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi áyila bésu bédufǝ Gadara eto kasɔ lǝ ditumbukplɛ eto lekpake nǝ nkpiɔ Galilea eto kasɔ .
Se Yesu lɛbɔ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ koo , osani utsyuǝ wǝ awɔnɔ bua nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ étsyi umǝ ǝmǝ úbǝ ótsyako wǝ . Yóofo lefe kpǝ se utidi ǝmfo díkayɛ leyaleya katsyilama . Nya wóakatɔnɔ nkǝ woǝsiǝ lǝ diyo enso lǝ edi nti .
Se únyǝ Yesuu , ófa nya óto wǝ ǝsuǝ ókpo lǝ kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto akɔ . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ bembembe nkǝ , “ Yesu , Onanto Fanlofanlo eto Ubi ! Be nkpe lǝ bonko ku fǝ lenti mfo ? Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , mǝnnǝ mɛ koto ! ”
Utidi ǝmfo átɛyi nyamfo , itsyise Yesu áto ɔkuɛ ókpe lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ mfó , nya ɔ́tɛyi ni nkǝ , “ Bɔ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ” Lefe kpǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsiǝ utidi ǝmǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ bákle wǝ ani ku akpa kulaa tsya bákpe wǝ lǝ amanaa , úkǝfǝsǝ amana nyamǝ nya lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ díkǝnǝ wǝ kesuko mfiminti .
Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ baakpo fǝ ? ” Mfó nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ baakpo bǝ Omantsya . ” Ɔ́tɛyi nko itsyise awɔnɔ bua kpǝ dídufǝ ísiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mfóo , awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa yǝnkǝ woanla nnya otsyese kaka awɔnɔ bua lǝǝsiǝ kǝnyǝ kanyi .
Mfóo , bakplako kpǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝ békedi . Nya awɔnɔ bua nyamǝ lɛlɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ utǝ lǝ bedufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya Yesu dítǝ mǝ kusu .
Nyaso bábɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya bédufǝ lǝ bakplako bamǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝmblɛ dítsyetsyi báwunini lǝ kɔtini komǝ eto kotosi nya bédufǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ nya bánya bátsylɔ kenke .
Lefe nǝ betidi ba díkabe bakplako bamǝ dínyǝ asa nnya díbǝ mfóo , bétsyetsyi bésu bátɛyi betidi ba lɛkɛ lǝ umǝ ku mbuto bo letsylama mfó kenke .
Nya betidi bamǝ lɛbɔ bésu bǝ lǝ besu babe lesa nǝ díbǝ . Nya se bésu báyo Yesu ɔflɔɔ , bǝnyǝ osani wǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu léla awɔnɔ bua utsyiko nya unsi lǝ Yesu eto akɔ untǝkǝ ǝnǝ wuee nya onkpe awu lǝ ǝsuǝ unsi kpoo . Mfóo , mǝmblɛ áte sikpi .
Betidi ba dínyǝ kase asa nyamfó díbǝǝ , átɛyi mba mfó kase Yesu létsya utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ awɔnɔ bua dísiǝ fɛ íkakpa wǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Gadare eto kasɔ eto betidi átɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ udu lǝ mǝ kasɔ , itsyise sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti . Nyaso Yesu édufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ údu .
Mfó nya utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu léla awɔnɔ bua úlǝkǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa nkǝ , “ Tǝ kusu lǝ ntǝkǝko fǝ . ” Fɛɛ Yesu mántɔnɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ ,
“ Sinkli esu oto lǝ esu atɛyi lesa nǝ Onanto diyifo útǝ fǝ . ” Lǝ nyaso utidi ǝmfó ésu ɔ́yɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ka nkpe mfó úkatɛyi asa nnya kenke Yesu díyifo útǝ wǝ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu dísinkli úsu ɔ́yila ditumbukplɛ nǝ nkpe mfó , betidi bamfó áfo wǝ kukɔnɔ , itsyise mǝmblɛ ǝsiǝ bákabe wǝ kusu .
Mfó nya osani wǝ baakpo Yairo wǝ lídi Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ ɔni ǝbǝ óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto akɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ utǝkǝko wǝ lǝ besu wǝ diyo ,
itsyise wǝ ubisiobi ɔni wǝ díkafo fe alɛ lefosi ǝnuǝ , labe ɔlɛ bufi nya okpe lǝ ukpǝ ku mǝnkpǝ eto nti . Se Yesu lɛyɛ ɔntɔɔ , betidi kpǝ ǝtǝkǝko wǝ báma wǝ bákpe .
Nya lǝ betidi bamfó ntii , usio wǝ kɔtɔ díkakpo itǝ lefosi alɛ ǝnuǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ tsya akɛ mǝ lenti . Usio ǝmfo ábiasǝ wǝ atabi kenke nkǝ lǝ otsya wǝ bufi bomǝ , fɛɛ ókplatsya ɔ́nɔ .
Ɔ́yɛ buɛɛ lǝ Yesu eto kama lǝ betidi nti nya útidi wǝ awu eto kotosi . Lamfolamfo kɔtɔ komǝ áyɛ wǝ bokpo .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ nkǝ , “ Owoe dítidi mɛ ? ” Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa mántɔnɔ . Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , be kase betidi kpǝ ntǝkǝko fǝ nya bama fǝ bakpe ! ”
Tsyaa , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyi miǝ utidi utsyuǝ étidi mɛ , itsyise ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ ábɔ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Se usio ǝmǝ léte nkǝ wǝmbofo ǝsuǝ bɔbiɔsǝ esoo , útsyiko butinkǝ nya óse akonki ókpe disi kasɔ lǝ Yesu eto akɔ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi lesa nǝ eso útidi Yesu eto awu lǝ betidi ba kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nya úlǝkǝ ɔ́tɛyi lesa nǝ eso útidi wǝ awu ku kase bufi bomǝ lɛyɛ wǝ lamfolamfo .
Lǝ nyamfo eso Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ubisiobi , fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . Su lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Lefenǝ Yesu nsi ɔnlɛ etiki budii , ɔtɔyɛ ɔni ǝbǝ údufǝ wǝ dítsyi Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Yairo ɔflɔ . Nya úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ ébukpǝ koko , nyaso yɛ oteasa ǝmǝ bulǝ . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu ánɔ ditiki nǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi Yairo nkǝ , “ Mante sikpi . Fǝ fo anɔ fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ebɔkɛ ale . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ bésu bédufǝ Yairo eto diyo mfóo , wǝntǝ utidi saa kusu nkǝ udufǝ diyo kafo enso Petro ku Yohanes ku Yakobo ku ubisiobi ǝmǝ eto anto ku ambe hã .
Nya betidi kpǝ díńyǝ mfó banlɛ nku buwi ku kudu lǝ ubi ǝmǝ eso . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biensiwi keku . Ubi ǝmǝ mǝnkpǝ . Selabe ete ɔnlɛ . ”
Mfóo , nya mǝmblɛ dímǝ wǝ , itsyise mǝ yi bǝnkǝ úkpǝ .
Yesu ákɔbe wǝ lǝ kɔni nya ókpadi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ubi , taka ǝńyǝ ! ”
Usiobi ǝmǝ ésinkli úbǝ nkpǝ nya ótaka úńyǝ lamfolamfo . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ bǝtǝ ubisiobi ǝmǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ udi .
Asa nyamfo kenke éyifo wǝ antomǝ yanii , fɛɛ Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato nkǝ bantɛyi utidi saa lesa nǝ díbǝ mfó .
Lǝ nyamfó eto kamaa , Yesu ákpadi wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamfó óboko wǝ akɔ nya útǝ mǝ kusu ku ǝsuǝale lǝ befi bala awɔnɔ bua kenke ku lǝ batsya efimbi akpa akpa tsya .
Nya óla mǝ ótsyese nkǝ besu bedi betidi etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ batsya befimfi bufi .
Fɛ booduu , Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bientsyi kulesa bisuko lǝ mi esu bɔyɛ ǝsuǝ fe uyilɛlɛ nye fe mba laadia asa eto katobe nye didisa nye atabi . Nya bientsyi akpesa bamba kulaa tsya .
Diyo nǝ kee baafo mii , bisiǝ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ ke biudu lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
Nya kaka ke bamfo mii , bidu lǝ umǝ ǝmfó lǝ bɛflɛ mi akpa eto utembu bekpo mfó . Nyamfo loote Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ eto ditsyǝbi nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ itǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . ”
Nya bakasebi bamǝ dídu bésu bátsyilama mbuto bomǝ kenke nya bédi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ , bátsya befimfi kalebe saa tsya .
Se Oka Herodes wǝ nlɛ seka budi lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ lɛnɔ asa nnya kenke nlɛ bubǝǝ , wǝ nsusu ǝlǝ wǝ itsyise betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes ni nwǝ disi ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ .
Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Elia ni nwǝ disi úsinkli úbǝ . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi koko bǝtsyuǝ eto ɔni uni wǝ dísinkli úbǝ nkpǝ .
Mfó nya Oka Herodes lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ dítǝ kusu miǝ bala Yohanes eto disi , nyaso owoe uni wǝ disi úbǝ ɔnlɛ asa nyamfo buyifo nya maanɔ wǝ diye mfo ? ” Nyaso Oka Herodes kábɛbɛ kusu ko wɔɔyɛ lǝ unyǝ Yesu .
Se bakasebi bamǝ dísinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi Yesu lesa saa nǝ béyifo . Mfó nya ókpa mǝ hã ɔ́yɛnko nya bédu bésu umǝ wǝ baakpo Betsaida .
Se betidi kpǝ lɛnɔ nkoo , bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bésu mfó . Yesu tsya áfo mǝ nya údi mǝ etiki utsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ , nya ótsya mba bufi nlɛ bulǝ .
Se kale nlɛ boloo , lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tǝ lǝ betidi bamfo lǝ bedu lǝ besu mbuto bo nkpe lǝ lekpake mfó , lǝ babɛbɛ lesa ku kasɔnɔkɔ , itsyise mfo eyifo ntɛnti . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ mǝ lesatsyuǝ lǝ bedi . ” Mfó nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Didisa nǝ bɔnlɛ mfo eyifo abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ . Ala fǝ busu boya lesa boboko betidi kpenkpe bamfo ? ”
Nya basani bamǝ eyifo akpi anɔ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ etsyukpa etsyukpa fe betidi awosi anɔ anɔ . ”
Nya se bakasebi bamǝ ditǝ bǝsiǝ nko ,
Yesu éfi abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ nyamǝ nya óbesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato . Ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , úbudi nnya nya úfi útǝ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ befi besiǝ bǝtǝ betidi bamǝ .
Nya mǝmblɛ dídi bémi nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛsɛ nnya wɛlɛwɛlɛ díbu nya íyi etsyitsya lefosi ǝnuǝ .
Diyi lɔni se Yesu mate nlɛ ola botoo , wǝ bakasebi ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ . Nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe betidi laatɛyi bǝ wǝ mini ? ”
Mfó nya bǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtsyuǝ aatɛyi bǝnkǝ fǝ ni Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes . Betsyuǝ tsya bǝ Elia . Nya bǝtsyuǝ laatɛyi bǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi koko eto ɔni wǝ disi úsinkli úbǝ nkpǝ feni . ”
Mfó nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nya mimii , owoe biebu biǝ wǝ mini ? ” Mfó nya Petro dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . ”
Yesu ǝkǝ mǝ ato kekleke nkǝ bántɛyi utidi saa ditiki nǝmfo .
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , nyǝ kanyi tinti lǝ beninǝ ku besumunyǝ eto beninǝ ku afi eto bateasa eto ani nya bɔɔni mɛ boolo mɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ esuǝǝ , Onanto ebotakasǝ mɛ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ mbǝ nkpǝ . ”
Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝmblɛ kenke nkǝ , “ Lǝ utsyuǝ ala nkǝ wǝǝtǝkǝko mɛɛ , ele bǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ato ku wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ alasa ǝsuǝ nya lǝ utsyi wǝ uyikabie utǝkǝko mɛ diyi saa .
Itsyise utidi saa wǝ laala nkǝ waata wǝ disi eto nkpǝ , woonyansǝ mu . Nya utidi saa wǝ loonyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ nkǝ lǝ utǝkǝko mɛ , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Nte kutǝkǝ ko utidi luunyǝ lǝ únyǝ kawunsiǝ ka kenke eto bikǝ nya ónyansǝ wǝ nkpǝ manlo ?
Lǝ mɔ ku mɔ asa nnya maate kenke álɛ utidi utsyuǝ kofanii , wǝ tsya ebɔlɛ Utidi Eto Ubi kofani lǝ lefe nǝ uubǝ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ku wǝ Anto eto diyǝnde ku batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ kenke eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ba nkpe mfoo , embukpǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bǝnyǝ Onanto sekadidi siamǝ . ”
Fe Kɔsida kɔni eto kama se Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfoo , ókpa Petro ku Yohanes ku Yakobo ɔ́yɛnko bésu bábe kɔtini besu ko disinti ola katokɔ .
Se ɔnlɛ ola botoo , wǝ ǝnǝmi eto ditsyǝbi afloma nya wǝ awu nnya onkpe léfloma iflubi futututu ɛnlɛ boto lǝ ǝnǝmi .
Lamfolamfoo , betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ ba ni Moses ku Elia nya banlɛ wǝ etiki budinko .
Bábɔ ku Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde nya bédi etiki ku Yesu itsyi lǝ kusu ko diyifo Onanto eto lelabi nkǝ ɔyɛ lǝ ko ǝsuǝ lǝ ukpǝ lǝ Yerusalem .
Petro ku wǝ bǝtsyuǝ álabe selabe sio sio sio , tsya básankli bǝnyǝ diyǝnde kplɛ nǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu lɛkɛ ku betidi inuǝ ba wonko mǝ díńyǝ mfó .
Se betidi inuǝ bamfo nlɛ budu lǝ Yesu flɔɔ , Petro átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bo mfo bubǝ alɛkɛ itǝ bo tinti ! Tǝ lǝ boto ebu ǝtsyǝ mfo . Lɔni itǝ fǝ , lɔni itǝ Moses , nya lɔni tsya itǝ Elia . ” Nya asa nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo kenkee , wóante lefe nǝ ɔ́tɛyi nnya tsya .
Lefe nǝ úńyǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budii , lɛtɔntɔ ábɔ díti mǝ kenke . Nya bakasebi bamǝ léte sikpi lǝ lefe nǝ lɛtɔntɔ nǝmfo léba lékpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mfó ǝmǝ bánɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ lǝ lɛtɔntɔ nǝmǝ kafo wǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ nwǝ mfo ni mɔ Ubi Wǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ . Bitsyue wǝ ditiki koto ! ”
Se ditiki eto ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ lélaa , bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ Yesu mate ete díńyǝ mfó . Bakasebi bamǝ éfi nnya bǝnyǝ mfó bákula , bántɛyi utidi saa nnya kulesa lǝ lefe nǝmǝ .
Se kale dísiǝǝ , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi itsyǝ bamǝ áyifǝ betsyi kɔtini komǝ ǝsuǝ bǝbǝ kasɔ . Nya bǝbǝ bétu betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya osani utsyuǝ léfa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Oteasa ! Nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa , be mɔ ubi ǝmfo ! Wǝ ete ni mɔ ubi nɛ !
Lɛwɔnɔ bua ditsyuǝ ǝsiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya diǝtǝ woafa bembembe . Diǝtinkǝsǝ wǝ kekleke kǝmuǝ wǝ kasɔ lǝ kasɔ nya waafo afabe nya efu laabɔ wǝ lǝ kɛnyɛ . Yeeyifo wǝ nko kekleke kaklɛ fɛ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ laataka lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nlɛ fǝ bakasebi lekpakpa minkǝ bala lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝmǝ bǝtǝ mɛ , fɛɛ bámfo ni bola . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi mmi eto betidi , beso biamfo mɛ kanɔ nya bitidi ato mmǝ ? Nte lefe nǝ eto okle ele bǝ mfi nkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ isu ese ? Nya nte lefe nǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ ele bǝ nkpe utu ntǝ mi fɛ lǝ ndu mi lǝ ɔflɔ . ” Nya ɔ́tɛyi osani ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Kpa fǝ ubi ǝmǝ aboko mfo . ”
Kase ubi ǝmǝ nlɛ bubǝ koo , lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ko dísiǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ dímuǝ wǝ lɛsɔ lǝ kasɔnti nya dítinkǝsǝ wǝ . Mfó nya Yesu díti lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ kusu nya ótsya ubi ǝmǝ nya úfi wǝ útǝ wǝ anto .
Onanto eto ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamfo éyifo betidi bamfó kenke yanii . Yesu eto eyifosa kenke édufǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ iyifo mǝ yanii lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ ,
“ Bianta lesa nǝ mǝǝbǝ mi bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ ! Nyamblɛ ebubǝ itǝ itsyi lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝ , buufi wǝ bakpe lǝ betidi eto ani . ”
Fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ mánnɔ asa nyamfo eto kasɔ . Iyifo lesa nǝ béfi bákula mǝ , fɛɛ báte sikpi lǝ kase bɔɔtɔ wǝ lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ banɔ kasɔ .
Kǝnǝ kǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ kédufǝ lǝ bakasebi bamǝ nti itsyi lǝ futsyuǝ ni ɔkplɛnyǝ onso lǝ mǝ nti .
Nya se Yesu léte mǝ nsusu esoo , úfi dikpefi ditsyuǝ úbǝ úńyǝnsǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ke loofo dikpefi nǝmfo lǝ mɔ diye ǝsuǝǝ , ófo mintsya . Nya utidi wǝ loofo mɛɛ , oofo utidi wǝ létsyese mɛ . Itsyise utidi wǝ laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kenke lǝ mi ntii , wǝ ni utidi wǝ nso kenke nɛ . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yohanes lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , búnyǝ utidi ɔni wǝ nlɛ awɔnɔ bua bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ nya bɔ́tɛyi wǝ boǝnkǝ úsinkli ɔyɛ , itsyise umbǝ bo lenti . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bienti wǝ kusu , bete biǝnkǝ uńyǝ mi kama . ”
Nya se lefe nǝ ele bǝ Onanto kpa Yesu usuko kato nlɛ boyoo , Yesu áse uyi nkǝ wuusu Yerusalem .
Ótsyese batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ bátɔ bésu umǝ utsyuǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ Samaria eto kasɔ lǝ besu bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ itǝ wǝ bubǝ .
Fɛɛ se umǝ ǝmfo eto betidi léte bǝ wɔɔyɛ mfo ofe lǝ ɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem esoo , bámfo wǝ .
Mfó se bakasebi ba ni Yohanes ku Yakobo dínyǝ nko esoo , bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , aala fǝ bokpadi ute utsyi kato ubǝ ɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ , úyenki ókpe mǝ .
Nya Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi bamǝ léfe bésu umǝ bamba .
Se banyɛ bantɔɔ , osani utsyuǝ átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Muutǝkǝko fǝ nsu kaka ke fantɔ . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nkpaflɔbɛ kpe ǝbiǝ nnya kafo baalabe , nya baklɔbɛ nkpe ayo . Fɛɛ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmbǝ kaka wuuluǝ wǝ disi . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi utidi bamba nkǝ , “ Tǝkǝko mɛ . ” Fɛɛ utidi ǝmfo nkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ mɛ kusu lǝ nsu mbikǝ mɔ anto fɛ . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝ mba nsi nkpǝ fe bekpǝnkpǝ lǝ besu bebikǝ mǝ bekpǝnkpǝ tsyuǝ . Nya mii , bisu bikatɛyi Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto ditiki nǝmǝ . ”
Utidi ɔni tsya nkǝ , “ Bonamute , muutǝkǝko fǝ . Fɛɛ tǝ mɛ kusu lǝ nsu nkla mɔ betidi fɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nwǝ ditsyǝ keyifo kasɔ ku dinwuǝ , fɛ weesinkli kabe kamaa , mǝńyǝ utǝ keyifo kǝtǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Bonamute ǝlǝkǝ betidi fosi akuanse ku inuǝ bamba nya óla mǝ ótsyese inuǝ , inuǝ nkǝ besu kǝmǝ ku mbuto bo útsyue útsyǝ nkǝ lǝ usu ɔyɛ ofe .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛkuɛnkǝ bia díkayo bulǝkǝ fui , fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ emfui . Nyaso bɛlɛ ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lekpakpa lǝ otsyese beyifoyifo lǝ bǝbǝ bawunsǝ lǝ bǝlǝkǝ bɛkuɛnkǝ biamǝ .
Bisu ! Nlɛ mi botsyese fe asamubi lǝ bekiti eto nti .
Bientsyi atabitobe nye asatɔtɔ eto katobe nye afokpa , nya biǝnńyǝ lǝ kusu bisiǝsǝ kuutsyuǝ saa .
“ Diyo saa biudufǝ , bisiǝsǝ mǝ bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Diyuǝ itǝ diyo nǝmfo ku ni betidi . ’
Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ wǝ laala diyuǝ kpe lǝ mfóo , bitǝ lǝ mi diyuǝ lǝ ditǝkǝko futsyǝ ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ mfóo , bidu ku mi diyuǝ eto kǝsiǝ kamǝ .
Bisiǝ lǝ diyo nǝ ke bɛsɔnɔ . Nya lesa saa nǝ ke boofi bǝtǝ mi , bidi lǝ binǝ faa . Itsyise uyifoyifo saa , ǝńyǝ itǝ kayofofo . Biekedu lǝ diyo lɔni bisu lebamba .
“ Nya umǝ saa wǝ báfo mii , bidi lesa saa nǝ bootǝ mi .
Betsya befimfi ba nkpe lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Nya bɛtɛyi umǝ ǝmǝ eto betidi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Onanto eto sekakedidi ebɔfi mi . ’
Fɛɛ lǝ bisu umǝ utsyuǝ nya báni bámfo mii , bidu bisu obia nti lǝ bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ ,
‘ Mi umǝ ǝmfo eto utembu bo nkpo bo lǝ akpa kulaa tsyaa , nnyǝ mu bɔ́flɛ bókpo mi mfo . Fɛɛ bekloma biǝ Onanto eto sekadidi eto lefe ebɔfi mi ! ’
Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti kekleke minkǝ lǝ diyi nǝ bookponko betidi lekpo ayoo , Onanto ebunyǝ Sodom eto umǝ kulaa tsya kaminsǝ eso umǝ ǝmfo .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Korasimfɔ ! Nya mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Betsaidafɔ ! Itsyise lǝ ayanisa nnya mínyifo lǝ mi nti ete mínyifo lǝ Tiro ku Sidon eto kǝmǝ bua inii , eni bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ , béfi afianku báyimi , bédiki ntɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya léte bǝnkǝ báni abua nnya béyifo !
Onanto ebunyǝ Tiro ku Sidon eto kǝmǝ kaminsǝ eso mi lǝ Lekpoyi ǝsuǝ .
Nya fǝ Kapernaum eto umǝ , bubu fanlɛ fǝ babesǝ fǝ ku fǝ betidi kato eso ? Bɔɔtsylɔsǝ mi , bato mi bakpe lǝ ute ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ke lɔɔnɔ mi ditikii , mɔ ditiki ɔnɔ . Nya utidi saa wǝ lɛni mii , mɔ ɔ́ni . Nya utidi saa wǝ lɛni mɛ , wote nkǝ ɔ́ni Onanto wǝ létsyese mɛ . ”
Betidi fosi akuanse ku inuǝ bamǝ ésinkli bǝbǝ ku disuǝyuǝ . Nya bǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , awɔnɔ bua kulaa tsya étsyue bo ditiki koto se bóla nnya búlǝkǝ lǝ fǝ diye ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ Obonsam se ófankli útsyi kato úbǝ kasɔ fe ofamfa seka .
Bɛnɔ kukɔnɔ ! Ntǝ mi ǝsuǝale bǝ biofo buńyǝ lǝ bawa ku bakpoe ǝsuǝ . Ku lǝ beso olontidi eto ǝsuaǝle kenke ani nya kulesa saa embuyifo mi .
Fɛɛ yenyifo mi disuǝyuǝ bǝ awɔnɔ bua etsyue mi ditiki ato . Bomu binyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ Onanto áwɔni mi aye ókpe lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ kato . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ákpe disuǝyuǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ kenke nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Anto , kato ku kasɔ eto Onamute , maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise asa nnya féfi fákula bekuente ku babesibe , ǝlǝkǝ nnya áte mba lenni kulesa ku mba nte fe bekpefi . Sitintii , Anto , nko nkpe fǝ ɔkɔɛ nɛ . ”
Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto éfi asa nnya kenke utǝ mɛ . Kuutsyuǝ saa enyi nwǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ , enso Onanto mate hã . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa lenyi utidi wǝ Anto ǝmǝ tsya ni , enso wǝ Ubi ɔni kplo wǝ mate hã ku betidi ba Ubi ǝmǝ dílǝkǝ nkǝ bate Anto ǝmǝ tsya . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ óbe wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ mate buɛɛ nkǝ , “ Ǝsuǝ yuǝ mi sitinti bǝ bɛlɛ asa nnya bɛnlɛ bunyǝ mfo bunyǝ !
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kpǝ ku baka tsya ála bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bunyǝ , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ , nya lǝ bánnɔ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ bɔnɔ , fɛɛ bɔ́nnɔ . ”
Kɔfi eto oteasa utsyuǝ ǝbǝ nkǝ woato Yesu obe . Nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , be ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be Asawɔniwɔni Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi ? Nya ntsyǝ faanɔ ditiki nǝmǝ kasɔ ? ”
Nya osani ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ La Bonamute Onanto ku fǝ utu kenke , ku fǝ lɛwɔnɔ kenke ku fǝ ǝsuǝale kenke ku fǝ nsusu kenke tsya , nya laala fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe fǝ ǝsuǝ ke . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Átɛyi ɛlɛkɛ nko . Yifo nko ete ebunyǝ nkpǝ manlo . ”
Fɛɛ se kɔfi eto oteasa ǝmǝ léla lǝ utǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lɛbɛ esoo , usi ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Owoe ni mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfe mǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ étsyi Yerusalem ɔ́tɔ lǝ Yeriko nya beyu dímuǝ wǝ lǝ kusu . Báblɛ wǝ nya bǝlǝkǝ wǝ bikǝ kenke lǝ ǝsuǝ nya báyani wǝ betsyǝ mfó lǝ ukpǝ ku mǝnkpǝ eto nti .
Íbǝ bǝ Onanto eto usumunyǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔlɛ bɔyɛ kafe lǝ kusu komǝ mfó . Fɛɛ se únyǝ utidi ǝmfo lǝ kusu ɔflɔ , ɔ́yɛ lǝ lekpake bamba fe údu .
Nko kǝ Lewinyǝ , utsyuǝ tsya díbǝ ɔ́yɛ mfo ɔnlɛ bofe . Nya se únyǝ osani ǝmǝ , wuntsya áyɛ lǝ ɔflɔ bamba ófe údu .
Fɛɛ Samarianyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ dibǝ ɔ́yɛ lǝ kusu mfo ɔnlɛ bofe , ǝbǝ útu utidi ǝmǝ . Nya se únyǝ wǝ , wǝ asa ǝnǝ wǝ kafo .
Ɔ́yɛ úsu wǝ ɔflɔ nya úfi nnuǝbi ku ntǝ ókpo lǝ wǝ afabe nyamǝ ǝsuǝ nya ókle nnya kenke , nya útsyi osani ǝmǝ útǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ubuki ǝsuǝ . Nya úfi wǝ úsuko bafɔ eto kasɔnɔkɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ ola óbe wǝ .
Se kale disiǝ , úlǝkǝ atabi ǝtsyuǝ útǝ nwǝ laabe bafɔ eto kasɔnɔkɔ kamǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kalɛ wǝ ola . Nya lǝ nsinkli mbǝ nlɛ bofe mfoo , moofo fǝ lesa nǝ ke fesi fábiasǝ lǝ wǝ bobe ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɔ afi eto oteasa ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Nya lǝ fǝ nsusu ǝsuǝ , betidi itsyǝ bamfo nti eto owoe lǝ fǝ ǝnyǝsa ǝsuǝ , ni utidi wǝ didufǝ lǝ bewudifɔ bamfo eto ani eto ɔyimitsyuǝ ? ”
Afi eto oteasa ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ dinyǝ wǝ kaminsǝ . ” Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya su lǝ esu eyifo nko . ”
Se Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi lɛyɛ lǝ kusu bantɔ , bésu bedufǝ kebuto kǝtsyuǝ . Usio utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Marta ákpa wǝ úsuko wǝ diyo .
Ɔyimisio utsyuǝ akɛ Marta wǝ baakpo Maria . Usio ǝmfo ǝsiǝ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔnlɛ wǝ asa nnya ɔnlɛ bote bɔnɔ .
Diyo bobe eto asa nnya dísu ítǝkǝ lǝ Marta mate ǝsuǝ étsyiko wǝ bulǝ . Nya úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , yenyifo fǝ kulesa bǝ mɔ ɔyimisio áyani diyo bobe eto asa buyifo nyamfó kenke utǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ ? Tɛyi wǝ lǝ ubǝ ɔwunsǝko mɛ ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ O Marta ! Be kase fanlɛ ǝsuǝ bulǝ lǝ asa kpǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ lesa lɔni ete loohiã bǝ babɛbɛ . Nya lesa nǝmǝ ni nǝ Maria dílǝkǝ nɛ . Nya bensiembofo ni lǝ wǝ ani . ”
Diyi lɔnii , Yesu ákɛ lǝ kalebe kǝtsyuǝ ókato ola . Se ólosǝ , wǝ bakasebi eto ɔni , ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , te bo kase buukato ola fe kase Yohanes léte wǝ bakasebi . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bɛlɛ ola botoo , bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bo Anto , tǝ lǝ bakpasǝ fǝ diye . Fǝ sekadidi lǝ sibǝ . Beyifo lǝ fǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo fe kase inte kato .
Tǝ bo bo diyi saa eto didisa .
Nya lǝ efi bo abua atsyɛ bo , fe kase bo tsya leefi katsyɛ utidi saa wǝ laata bo kebu . Nya mǝntǝ lǝ budufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ nya le ǝlǝkǝ bo etsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . ’ ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ áyɛ úsu wǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ eto diyo ku ntsyenti úsu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyɛtsyuǝ , dia ǝlǝmbo ǝtsyǝ ǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ ,
itsyise mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ ɔni etsyi kusu ubǝ ɔsɔnɔ mɛ mɔmɔ . Nya didisa saa ente muutǝ wǝ ! ’
“ Nya fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mǝmbǝ ǝlǝ mɛ ! Bonko mɔ bebi ebolabe nya búti siku lǝ diyo . Mensi embofo botaka mɔmɔ kǝbǝ kǝtǝ fǝ kulesa . ’
Lǝ íbǝ bǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , be ni lesa nǝ fuuyifo ? Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ mǝ sɛyɛtsyuǝ mate esoo , wǝmbotaka . Fɛɛ lǝ kase fǝnyǝ fanlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ hã esoo , wootaka utǝ fǝ lesa saa nǝ fanlɛ bɔbɛbɛ .
“ Bɛtɔ asa lǝ befi bǝtǝ mi . Bɛbɛbɛ asa lǝ binyǝ . Bɛsɔ siku lǝ basini mi .
Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ laatɔ asaa , bǝǝtǝ wǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laabɛbɛɛ , wǝǝnyǝ . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ laasɔ sikuu , bɔɔsini wǝ .
“ Nya mimba ni bebiantomǝǝ , biefi owa kǝtǝ lǝ lɛkpɛ nǝ ubi lɛtɔ mi eto kɛnyɛ ?
Nye okpoe bomu biefi kǝtǝ wǝ lǝ dikusɛmfɔ nǝ ɔ́tɔ eto kɛnyɛ ?
Mimba ni babuayifo kulaa tsya yi kase buifi asa sɛɛ bitǝ mi bebi . Nya ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ ku Boanto wǝ nkpe kato itǝ bo ? Ntsyǝ yoofó bubǝ bǝ wǝmbufi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ utǝ betidi ba laatɔ wǝ ? ”
Lefe lɔnii , Yesu ákala lɛwɔnɔ bua nǝ lǝǝndi etiki ketsyiko lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso se lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lɛbɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ko , utidi ǝmǝ étsyiko etiki budi . Nyamfo éyifo betidi ba díńyǝ mfó yanii .
Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Awɔnɔ bua kenke eto uninǝ wǝ baakpo Beelsebul eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ woafo nya bola kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya léla bǝ baato Yesu babe eso bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ úyifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ ote nkǝ Onanto ɔflɔ utsyi .
Fɛɛ Yesu wǝ ate mǝ nsusu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sekakedikɔ saa sia lema akpa akpa nya mǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ nlɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ , sekakedikɔ siamfo eboba . Nya diyo nǝ ke eto betidi lǝǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ , diyo nǝmǝ eboba .
Nyaso lǝ boma kpe lǝ Obonsam eto sekakedikɔɔ , ntsyǝ fɛ wǝ sekakedikɔ siamǝ luunyǝ ? Bɛlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ maala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Beelsebul eto ǝsuǝale nnya wǝǝtǝ mɛ eso .
Nya lǝ Beelsebul ǝsuǝ maala mǝǝ , bawoe ǝsuǝ mba ntǝkǝko mi laayɛ kala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ ? Mi kosate eto mba ntǝkǝko mi lɛ bulǝkǝ kate nkǝ bidia baatɛyi .
Owo lo ! Onanto eto ǝsuǝale bomu ǝsuǝ maala awɔnɔ bua kǝlǝkǝ . Nyalɛ nyamfo lɛ bulǝkǝ kate mi wuee nkǝ , Onanto eto sekakedidi ébubǝ sékpe lǝ mi nti koko .
“ Lǝ ǝsuǝaletidi utsyuǝ ǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ bemamakǝ uńyǝ ɔlɛ wǝ diyo bosee , te fǝ bike bia nte wǝ embonya .
Fɛɛ lǝ utidi wǝ nkpe ale nso wǝ ǝbǝ nkǝ woakpɔ ku wǝ nya óso wǝ anii , woalɛ wǝ bemamakǝ bia ǝsuǝ ufi wǝ disi utǝkǝ kafo nya woalɛ utidi ǝmǝ eto bikǝ kafo kesiǝ kǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
“ Utidi wǝ ke lǝmbǝ lǝ mɔ lekpakee , te fǝ uńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ sitinti . Nya utidi wǝ ke laankpa asa kǝtsyǝ ditsyu ku mɛ , te fǝ ɔlɛ nnya busense kewi .
“ Lǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua ábɔ lǝ utidi ǝsuǝǝ , diesu katsyilama nlebe nlebe bo lekoe kabɛbɛ kaka diɔkɛ ditsyǝ ɔnwɛ . Nya lǝ díǝnnyǝ kedufǝkɔɔ , diatɛyi ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Muusinkli nsu mɔ diyo nǝ mínsiǝ kɔ . ’
Nyaso diesinkli kesu kabe ǝkǝnyǝ nkǝ bákpa diyo nǝmǝ kafo kɛnkɛnkɛ nya lesa saa nte kukɔnɔ .
Lǝ nnya esoo , diabɛbɛ awɔnɔ bua akuanse nnya nkpe disiale enso ni nya bǝǝbǝ bǝ lǝ bǝsiǝ mfo . Lǝ kalosǝkɔ , utidi ǝmfo eto nkpǝ bo woǝsiǝ abia kaso mbo úsiǝ kɔ kulaa tsya . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi asa nyamfoo , usio utsyuǝ wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ betidi bamǝ nti áfa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto lǝ okpo usio wǝ lélé fǝ ku nwǝ dítǝ fǝ lɛmi fáyimi atsyɔ ! ”
Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba laanɔ Onanto eto ditiki nya beeyifo lǝ ni ǝsuǝ , mǝ bomu ele bǝ bǝnyǝ disuǝnyuǝ nɛ ! ”
Nya se betidi bamǝ dítsyiko bufui lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝǝ , úsukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe kase mi mmi eto betidi nkpe sibusufɔ ! Ayanisa eto bulǝkǝ kate nya baala bǝ bǝǝnyǝ , fɛɛ bembunyǝ anyinisa saa enso nya díbǝ lǝ Yona ǝsuǝ seka .
Fe kase Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yona eto ale díbǝ itǝ lǝ Ninivefɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke Utidi eto Ubi tsya eto ale luubǝ fe ditsyǝbi itǝ mmi eto betidi nɛ .
Nya lǝ diyi fɛfɛ eto Lekpoyi ǝsuǝǝ , Besio eto Oka wǝ dítsyi Ɔnwɛdikue ebotaka uńyǝ nya woote mi lɛnimi lǝ lɛwɔ olo mi dikpi , itsyise ótaka útsyi lǝ wǝ kasɔ ka letso famfamfa úsu nkǝ lǝ ɔnɔ Oka Salomo eto kobetete eto asa . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ utidi wǝ nso Salomoo , wǝ ni nwǝ mfo nɛ .
Ninivefɔ ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Lekpoyi Fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ nya boolo mi mmi eto betidi bamfo dikpi . Itsyise lefe nǝ Yona lɛtɛyi mǝ Onanto eto ditikii , bátsyi báwuninsǝ nya báyɛ mǝ abua buyifo . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utidi ɔni utsyuǝ kpe lǝ mi nti mfo wǝ lɛmɔ onso Yona kulaa tsya !
“ Utidi kuutsyuǝ saa anto okandiɛ kefi kakula nye kakpe lǝ asa kalɔ . Bomu weefi wǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kǝtǝkǝkɔ kaka betidi ba lǝǝbǝ mfó luunyǝ asa wue .
Utidi eto ǝnǝmi eyifo fe okandiɛ itǝ wǝ utidi ǝmǝ . Lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnyǝ asa kukɔnɔɔ , fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke tsya , yuutǝ ǝnyǝ asa ekpa kenke . Fɛɛ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝmbǝ kɔnɔɔ , te fǝ fǝ utidi ǝmǝ kenke kpe lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso lɔ abe fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ bǝ diyǝnde nǝ nkpe fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mamfiani ketuntu .
Lǝ diyǝnde akpasǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ kenke nya fǝ kukalebe saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝǝ , te fǝ fǝ kalebe saa ebunyǝ lekpasǝ fe kase okandiɛ lǝǝyǝnde nya wǝ diyǝnde laakpo fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ seka . ”
Se Yesu dídi etiki ólosǝǝ , Farisinyǝ ɔni utsyuǝ ákpadi wǝ nkǝ ubǝ udi lesa lǝ wǝ diyo . Mfó nya úsu úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ lǝ udi lesa .
Íyifo Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ buɛ se únyǝ nkǝ Yesu mǝmflǝ kɔni fe kase mǝ lekpa lete fɛ útsyiko budi .
Nyaso Bonamute Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , mi Farisifɔ biǝflǝ mi kedikpɛ ku akɔbe eto kama , fɛɛ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , biyi ku lefomfi ku asa buayifoyifo sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
Bieninǝ ! Inni Onanto ǝmǝ ete ni nwǝ díyifo asa nnya kenke eto kafo ku kama lee ntsyǝ ?
Bifi lesa saa nǝ nkpe lǝ mi kakpɛ ku akɔbe kafo bitǝ bakombo bǝ lǝ mi lesa saa lǝ ele kɛnkɛnkɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Farisifɔ ! Biefi mi edisa ku mi nyoma eto bekolenkǝ ku seko ku afantosi akpa akpa , nnya laanyi fififi eto lekpafosile kǝtǝ Onanto . Fɛɛ bɛni asa sɛɛ buyifo lǝ kɔnukualɛsu ǝsuǝ nya biannla Onanto tsya . Nyamfo ni lesa nǝ ele bǝ biyifo bɛkɔ lǝ nnya bímfi bɛnlɛ buyifo koko , nya yanle bǝ bilǝkǝ ku kuǝtsyuǝ bitsyɛ kama .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi Farisifɔ ! Itsyise biala biǝ biǝsiǝ lǝ nsiǝkɔ kplɛ bo nso lǝ ntsyakɔ . Nya biala biǝ betidi kǝsiǝsǝ mi ku dibu lǝ obia .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi , itsyise bite fe edi nnya mbikǝ lǝ kasɔ bǝǝnyǝ kǝtsyǝ lekpo , nya betidi laayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kafe itsyise baante nko . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ kɔfi eto oteasa ɔni lǝ mǝ nti átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , lǝ atɛyi nyamfo nkoo , áka bontsya . ”
Nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi afi eto bateasa tsya . Itsyise bietsyisǝ betidi bikǝ bia bembofo butsyi . Nya biemfi nsusu kabe biǝ biawunsǝko mǝ lǝ mi butsyi ǝsuǝ .
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi sitinti , itsyise béto edi kukɔnɔ bitǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi . Fɛɛ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bamfoo , lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mi bana mǝ lélo mǝ .
Nya mi kosatee , bɛtɔnɔ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ biǝ lesa nǝ mi anto mǝ díyifo álɛkɛ . Mǝ lélo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi bamǝ nya mi léto mǝ edi .
Nyamfo eso Onanto lǝ wǝ kobetete ǝsuǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mootsyese mɔ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku batɔnkpe nya boolo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nya bootǝkǝko bǝtsyuǝ kama . ’
Nyaso mi mmi eto betidi kenkee , boonǝ mi koto lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba kenke bálo idu taa kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔ kǝ .
Idu lefe nǝ bálo Abel ibǝ eyo Sakaria wǝ bálo lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ku kakɛnkɛkɔ eto nti . Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , Onanto ebunǝ mi , mmi eto betidi ato lǝ nyamfo kenke eso !
“ Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ mi kɔfi eto bateasa ! Itsyise diyo nǝ kafo kobe nkpee , bíti ni siku bílǝkǝ safui bídunko . Fɛɛ mi kosate áni biǝ biembudufǝ lǝ ni kafo . Nya bieti betidi bamba ba nlɛ bokplatsya bǝ beedufǝ lǝ ni tsya kusu . ”
Se Yesu dídu lǝ kaka mfóo , Farisifɔ ku kɔfi eto bateasa étsyiko bunyǝnki nya bátɔ wǝ etiki kpǝ ku lɛblɔfi .
Nya banlɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ lǝ kase bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ bǝ ɔtɛyi kabua .
Se betidi akpi akpi bǝtsyuǝ díbǝ bátsya mfóo , itǝ bǝ bétsyiko bǝtsyuǝ bukǝ kamanklii , Yesu étsyiko wǝ bakasebi etiki budi katɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebe sinini lǝ Farisifɔ eto bidiabidia eto asayifoyifo nnya laayansǝ betidi ǝsuǝ .
Lesa saa nǝ betidi díyifo bákula , ǝbɔbɔ lǝ lekple utidi saa nyǝ wuǝ , nya akulasa saa ǝbɔbɔ bate .
Nyaso lesa saa nǝ ke bátɛyi lǝ kaka lenaa , diɔbɔ lǝ lekple banɔ . Nya asa nnya bátɛyi lǝ kawɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ diyo kǝmiǝǝ , boolǝkǝ nnya babe letsya utsyuǝ saa nɔ .
“ Bayɛtsyuǝ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , bianté sikpi betidi ba laafo etidisuǝ ete bolo nya bensiembofo kulesa buyifo lǝ nnya kama .
