Utidi wǝ ele bǝ bete sikpii , muulǝkǝ wǝ nte mi . Bete sikpi Onanto wǝ lǝ ólo fǝ ólosǝǝ , nya unsi onkpe ǝsuǝale uufi fǝ oto okpe lǝ ditefɛnku nǝ lǝǝnyǝ lefe saa kǝmiǝ . Befo mɛ bɛnɔ biǝ , wǝ ni utsyuǝ ele bǝ bete sikpi nɛ .
Inni pɛsewa inuǝ ete baate ntsyuɛ nnɔɔ ? Fɛɛ Onanto anta mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ .
Mi disi eto sɛwɔni kulaa tsya , Onanto yi se leklambi . Nyasoo , biensite sikpi itsyise befo koya beso baklɔbɛ kpǝ .
“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kasini minkǝ , utidi wǝ ke lɔɔtɛyi lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi nkǝ uyifo mɔ olee , Utidi Eto Ubi tsya ebofo wǝ fe wǝ ole lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe eto ǝnǝmi .
Fɛɛ utidi wǝ lɔɔni mɛ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmii , Utidi Eto Ubi tsya ebɔni wǝ lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
Nya utidi saa wǝ lɔɔtɛyi lesatsyuǝ uńyǝ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebufi ɔtsyɛ wǝ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ luudi mbusiotiki lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto embufi nnya ɔtsyɛ wǝ kulefe .
“ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bakpa mi besuko Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nye baka eto ǝnǝmi bǝ baakponko mi lekpoo , biǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ mi lǝ lesa nǝ biusu bɛtɛyi ǝsuǝ nye kase biota mi ǝsuǝ disi .
Itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ebote mi lesa nǝ biɔtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayo . ”
Utidi utsyuǝ ákɛ mfo lǝ betidi nti wǝ lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa , tɛyi mɔ ɔyimi fǝnkǝ usie bo anto eto bikǝ bia utsyǝ bo lǝ mfo mɔ bele . ”
Mfó Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Osani , owoe dítǝ mɛ kusu nkǝ nsie bikǝ nye nyifo okponkpo lǝ mi inuǝ eto bikǝ busie ǝsuǝ ? ”
Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝmblɛ nkǝ , “ Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ bikǝtanta ku kunǝnkpǝ saa eto okle ǝsuǝ , itsyise utidi eto nkpǝ sitinti manyɛ lǝ bikǝ bia nkpe wǝ , lǝ uyifo otabinyǝ kulaa tsya ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu ésukosǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝǝ , “ Otabinyǝ utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ wǝ lɛkɛ nsɔ kpǝ bo lɛlɛkɛ bidikǝ tinti .
Lǝ nyamfo eso úfi nsusu nkǝ , ‘ Se mǝnnyǝ kaka muutsyǝ mɔ bidikǝ biamfoo , be ele bǝ nyifo ?
“ ‘ Lesa nǝ ele bǝ nyifo ni bǝ mooba mɔ kenwu ka kɔ nya mooto kafɔfɔ ka lɔɔmɔ eso nka kɔ . Mfó muunyǝ kǝtsyǝkɔ itǝ mɔ bidikǝ ku bikǝ kenke .
Nya mɔɔtɛyi mɔ ǝsuǝ minkǝ disiɛkpɛ kpe mɛ . Nkpe asa sɛɛ kpǝ nnya mɔɔlɔ ntsyǝ itǝ alɛ kpǝ . Muusiǝ ntsyǝ ɔnwɛ nya muudi , nnǝ nya muudi nkpǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ . ’
“ Fɛɛ Onanto átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ utidimumu ! Ketsye kamfo hã moofo fǝ nkpǝ lǝ fǝ ani . Nya owoe luudi asa nnya fála fǝ alɔ ǝtsyǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ mfo ? ’ ”
Mfó nya Yesu lélosǝ wǝ etiki nkǝ , “ Mmǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ betidi ba laabɛbɛ asa kpǝ kǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo nya baanlɔ kulesa kǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto nɛ . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ biankpɔnko ǝsuǝ lǝ lesa nǝ biudi bisiǝ nkpǝ nye lesa nǝ biɔlɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nkpǝ afo koya boso didisa , nya etidisuǝ tsya afo koya eso lesa nǝ bɔɔlɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ
Bɛlɛ ǝnǝmi bebe baklɔbɛ ba laamfó ɔkɔɛ nya bǝǝmfǝsǝ nye bǝlǝkǝ bidikǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ tsya . Bǝmbǝ kenwu nye bikǝ kǝtsyǝkɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto ǝǝtǝ mǝ didisa ! Nya mimba lefo koya benso baklɔbɛ nkpǝ !
Nya mi utsyuǝ ebofo nkpǝ busiǝ diyi lɔni kplo kasonsǝ alɛ nnya ele bǝ usiǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lekplatsya ǝsuǝ ?
Nya lǝ biembofo kulesa buyifo lǝ asa kɛkɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , beso bia bakplatsya kele ǝsuǝ lǝ asa bamba tsya ǝsuǝ ?
“ Bibu bebe kase dituwinimi lǝǝmǝ kanɔ bobee . Kaanta olokotutu nya keendi kafia kefi keti ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Oka Salomo kulaa tsya lǝ wǝ kɔlɔkɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , mánnɔ bobe fe dituwunimi nǝ lǝǝmǝ mfó .
Lǝ Onanto lǝǝtǝ sefa kɔlɔkɔ komfo eto oklee , sefa sia lǝǝńyǝ mmi ete nya lǝ kǝsiǝsǝ ete baala se kato kakpé lǝ ditefɛnku kǝmiǝǝ , ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ Onanto ǝmfo kǝ embutǝ mi alɛsa nnya lǝmboso sefa eto ale nyamǝ ? Be dítǝ eso mi bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale mmǝ ?
Nyaso biante sikpi lǝ bɛsɛsǝ ǝnǝmi bikatɔ biǝnkǝ be biudi nye be biunǝ .
Itsyise betidi ba dímamfo Onanto bánɔɔ , mǝ ni mba leefi mǝ ǝnǝmi kǝtǝkǝ lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Mi Anto yi nkǝ asa nyamfo kenke afe itǝ mi .
Bomu bikebu disi ketsyiko lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ nya uufi nyamfo kenke utǝ mi .
“ Mi ditsyukpa kɛkɛ nǝ ntǝkǝko mɛ , biante sikpi . Itsyise iyifo Onanto eto lelabi bǝ utǝ mi kǝsiǝkɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ .
Bifi mi bikǝ bia nte mi bisu bete lǝ bifi atabi nyamǝ bitǝ bakombo . Lǝ bɛbɛbɛ otabitobe wǝ lǝǝmbobia bitsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto . Mfóo , nya mi bikǝ bia lefo koya luutsyǝ kpoo nya biembolo kulefe . Itsyise uyu saa ǝmbofo budufǝ mfo nya balɛ lembobiasǝ mi .
Itsyise kaka fǝ bikǝ bia lefo koya ntee , mfo mi ketu tsya luusiǝ nɛ .
“ Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ itǝ lesa nǝ ke luubǝ , lǝ mi kakandiɛ lǝ kǝkǝnyǝ . Nya biǝntǝ lǝ mi okandiɛ lǝ ɔni .
Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bińyǝ fe kase beyifoyifo lǝǝńyǝ kǝsǝkǝ mǝ Onamute wǝ luutsyi kusiǝ kakpakɔ ubǝ . Lǝ ubǝ ɔsɔ sikuu , lǝ basini bǝtǝ wǝ lamfolamfo .
Beyifoyifo ba Onamute luubǝ unyǝ nkǝ bǝńyǝ balɛ bose itǝ wǝ bubǝǝ , ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti ! Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , wɔɔwuninsǝ kafia lǝ lɛmɔkɔsi ɔtsyimi , nya wuutǝ nkǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ wǝ kedikɔ , nya wǝ kosate luutǝ mǝ lesa bedi .
Lǝ ibǝ bǝ ntsyenti nye kolensiǝnto kplɛ úbǝ nya únyǝ mǝ se bǝńyǝ bensǝkǝ wǝ bubǝǝ , nte disuǝyuǝ nǝ eto okle wookpe mǝ !
Mɔmɔɔ , bete biǝ lǝ oyosate ebote lefe nǝ uyu luubǝ uyu wǝǝ , eni wǝmbutǝ wǝ kusu nkǝ oba udufǝ wǝ diyo .
Nyaso nko ele bǝ itsyǝ mi tsya bǝ bińyǝ bikabe kusu nɛ , itsyise mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , ebubǝ udufǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bɛnnlɛ wǝ kusu bobe . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Petro lɛtɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bo fanlɛ lekpa nǝmfo bɔtɛyi kǝtǝ , lee dińyǝ itǝ utidi saa ? ”
Nya Yesu ditǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Uyifoyifo ni nwǝ ntǝkǝ ǝnǝ nya weeyifo keyifo lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto kusu ǝsuǝ , wǝ ni nwǝ wǝ Onamute leefi kǝtsyǝ lǝ wǝ beyifoyifo fɛfɛ eto kɛnyɛ nɛ . Nya wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ wǝ beyifoyifo fɛfɛ mǝ didisa lǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Bebe , lǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ afo nya woeyifo ke kukɔnɔ fɛ wǝ Onamute díbǝǝ , wuunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti lǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ !
Sitintii , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ wǝ Onamute ǝmfó ebufi uyifoyifo ǝmǝ utsyǝ lǝ wǝ bikǝ kenke eto kɛnyɛ .
“ Fɛɛ lǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Onamute ésu kusu wǝǝmbubǝ mlǝ , ’ nyaso útsyiko budi kǝnǝ kǝkpǝ ntǝ nya woablɛ beyifoyifo fɛfɛ ba ni basani ku besio kenke ku disialee ,
wǝ Onamute ebubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ uyifoyifo lenyi , ɔnnlɛ kusu bobe . Mfó Onamute ǝmǝ ebunǝ wǝ koto kekleke ko dinyǝ itǝ mba ditidi ato bamfó eto okle .
“ Uyifoyifo wǝ nyi lesa nǝ wǝ Onamute laala nkǝ uyifo utǝ wǝ fɛ woani ni buyifo se woanla nkǝ woeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ esoo , ablɛ hã buukablɛ wǝ nya luutǝ ofo afabe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ uyifoyifo wǝ lennyi lesa nǝ wǝ Onamute laala nkǝ uyifo fɛ uyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ kotonǝnǝ , sɛkɛ ete boonǝ wǝ koto . Utidi saa wǝ bǝtǝ asa kpǝǝ , nko ke ele bǝ uyifo asa kpǝ nɛ . Nyaso utidi saa wǝ bǝtǝ asa kpǝ isi ensoo , nko ke ele bǝ uyifo keyifo isi eso nɛ .
“ Mfi Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ko nte fe ute seka mboko kawunsiǝ . Nya nla sitinti minkǝ eni utsyiko buńyǝ koko .
Ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto bulǝ kplɛ butsyuǝ kpe ele bǝ mfo fe kase ketu leetsyi utidi kedunko . Nya membunyǝ lɛwɔnɔ nsiǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bulǝ bomfó díbǝ bófe .
Bíbu biǝ mbǝ kawunsiǝ miǝ mǝǝtǝ mi diyuǝ ? Owo lo ! Inni diyuǝsǝ , bomu nti busǝnsǝ eso .
Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , ayo nnya fe kaka betidi ɛnɔ nkpee , boosensǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Inuǝ ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ itsyǝ ǝsuǝ nya itsyǝ lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ inuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Ubianto ebotaka uńyǝ lǝ wǝ bebisaibi ǝsuǝ , nya bebisaibi lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ anto ǝsuǝ . Ambemǝ ebotaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ bebisiobi ǝsuǝ , nya bebisiobi tsya lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ ambemǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝsǝambe mǝ lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ bebisaibi eto bǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bebi eto bǝsiǝ lootaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ bǝsǝambemǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi betidi bamfó tsya nkǝ , “ Lǝ binyǝ biǝ lɛsɔmiloku ana ditsyi kofe eto diyo kedufǝkɔ lǝ difule lɛlɛ bubǝǝ , biatɛyi mfó ǝmǝ biǝ ɔsɔmi ebubǝ ɔni . Nya yǝǝbǝ kǝtǝ nko .
Nya lǝ binyǝ biǝ ufiebi lɛ bɔsɔ ketsyi Ɔnwɛdukuǝ eti ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , biatɛyi biǝ utefofo nye diwi ɛbɔkɛ . Nya yǝǝbǝ kǝtǝ nko .
Ǝnǝmi , ǝnǝmi eto betidi , lǝ binyǝ kato ku kasɔ eto ditsyǝbii , biate lefe nǝ ɛnlɛ bote , beso bɛnnlɛ mɔmɔ eto lefe kasɔ bɔnɔ kǝlǝkǝ kate ?
“ Beso biamfo budufǝ lǝ asa kǝmiǝ kabe lɛsɛ nǝ ele bǝ biyifo ?
Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ákpadi fǝ etiki lǝ lekpokakpokɔ nkǝ fonko wǝ ákɛ etiki ǝtsyuǝǝ , yɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ lǝ alɔ etiki nyamǝ ǝtsyǝ fɛ lǝ bidufǝ lekpokakpokɔ . Leni nkoo , wuufi fǝ utǝ bakponkpo nya mba lǝǝmuǝ betidi luufi fǝ bato bakpe lǝ diyo .
Nya nlɛ fǝ butǝ bote minkǝ ebɔkɛ mfó isu ese lefe nǝ fafó fǝ kotonǝnǝ eto kayo kenke falosǝ . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákɛ mfó ba lɛtɛyi Yesu kase Pilato lélo Galileafɔ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkǝtǝ Onanto kedi .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibu biǝnkǝ se bálo Galileafɔ bamfo nko esoo , mǝ abua nnya béyifo amɔ eso Galileafɔ fɛfɛ kenke ?
Owo lo ! Inni nko ini kon ! Fɛɛ nnya míntɛyi mi ni bǝ , lǝ bianyɛ mi asa bua buyifoo , nko ke mi tsya luubǝ bikpǝ nɛ .
Nya betidi lefosi mflamfla ba Siloa eto diyo kplɛ nǝmǝ léba lékpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ bǝkpǝǝ , bibu biǝ lǝ nyamfo eso beyifo babuatidi banso mba nsi lǝ Yerusalem mfó kenke ?
Owo lo ! Inni nko ini kon ! Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ bientsyi mi akɔɛsi bɛwuninsǝ , nko ke mimblɛ kenke luubǝ bikpǝ fe mǝ ke nɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefe mǝ , osani utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó wǝ lɛkɛ kudiyi kutsyuǝ lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ . Úsu nkǝ lǝ usu ɔbɛbɛ kuyi komǝ eto ebibi , fɛɛ wǝnnyǝ ku ǝtsyuǝ .
Mfó ǝmǝ ɔ́tɛyi nwǝ laabe wǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Alɛ ǝtsyǝ ni nyamfo nɛ se mǝǝbǝ mfo kǝbǝ kabɛbɛ kuyi komfo eto ebibi kanɔ nɛ . La ko akpo kasɔ , itsyise kumbǝ kutǝkǝ saa itǝ kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ kuńyǝ mfo . ’
“ Fɛɛ nwǝ laabe ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , yani ko lǝ kusi kunyǝ lɛlɛ lɔni kplo lǝ bobe . Muuku ko kalɔ ntsyilama nkpo asa nnya lɔɔlɛkǝsǝ kasɔ kamǝ lǝ bobe .
Nya lǝ kofó ebibi kpǝ bɔnwɔɔ , ɛlɛkɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ koamfo bɔnwɔ lɛlɛ nǝ luubǝ , ebofo ko bola kakpo kasɔ . ’ ”
Nya lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lɔni ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ákɛ mfó úkate asa lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kǝtsyuǝ .
Nya usio utsyuǝ tsya ákɛ mfó wǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua ditsyuǝ díkǝlǝ fe lefosi alɛ mflamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝtǝ bǝ usio ǝmǝ ǝnwǝ úkǝnǝ lefe saa eso woamfo bɔtsyɔ kǝńyǝ tente .
Se Yesu dínyǝ wǝǝ , ókpadi wǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Usio , báyankli fǝ lǝ fǝ bufi ǝsuǝ ! ”
Nya Yesu dífi wǝ ani útǝkǝ lǝ usio ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Lamfolamfo , usio ǝmǝ átaka úńyǝ ɔ́tsyɔ nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto .
Nwǝ laabe Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kamǝ ǝnyǝ ɔblɔ tinti lǝ kase Yesu létsya ufimfi ǝmǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ eso . Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi betidi bamfó kenke nkǝ , “ Bokpe eyi akua nnya ele bǝ bufi buyifo bo nyifo . Nyaso bekpe eyi nyamfo bǝ lǝ lesatsyuǝ lɛ mii , bibǝ lǝ batsya mi , inni lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ! ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Bonamute dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi , ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi , mii , biǝlǝkǝ bebuki ba leeyifo mi keyifo nye leetsyi mi bikǝ ketsyiko lǝ kakuɛ nya biakpa mǝ kesuko ntu kǝnǝkɔ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , biǝnyǝ Abraham eto ketsyikɔ eto ubi sionko wǝ ńyǝ mfo , wǝ Obonsam dífi kǝkuǝ ókle lefosi alɛ mflamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ ni nyamfo . Yenyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ bǝ bǝlǝkǝ wǝ lǝ kǝkuǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ? ”
Etiki nnya Yesu dílǝkǝ ɔ́tɛyi mfo ǝtǝ bǝ kofani ǝmuǝ wǝ balo , nya betidi bamba dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ anyinisa nnya kenke ɔnlɛ bulǝkǝ kate eso .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyi kase Onanto eto Sekadidi laayɛ kesensǝ ? Nya be ele bǝ bufi nnya bokatesǝ ko ?
Bebe ! Osani utsyuǝ éfi diyibibi ditsyuǝ nǝ nso bɔfɛ óto lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ . Se diyibibi nǝmǝ díkǝǝ , díbǝ lébe léfiani kuyi kplɛ kutsyuǝ eto kɔlɔmɔ ǝsuǝ baklɔbɛ díbǝ báto ayo bakpe . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa bamba nkǝ , “ Be muufi Onanto sekadidi nkatesǝ ko ?
Usio utsyuǝ éfi ǝyǝnkisǝsa úfi ótsyakasǝ ku nnamfo eto ɔkpɛ ɔni , nya ɔ́fɔkɔtisǝ ɔ́wɔ mu isu ese lefe nǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa nyamǝ léba ídufǝ lǝ nnamfo bomǝ kenke ǝsuǝ nya dítǝ botaka . ”
Yesu ésu ɔ́yɛ lǝ kǝmǝ ku mbuto kafo nya óte betidi asa lǝ lefe nǝ ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya utidi utsyuǝ lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , ɛkpɛ ini bǝ betidi ba luubǝ bǝnyǝ bofo , ǝmbufui lee ntsyǝ ini ? ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ ,
“ Bekpe ale lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ kesie ka nso bɔfɛ bidufǝ . Itsyise betidi kpǝ ebola sitinti bǝ baayɛ mfo lǝ bedufǝ , fɛɛ bǝmbofo budufǝ .
Lefe ebubǝ leyo itǝ buudufǝ nya Onamute ǝmǝ lootaka uńyǝ nya wuuti kesie kamǝ . Nya mimba dibu biińyǝ lǝ lekple biu kasɔ siku katɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Onamute , sini bo ! ’ “ Fɛɛ Onamute ǝmǝ ebulǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Minnyi mi ku kaka bitsyi ! ’
“ Nya biɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bo ku fǝ lídi búnǝ , nya fáte asa lǝ bo umǝ ! ’
“ Fɛɛ usi ɔɔtɛyi mi nkǝ , ‘ Minnyi mi ! Bidu mɛ lǝ akɔ mi babuayifotidi . ’
“ Mfo ǝmǝ nya nku buwi ku animi bunǝ lɔɔkɛ lǝ lefe nǝ biunyǝ Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob Ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi kenke lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto léla mi ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ biendufǝ mfó .
Betidi ebutsyi kofekatokɔ ku diyo kedufǝkɔ bǝbǝ . Nya mba ditsyi ɔnwɛ kato ku ɔnwɛ dikuǝ ebotsya nya boodi bǝnǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .
Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba ni bafɛfɛ , mǝ luubǝ bedi betutɛ . Nya mba ni betutɛ eto bǝtsyuǝ , mǝ luubǝ bafiani bafɛfɛ nɛ . ”
Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfo kǝmiǝ , Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Kɔse lǝ abɔ mfo edu mɔmɔ mɔmɔ lǝ esu kalebe bamba , itsyise Oka Herodes ala nkǝ wǝ alo fǝ . ”
Mfo ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu bɛtɛyi wǝ obiasǝtidi ǝmfó biǝnkǝ mɔ nlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Mmi , moola awɔnɔ bua nlǝkǝ nya mootsya betidi efimbi , efimbi nya banlɛ isu ese kusɛɛ . Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ , moolosǝ mɔ keyifo . ’
Nyaso ele bǝ ndiǝ ndiǝ ndiǝ nyɛ nsu sɛtɔ mmi isu ese kusɛɛ ku kǝsiǝsǝ . Itsyise yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ balo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi ku utsyuǝ sa lǝ kalebesa enso lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ kafo .
“ Yerusalem , Yerusalem ! Fǝ betidi laalo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , nya biakpɔ aba Onanto eto batɔnkpe ba ótsyese mi . Lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nla miǝ lǝ nkpa fǝ betidi ntsyǝ ditsyu fe kase ukusɛsiǝle leesensǝ wǝ mbamba keti wǝ bebi , fɛɛ áni .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Onanto ebulǝkǝ wǝ ato utsyiko lǝ umǝ ǝmfo . Nya lǝ ntɛyi mi sitinti minkǝ , biensiembunyǝ mɛ bio isu ese lefe nǝ biudi etiki bɛtɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Atɛsǝ itǝ nwǝ luubǝ lǝ Boanto Onanto eto diye ǝsuǝ ! ’ ”
Lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu ésu Farisifɔ eto beninǝ ɔni eto diyo lǝ kaka bákpadi wǝ bǝ ubǝ udi lesa . Nya bǝtsyuǝ akɛ mfo ékeyu kalɛ ola lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kekleke .
Mfó nya osani utsyuǝ wǝ eto ani ku akpa lɛfɔɔ , díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɔ kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ nkǝ , “ Bo kɔfi ǝtǝ bo kusu nkǝ batsya utidi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ , lee koǝntǝ bo kusu ? ”
Fɛɛ bámfo kɛnyɛ bufǝ katɛyi kulesa . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛkɔbe utidi ǝmfo ókpa wǝ úsuko kutsyǝ nya ótsya wǝ nya útǝ wǝ kusu údu .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mi utsyuǝ kpe ubi nye onantsyui nya ófankli údufǝ lǝ dibiǝ ditsyuǝ kafo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi , embunǝ wǝ ǝlǝkǝ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lamfolamfo ? ”
Fɛɛ bámfo wǝ ditiki eto mbuayɛ butǝ bio .
Se Yesu dínyǝ kase betidi ba bákpadi báboko mfó eto bǝtsyuǝ nlɛ nsiǝkɔ kplɛ bota kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa ditsyuǝ nkǝ ,
“ Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ákpadi fǝ nkǝ bǝ wǝ kusiǝkakpakɔ , mensu ǝsiǝ lǝ kakplɛkɔ . Itsyise ǝtsyuǝ ókpadi utidi wǝ nkpe dibu onso fǝ tsya oboko mfó .
Nya utidi wǝ lékpadi mi inuǝ ba kenke díbǝ mfó ɔ́tɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Tǝ lǝ utidi ǝmfo lǝ ubǝ usiǝ mfó . ’ Yoohiã bǝ taka lǝ esu ǝsiǝ lǝ kaka lǝmbǝ dibu ku kofani .
Bomu lǝ bákpadi fǝ bakoko kalebe kǝtsyuǝ , su ǝsiǝ lǝ kaka lenni kakplɛkɔ . Nya lǝ utidi wǝ lékpadi fǝ ǝbǝǝ , mfo wɔɔtɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ɔyɛtsyuǝ , taka lǝ mfó lǝ ǝbǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ kakplɛkɔ mfo . ’ Nya nyamfo ebokpe fǝ dibu lǝ betidi bamba ba bákpadi báboko mfó kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
Itsyise utidi saa wǝ labesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , Onanto ebobokosǝ wǝ kasɔ . Nya utidi saa wǝ laabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ , Onanto ebobesǝ wǝ kato . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi utidi wǝ lékpadi wǝ nkǝ ubǝ kedikɔ mfó nkǝ , “ Lǝ akpadi betidi fǝ bǝbǝ bedi lǝfǝ diyo , mankpadi fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ nye fǝ bayimi nye fǝ betidi nye fǝ bayotsya ba ni batabinyǝ . Itsyise mǝ tsya ebokpadi fǝ nko kǝ bǝ , bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ edi . Nya lǝ ibǝ nko , nyalɛ te fǝ lesa nǝ féyifo fǝtǝ mǝǝ , eto oko banlɛ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ fǝ nɛ .
Bomu lǝ alɛ diyi nǝmfo eto okle budii , kpadi bakombo ku betidi ba lamfo bɔyɛ kukɔnɔ ku mba lɛtsyini ku benǝmba .
Nyamfo luutǝ Onanto kpo fǝ atsyɔ nɛ . Itsyise betidi bamfó ǝmbofo fǝ kayo bofo lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ kulesa . Onanto ebofo fǝ nya kayo lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ betidi sɛɛ lootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝ . ”
Se betidi ba nsi lǝ kedikɔ mfó eto ɔni lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfo , ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Sitinti , disuǝyuǝ ebɔkɛ lǝ betidi ba luubǝ bedi lesa lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ! ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ ákpadi betidi kpǝ lǝ wǝ diyi kplɛ ditsyuǝ eto lesakedikɔ .
Se lefe léyo bǝ betsyiko budi kǝnǝǝ , óla wǝ beyifoyifo ókpe nkǝ batɛyi wǝ betidi ba kenke ókla utsyǝ nkǝ bǝbǝ . Itsyise lesa saa ebɔflɔ !
“ Fɛɛ mǝmblɛ kenke étsyiko taflatsyɛ boto . Utidi tutɛ átɛyi uyifoyifo ɔni ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nya kasɔ kǝtsyuǝ nya ele bǝ nsu mbe kǝ . Nyaso tɛyi wǝ fǝnkǝ , “ Nlɛ wǝ lekpakpa , mǝmbofo bubǝ . ” ’
“ Obamba tsya nkǝ , ‘ Ńnya banantsyui lefosi ba lɔɔwunsǝko mǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ . Nya kusu mintɔ miǝ lǝ nsu nto mǝ mbe lǝ boofo keyifo buyifo . Nyamfo esoo , tɛyi wǝ fǝnkǝ , “ Nlɛ wǝ lekpakpa , mǝmbofo bubǝ . ” ’
“ Obamba tsya nkǝ , ‘ Mɔmɔ ete minkpa kusiǝ nɛ , nyaso mǝmbofo bubǝ . ’
“ Uyifoyifo ɔni ǝmǝ esinkli úsu , úsu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ Onamute asa nyamfo kenke . Mfó kafo ányi wǝ Onamute ǝmǝ tinti nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Kɔse lǝ esu ǝńyǝ lǝ esu ku nlebe nlebe kenke lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ lǝ akpa bakombo ku betidi ba lɛtsyini ku bǝnǝmba ku mba kenke leba bankpo lǝ kasɔ aboko mfo . ’
“ Mfo ǝmǝ nya uyifoyifo ǝmǝ dísu úyifo nko . Nya úsinkli úbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ Onamute nkǝ ókpadi mǝ , fɛɛ nsiǝkɔ kpǝ esi bubu bute .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Onamute lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Su lǝ esu ayɛ lǝ umǝ ku mbuto eto esu lǝ akpe nkɛale lǝ akpa betidi ba kenke aboko itǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo kenke lǝ diyi .
Nya nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ minkǝ betidi ba kenke mínkpadi miǝ bǝbǝ lesakedikɔ fɛ báni , mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embutidi mɔ lesa nǝmfo kɛnyɛ babe ! ’ ”
Lefe ditsyuǝ se betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ dítǝkǝko Yesu , ɔ́tsyi ɔ́wuninsǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ ,
“ Utidi saa wǝ luubǝ mɔ ɔflɔɔ , ǝmbofo mɔ okasebi budi lǝ waanla mɛ kaso wǝ anto ku wǝ usiǝ ku bebi ku wǝ bayimisani ku bayimisio ku wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya .
Utsyuǝ saa ke dimentsyi wǝ uyikabie ɔyɛ mɔ kayɛkɔ utǝkǝko mɛɛ , mǝnńyǝ utǝ bǝ uyifo mɔ okasebi .
“ Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woato diyo kplɛ ditsyuǝ , tutɛ ele bǝ usiǝ kasɔ ubu bikǝ bia kenke loofe ku mi koya kenke obe lǝ okpe atabi nya loohiãa , bǝ woofo diyo nǝmǝ boto kalosǝ fɛ utsyǝ ni kasɔ .
Nya lǝ weenyifo nyamfo , wǝmbofo diyo nǝmǝ boto kalosǝ , lǝ ɔ́sisǝ ni kasɔ kekleke ku abambi fɛ utsyǝ kafati kasɔ boto kulaa tsya . Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ luunyǝ nii , ebumǝ wǝ katɛyi nkǝ ,
‘ Utidi ǝmfo étsyiko diyo nǝmfo boto kasɔ , fɛɛ wǝmbofo ni boto kalosǝ . ’
“ Lǝ oka utsyuǝ átaka ku bamamanyǝ akpi lefosi nnya usu nkǝ woakpɔnko oka bamba wǝ nkpe bamamanyǝ akpi fosi ǝnuǝ , wuusiǝ ubu disi obe kukɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale nya onkpe ebutǝ bǝ ofo wǝ olo ǝmǝ bɔkpɔnko .
Nya lǝ unyǝ nkǝ umbǝ ǝsuǝale nyamfo eto okle , wootsyese wǝ batɔnkpe nya boosu batsya ku oka ǝmǝ lǝ lefe nǝ batsyoko bǝtsyuǝ nya bɔɔlɛ wǝǝ lekpakpa nkǝ bayɛ bɔkpɔ lǝ bafiani bayɛtsyuǝ bomu , fɛ lǝ oka ǝmfó lǝ ɔnyi ɔfi kulaa tsya . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ Yesu lélosǝ wǝ etiki nyamǝ , nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ini itǝ mi bǝ mi kutsyuǝ ǝmbofo mɔ okasebi budi lǝ woenlǝkǝ wǝ ato utsyiko lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ .
“ Mba kpe alɛkɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ kamini kamǝ alo lǝ mba bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , kusu ku kutsyuǝ saa ensimbǝ ǝsuǝ bookpe kamini lǝ mu bio .
Yensilɛkɛ bǝ befi mu bakpe balɛkɛsǝ kasɔ , nya yanlɛkɛ itǝ kuku kulaa tsya . Buwi ele bǝ bewi mu . “ Nyaso fǝǝ ke ato nnya laanɔ asa kpee , tsyue ato lǝ anɔ ! ”
Diyi lɔnii , mba laafo umǝnko kpǝ ku babuatidi bamba ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ bǝ baanɔ wǝ ditiki .
Mfó nya Farisifɔ ku afi eto bateasa dítsyiko dinyǝfi bokpe ku wǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo aafo babuatidi nya wǝ ku mǝ leedi lesa kulaa tsya ! ”
Nyaso Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ ,
“ Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti kpe basamu kolofa , nya ɔni lénya lǝ mǝ ntii , be fuuyifo ? Eboyani awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ bamfó ǝtsyǝ lǝ kedikɔ mfó , esu kabɛbɛ ɔni wǝ lénya mfó isu ese lefe nǝ fǝnyǝ wǝ .
Nya lǝ ǝnyǝ wǝǝ , ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti , nya fuutsyi wǝ ǝtǝkǝ lǝ simuǝ .
Nya fuufi wǝ aboko oto . Nya fookpadi fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ ku mba lǝ koyotsya nya fɔɔtɛyi mǝ fǝnkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti , itsyise nnyǝ mɔ osamu wǝ lénya nyaso binyǝnko mɛ disuǝyuǝ ! ’
Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , nko ke disuǝyuǝ tinti lɔɔkɛ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ lǝ obuatidi ɔni wǝ hã lɛtsyi lɛkɔɛsi ɔwuninsǝ enso disuǝyuǝ nǝ boonyǝ lǝ fe betidi awosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ɔwɔnɔmbǝ ba dimensihiã bɔtsyi kawuninsǝ ǝsuǝ .
“ Nya lǝ usio utsyuǝ kpe sika flubia lefosi nya ónyansǝ sɔnii , be ele bǝ uyifo ? Wooto okandiɛ , okpa wǝ diyo kafo kenke , ɔbɛbɛ se lǝ diyo eto akpɔ nnya kenke kukɔnɔ isu ese lefe nǝ unyǝ atabi nyamǝ .
Nya lǝ unyǝ see , wookpadi wǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku mba nkpe lǝ koyotsya , nya wɔɔtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti itsyise nnyǝ mɔ atabi nnya lénya nyaso binyǝ ku mɛ disuǝyuǝ . ’
Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , nko ke Onanto eto batɔnkpe tsya luunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ obuatidi ɔni wǝ ditsyi lɛkɔɛsi ɔwuninsǝ eso . ”
Yesu ésukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Osani utsyuǝ akɛ wǝ bebisaibi inuǝ lɛkɛ .
Nya dikpefile lɛtɛyi wǝ anto nkǝ , ‘ Nto , fi mɔ kedikɔ ka luutu mɛ lǝ fǝ bikǝ nti ǝtǝ mɛ mɔmɔ mɔmɔ . ’ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani ǝmǝ éfi wǝ bikǝ biamǝ nya úsie mi lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ útǝ wǝ bebi inuǝ bamǝ .
“ Nya lǝ eyi asiani eto kamaa , dikpefile nǝmǝ éfi asa nnya kenke dítu wǝ óte nya úfi atabi nyamǝ nya údu úsu kusu famfamfa kaka úsu úsiǝ údi nkpǝ bua bua , nya óbiasǝ wǝ atabi nyamǝ kenke .
Údi lesa saa nǝ dítsyǝ wǝ ólosǝ . Lǝ nyamfó eto kamaa , kukpɛnsɛ kekleke kutsyuǝ ǝbǝ lǝ kasɔ kamǝ kenke nyaso kukpɛnsɛ ǝbǝ kúmuǝ wǝ nya kulesa ménsibu wǝ lǝ udi .
Nyamfo esoo , úfi ǝsuǝ úsu ɔ́tsyɛ osani utsyuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ wuukeyifo keyifo saa ka ke eto okle wuutǝ wǝ nke uyifo . Nya osani ǝmǝ tsya dífi wǝ ókpe lǝ kaka wǝ bakplako nkpe banlɛ kota bɔnwɔ lǝ wǝ kebuto kǝtsyuǝ .
Kukpɛnsɛ esoo , óla nkǝ eni lǝ ɔkɛ bakplako eto didisa nǝ bǝǝtǝ mǝ mfó eto ditsyuǝ lǝ udi , fɛɛ utidi saa mǝntǝ wǝ ni .
“ Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , úsinkli údufǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Betidi ba ni mɔ anto eto beyifoyifo , baakɛ lesa kedi kemi kulaa tsya diebu . Nya mɔ nsi mfo nya kukpɛnsɛ luubǝ kolo mɛ .
Mootaka ńyǝ nsikli nsu mɔ anto ɔflɔ , lǝ ntɛyi wǝ minkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto , nyifo kabua nya mínta Onanto ku fintsya mimbu .
Mensińyǝ ntǝ bǝ kpadi mɛ fe fǝ ubi . Bomu fi mɛ fe betidi ba nlɛ keyifo buyifo kǝtǝ fǝ eto ɔni . ” ’
Mfó ǝmǝ nya ótaka nya úfi wǝ bikǝ nya ɔ́yifǝ kusu ɔntɔ lǝ wǝ anto ɔflɔ . “ Se wǝ anto dínyǝ wǝǝ , óte nkǝ wǝ ubi uni nkpe fãã ɔnlɛ bubǝ . Wǝ ubi eto asa álɛ wǝ kaminsǝ , nya útsyetsyi úsu ɔ́buta wǝ ku disuǝyuǝ .
“ Mfo nya wǝ úbi lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Anto , nyifo kabua nta Onanto ku fintsya mbu . Nya mensinyǝ ntǝ bǝ akpadi mɛ fe fǝ ubi tsya ! ’
“ Fɛɛ wǝ anto ákpadi wǝ beyifoyifo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bɛkɔse ! Bifi awu nnya laanɔ bobe bibǝ bekpe wǝ . Nya lǝ bifi lɛsukpɛ ku afokpa nnya laanɔ bobe tsya bekpe wǝ lǝ ani ku akpa .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , bisu bimuǝ lenantsyuikpɔ nǝ nkpe ayinkua lǝ belo ni . Nya bitǝ lǝ budi bunye disuǝyuǝ .
Itsyise mɔ ubi ǝmfoo , búfi wǝ fe nwǝ díkpǝ . Fɛɛ úsinkli úbǝ nkpǝ . Ónya nya busi búnyǝ wǝ . ’ Nyamfo eso bétsyiko diyi budi kǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
“ Lǝ lefe nǝmfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ubi ninǝ ésu nkǝ lǝ usu obe mǝ kakuɛ . Se utsyi ɔnlɛ bubǝ nya ibu sɛkɛ lǝ udufǝ otoo , ɔ́nɔ ǝsǝ sǝnsǝ ku nwui wuinwui eto kɔsɔ .
Mfo nya ókpadi beyifoyifo eto ɔni lǝ mǝ nti nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be nlɛ bubǝ lǝ oto ? ’
“ Uyifoyifo ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ ɔyimisani úsinklii úbǝ oto nya fǝ anto dítǝ bálo lenantsyuikpɔ nǝ nkpe ayinkua , itsyise usinkli ubǝ fɛ kulesa dímǝnyifo wǝ eso . ’
“ Nyamfo ǝtǝ kafo ányi wǝ ɔyimisani ninǝ ǝmǝ tinti eso ɔ́ni nkǝ wǝmbudufǝ diyo kulaa tsya . Lǝ nnya eso wǝ anto ábɔ úbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ mfó , nya úbǝ ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ udufǝ diyo .
Fɛɛ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ ésinkli ɔ́tɛyi wǝ anto ǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Beso mińyǝ minlɛ keyifo buyifo kǝteǝ fǝ alɛ kpǝ ni nyamfo , fe fǝ uyifoyifo nya mǝnńyǝ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ kulefe kulefe , nya ǝmǝntǝ mɛ kulesa fe ote kulaa tsya , fǝ lǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku mɔ bayɛtsyuǝ ?
Fɛɛ se fǝ ubi wǝ lébiasǝ fǝ bikǝ nya úsu útǝkǝko batsyetɔ dísinkli úbǝ otoo , álo lenantsyuikpɔ nǝ dísiǝ ayinkua ǝtǝ wǝ ! ’
“ Mfó ǝmǝ nya wǝ anto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ubi , fǝ kpe mfo lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ lefe saa nya asa nnya nte mɛ kenke , eyifo fǝ ale .
Fɛɛ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ budi diyi bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ , itsyise búfi boǝ iyifo fe bukpǝ fǝ ɔyimi díkpǝ nya úsinkli úbǝ nkpǝ . Iyifo fe bonya ónya nya busi búnyǝ wǝ bio . ’ ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , otabinyǝ utsyuǝ akɛ mfó wǝ lɛkɛ uyifoyifo ɔni wǝ díkabe wǝ bikǝ . Nya bǝbǝ bátɛyi otabinyǝ ǝmǝ bǝ nwǝ laabe wǝ bikǝ mfó lɛ wǝ atabi bobiasǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo eso otabinyǝ ǝmǝ ákpadi nwǝ laabe wǝ bikǝ mfo nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be ni nnya eto okle mínɔ itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ mmǝ ? Yifo nkunta itsyi lǝ kase fanlɛ mɔ bikǝ bobe ǝsuǝ kenke aboko mɛ , itsyise ensiembofo mɔ bikǝ bobe bio tsya . ’
“ Mfó nya uyifoyifo ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ Onamute ǝbǝ mɛ bola lǝ mɔ keyifokɔ . Be muuyifo ? Mimbǝ ǝsuǝale nnya mukeyifo kakuɛnyifo . Nya asa bɔtɔ tsya aalɛ mɛ kofani .
Ahaa ! Mbote lesa nǝ muuyifo ! Itǝ bǝ lǝ mɔ keyifo ábɔ mɛ lǝ ani tsyaa , lǝ mɔ bayɛtsyuǝ lǝ bafo mɛ lǝ mǝ ayo . ’
“ Lǝ nyamfo esoo , ókpadi betidi ba nsi wǝ Onamute kayo ɔni , ɔni . Ɔ́tɔ ututɛ nkǝ , ‘ Kayo kasia fensi mɔ Onamute ? ’
“ Oyonyǝ ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nnuǝ eto atase nnya lɛmɔ kolofa kɔni . ’ “ Mfó ǝmǝ nya nwǝ laabe bikǝ biamǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be fǝ kayo eto kukue mfo . Siǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ awɔni awosi anɔ fe nnya fensi nɛ . ’
“ Nko ke ɔ́tɔ oyonyǝ bamba nkǝ , ‘ Ntsyǝ ni fǝ ale ? Kayo kasia fensi ? ’ “ Oyonyǝ ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Iyifo antabi eto atoku kplɛ kolofa kɔni . ’ “ Mfo nya nwǝ laabe bikǝ ǝmfo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be fǝ kayo eto kukue mfo . Wɔni awosi mflamfla ǝtsyǝ . ’
“ Nyamfo esoo , Onamute ǝmǝ átɛsǝ nwǝ laabe bikǝ wǝ dímenyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ ǝmǝ lǝ wǝ kobe ko óte mfo eso . Sitintii , betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa eto kɛnyɛɛ , mǝ etsyuesa lǝ mǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ kulaa tsya so mba difi mǝ etsyuesa bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Onanto eto sekadidi ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dísukosǝ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi mi kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ bɔkɛ bɛwunsǝ ko betidi . Itǝ lǝ béloo , Onanto ebofo fǝ okpe lǝ wǝ kǝsiǝkɔ .
“ Utidi wǝ laalɛ asa nnya ni akɛkɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , wǝ loofo asa nnya ni akplɛ enso tsya bɔlɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ laanyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ keyifo asa nnya ni akɛkɛ , wǝmbɔyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ uyifo asa nnya ni akplɛ enso tsya .
Lǝ nnya eso lǝ bianyɛnko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ utidi ebofo mi ɔnɔ bǝ biɔlɛ asa nnya ni lɛwɔnɔ eto ale nnya ni Onanto eto ǝtǝsa ola lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ?
Nya lǝ amanlɛ utidi bamba eto asa nnya nkpe fǝ lǝ ɔflɔ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ booyani fǝ kosate eto ale bǝtǝ fǝ ?
“ Uyifoyifo saa embofo banamute inuǝ busumu . Woola ɔni , ukisi unuǝfǝ . Wuutsyue ɔni koto nya ɔɔni unuǝfǝ . Ǝmbofo Onanto ku atabi bɔkɔ kesumu . ”
Lefe nǝ Farisifɔ lɛnɔ asa nnya Yesu lɛtɛyii , bǝmǝ wǝ itsyise bála atabi fefe .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biyifo betidi ba laate ǝsuǝ fe betidi sɛɛ lǝ babamba eto ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ Onanto yi mi akɔɛsi kafo kenke . Itsyise asa nnya lefo koya lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmii , eyifo asinsa lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
“ Moses eto kɔfi eto kukue ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asa nnya báwɔni bǝtsyǝǝ , éyifo mǝ keyifo isu ese Ntuflǝsǝtidi Yohanes eto lefe . Nya idu lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝǝ , bianɔ se baatɛyi dikiti sɛɛ nǝ ditsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya utidi saa nlɛ bokplatsya nkǝ lǝ udufǝ mfó .
Fɛɛ iyuǝ eso itǝ bǝ kato ku kasɔ lǝ enya , enso bǝ afi nyamfo eto awɔnisa eto lekpa sɛkɛ saa bɔ lǝ Onanto eto afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
“ Osani saa wǝ lɔɔni wǝ usiǝ nya uufi obambaa , okpo kusiǝ . Nya osani wuufi kusiǝ ko bánii , okpo kusiǝ .
“ Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝǝ , otabinyǝ sani ɔni akɛ wǝ díkalɛ bikǝ bia lefo koya tinti , nya úkǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lefe saa lǝ wǝ nkpǝ kenke ǝsuǝ .
Nya okombo utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo bǝ Lasaro tsya lɛkɛ mfo . Afabe édi okombo ǝmfo ǝsuǝ kenke nya béketsyi wǝ bǝkǝtsyǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ otabinyǝ ǝmǝ eto diyo eto kesie .
Úkabe kusu nkǝ lǝ otabinyǝ ǝmǝ lɛ budii , ewuliwuli nnya díkakpo lǝ kasɔ eboyo wǝ lǝ udi . Bakpa kula tsya kǝbǝ kadia wǝ afabe nyamǝ .
“ Íbǝ íbǝ bǝ Okombo ǝmǝ ésu úkpǝ nya Onanto eto bɔtɔnkpe díbǝ bétsyi wǝ bésu bǝtsyǝ lǝ Abraham eto akɔ kato . Otabinyǝ ǝmǝ tsya ǝbǝ úkpǝ nya bébikǝ wǝ .
Nya lǝ ɔkɔmǝǝ , únyǝ nkǝ ɔ́kɛ lǝ kanyi kǝnyǝkɔ . Mfó se óbesǝ ǝnǝmi kato , únyǝ Abraham famfamfa nya Lasaro dísiǝ wǝ lǝ akɔ .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya ókpadi bembembe ɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Anto Abraham ! Nyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ lǝ ǝtǝ lǝ Lasaro lǝ ufi lɛnimi oto lǝ ntu ntsyuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ufi ubǝ utǝkǝ lǝ mɔ odiakami ǝsuǝ lǝ iyuǝ ko mɛ . Itsyise nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ ute ǝsuǝ mfo ! ’
“ Fɛɛ Abraham átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ubi , kloma fǝnkǝ lǝ fǝ nkpǝ disiǝfee , áfo asa sɛɛ kpǝ tinti . Nya Lasaro wǝ alɛɛ , asa bua sɔ̃ɔ̃ ófo . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , ɔlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ nya fǝ nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ .
Nya , nnya nsi nkpe lǝ nnyaa , kukpio kplɛ kutsyuǝ kpe mfo lǝ bo ku fǝ eto nti . Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woayila ubǝ mfóo , wǝǝmbofo . Nya nko ke kutsyuǝ tsya lǝmbofo bɔyɛ kedu mfó kǝbǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo . ’
“ Mfó otabinyǝ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Anto Abraham , nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa kpe Lasaro lǝ usu mɔ anto eto .
Mfóo , nkpe bayimisani ɛnɔ . Tǝ lǝ usu ɔlɛ mǝ kɔlɛ kukɔnɔ itǝ lǝ mǝ lǝ bayɛ kaka minkpe bubǝ , kaka kanyi nkpe mfo . ’
“ Mfó ǝmǝ nya Abraham lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Fǝ bayimisani kpe Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lǝ ɔflɔ . Nya ele bǝ betsyue mǝ koto . ’
“ Mfó nya otabinyǝ ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Anto Abraham , bǝmbɔnɔ mǝ ditiki ! Fɛɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ataka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ mfo úsu mǝ ɔflɔɔ , bɔɔnɔ wǝ ditiki bayɛ mǝ asa bua buyifo . ’
“ Fɛɛ Abraham átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ bǝbɔnɔ Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ditikii , lǝ yuubǝ bǝ utidi utsyuǝ ataka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ mfo usu mǝ ɔflɔ kulaa tsyaa , bembofo wǝ ditki banɔ ! ’ ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Asa nnya lǝǝtǝ utidi leeyifo lebua , ebubǝ kokooko . Fɛɛ mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ asa nyamfo lɔɔyɛ ibǝ !
Lǝ béfi kukuǝ ko lɛmɔ kutsyuǝ bátsyasǝ wǝ lǝ simuǝ nya báto wǝ bákpe lǝ lekpo kǝmiǝ kulaa tsya , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ eso koto ko Onanto luunǝ nwǝ luutǝ bekpefi kɛkɛ bamfo eto utsyuǝ yifo lebua .
Nyaso lɔ abe asa nnya feeyifo kukɔnɔ . “ Nya lǝ fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ éyifo fǝ kabua kǝtsyuǝǝ , kǝ wǝ ato . Nya lǝ údi dikpi nya ɔnɔ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , nyalɛ fi atsyɛ wǝ .
Lǝ úyifo lesa bua óta fǝ úbu sekuanse lǝ diyi lɔni ǝsuǝ nya usi usinkli úbǝ , úbǝ ɔlɛ fǝ lekpakpa sekuanse diyi nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝǝ , fi atsyɛ wǝ . ”
Yesu eto batɔnkpe álɛ Yesu lekpakpa bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ lǝ bo bofokanɔ lǝ bumuǝ ale boso . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Bonamute lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bekpe bofokanɔ bo leyo fe diyibibi nǝ nso bɔfɛ kenkee , biofo kuyi komfo bɔtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Su lǝ mfo lǝ esu edufǝ lǝ lekpo kǝmiǝ mǝ . ’ Nya kuuyifo nko mǝ .
“ Bibu nyamfo be be . Lǝ mi utsyuǝ kpe uyifoyifo wǝ laafo ɔkuɛ kǝtǝ wǝ nye ɔnlɛ fǝ basamu bobe nya utsyi ɔkuɛ ubǝ udufǝǝ , bɔtɛyi fɔɔtɛyi wǝ fǝ ubǝ usiǝ lǝ kasɔ mlǝ lǝ udi wǝ lesa ?
Owo lo ! Bomu ebɔtɛyi wǝ fǝ , ‘ Muǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ atsyasǝ kafia lǝ nkɛ , lǝ anwa lesa , lǝ efi mɔ didisa ǝtsyǝ mɛ lǝ ndi nlosǝ fɛ lǝ fintsya lǝ edi . ’
Yanle bǝ sɔ wǝ ani se ini wǝ uyifoyifo eto keyifo ete ini .
Nko ke ini itǝ mi tsya nɛ . Lǝ biyifo lesa saa nǝ mintɛyi mi miǝ biyifoo , ele bǝ bɛtɛyi biǝ , ‘ Beyifoyifo ete buni . Nya lesa nǝ buyifoo , eyifo lesa nǝ ete ele bǝ buuyifo . ’ ”
Nya se Yesu dídu ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem , ɔ́yɛ Samaria ku Galilea eto kumǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya se ɔnlɛ kebuto kǝtsyuǝ budufǝǝ , basani lefosi bǝtsyuǝ ba nlɛ bufisia bufi ǝbǝ batsyako wǝ . Befimfi bamfo ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ .
Nya báfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝ , “ Anto Yesu , be bo lǝ ǝnyǝ bo kaminsǝ ! ”
Yesu ǝnyǝ mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bisu lǝ bifi mi ǝsuǝ bisu bete Onanto eto nwǝ lǝǝtǝ wǝ kedi lǝ ɔlɛ ola obe mi . ” Se bányɛ bantɔɔ , bǝnyǝ bǝ mǝ bufi áyɛ mǝ .
Fɛɛ se mǝ ɔni dínyǝ nkǝ wǝ bufi ǝyuǝ wǝǝ , úsinkli úsu nya ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe .
Nya úsu óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́sɔ wǝ ani . Nya utidi ǝmǝ eyifo Samarianyǝ .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ nkǝ , “ Nya inni betidi lefosi míntsya fɛɛ ? Se ɔwɔnɔmbǝ fɛfɛ léfe ?
Ntsyǝ ibǝ bǝ utidi wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ ǝmfo hã ni nwǝ dísinkli úbǝ nkǝ wǝǝbǝ ɔsɔ Onanto ani ? ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , lǝ edu . Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ bufi . ”
Farisifɔ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ bala bǝ baate lefe nǝ kon Onanto eto sekakedikɔ luubǝ itǝ . Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto Sekadidi embubǝ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ betidi loofo bunyǝ .
Kuutsyuǝ ǝmbɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe ! Nnyǝ se mfo ! ’ nye ‘ Nnyǝ se mmǝ . ’ Itsyise Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ fe sekpe mfo lǝ mi nti . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ nǝ biɔbɛbɛ biǝ biǝnyǝ diyi nǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , luubǝ . Fɛɛ biembunyǝ !
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ebubǝ mi nti ini mba lɔɔtɛyi mi nkǝ , ‘ Bebe , nnyǝ wǝ mmǝ ! ’ nye ‘ Bebe , nnyǝ wǝ mfo ! ’ Fɛɛ biensu bɛbɛbɛ mɛ mfó !
Itsyise fe kase ofamfa laafa ku ute ketsyi lekpake nǝ kesu lebamba , nko kǝ sitinti Utidi Eto Ubi eto bubǝ luutsyǝ nɛ .
Fɛɛ ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ wooka kanyi bunyǝ tinti nya mmi eto betidi lɔɔni wǝ .
“ Asa nnya díbǝ lǝ Noa eto lefe , nnya kǝ nnya luubǝ itǝ le lefe nǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , luubǝ bio nɛ .
Betidi ékedi , bǝkǝnǝ . Nya basani díkakpa bǝsiǝ nya bǝkǝtǝ besio bese isu ese diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ Noa dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ kafo . Nya ɔsɔmi lɛni nya ntubibi díyi bóba bókpo kasɔ ka kenke nya bólo betidi kenke .
“ Nko kǝ yuubǝ itǝ fe kase íbǝ lǝ Lot eto lefe tsya nɛ . Betidi ékedi , bǝkǝnǝ , nya bákasa asi tsya . Bǝtsyuǝ ǝnyǝ bákakpe bidikǝ , nya bǝtsyuǝ díkato ayo .
Nya diyi nǝ Lot lɛbɔ lǝ Sodom , ute ku etebambi nnya nkpe lɛyimbi bua lɛwunini itsyi kato íbǝ ékpo lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya étonsǝ mɛmblɛ kenke .
“ Nko ke yuutsyǝ lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , lɔɔbɔ mbǝ nɛ .
Diyi nǝmfoo , utidi wǝ ńyǝ lǝ wǝ letsya ǝsuǝǝ , mensitɛyi nkǝ weesu diyo lǝ usu ufi kulesa . Nko ke ini lǝ ɔkuɛ utsyǝ ńyǝǝ , wensitɛyi nkǝ weesinkli ubǝ oto lǝ ubǝ ufi kulesa .
Bekloma lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ Lot eto usiǝ ǝsuǝ !
Utidi saa wǝ lela nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ nkpǝǝ , wooyansǝ mu . Nya utidi saa wǝ leyansǝ wǝ nkpǝǝ , wuusinkli unyǝ mu .
Nya ketsye kamfoo , betidi inuǝ ebolabe lǝ bikǝ biɔni ǝsuǝ , nya Onanto ebofo ɔni nya wooyani ɔni olabesǝ .
Besio inuǝ ebukǝkuǝ nnamfo lǝ kukuǝ kɔni ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto luulǝkǝ ɔni nya wooyani ɔni uńyǝnsǝ mfó .
Basani inuǝ ebuńyǝ bakafo nya wuutsyi ɔni udunko nya wooyani unuǝfǝ uńyǝnsǝ mfó . ”
Mfó ǝmǝ nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ sie ? ” Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kaka lesakpǝnkpǝ ntǝ , mfó ebintsyǝ laakpo nɛ . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi lekpa ditsyuǝ óte mǝ nkǝ ele bǝ bakato ola lefe saa nya yanle bǝ elo mǝ ani .
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Okponkpo bua utsyuǝ akɛ lǝ umǝ utsyuǝ wǝ dímankate Onanto sikpi nya wénkebu utidi tsya .
Nya lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kee , ɔkɔsiǝ utsyuǝ akɛ mfo wǝ díkesu wǝ ɔflɔ úsukalɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ , ‘ Lǝkǝ mɛ lǝ mɔ olo eto bulǝ ǝsuǝ . ’
“ Éfo lefe kpǝ , okponkpo ǝmǝ áni wényifo kulesa lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Ite bǝ maanté Onanto sikpi nya meemfi utidi keyifo kulesa ,
lǝ bulǝ bo ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmfo nlɛ mɛ bulǝ esoo , moobe miǝ nwunsǝko wǝ nla wǝ olo eto etiki nyamǝ nlǝkǝ . Lenni nko , wǝǝmbɔyɛ bubǝ nya wǝǝmbutǝ nkɛ lɛnwɔ mfe mfe . ’ ”
Mfó nya Bonamute dísukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ lesa nǝ okponkpo bua ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , yuubǝ bǝ Onanto embulǝkǝ wǝ betidi ba leewi kakpadi wǝ ketsye ku kakɔmi kato ola kǝtǝ wǝ bǝ ɔwunseko mǝǝ ? Nye bomu ebu fǝnkǝ wǝ ofe kama lǝ mǝ bulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ?
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ Onanto ebokpo lekpo nya wuutǝ mǝ lɛbɛ lamfolamfo . Fɛɛ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝbǝǝ , wuunyǝ betidi ba léfo wǝ bánɔ ? ”
Yesu átɛyi lekpa nǝmfo utǝ betidi ba leebu bǝ mǝ kakle hã ni basɛɛ nya bensi embunyǝ utidi sa wǝ ntǝ fǝ mǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , betidi inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ ésu Onanto eto Kedikǝtǝkɔ bǝ lǝ bato ola . Ɔni eyifo Farisinyǝ nya unuǝfǝ diyifo nwǝ laafo oko .
Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lete nya óto ola nkǝ , ‘ Onanto , maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise maansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ , nya meenyifo utidi kabua , nya maankpo kusiǝ fe kase betidi bamba leeyifo . Nya maasɔ fǝ ani tsya , itsyise minte fe nwǝ laafo oko wǝ ńyǝ mmǝ tsya seka .
Maakle kɛnyɛ eyi ǝnuǝ lǝ kɔsida saa ǝsuǝ . Nya meefi lesa nǝ kee minyǝ eto lekpafosile kǝtǝ fǝ . ’
“ Fɛɛ nwǝ laafo oko ǝmǝ ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ nya wónla nkǝ woabesǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi kato kulaa tsya . Fɛɛ úfi wǝ ani utǝkǝ lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Onanto , be mɔ obuayifo ǝmfo lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ’ ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi nkǝ , se besinkli bésu ayo , nwǝ laafo oko ǝmǝ ale kɛnkɛnkɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi nya inni Farisinyǝ ǝmǝ . Itsyise utidi saa wǝ laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , Onanto ebobokosǝ wǝ kasɔ . Nya utidi saa wǝ laaboko sǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , Onanto ebobesǝ wǝ kato . ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ éfi mǝ bebi báboko Yesu ɔflɔ , katɛyi bǝ ufi wǝ ani utǝkǝ lǝ mǝ . Se Yesu eto bakasebi dínyǝ nyamfo , béyǝnki bákpe betidi bamǝ lǝ nnya eso .
Fɛɛ Yesu ákpadi bekpefi bamǝ óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bekpefi lǝ bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ nya bienti mǝ kusu . Itsyise Onanto eto sekakedikɔ te itǝ betidi ba laabokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe bekpefi bamfo eto okle .
Nya bekloma nyamfo biǝnkǝ , utidi saa wǝ dímamfo Onanto eto sekadidi fe dikpefi seka , wǝmbudufǝ se kafo kulefe kulefe , kulefe . ”
Yudafɔ eto uninǝ utsyuǝ átɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Oteasa sɛɛ , be ele bǝ nyifo fɛ lǝ nyǝ nkpǝ manlo ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso faakpadi mɛ fǝ ɔsɛɛ ? Utidi kuutsyuǝ saa menyifo ɔsɛɛ enso Onanto hã .
Nyi miǝ biyi kɔfi ko laatɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mankpo kusǝ nye kusiǝ , manlo utidi , menyu , manla fǝ utsyuǝ kɛnyɛ , nya bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . ’ ”
Mfó nya utidi ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ntsyue afi nyamfo kenke koto kukɔnɔ , itsyi lǝ mɔ sikpefi lefe kǝ . ”
Se Yesu lɛnɔ wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ibu lesa lɔni ele bǝ yifo . Fi bikǝ bia kenke nte fǝ ate , lǝ efi atabi nyamfó ǝtǝ bakombo . Nyamfo luutǝ ǝnyǝ bikǝ ǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kato nɛ . Nyamfo kama lǝ edu ǝbǝ ǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
Fɛɛ lefe nǝ osani ǝmǝ lɛnɔ nya mfo , ǝsuǝ ába wǝ itsyise bikǝ kpǝ kpe wǝ .
Yesu ǝnyǝ kase ǝsuǝ léba wǝ nya údi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ekpe ale itǝ otabinyǝ fɛ lǝ ofo Onanto eto sekakedikɔ budufɔ !
Nya ekpe ale itǝ otabinyǝ bǝ lǝ udufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ , enso kase ɔtɔmli ku lekoko lɔɔyɛ lǝ okasa eto ofo ofe . ”
Mfó nya betidi ba lɛnɔ nyamfo lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe kon luunyǝ bofo ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ utidi lembofo buyifoo , iyuǝ itǝ Onanto ku buyifo . ”
Mfó nya Petro lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bebe , bo áyani bo ayo eto asa kenke butsyǝ nya búbǝ búntǝkǝko fǝ . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti , ɔnukualɛ uni . Nya nla miǝ bete biǝ utidi saa wǝ léyani wǝ diyo utsyǝ nye óyani wǝ usiǝ nye bayimisani nye wǝ antomǝ nye bebi utsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi esoo ,
wuunyǝ asa nyamfó eto okle kpǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo kǝmiǝ ku nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalokɔ ku lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝ tsya kǝmiǝ . ”
Yesu ákpa wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ ba úkǝlǝkǝ mate hã óboko wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ ! Bɔtɔ lǝ Yerusalem , kaka asa nnya kenke Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ mɛ , Utidi Eto Ubi ǝsuǝ , luubǝ itǝ nko .
Betidi ebufi mɛ bakpe lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto ani bǝ lǝ befi mɛ beyifo ǝmǝnsa . Booka mɛ nya bootufǝ ntufǝ bakpo mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Bɔɔblɛ wǝ nya boolo wǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nsi wootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ . ”
Nya asa nyamfo kenkee , bakasebi bamǝ mánnɔ nnya kasɔ . Etiki nyamfo eto kasɔnɔnɔ tsya akula mǝ . Bánnɔ lesa nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ mfo eto kasɔ .
Lǝ lefe nǝ Yesu ńlɛ bɔnyi kafi Yerikoo , unǝmba utsyuǝ ǝsiǝ lǝ kusu ɔflɔ mfó úkatɔ asa .
Se ɔ́nɔ betidi kpǝ ba nlɛ bofe eto kuduu , ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Be nlɛ bubǝ ? ”
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ uni nlɛ bofe . ”
Mfó nya ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ Yesu , Oka David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
Mfó nya betidi ba ntɔ sɛtɔ dínyenki bákpe wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ údika . Fɛɛ mɔmɔ bomu óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ David eto ubi ! Be mɛ lǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ ! ”
Lǝ nnya eso Yesu ále únyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ bakpa unǝmba ǝmǝ baboko wǝ ɔflɔ . Se úbǝ óyo wǝ ɔflɔ , Yesu átɔ wǝ nkǝ ,
“ Be faala fǝ nyifo ntǝ fǝ ? ” Unǝmba ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Anto , nla miǝ lǝ nsi nnyǝ asa . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ sinkli ǝnyǝ asa ! Fǝ bofokanɔ átsya fǝ . ”
Lamfolamfo , usinkli únyǝ asa nnya útǝkǝko Yesu nya ɔ́yɛ ɔntɔ ɔnlɛ Onanto bɔtɛsǝ . Nya se betidi kpǝ bamfó dínyǝ nyamfoo , mǝmblɛ kenke átɛsǝ Onanto .
Yesu ésu údufǝ Yeriko , nya ɔ́yɛ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kafo ɔntɔ .
Mfó nya mba laafo umǝnko eto uninǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Sakeo lɛkɛ , nya úyifo otabinyǝ tinti .
Úkabɛbɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ wɔɔyɛ lǝ unyǝ utidi wǝ kon Yesu ni . Fɛɛ se úyifo utidi kliminti esoo , ɔnlɛ kusu ku kutsyuǝ bunyǝ se betidi mfui eso .
Nyaso útsyetsyi ɔ́tɔ betidi bamfo sɛtɔ nya óbe kuyi bǝ lǝ unyǝ Yesu , itsyise óte nkǝ wuubǝ ɔyɛ mfo .
Se Yesu léyo kuyi komǝ kalɔɔ , úkǝnǝ úńyǝ nya óbesǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya ɔ́tɛyi Sakeo nkǝ , “ Sakeo , kɔse lǝ ayifǝ ǝbǝ kasɔ , itsyise fǝ diyo mɔɔsɔnɔ mi nɛ . ”
Sakeo ákɔse ɔ́yifǝ úbǝ kasɔ nya útǝ Yesu edufǝ ku disuǝyuǝ tinti .
Betidi ba dínyǝ nyamfó étsyiko etiki budi kawɔnɔnɔ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ katɛyi bǝ , “ Osani ǝmfo esukayɛ utidi ǝmfo wǝ ni obuayifo eto diyo . ”
Mfó nya Sakeo létaka úńyǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi Bonamute ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Anto ! Muufi mɔ bikǝ bia nkpe mɛ kenke eto kutsyǝ ntǝ bakombo . Nya betidi ba kenke eto bikǝ míntafa mímfoo , moofo mǝ nnya kayo eto sena ntsyǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mmi ǝmfo bofo ǝbǝ diyo nǝmfo , itsyise utidi wǝ mfo tsya eyifo Abraham eto kafo eto ubi .
Nya mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubii , mbǝ miǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ betidi ba kenke lénya kusu mboko nkpǝ . ”
Mfó nya betidi bamfó ńyǝ banlɛ asa nnya Yesu nlɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi bɔnɔ . Nya úsukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ lekpa ditsyuǝ , itsyise ofe ɔlɛ bɔnyi kafi Yerusalem nya bébu bǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ ebubǝ sitinti mɔmɔ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , osani wǝ nkpe dibu utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó wǝ létaka úsu kasɔ famfamfa kǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bǝtsyǝ wǝ seka . Nya úfi nsusu nkǝ , wuusinkli ubǝ wǝ umǝ .
Fɛ úduu , ókpadi wǝ beyifoyifo lefosi utsyǝ . Nya útǝ utsyuǝ saa atabi eto otobe ɔni . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bifi atabi nyamǝ beto ɔlɔ isu ese lefe nǝ muubǝ . ’
“ Fɛɛ osani ǝmfo eto umǝ eto betidi ékekisi wǝ , nyaso bátsyese batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bǝ besu batɛyi Okankplɛ nkǝ , ‘ Boanla boǝ osani ǝmfo di bo oka . ’
“ Tsya , bǝtsyǝ osani ǝmǝ seka nya usi úsinkli úbǝ umǝ ǝmǝ . Lamfolamfo , útǝ bákpadi wǝ beyifoyifo bamǝ bǝbǝ bátsya lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi nkǝ lǝ ɔnɔ kutǝkǝ ko bǝnyǝ .
“ Uyifoyifo tutɛ ǝbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nnyǝ atabi eto etobe lefosi ntǝkǝ lǝ ɔni ǝmǝ fǝtǝ mɛ mfó ǝsuǝ . ’
“ Mfó nya Onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛsǝ wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Álɔ eyifo ! Eyifo uyifoyifo sɛɛ ! Se fálɛ keyifo kɛkɛ kamfo ola fáyɛnko ke lǝ kusu sɛɛ esoo , muufi fǝ ntsyǝ seka lǝ kǝmǝ lefosi ǝsuǝ . ’
“ Uyifoyifo nuǝfǝ tsya ǝbǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nnyǝ atabi eto etobe ɛnɔ ntǝkǝ lǝ ɔni wǝ fǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ ! ’
“ Nya Onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi uyifoyifo ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ , ‘ Fǝǝ , ebudi seka lǝ kǝmǝ ɛnɔ ǝsuǝ ! ’
“ Uyifoyifo bamba ǝbǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , nyǝ fǝ atabi eto otobe ɔni wǝ fǝtǝ mɛ . Mfí nnya nkle lǝ mɔ ofiamɛ ǝsuǝ nkula .
Nte fǝ sikpi itsyise eyifo nwǝ nkpe ale . Nya feefi lesa nǝ lenni fǝ lele kafloma keyifo fǝ lele . Nya feefi didisa nǝ fǝmankpe kulaa tsya keyifo fǝ lele . ’
“ Mfó nya Onamute ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , ‘ Uyifoyifo bua feni ! Fǝ kosate eto kɛnyɛ eto etiki ni nnya muufi nlo fǝ dikpi ! Eyi fǝ nyifo utidi wǝ nkpe ale . Nya meefi lesa nǝ lenni mɔ lele kafloma keyifo mɔ lele . Nya meefi lesa lǝ kaka mánkpe ku ditsyuǝ .
Nya lǝ eyi nkoo , beso fémemfi mɔ atabi esu akpe lǝ atabi kǝtsyǝkɔ ? Mfóo , nyi miǝ muunyǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ nsinkli ntsyi mbǝ . ’
“ Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi betidi ba ńyǝ mfo nkǝ , ‘ Bɛlɛ atabi nyamǝ befo lǝ wǝ ani bitǝ uyifoyifo wǝ nkpe atabi eto etobe lefosi . ’
“ Fɛɛ betidi bamfo átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , uyifoyifo ǝmfó ebunyǝ atabi eto etobe lefosi útsyǝ ! ’
“ Mfó nya Onamute ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , ‘ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utidi wǝ asa ntee , wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto luutǝ okpe enso nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ kulesa lentee , nnya nte wǝ kulaa tsyaa , bɔɔlɛ ni bafo wǝ lǝ ani .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , binǝ mɔ balo ba dímanla bǝ ndi seka lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ beboko mfo lǝ belo mǝ lǝ mɔ ǝnǝmi . ’ ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ asa nyamfo ólosǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ sɛtɔ úsu Yerusalem .
Lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ Betfage ku Betania bɔfi lǝ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ɔflɔɔ , ótsyese wǝ bakasebi inuǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ bakatɔ .
Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bikatɔ lǝ umǝ kɛkɛ wǝ nkpe sɛtɔ mfó . Nya lǝ bɛlɛ wǝ budufǝǝ , biunyǝ ɔflimu eto lɛkpɔ ditsyuǝ nǝ bátsyasǝ lǝ ukuǝ bǝńyǝsǝ nǝ utidi kuutsyuǝ saa dímǝnsiǝ tɔ unyǝ . Benyankli ni ku ukuǝ lǝ bifi wǝ beboko mfo .
Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ atɔ mi lesa nǝ eso bényankli nii , bɛtɛyi wǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Bonamute nlɛ ni bohiã . ’ ”
Bakasebi bamǝ áyifǝ lǝ kusu bésu bǝnyǝ lesa saa fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝ bǝńyǝ banlɛ ubuki ǝmǝ bonyankli kǝlǝkǝǝ , ubuki ǝmǝ eto basate átɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ wǝ bonyankli ? ”
Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute ahiã wǝ . ”
Nya béfi ubuki ǝmǝ báboko Yesu . Mfó nya béfi mǝ mfia bésensǝ bákpo lǝ ubuki ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya báwunsǝko Yesu óbe úsiǝ lǝ wǝ .
Se úsiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya báyɛ bantɔɔ , betidi bǝtsyuǝ éfi mǝ mfia bésensǝ bákpo lǝ kusu .
Lefe nǝ Yesu ńlɛ bɔnyi kafi Yerusalem lǝ kusu kaka ɔnlɛ Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini bɔyifǝ kǝbǝǝ , wǝ bakasebi kpǝ bamǝ étsyiko Onanto ani bɔsɔ nya báto keyudu banlɛ bofa bembembe lǝ asa kplɛ nnya bǝnyǝ eso .
Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Atɛsǝ itǝ Oka wǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ ! Diyuǝ lǝ lefo kato kenke . Nya diyǝnde itǝ Onanto ! ”
Mfó nya Farisifɔ ba lɛkɛ lǝ sitiditu siamǝ nti lɛtɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , ninko fǝ bakasebi lǝ bayɛ kudu bokpo ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ lǝ bayɛ kudu bokpoo , aba nyamfo kosate ebutsyǝ kasɔ ku kudu bokpo . ”
Kase Yesu lɛyɛ ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem kedufǝkɔɔ , nya únyǝ umǝ ǝmǝǝ , úwi keku lǝ wǝ disi .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nla sitinti miǝ lǝ nnya ete biunyǝ bete mmi eto diyi nǝmfo eto lesa nǝ loohiã itǝ bǝ lǝ binyǝ diyuǝ ini ! Fɛɛ ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , bɛnlɛ bunyǝ lǝ bete !
Lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ se mi balo luuńyǝ batsyilama mi lǝ kalebe saa kenke . Nya booti ǝbiǝ kenke nya kulesa lembofo budufǝ nye kabɔ kǝbǝ lekple .
Betidi ebɔtsylɔsǝ umǝ mfo kenke nya boolo betidi ba nkpe lǝ wǝ kenke . Nya leba ku ditsyuǝ sa embubu ditǝkǝ lǝ ni kǝtsyǝkɔ . Itsyise bɛni nya bíǝnyǝ lǝ bete lefe nǝ Onanto díbǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo mi lǝ nkpǝ ! ”
Yesu ésu údufǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ nya útsyiko mba nlɛ bikǝ bote mfó bola kabɔsǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ diyoo , betidi ebokpadi ni bǝ diyo kaka betidi laato ola . ’ Nya mi dífi mfó befianisǝ beyu eto kabiɔkɔ ! ”
Diyi saa , Yesu ákate asa lǝ Onanto eto Kedikǝtǝkɔ mfó . Onanto eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Afi eto bateasa ku betidi eto batɔnkotɔnko ála bǝ lǝ balo wǝ .
Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ , itsyise betidi kpǝ akɛ mfó ba eto ato léfo wǝ etiki nyamǝ kekleke eso .
Diyi lɔni se Yesu lɛkɛ katé betidi asa lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ , kedi mǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ eto asa , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ku umǝ eto beninǝ ǝbǝ mfó .
Mfó nya bǝbǝ bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo ǝsuǝale nnya fankpe fɛ feeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle . Nya owoe dítǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ ntɔ mi etiki ǝtsyuǝ lǝ nnɔ .
Nte ǝsuǝale nnya Yohanes lɛkɛ fɛ úyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa útǝ betidi , Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi lee , betidi bomu ɔflɔ itsyi ? ”
Mfó nya bétsyiko kǝnǝ kasɔ lǝ mǝ nti katɛyi bǝ , “ Be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Lǝ bɔ́tɛyi boǝ Onanto ɔflɔ únyǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ utsyiko , ɔtɔ bo nkǝ , ‘ Be díbǝ eso biamfó Yohanes bɛnɔ ? ’
Nya lǝ bɔtɛyi boǝ utidi ɔflɔ ófo nnya utsyiko , katsyakɔ eto betidi bamfo kenke ebubǝ bakpɔ bo aba , itsyise mǝmblɛ kenke áfo bánɔ bǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ Yohanes ni nɛ . ”
Lǝ nyaso bǝlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boante kaka únyǝ ǝsuǝale nyamǝ útsyiko . ”
Mfó nya Yesu tsya lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke eso mintsya mǝmbɔtɛyi mi kaka mimfo ǝsuǝale fɛ meeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi bǝtidi bamǝ lekpa nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mǝ , osani utsyuǝ áfo kudiyi eto ɔkuɛ utsyuǝ . Se úsu kusu kutsyuǝ nkǝ lǝ usu usiǝ itǝ lefe nǝ dikulǝ esoo , úfi wǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ókpe lǝ beyifoyifo bǝtsyuǝ eto ani .
Se lefe léyo bǝ betsyiko eyibibi nyamǝ bɔlɛɛ , ótsyese wǝ uyifoyifo utsyuǝ nkǝ usu ofo wǝ kedikɔ lǝ ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ beyifoyifo ɔflɔ oboko wǝ . Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ áblɛ uyifoyifo ǝmǝ nya bála wǝ babɔsɛ , nya bǝntǝ wǝ kulesa .
Lǝ nyaso ótsyese uyifoyifo bamba . Fɛɛ beyifoyifo bamǝ áblɛ wuntsya , nya bákpe wǝ kofani , nya bála wǝ bátsyese , nya bǝntǝ wǝ kulesa .
Ótsyese uyifoyifo tsyǝfǝ . Nya beyifoyifo bamǝ lɛblɛ wǝ bǝtǝkǝ wǝ afabe lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bála wǝ bǝlǝkǝ lǝ mfó .
“ Mfó ǝmǝ nya ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ lɛtɔ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Be ele bǝ nyifo ? Mootsyese mɔ ubi lala nya mfo nnɔ miǝ boobu wǝ . ’
“ Fɛɛ se beyifoyifo bamǝ dínyǝ ubi ǝmǝ , bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Biǝnyǝ ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ eto ubi kosate ni nwǝ mfo . Bitǝ lǝ bolo wǝ ete wǝ bikǝ biamfo kenke lǝ befiani bo bele ! ’
Nyaso bǝnǝ wǝ babɔsǝ lǝ ɔkpɔ ǝmǝ kafo nya bálo wǝ . ” Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be ɔkuɛnsate ǝmǝ luuyifo beyifoyifo bamǝ mfo ?
Nla miǝ bete biǝ woolo beyifoyifo bamǝ kenke nya wuufi ɔkuɛ ǝmǝ okpe lǝ beyifoyifo bamba lǝ ani . ” Se betidi bamǝ lɛnɔ nko , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Yanle bǝ ibǝ nko ! ”
Yesu ábe mǝ tũũ nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Bíankla Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nyamfo eto kasɔ nlɛ bote , ‘ Leba nǝ mba laato ayo lɛni bǝ dimbǝ kɔnɔɔ , ni bomu díbǝ lefiani nǝ nso bofe lǝ afɛfɛ kenke nti ? ’
Utidi saa wǝ luutusǝ ɔsɔ lǝ leba nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , eboba wuli wuli wuli . Nya lǝ leba nǝmǝ tsya ǝbǝ lɛsɔ utsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , diukuǝ wǝ muɛmuɛmuɛ . ”
Afi eto bateasa ku Onanto eto besumunyǝ eto beninǝ ákpe nkɛale bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ Yesu lamfolamfo , itsyise bǝnyǝ bǝ mǝ ɔnlɛ sitinti nyaso ɔ́tɛyi lekpa nǝmǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ báte betidi bamfo sikpi .
Lǝ nnya esoo , bákabɛbɛ kusu bamba ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Bǝlǝkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ kalɔ kalɔ . Nya bákle ku mǝ bǝnkǝ besu Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya béyifo ǝsuǝ fe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mǝ kosate léla bǝ lǝ bate itǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bátsyese mǝ bǝnkǝ babio Yesu uyibi lǝ etiki ǝsuǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu ko bɔɔyɛ befi wǝ bakpe lǝ Roma eto Aba eto uninǝ eto ani .
Lǝ nnya esoo , mba laabio kanɔ asa bamfó ésu Yesu ɔflɔ . Nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝnkǝ asa nnya faatɛyi ku nnya fate kenke eyifo etiki tlolololo . Nya buyi tsya boǝ aambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ alɛ asa buyifo . Bomu aate ɔnukualɛtiki nnya ǝsuǝ Onanto laala nkǝ betidi yifo .
Lǝ nyamfo eso bola boǝ boate lǝ bo kɔfi ǝtǝ kusu bǝ bofo umǝnko butǝ Romafɔ eto Okankplɛ lee yǝntǝ kusu ? ”
Fɛɛ Yesu ǝnyǝ mǝ kɔwɛsu bua útsyǝ lekpo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Bifi sika flubia eto atabi beboko lǝ mbe . Owoe eto disi ku diye ntǝkǝ mfo ? ”
Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ale ini . ” Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bifi lesa saa nǝ ni Okankplɛ eto lele bitǝ Okankplɛ . Nya bifi lesa saa nǝ ni Onanto eto lele bitǝ Onanto . ”
Nya lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi mfóo , bamfó wǝ bumuǝ lǝ kulesa ǝsuǝ . Mǝ kɛnyɛ ǝkpǝ mǝ nya iyifo mǝ yani lǝ ditiki nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi eso .
Sadukifɔ bǝtsyuǝ mba laatɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ensi embotakaa , ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ ,
“ Oteasa , Moses áwɔni lǝ afi nnya útǝ bo nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ osani utsyuǝ ǝkpǝ nya oyani wǝ usiǝ utsyǝ nya bánle bebi saa , nyalɛ ele bǝ osani ǝmfo eto ɔyimisani , fi usio ǝmǝ ufi . Nya wǝ ku ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ lǝ bale bebi . Nya bebi bamfóo , betidi ebunyǝ mǝ fe osani wǝ dimankɛ ubi saa eto bale . ’
Lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ , bayimisani ekuanse akɛ . Osaibi ninǝ éfi kusiǝ nya úbǝ úkpǝ nya wǝ ku wǝ usiǝ mánle ubi saa .
Ɔyimisani nuǝfǝ tsya éfi ɔkɔsiǝ ǝmǝ .
Utsyǝfǝ tsya nko kǝ . Nya lesa nǝmǝ diyifo nko itǝ bayimisani ekuanse bamfo kenke . Mǝmblɛ kenke ǝkpǝ lǝ lefǝ nǝ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa manle .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔ kenke , usio ǝmǝ kosate ǝbǝ úkpǝ .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ bekpǝnkpǝ luusinkli bataka , owoe eto usiǝ usio ǝmǝ luudi se mǝmblɛ kenke dífi wǝ lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nkpǝ bomfo ǝsuǝ ete basani ku besio leefi bǝsiǝ kǝsiǝ bese .
Fɛɛ basani ku besio kenke ba díńyǝ itǝ bǝ bataka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ nkpǝ bo lensiembolo kulefee , bensiembufi bǝsiǝ nye bǝsiǝ bese .
Bootsyǝ fe kase Onanto eto batɔnkpe nte , nya bensiembukpǝ tsya . Beyifo Onanto eto bebi itsyise bátaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ .
Nyamfo ni ɔnukualɛ wǝ Moses dílǝkǝ ote lǝ Asawɔni Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ bekpǝnkpǝ si bootaka bǝbǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ . Itsyise lǝ lefe nǝ únyǝ lǝ kuyi ko díkǝnyǝ ute eto ǝnǝmi , ókpadi Onamute fe Abraham eto Onanto ku Isak eto Onanto ku Yakob tsya eto Onanto .
Nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ mba díkekpǝ kokoo , besi nkpǝ . Nyaso uyifo mǝ Onanto tsya . ”
Mfó afi eto bateasa bamfo eto bǝtsyuǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , ǝtǝ mbuayɛ kukɔnɔ ! ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , kutsyuǝ saa ménsikpe ɔkɔɛ lǝ ɔtɔ kulesa tsya .
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ betidi lɛtɛyi bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebutsyi Oka David eto bebi eto kafo ?
Nya Oka David ǝmǝ kosate átɛyi lǝ kusǝ eto kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Onamute ǝmǝ átɛyi mɔ Onamute nkǝ , “ Si ǝsiǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani eto kutsyǝ
isu ese lefe nǝ muufi fǝ balo nkpe lǝ fǝ kokpa kalɔ . ” ’
Nya lǝ Oka David ákpadi wǝ nkǝ Onamutee , ntsyǝ íbǝ fɛ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ luuyifo Oka David eto kafo eto ubi ? ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ betidi ba tã dínyǝ béketsyue ato lǝ asa nnya Yesu nlɛ bɔtɛyi , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ ,
“ Bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ afi eto bateasa ǝsuǝ . Betidi ba laala botsyilama lǝ mǝ awu kplɛ kplɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya baala bǝ betidi kǝsiǝsǝ mǝ ku dibu lǝ asi kafo . Mǝ laala nlebe kplɛ busiǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ nya baala ndikɔ kpaa busiǝ lǝ eyikedikɔ .
Beesu bakɔɛsiǝ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ bawunsǝ ko mǝ , fɛɛ baawɛ mǝ kalɛ mǝ asa kafo . Nya baato kala kǝntsyɛ , kate ǝsuǝ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Nyaso mǝ kotonǝnǝ ebɔkɛ ale eso utsyuǝ saa eto kole ! ”
Lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ mfoo , Yesu ábesǝ ǝnǝmi kato nya únyǝ kase batabinyǝ leefi mǝ ǝtǝsa kesu kakpe lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto otobe kafo .
Nya únyǝ tsya kase ɔkɔsiǝ okombo utsyuǝ dífi pesewa inuǝ butsyuǝ ókpe lǝ otobe ǝmǝ kafo .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ ɔkɔsiǝ okombo ǝmfoo , útǝ lesa nǝ nso bafɛfɛ bamfo kenke .
Itsyise babamba bamfoo , mǝǝ , lesa nǝ baala lǝ nǝ bǝǝnyǝ nti , ete ni nǝ bǝtǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ usio ǝmfo wǝ sekombo , lesa nǝ kenke ntǝ wǝ nǝ wuudi mfó , nya ni nǝ úfi útǝ mfo nɛ . ”
Lefe nǝmfóo , bakasebi bǝtsyuǝ akɛ mfó kedi etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya bátɛyi kase kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ laanɔ bobe ku kase aba nnya béfi báto diyo nǝmǝ laanɔ bobe ku asa nnya betidi dítǝ béfi bálɔ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Lesa saa nǝ bɛnlɛ bunyǝ mfoo , lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ se leba saa lensiembubu lǝ ni kǝsiǝkɔ . Bomu betidi ebusense ditsyuǝ saa lekpo lǝ kasɔ . ”
Mfó nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , dimamfe yuubǝ itǝ nko ? Nya be ini buufi bunyǝ lǝ bote boǝ lefe nǝ asa nyamfo luubǝ éboyo ? ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bińyǝ bikabe kusu itǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbɔwɛ mi okpe . Betidi kpǝ ebubǝ batɛyi bǝnkǝ mɔ ditiki bǝbǝ bulǝkǝ kate , bookǝbǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Mɔ uni , ’ nya ‘ Lefe nǝmǝ éboyo . ’ Fɛɛ biǝntǝkǝko mǝ kama .
Bíanté sikpi lǝ bɛnɔ lema eto kudu nya betidi letaka bǝńyǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Asa nyamfo eto kakle ebutsyiko bubǝ , fɛɛ inni nya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ kalosǝkɔ ebubǝ eyo elo . ”
Yesu esi úsukosǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ese ebɔkpɔ ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ , nya bekakedikɔ lɔɔbɔkpɔ ku mǝ ǝsuǝ .
Kasɔ ebutinkǝ kekleke . Nya kukpɛnsɛ tsya luubǝ kekleke . Nya efimbi akpa akpa tsya luubǝ nlebe nlebe kenke . Nya ekpinsa kpǝ luutsyiko bubǝ lǝ difule ǝsuǝ .
“ Nya fɛ asa nyamfo luubǝ ibǝ , betidi ebumuǝ mi nya bookpe mi bulǝ , bate mi ohiã . Betidi ebokpa mi besuko akpokakpokɔ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ nya bookpe mi lǝ ayo . Nya bookpa mi besuko baka ku Aba eto bǝnyɛsiǝ eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ bakponko mi akpo lǝ mɔ disi eso .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , kusu ebɔsini mi bǝ lǝ bidi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
Bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ bɛtɔnsǝ itǝ bǝ biembulǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kusu ko biɔyɛ bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ eso .
Itsyise muutǝ mi kobe ku kɛnyɛ yayaya itǝ bǝ mi balo eto kuutsyuǝ embofo buńyǝ lǝ mi ǝnǝmi nye bǝtǝ mi etiki eto mbuayɛ kulefe .
Mi anto mǝ ku bayimisani ku mi betidi ku mi bayɛtsyuǝ ebufi mi bakpe lǝ ani . Nya boolo mi bǝtsyuǝ .
Betidi ba tã ebukisi mi lǝ mɔ disi eso .
Fɛɛ mi disi eto sɛwɔnii , lɛ sɔni kplon embonya .
Bińyǝ kekleke lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbɔkɛ kalokɔ kulefe .
“ Lefe nǝ bínyǝ biǝ bamamanyǝ esu bǝńyǝ batsyilama Yerusalem , ete biote biǝ umǝ ǝmfo eto boba kakpo lǝ kasɔ eto lefe eboyo .
Lefe nǝ mfóo , betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ Yudea , ele bǝ betsyetsyi bedu besu babiɔ lǝ atini ǝsuǝ lǝ babɔ lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ . Nya betidi bakenke nkpe lǝ umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ kafo , ele bǝ babɔ lǝ wǝ bedu . Nya betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ mbuto ku kǝmǝ ka lɛfi mfo , yanle bǝ besu umǝnkplɛ ǝmǝ kafo .
Itsyise lefe nǝ mfó ni kotonǝnǝ eto eyi nnya ele bǝ ibǝ fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki léte .
Yɔɔkɛ ale tinti itǝ besio ba ni bafonlɛ ku bebiambe ba nlɛ bebi bɔyimisǝ . Kanyinyǝnyǝ kekleke kǝtsyuǝ ebubǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ ebubǝ betidi bamfo ǝsuǝ .
Boolo bǝtsyuǝ ku asiabi . Nya boomuǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale besuko nsɔ bamba kpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ , luudi sɛkplɛ baayinkǝ Yerusalemfɔ bakpe isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto lɛtɔnɔ utǝ mǝ .
“ Ekpinsa kpǝ ebubǝ lǝ kofe ku kofande ku befandebi eto ǝnǝmi ǝsuǝ . Nya kasɔ eto betidi kenke eboyansǝ kusubebe saa . Nya sikpi kplɛ ebubǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ lǝ kase lekpo eto kudu ku kase diuyǝnki nyanklaa eso .
Ǝnǝmi ebutsyiko betidi bonanko lǝ sikpi sia luumuǝ mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ befi bǝńyǝ bensǝkǝ itǝ lesa nǝ luubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ǝsuǝ eso . Itsyise asa nnya nkpe lǝ difule ensiembuńyǝ lǝ nnya kǝńyǝnkɔ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Utidi Eto Ubi ebɔbɔ ubǝ lǝ difule lǝ asɔmi loku kǝmiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ ku lǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝ asa nyamfo mfe nlɛ bubǝǝ , bɛlɔ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyǝ lǝ bikabe kusu , itsyise mi dilǝkǝfe ebɔfi elo . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ lekpa ditsyuǝ nkǝ , “ Bibu disi bitsyi lǝ kudiyi ku eyi bamba kenke ǝsuǝ bebe .
Lǝ binyǝ biǝ afanto fɔfɔ etsyiko bɔbɔɔ , bete biǝ kasɔmite eboyo elo .
Nko kǝ ini lǝ binyǝ biǝ asa nyamfo nlɛ bubǝǝ , bete biǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ eto dibǝfe fe yaala lǝ eyo .
“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ fɛ bǝtsyuǝ ba nsi nkpǝ mfo luukpǝ balo .
Kato ku kasɔ ebubǝ efe , fɛɛ mɔ etiki embubǝ efe kulefe .
“ Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ biemfi mi lefe bitǝ budi ku sitekpe eto disuǝyuǝ mate . Nya kuutsyuǝ memfi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ bɔkpɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa ǝsuǝ . Lenni nko , diyi nǝmǝ ebubǝ ditu mi lǝ kafuafua ǝsuǝ .
Nya yuuyifo fe kase uyibibiobio lǝǝlǝkǝ ubuki seka . Etsyise yuubǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ bińyǝ bikato ola lefe saa bǝ lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ bɛbɔ befe lǝ keni saa ǝsuǝ lǝ lesa saa nǝ luubǝ mfo ǝsuǝ lǝ itǝ bǝ biofo buńyǝ lǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi eto lekpokakpokɔ . ”
Lǝ eyi nyamfó kenke ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu éfi ɔ́lɛ betidi bamfo asa bote lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ . Nya lǝ ditsyitsyo lefee , úkesu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ékesu kalabe .
Nya olesiǝtu saa , betidi bamfo ékesu kedikǝtǝkɔ kamǝ lǝ banɔ wǝ asatete .
Lefe nǝ Yudafɔ leedi Nnamfokuã eto Abolo eto Diyi nǝ baakpo bǝ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila ebɔfi .
Fɛɛ se Onanto eto besumunyǝ ninǝ mǝ ku afi eto bateasa díkate betidi bamfó sikpi esoo , bákabɛbɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ balo Yesu lǝ kabiɔbiɔ ǝsuǝ .
Mfó nya Obonsam dídufǝ lǝ Yuda wǝ baakpo tsya bǝ Iskariot ǝsuǝ . Nyaa uyifo Yesu eto lefosi bakasebi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni .
Nyaso Yuda ésu Onanto eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto mba laase mfó eto beninǝ ɔflɔ . Nya bédi etiki itsyi lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ wɔɔyɛ fɛ boomuǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ , nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝ bootǝ wǝ atabi .
Nya Yuda tsya lɛtɔnɔ nko . Nyaso útsyiko lefe sɛɛ bɔbɛbɛ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ wɔɔyɛ ufi Yesu okpe mǝ lǝ ani lǝ betidi bamǝ eto mante mante ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , diyi nǝ baalo basamubi itǝ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi itǝ Nnamfokuã eto Diyididi ǝbǝ léyo .
Nya Yesu létsyese Petro ku Yohanes ɔtɔnsǝ ku kɛnyɛ kamfo nkǝ , “ Bisu bɛlɔ Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa bitsyǝ itǝ bo budi . ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Sie faala fǝ bɔlɔ ni butsyǝ ? ”
Nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bidufǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ ǝmǝǝ , osani utsyuǝ ebubǝ otsyako mi wǝ ntsyi ntu ku ɔlɔtsyi . Bitǝkǝko wǝ lǝ bidufǝ diyo nǝ wuudufǝ .
Nya lǝ bɛtɛyi oyosate ǝmǝ biǝnkǝ , ‘ Oteasa nkǝ bɔtɔ fǝ nkǝ , “ Nte diyo nǝ kafo ele bǝ Mɔ ku mɔ bakasebi luubǝ bedi Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa ? ” ’
Woote mi abanslo kato eto diyo kplɛ ditsyuǝ nǝ bálɔ bǝtsyǝ nya bétsyue ǝsiǝsa lǝ ni kafo bǝtsyǝ . Bɛlɔ didisa nǝmǝ bitsyǝ mfó . ”
Mfó nya báyifǝ kusu bésu bǝnyǝ lesa saa pɛpɛɛpɛ fe kase Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ . Nya bálɔ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto edisa nyamǝ bǝtsyǝ mfó .
Se lefe léyoo , Yesu ku wǝ batɔnkpe bamǝ ésu bǝsiǝ kasɔ bǝ lǝ bedi lesa .
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Iyifo mɔ lelabi kokooko bǝ lǝ ndi Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto didisa nǝmfo ku mi fɛ lǝ nnyǝ kanyi .
Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ mensiembudi ni bio isu ése lefe nǝ muudi ni lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . ”
Nnya kamaa , Yesu éfi ditǝnǝkɔbe nya ɔ́sɔ ani . Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Befo nyamfo lǝ binǝ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , mensiembunǝ ntu bo lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ wanyi eto awɔnsa ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto eto sekadidi luubǝ . ”
Nya úfi abolo utsyuǝ nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani . Nya úbudi nnya nya úfi útǝ mǝ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ni mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia muufi ntǝ Onanto kedi lǝ mi disi . Biyifo nyamfo bifi bikakloma mɛ . ”
Nko ke tsya úfi ntǝ ku lɛkɔbe úfi utǝ mǝ lǝ didisa nǝmǝ kama nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lɛkɔbetɔ nǝmfo eyifo Onanto eto ketsyue fɔfɔ ka utsyue utsyǝ fe ditsyǝbi , nǝ ni mɔ kɔtɔ ko mookpo lǝ kasɔ lǝ mi disi .
Fɛɛ bete biǝ nwǝ dídu mɛ útǝǝ , si ɔlɛ kɔni bokpe ko mɛ lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni mfo .
Nya mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , mbǝ nlɛ bofe fe kase Onanto lése uyi utsyǝ . Fɛɛ mbɔbuɛ itǝ utidi wǝ luudu mɛ utǝ . ”
Mfó nya beetsyiko bǝtsyuǝ bɔtɔ kanɔ bǝ owoe luuyifo nyamfo .
Kǝnǝ ǝbǝ kedufǝ bakasebi bamǝ nti itsyi nwǝ luudi ɔkplɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba lenni Yudafɔɔ , mǝ baka kpe ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ betidi ǝsuǝ kenke . Nya baka bamfo kpe diye nǝ baala bǝ betidi bamfo kakpo mǝǝ , nǝ ni bǝ ‘ Bafonǝtidi . ’
Fɛɛ inni nko ele bǝ itsyǝ lǝ mi nti . Bomu utidi wǝ ni nwǝ nso kenke lǝ mi ntii , ele bǝ uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔkɛkɛ enso . Fɛɛ nwǝ ni ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ele bǝ ofiani nwǝ leesumu betidi .
Nya owoe ni ɔkplɛnyǝ onso ? Nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ɔpunu ekedi lee , nwǝ leesumu wǝ ? Lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , nwǝ lǝǝsiǝ lǝ ɔpunu ekedi . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , nkpe mi lǝ nti fe nwǝ leesumu .
Bíokpe ɔkɔɛ koko bítǝkǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ lefe kekleke kenke ǝsuǝ .
Nya fe kase mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale nkǝ ndi sekaa , nko kǝ mintsya luutǝ mi ǝsuǝale nyamǝ eto okle nɛ .
Biudi binǝ lǝ mɔ lesakedikɔ lǝ mɔ sekakedikɔ . Nya biusiǝ lǝ akankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ bidi seka lǝ Israel eto lefosi atobi ǝnuǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi Simon Petro nkǝ , “ Simon , Simon ! Tsyue ato lǝ anɔ ! Onanto ǝtǝ Obonsam kusu nkǝ oto mimblɛ obe lǝ usense mi nti , mba nkpe kɔnɔku mba lǝmbǝ kɔnɔ lǝ fe kase ɔkuɛmfo laaflɛ kamɔ kǝlǝkǝ lǝ kofo nti .
Fɛɛ Simon , mboto ola lǝ fǝ disi bǝ lǝ fǝ bofokanɔ lǝ bɔyɛ kɛnyɛ buyuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ fuusinkli ǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔɔ , kpe fǝ bayimitsyuǝ nkɛale . ”
Nya Petro lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nńyǝ nlɛ kusu bobe miǝ bonko fǝ kenke ebolabe lǝ Aba eto diyo nya lǝ nkpǝ ku fǝ kulaa tsya ! ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Petro , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi miǝ ketsye kamfo fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛɛ , ebutudi sitsyǝ fǝ enyi mɛ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfe se míntsyese mi kusu nya míntǝ bíentsyi otabitobe nye kusuyɛyɛtobe nye afɔkpa kuǝtsyuǝ , béhiã lesatsyuǝ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Kulesa mánhiã bo kula kon . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , utidi wǝ nkpe atabi eto otobe utsyuǝ nye kusuyɛyɛtobe utsyuǝ , ufi ɔlɛ . Nya nwǝ kalande kukǝtsyuǝ lentee , ele bǝ ufi wǝ awu nye kafia ote , lǝ usu oya ke .
Nya nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe mfó lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bákla wǝ bákpe lǝ betidi bua ntii , ’ ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ nko lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lesa nǝ báwɔni itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝǝ , lɛ bubǝ kǝtǝ . ”
Nya bakasebi bamǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , bee ! Nnyǝ nlanle nnuǝ nte mfo ! ” Mfó nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Isiǝ . ”
Yesu áyɛ ɔ́bɔ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ nya úsu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ fe kase woala buyifo . Nya wǝ bakasebi bamǝ tsya dítǝkǝko wǝ .
Se óyo kaka ǝmǝǝ , Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Beto ola , lǝ bɛyɛ disi butǝ le botokabe ǝsuǝ . ”
Nnya kamaa , óyani mǝ utsyǝ mfó ɔ́yɛ usu sɛtɔ sɛkɛ nya óse akonki óto ola .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , lǝ alaa , lǝkǝ kanyi eto lɛkɔbe nǝmfo etsyiko lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ menyifo lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ fǝ lele ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe dítsyi kato úbǝ úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte wǝ nya ókpe wǝ nkɛale .
Nya lǝ kanyi kplɛ ka ɔnlɛ bunyǝ esoo , usi óto ola kekleke ókpe . Nya diwi nǝ lɛbɔ lekpo wǝ eyifo fe atɔbo nya nlɛ bola kakpo lǝ kasɔ .
Se Yesu létaka lǝ kaka ɔnlɛ ola boto mfóo , úsinkli úsu wǝ bakasebi bamǝ ɔflɔ . Nya úbǝ únyǝ nkǝ bálabe selabe itsyi lǝ lɛwɛnlo nǝ ǝsuǝ bakɛ eso .
Mfo nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ selabe ? Betaka lǝ beto ola lǝ kase biembudufǝ lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu ńyǝ ɔnlɛ etikii , betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ áyɛ bétu wǝ . Yuda wǝ ni bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni lɛtɔnko mǝ . Ɔ́yɛ úsu Yesu ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ ɔfiɔ wǝ lǝ kola .
Fɛɛ Yesu átɛyi Yuda nkǝ , “ Yuda , bubǝ fǝbǝ fǝ aafiɔ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , lǝ kola lǝ efi mɛ akpe lǝ betidi eto ani ? ”
Lefe nǝ bakasebi ba lɛkɛ mfó ku Yesu dínyǝ lesa nǝ luubǝ ibǝ , bátɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , bɔkpɔnko mǝ ku bo nlande lee ? ”
Mfó nya bakasebi bamǝ nti eto ɔni lésiabe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto uyifoyifo eto kodianito úfǝ .
Fɛɛ Yesu áni ko mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Isiǝ ! Bitǝ mǝ kusu ! ” Mfó nya útidi uyifoyifo ǝmǝ eto koto nya wǝ koto dísinkli kótsya wǝ .
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi besumufɔ ninǝ ku mba laase Disumuyo eto beninǝ ku kusǝ eto beninǝ ba díbǝ mfo bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ nkǝ , “ Beso ele bǝ bifi keyi ku nlande bibǝ fe uwudifɔ mini ?
Bonko mi ákɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ diyi saa tsya bíatɛtsyi biǝ biǝmuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale mɛ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mi lefe léyo bǝ biyifo nko se Obonsam eto ǝsuǝale ntekǝ kato . ”
Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku baka bamfó ǝmuǝ Yesu , nya béfi wǝ bésuko Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto diyo . Nya Petro tsya dítǝkǝko mǝ kama kama .
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ákpe ute utsyuǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ eto lekple , nya Petro tsya dísu úsiǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
Se besio eto uyifoyifo ɔni dínyǝ Petro se ute díyǝnde okpo wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ se usi mfóo , óbe wǝ tũũ nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo tsya ǝǝtǝkǝko Yesu . ”
Fɛɛ Petro áni nyamfo nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Usio , minyi wǝ kulaa tsya ! ”
Lǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ eto kama , osani utsyuǝ tsya ǝnyǝ Petro wǝ únyi nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fintsya mǝ nti eto ɔnɔ feni ? ” Fɛɛ Petro esi útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Osani , nni mɔ uni ! ”
Íyifo fe lebombosɔsɔ lɔni eto kama , osani bamba utsyuǝ tsya ébǝ únyǝ kekleke ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Kǝnǝ ku kǝtsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ osani ǝmfo tsya ǝtǝkǝko Yesu , itsyise Galileanyǝ uni ! ”
Fɛɛ Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Osani , mante lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo kula kula ! ” Lamfolamfo , fe kase unsi únyǝ ɔnlɛ etiki , ukusɛ ko ditǝ kɛnyɛ .
Bonamute ǝmǝ ékensǝ óbe Petro . Mfó ǝmǝ nya Petro lékloma nkǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛ ketsye kamfoo , ebutudi kɛnyɛ sitsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ fǝ enyi mɛ . ”
Petro ábɔ úsu lekple nya úwi keku kekleke .
Betidi ba díkase Yesu , ǝmǝ wǝ nya báblɛ wǝ .
Bákle wǝ ǝnǝmi nya báblɛwǝ , nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe lɛsɔ fǝ ? Tɛyi bo ! ”
Nya báka wǝ lǝ esu bamba kpǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
Se kale dísiǝǝ , kusǝ komǝ eto beninǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ǝbǝ bǝsiǝ . Nya bákpa Yesu bésuko mǝ ǝnǝmi .
Nya betidi ba díbǝ batsya mfó lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo lǝ fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ . ” Mfo nya útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ntɛyi mi lesatsyuǝ tsyaa , biǝmbofo bɛnɔ .
Nya lǝ ntɔ mi etiki ǝtsyuǝ , biǝmbofo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ katɛyi mɛ kulesa .
Fɛɛ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , Onanto wǝ ni ǝsuǝalenyǝ kenke ebutsyǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi , lǝ wǝ kodiani . ”
Mfó nya mǝmblɛ lɛtɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ ? ” Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mi kosate nlɛ bɔtɛyi biǝnkǝ wǝ mini , nya nko ini nɛ . ”
Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yensihiã bo bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa si ubǝ udi adansiɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ . Bo kosate ánɔ asa nnya ɔ́tɛyi ! ”
Nya mǝmblɛ létaka nya béfi Yesu bésuko Pilato ɔflɔ .
Mfó bétsyiko etiki butsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Búmuǝ utidi ǝmfo se ɔnlɛ bo kusǝ eto betidi bokpa kayɛnko lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ . Nya ɔnlɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , bénsiko umǝnko bǝtǝ Roma eto Okankplɛ . Nya úsi ɔ́tɛyi tsya nkǝ wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nya uni Oka tsya . ”
Pilato átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ? ” Nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nko ini fe kase fanlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ . ”
Mfó nya Pilato lɛtɛyi besumunyǝ ninǝ ku sitiditu siamǝ nkǝ , “ Mǝnnyǝ kulesa lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ nǝ eso ele bǝ nlo wǝ dikpi . ”
Fɛɛ mǝmǝ ǝńyǝ kekleke bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ asa nnya woate ǝtǝ botaka kǝńyǝ ǝbǝ idufǝ lǝ Yudea eto betidi kenke nti . Útsyǝ nyamfo kasɔ lǝ Galilea , nya úkaboko nnya mfo tsya . ”
Se Pilato lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmfoo , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Galileanyǝ ni utidi ǝmfo ? ”
Nyaso se óte nkǝ Yesu étsyi Galilea eto lekpake nǝ ǝsuǝ Herodes nlɛ seka budi esoo , úfi wǝ ótsyese Herodes ɔflɔ . Nya Herodes ǝmfo akɛ lǝ Yerusalem lǝ lefe nǝmfó ǝsuǝ .
Ǝsuǝ ǝyuǝ Herodes tinti se únyǝ Yesu , itsyise wɔ́ɔnɔ wǝ kɔsɔ koko nya óla nkǝ lǝ unyǝ wǝ kokooko . Nya ɔnlɛ kusu bobe nkǝ wuunyǝ Yesu lǝ uyifo ayanisa ǝtsyuǝ lǝ obe .
Nyaso Herodes átɔ Yesu etiki kpǝ , fɛɛ Yesu ménfe kɛnyɛ utǝ mbuayɛ saa .
Besumunyǝ ninǝ ku afi eto bateasa ábɔ bǝbǝ sɛtɔ nya bála nnyɛ kplɛ , kplɛ bǝtǝkǝ Yesu .
Herodes ku wǝ bamamanyǝ ákpe Yesu kɔfiɔ ku kofani . Nya béfi awu nnya lefo koya ǝtsyuǝ bákpe wǝ nya besi bákpa wǝ bésuko Pilato ɔflɔ .
Diyi nǝmfo hã ǝsuǝ nya Herodes ku Pilato léfiani bayɛtsyuǝ , itsyise kɔɔ , balo bédi lǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Pilato ákpadi besumunyǝ ninǝ ku umǝ eto beninǝ ku betidi ba létsya mfo ɔkɔ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi lékpa utidi ǝmfo béboko mɛ biǝ ɔlɛ betidi bokpa kayɛnko lǝ kusu bua ǝsuǝ . Nya mɔmɔɔ , ńtɔ wǝ etiki lǝ mi kosate eto ǝnǝmi . Nya mǝnnyǝ kabua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase mi léla bítǝkǝ wǝ .
Herodes tsya mǝnnyǝ kulesa bua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise úsinkliko wǝ ótsyese bo . Utidi ǝmfo ményifo kulesa nǝ ele bǝ bolo wǝ dikpǝnkpi .
Nyaso muutǝ lǝ bablɛ wǝ kuyibi lǝ nyani wǝ lǝ udu . ”
Lǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto eyididi saa ǝsuǝǝ , iyifo Pilato eto ketsyue bǝ oyani mba bákpe lǝ diyo eto ɔni lǝ mǝ nti utǝ mǝ .
Mǝmblɛ áfa bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lo wǝ ! Lǝ ayani Baraba ǝtǝ bo ! ”
Baraba ǝmfoo , bákpe wǝ lǝ diyo ɛyɛ lǝ bulǝ butsyuǝ bo ókpe únyǝ lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ ku wǝ utidi wǝ ólo ǝsuǝ eso .
Nya se Pilato léla nkǝ lǝ oyani Yesu esoo , usi údi betidi bamǝ etiki .
Fɛɛ bákpo kudu bembembe bákpe lǝ wǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ bǝ “ Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! Sɔ wǝ amanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ! ”
Pilato esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ ditsyǝfǝ nkǝ , “ Nya nte kabua ka úyifo ? Mǝnnyǝ kabua ka úyifo eso ele bǝ nlo wǝ dikpǝnkpi ! Muutǝ lǝ bablɛ wǝ keyibi lǝ nyani wǝ . ”
Fɛɛ bofa ko bensi banlɛ bembembe katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ele bǝ lǝ basɔ Yesu bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . ” Nya lǝ kalosǝkɔ , bǝtǝkǝ wǝ kato .
Nyaso Pilato ála etiki nyamǝ úlǝkǝ fe kase betidi bamǝ léla .
Óyani utidi nwǝ baala útǝ mǝ . Utidi wǝ bakponkpo lékpe lǝ diyo itǝ bulǝ bo ókpe ku wǝ utidilolo eso . Nya óyani Yesu ókpe mǝ lǝ ani nkǝ lǝ beyifo lesa nǝ bála ku wǝ .
Bamamanyǝ bamǝ ákpa Yesu bédunko . Nya se bányɛ lǝ kusu bantɔ , bátsyako Kirenenyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Simon wǝ dítsyi kebuto kǝtsyuǝ ɔntɔ lǝ Yerusalem . Bǝńyǝnsǝ wǝ báyinkǝ wǝ bákpe bǝnkǝ ofo uyi wǝ Yesu ntsyi mfo utsyi lǝ utǝkǝko wǝ kama .
Betidi kpǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝkǝko Yesu kama . Nya besio bǝtsyuǝ akɛ lǝ mǝ nti ba díkewi nku ku kaminsǝ kǝtǝ wǝ .
Yesu ékensǝ óbe nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Yerusalem eto besio , bienwi keku bitǝ mɛ . Bomu biwi lǝ mi ku mi bebi eto disi .
Itsyise lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ nǝ betidi lɔɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Diyuǝ itǝ bakonɔ ku mba eto belefie ubi dímǝnsiǝtɔ unyǝ ku ami nnya bányimi tɔ bǝnyǝ ! ’
Lefe nǝmfó ni lefe nǝ betidi lɔɔtɛyi atini bǝ , ‘ Beba bekpo bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ! ’ Nya bɔɔtɛyi akpenkpe bǝ , ‘ Bɛkula bo ! ’
Itsyise lǝ balɛ asa nyamfo eto okle buyifo lǝ kuyi kuã ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ kuyi koya ? ”
Bákpa betidi bamba inuǝ ba ni babuayifo bésu kalokɔ ku Yesu .
Se bésu báyo kaka baakpo Ditidisikɔbee , básɔ Yesu bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ mfó . Nya betidi inuǝ bamǝ tsyaa , básɔ mǝ bámanklasǝ lǝ keyi ǝsuǝ lǝ Yesu eto simǝni ku sediani .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , fi atsyɛ mǝ , itsyise benyi lesa nǝ banlɛ buyifo . ” Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , bamamanyǝ bamǝ ésie Yesu eto awu bǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ kase asa nnya bákpo basɛ lété ǝsuǝ .
Betidi bamǝ kenke ǝńyǝ mfó balɛ bobe nya Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ ńyǝ bánlɛ Yesu bumǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ófo betidi bamba lǝ nkpǝ , bitǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bobe , lǝ wǝ ni Kristo , Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ! ”
Nko ke bamamanyǝ bamfó tsya dímǝ wǝ nɛ . Bésu wǝ ɔflɔ nya béfi ntǝ bo nkpe kalo bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ unǝ .
Nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ fǝ ni Yudafɔ eto Okaa , nyalɛ kpɔ lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
Báwɔni etiki nyamfo lǝ wǝ disikato nya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni Yudafɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ nɛ . ”
Babuayifo ba básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ eyi ǝsuǝ eto ɔni lǝ mǝ nti áka Yesu nkǝ , “ Inni fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ? Kpɔ lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ ǝlǝkǝ bo tsya ! ”
Fɛɛ unuǝfǝ áni ko wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Aante Onanto sikpi lee ? Kotonǝnǝ kɔni eto okle befi bǝtǝ fǝ ku wǝ kenke .
Nya bo kotonǝnǝ , kɔyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ boo , ni ni nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bo nɛ . Fɛɛ wǝ ményifo kabua saa . ”
Nya ɔ́tɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Yesu , kloma mɛ lǝ esu edufǝ fǝ sekakedikɔ ! ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ mmi ǝmfo kee , ebudufǝ Paradiso kafo ku mɛ . ”
Nya se éyo kakɔmi eto lefosi ǝnuǝǝ , kofe áyɛ bofa nya kale ku kawunsiǝ kenke lena tũũ itsyi lǝ kakɔmi isu ese lǝ abombo ǝtsyǝ . Nya Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ eto kafia ka mfaka mfo léla , késie lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ .

Yesu áfa ku ɔkɔɛ bembembe nkǝ , “ Nto , mfi mɔ lɛwɔnɔ ńkpe fǝ lǝ ani ! ” Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfó nkoo , óma kɛnyɛ .
Se omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmǝ dínyǝ lesa nǝ díbǝǝ , ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Sitintii , utidi ǝmfo eyifo utidi sɛɛ . ”
Se betidi ba díbǝ bǝ baabe lesa nǝ díbǝ nya bǝnyǝ lesa nǝ díbǝǝ , bésinkli bésu ayo nya béfi ani bétsyi lǝ esi ku kaminsǝ .
Nya betidi ba kenke léte Yesu ku besio ba dítǝkǝko wǝ ditsyi Galilea bǝbǝǝ , ǝńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ balɛ asa nyamfo bobe .
Osani utsyuǝ ákɛ mfó baakpo Yosef wǝ dítsyi Arimatea lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ . Uyifo utidi sɛɛ wǝ betidi lǝǝtǝ dibu tinti . Nya uńyǝ ɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ Onanto eto sekadidi sia nlɛ bubǝ . Ite bǝ ɔ́kɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto bakponkpo nti tsyaa , wántɔnɔ ko mǝ lǝ lesa nǝ báse uyi ku lesa nǝ béyifo ǝsuǝ .

Úsu Pilato ɔflɔ úsu ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ lǝ ofo Yesu eto ɔkɔ .
Úlǝkǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ nya úfi kafia flubia kǝtsyuǝ úmini wǝ kenke . Nya úfi wǝ úsu úbikǝ lǝ leba kafo eto kudi kutsyuǝ ko bembikǝtɔ kuutsyuǝ bǝnyǝ .
Diyi nǝmfó eyifo Fida wǝ bǝǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi lǝǝsiǝ kale .
Besio ba dítǝkǝko Yesu se betsyi Galilea , ǝtǝkǝko Yosef bésu kudi komǝ eti nya bésu bábe kase bébikǝ Yesu ǝmǝ .
Nya bésinkli bésu oto nya bǝkuǝ asa nnya laanyi fififi ku nnuǝbi bo beefi kediki bakɔ lǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtsyǝ . Nya bǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi fe kase mǝ afi nyamǝ léte .
Lǝ Kɔsida eto olensiǝntoo , besio bamǝ ésu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ bétsyi afa nnya bálɔ bǝtsyǝ bésuko kudi komǝ ɔflɔ .
Mfóo , bǝnyǝ bǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ ásini kute nya leba kplɛ nǝ béfi béti mfó ámina dite kutsyǝ .
Nyaso bédufǝ bésu kudi komǝ kafo , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ɔkɔ ǝmǝ .
Nyamfo ǝtǝ difufu ǝmuǝ mǝ . Nya ete basani inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ dílǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte mǝ . Nya bikǝ bia banlɛ nlɛ buyǝnde kaba mǝ ǝnǝmi .
Sikpi ǝmuǝ mǝ tinti nyaso báse esi kasɔ bǝtǝ basani bamǝ . Nya basani bamǝ lɛtɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bɛnlɛ utidi wǝ nkpe nkpǝ bɔbɛbɛ lǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ nti ?
Umbǝ mfo . Ótaka ! Bekloma lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi mi lefe nǝ ɔkɛ lǝ Galilea nkǝ ,
ele bǝ befi Utidi Eto Ubi bakpe lǝ betidi bua eto ani . Bɔɔsɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kamaa , wuusinkli otaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ . ”
Besio bamǝ ákloma wǝ etiki nyamǝ .
Nya se bésinkli bétsyi kebikǝkɔ mfó bǝbǝǝ , bésu bátɛyi bakasebi lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ku babamba kenke tsya asa nyamfo .
Besio bamǝ ni Maria Magdalene ku Yohana ku Maria wǝ ni Yakobo eto ambe . Mǝ ku besio bamba ni mba lɛtɛyi batɔnkpe bamfo asa nyamfo .
Fɛɛ batɔnkpe bamǝ efi asa nnya besio bamǝ díbǝ bátɛyi mǝ fe ebukitiki . Nyaso bámfo mǝ bánɔ .
Fɛɛ Petro alɛɛ , ótaka nya útsyetsyi úsu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ . Nya se úsu óbe kudi komǝ kafoo , únyǝ mfia bo bébikǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ wénsinyǝ kulesa mfó . Nyaso usinkli úsu se íyifo wǝ yanii lǝ kase asa nyamǝ díbǝ eso .
Nya lǝ diyi nǝmfo ke ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto mba ntǝkǝko wǝ eto inuǝ bǝtsyuǝ yɛ lǝ kusu bátɔ lǝ umǝ kɛkɛ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Emaus . Nya yuutsyǝ fe esunkpo kɛntsyɛ akuanse idu mfo isu Yerusalem .
Nya banyɛ mfó banlɛ etiki budi itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ díbǝ ǝsuǝ .
Se bányɛ bánlɛ etiki budi kedufǝ lǝ etiki nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu kosate ésu útu mǝ nya wǝ ku mǝ lɛyɛ bantɔ .
Bǝnyǝ wǝ , fɛɛ bǝntsyǝ wǝ lekpo .
Yesu átɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be ǝsuǝ bɛnyɛ lǝ kusu bɛnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko ? ” Bǝkǝnǝ bǝńyǝ . Nya mǝ ǝnǝmi nlɛ bote fe baminsǝtidi .
Nya mǝ ɔni wǝ baakpo Kleopa lɛtɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ fǝ mate hã ete ni ɔfɔ lǝ Yerusalem wǝ lenyi asa nnya nlɛ bubǝ lǝ eyi nnya kliminti mfo eto nti lee ? ”
Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be eto asa ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Asa nnya díbǝ lǝ Yesu Nasaretnyǝ ǝsuǝ . Utidi emfo ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ Onanto ku betidi ba tã dínyǝ bǝ okpe ǝsuǝale tinti lǝ wǝ asayifoyifo ku asa nnya ɔ́tɛyi kenke ǝsuǝ .
Nya bo besumunyǝ ninǝ ku bo baka dífi wǝ bákpe lǝ Romamfɔ eto uninǝ lǝ ani bǝ olo wǝ dikpǝnkpi nya básɔ wǝ bamanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ búfi ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ boǝ wǝ loofo Israel eto betidi kenke lǝ nkpǝ . Nya mmi ni diyi tsyǝfǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ se asa nyamfo díbǝ nɛ .
Bo nti eto besio bǝtsyuǝ ǝtǝ bo ketu étinkǝ . Itsyise bésu wǝ kudi komǝ ɔflɔ ku olesiǝtu ǝmfo .
Fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ ɔkɔ ǝmǝ . Nya bésinkli bǝbǝ bátɛyi bo bǝnkǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ báte mǝ . Nya bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ Yesu kpe nkpǝ .
Bo nti eto bǝtsyuǝ ésu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ mfó nya bǝnyǝ fe kase besio bamǝ lɛtɛyi pɛpɛɛpɛ , fɛɛ bǝnnyǝ wǝ kosate . ”
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bieninǝ ! Nya tsyaa , mi bofokanɔ lǝ asa nnya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi mi ǝsuǝ ǝmbǝ ale !
Binyi biǝnkǝ ele bǝ , Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ nyǝ kanyi kamfo eto okle fɛ lǝ udufǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ ? ”
Nya Yesu dílǝkǝ asa nyamfo kasɔ óte mǝ lǝ asa nnya báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ itsyi lǝ Moses eto Ǝkue ku asa nnya kenke Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Se íbu sɛkɛ lǝ bedufǝ umǝ kɛkɛ wǝ bántɔɔ , Yesu éyifo fe bofe ɔnlɛ kedu .
Fɛɛ báninko wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Kale ébolo kalo nyaso kɛ lǝ bo ɔflɔ mfo . ” Nyaso úsu ɔ́sɔnɔ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ nkǝ lǝ udi lesa ku mǝ . Nya úfi abolo nyamǝ nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani , nya úbudi nnya úfi útǝ mǝ .
Mfó nya mǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini nya bǝnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Fɛɛ ónya fĩĩ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi .
Bátɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Lefe nǝ ɔ́kɛ mfó úkedinko bo etiki nya úkǝlǝkǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki kasɔ kate bo lǝ kusuu , disuǝyuǝ ditsyuǝ eto okle akɛ bo lǝ lɛkɔɛsi ! ”
Bátaka lamfolamfo nya bésinkli bésu Yerusalem . Nya bésu bǝnyǝ lefosi ɔnwɛ bamǝ ku betidi bamba bákɔ bensi .
Nya bánlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ , “ Bonamute átaka útsyi ɔkɔmǝ sitinti , nya úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Simon . ”
Mfó nya betidi inuǝ bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ asa nnya díbǝ lǝ kusu ku kase bǝnyǝ Yesu bǝtsyǝ lekpo lefe nǝ úbudi abolo nyamǝ útǝ mǝ .
Se betidi inuǝ bamfo nlɛ mǝ etiki budii , mfó ǝmǝ Yesu kosate ǝbǝ úńyǝ lǝ mǝ nti . Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi . ”
Báyakla nya bébu bǝnkǝ ɔkɔ banlɛ bunyǝ .
Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beso bietinkǝ mǝ ! Beso biamfo kanɔ ?
Bebe mɔ ani ku mɔ akpa . Nya bitidi mɛ lǝ bete biǝ mɔ uni . Itsyise ɔkɔ ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku ekubi fe kase bɛnlɛ mɛ bunyǝ minte mmǝ . ”
Se ɔ́tɛyi nkoo , úfi wǝ ani ku akpa óte mǝ .
Lǝ kase banlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti nya asa nyamǝ díyifo mǝ yani esoo , bámfo bofo kanɔ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Didisa ditsyuǝ te mi mfo ? ”
Béfi lɛkpɛ sǝnsǝ báboko wǝ .
Nya ófo ni ɔ́yimi lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi mfó .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ tututu míntɛyi mi lefe nǝ minkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔ nɛ . Lesa saa nǝ báwɔni lǝ Moses eto afi eto kukue nye Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto asa nnya báwɔni lǝ Ǝsǝnkue itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ ibǝ itǝ nko . ”
