Mfó nya ɔ́sini mǝ nsusu itǝ lǝ banɔ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki nnya nkpe mfó kasɔ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bǝtsyǝ bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ mfo ebunyǝ kanyi nya wootaka utsyi bekpǝnkpǝ nti ubǝ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya wǝ bakasebi ebobe letsya lǝ wǝ diye ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke bǝ batsyi mǝ akɔɛsi bawuninsǝ itǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ . Nya letsyabebe nǝmfo ebutsyǝ kasɔ lǝ Yerusalem .
Mi luudi adansiɛ bilǝkǝ ditiki nǝmfo bete lǝ kalebe saa .
Nya mɔ kosate ebufi lesa nǝ mɔ Anto lɛtɛyi útsyǝ ntsyese mi . Fɛɛ ele bǝ bińyǝ bisǝkǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nyamfo lǝ Yerusalem isu ese lefe nǝ biofo nyamǝ itsyi kato . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ákpa mǝ nya bédu lǝ Yerusalem eto umǝ bésu Betania eti . Mfó óbesǝ ani kato nya ókpo mǝ atsyɔ .
Nya lefe nǝ tututu ɔnlɛ mǝ atsyɔ bokpo mfóo , údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ nya Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato .
Báse akonki bésumu wǝ nya bésinkli bésu Yerusalem ku disuǝyuǝ tinti .
Békesu Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ mlǝ mlǝ mlǝ késu késumu Onanto kasɔ wǝ ani .
Ditiki nǝmǝ akɛ fɛ béyifo kawunsiǝ . Ditiki nǝmǝ ku Onanto lɛkɛ . Nya Ni ku Onanto ni ɔni .
Ditiki nǝmǝ ku Onanto lɛkɛ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝǝ , nya Onanto díyifo lesa saa nɛ . Bényifo kulesa nǝ wǝ dímankɛ lenti .
Ditiki nǝmǝ ǝǝtǝ nkpǝ , nya nkpǝ bomǝ ɔflɔ betidi dínyǝ diyǝnde betsyiko .
Diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝǝyǝnde kakpo lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ ketuntu kamǝ mamfotɔ diyǝnde nǝmǝ bɔninsǝ .
Onanto átsyese utidi utsyuǝ . Wǝ diye ni Yohanes .
Úbǝ nkǝ woedi betidi etiki itsyiko lǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ lɛnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ lǝ ofo ɔnɔ .
Inni Yohanes kosate ni diyǝnde nǝmǝ . Bomu úbǝ nkǝ lǝ udi etiki itsyi lǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo ni lekpasǝ kosate nǝmǝ nɛ , lekpasǝ nǝ nlɛ kawunsiǝ bubǝ nǝ luuyǝnde ditǝ utsyuǝ saa lekpasǝ .
Ditiki nǝmǝ ákɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ , nya wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ , fɛɛ kawunsiǝ eto betidi mǝnnyǝ wǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo .
Úbǝ wǝ kosate eto betidi ɔflɔ , fɛɛ wǝ betidi mámfo wǝ .
Fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ ete léfo wǝ . Nya mba kenke léfo wǝ bánɔɔ , útǝ mǝ ǝsuǝale nnya dítǝ báfiani Onanto eto bebi .
Bámfiani Onanto eto bebi ɛyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ nye ɛyɛ lǝ usǝ ku usiǝ eto ubilele eto ketsyue ǝsuǝ . Bomu Onanto kosate lɛtɔnɔ nkǝ woafo mǝ lǝ bafiani wǝ bebi .
Ditiki nǝmǝ ǝbǝ léfiani utidinini wǝ dísiǝ lǝ bo nti , nya úyi ku Onanto eto lefonǝ ku sitinti kenke . Nya búnyǝ wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ nǝ eto okle ófo útsyiko wǝ anto ɔflɔ fe Onanto eto Ubi ɔni kplo eso .
Yohanes ǝlǝkǝ wǝ óte betidi lǝ lefe nǝ óbe letsya . Ófa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝmfo ni utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ míndi etiki mintsyiko minkǝ , ‘ Nwǝ ntǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝǝ , amɔ oso mɛ , itsyise okpe koko fɛ bále mɛ . ’ ”
Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ kplɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ókpo bomblɛ kenke atsyɔ kpǝ .
Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ bo kɔfi komǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Moses ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ wǝ lefonǝ ku sitinti siamǝ ǝbǝ bo ɔflɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnnyǝ tɔ Onanto unyǝ . Wǝ ubi ɔni kplo wǝ lekate ko Onanto wǝ nsi lǝ wǝ Anto ǝmǝ eto akɔɔ , wǝ ni díbǝ úlǝkǝ futsyǝ Onanto ni óte bo nɛ .
Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem ákpe besumunyǝ ku Lewifɔ bésu Yohanes ɔflɔ . Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ko feni ? ”
Mfóo , Yohanes mánni mbuayɛ butǝ bomu ókpasǝ mǝ nkǝ , “ Inni mɔ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ . ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ owoe feni ? Fǝ ni Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia ? ” Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni mɔ ni . ” Bésukosǝ bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , fǝ ni Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ wuubǝ ? ” Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owo lo . ”
Nyaso bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Tɛyi bo lesatsyuǝ nǝ busu bɔtɛyi mba lékpe bo kɔtɔ ! Owoe feni ? Nya be fanlɛ bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
Yohanes ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ fe kase Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya lɛwɔni utsyǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni utidi wǝ nlɛ bofa lǝ mfiminti kafe eto ɔkɔɛ katɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Bɛtsyɔnsǝ Bonamute eto kusu bitsyǝ itǝ wǝ bubǝ ! ’ ”
Nya betidikpekpe ba dítsyi Yudafɔ ba baakpo Farisifɔ ɔflɔ bǝbǝǝ ,
lɛtɔ Yohanes bǝ , “ Lenni fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , nye Elia , nye unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝǝ , ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ fanlɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa buyifo ? ”
Yohanes ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛɛ , meefi ntu keyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmfo . Fɛɛ utidi utsyuǝ ńyǝ mi lenti , wǝ binnyi .
Utǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔlɛ bubǝ nya wǝ afokpa eto kekue mǝnńyǝ ntǝ kulaa tsya bǝ nyankli . ”
Asa nyamfo ǝbǝ lǝ Betania eto umǝ lǝ Yordan eto ketu eto ditukpenkpe nǝ nse . Mfó Yohanes nlɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa buyifo kǝtǝ betidi nɛ .
Kǝsiǝsǝǝ , Yohanes ǝnyǝ Yesu nlɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mba ńyǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ Onanto eto Lesamubi nǝ ntsyi kawunsiǝ eto abua ɔntɔnko .
Wǝ ni utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ míntɛyi mintsyiko lefe nǝ míndi etiki míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Utidi utsyuǝ tǝkǝ mɛ kama ɔnlɛ bubǝ wǝ lɛmɔ onso mɛ , itsyise okpe kokooko fɛ bále mɛ . ’
Mɔ kosate tsya mánte utidi ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ wǝ bubǝ eso mímbǝ minlɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmfo buyifo bǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ wǝ nte Israel eto kusǝ eto betidi . ”
Mfó nya Yohanes disi ɔ́tɛyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ miǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ áyifǝ dítsyi kato dísiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ fe lɛblɛkpa seka .
Tutɛ mánte miǝ wǝ uni . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Onanto létsyese mɛ nkǝ mbǝ keyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Ebunyǝ se mɔ Lɛwɔnɔ lɔɔyifǝ ditsyi kato dibǝ disiǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , ete ebote fǝ wǝ ni utidi wǝ luufi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ukeyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ nɛ . ’
Nya mínyǝ se íbǝ nkomǝ lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ . Nya minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ wǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi kosate ǝmǝ nɛ . ”
Kǝsiǝsǝǝ , Yohanes ku wǝ bakasebi inuǝ si bǝńyǝ mfó ke ,
nya únyǝ Yesu díbǝ ɔnlɛ bofe . Nya se únyǝ wǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebee , nyǝ Onanto eto Lesamubi nǝmǝǝ ! ”
Bakasebi inuǝ bamfo ánɔ nnya Yohanes lɛtɛyi nya bédu bésu bǝtǝkǝko wǝ .
Se Yesu lɛtsyi ɔwuninsǝ únyǝ nkǝ bǝtǝkǝko wǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Be biabɛbɛ ? ” Bǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Rabi , ” eto kasɔ ni Oteasa , “ Lekpakpa , se fankpe ? ”
Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bibǝ bebe . ” Lefe nǝmfó ebutsyǝ fe ditsyitsyo eto abombo ana seka . Nyaso bǝtǝkǝko wǝ bésu kaka onkpe , nya bǝsiǝ wǝ lǝ ɔflɔ diyi fɛfɛ nǝmǝ .
Bakasebi inuǝ ba lɛnɔ Yohanes eto ditiki nǝmǝ fɛ bǝtǝtǝko Yesuu , eto ɔni ni Andrea wǝ ni Simon Petro eto ɔyimi .
Lesa tutɛ nǝ Andrea ǝmǝ díyifo ni bǝ úsu ɔ́bɛbɛ wǝ ɔyimi , ini Simon nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Búnyǝ Mesia ǝmǝ , ” eto kasɔ ni Kristo wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ .
Nya ókpa Simon úsuko Yesu ɔflɔ . Yesu ábe wǝ tũũ , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ni Simon , Yohanes eto ubi . Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , bookpo fǝ bǝ Kefas , ” nye Petro eto kasɔ ni kobansǝ .
Kǝsiǝsiǝǝ , Yesu ála nkǝ weesu kasɔ ka baakpo bǝ Galilea . Nya se ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ utsyuǝ wǝ baakpo Filipo nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝtǝkǝko mɛ . ”
Filipo etsyi Betsaida , umǝ wǝ Andrea ku Petro tsya ditsyi .
Se Filipo dísu únyǝ Nataniel , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Búunyǝ utidi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni asa betsyiko bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ ! Wǝ ni Yosef eto ubi Yesu wǝ ditsyi Nasaret ! ”
Nataniel átɔ nkǝ , “ Lesa sɛɛ ditsyuǝ ebofo bɔbɔ ketsyi Nasaret kǝbǝǝ ? ” Filipo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ abe ! ”
Se Yesu dínyǝ Nataniel lɛyɛ ɔnlɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nyǝ Israelnyǝ tinti nlɛ bubǝ mǝǝ , woanwɛ betidi . ”
Nataniel átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ féyifo fáte utidi wǝ eto okle mini ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Fɛ Filipo díbǝ ókpadi fǝ lǝ lefe nǝ fakɛ lǝ koto komǝ kalɔɔ , mbúnyǝ fǝ koko . ”
Nataniel átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , eyifo Onanto eto Ubi kosate . Fǝ ni Israelfɔ eto Oka ǝmǝ ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Eni nnya míntɛyi fǝ miǝ nnyǝ fǝ lǝ koto komǝ kalɔ eso fáfo fánɔɔ ? Ebunyǝ asa nnya nsi nso nyamfo . ”
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , biunyǝ se kato lɔɔsini nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe nlɛ kato bobe kesu kayifǝ kǝbǝ mɔ , Utidi eto Ubi , ɔflɔ . ”
Lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bákpa kusiǝ kutsyuǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ . Yesu eto ambe Maria ákɛ mfó .
Nya bákpadi Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi tsya báboko kusiǝ kakpakɔ kamǝ .
Se nte bo banlɛ bunǝ léloo , Yesu eto ambe ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nte bo banlɛ bunǝ álo . ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mbe , yanle bǝ tɛyi mɛ lesa nǝ ele bǝ nyifo . Mɔ lefe mányo tɔ . ”
Nya Yesu eto ambe lɛtɛyi besumubi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Biyifo lesa nǝ kee wɔɔtɛyi mi nkǝ biyifo . ”
Se ini lekpa ídi itǝ Yudafɔ bǝ bǝflǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , bǝtsyǝ ntu eto kalɔtsyi kplɛ ekua ka bǝlǝkǝ lǝ abansǝ ǝsuǝ mfó . Nya ketulɔtsyi ɛnɔ nye ekua leeyi ɔlɔtsyi kplɛ ɔni .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi besumubi bamǝ nkǝ békuti ntu béyisǝ kalɔtsyi kplɛ kamǝ . Nyaso békuti ntu béyisǝ kalɔtsyi kplɛ kamǝ klɛlɛlɛlɛ .
Mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bikuti ntu bomǝ eto ntsyuǝ bisuko utidi wǝ nsi lǝ ketsyue kamǝ eto kɛnyɛ . ” Nya békuti mu bésuko wǝ .
Se útu ntu bo léfiani nte óbee , wǝ ánte kaka nte bomǝ dítsyi . Fɛɛ besumubi ba díkuti ntu bomǝ bésuko alɛɛ , mǝmǝ áte . Nyaso nwǝ nsi lǝ ketsyue kamǝ eto kɛnyɛ ákpadi okafɔse ǝmǝ ,
nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa , nte sɛɛ woaka betidi butǝ bǝǝnǝ , nya lǝ betidi ǝnǝ bǝkpǝ eto kamaa , nya fɛ weefi mbo dimanlɛkɛ kǝtǝ betidi lǝǝnǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ fǝ ébu nsɛɛ ǝtsyǝ kama ! ”
Nnya díbǝ lǝ Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ mfóo , ni ayanisa tutɛ nnya úyifo . Úyifo nyamfo úlǝkǝ wǝ diyǝnde óte , nya wǝ bakasebi léfo wǝ bánɔ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ ambe , ku wǝ bayimi , ku wǝ bakasebi édu bésu Kapernaum nya bǝsiǝ mfó eyi asiani .
Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto didife eboyo elo , nyaso Yesu ésu Yerusalem .
Se údufǝ Onanto eto Disumuyoo , únyǝ se betidi nlɛ banantsyui ku basamu ku ablonuma bote ku mba laafloma atabi tsya nsi lǝ mǝ kapunu eto akɔ .
Nyaso ófio ukuǝ nya úfi wǝ óla basamu ku banantsyui kenke ɔ́bɔsǝ lǝ Disumuyo mfó . Úsensǝ mba nlɛ atabi boba eto atabi úwui nya úkǝ mǝ kapunu ókpo lǝ kasɔ .
Ɔ́tɛyi mba nlɛ ablonuma bote nkǝ , “ Bitsyi asa nyamfo bɛbɔnko lǝ mfo , nya biemfi mɔ Anto eto diyo biyifo bikǝkatekɔ . ”
Nya wǝ bakasebi lékloma nnya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto , mɔ lelabi itǝ fǝ Disumuyoo , ǝtǝ ǝnǝmi asɛ mɛ lǝ ni ǝsuǝ . ”
Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ǝbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se féyifo asa nyamfo mǝǝ , nte ayanisa nnya fuuyifo ate bo bǝ akpe kusu feeyifo nnya okle ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Beba Onanto eto Disumuyo kamfo , nya mootakasǝ ke ńyǝnsǝ lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝ ! ”
Yudafɔ bamǝ átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Disumuyo ka befi alɛfosi ana alɛ akua bátoo , bɔtɛyi fanlɛ fǝ ebusinkli atakasǝ ke ǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
Fɛɛ bánte bǝ wǝ sinǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko fe Onanto eto Disumuyo .
Nyaso lefe nǝ Onanto létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , nya fɛ wǝ bakasebi lékloma bǝ ɔ́tɛyi nko utsyǝ . Nyaso báfo asa nnya báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ku nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi bánɔ .
Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛkɛ lǝ Yerusalem lǝ Ukpe Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyididi lefee , betidi kpǝ áfo wǝ bánɔ lǝ ayanisa kpǝ nnya bǝnyǝ úyifo eso .
Fɛɛ Yesu mémfi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ mǝ , itsyise uyi betidi kenke .
Yensife bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa si ɔtɛyi wǝ kulesa itsyi lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ itsyise wǝ kosate áte lesa nǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ .
Lefe nǝmfóo , Yudafɔ eto uninǝ ɔni wǝ baakpo bǝ Nikodemo akɛ lǝ mǝ ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Farisifɔ nti .
Kǝtsyǝ kanii , úbǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , buyi boǝ fǝ ni nwǝ ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ fǝbǝ , itsyise kutsyuǝ saa embofo ayanisa nnya feeyifo buyifo lenni Onanto nsi ko wǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ , lǝ bensinkli utidi balee , wǝmbunyǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ . ”
Nikodemo átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ boofo utidi wǝ díkabe businkli kale bio ? Businkli ele bǝ usinkli udufǝ lǝ wǝ ambe eto kafo fɛ lǝ besinkli bale wǝ dinuǝfǝ lee ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ bánle utidi betsyiko lǝ ntu ku Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , weembofo budufǝ lǝ Onanto eto Sekadidi siamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Utidininii , bále wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ etidisuǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nnya ditsyi lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝǝ , bále wǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso mǝntǝ lǝ iyifo fǝ naa lǝ ntɛyi fǝ miǝ ele bǝ bale fǝ bio .
Ufiebi aasɔ kesu kakake ola , nya wǝ kɔsɔ hã faanɔ , fɛɛ inni lǝ kaka utsyi ku kaka ɔntɔ . Nko inte itǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ bále ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
Mfó nya Nikodemo lɛtɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ nyamfo loofo bubǝ kǝtǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Oteasa kplɛ feni lǝ Israel , ntsyǝ ibǝ fámannɔ nyamfo kasɔ ?
Nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ asa nnya bunyii , nnya ǝsuǝ boedi etiki ketsyiko nɛ . Nya lesa nǝ ke búkenyǝǝ , ni ǝsuǝ boedi adansiǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ biamfo bo etiki nyamǝ kanɔ .
Lǝ ndi fǝ etiki itsyi lǝ kasɔ mfo eto asa ǝsuǝ nya fámamfo mɛ ánɔɔ , ntsyǝ foofo mɛ bofo kanɔ lǝ ndi fǝ etiki itsyi lǝ kato eto asa ǝsuǝ ?
Nya kuutsyuǝ saa ménsu tɔ kato unyǝ enso mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi wǝ ditsyi kato úbǝ kawunsiǝ mfo .
“ Fe kase Moses lébesǝ owa wǝ béfi situ béyifo kato lǝ uyi ǝsuǝ lǝ mfimintii , nko ke ele bǝ babesǝ mɔ , Utidi Eto Ubi kato nɛ ,
bǝ utidi wǝ ke léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
“ Itsyise Onanto ála kawunsiǝ kamfo kon bǝnkǝ úfi wǝ Ubi ɔni kplo útǝ nkǝ utsyuǝ saa ke laafo wǝ kanɔɔ , lǝ ɔyɛ bukpǝ kanya , bomu lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Itsyise Onanto mántsyese wǝ Ubi kawunsiǝ nkǝ lǝ ubǝ olo ke dikpi , bomu bǝ lǝ uyifo ke Ofomfokǝtǝ .
“ Utidi wǝ ke laafo wǝ Ubi kanɔɔ , bembolo wǝ dikpi . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laamfo wǝ kanɔɔ , bóolo wǝ dikpi koko itsyise wóamfo Onanto eto Ubi ɔni kplo ǝmǝ ɔnɔ eso .
Kase baayɛ kaalo dikpi nǝmǝ ni bǝnkǝ , diyǝnde nǝmǝ ǝbǝ kawunsiǝ , fɛɛ betidi aala ketuntu kaso diyǝnde nǝmǝ , itsyise baala asa buayifoyifo kaso .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leeyifo asa buaa , weekisi diyǝnde , nya woannyi kafi ni . Itsyise woate sikpi nkǝ lǝ ɔnyi ɔfi diyǝndee , yuulǝkǝ wǝ asa bua nnya weeyifo ote bǝnyǝ .
Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , aanyi kafi diyǝnde , itsyise woala nkǝ diyǝnde nǝmǝ lǝkǝ lete nkǝ kase unsi nkpǝ yɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi édu bésu Yudea eto lekpake mfó . Bǝsiǝ mfó itǝ lefe ditsyuǝ , nya úkeyifo betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa .
Lefe nǝmǝǝ , Yohanes tsya ákɛ lǝ Ainon lǝ Salim ɔflɔ kǝflǝsǝ betidi ntu , itsyise ntu abɔ lǝ mfó nya betidi ékesu wǝ ɔflɔ nya úkǝflǝsǝ mǝ ntu .
Lefe nǝmfóo , bǝmmuǝ tɔ Yohanes beti bakpe lǝ aba eto diyo .
Diyi lɔnii , etikinǝnǝ ǝtsyuǝ édufǝ lǝ Yohanes eto bakasebi ku Yudanyǝ utsyuǝ eto nti itsyi lǝ ǝsuǝflǝflǝ eto lekpa ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bǝbǝ Yohanes ɔflɔ bátɛyi wǝ bǝ , “ Oteasa , akloma utidi utsyuǝ wǝ fǝ ku wǝ díńyǝ lǝ Ketu Yordan eto ditukpenkpe nǝ nse , ini wǝ ǝsuǝ fédi adansiɛ fetsyiko ? Wǝ ni nwǝ mfe nlɛ betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa buyifo nɛ , nya betidi ba kenke nlɛ budu kesu wǝ ɔflɔ . ”
Yohanes átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo kulesa bɔkɛ , lenni Onanto dífi ni útǝ wǝ .
Mi kosate ni mɔ badansiɛ bǝ ntɛyi mi nkpasǝ wuee miǝ inni mɔ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto létsyese mɛ nkǝ ntɔ wǝ sɛtɔ .
Nwǝ ni Okafɔsee , wǝ ni nwǝ mbǝ Okafɔ ǝmǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ nwǝ ni Okafɔse ǝmǝ eto okloboo , lǝ unyǝ ɔlɛ Okafɔse ǝmǝ eto ɔkɔɛ bɔɔnɔ , yeakpe wǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti . Nko ǝmǝ eso mintsya nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ tinti fe okafɔse ǝmǝ eto oklobo nɛ .
Nya nko ele bǝ wǝ diye be kato lǝ mɔ lele lǝ dibǝ kasɔ nɛ .
“ Nwǝ ditsyi kato ubǝǝ , so utsyuǝ saa . Nya nwǝ ditsyi kasɔ mfo tsyaa , kasɔ mfo eto utidi ete uni . Nya kasɔ mfo eto asa eto etiki ete weedi . Fɛɛ nwǝ ditsyi kato úbǝǝ , tǝkǝ mǝmblɛ kato .
Waatɛyi lesa nǝ úkǝnyǝ ku nnya úkanɔ mfó . Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa aamfo wǝ sedansiɛdidi siamǝ .
Fɛɛ nwǝ ke léfo wǝ kɛnyɛ kamǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , lɛ uyi bose kǝtǝ nkǝ Onanto eyifo utintinyǝ .
Nwǝ Onanto létsyesee , eedi Onanto eto etiki , itsyise Onanto éfi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ úyisǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke .
Anto ǝmǝ aala wǝ Ubi ǝmǝ nya úfi lesa saa ókpe wǝ lǝ ani nɛ .
“ Nwǝ léfo Ubi ǝmǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , kpe nkpǝ manlo . Nya nwǝ laani weentsyue Ubi ǝmǝ kotoo , weembunyǝ nkpǝ manlo bomǝ . Bomu Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ manlo ebutǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Farisifɔ ánɔ bǝ Yesu lɛ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ buyifo kǝtǝ betidi , nyaso betidi kpǝ tǝkǝko wǝ baso Yohanes .
Lǝ sitintii , Yesu kosate ményifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa útǝ kuutsyuǝ saa , bomu wǝ bakasebi hã díkeyifo nko .
Se Yesu léte nkǝ Farisifɔ ánɔ ditiki nǝmfo nkoo , údu lǝ Yudea eto kasɔ úsu Galilea eto kasɔ .
Nya lǝ kusu ko ɔnyɛ ɔntɔɔ , ele bǝ ɔyɛ Samaria eto kasɔ ofe .
Yesu ésu óyo Samaria eto umǝ wǝ baakpo Sikar , wǝ lɛfi kasɔ ka mǝ ona Yakob dítǝ wǝ ubi Yosef .
Lɛtidibo ditsyuǝ nǝ Yakob díku akɛ mfó . Nya se ílǝ Yesu fɛ úsu óyo mfó lǝ nkɔminti lefe itsyi lǝ kusu komǝ eto bɔyɛ esoo , úkǝnǝ úsiǝ lǝ lɛtidibo nǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya ete Samariasio utsyuǝ díbǝ ntu kekutikɔ . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tǝ mɛ ntu lǝ nnǝ . ”
Lǝ lefe nǝ mfó ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu eto bakasebi ébudu bésu umǝ didisa kayakɔ .
Usio ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , “ Beso fǝ Yudanyǝ laatɔ mɔ Samariasio fǝ ntǝ fǝ ntu lǝ ǝnǝ ? ” Usio ǝmǝ átɔ nko itsyise Yudafɔ ku Samariafɔ anka .
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nnya ete fenyi lesa nǝ Onanto lǝǝtǝ ku nwǝ nlɛ fǝ bɔtɔ nkǝ tǝ wǝ ntu lǝ unǝǝ , eni fǝ bomu ebɔtɔ wǝ fǝ utǝ fǝ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ . ”
Usio ǝmǝ átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , ǝmbǝ lesa nǝ beefi kekuti ntu , nya lɛtidibo nǝmǝ tsya atsyo . Sie fuunyǝ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ bomǝ etsyiko ?
Lee fǝ nso bo Ona Yakob wǝ díku lɛtidibo nǝmfo útǝ bo , kaka wǝ ku wǝ bebi ku wǝ bebuki kenke dínǝ ntu betsyiko ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ betidi ǝnǝ ntu bomfoo , utukuɛ si wɔɔlɛ mǝ .
Fɛɛ ntu bo mɔ luutǝǝ , utukuɛ ensi ǝmbɔlɛ nwǝ luunǝ mu . Ntu bo mɔ luutǝ wǝ ebofiani nkpǝ eto ntu eto kayifǝkɔ lǝ wǝ . Ntu bomfo ebukabɔdi lǝ wǝ nya buutǝ wǝ nkpǝ manlo . ”
Usio ǝmfo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Boanto , tǝ mɛ ntu bomfo bǝ lǝ utukuɛ lǝ ɔyɛ mɛ bɔlɛ bio , nya lǝ nyɛ mfo bubǝ kekuti ntu . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su akpadi fǝ usǝ lǝ bibǝ . ”
Usio ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Minsi kusǝ . ” Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Átɛyi sitinti fǝ ensi kusǝ .
Ébusiǝko basani ɛnɔ áfe . Nya nwǝ fǝ ku wǝ nkpe mɔmɔ kulaa tsya enni fǝ usǝ . Sitinti fátɛyi . ”
Usio emǝ átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nnyǝ miǝ eyifo Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi .
Bo Samariafɔɔ , bo banamǝ ésumu Onanto lǝ kɔtini komfo ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mi Yudafɔ aatɛyi biǝnkǝ Yerusalem ni kaka ele bǝ busumu Onanto . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Usionko , fo mɛ anɔ fǝ lefe ditsyuǝ lǝ bubǝ nǝ betidi lensiembusumu Onanto lǝ kɔtini komfo ǝsuǝ nye lǝ Yerusalem .
Mi Samariafɔɔ , binyi lesa nǝ biesumu . Fɛɛ bo Yudafɔɔ , buyi futsyǝ boesumu . Itsyise Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ nnya bofokǝtǝ laayɛ kǝbǝ .
Fɛɛ lefe lɛ bubǝ nya díkǝbǝ tsya koko , se betidi luusumu Anto ǝmǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ku lǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ku lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ . Itsyise mǝ ni besumunyǝ ba eto okle Onanto laala nkǝ besumu wǝ nɛ .
Se Onanto ni Lɛwɔnɔ esoo , betidi ba luusumu wǝǝ , ele bǝ bayɛ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝale ku lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ . ”
Usio ǝmǝ átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyi miǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , wǝ baakpo Kristoo , ebubǝ . Nya lǝ ubǝǝ , wuulǝkǝ lesa saa kasɔ ote bo . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ nwǝ nlɛ etiki budi ku fǝ mfoo , mɔ ni wǝ nɛ . ”
Lefe nǝmfóo , wǝ bakasebi bamǝ ǝbǝ bédufǝ nya íyifo mǝ naa se bǝnyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ku usio . Fɛɛ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mántɔ usio ǝmǝ bǝ be woabɛbɛ nye bátɔ wǝ bǝ beso ɔnlɛ etiki budi ku usio ǝmǝ .
Usio ǝmǝ áyani wǝ ɔlɔtsyi ǝmǝ útsyǝ lǝ lɛtidibo nǝmǝ ɔflɔ nya údu úsu umǝ úsu ɔ́tɛyi betidi nkǝ ,
“ Bibǝ bebe osani utsyuǝ wǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ lesa saa nǝ mínkeyifo mínyǝ lǝ mɔ nkpǝ ! Lee wǝ ni Onanto eto nwǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ ? ”
Nyaso betidi bamǝ ábɔ bétsyi umǝ ǝmǝ bésu bǝ beesu bǝnyǝ wǝ .
Lefe nǝmfóo , bakasebi bamǝ álɛ Yesu lekpakpa bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , bedi lesa ! ”
Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nkpe lesa nǝ muudi nǝ ǝsuǝ binyi kulesa saa bitsyiko . ”
Nyaso bakasebi bamǝ étsyiko mǝ ǝsuǝ bɔtɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Lee utsyuǝ áboko wǝ lesa údi ? ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ didisa ni bǝ nyifo nwǝ lékpe mɛ eto lelabi , nya lǝ nlosǝ keyifo ka útǝ mɛ nkǝ nyifo .
Biatɛyi biǝnkǝ , ‘ Afa ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ kama fɛ lesa loobe oto . ’ Fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ bɛlɛ ola bebe kakuɛ eto ditsyǝbi lǝ bebe kase bidikǝ biamǝ díkabe ! Bíoyo nnya bulǝkǝ .
Onanto aafo kayo nwǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ bidikǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ nya waakpa mi kakpo lǝ unwu itǝ nkpǝ manlo . Lǝ nyamfo eso nwǝ laato ku nwǝ lǝǝlǝkǝǝ , mǝmblɛ ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
Nyaso nnya baatɛyi bǝ utidi ɔni laato nya obamba lǝǝlǝkǝ , eyifo sitinti .
Mɔ létsyese mi miǝ bisu bilǝkǝ bidikǝ lǝ ɔkuɛ wǝ inni mi léto bikǝ biamǝ . Betidi bamba díyifo keyifo kekleke lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ lǝ mfó , nya mi dínyǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ keyifo ka mǝ díyifo ǝsuǝ . ”
Samariafɔ kpǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ áfo Yesu bánɔ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya usio ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ɔ́tɛyi mɛ lesa saa nǝ mínkeyifo lǝ mɔ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ mínyǝ , ” eso .
Nyaso se Samariafɔ bamǝ díbǝ bǝnyǝ Yesu lǝ lɛtidibo nǝmǝ ɔflɔɔ , bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ usiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ nya Yesu dísiǝ mfó eyi ǝnuǝ .
Betidi bamba kpǝ esi báfo wǝ bánɔ lǝ wǝ ditiki nǝ údi mǝ eso .
Nya bátɛyi usio ǝmǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bófo bɔ́nɔ mɔmɔ inni lǝ nnya fátɛyi bo eso , bomu bo kosate ánɔ etiki nnya údi eso , nya buyi boǝ wǝ ni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto Ofomfokǝtǝ tinti ǝmǝ . ”
Lǝ eyi ǝnuǝ eto kamaa , Yesu édu mfó úsu Galilea eto kasɔ .
Itsyise wǝ kosate ǝlǝkǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Dibu ankɛ kǝtǝ Onanto Eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi lǝ wǝ kosate eto kasɔ . ”
Fɛɛ se Yesu dísu údufǝ Galilea , betidi bamǝ áfo wǝ atuu ku disuǝyuǝ , itsyise se bésu Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyisɛɛ kedikɔ lǝ Yerusalem , bǝnyǝ asa nnya kenke úyifo .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , Yesu ésinkli úsu Kana lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ , kaka úkatsyi ntu ɔ́wuninsǝ bófiani nte . Lefe nǝmfóo , Aba eto unyɛsiǝ ninǝ utsyuǝ wǝ dítsyi Kapernaum eto ubi ánɔ bufi .
Se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Yesu etsyi Yudea úbǝ Galilea , úsu wǝ ɔflɔ nya ɔ́lɛ wǝ lekpakpa nkǝ úsu Kapernaum lǝ usu otsya wǝ ubisaibi utǝ wǝ , itsyise wǝ ubi ǝmǝ fe woala lǝ ukpǝ .
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ biǝnnyǝ nyifo ayanisa ntee , biamfo mɛ kanɔ . ”
Uninǝ ǝmfo álɛ wǝ lekpakpa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ abe mɔ ubi ǝmǝ bǝ lǝ ɔyɛ bukpǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su ! Fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ebɔkɛ nkpǝ . ” Uninǝ ǝmǝ áfo etiki nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ ɔ́nɔ nya úsinkli údu .
Se úsinkli ɔntɔɔ , wǝ diyo eto beyifoyifo betsyuǝ átsyako wǝ lǝ kusu nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ kpe nkpǝ .
Ɔ́tɔ mǝ lefe nǝ tutuutu íyuǝ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ . Nya bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Kǝnǝ ku kakɔmi lefe , fe lebombo lɛwɛ eti nnya bɔyila bomǝ léyani wǝ nɛ . ”
Ubi anto ǝmǝ ákloma nkǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ tutuutu Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ubi ǝmǝ ebɔkɛ nkpǝ . ” Nya uninǝ ǝmfo ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke léfo Yesu bánɔ .
Nyamfo díyifo ayanisa nuǝfǝ nnya Yesu díyifo lǝ Galilea se utsyi Yudea eto kasɔ úsu mfó nɛ .
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ésu Yerusalem se Yudafɔ eto diyisɛɛ ditsyuǝ didife léyo .
Lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kaka baakpo Basamu eto Kesie ɔflɔɔ , ditumbu ditsyuǝ kpe mfó nǝ baakpo bǝ Betesda lǝ Hebrifɔ eto sele ǝsuǝ . Bákpo mpatampa ɛnɔ beńyǝnsǝ lǝ ditumbu nǝmǝ ɔflɔ .
Mfó befimfi kpǝ ateate ba ni bǝnǝmba , mba lɛtsyini , ku mba leba bankpoo kasɔ díbǝ kakpo . Nya bǝńyǝ bensekǝ ntu bomǝ eto butinkǝsǝ butsyuǝ .
( Itsyise afe ǝtsyuǝǝ , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ kǝbǝ kémunisǝ ntu bomǝ . Nya ufimfi tutɛ wǝ ke dídufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝnyǝ bufitsyantsya . )
Osani utsyuǝ kálabǝ mfó wǝ díkǝfi alɛ fosi ǝtsyǝ alɛ mflamfla sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
Se Yesu dínyǝ wǝ nya unyi nkǝ onlabe lǝ ufinkla ǝsuǝ mfó itǝ alɛ kpǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Ala bǝ , fǝ bufi yɛ fǝ ? ”
Ufimfi ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Uninǝ , mimbǝ kuutsyuǝ wǝ lɔɔwunsǝko mɛ ndufǝ ntu bomǝ kafo lǝ bémunisǝ mu . Lǝ nkplatsya miǝ meedufǝ tsyaa , utidi bamba éboka mɛ budufǝ koko . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka ǝńyǝ , fi fǝ okla lǝ ayɛ edu ! ”
Lamfolamfo , osani ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝ ǝmuǝ wǝ ale ! Úfi wǝ okla nya ɔ́yɛ údu . Diyi nǝ nyamfo díbǝǝ , eyifo Yudafɔ eto Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
Nyaso Yudafɔ eto beninǝ átɛyi osani wǝ Yesu létsya bufi bǝnkǝ , “ Mmi eyifo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi . Kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ lǝ etsyi fǝ okla . ”
Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nwǝ létsya mɛ bufi ke lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Taka ǝńyǝ , fi fǝ okla lǝ ayɛ edu ! ’ ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Owoe ni utsyǝ lɛtɛyi fǝ nkǝ , ‘ Tsyi fǝ okla lǝ ayɛ ’ ? ”
Fɛɛ nwǝ bátsya bufi bomǝ mánte nkǝ utsyǝ ǝmǝ ni Yesu . Nya Yesu tsya ébonya údufǝ lǝ betidi kpǝ ba díńyǝ mfó eto nti .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ǝnyǝ wǝ lǝ Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Ǝsuǝ búmuǝ fǝ ale . Nyaso mensiyifo lebua bio ! Lenni nkoo , lesa nǝ nkpe ale enso mmǝ ebuyifo fǝ ! ”
Nya osani ǝmǝ dídu nya úsu ɔ́tɛyi Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ nkǝ Yesu ni utidi wǝ létsya wǝ bufi .
Nyaso bétsyiko Yesu bulǝ , itsyise ótsya utidi bufi lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Anto si ɔlɛ keyifo buyifo lefe saa , nyaso ele bǝ mintsya yifo nko . ”
Lǝ nnya ɔ́tɛyi mfo esoo , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ esi bábɛbɛ esu kekleke bǝ baalo wǝ . Itsyise inni Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ eto kɔfi ete óta úbu , bomu usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ Onanto eyifo wǝ Anto . Nya nyamfo eto kasɔ ni bǝ wǝ ku Onanto akate .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , Onanto eto Ubi embofo kulesa buyifo lǝ wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ wǝǝnyǝ wǝ Anto leeyifoo , ni wintsya leeyifo nɛ .
Itsyise Anto ǝmǝ aala wǝ Ubi ǝmǝ nya woate wǝ lesa saa nǝ wǝ kosate nlɛ buyifo . Nya woote wǝ asa kplɛ kpǝ enso nyamfo nnya luuyifo mimblɛ yanii .
Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ laatakasǝ bǝkpenkpe ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ kaboko nkpǝǝ , nko ke Ubi ǝmǝ tsya luutǝ nkpǝ mba úlǝkǝ nɛ .
Nya Anto ǝmǝ kosate tsya ankponko kuutsyuǝ lekpo , bomu útǝ wǝ Ubi kusu nkǝ okponko betidi kenke lekpo ,
bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ufi dibu utǝ Ubi ǝmǝ fe kase bǝǝtǝ Anto ǝmǝ dibu . Futsyǝ kee dímembu Ubi ǝmǝǝ , mémbu Anto ǝmǝ létsyesǝ wǝ tsya .
“ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ laanɔ mɔ ditiki nya ófo nwǝ létsyese mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , wuunyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Bembokponko wǝ lekpo , fɛɛ ɔ́yɛ lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ ófe údufǝ lǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ koko .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , lefe lɛ bubǝ nǝ bekpǝnkpǝ luutsyue Onanto eto Ubi koto , nya mba leetsyue we ɔkɔɛ koto ebunyǝ nkpǝ tinti . Lefe nǝmǝ kulaatsya ébubǝ koko .
Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ ni nkpǝ eto ketsyikokɔ , nko ke útǝ nkǝ wǝ Ubi tsya yifo nkpǝ eto ketsyikokɔ nɛ .
Nya útǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ okponko kawunsiǝ kenke lekpo , itsyise wǝ ni Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ .
“ Biǝntǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ iyifo mi yanii , itsyise lefe lɛ bubǝ nǝ bekpǝnkpǝ ba nkpe lǝ edi lɔɔnɔ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ eto ɔkɔɛ .
Nya bɔɔbɔ lǝ edi bǝbǝ . Mba dísiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ ebotaka bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Nya mba dísiǝ nkpǝ bua , tsya ebotaka bafo dikpilolo .
“ Mǝmbofo kulesa buyifo lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Lesa nǝ Onanto laatɛyi mɛɛ , nnya meefi kakpo lekpo nɛ . Nyaso mɔ lekpokponkpo yɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , itsyise meenyifo kulesa lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ nwǝ létsyese mǝ eto lelabi ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ nlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ mɔ kosate ǝsuǝǝ , yanle bǝ bafo lesa nǝ míntɛyi ǝmbǝ kalende .
Fɛɛ utidi bamba kpe wǝ leedi adansiɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ , nya nyi miǝ adansiɛ nnya ɔnlɛ budi lǝ mɛɛ , kpe kalende .
“ Bíokpe batɔnkpe Yohanes ɔflɔ nya úkatɛyi mi sitinti siamǝ itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ mɔɔ , minlɛ bɔtɛyi miǝ utidinini eto sedansiɛdidi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ afe itǝ mɛ . Bomu ńtɛyi nyamfo bǝ lǝ binyǝ bofokǝtǝ .
Yohanes ǝtsyǝ fe okandiɛ wǝ nlɛ bunyǝ nya ɔnlɛ lekpasǝ butǝ , nya béla biǝ biǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ lekpasǝ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe sɛkɛ ete .
“ Fɛ mɔɔ , sedansiɛ sia lɛflɔ senso Yohanes eto selee , se nkpe mɛ nɛ . Itsyise keyifo ka mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ nkǝ nyifo nlose , ka minlɛ buyifoo , ke nlɛ adansiɛ budi lǝ mɛɛ nɛ . Ke nlɛ bote bǝ mɔ Anto ǝmǝ létsyese mɛ .
Nya Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ tsyaa , wǝ kosate leedi adansiǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Bíannɔ tɔ wǝ ɔkɔɛ bɛnɔ , nya bíǝnyǝ tɔ kase unte bínyǝ .
Fɛɛ biamfo wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ kakpe lǝ mi akɔɛsi itsyise biamfo utidi wǝ ótsyese bɛnɔ .
Biakase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto asa itsyise bibu biǝ biunyǝ nkpǝ manlo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Nya ko etiki nyamfoo , lɛ etiki budi ketsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ !
Fɛɛ bɛni biǝ biembubǝ mɛ ɔflɔ lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ .
“ Minlɛ kasɔ mfo eto betidi eto atɛsǝ bɔbɛbɛ ,
itsyise nyi betidi ba eto okle bini , nya nyi miǝ bianla Onanto lǝ mi akɔɛsi .
Mbǝ lǝ mɔ Anto eto diye ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ biamfo mɛ . Nya lǝ utidi bamba ebubǝ lǝ wǝ kosate eto diye ǝsuǝ alɛɛ , biofo wǝ .
Ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ biofo mɛ bɛnɔ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bɛnlɛ atɛsǝ bɔbɛbɛ ketsyiko mi bǝtsyuǝ ɔflɔ , nya biambɛbɛ atɛsǝ nnya ditsyi Onanto ɔni kplo ǝmǝ ɔflɔ ?
“ Fɛɛ biembu biǝ mɔ ni nwǝ loolo mi dikpi lǝ mɔ Anto ɔflɔ . Bomu Moses , nwǝ ǝsuǝ bífi mi kusubebe bítǝkǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ loolo mi dikpi nɛ .
Lǝ nnya ete béfo Moses bɛnɔ sitintii , eni béfo mɛ bɛnɔ , itsyise ɔ́wɔni asa utsyǝ itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ se bíamfo lesa nǝ ɔ́wɔni utsyǝ bɛnɔɔ , ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ biofo lesa nǝ maatɛyi bɛnɔ ? ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu áyila Galilea eto Ditumbukplɛ nǝ bensi baakpo bǝ Tiberia eto Ditumbukplɛ úsu ni lekpake nǝ nse .
Nya betidi kpǝ dítǝkǝko wǝ , itsyise bǝnyǝ ayanisa nnya úyifo ótsya mba nlɛ bufi eso .
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi ábe bésu bǝsiǝ lǝ lekpenkpe ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝ Yudafɔ leedi Ukpe Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi éboyo elo .
Se Yesu létakasǝ ǝnǝmi únyǝ sitiditu kplɛ sia nlɛ wǝ ɔflɔ bubǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ Filipo nkǝ , “ Sieti buunyǝ didisa boya butǝ betidi bamfo kenke lǝ bedi ? ”
Fɛɛ Yesu átɔ nyamfo nkǝ lǝ ufi oto Filipo obe , ite bǝ uyi lesa nǝ wǝ kosate lǝǝbǝ buyifo tsya fɛ .
Filipo ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bufi betidi alofa ǝnuǝ eto diyi eto kayofofo eto atabi boya didisa kulaa tsyaa , diemboyo bǝ betidi bamfo eto utsyuǝ saa nyǝ sɛkɛ udi ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu eto okasebi wǝ ni Simon Petro , eto ɔyimi wǝ baakpo Andrea , lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ ,
“ Okosobi utsyuǝ si mfo wǝ ntsyi abolo anɔ ku akpɛ ǝnuǝ . Fɛɛ bǝ ni nyamfo itǝ betidi ba kpenkpe mfo ? ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ kaka lékpa wuee . ” Nyaso betidi bamǝ kenke ǝsiǝ lǝ kasɔ . Basani mate eyifo fe akpi anɔ .
Nya Yesu dífi abolo nyamǝ , nya ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani nya úsie nnya útǝ betidi bamǝ nsi mfó . Nko ke úyifo ku akpɛ nyamǝ tsya nɛ , nya mǝ utsyuǝ saa lɛkɛ kase óla .
Se bédi bémii , Yesu átɛyi wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛsɛ nnya díbu , bǝ lǝ ku ni ditsyuǝ saa lǝ lɛyɛ bobia . ”
Nyaso básɛ nnya díbu bakɔ . Nya nnya díbu lǝ abolo anɔ nnya bédi ǝsuǝǝ , éyi lefosi etsyitsya ǝnuǝ .
Se betidi bamǝ dínyǝ ayanisa nnya Yesu díyifoo , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sitinti nwǝ mfo ni Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi wǝ luubǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ ! ”
Nya , Yesu áte nkǝ bǝǝbǝ wǝ bubǝ kǝmuǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ kǝtsyǝ seka . Itǝ eso úlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ nti úsu ɔkɛ lǝ akpenkpe nnya nkpe mfó nti wǝ mate .
Se ditsyitsyo lefe léyoo , Yesu eto bakasebi áyifǝ bésu ditumbukplɛ nemǝ kɛnyɛ .
Bédufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ nya bétsyiko ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyila kesu Kapernaum eti . Kale ébolo , tsya fɛɛ Yesu mǝmbǝ óyotɔ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto ntu étsyiko bonwa ketu flɛmflɛmflɛ , itsyise ufiebi étsyiko bɔsɔ kekleke .
Bakasebi bamǝ ébonwa ɔklɔ ǝmǝ báyɛ fe esunkpo ǝtsyǝ nye ana ku kama fɛ bǝnyǝ se Yesu nyɛ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ bubǝ . Se bǝnyǝ wǝǝ , sikpi ko dímuǝ mǝ !
Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi , mǝ nkǝ , “ Biante sikpi ! Mɔ uni . ”
Mfó fɛ ǝsuǝ diyuǝ mǝ nɛ ! Nya bǝtǝ údufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ nya ete bédufǝ kaka bántɔ tsya nɛ .
Se kale dísiǝǝ , betidi ba díbu bǝńyǝ lǝ ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ eto situma sia nsee , ǝnyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo bǝ diyi nǝ léfee , ɔklɔ ɔni hã díńyǝ lǝ utuflɔ mfó . Báte bǝ Yesu méndufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ku wǝ bakasebi fɛ bétsyiko ditumbukplɛ nǝmǝ bɔyila . Bakasebi bamǝ mate ete dídufǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo .
Nya efue bamba nnya ditsyi Tiberia eto umǝ ǝbǝ ídufǝ kaka dímantsyonko kaka bédi abolo , se Bonamute lékasɔ Onanto ani ólosǝ eto kama .
Se sitiditu nǝmǝ dínyǝ nkǝ Yesu nye wǝ bakasebi mankɛ mfó esoo , bédufǝ lǝ efue nyamǝ nya bédu bésu Kapernaum bésu banlɛ Yesu bɔbɛbɛ .
Se betidi bamǝ dínyǝ Yesu lǝ ditumbukplɛ eto lekpake nǝ nsee , bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , dimamfe fǝbǝ mfo ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , inni ayanisa nnya bínyǝ mínyifo bɛnɔ kasɔ eso bɛnlɛ mɛ bɔbɛbɛ , bomu lǝ didisa nǝ bɛkɛ bídi bími eso .
Biankplatsya itǝ didisa nǝ laabia , bomu bekplatsya itǝ didisa nǝ lambia , nǝ luutsyǝ itǝ nkpǝ manlo . Didisa nǝmfoo , ni ni nǝ Utidi Eto Ubi luutǝ mi nɛ , itsyise Anto Onanto ébutǝkǝ wǝ kɔni utsyǝ . ”
Mfó nya betidi bamǝ lɛtɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Be ele bǝ buyifo lǝ ete bǝ bɔlɛ Onanto eto keyifo buyifo ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ Onanto lela nkǝ biyifo ni bǝ befo utidi wǝ ótsyese bɛnɔ . ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nte ayanisa nnya fuuyifo ate bo , bǝ lǝ bofo fǝ bɔnɔ ? Be fuuyifo ?
Bo banamǝ édi didisa nǝ baakpo mana lǝ mfiminti fe kase báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , ‘ Útǝ mǝ didisa nǝ dítsyi kato nkǝ bedi . ’ ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ inni Moses ni nwǝ dítǝ mi didisa nǝ dítsyi kato . Bomu mɔ Anto ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ mi didisa tinti nǝ ditsyi kato .
Itsyise Onanto eto didisa ni nwǝ ditsyi kato úbǝ . Wǝ ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , tǝ bo didisa nǝmfo lefe saa . ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni didisa nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ nɛ . Fǝǝ ke díbǝ mɔ ɔflɔɔ , kukpɛnsɛ ǝmbɔlɛ fǝ kulefe , nya nwǝ léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , utukuɛ ǝmbɔlɛ wǝ kulefe kulefe .
Fɛɛ ntɛyi mi minkǝ ite bǝ bíunyǝ mɛ tsyaa , bíamfo mɛ bɛnɔ .
Utsyuǝ saa ke mɔ Anto ǝmǝ dífi útǝ mɛɛ , ebubǝ mɛ ɔflɔ , nya nwǝ díbǝ mɛ ɔflɔɔ , mǝmbɔni wǝ kulefe .
Itsyise ntsyi kato mbǝ inni bǝ lǝ nyifo lǝ mɔ lelabi ǝsuǝ , bomu mbǝ miǝ lǝ nyifo lǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ eto lele ǝsuǝ .
Nya utidi wǝ létsyese mɛ eto lelabi ni nkǝ mba kenke úfi útǝ mɛ eto kutsyuǝ mannya , bomu bǝ lǝ ntakasǝ mǝ nńyǝnsǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Itsyise mɔ Anto eto lelabi ni nkǝ , utsyuǝ saa wǝ dínyǝ mɔ Onanto eto Ubi nya ófo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ manlo , nya mootakasǝ wǝ nńyǝnsǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yudafɔ bamǝ dítsyiko bɔwɔnɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ itsyise ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni didisa nǝ ditsyi kato díbǝ ” eso .
Nyaso bátɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni Yesu ǝmfo wǝ ni Yosef eto Ubi lee ? Buyi wǝ anto ku ambe . Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ woatɛyi nkǝ , utsyi kato úbǝ ? ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛyɛ kǝnǝ lǝ mi nti .
Kuutsyuǝ embofo mɛ ɔflɔ bubǝ lenni mɔ Anto ǝmǝ lékpa wǝ óboko mɔ ɔflɔ . Nya mootakasǝ wǝ mboko nkpǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi áwɔni bǝnkǝ , ‘ Onanto ebote mǝmblɛ kenke asa . ’ Nyaso utsyuǝ saa wǝ leetsyue ato nya woakase asa ketsyi lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔɔ , ǝǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ .
Nyamfo mante bǝ utsyuǝ ébunyǝ Anto ǝmǝ unyǝ enso nwǝ ditsyi Onanto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ hã díkǝnyǝ wǝ unyǝ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ nwǝ lefo ɔnɔɔ , nkpǝ manlo kpe wǝ .
Mɔ ni dídisa nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ .
Mi banamǝ édi lesa nǝ baakpo mana lǝ mfiminti , fɛɛ bekpǝ .
Fɛɛ didisa nǝ ditsyi kato díbǝǝ , eyifo didisa nǝ utsyuǝ saa ke leedi nii , embukpǝ .
Mɔ ni didisa nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ , nǝ dítsyi kato díbǝ . Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leedi lesa nǝmfoo , wuusiǝ nkpǝ lefe saa . Nya didisa nǝ muufi ntǝ kawunsiɛ eto betidi bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝǝ , eyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia muumfi ntǝ . ”
Nyamfo áboko kǝnǝ kekleke lǝ Yudafɔ bamǝ nti nya bátɔ bǝ , “ Ntsyǝ utidi ǝmfo loofo wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bufi kǝtǝ bo nkǝ budi ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ biendi mɔ Utidi Eto Ubi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ , binǝ mɔ kɔtɔɔ , biembunyǝ nkpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
Utsyuǝ saa ke leedi mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nya wǝǝnǝ mɔ kɔtɔɔ , ebunyǝ nkpǝ manlo , nya mootakasǝ wǝ mboko nkpǝ , lǝ diyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ni didisa tinti nya mɔ kɔtɔ ni ǝnǝsa tinti .
Utsyuǝ saa ke leedi mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nya wǝǝnǝ mɔ kɔtɔɔ , okpe lǝ mɛ , nya mintsya nsi nkpǝ lǝ wǝ .
Fe kase Anto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ mɛ nya minsi nkpǝ lǝ wǝǝ , nko ke utidi wǝ leedi mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝǝ , luusiǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mɛ eso nɛ .
Nyamfo ni didisa nǝ ditsyi kato díbǝ . Dinte fe didisa nǝ eto okle mi banamǝ dídi nya bǝkpǝ . Utsyuǝ saa kee leedi didisa nǝ maatɛyi mfoo , ebusiǝ nkpǝ itǝ lefe nǝmǝ kenke . ”
Asa nyamfo Yesu léte mǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ lǝ Kapernaum nɛ .
Se Yesu eto bakasebi kpǝ lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ditiki nǝmfo eto kasɔnɔnɔ kpe ale tinti ! Owoe loofo ni bofo ? ”
Ite bǝ mǝ kuutsyuǝ mémfe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi kulesa tsyaa , Yesu áte nkǝ íkǝlǝ mǝ lǝ akɔɛsi nya ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ǝlǝ mi ?
Nyalɛ , lǝ ibǝ bǝ binyǝ Utidi eto Ubi ǝmǝ ɔntɔ kato kaka usiǝ kɔɔ , ntsyǝ biuyifo ?
Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ . Utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa . Etiki nnya kenke míntɛyi eyifo Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto etiki nnya lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ .
Fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ kpe lǝ mi nti ba dímamfo bánɔ . ” Yesu áte taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ mba dímamfo wǝ bánɔ ku nwǝ luufi wǝ okpe kɔni .
Ɔ́tɛyi úsukosǝ nkǝ , “ Nyamfo eso míntɛyi mi miǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mɛ ɔflɔ bubǝ lenni Anto ǝmǝ dítǝ wǝ kusu . ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , mba dítǝkǝko wǝ kpǝ ésinkli lǝ wǝ kama nya bǝkǝtǝkǝko wǝ kama bio .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɔ wǝ bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ nkǝ , “ Mi tsyaa , biusinkli mɛ kama ? ”
Simon Petro ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe ɔflɔ buudu busu ? Fǝ nkpe nkpǝ manlo eto etiki nyamǝ !
Nya mɔmɔɔ , bófo bɔ́nɔ nya bunyi boǝ fǝ ni Onanto eto Ubi , wǝ ni Ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ ǝmǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni nwǝ dílǝkǝ mi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ tsyaa , ɔni eyifo oboatidi lǝ mi nti ! ”
Yesu átɛyi nyamfo itsyi lǝ Yuda wǝ ni Simon Iskariot eto ubi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise uyifo bakasebi lefosi inuǝ bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ luufi wǝ okpe kɔni .
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Yesu ésu ɔ́yɛ lǝ Galilea eto kasɔ , nya wánla nkǝ weesu Yudea eto kasɔ itsyise Yudafɔ akabɛbɛ kusu lǝ balo wǝ eso .
Lefe nǝmfoo , Yudafɔ eto Mpatampa Kalɔsiǝsiǝ eto Diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ éboyo .
Nyaso Yesu eto bayimisani átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Du mfo lǝ esu Yudea eto kasɔ lǝ fǝ bakasebi lǝ bǝnyǝ asa nnya fanlɛ buyifo .
Itsyise utidi wǝ laala nkǝ bate wǝǝ , enyifo asa kakula . Se fanlɛ asa nyamfo buyifoo , lǝkǝ nnya ate kawunsiǝ kenke lǝ betidi lǝ bate fǝ ! ”
Bátɛyi wǝ nko itsyise wǝ bayimisani kulaa tsya mámfo wǝ bánɔ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ lefe mányo tɔ . Fɛɛ mii , lefe saa alɛkɛ itǝ mi .
Kawunsiǝ embofo mi bukisi . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , keekisi mɛ itsyise nlɛ bulǝkǝ kate minkǝ ke asayifoyifo eyi ku abuayifoyifo .
Mii , bisu diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ . Mɔɔ , membusu diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ itsyise mɔ lefe mányo tɔ . ”
Se ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nyamfoo , ɔ́tsyimɛ ɔkɛ lǝ Galilea mfó .
Fɛɛ se wǝ bayimisani bamǝ dídu bésu diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ eto kamaa , Yesu tsya ésu mfó , fɛɛ wǝnlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ote , ɔ́kula ǝsuǝ .
Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ákabɛbɛ wǝ lǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔ ákatɔ bǝ , “ Sieti osani ǝmǝ nkpe ? ”
Betidi kpǝ lǝ sitiditu nǝmǝ nti ékedi etiki kawɛkawɛ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Uyifo utidi sɛɛ . ” Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya díkatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo ! Ɔlɛ betidi bɔwɛ kakpe kanyansǝ ! ”
Fɛɛ se banlɛ Yudafɔ sikpi bote esoo , kuutsyuǝ mámfo nnya bulǝkǝ katɛyi lǝ betidi lǝ banɔ .
Se diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ didi eto eyi leyo ni ntinti etii , Yesu ésu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo nya úsu óte asa mfó .
Wǝ asatete nyamǝ éyifo Yudafɔ bamǝ yanii , nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Sieti okosobi ǝmfo ditsyi ku kobe komfo eto okle , se wénsu asa kakasekɔ lǝ kukalebe saa ? ”
Mfó Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ asatete méntsyi mɔ kosate ɔflɔ . Bomu itsyi Onanto wǝ létsyese mɛ ɔflɔ .
Utidi wǝ laala nkǝ weeyifo Onanto eto lelabii , ebote lǝ asa nnya maate etsyi Onanto ɔflɔ lee , mɔ kosate eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ maate nnya .
Utidi wǝ leedi etiki itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ǝsuǝ eto atɛsǝ waabɛbɛ . Fɛ , utidi wǝ laala nkǝ waatɛsǝ nwǝ létsyese wǝǝ , weeyifo asa kayɛnko lǝ sitinti ǝsuǝ nya waantɛyi sidia .
Inni Moses ni nwǝ dítǝ mi kɔfi komǝ lee ? Fɛɛ mi kuutsyuǝ entsyue kɔfi komǝ koto . Beso bela biǝ bialo mɛ ? ”
Mfó sitiditu siamǝ dítǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko fǝ ! Owoe nlɛ bola nkǝ waalo fǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ayanisa ani nyamfo mínyifo nya íyifo mimblɛ tã yanii mmǝ .
Moses ǝtǝ mi kɔfi nkǝ bela mi bebisaibi eto alo . Ite bǝ inni Moses uni dítsyiko nko , bomu itsyi taa mi bana lefe . Nyaso biala osaibi lelo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nɛ .
Nya lǝ boofo osaibi lelo bola lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ lǝ kase yembonta Moses eto kɔfi ibuu , beso biǝnyǝ ɔblɔ kakpe mɛ biǝ ntsya utidi wǝ nlɛ bufi , úmuǝ ale kenke lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ ?
Biemfi ǝnyǝnsa bekpo lekpo ! Bomu bekpo etiki eto lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ sitintisu ǝsuǝ . ”
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Yerusalem átɔ bǝ , “ Inni utidi ǝmfo banlɛ bɔbɛbɛ bǝ baalo ?
Bebe wǝ ! Ɔlɛ etiki budi lǝ obianti , nya bántɛyi wǝ kulesa ! Lee , bote bákate sitinti biǝnkǝ wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ?
Lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ǝmǝ ǝbǝǝ , kuutsyuǝ saa embote kaka utsyi úbǝ . Fɛɛ utidi ǝmfo alɛɛ , bomblɛ yi kaka utsyi úbǝ . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu díkate asa lǝ Disumuyo mfóo , ófa bembembe ɔ́tɔ nkǝ , “ Inni biǝnkǝ biyi mɛ sitinti ku kaka mintsyii ? Mǝmbǝ mfo lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ ! Nwǝ létsyese mɛɛ , waantɛyi sidia . Nya mii , binyi wǝ .
Fɛɛ mɔɔ , nyi wǝ , itsyise intsyi wǝ ɔflɔ nya wǝ ni nwǝ létsyese mɛ . ”
Nya bákplatsya bǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ mǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mámfo wǝ butidi , itsyise wǝ lefe mányo tɔ .
Fɛɛ kpǝ lǝ mǝ nti áfo wǝ bánɔ nyaso bátɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nya lǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ díbǝǝ , uteyifo ayanisa ote enso nnya utidi ǝmfo díkeyifoo ? ”
Farisifɔ bamǝ ánɔ se sitiditu siamǝ nlɛ etiki nyamfo bɔtɛyi lǝ kawɛ lǝ mǝ nti lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ , nyaso mǝ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ átsya nya batsyese kedikǝtǝkɔ eto mba laase mfo bǝ besu bǝmuǝ Yesu baboko .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nsi mɔɔkɛ mi lenti itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ ete muusinkli nsu nwǝ letsyese mɛ ɔflɔ .
Biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ biembunyǝ mɛ , itsyise kaka mɔɔkɛɛ , biembofo mfó bubǝ . ”
Ete Yudafɔ eto beninǝ lɛtɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ benkǝ , “ Sieti nwǝ mfo laala nkǝ weesu fɛ boembunyǝ wǝ ? Lee , bubu ɔnlɛ nkǝ weedu usu Helafɔ eto kǝmǝ ka bo betidi nkpe bǝ lǝ ote Helafɔ bamǝ asa mfóo ?
Nnya ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ biembunyǝ mɛ , ’ nya ‘ Kaka mɔɔkɛɛ , biǝmbofo mfó bubǝǝ , ’ eto kasɔ ni be ? ”
Lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝ ni diyi nǝ nso bofe lǝ diyididi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu átaka úńyǝ nya óbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ utukuɛ lɛ utsyuǝǝ , utsyǝ ǝmǝ bǝ mɔ ɔflɔ lǝ ubǝ unǝ ntu .
Fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , ‘ Utidi wǝ léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , ketukplo ka lǝǝtǝ ntu bo lǝǝtǝ utidi lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ eto ntuu , ebɔbɔdi butsyi lǝ wǝ utu kǝmiǝ . ’ ”
Yesu átɛyi nyamfo itsyi lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ mba léfo wǝ bánɔ loofo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise éyo lefe nǝmfoo , bǝntǝ tɔ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ , se bántakasǝ tɔ Yesu betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ báboko wǝ diyǝnde esuǝ eso .
Se betidi bamǝ lɛnɔ etiki nyamfoo , bátɛyi benkǝ , “ Sitintii , utidi ǝmfo eyifo Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmǝ . ”
Babamba tsya átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ mfo ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ nɛ . ” Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝǝ , ebofo Galilea butsyi ?
Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebutsyi Oka David eto kafo lǝ Betlehem eto umǝ kaka Oka David dísiǝ . ”
Lǝ nnya eso kabakǝfǝ édufǝ lǝ betidi bamǝ eto nti itsyi lǝ Yesu eso .
Bǝtsyuǝ ala bǝ bǝǝmuǝ wǝ , fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa méntidi wǝ .
Se mbalaase Disumuyo eto mba bákpe dísinkli besuu , Farisifɔ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ bamǝ ɔflɔ , bátɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Beso bíǝmmuǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale beboko ? ”
Mfó nya bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Boannɔ tɔ kuutsyuǝ saa di etiki fe kase utidi ǝmfo didi kulefe ! ”
Farisifɔ bamǝ átɔ mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ úflu mi tsyaa , mi nsusu , ɔ́wɛ mi ókpe ?
Bíɔnɔ tɔ bɛnɔ biǝ beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ nye Farisinyǝ utsyuǝ áfɔ wǝ ɔ́nɔ ?
Kulefe , kulefe ! Ditiditu nǝmfo enyi Moses eto kɔfi eto kulesa . Nyaso Onanto eto ekudi tǝkǝko mǝ ! ”
Farisifɔ eto uninǝ ɔni wǝ baakpo Nikodemo , ébusu Yesu ɔflɔ únyǝ . Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ ,
“ Nyalɛ , bo kɔfi ǝtǝ bo kusu nkǝ bokponko utidi lekpo bolo wǝ dikpi lefe nǝ eto lefe boannɔ tɔ wǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki nye batɔ wǝ lesa nǝ úyifo ? ”
Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Nyalɛ , fintsya Galileanyǝ feni ? Dufǝ lǝ Anantotiki eto Ekue abe , ete ebote fǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi kuutsyuǝ embɔbɔ utsyi lǝ Galilea . ”
( Nya utsyuǝ saa dídu úsu diyo . )
Fɛɛ Yesu wǝ édu úsu Nnuǝbi eto Eyi eto Kɔtini ǝsuǝ .
Kǝsiǝsǝ eto olesiǝ tuu , úsinkli úsu Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo . Betidi bamǝ kenke ǝbǝ bátsyilama wǝ , nya úsiǝ lǝ mǝ nti , útsyiko mǝ asa bote .
Mfóo , kɔfi eto bateasa ku Farisifɔ lékpa usio utsyuǝ wǝ bǝmuǝ kɔni kɔni lǝ disǝnkpo ǝsuǝ báboko mfó . Nya bǝńyǝnsǝ wǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
Bátɛyi Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , bǝmuǝ usio ǝmfo kɔni kɔni lǝ disǝnkpo ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ Moses eto kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ boto wǝ okle aba bolo , ” lǝ bǝnyǝ etiki lǝ wǝ , “ Ntsyǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? ”
Bátɔ wǝ nyamfo bǝ lǝ befi bato wǝ babe lǝ bayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝmuǝ wǝ . Fɛɛ Yesu ǝbǝ kasɔ nya úfi wǝ lɛnimi útsyiko asa bɔwɔni lǝ kasɔnti .
Nya se bensi bǝńyǝ banlɛ wǝ etiki bɔtɔɔ , óbesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mi nti eto nwǝ dímenyifo tɔ lebua unyǝǝ , di ututɛ lǝ oto wǝ leba . ”
Nya usi úbǝ kasɔ , ɔ́wɔni asa lǝ kasɔnti ku wǝ lɛnimi .
Se beninǝ bamǝ lɛnɔ nnya nkoo , mǝmblɛ kenke édu ɔni , ɔni , idu lǝ beninǝtidi ǝsuǝ . Isi íbu Yesu ku usio ǝmǝ mate nsi nyǝ mfó .
Yesu átakasǝ ǝsuǝ únyǝ nya ɔ́tɔ usio ǝmǝ nkǝ , “ Boambe , se báfe ? Nyalɛ , mǝ kuutsyuǝ mémbu loolo fǝ dikpi ? ”
Mfó usio ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Owo lo , Bonamute . ” Nyaso Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nko ke mintsya lǝmbolo fǝ dikpi nɛ . Nyaso du esu . Fɛɛ mensisu eyifo lebua bio . ”
Yesu esi údi Farisifɔ etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni kawunsiǝ eto diyǝnde . Utidi wǝ ke ntekǝko mǝǝ , wuunyǝ diyǝnde nǝ lǝǝtǝ utidi nkpǝ tinti nya wǝǝmbɔyɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ kulefe . ”
Farisifɔ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Alɛ etiki budi ketsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso nnya fanlɛ bɔtɛyi ǝmbǝ kalende saa . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Owo lo , ite bǝ nlɛ etiki budi ketsyi lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi kpe kalende , itsyise nyi kaka mintsyi , nya minyi kaka mintɔ . Fɛɛ mimii , binyi kaka mintsyi nye kaka mintɔ .
Mii , kawunsiǝ eto nsusu ǝsuǝ nnya biefi kakponko asa lekpo nɛ , fɛ mɔɔ , mankponko kuutsyuǝ lekpo .
Fɛɛ lǝ bǝ nyifo nkoo , mɔ lekpokponkpo ebɔyɛ lǝ sitinti eto kusu ǝsuǝ . Itsyise inni mɔ mate lookpo ni . Bomu Anto wǝ létsyese mɛɛ , ǝǝńyǝ mɛ kama .
Nya lǝ mi kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , báwɔni bákpe bǝ , lǝ badansiɛ inuǝ eto kɛnyɛ akate lǝ etiki ǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lesa nǝ bátɛyi kpe kalende .
Mɔɔ , meedi adansiɛ lǝ lesa nǝ maatɛyi ǝsuǝ , nya mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛ tsya eedi adansiɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se fǝ anto ǝmǝ nkpe ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Binyi mɛ nya binyi mɔ Anto ǝmǝ tsya . Lǝ bote ete bete mɛɛ , eni biote mɔ Anto tsya . ”
Yesu átɛyi nyamfo lǝ okokakokɔ se ɔnlɛ asa bote lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝ . Fɛɛ kuutsyuǝ saa mǝmmuǝ wǝ , itsyise wǝ lefe mányo tɔ .
Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mǝǝbǝ budu lǝ mi ɔflɔ , nya biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ biukpǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ . Nya kaka mintɔɔ , biembofo mfó bubǝ . ”
Nyaso Yudafɔ bamǝ átɔ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔntɔ kalokɔ eso ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Biembofo kaka mintɔ bubǝ lee ’ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mimii , kasɔ mfo eto betidi bini . Nya mɔɔ , ntsyi kato . Mi etsyi kawunsiǝ mfo , fɛɛ mɔɔ , mentsyi kawunsiǝ mfo .
Nyaso míntɛyi mi minkǝ biukpǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya lǝ biamfo bɛnɔ biǝ mɔ ni nwǝ minii , biukpǝ lǝ mi abua ǝsuǝ sitinti . ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝ , “ Owoe feni ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ míntɛyi mi itsyi taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔɔ , ni ǝmǝ ete nɛ .
Nkpe etiki kpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ nnya ele bǝ mfi nlo mi dikpi . Fɛɛ nwǝ létsyese mɛɛ , sitintitidi uni . Nya asa nnya minɔ mintsyiko wǝ ɔflɔɔ , nnya mimfi minlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ kawunsiǝ nɛ . ”
Mfóo , bánnɔ kasɔ bǝ Yesuu , Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko .
Nyaso ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ bebesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ katoo , nyafɛ biote biǝ mɔ ni nwǝ mini nɛ , nya meenyifo kulesa lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ mɔ Anto léte mɛ nkǝ ntɛyii , ni hã maatɛyi nɛ .
Nwǝ lekpe mɛ kɔtɔɔ , si ko mɛ . Wóanyani mɔ mate utsyǝ , itsyise meeyifo lesa nǝ lǝǝyuǝsǝ wǝ kafo lefe saa . ”
Nya se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo mmǝǝ , betidi kpǝ ba lɛnɔ ɔ́tɛyi nyamfoo , áfo wǝ bánɔ .
Nyaso Yesu átɛyi Yudafɔ ba léfo wǝ bánɔ nkǝ , “ Lǝ biyifo lǝ mɔ asatete ǝsuǝǝ , ete bǝ biyifo mɔ bakasebi sitinti nɛ .
Biote sitinti siamǝ , nya sitinti siamǝ ebutǝ bisiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abraham eto befluflu buni , nya bóendi tɔ ndomufɔ butǝ kuutsyuǝ saa tɔ búnyǝ ! Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ faatɛyi fǝnkǝ , bootǝ busiǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ utsyuǝ saa ke leeyifo lebuaa , uyifo ndomunyǝ utǝ lebua .
Ndomunyǝ aamfiani oyobi wǝ nkpe kedikɔ kulefe . Bomu oyosate eto ubii , wǝ kpe kedikɔ lefe saa .
Nyaso lǝ mɔ Onanto eto Ubi ǝtǝ kusu nkǝ bisiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ete bǝ bisi lǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ sitinti nɛ .
Nyi miǝ Abraham eto bebi bini . Fɛɛ bela biǝ bialo mɛ , itsyise biamfo asa nnya maate mi bɛnɔ , eso .
Lesa nǝ mímfo mintsyiko mɔ Anto ɔflɔɔ , ni maatɛyi nɛ . Nya mi tsyaa , lesa nǝ bɛnɔ bitsyiko mi anto ɔflɔɔ , ni bɛnlɛ buyifo nɛ . ”
Yudafɔ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Abraham ni bo anto . ” Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Abraham eto bebi bini sitintii , eni biuyifo asa nnya Abraham díyifo seka .
Fɛɛ bela biǝ bialo mɔ nwǝ laatɛyi mi sitinti sia mínɔ mintsyiko Onanto ɔflɔ . Abraham ményifo nko .
Asa nnya mi anto kosate díyifoo , nya bɛnlɛ buyifo nɛ . ” Mfó bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bunni basɔnɔbi ! Anto ɔni nkpe bo , wǝ ni Onanto ! ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ Onanto ete ni mi antoo , eni biala mɛ . Itsyise Onanto ɔflɔ míntsyi mímbǝ mfo . Inni mɔ kosate eto lelabi ǝsuǝ mímbǝ . Bomu wǝ ni nwǝ létsyese mɛ .
Ntsyǝ eso biannɔ lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kasɔ ? Nnya ni bǝ bianla biǝ bianɔ ditiki nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi .
Mi anto Obonsam eto bebi bini , nya bela biǝ bieyifo wǝ lelabi . Idu taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔɔ , uyifo nwǝ laalo betidi . Nya woanla ditiki tinti nǝmǝ itsyise woantɛyi sitinti kulefe . Lǝ ɔtɛyi sidiaa , wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi kate . Itsyise nwǝ laatɛyi sidia uni , nya wǝ ni bidia kenke eto anto .
Fɛɛ mɔɔ se ini sitinti maatɛyi mi esoo , biamfo mɛ kanɔ .
Mi nti eto owoe loofo mɛ dikpi bolo nkǝ nyifo lebua ? Lǝ ntɛyi mi sitintii , beso biamfo mɛ kanɔ ?
Utidi wǝ ni Onanto eto olee , aanɔ Onanto eto etiki . Nnya eso biannɔ Onanto eto etiki ni bǝ binni wǝ bale . ”
Yudafɔ átɔ Yesu bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ bɔ́tɛyi boǝnkǝ Samarianyǝ feni nya lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko fǝǝ , bɔ́tɛyi sidia ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua saa ǝntǝkǝko mɛ . Nlɛ mɔ Anto dibu butǝ , fɛɛ mi ǝntǝ mɛ dibu .
Mɔɔ , maambɛbɛ dibu kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ nwǝ laabɛbɛ nkǝ betidi tɛsǝ mɛɛ , kpe . Wǝ ni nwǝ laakpo lekpo kayɛnko lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ , lǝ utsyuǝ eetsyue mɔ asatete kotoo , wǝmbukpǝ kulefe ! ”
Yudafɔ átɛyɛ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Mfe fɛ buunyǝ boǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko fǝ nɛ ! Abraham ǝkpǝ , nya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi tsya díkpǝ , fɛɛ fǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi fǝ nwǝ ke ditsyue fǝ asatete kotoo , ǝmbukpǝ kulefe !
Bubu feebu fǝ fǝ lɛmɔ fanso Boanto Abraham wǝ díkpǝ , fɛɛ ? Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi tsya ǝkpǝ ! Owoe eto okle feebu fǝ wǝ feni ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ maatɛsɛɛ , nyalɛ mɔ atɛsǝ nyamǝ manle kulesa . Fɛɛ nwǝ laatɛsǝ mɛɛ , wǝ ni mɔ Anto . Wǝ ni nwǝ bíatɛyi biǝ wǝ ni mi Onanto nɛ .
Mii , binyi wǝ . Fɛ mɔɔ , nyi wǝ . Lǝ ntɛyi miǝ minnyi wǝǝ , nyalɛ moofiani odia fe mi ke , fɛɛ nyi wǝ , nya meetsyue wǝ ditiki koto .
Mi anto Abraham ǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ se ɔ́nɔ mɔ bubǝ eto asa . Nyaso úfi ǝnǝmi útǝkǝ lǝ mɔ bubǝ ǝsuǝ nya únyǝ disuǝyuǝ . ”
Yudafɔ bamǝ átɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ámamfo tɔ alɛ fosi anɔ kulaa tsya , nya bɔtɛyi fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝ eyi Abraham ? ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , mɔɔ , mfe nkpe koko fɛ bále Abraham . ”
Ete básɛ abambi bǝ baato wǝ , fɛɛ Yesu ákula ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́bɔ údu lǝ Kedikǝtǝkɔ mfó .
Se Yesu díbǝ ófe ɔntɔɔ , únyǝ utidi utsyuǝ wǝ bále unǝmba .
Wǝ bakasebi átɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Oteasa , owoe eto lebua dítǝ bále osani ǝmfo unǝmba ? Wǝ kosate eso lee wǝ antomǝ eto abua eso ? ”
Mfó Yesu dítǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni nwǝ mfo nye wǝ antomǝ díyifo lebua eso . Bomu bále wǝ nko bǝ lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ keyifo eto ǝsuǝale ote betidi .
Se bonkpe lǝ kalesiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ele bǝ buyifo keyifo butǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ . Kale ǝǝbǝ bolo nya kuutsyuǝ saa lensiembofo keyifo buyifo .
Lefenǝ eto lefe minsi minkpe lǝ kawunsiǝǝ , mɔ ni kawunsiǝ eto diyǝnde . ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi nko ólosǝǝ , ókpo ntufǝ lǝ kasɔ , ɔ́wɔ site úfi se údikiti wǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi ,
nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Su lǝ esu ǝflǝ ntu lǝ Siloa eto Ditubiǝ ǝsuǝ . ” Siloa eto kasɔ ni nkǝ Bákpe wǝ . Nyaso osani ǝmǝ ésu úflǝ ntu bomǝ . Nya wǝ ǝnǝmi lɛsini ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ , nya úsinkli úbǝ oto .
Wonko mba nkpe lǝ koyotsya ku betidi ba kenke díkǝnyǝ wǝ ɔnlɛ asa bɔtɔɔ , átɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni osani ǝmfo ni nwǝ díkǝsiǝ lǝ mfó úkatɔ asa ? ”
Bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝ wǝ uni . Fɛɛ babamba átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Owo lo , inni wǝ uni . Bole ete ole wǝ . ” Mfó nya utidi ǝmǝ kosate lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ uni ! ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ fanlɛ asa bunyǝ ? ”
Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ baakpo Yesu lɛwɔ sitǝ udikiti mɛ lǝ ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ nsu mflǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ Siloa eto ditubiǝ . Nyaso nsu , nya se mímflǝ ǝnǝmi mínlosǝ ete míntsyiko asa bunyǝ . ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝ , “ Sieti onkpe ? ” Útǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mante kaka onkpe . ”
Bákpa nwǝ eto ǝnǝmi léba kɔ ǝmǝǝ , bésuko Farisifɔ bamǝ ɔflɔ .
Diyi nǝ Yesu lɛnwɔ sitǝ údikiti lǝ unǝmba ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi fɛ ótsya wǝǝ , éyifo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi .
Nya Farisifɔ bamǝ tsya lɛtɔ osani ǝmǝ kase íyifo fɛ útsyiko asa bunyǝ . Ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Sitǝ ɔ́nwɔ úfi údikiti mɛ lǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya mímflǝ mɔ ǝnǝmi ete míntsyiko asa bunyǝ . ”
Mfó nya Farisifɔ bamǝ eto bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ díyifo nyamfo embofo Onanto ɔflɔ butsyi ! Itsyise weenyifo lǝ Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ . ” Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bamba átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ obuayifo ebofo ayanisa nyamfo eto okle buyifo kate ? ” Itǝ kǝsǝnsǝ édufǝ mǝ lenti .
Nyaso Farisifɔ bamǝ esi bátɔ osani ǝmǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Se fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ wǝ lɛsini fǝ ǝnǝmii , be ni fǝ nsusu itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? ” Mfó nya osani ǝmǝ dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi uni . ”
Yudafɔ bamǝ mámfo bánɔ sitinti bǝ osani ǝmǝ ába ǝnǝmi fɛ usi útsyiko asa bunyǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bákpadi wǝ anto mǝ díbǝ .
Bátɔ mǝ bǝ , “ Mi ubisaibi ni nwǝ mfo ? Biǝ béle wǝ unǝmba , nya ntsyǝ iyifo fɛ omfe ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ mɔmɔ ? ”
Wǝ anto mǝ ǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Buyi boǝ bo ubi uni . Nya bunyi tsya boǝ bole wǝ unǝmba .
Fɛɛ bunyi kase íyifo fɛ omfe ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ . Nya bunyi futsyǝ tsya létsya wǝ ǝnǝmi nyamǝ . Bɛtɔ wǝ kosate lǝ ɔtɛyi mi itsyise wóobe ! ”
Wǝ antomǝ átɛyi nyamfo nko itsyise balɛ Yudafɔ sikpi bote , itsyise Yudafɔ átɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ utsyǝǝ ke lɛtɛyi nkǝ ófo Yesu ɔ́nɔ fe Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝǝ , boolǝkǝ wǝ betsyiko lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ .
Nyamfo eso wǝ antomǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Wóobe , bɛtɔ wǝ kosate nɛ ! ”
Bákpadi nwǝ bále unǝmba ǝmǝ dinuǝfǝ nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Te Onanto sikpi lǝ atɛyi bo sitinti ! Buyi boǝ utidi wǝ létsya fɛ mfó eyifo obuayifo ! ”
Osani ǝmǝ ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , minnyi lǝ obuayifo ni osani ǝmfo lee unni . Lesa lɔni minyi mɔɔtɛyi ni bǝnkǝ , kɔɔ mba ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , mfe nlɛ bunyǝ ! ”
Bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be úyifo fǝ nya ntsyǝ ɔ́yɛ ótsya fǝ ǝnǝmi nyamǝ ? ”
Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mboka mi bɔtɛyi éfe , fɛɛ bianla biǝ biafo nnya . Beso bela biǝ bisi bianɔ nnya ? Lee , bela biǝ miitsya afiani wǝ bakasebii ? ”
Báka wǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝ ete ni wǝ okasebi . Boo , Moses eto bakasebi buni .
Buyi boǝ Onanto édiko Moses etiki . Nya nwǝ mfo alɛɛ , boante kaka utsyi kulaa tsya ! ”
Mfó nya osani ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nte ditiki nǝ eto okle ni nǝmfo ? Binyi kaka utsyi , fɛɛ wǝ lɛsini mɛ ǝnǝmi nɛ !
Buyi boǝ Onanto eentsyue babuayifo koto , fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ eesumu Onanto , nya weeyifo wǝ lelabii , weetsyue wǝ koto kanɔ wǝ olatoto .
Idu taa kawunsiǝ eto kasɔ ketsyikokɔɔ , bóannɔ tɔ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa wǝ átsya nwǝ bále unǝmba .
Lenni Onanto ɔflɔ utsyii , eni wǝmbofo kulesa buyifo . ”
Batɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Fǝǝ bále ku lebua fábe ku nii ! Nya fǝ bomu lela fǝ aate bo asaa ? ” Nyaso bála wǝ , bábɔnko lǝ Yudafɔ eto katsyakɔ kamǝ .
Yesu ánɔ nkǝ bála wǝ nyaso se únyǝ osani ǝmǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Áfo Utidi Eto Ubi ánɔ ? ”
Osani ǝmǝ ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Nto , te mɛ futsyǝ uni , bǝ lǝ mfo wǝ nnɔ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ébunyǝ utidi ǝmǝ koko , nnyǝ wǝ ni nwǝ nlɛ fǝ etiki budinko mfo mɔmɔ nɛ . ”
Osani ǝmǝ átɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , mfo nnɔɔ ! ” Nya óse akonki lǝ Yesu eto ǝnǝmi úsumu wǝ .
Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo bǝ lǝ nkponko betidi lekpo , bǝ lǝ bǝnǝmba lǝ bǝnyǝ asa , nya mba lǝǝnyǝǝ , lǝ bafiani bǝnǝmba . ”
Farisifɔ ba díńyǝ mfo lɛnɔ nnya Yesu lɛtɛyii , átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyalɛ bɔtɛyi fanlɛ fǝ bo tsya ába ǝnǝmi lee ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ boba mi ǝnǝmi lebaa , eni biebudi dikpi , fɛɛ se biǝ bɛlɛ bunyǝ esoo , mi abua tǝkǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke dímanyɛ lǝ lesamuyo eto kesie údufǝ lesamuyo nǝmǝǝ , bomu ɔ́yɛ kusu bamba saa údufǝ lǝ ni kafoo , eyifo uyu ku nwǝ laabiasǝ asa .
Nyaa , nwǝ ke laayɛ lǝ kesie kedufǝ lesamuyo nǝmǝ kafoo , wǝ ni nwǝ laayɛnko basamu tinti nɛ .
Nya nwǝ laase lesamuyo eto kesie aasini kesie eto siku kǝtǝ wǝ . Woakpadi basamu bamǝ lǝ mǝ aye nya baanɔ wǝ ɔkɔɛ nya woakpa mǝ kabɔnko .
Lǝ okpadi mǝ nya ɔyɛnko mǝ ɔbɔnkoo , woatɔ mǝ sɛtɔ kayɛnko mǝ nya bǝǝtǝkǝko wǝ kama itsyise beeyi wǝ ɔkɔɛ .
Bǝmbutǝkǝko kuutsyuǝ bamba kama . Bomu bootsyetsyi bedu itsyise benyi wǝ ɔkɔɛ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ lekpa nǝmfo , fɛɛ bánnɔ nnya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ eto kasɔ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Yesu esi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ sitintii , mɔ ni kesie itǝ basamu bamǝ .
Betidi ba kenke lɛtɔ mɛ sɛtɔ bǝbǝǝ , beyifo beyu ku mba laabiasǝ asa . Fɛɛ basamu bamǝ méntsyue mǝ koto .
Mɔ ni kesie kamǝ . Lǝ utsyuǝ ayɛ lǝ mɛ udufǝ lǝ kafoo , wuunyǝ bofo . Wuudufǝ lǝ mfó ukabɔ , nya wuunyǝ didisa sɛɛ ukedi .
Uyuu , bubǝ ete woǝbǝ nkǝ lǝ uyu , olo utidi , obiasǝ asa . Mɔɔ , mbǝ miǝ lǝ binyǝ nkpǝ , nkpǝ bo lɛflɔ .
“ Mɔ ni utinti wǝ laayɛnko basamu , nwǝ lɛtɔnɔ nkǝ weefi wǝ nkpǝ utǝ lǝ wǝ basamu eto disi .
Utidi wǝ laayɛnko basamu wǝ baafo diyi eto kayo nya benni wǝ kosate eto balee , weetsyetsyi kedu lǝ unyǝ ukiti nlɛ bubǝ . Ukiti ǝmǝ eedufǝ mǝ lenti kǝmuǝ mǝ nya wǝǝsensǝ mǝ .
Utidi ǝmfo eetsyetsyi kedu itsyise diyi eto uyifoyifo ete uni . Nya basamu bamǝ eto bɔflɔ nye mǝ kasɛɛ aanka wǝ .
“ Mɔ ni utinti wǝ laayɛnko basamu . Fe kase Anto ǝmǝ nyi mɛɛ , nya mintsya nyi wǝǝ , nko ke mintsya nyi mɔ basamu , nya mǝǝtsya nyi mɛ nɛ . Nya míntɔnɔ miǝ mǝǝkpǝ lǝ mǝ disi .

Nkpe basamu bamba ba lǝmbǝ lǝ lesamuyo nǝmfo tɔ . Ele bǝ nyɛnko mǝ tsya mboko , nya mǝ tsya lǝ banɔ mɔ ɔkɔɛ . Nya mǝmblɛ loofíani basamu eto ditsyukpa lɔni lǝ ɔyɛnkoyɛnko ɔni eto kalɔ .
“ Anto ǝmǝ aala mɛ , itsyise ntɔnɔ miǝ mǝǝkpǝ lǝ mǝ disi , bǝ lǝ nsinkli mbǝ nsiǝ nkpǝ bio .
Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mɔ nkpǝ bofo lǝ mɔ ani , bomu mɔ kosate dífi mu míntǝ miǝ mǝǝkpe . Nkpe ǝsuǝale bǝ moofo mu bufi kǝtǝ . Nya ǝsuǝale si ekpe mɛ bǝ nsinkli mfo mu . Nko ǝmǝ mɔ Anto dítǝ mɛ nkǝ nyifo nɛ . ”
Lǝ etiki nnya Yesu lɛtɛyi mfo esoo , kabakǝfǝ esi kédufǝ lǝ Yudafɔ bamǝ nti .
Mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lɛwɔnɔ bua tǝkǝko wǝ . Ɔlɛ kumunǝ bukpǝ ! Beso ele bǝ besi betsyue wǝ koto fɛ ? ”
Fɛɛ babamba tsya átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua nkpee , embofo etiki nyamfo eto okle bɔtɛyi ! Ntsyǝ lɛwɔnɔ bua luuyifo unǝmba si unyǝ asa fɛ ? ”
Lɛyɔlefee , nya beedi Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo Bufikakpe lǝ Onanto kɔni eto Diyi lǝ Yerusalem .
Yesu ákayɛ kafe lǝ Disumuyo eto lekpake nǝ baakpo Solomo eto Ablanase mfó .
Mfó nya Yudafɔ bamǝ létsyilama wǝ , nya bátɔ wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Isu ese dimamfe lefe kon fookpe bo lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ esu ase ? Tɛyi bo sitinti siamǝ , lǝ fǝ ni Utidi ǝmǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyǝ . ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo koko , tsya biamfo mɛ akanɔ . Asa nnya meeyifo lǝ mɔ Anto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝǝ , lɛ mɛ bulǝkǝ kate .
Fɛɛ biǝmbofo mɛ bɛnɔ , itsyise bientsyi mɔ basamu bamǝ nti .
Mɔ basamu eetsyue mɛ koto . Nyi mǝ , nya bǝǝtǝkǝko mɛ .
Ntǝ mǝ nkpǝ manlo , nya bemuukpǝ kulefe . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ lǝ mɔ kɔni .
Mɔ Anto wǝ dífi mǝ útǝ mɛɛ , kpe ale oso lesa saa . Kuutsyuǝ saa embofo mǝ bofo lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ lǝ mɔ Anto eto kɔni kulefe kulefe .
Anto ǝmǝ ku mɔɔ , eyifo bani . ”
Mfó nya Yudafɔ bamǝ dísi básɛ aba bǝ bato wǝ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Nyifo nnyifo sɛɛ kpǝ bo mɔ Anto lékpe mɛ lǝ mi nti . Nya nte nnya eso bela biǝ biakpɔ mɛ aba ? ”
Yudafɔ bamǝ ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Inni nnyifo sɛɛ bo féyifo eso boǝ boakpɔ fǝ aba . Bomu mbusiotiki nnya fédi eso ! Utidinini ete feni , fɛɛ éfi fǝ ǝsuǝ éyifo fe Onanto ! ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Báwɔni bákpe lǝ mi kosate eto Kɔfi eto Kukue bǝ Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Beyifo fe bananto . ’
Buyi boǝ lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue , eyifo sitinti itǝ lefe saa . Nya mfó Onanto lékpadi betidi ba léfo wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ nkǝ , ‘ Beyifo fe bananto . ’
Fɛɛ mɔɔ , Anto ǝmǝ dílǝkǝ mɛ nya ótsyese mɛ kawunsiǝ nɛ . Nya ntsyǝ eso fɛ biɔtɛyi biǝ ndi mbusiotiki lǝ nnya míntɛyi miǝ nyifo Onanto eto Ubi ?
Lǝ minlɛ mɔ Anto eto nnyifo buyifoo , nyalɛ biamfo mɛ bɛnɔ .
Fɛɛ lǝ nlɛ mu buyifoo , lǝ biamfo mɛ bɛnɔ tsyaa , ele bǝ befo asa nnya meeyifo bɛnɔ , bǝ lǝ bete lǝ bɛnɔ nnya kasɔ biǝ Anto ǝmǝ si lǝ mɛ , nya mintsya nsi nkpǝ lǝ wǝ . ”
Mfó tsyaa , besi bála bǝ bǝǝmuǝ Yesu , fɛɛ usi ɔ́bɔ lǝ mǝ nti údu .
Yesu esi úsu ɔ́yila Ketu Yordan úsu kaka Yohanes díyifo betidi ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa tutɛ , nya ɔ́tsyimɛ mfó .
Betidi kpǝ ǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Yohanes ményifo ayanisa saa óte . Fɛɛ lesa saa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi itsyi lǝ utidi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ eyifo sitinti . ”
Nya betidi kpǝ lǝ mfó léfo wǝ bánɔ .
Osani utsyuǝ baakpo Lazaro wǝ dísiǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Betania ánɔ bufi . Wǝ ku wǝ bayimisio inuǝ ba baakpo Maria ku Marta dísiǝ lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ .
Maria ǝmfo ni nwǝ dífi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi ókpo Bonamute Yesu lǝ akpa nya úfi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si wǝ akpa nyamǝ . Wǝ ɔyimisani ni Lazaro wǝ lɛnɔ bufi bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo nɛ .
Wǝ bayimisio bamfo átsyese Yesu kɛnyɛ bǝ , “ Bonamute , fǝ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala ánɔ bufi ! ”
Se Yesu léfo kɛnyɛ kamfoo , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bufi bomfo enni bukpǝmfi itǝ wǝ , bomu iyifo nnya ǝsuǝ buufi babesǝ Onanto eto diye kato , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ babesǝ Onanto eto Ubi tsya kato . ”
Nyaa , Yesu ála Marta ku wǝ ɔyimisio ku Lazaro eto asa tinti .
Fɛɛ se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ ɔ́nɔ bufii , usi ɔ́kɛ mfó eyi ǝnuǝ okpe .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bakasebi nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ businkli busu Yudea . ”
Mfó nya wǝ bakasebi lɛtɛyɛ wǝ nkǝ , “ Oteasa , kayinkǝnǝ ete Yudafɔ díkabɛbɛ kusu bǝ baakpɔ fǝ aba , nya fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ busi boesu mfó ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Inni lefosi abombosɔsɔ ǝnuǝ nkpe lǝ diyi eto kalekpakpa ǝsuǝ ? Lǝ utsyuǝ lɛ bɔyɛ lǝ kalekpakpa ǝsuǝǝ , weentusǝ itsyise ɔlɛ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto lekpasǝ bunyǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ ketsye ɔnlɛ bɔyɛɛ , wuutusǝ itsyise lekpasǝ ǝmbǝ itǝ wǝ . ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , usi ɔ́tɛyi úkǝ nkǝ , “ Bo ɔyɛtsyuǝ Lazaro lɛ selabe , nyaso ntɔ wǝ kasanklisǝ kɔ . ”
Se bakasebi bamǝ lɛnɔ nkoo , bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ selabe onlabee , nyalɛ yuuyuǝ wǝ . ”
Fɛɛ Yesu wǝ lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ Lazaro ébukpǝ , fɛɛ wǝ bakasebi ébu bǝnkǝ selabe tinti ɔ́tɛyi utsyiko .
Nyaso Yesu ákpasǝ mǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lazaro ǝkpǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ mi esoo , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bǝ mánkɛ lǝ mfó fɛ úkpǝ , bǝ lǝ befo bɛnɔ esoo . Nyaso bítǝ lǝ busu wǝ ɔflɔ mfó . ”
Mfó nya Toma wǝ baakpo Ɔfimfinyǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ bakaseyimitsyuǝ bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bitǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ butǝkǝko Oteasa busu bǝ lǝ busu bukpǝ ku wǝ ! ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu dísu údufǝ mfoo , ɔ́nɔ nkǝ bébikǝ Lazaro diyi nale ni diyi nǝmfó nɛ .
Idu lǝ Betania isu Yerusalem eyifo fe esunkpo ǝnuǝ seka .
Nyaso Yudafɔ kpǝ ǝbǝ mfó bǝ bǝǝbǝ bamansǝ Maria ku Marta lɛkɔ se mǝ ɔyimisani díkpǝ eso .
Se Marta lɛnɔ nkǝ Yesu lɛ bubǝǝ , úsu nkǝ weesu otsyako wǝ , fɛɛ Maria ebu ɔkɛ lǝ diyo .
Marta átɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ nnya ete fakɛ mfoo , eni mɔ ɔyimisani mǝnkpǝ !
Fɛɛ nnyi miǝ mɔmɔ kulaa tsyaa , lesa saa nǝ fɔɔtɔ Onantoo , wuutǝ fǝ ni . ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Fǝ ɔyimisani ebotaka ubǝ nkpǝ . ”
Nya Marta lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nyi miǝ wootaka ubǝ nkpǝ lǝ lefe nǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ lootaka lǝ Diyi Fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ bǝkpǝkpǝ eto botaka kǝńyǝ ku businkli kǝbǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ nkpǝ nɛ . Utsyuǝ saa ke léfo mɛ ɔ́nɔɔ , lǝ úkpǝ kulaa tsyaa , wuusiǝ nkpǝ .
Nya utsyuǝ saa ke nsi nkpǝ nya ófo mɛ ɔ́nnɔ , embukpǝ kulefe . Afo nyamfo anɔ ? ”
Útǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ee , Bonamute . Mfo nnɔ miǝ fǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , Onanto eto Ubi nwǝ bátɛyi bǝtsyǝ bǝ wuubǝ kawunsiǝ . ”
Se Marta lɛtɛyi nyamfo ólosǝǝ , úsu ókpadi wǝ ɔyimisio Maria , nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ buɛɛ nkǝ , “ Oteasa ǝmǝ ebubǝ nya ɔnlɛ fǝ disi bɔtɔ . ”
Se Maria lɛnɔ nkoo , ótaka mlǝ nya úsu wǝ katsyakokɔ .
Lefe nǝmfoo , Yesu méndufǝ tɔ umǝ kafo . Bomu usi úńyǝ lǝ kaka Marta díbǝ otsyako wǝ mfó .
Se Yudafɔ ba nsi lǝ diyo lǝ Maria ɔflɔ banlɛ wǝ lɛkɔ bomansǝ dínyǝ bǝ ótaka kplaa , mǝ tsya átaka bǝtǝkǝko Maria kama . Bébu bǝ kudi komǝ eti ɔntɔ lǝ usi usu uwi keku .
Se Maria dísu údufǝ kaka Yesu ńyǝǝ , óse akonki lǝ wǝ akɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , lǝ nnya ete fákɛ mfoo , eni mɔ ɔyimisani mǝnkpǝ ! ”
Yesu ǝnyǝ kase Maria ku betidi ba dítǝkǝko wǝ nlɛ nku . Ílǝ wǝ lǝ utu nya óla ɔ́wɔnɔ hũũ .
Ɔ́tɔ mǝ nkǝ , “ Sieti bíbikǝ wǝ ? ” Bǝtǝ mbuayɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute , bǝ lǝ ǝbǝ abe . ”
Mfóo , Yesu éwi keku .
Nya Yudafɔ bamǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bebe kase ko óla wǝǝ ! ”
Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Ɔ́sini unemba ǝnǝmi nya ɔnlɛ asa bunyǝ . Beso wǝntǝ lǝ Lazaro lǝ ɔyɛ bukpǝ ? ”
Isi ílǝ Yesu tinti , nya ɔ́nyi úsu kudi komǝ ɔflɔ . Kudi komǝ eyifo dibiǝ lǝ koba kafo nya béfi leba béti ko kɛnyɛ .
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnyi leba nǝmǝ lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ . ” Mfó nya Lazaro ǝmǝ eto ɔyimisio Marta lɛtɛyi Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , wuukanyi mɔmɔ , itsyise mmi ni diyi nale se bébikǝ wǝ nɛ ! ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mántɛyi fǝ minkǝ lǝ áfo mɛ ánɔɔ , ebunyǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ? ”
Nyaso bányi leba nǝmǝ lǝ kudi komǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Yesu ábesǝ ǝnǝmi kato óbe nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nto , maasɔ fǝ ani , itsyise eetsyue mɛ koto lǝ nkpadi fǝ .
Nyi miǝ eetsyue mɛ koto lefe saa . Fɛɛ mba ńyǝ mfo eso minlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyi nko , bǝ lǝ bafo banɔ bǝ fǝ lékpe mɛ kɔtɔ . ”
Se ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nkoo , ófa bembembe nkǝ , “ Lazaro , bɔ ǝbǝ ! ”
Nya ukpǝnkpǝ ǝmǝ lɛbɔ úbǝ ku kafia ka béfi bémini wǝ ǝsuǝ ku nka béfi bémini wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Beyankli we bikǝ biamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ udu . ”
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Yudafɔ ba díbǝ Maria ɔflɔ nya bǝnyǝ nnya Yesu díyifoo , eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ áfo wǝ bánɔ .
Fɛɛ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ édu bésu Farisifɔ ɔflɔ nya bátɛyi mǝ lesa nǝ Yesu díyifo .
Nyaso Farisifɔ ku besumunyǝ ninǝ ákpe disi ku Yudafɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko nya bátɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Be ele bǝ buyifo ? Bebe ayanisa kpǝ nnya osani ǝmfo nlɛ buyifo kate !
Lǝ butǝ wǝ kusu ɔnlɛ nyamfo buyifo nkoo , utsyuǝ saa ebofo wǝ ɔnɔ . Nya Romafɔ luubǝ baba bo Disumuyo kɛnkɛ kamǝ ku kusǝ komǝ tsya ! ”
Mfóo , mǝ nti eto nwǝ baakpo Kayafa , wǝ ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ lɛlɛ nǝmfoo , lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ asakasɔnɔnɔ lǝǝlǝ mi mmǝ !
Binyi tɔ biǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ utidi ɔni kpǝ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto disi enso bǝ kusǝ komǝ kenke eto betidi tsylɔ lee ? ”
Lǝ sitintii , wóantɛyi nyamfo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto nsusu ǝsuǝ . Bomu fe nwǝ ni Usumunyǝ Ninǝ itǝ lɛlɛ nǝmfo esoo , Onanto áyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ nkǝ ɔtɛyi nyamfo , nnya ni katɛyikǝtsyǝ bǝ Yesu ebubǝ ukpǝ lǝ Yudafɔ kenke eto disi .
Inni bǝnkǝ lǝ ukpǝ lǝ kusǝ komǝ eto disi mate ete . Bomu bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ɔsɔ Onanto eto bebi ba kenke dísensǝ bankpo lǝ kawunsiǝ eto akpɔ akpɔ nnya kenke lebo , beyifo bani .
Lǝ nyaso ídu dinǝmfo ǝsuǝ , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bamǝ dítsyiko esu bɔbɛbɛ kase bomuǝ Yesu lǝ balo wǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Yesu ménsifo bɔyɛ kafe mmǝ lǝ Yudafɔ nti . Bomu údu úsu úsiǝ lǝ umǝbibi wǝ baakpo Efraim kaka lefi mfiminti . Mfó wonko wǝ bakasebi dísiǝ .
Lefe nǝmfoo , Yudafɔ eto Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi didife éboyo elo . Nya betidi kpǝ dítsyi kasɔ kamǝ eto akpɔakpɔ bésu Yerusalem lǝ besu bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ beyifo ǝsuǝflǝflǝ eto lekpa nǝmǝ fɛ lɛ diyididi nǝmǝ lǝ leyo .
Se bǝńyǝ lǝ Disumuyo nǝmǝǝ , bákabɛbɛ Yesu nya bákatɔ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Ntsyǝ bibu ? Nyi miǝ wǝmbofo diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ bubǝ , lee ntsyǝ ini ? ”
Lefe nǝmfóo , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Farisifɔ ébutǝ bote bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ yi kaka Yesu nkpee , lǝ ubǝ utǝ mǝ bote , lǝ besu bǝmuǝ wǝ .
Se ibu eyi akua lǝ bedi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyii , Yesu ésu Betania , kaka Lazaro wǝ Yesu létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ ditsyi .
Mfóo , banwa ditsyitsyosa bǝtǝ wǝ bǝ lǝ udi . Marta ni nwǝ lɛwunsǝko mǝ lǝ lesa nǝmǝ kedikɔ . Lazaro tsya akɛ lǝ mba ku Yesu dídi lesa nǝmǝ nti .
Mfó ǝmǝ nya Maria dífi nnuǝbi bo laanyi fififi béyifo betsyiko lǝ nnya baakpo naadi ǝsuǝ , nya bofo koya tinti eto dituntu kplɛ tɔ úsu ókpo Yesu lǝ akpa . Nya úfi wǝ disi eto sɛwɔni ɔ́si wǝ akpa . Bɔnyi fififi bomǝ éyi diyo nǝmǝ kenke .
Nya Yesu eto okasebi ɔni wǝ ni Yuda Iskariot , nwǝ luubǝ udu Yesu utǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Beso bánte nnuǝbi bomfo sika flubia alofa ǝtsyǝ befi atabi nyamǝ bǝtǝ bakombo ? ”
Fɛɛ inni lǝ kase Yuda dífi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ bakombo eto asa eso ɔtɛyi nyamfo nko . Bomu uyu uni . Wǝ ɔflɔ atabi eto otobe dítsyǝ , nya úkeyu atabi nyamǝ eto ǝtsyuǝ kǝlǝkǝ kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Beyani wǝ kpoo . Bitǝ lǝ uyifo lesa nǝ woofo buyifo kǝtsyǝ itǝ mɔ kǝbikǝ .
Bakombo kpe lǝ mi ɔflɔ lefe saa . Fɛɛ mɔɔ , mǝmɔɔkɛ lǝ mi ɔflɔ lefe saa . ”
Se Yudafɔ kpǝ lɛnɔ bǝ Yesu kpe lǝ Betania , béti wǝ bésu mfó . Nya inni Yesu mate eso bésu mfó , bomu lǝ bǝnyǝ Lazaro wǝ Yesu létakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ tsya .
Lǝ nyaso besumunyǝ ninǝ átsya béfi nsusu bǝ boolo wuntsya .
Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ Lazaro ǝsuǝ esoo , Yudafɔ kpǝ lǝ kesumu bɔni kǝtǝnko Yesu kama .
Se kale dísiǝ , betidi eto ditsyukpa kplɛ nǝ díbǝ Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ kedikɔɔ , ánɔ bǝ Yesu lɛ Yerusalem bubǝ .
Nyaso béfi katodi nya bésu bǝ baatsyako wǝ . Bákafa katɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Hosiana ! Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto ! Bɛtɛsǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ ! Atɛsǝ itǝ Israelfɔ eto Oka ! ”
Yesu ǝnyǝ ɔflimubi utsyuǝ nya úsiǝ lǝ wǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ ,
“ Biante sikpi mi Sion eto umǝ eto betidi ! Nyǝ fǝ Oka nsi lǝ ɔflimubi ǝsuǝ ɔnlɛ bubǝ ! ”
Tutɛɛ , wǝ bakasebi mánnɔ nyamfo kasɔ . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Onanto díkatakasǝ Yesu utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ ku dibuu , nya fɛ bákloma bǝ nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ etsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya nnya ni asa nyamfo kenke béyifo bǝtǝ wǝ nɛ .
Betidi ba díńyǝ mfó fɛ Yesu lékpadi Lazaro útsyiko kudi kafo lǝ ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝǝ , ésu bátɛyi lesa nǝ díbǝ mfó .
Nyamfo esoo , betidi kpǝ ésu bátsyako wǝ , itsyise bánɔ ayanisa nnya úyifo óte eso .
Mfó Farisifɔ bamǝ lɛtɛyi mǝ bǝtsyuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bebe , kulesa anlɛ bɔlɛkɛ kǝtǝ bo ! Binyǝ biǝ kawunsiǝ kenke édu bésu bǝtǝkǝko wǝ ! ”
Grikifɔ bǝtsyuǝ tsya akɛ lǝ betidi ba dísu Disumuyo lǝ Yerusalem lǝ diyi nǝmǝ kedikɔ nti .
Bésu Filipo wǝ dítsyi Betsaida lǝ Galilea ɔflɔ , nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boanto , bola boǝ boǝnyǝ Yesu . ”
Filipo ésu ɔ́tɛyi Andrea nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ dídu bésu bátɛyi Yesu .
Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe nǝmǝ eboyo bǝ babesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ eto diye kato .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ lǝ banto lentabi nǝmǝ lǝ kasɔ dibuu , lentabi lɔɔni ete disi diudi . Fɛɛ lǝ dibuu , nya fɛ diɔnwɔ ebibi kpǝ nɛ .
Utidi wǝ lela wǝ kosate eto nkpǝǝ , ebonyansǝ mu . Fɛɛ nwǝ dikisi wǝ kosate eto nkpǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , ebɔlɔ mu utsyǝ itǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Utsyuǝ saa ke lela nkǝ weeyifo mɔ keyifoo , ele bǝ utǝkǝko mɛ , itǝ bǝ mɔ uyifoyofo ǝmǝ ebusiǝ lǝ kaka minsi . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke ni mɔ uyifoyifoo , mɔ Anto ebokpe wǝ dibu .
“ Mɔmɔɔ , ɛlɛ mɛ bulǝ lǝ mɔ lɛkɔɛsi . Fɛɛ be ko ele bǝ ntɛyi ? Bɔtɛyi ele bǝ ntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Nto , mǝntǝ lǝ kanyi kamfo eto okle lǝ kǝtǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ lee ’ ? Owo lo ! Fɛɛ nyamfo eso mímbǝ kawunsiǝ , bǝ lǝ nnyǝ kanyi kamfo eto okle nɛ .
Nyaso Nto , tǝ lǝ babesǝ fǝ diye kato ! ” Nya ɔkɔɛ lɛbɔ utsyi kato nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mbóbesǝ ni kato koko . Nya nsi muuyifo nko . ”
Se betidi ba dińyǝ mfo lɛnɔ ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝǝ , mǝ bǝtsyuǝ átɛyi bǝnkǝ ɔsɔmi uni díkumi . Nya bǝtsyuǝ lɛtɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ ni lɛtɛyi wǝ lesaatsyuǝ . ”
Mfó Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Inni mɔ eso ɔkɔɛ ǝmfó lɛbɔ , bomu mi eso .
“ Mɔmɔ ni lefe nǝ Onanto lookponko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi lekpo . Nya Onanto luutu kawunsiǝ kamfo eto ǝsuǝalenyǝ lǝ wǝ seka ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ betsyi mɛ lǝ kasɔ babesǝ katoo , muunǝ betidi kenke mboko mɔ ɔflɔ . ”
Lefe nǝ Yesu lɛtɛyi nyamfoo , óte ukpǝ wǝ eto okle wǝǝbǝ bukpǝ .
Mfó nya sitiditu siamǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bo kɔfi eto kukue lɛ bo bɔtɛyi nkǝ , Utidi Wǝ Bákpo Ɔhile Bǝtsyuǝ ebusiǝ nkpǝ isu manlo manlo . Nya ntsyǝ ibǝ fɛ fanlɛ bɔtɔyi fǝnkǝ boobesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ kato ? Owoe ni Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ mfo ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Diyǝnde nǝmǝ si diɔkɛ lǝ mi nti itǝ lefe sɛkɛ ete . Se diyǝnde nǝmǝ nsi nkpe mi lenti esoo , bɛyɛ bɛtɔ , bǝ lǝ kale lǝ kayɛ mi bolo lǝ bidufǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Itsyise nwǝ laayɛ lǝ ketuntuu , ante kaka ɔntɔ .
Nyaso se lekpasǝ nkpe lǝ mi ntii , befo lekpasǝ nǝmǝ bɛnɔ bǝ lǝ biyifo lekpasǝ eto betidi . ” Se Yesu lɛtɛyi mǝ nyamfo ólosǝǝ , údu lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ úsu ɔbiɔ .
Ite bǝ Yesu éyifo ayanisa kpǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi óte tsyaa , bámfo wǝ bánɔ .
Fɛɛ nyamfo ǝbǝ itǝ nko , bǝ lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya eto lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe léfo ditiki nǝ bɔ́tɛyi ɔnɔ ? Nya owoe Bonamute ǝmǝ dílǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale óte ? ”
Lǝ nyamfó eso bámfo bofo kanɔ , itsyise Yesaya esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mba mǝ ǝnǝmi nya míninǝsǝ mǝ , bǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛyɛ asa bunyǝ . Nya lǝ mǝ nsusu lǝ bɔyɛ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ . Itǝ bǝmbɔtsyi bawuninsǝ befi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ mɛ , bǝ lǝ ntsya mǝ bufi . ”
Yesaya átɛyi nyamfo itsyise úbunyǝ Yesu eto diyǝnde kokoko , nya údi etiki utsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ ite nko tsyaa , Yudafɔ eto beninǝ kpǝ áfo Yesu banɔ . Fɛɛ lǝ Farisifɔ bamǝ eso baamfo etiki nyamfo budi kabɔsǝǝ lekple betidi nɔ , bǝ lǝ bayɛ mǝ bola lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ eso .
Baala bǝ baafo betidi eto atɛsǝ enso atɛsǝ nya ditsyi Onanto ɔflɔ .
Nyaso Yesu édi etiki ófa bembembe ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke laafo mɛ kanɔɔ , inni mɔ mate ete ófo ɔ́nɔ . Bomu ófo nwǝ létsyese mɛ tsya ɔ́nɔ .
Nya utsyuǝ saa ke lǝǝnyǝ mɛɛ , ǝǝnyǝ nwǝ létsyese mɛ tsya .
Mbǝ kawunsiǝ fe lekpasǝ , nya utsyuǝ saa ke léfo mɛ ɔnɔɔ , ensiembɔkɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ bio .
“ Lǝ utsyuǝ aanɔ mɔ ditiki nya weentsyue ni koto , mǝmbolo wǝ dikpi , itsyise mǝmbǝ miǝ maalo kawunsiǝ eto betidi dikpi . Bomu mbǝ miǝ lǝ mmfo ntǝ mǝ .
Utidi wǝ kee lɛni mɛ nya wámmfo mɔ ditikii , kpe nwǝ lookponko wǝ lekpo . Etiki nya míndii , nya lookponko wǝ lekpo lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝmǝ nɛ .
Nyamfo eyifo sitinti itsyise mántɛyi kulesa lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Bomu mɔ Anto wǝ létsyese mɛɛ , léte mɛ lesa nǝ ele bǝ ntɛyi ku kase ele bǝ ntɛyi ni .
Nya nnyi miǝ wǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝǝtǝ nkpǝ manlo . Nyaso lesa nǝ kee míntɛyii , ni ni lesa nǝ Anto ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ ntɛyi nɛ . ”
Ibu diyi lɔni fɛ lǝ bedi Ukpǝ Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ . Yesu áte nkǝ wǝ lefe éboyo bǝ udu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo usu wǝ Anto ɔflɔ . Úkala mba ni wǝ bale lǝ kawunsiǝ mfo , nya óla mǝ sitinti isu ese taa kalosǝkɔ .
Yesu ku wǝ bakasebi akɛ lǝ lesakedikɔ ku ditsyitsyo nǝmfó . Olo ǝmǝ ébusu údufǝ lǝ Yuda wǝ ni Simon Iskariot eto ubi eto nsusu nkǝ lǝ udi wǝ okpe lǝ udu Yesu utǝ wǝ balo .
Yesu áte nkǝ wǝ Anto éfi ǝsuǝale saa útǝ wǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Uyi nkǝ útsyi Onanto ɔflɔ nya usinkli ɔntɔ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
Nyaso ótaka lǝ lesakedikɔ kamǝ nya úlǝkǝ wǝ awubunte kplɛ nnya kato útsyǝ nya úfi sebo ótsyasɛ lǝ nkɛ .
Úkuti ntu ókpo lǝ ɔkpɛ kplɛ utsyuǝ kafo nya útsyiko wǝ bakasebi bamǝ eto akpa buflǝ , ákasi nnya ku sebo sia ótsyasǝ lǝ nkɛ .
Se éyo Simon Petro ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́tɔ Yesu nkǝ , “ Bonamute , buflǝ fǝǝbǝ mɛ akpa lee ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Amannɔ tɔ lesa nǝ minlɛ buyifo mfo eto kasɔ , fɛɛ kamaa , ǝbɔnɔ nnya kasɔ . ”
Simon Petro ǝtǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kulefe ! Mǝmbutǝ kusu miǝ lǝ ǝflǝ mɔ akpa kulefe . ” Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ mǝmflǝ fǝ akpaa , nyalɛ ensiembuyǝ kedikɔ lǝ mɛ . ”
Simon Petro átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , nyalɛ mǝmflǝ mɔ akpa mate , bomu flǝ mɔ ani ku mɔ disi tsya ! ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa ke díkǝflǝ ntuu , ole . Nya weensihiã bǝ uflǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bio , nnya lehiã ete ni bǝ uflǝ akpa . Itsyise wǝ kalebe saa ebole koko . Mi ǝsuǝ ébole , fɛɛ inni mimblɛ . ”
Yesu fe úyi nwǝ lǝǝbǝ wǝ bokpe lǝ ani , nyaso ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Inni mimblɛ kenke lele . ”
Se Yesu díflǝ mǝ akpa ólosǝǝ , úsinkli úfi wǝ awu ókpe , nya úsinkli úsu úsiǝ lǝ kasɔ lǝ kedikɔ kamǝ . Mfó nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ bakasebi bamǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛnɔ lesa nǝ mínyifo mi mfo eto kasɔ ?
Biakpadi mɛ biǝ Oteasa ku Onamute , nya ɛflɔ bǝ bekpadi mɛ nko . Itsyise wǝ mini nɛ .
Mɔ , nwǝ ni mi Onamute ku Oteasa ébuflǝ mi akpa . Lǝ nko inii , ele bǝ mi tsya flǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ eto akpa .
Ditsyǝbi dini mínyifo mínte mi , bǝ mi tsya lǝ biyifo fe kase mínyifo mínte mi .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti miǝ uyifoyifo mamɔ oso wǝ Onamute . Nko ke ini bǝ ɔtɔyɛ mamɔ onso nwǝ lékpe wǝ kɔtɔ .
Se binyi sitinti siamfo esoo , Onanto ebokpo mi atsyɔ lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ sitintisu ǝsuǝ biyifo asa !
“ Inni mimblɛ eto etiki minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo . Nyi mba mínlǝkǝ lǝ mi nti . Fɛɛ ele bǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto etiki bǝ itǝ fe kase báwɔni nnya bǝtsyǝ , ‘ Utidi wǝ lékpe kɔni lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni ku mɛ búdi lesaa , wǝ ni nwǝ létaka úńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ . ’
“ Nlɛ mi nyamfo bɔtɛyi katɔnsǝ fɛ lǝ ibǝ ibǝ , bǝ lǝ ibǝ ibǝ nko sitintii , biofo bɛnɔ biǝ Mɔ ni Nwǝ Mini .
Sitinti ini minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ke lefo utidi wǝ míntsyesee , mɔ ófo . Nya utsyuǝ saa ke léfo mɛɛ , nwǝ létsyese mɛ uni ófo . ”
Se Yesu lɛtɛyi etiki nyamfo ólosǝǝ , ílǝ wǝ tinti lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Nya ɔ́tɛyi ókpasǝ nkǝ , “ Sitinti minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mi nkǝ , mi nti eto ɔni ebudu mɛ utǝ . ”
Mfó nya Yesu eto bakasebi bamǝ dítsyi bawuninsǝ bábe mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto ǝnǝmi itsyise íyifo mǝ yaa , nya bánte mǝ nti eto nwǝ Yesu nlɛ .
Bakasebi bamǝ eto ɔni wǝ Yesu laala tintii , ǝsiǝ ɔfi Yesu .
Lǝ nyaso Simon Petro áma ǝnǝmi ókpe okasebi ǝmǝ , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Tɔ wǝ futsyǝ ɔnlɛ . ”
Nyaso wuntsya étsyue kɛnyɛ lǝ Yesu ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ buɛ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe ni futsyǝ ? ”
Mfó nya Yesu dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ muubudi lesa nto kutu ntǝǝ , wǝ uni nɛ . ” Lǝ nyaso Yesu ébudi lesa sɛkɛ úfi óto kutu nya úfi útǝ Yuda wǝ ni Simon Iskariot eto ubi .
Kase Yuda lefo lesa nǝmǝ koo , Obonsam ko dídufǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Mfó nya Yesu lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kɔse mlǝ lǝ eyifo lesa nǝ faala fǝ eeyifo . ”
Fɛɛ bafɛfɛ ba nsi lǝ lesakedikɔ mfó mánnɔ kasɔ lesa nǝ eso Yesu lɛtɛyi Yuda nko .
Mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ébu bǝ se ini Yuda díkalɛ mǝ otabitobe esoo , bɔtɛyi Yesu nlɛ wǝ nkǝ usu oya bikǝ bia boohiã itǝ mǝ diyisɛɛ nǝmǝ eto budi oboko lee usu utǝ bakombo lesatsyuǝ .
Nya se Yuda léfo lesa nǝmǝ koo , ete ɔ́bɔ údu . Kǝtsyǝ tsya idi lefe nǝmfó .
Se Yuda dídu eto kamaa , Yesu átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔɔ , bábesǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ eto diye kato . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bábesǝ Onanto eto diye kato .
Lǝ bábesǝ Onanto eto diye kato ɛyɛ lǝ Utidi Eto Ubi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ Onanto ebulǝkǝ Utidi Eto Ubi eto diyǝnde nǝ ǝsuǝ onkpe ote . Nya wuuyifo nkomǝ mɔmɔ mfoti .
“ Mɔ bebi , mensiembusiǝ lǝ mi ɔflɔ ɛklɛ bio . Biɔbɛbɛ mɛ , fɛɛ nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi mɔmɔ fe kase míntɛyi Yudafɔ eto beninǝ léfee miǝ , ‘ Kaka mintɔɔ , biembofo mfó bubǝ . ’
“ Nya mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ mi kɔfi fɔfɔ butǝ . Bela mi bǝtsyuǝ ! Kase minla mii , mi tsya la mi bǝtsyuǝ nko ke .
Lǝ bela bǝtsyuǝǝ , betidi ba tã ebɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bate bǝ mɔ bakasebi bini . ”
Simon Petro átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , se fantɔ ? ” Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Kaka mintɔɔ , embofo mɛ butǝkǝko kesu mɔmɔ . Fɛɛ kamaa , ebutǝkǝko mɛ ǝbǝ mfó . ”
Petro átɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , beso mǝmbofo fǝ butǝkǝko mɔmɔ kesu ? Muukpǝ lǝ fǝ disi faa ! ”
Mfó Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Ebofo bukpǝ sitinti lǝ mɔ disi fɛ ? Sitinti , nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi miǝ , fɛ ukusɛ luutǝ kɛnyɛɛ , ǝbɔni mɛ sitsyǝ , fǝ enyi mɛ kon . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Biǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ mi lǝ lɛkɔɛsi . Fe kase béfo Onanto bɛnɔɔ , befo mintsya bɛnɔ .
Lǝ mɔ Anto eto diyoo , nsiǝkɔ kpǝ kpe . Ntɔ lǝ nsu nlɔ nsiǝkɔ ntsyǝ mi . Nya mǝmbɔtɛyi mi nko , lenni nko ini .
Nya lǝ nsu nlɔ nsiǝkɔ ntsyǝ ntǝ mi nlosǝǝ , muusinkli mbǝ nkpa mi nsuko mɔ ɔflɔ , itǝ bǝ kaka minkpee , lǝ mi tsya lǝ bisiǝ mfó .
Biyi kusu ko ntɔ lǝ kaka mintɔ . ”
Toma átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , bunyi kaka fantɔ . Nya ntsyǝ buuyifo bote kusu ko bɔɔyɛ bubǝ fǝ aflɔ ? ”
Yesu ǝtǝ wǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni kusu komǝ , sitinti siamǝ ku nkpǝ bomǝ . Kuutsyuǝ saa embubǝ Anto ǝmǝ ɔflɔ lǝ woanyɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Yesu átɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔmɔ ǝmǝ bimfi biinyi mɛɛ , bíote mɔ Anto ǝmǝ tsya . Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , bifi biyi wǝ nya bíkǝnyǝ wǝ tsya . ”
Filipo átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Bonamute , te bo Anto ǝmǝ ete imi bo . ”
Yesu átɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Filipo , kokooko ǝmǝ minkpe mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ete binyi mɛ tɔ ? Nwǝ ke díkǝnyǝ mɛɛ , ǝnyǝ mɔ Anto ǝmǝ tsya nɛ . Ntsyǝ eso fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , ‘ Te bo Anto ǝmǝ ’ ?
Filipo , nyalɛ ámamfo ánɔ fǝ nkpe lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nya wuntsya nkpe lǝ mɛ ? Etiki nnya míntɛyi mii , mentsyi mɔ kosate ɔflɔ . Anto wǝ nkpe lǝ mɛɛ , leeyifo wǝ kosate eto keyifo .
Befo mɛ bɛnɔ lǝ ntɛyi mi minkǝ , nkpe lǝ Anto ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , nya wuntsya nkpe lǝ mɛ . Lǝ biamfo bɛnɔɔ , befo bɛnɔ lǝ ayanisa nnya meeyifo mate eso .
