Nya bákpo kudu bembembe bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Boǝnyǝ lesa bua saa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ! Nya lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ditsyuǝ nye Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe utsyuǝ nlɛ wǝ etiki budinkoo , be lebia lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ? ”
Mfóo , etiki eto kǝnǝ kamǝ ǝbǝ kakɛ ale tinti . Nyaso bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ ǝmǝ áte sikpi nkǝ boonǝ Paulo bésense nyasoo , ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bamamanyǝ nkǝ bakpa wǝ besu beti bakpe lǝ Aba eto diyo .
Nya diyi nǝmfo eto ntsyǝntii , Bonamute ǝbǝ Paulo ɔflɔ nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Paulo , kpe utu ! Fe kase fǝńyǝ fédi mɔ ditiki nǝmǝ eto adansiɛ lǝ Yerusalem , nko ke fuuńyǝ edi ni lǝ Roma tsya nɛ . ”
Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ áka ntamu bǝnkǝ bǝǝmbudi lesa nye bǝnǝ ntu isu ese lefe nǝ eto lefe balo Paulo !
Nya betidi bamfo ebuyifo fe betidi fosi ana ku kama .
Nya bésu besumunyǝ ninǝ kenke ku mǝ batɔnkotɔnko ɔflɔ nya bésu bátɛyi mǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Boka ntamu boǝnkǝ boembudi nye bunǝ kulesa isu ese lefe nǝ boolo Paulo .
Lǝ nyaso mi ku bakponkpo tɛyi bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko bǝ lǝ okpa Paulo oboko katsyakɔ mfó . Biyifo fenkǝ bela biǝ bisi biatɔ wǝ etiki nyamǝ eto lekpasǝ . Nya lǝ bakpa wǝ balɛ bobokoo , lǝ bolo wǝ lǝ kusu . ”
Nya se Paulo eto utitabo lɛnɔ etiki nya kenke bátɛyi mfo esoo , útsyǝtsyi úsu Aba eto diyo kaka bákpe Paulo nya úsu úyu ɔ́tɛyi wǝ etiki nya bátɛyi .
Nyaso Paulo ákpadi omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ díńyǝ lǝ mfó nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Kpa okosobi ǝmfo esuko mi ununǝ ɔflɔ . Ɔyɛnko ditiki kekleke nkǝ lǝ ɔtɛyi wǝ . ”
Lǝ nya esoo , omamanyǝ ǝmǝ ákpa okosobi ǝmfo úsuko mǝ uninǝ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Paulo wǝ bákpe lǝ diyo mfo lekpadi mǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ nkpa dikpefi nǝmfo mboko fǝ ɔflɔ lǝ ɔtɛyi fǝ ditiki ditsyuǝ nǝ ɔnyɛnko . ”
Nyaso bamamanyǝ ninǝ kenke eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo ákɔbe okosobi ǝmfo lǝ kɔni nya ókpa wǝ usuko lɛkpɔ nya ɔ́tɔ wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fanyɛnko fǝ atɛyi mɛ ? ”
Nya ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ákle kɛnyɛ ku mǝ beninǝ bǝnkǝ bǝǝbǝ balɛ fǝǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ akpa Paulo aboko katsyakɔ mfó kusɛɛ ku nsusu bǝ lǝ batɔ wǝ etiki ǝtsyuǝ .
Fɛɛ mamfo mǝ etiki , itsyise mǝ betidi fe awosi ana ku kama ǝbɔbiǝ lǝ kusu komǝ kala wǝ kusu . Betidi bamfo akle kɛnyɛ bǝ boolo Paulo fɛ boodi lesa nye bǝnǝ ntu . Nyaso balɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ ɛɛyɛ lǝ fǝ . Boomuǝ ǝsuǝ besu babiɔ lǝ kusu mfo , itsyise balɛ kusu bobe bǝ ǝbɔtɔnɔ ǝtǝ mǝ nko . ”
Bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo ǝkǝ wǝ ato nkǝ , “ Mǝntǝ lǝ kutsyuǝ saa lǝ usi ɔnɔ ditiki nǝ fátɛyi mɛ mfo blɛmblɛ ! ” Nya útǝ okosobi ǝmfo kusu dídu .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , omamanyǝ ninǝ ǝmfo ákpadi wǝ beninǝ inuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Bɛbɛbɛ bamamanyǝ alofa ǝnuǝ ba luusu Kaisarea mmi ku kǝtsyǝ abombo ɔwɔnɔmbɛ . Bɛbɛbɛ betidi alofa ǝnuǝ ba tsya luutsyi afle ku betidi fosi akuanse ba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ batɔmini .
Bitǝ Paulo batɔmini lǝ usiǝ lǝ bekpa wǝ bɛyɛnko buɛ bisuko Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ Felike ɔflɔ . ”
Nya ɔ́wɔni kukue kutsyuǝ nkǝ befi besuko unyɛsiǝ ǝmǝ nkǝ ,
Kukue komfo etsyi mɔ Klaudio Lisia ɔflɔ nya minlɛ ko bufi katsyese fǝ Boote kplɛ Felike minlɛ fǝ busiǝsǝ .
Yudafɔ dímuǝ utidi ǝmfo nya yoofo budi bǝ bala bǝ baalo wǝ fɛ mintǝ bamamanyǝ miǝ bafo wǝ , itsyise nnɔ bǝ Romanyǝ uni .
Nyaso nkpa wǝ nsuko mǝ katsyakɔ bǝ lǝ banɔ lesa nǝ uyifo .
Nnyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo minkǝ nnya eso bǝmuǝ wǝ mfo yɛ lǝ mǝ Yudafɔ eto afi ǝsuǝ nya inni bota kebu bo eso ele bǝ bakpe wǝ lǝ diyo nye balo wǝ .
Lǝ lefe nǝ utsyuǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ ǝnkǝ balɛ disi bubu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ balo wǝǝ , lamfolamfo mbu disi minkǝ lǝ nkpa wǝ mboko fǝ ɔflɔ nya lǝ ntɛyi mba wǝ ku mǝ lɛkɛ etiki miǝ befi kabua ka uyifo baboko fǝ ɔflɔ .
Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamfó eyifo lǝ lesa nǝ bátɛyi mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso ketsye kamfóo , bákpa Paulo báyɛnko taa Antipatri .
Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , bamamanyǝ ba nyɛ lǝ akpa ésinkli bésu Aba eto diyokakpekɔ mfó , nya bǝtǝ mba lǝǝsiǝ lǝ batɔmini bǝ bayɛnko Paulo besuko Kaisarea .
Se bésu bédufǝǝ , bákpa Paulo ku kukue ko bǝtǝ mǝ mfo bésu bǝtǝ Aba eto Unyɛsiǝ ǝmǝ .
Nya lǝ lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ kukue komǝ boklaa , ɔ́tɔ Paulo kaka útsyi . Se ɔ́nɔ nkǝ Paulo etsyi Kilikiaa ,
usi ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Muudufǝ lǝ fǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ nnɔ nya kukɔnɔ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayo lǝ fonko betidi ba lɛkɛ etiki mfó ǝbǝ . ” Nya usi útǝ wǝ bamamanyǝ ba ńyǝ mfó nkǝ bákpa Paulo besu beti bakpe lǝ diyo nǝ Oka Herodes léto lǝ bakase wǝ .
Eyi anɔ eto kamaa , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Ananias ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku mǝ Otsyiami wǝ bákpo Tertulo ǝbǝ Kaisarea . Bǝbǝ Felike ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ babɔ wǝ kabua ka Paulo nlɛ buyifo .
Nya se bákpadi Pauloo , Tertulo ákpe kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bo Ububutidi , lefe kpǝ ni nǝmfoo , diyuǝ akɛ bo lenti ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ kobe ku bote butsyue bo fefi fanyɛnko bo eso . Nya bunyǝ boǝ bɔtsyikawuninsǝ sɛɛ kpǝ tsya ǝbǝ lǝ bo kasɔ mfo kenke .
Nyamfo eso bo Yudafɔ kenke lɛ fǝ ani bɔsɔ .
Nya bɔlɛ fǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ boǝ lǝ bɔyɛ fǝ lefe bobiasǝǝ , lǝ etsyue ato anɔ etiki nya boǝbǝ bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ osani ǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
“ Se bunyǝ wǝǝ , bunyǝ boǝ uyifo nwǝ laakpe bulǝ , nya woatsyilama kafe lefe saa akabiasǝ Yudafɔ eto nsusu lǝ kalebe saa lǝ kasɔ kamfo kenke bǝ lǝ bǝnǝ asa bua baboko lǝ bǝnyǝ Aba lǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝ ni ditsyukpa nǝ baakpo Nasaretfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko .
Nya búnyǝ tsya boǝ úkatsyilama kéyifo asa nnya dítǝ bǝ ókpe bo Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo kɔfiɔ fɛ búmuǝ wǝ . Bola boǝ eni boeyifo wǝ lesa nǝ díńyǝ itǝ asa bua nnya uyifo úńyǝ lǝ bo afi ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko ninǝ Lisia díbǝ ɔ́lɛ wǝ ófo , nya útǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ wonko mba lǝkǝ etiki bǝ lekpo eti lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi .
Nyaso ebofo wǝ bɔtɔ lǝ anɔ lǝ etiki nnya bɔ́tɛyi mfo eyifo sidia . ”
Nya Yudafɔ bamǝ kenke lɛkɔ bédi adansiɛ bátɛyi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ nnya kenke Tertulo lɛtɛyi bǝ iyifo ɔnukualɛ .
Nya lefe nǝ Aba eto unyɛsiǝ emfo diyifo Paulo kɔni nkǝ udi etikii , Paulo ǝtsyǝ kasɔ nkǝ , “ Anto , nnyi miǝ fǝ ni futsyuǝ laakpo akpo lǝ Yudafɔ nti alɛ kpǝ ni nyamfo . Lǝ nyaso iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ bǝ ndi etiki nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi .
Yuuyifo fǝ bote bǝnkǝ iyifo fe lefosi eyi ǝnuǝ ni nyamfo se mímbǝ Yerusalem mímbǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó bǝ lǝ ntǝ kedi .
Nya kuutsyuǝ mǝnyǝ se bonko kuutsyuǝ nlɛ etiki bunǝ nye mínkpe bulǝ saa lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo mfó nye lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ tsya nnye lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ kafo .
Nya betidi bamfo eto kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo kulesa bunyǝ kate sitinti , bǝ etiki nnya bátɛyi mfo eyifo sitinti .
Nyaa , ditiki nǝ ǝsuǝ mɔɔtɔnɔ ku mǝ ni bǝnkǝ nńyǝ lǝ boantomǝ eto Onanto eto bofokanɔ eto kusu ko mǝ bǝnkǝ iyifo ditsyukpa nǝ nńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nnya ni bǝ mmfo Moses eto kɔfi nnɔ kekleke ku asa nnya báwɔni bákpe lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto ekue ǝsuǝ .
Mfi ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ fe kase mǝ tsya dífi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ bǝ betidi ba kenkee , bǝ basɛɛ ku babua tã ebotaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mfi mɔ ǝsuǝale kenke nkpe bǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ nsusu nte lǝ nkpa lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto ku betidi kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
“ Alɛ kpǝ ni nyamfo mensikɛ lǝ Yerusalem . Nya misinkli mimbǝ miǝ mufi ǝtǝsa ntǝ bakombo ba ni mɔ kosate eto betidi nya lǝ ntǝ Onanto kedi tsya .
Lǝ lefe nǝ mínyifo disikpinkpi eto lekpa mínlosǝǝ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ ǝbǝ bǝnyǝ mɛ lǝ Disumuyo mfó . Nya bonko mba laakpo kudu kakpe bulǝ saa mányɛ . Nya mɔ ǝmǝ tsya mánkpe bulǝ saa .
Yoofo budi bǝ Yudafɔ ba ditsyi Asia eto kasɔɔ , mǝ ele bǝ bebǝ fǝ ɔflɔ . Nya lǝ mɔ ku mǝ kpe etiki ǝtsyuǝǝ , nnya boolǝkǝ batɛyi nɛ .
Nnye betidi ba nsi mfóo , yoofo budi bǝ bɔɔtɛyi asa bua nnya eto dikpi nǝ bálo mǝ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ eto bakponkpo ninǝ ba lɛkɛ mfó fɛ bákponko mɛ lekpo .
Enso ditiki nǝ mímbesǝ ɔkɔɛ kato míntɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ míńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi minkǝ , ‘ Mbǝ katsyakɔ mfo lǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ minkǝ mfo nnɔ minkǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ si bootaka betsyi ɔkɔmǝ bǝbǝ ’ eso békponko mɛ lekpo ? ”
Nyaso Felike wǝ nyi kusufɔfɔtsyɔntsyɔ eto ditsyukpa nya ófo ditiki nǝmfo ɔ́nɔ tintii , átɛyi Yudafɔ bamfo nkǝ , “ Bisinkli bɛyɛ isu ese lefe nǝ bamamanyǝ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko kplɛ Lisia luubǝ fɛ lǝ nla ditiki nǝmfo nlǝkǝ . ”
Nya útǝ kusu nkǝ omamanyǝ ninǝ kpa Paulo usu okpe lǝ diyo . Fɛɛ balɛ wǝ ola kukɔnɔ , lǝ bǝtǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ ba luubǝ bǝ bǝǝnyǝ wǝ nnye baboko wǝ asaa , kusu .
Lǝ eyi asiani ǝtsyuǝ eto kamaa , Felike ku wǝ usiǝ Drusila wǝ ni Yudanyǝ ǝbǝ , nya útǝ nkǝ bakpa Paulo baboko , nya údi mǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo eto bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lefe nǝ unsi ɔnlɛ asa kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mǝ itsyi lǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ ku ǝsuǝ ola bɔlɛ ku Onanto eto lekpo kponkpo nǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ kama kamaa , sikpi alɛ Felike tinti . Mfóo , nya Felike lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Taka lǝ edu . Nya lǝ nsi nkɛ lefe sɛɛ , muutǝ bakpadi fǝ bǝtǝ mɛ . ”
Nya se úbu nkǝ Paulo ebuyifo nte butsyuǝ utǝ wǝ esoo , úkakpe nkǝ bákakpadi wǝ lefe saa lǝ wonko wǝ lǝ bǝkǝdi etiki lǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Lǝ alɛ ǝnuǝ eto kamaa , bǝlǝkǝ Felike bédunko nya báboko Porkio Festo lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . Nya se Felike lɛbɛbɛ nkǝ Yudafɔ la wǝ asa esoo , útǝ kusu nkǝ Paulo si ɔkɛ diyo nǝmǝ mfó .
Eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kama se Festo díbǝ údufǝ lǝ wǝ sininǝ kedikɔɔ , údu lǝ Kaisarea úsu Yerusalem .
Mfó nya besumunyǝ ninǝ ku Yudafɔ eto beninǝ lɛtɛyi wǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Paulo ǝsuǝ . Nya bálɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ
okpa Paulo oboko Yerusalem . Nya mǝ nsusu ni bǝnkǝ bɔɔbiɔ bǝsǝkǝ wǝ lǝ kusu . Nya lǝ ubǝ ɔlɛ bofee , lǝ balo wǝ .
Nya Festo lɛtɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Paulo labe lǝ diyo lǝ Kaesarea . Nya mintsya luubǝ mfo lefe kliminti eto kama .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ mi beninǝ lǝ bǝbǝ mfó lǝ bǝbǝ bǝlǝkǝ kabua ka úyifo bate . ”
Lǝ eyi mflamfla nye lefosi eto kamaa , Festo ésinkli úsu Kaesarea . Se kale dísiǝǝ , ókpadi Paulo eto lekpo nǝmfo .
Nya se Paulo díbǝ údufǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfóo , Yudafɔ ba ditsyi Yerusalem ǝbǝ bǝńyǝ bátsyilama wǝ nya báwe etiki kpǝ bǝtǝkǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ nya bámfo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate ɔnukualɛ wǝ nkpe lǝ nnya .
Paulo édi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ményifo kabua saa nta Yudafɔ eto kɔfi nye Disumuyo nye Okankplɛ Kaisare eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ mbu . ”
Nya se Festo léla nkǝ lǝ Yudafɔ la wǝ asa esoo , ɔ́tɔ Paulo nkǝ , “ Ala fǝnkǝ eesu Yerusalem lǝ nsu nkponko fǝ lekpo nǝmǝ mfó ? ”
Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Owo . Iyifo mɛ kusutǝtǝ bǝnkǝ kasɔ kamfo eto Okankplɛ Kaisare kosate kponko mɛ lekpo nǝmfo . Fǝ kosate yi sitinti fǝnkǝ manta kɔfi sa mbu nyifo kabua sa lǝ Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyifo lesa nǝ díńyǝ itǝ bǝ balo mǝǝ , mɔɔtɔnɔ miǝ balo mɛ ! Fɛɛ lǝ mánta kɔfi saa mbuu , yembutǝ kusu bǝ fǝ nye utidi bamba lǝ ufi mɛ utǝ betidi bamfo lǝ balo . Lǝ nyaso mfi mɔ etiki nlɛ butsyǝ lǝ Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ǝnǝmi ! ”
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Festo ku wǝ beninǝ álɛ etiki nyamǝ bábe nya ɔ́tɛyi Paulo bǝnkǝ , “ Se féfi fǝ etiki fanlɛ Okankplɛ Kaisare butǝ esoo , ebusu Okankplɛ Kaisare eto ǝnǝmi . ”
Lǝ eyi ǝtsyuǝ eto kamaa , Oka Agripa ku wǝ ɔyimisio wǝ baakpo Bernike ǝbǝ Festo ɔflɔ lǝ Kaisarea bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ bǝsiǝsǝ .
Bǝsiǝ mfó eyi kpǝ nya Festo dífi Paulo eto etiki ɔ́tɛyi Oka ǝmfo nkǝ , “ Osani utsyuǝ labe lǝ Aba eto diyo mfo , nya Felike léyani utsyǝ .
Lefe nǝ mínsu Yerusalem , besumunyǝ ninǝ ku mǝ batɔnkotɔnko átɛyi mɛ etiki nnya bála bǝtǝkǝ wǝ , nya bátɛyi mɛ bǝ ntǝ kusu lǝ balo wǝ dikpi .
“ Nya mínlǝkǝ kasɔ mínte mǝ miǝ Romafɔ eto kɔfi mǝntǝ kusu bǝ balo utidi dikpi fɛ lǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo . Ele bǝ bǝtǝ wǝ kusu lǝ wǝ ku betidi ba lɛkɛ etiki lǝ batsya batɛyi nya fɛ lǝ balo wǝ dikpi .
Lefe nǝ bǝbǝ mfo lǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , mintsya mémfi nnya ntsyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nnya kǝsiǝsǝ eto olesiǝǝ , ntǝ miǝ bakpa osani ǝmfo baboko mɔ lekpokakpokɔ .
Fɛɛ etiki nnya béfi lɛ wǝǝ , menyifo etiki bua nnya mímbu miǝ nnya boofi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Asa nnya bátɛyi mfó eyifo etiki nnya ditsyi lǝ mǝ kafokanɔ ku utidi wǝ baakpo Yesu wǝ díkpǝ , nya Paulo , wǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ okpe nkpǝ ǝsuǝ !
Iyifo mɛ basaa nya mante kase mɔɔyɛ nla etiki nyamǝ . Lǝ nyaso ntɔ Paulo lǝ woola nkǝ woefi ditiki nǝmǝ usuko Yerusalem lǝ usu ulǝkǝ etiki nyamfo kɛnyɛ lǝ Yerusalem mfó .
Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi nkǝ óla nkǝ woefi wǝ etiki usuko Okankplɛ Kaisare lǝ udi , lǝ nyaso ntǝ miǝ beti wǝ bakpe lǝ diyo isu ese lefe nǝ mootsyese wǝ Okankplɛ ǝmǝ ɔflɔ . ”
Nya Oka Agripa lɛtɛyi Festo nkǝ , “ Nla miǝ mɔ kosate lǝ nnɔ wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ . ” Nya Festo lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ɛbɔnɔ ditiki nǝmfo kusɛɛ ! ”
Nya se kale disiǝǝ , Oka Agripa ku Berenike álɔkɔ ku bekankǝ bǝbǝ lekayo nya bédufǝ lekpokakpokɔ mfó . Nya bamamanyǝ ku umǝ ǝmǝ eto beninǝ dítǝkǝko mǝ bǝǝbǝ . Nya Festo dítǝ ǝsuǝale nkǝ bakpa Paulo baboko .
Nya Festo lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Oka Agripa ku mi mba kenke díbǝ bétsya mfo , osani ǝmfo ni utidi wǝ Yudafɔ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem ku Kaisarea mfo kenke tsya léla bǝ balo !
Fɛɛ lǝ mɔ nsusu ǝsuǝǝ , wényifo kulesa nǝ dítǝ bǝ balo wǝ dikpǝnkpi . Fɛɛ wǝ ǝmǝ tsya nkǝ úfi wǝ etiki útǝ bo Okankplɛ . Nya mintsya mánni nko .
Fɛɛ be ni lesa nǝ ele bǝ nwɔni ntǝ bo Okankplɛ ǝmfo ? Itsyisee , wényifo tɔ kabua saa mǝ . Lǝ nyaso nkpa wǝ mboko mi ku fǝ Oka Agripa titlu , minkǝ lǝ bidufǝ lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ lǝ bete mɛ ditiki nǝ ele bǝ nwɔni ntsyese wǝ .
Itsyisee , yanlɛkɛ bǝ nkpa nwǝ bákpe lǝ diyo ntsyese kasɔ kamfo eto Okankplɛ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe mǝnnyǝ kabua ka úyifo ka mɔɔwɔni ntsyese wǝ . ”
Nya Agripa lɛtɛyi Paulo nkǝ , “ Kusu kpe bǝ di fǝ etiki . ” Lǝ nnya esoo , Paulo ábesǝ wǝ kɔni kato nya údi etiki ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Bo Oka Sɛɛ Agripa , disi ɛkpɛ kpe mɛ mmi bǝ moofo mɔ ditiki bulǝkǝ kate lǝ fǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ nnya eso Yudafɔ dífi etiki lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise nyi miǝ fǝǝ , eyi Yudafɔ eto kǝnǝ ka nkpe lǝ mǝ nti ku mǝ akpa kenke kukɔnɔ . Nyamfo esoo , minlɛ fǝ lekpakpa nɛ . Kpe utu lǝ anɔ mɔ etiki ǝtǝ mɛ .
“ Yudafɔ kenke yi kase mínlɛ mɔ ǝsuǝ ola idu lǝ mɔ sikpefi lefe lǝ mɔ umǝ ku lǝ Yerusalem tsya .
Lǝ bɔɔtɛyi ɔnukualɛɛ , nko seka mísiǝ nkpǝ fe Farisinyǝ itsyi taa mɔ sikpefi lefe nɛ . Nya Yudafɔ eto afi ku akpa kpe ale eso nsumu bamba saa eto ale kenke .
Lǝ nyaso ete béfi etiki nyamfo banlɛ butǝkǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ lǝ kase mińyǝ minlɛ kusu bobe itǝ kɛnyɛ ka Onanto lɛtɛyi bo bana mǝ utsyǝ eso .
Israelfɔ eto lefosi atobi ǝnuǝ nnya kenke lǝ bokplatsya kekleke kǝtsyǝ ku kakɔmi bǝ lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bǝnyǝ kusu ko minlɛ bobe mfo . Bo Oka Sɛɛ , nyamfo eso Yudafɔ nlɛ mɛ kɛnyɛ bola kǝtǝkǝ mɛ etiki lǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Beso ele bǝ ilǝ bǝ mi mba nkpe mfo kenke fo bɛnɔ biǝ Onanto aatakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ?
“ Lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , mfi nnya ntǝkǝ lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ miǝ muuyifo lesa saa nǝ moofo lǝ nńyǝ lǝ Yesu wǝ ni Nasaretnyǝ eto mba ntǝkǝko wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Yudafɔ eto besumunyǝ ninǝ ǝtǝ mɛ ǝsuǝale bǝ mmuǝ betidi kɛnkɛ kpǝ nkpe lǝ diyo lǝ Yerusalem . Nya mba bálo lǝ mǝ nti tsyaa , íyifo mɔ lelabi bǝ ibǝ nko
Ntǝkǝko mǝ nya mínkpɔ mǝ nya mínte mǝ ohiã ɛyɛ isu kǝmǝ bamba ka letsyo kulaa tsya . Nya míntǝ miǝ beyifo mǝ asafimfi lǝ Yudafɔ eto ntsyakɔ kenke . Nya míńyǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ ku lɛblɔfi miǝ bedi mbusiotiki nnya dińyǝ lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
“ Nko eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ minkɛ minyɛ mintɔ lǝ Damasko ku ǝsuǝale fe kase besumunyǝ ninǝ dítǝ mɛ .
Bo Oka Sɛɛ , kase minyɛ kusu lǝ kakɔmi eto lefosi ǝnuǝ lefee , nnyǝ diyǝnde nǝ lekpa lenso mfenti eto kofe ditsyi kato nya lékpo létsyilama bonko mba nyɛ bɔntɔ .
Nya mfó se bomblɛ dídu bɔ́nɔɔ , nnɔ ɔkɔɛ utsyuǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto sele ǝsuǝ nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Saulo , Saulo , beso fǝńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nko ? Lǝ áta biyu kokpaa , fǝ kosate ete loofo lefabe . ’
“ Nya míntɔ wǝ minkǝ , ‘ Bonamute , owoe fe ni ? ’ “ Nya ɔkɔɛ ǝmǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Mɔ ni Yesu wǝ fanlɛ bɔkpɔnko kekleke .
Mɔmɔɔ , taka ǝńyǝ ! Se mínkǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ mínte fǝ esoo , muufi fǝ nyifo mɔ uyifoyifo . Ɛbɔtɛyi kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lesa nǝ fǝnyǝ mfo ku asa nnya muukǝlǝkǝ nkate fǝ .
Nya kaka minlɛ fǝ botsyesee , moose fǝ , nlǝkǝ fǝ ntsyiko lǝ fǝ betidi ku lǝ bele bamba tsya nti .
Muutǝ asini mǝ ǝnǝmi nnya luutǝ bǝ ebulǝkǝ mǝ etsyiko lǝ Obonsam eto ǝsuǝale ku ketuntu ka bankpe ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bafo Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ku diyǝnde nǝ ǝsuǝ onkpe banɔ . Bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mǝ abua ɔtsyɛ mǝ itǝ bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ kǝsiǝkɔ kato fe mba úlǝkǝ óboko wǝ akɔ báfiani mba úlǝkǝ utsyǝ itsyise báfo mɛ bánɔ eso . ’
“ Lǝ nyasoo , Oka Agripa , nyamfo eso mányɛ buyifo lǝ nnya Onanto dílǝkǝ óte mɛ itsyi kato ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Ntsyiko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ budi kate Damaskofɔ lǝ nnya kama Yerusalemfɔ , lǝ nnya kama Yudafɔ kenke ku mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya miǝ besinkli lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ lǝ befi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Onanto , lǝ bate lǝ mǝ asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ bǝ bátsyi báwuninsǝ sitinti .
Nyamfo eso Yudafɔ dímuǝ mɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto Disumuyo nɛ . Nya bála bǝ eni baalo mɛ .
Fɛɛ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ mǝ ani . Nyaso minsi minkpe nkpǝ minlɛ adansiɛ nyamfo budi kate mi beninǝ ku betidi kenke tsya nɛ . Lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfoo , nnya tututu ni nnya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku nnya Moses lɛtɛyi bǝ yuubǝ itǝ nɛ .
Nnya ni bǝ Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ebubǝ unyǝ kanyi . Nya wǝ ni utidi tutɛ wǝ lootaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ ubǝ , nya wǝ luunǝ diyǝnde oboko Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kenke . ”
Lamfolamfoo , Festo áfa ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Paulo , disi ábia fǝ ! Fǝ sikuente kplɛ siamǝ ábiasǝ fǝ disi ! ”
Nya Paulo lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Ububutidi Festo , disi mambia mɛ . Biemfi ditiki nǝmfo fe ayɛtiki . Etiki tinti minlɛ bɔtɛyi .
Sitinti , Oka Agripa yi etiki nnya minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo . Nyaso minlɛ wǝ etiki budinko ku utu faa nɛ . Mfo nnɔ miǝ nyamfo eto kulesa menyifo wǝ akulasa , uyi nnya lesa saa .
Oka Agripa , áfo nnya Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi ánɔ ? Nyi miǝ áfo mǝ ánɔ . ”
Nya Agripa lɛtɔ Paulo nkǝ , “ Ala fǝ ntsyi nwuninsǝ mfiani Ukristonyǝ lǝ lefe kliminti nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ? ”
Nya Paulo dítǝ mbuayɛ nkǝ , “ Lefe kliminti dini o-o , lɛkɛntsyɛ dinii , nlɛ ola boto mmi minkǝǝ , mi mba nkpe mfo kenke tsyi bɛwuninsǝ fe mintsya kǝ . Fɛɛ biunyǝ kanyi bakpe mi amana fe kase mɔ nlɛ bunyǝ mǝ ! ”
Nya Oka Agripa ku Festo ku Bernike ku betidi bamba bamfó kenke létaka bǝńyǝ .
Nya se bataka bábɔ lǝ mfoo , bákpe disi lǝ Paulo eto ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo menyifo lesa saa bua nǝ ele bǝ balo wǝ nye bakpe wǝ lǝ diyo . ”
Nya Agripa lɛtɛyi Festo nkǝ , “ Eni boofo wǝ boyani lenni nya úkefi ditiki nǝmfo útsyǝ Okankplɛ Kaisare lǝ ǝnǝmi eso . ”
Nya lefe nǝ báse uyi bǝnkǝ ele bǝ busu Roma lǝ Italiaa , bákpa Paulo ku mba bákpe lǝ diyo ku babamba bákpe lǝ omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ baakpo Yulio eto ani . We ni Okankplɛ eto bamamanyǝ eto ditsyukpa eto uninǝ .
Nya búfi ɔklɔ wǝ dítsyi Adramitio nya útǝ ǝnǝmi Asia eto lekpake eti . Nya bo ku Makedonianyǝ wǝ baakpo Aristarko wǝ ditsyi Tesalonika dísiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ .
Nya lefe nǝ kale dísiǝǝ , bóyo Sidon eto lekpo kɛnyɛ . Mfó Yulio dítǝ Paulo kusu kafo faa nkǝ usu umǝ lǝ usu unyǝ wǝ bayɛtsyuǝ itǝ lǝ bǝtǝ wǝ asa nnya wuufi ɔyɛ kusu .
Nya se busi búdu mfóo lǝ ɔklɔ ǝsuǝ nya lǝ kase ufiebi ǝmǝ lɛkɛ kɛnyɛ ale esoo , bɔyɛ Kipro eto Ɔnwɛdukue eti kaka bɔ́bɔ lǝ ufiebi ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya se bófe mfóo , bɔ́yɛ lǝ Kilikia ku Pamfilia eto lekpo kɛnyɛ , nya búsu búńyǝ lǝ umǝ wǝ baakpo Mira lǝ Likia eto lekpake .
Lǝ mfó omamanyǝ ninǝ wǝ nyɛnko bo ǝnyǝ ɔklɔ utsyuǝ wǝ ditsyi Aleksandria ɔntɔ lǝ Italia eto kasɔ . Nya útǝ búsiǝ lǝ wǝ .
Nya lǝ eyi kpǝ eto kamaa , ílǝ fɛ búsu bóyo umǝ wǝ baakpo Knido . Nya lǝ ufiebi wǝ nlɛ bɔsɔ kekleke esoo , bóamfo bɔyɛ kesu sɛtɔ . Nyaso se búdufǝ Salmonee , bɔ́tsyi bɔ́yɛ búsu Kreta ɔflɔ kaka kasɔ kamǝ díti ufiebi ǝmǝ eso wánkɛ kɛnyɛ ale .
Disiale fɛ bɔ́yɛ búsu búdufǝ kaka baakpo Ɔklɔ eto Kǝńyǝnkɔ ka lɛlɛkɛ ka dimensitsyo ku umǝ wǝ baakpo Lasea .
Nya se búkedi eyi kpǝ lǝ kusu ko bɔnyɛ esoo , Yudafɔ eto kɛnyɛ leklefe ébofe . Nya bɔyɛ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ebubǝ ɛkɛ ale eso . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Paulo álɛ mǝ kɔlɛ nkǝ ,
“ Boanto mǝǝ , nnyǝ minkǝ bo kusu bɔyɛ idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔ ǝbǝ ale bɔkɛ kaso , itsyise ɔklɔ ǝmfo ebudufǝ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ , nya asa kpǝ ku betidi tsya ebɔtsylɔ . ”
Fɛɛ bamamanyǝ eto uninǝ ǝmfo áfo ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto okanka ku ɔklɔ sate eto lesa nǝ bátɛyi ɔ́nɔ enso nnya Paulo lɛtɛyi .
Nyaso se ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kamǝ mánlɛkɛ itǝ lefe kentsyɛ se lɛyɔ lefe nlɛ bubǝ esoo , mba wǝ ku mǝ nyɛ kusu átɛyi bǝnkǝ bala bǝ baayɛ besu bedufǝ Foinike bomu . Mfoti ebɔlɛkɛ itǝ mǝ bɔkɛ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nǝmǝ . Itsyise Foinike eyifo umǝ lǝ Kreta eto kasɔ eto kaka kakɔlɔ kpǝ lǝǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ nnya leeti ufiebi kusu lǝ kofe eto diyo kedufǝkɔ eti .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfó ufiebi sɛɛ utsyuǝ etsyiko bɔsɔ ketsyi Ɔnwɛdikue eti , nya iyifo fe yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ kusu bɔyɛ . Lǝ nyaso bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ nya bédu báyɛ lǝ Kreta ɔflɔ .
Fɛɛ lamfolamfoo , ufiebi bua utsyuǝ ko dítsyiko bɔsɔ itsyi lǝ kodiani eto lekpake itsyi lǝ Kreta eti .
Nya ɔ́sɔ útsyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ óbesǝ kato . Bala bǝ lǝ yɔɔlɛkɛ lǝ batsyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi bawuninsǝ besuko kasɔ eti , tsya bamfo . Nyaso báyani wǝ nya ufiebi ǝmǝ lɛsɔ útsyi wǝ ɔ́yɛnko .
Nya kama kamaa , búsu búnyǝ kabiɔnkɔ sɛkɛ kǝtsyuǝ lǝ kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama ka baakpo Kauda eto kutsyǝ kɔni . Nya disiǝale fɛ bófo bo ɔklɔ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ botsyasǝ lǝ ɔkplɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ bunsi .
Nya se bǝnyǝ bǝ bulǝ saa ensibǝǝ , béfi kekuǝ bákle ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ tsya . Báte sikpi bǝnkǝ ufiebi ebɔsɔ utsyi wǝ usu okpe lǝ kota eto kɔwunimi bua ǝsuǝ lǝ Libia eto lekpo kɛnyɛ . Nyaso bábokosǝ ufiebi nto mfia bo bátsyasǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ . Lǝ nyamfo eso ufiebi ǝmǝ ǝnǝ wǝ ɔ́yɛnko .
Se kale dísiǝ fɛ ufiebi ǝmǝ dímanyɛ tɔ bɔsɔɔ , bétsyiko bikǝ bia nkpe lǝ wǝ kafo bulǝkǝ kato kakpe lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ diyi tsyǝfǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bétsyiko ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto biyifokǝ kpǝ tsya bɔsɛ kato kakpe .
Lǝ eyi kpǝ nnya dítǝkǝǝ , ufiebi ǝmǝ ásɔ kekleke isi eso itǝ bǝ bóǝnyǝ kofe nye befandebi . Nya itǝ bǝ bo kpǝ ménsibe kusu boǝ busi bɔɔkɛ nkpǝ kon !
Nya lefe kpǝ ǝbǝ léfe bankɛ kɔni bendi lesa , mfó Paulo létaka úńyǝ lǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , lǝ nnya ete bɛnɔ mɔ etikii , eni bóendu lǝ Kreta , enni asa nyamfo kenke mǝmbǝ itsyǝ bo mmǝ .
Nyaso nlɛ mi lekpakpa tinti minkǝ bekpe utu , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ebonya , fɛɛ bo kuutsyuǝ saa embukpǝ !
Itsyise kǝnǝ ku ketsyee , Onanto wǝ mbǝ mɛ ini wǝ meesumuu , wǝ ɔtɔnkpe ǝbǝ úńyǝ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi mɛ nkǝ , ‘ Paulo , mensite sikpi . Ele bǝ efi fǝ ditiki ǝsuko Kaisare ǝflɔ ! Itsyise Onanto kpe kafo ɛkpɛ , úńyǝ fonko mba nyɛ kusu kaminsǝ eso mi kutsyuǝ saa embonya . ’
Nyaso mɔ betidi , bimuǝ utu bɛlɛ ! Mfo Onanto nnɔ , lesa saa ebubǝ itǝ fe kase ɔ́tɛyi mɛ .
Fɛɛ ele bǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ su ɔsi lǝ kɔwunimi ǝsuǝ lǝ kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama . ”
Nya ufiebi dísukosǝ bɔsɔ ketinkǝsǝ bo sɛtɔ ku kama lǝ Adria eto lekpo ǝsuǝ itǝ lefosi eyi ana . Nya lǝ lefosi diyi nale eto ntsyentii , bo ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto beyifoyifo ebu bǝnkǝ bɔɔnyi bafi kasɔ kǝtsyuǝ .
Mfo nya bésusu ntu bomǝ eto letsyobi bábe , nya bǝnyǝ bǝnkǝ ntu bomǝ eto letsyobi eyifo fe akpa kolofa akpafosi ǝnuǝ . Nya se besi báyɛ bésu sɛtɔ sɛkɛɛ , besi bésusu nya bǝnyǝ bǝ ntu bomǝ eto letsyobi eyifo akpa afosi ɔwɔnɔmbǝ .
Nya se báte sikpi bǝnkǝ ufiebi ebɔsɔ utsyi ɔklɔ ǝmǝ usu ɔsɔ lǝ abansǝ ǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , báyani bitu bena bia nkpe kalende tinti lǝǝmuǝ ɔklɔ kǝńyǝnsǝ lǝ kalebe kani . Nya bǝńyǝ nya bákato ola kekleke bǝ kale lǝ kǝsiǝ mlǝ .
Nyaso se ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto beyifoyifo léla bǝ lǝ betsyetsyi bedu esoo , bǝlǝkǝ ɔklɔ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ bǝtǝkǝ lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ nya báko bátɛyi bǝnkǝ bála bǝ babe lǝ ɔklɔ kplɛ ǝmǝ eto sɛtɔ sia bákpe bitu bia nkpe kalende ebofo ɔklɔ ǝmǝ bumuǝ kǝtsyǝ .
Fɛɛ Paulo átɛyi bamamanyǝ ku mǝ uninǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ betidi bamfo mankɛ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmfo kafoo , biukpǝ . ”
Nyaso bamamanyǝ bamfo ála ukuǝ wǝ lɛkɔbe ɔklɔ kɛkɛ ǝmǝ ɔnlɛ , nya báyani wǝ bákpe lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lefe nǝ kale nlɛ busiǝǝ , Paulo álɛ mǝ lekpakpa nkǝ mǝmblɛ di lesa . Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Eyi lefosi ana nɛ se bɔkɛ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ nya mi kuutsyuǝ saa ménsifi tɔ kulesa okpe kɛnyɛ .
Lǝ nyaso nlɛ mi lekpakpa minkǝ , bidi lesatsyuǝ lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale itǝ bǝ biembukpǝ . Itsyise lɛ ɔsɔsɔ ɔni embusiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . ”
Nyaso Paulo éfi didisa , nya se ɔ́sɔ Onanto ani lǝ mǝmblɛ eto ǝnǝmi mfóo , úbudi lesa nǝmǝ ditsyuǝ údi .
Lamfolamfoo , utsyuǝ saa eto utu ǝsiǝǝ kasɔ nya mǝmblɛ dítsyiko lesa nǝmǝ budi .
Betidi ba lɛkɛ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo eyifo betidi alofa ǝnuǝ awosi akuanse ku ekua .
Nya se bédi bálosǝǝ , betidi bamǝ esi bǝlǝkǝ bidikǝ bia kenke díbu lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ kafo bákpe lǝ ntu ǝsuǝ , itǝ bǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ átaka kalende .
Lefe nǝ kale dísiǝ kakpaa , bǝnnyǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ bǝtsyǝ lekpo mfó . Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ ɔklɔ eto ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kǝtsyuǝ lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ mfó kaka beebu bǝ yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ bayɛ lǝ besu bǝńyǝnsǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ .
Nyaso bala kekue ka lɛkɔbe bitu bia lǝǝmuǝ ɔklɔ kǝnyǝnsǝ , nya bányankli kekue ka lɛkɔbe ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto nnya laate wǝ kusu lǝ ɔlɛ bɔyɛ . Nya bábesǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto mfia bo ufiebi leetsyi itǝ lǝ ufiebi ǝmǝ lǝ unǝ mǝ ɔyɛnko usuko .
Nya se báyɛ bantɔɔ , ɔklɔ ǝmǝ ésu ɔ́si lǝ kɔwunimi ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ wénsifo bɔyɛ bio . Nya se ufiebi tsya nlɛ bɔsɔ kǝkǝ wǝ kama esoo , óba úsensǝ kenke .
Nya se bamamanyǝ bamfo díbu bǝ mba bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo bamǝ ebutsyetsyi beduu , bǝlǝkǝ nsusu bǝ lǝ basɔ mǝ balo .
Fɛɛ se mǝ ɔtɔnkotɔnko ǝmfo léla nkǝ woafo Paulo lǝ nkpǝ esoo , wántɔnɔ ku mǝ . Nyaso útǝ kusu nkǝ nwǝ kee loofoo , lǝ basa bedufǝ lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bake babɔ .
Nya mba luubu tsyaa , lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ ǝmǝ eto kǝtsyǝ ku lesa nǝ kee loofo mǝ butsyi kayɛnko lǝ ntu bomǝ ǝsuǝ kabɔsǝ kesuko utuflɔ . Lǝ nyaso bomblɛ éyifo nko nya bɔ́bɔ búsu lekpo kɛnyɛ mfó , bo kutsyuǝ saa ménkpǝ .
Lefe nǝ bɔ́bɔ bófe lǝ bulǝ bomǝ ǝsuǝǝ , búsu bóte boǝnkǝ mfó ni kasɔ ka ntu letsyilama baakpo Malta .
Nya kasɔ kamfo eto betidi léfo bo kukɔnɔ . Lefe nǝmfo eyifo ɔsɔmi ku lɛyɔ lefe , nyaso bátsyaka ute kplɛ lǝ lekpo kɛnyɛ bǝtǝ bo nya báfo bo kukɔnɔ .
Nya lefe nǝ Paulo nlɛ atɔni ǝtsyuǝ bɔsɛ lǝ ubǝ okpe lǝ ute ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , owa utsyuǝ ko lɛbɔ lǝ atɔni nyamǝ nti itsyi lǝ ute ǝmǝ eto lɛyilabi eso , nya óbe ɔ́yɛ ókle Paulo eto kɔni .
Nya se mfó eto betidi dínyǝ bǝ owa ǝmfo faka lǝ wǝ kɔni ǝsuǝ , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi ǝmfo eyifo nwǝ laalo betidi . Nyaso itǝ bǝ ɔbɔ utsyi lǝ lekpo eto ukpǝ kǝmiǝ tsyaa , bo Ufiǝ ɔnukualɛ embɔtɔnɔ nkǝ usiǝ nkpǝ . ”
Nya Paulo lɛwunya wǝ lǝ wǝ kɔni ókpe lǝ ute ǝmǝ kǝmiǝ nya kulesa saa ményifo wǝ tsya .
Nya betidi ba díńyǝ banlɛ wǝ bobee , díbu bǝ wɔɔfɔ nye wɔɔsɔ kasɔ ukpǝ lamfolamfo . Nya se bǝńyǝ bábe wǝ ɛklɛɛ fɛ kulesa mǝmbǝǝ , bétsyi mǝ nsusu lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ báwuninsǝ nya bátɛyi bǝnkǝ ufiǝ utsyuǝ uni .
Nya kaka búsu bɔ́yifǝ mfóo , éyifo kasɔ ka lɛfi Oka Publio eto diyo . Nya oka ǝmfo tsya léfo bo ku disuǝyuǝ , nya óbe bo itǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ sɔ̃ɔ̃ .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfo tututu , Publio eto anto ánɔ bufi . Atikesi ǝmuǝ wǝ , nya ɔnlɛ kafo boto tsya . Nya se Paulo dísu wǝ ɔflɔ lǝ diyo nya óto ola nya úfi ani útǝkǝ lǝ wǝǝ , bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝ .
Se bánɔ bǝ bufi bomǝ áyɛ wǝǝ , befimfi ba kenke nkpe lǝ kasɔ kamǝ mǝmblɛ ábɔ bǝbǝ , nya Paulo létsya mǝ .
Nya lǝ eyifosa nyamfo esoo , bátsyɛ bo asa kpǝ . Nya se lefe léyo bǝ budu mfoo , báboko bo asa kpǝ bǝ bufi bɔyɛ kusu .
Búsiǝ mfó éfo afa ǝtsyǝ fɛ búdu . Lefe nǝ bɔnlɛ buluu , búsiǝ lǝ ɔklɔ wǝ baakpo bǝnkǝ Bafimfi Eto Bǝfiǝ wǝ dítsyi Aleksandria wǝ díbǝ úńyǝ lǝ kasɔ kamfó lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nǝmǝ mfó .
Se búdu mfóo , umǝnkplɛ wǝ búsu búńyǝ ni Sirakusa . Nya búsiǝ mfo tsya eyi ǝtsyǝ .
Se búdu mfóo , bɔyɛ búsu búdufǝ Regio . Nya se kale dísiǝǝ , ufiebi sɛɛ etsyiko bɔsɔ ketsyi bo kama wǝ lɛwunsǝko bo , wǝ lékpa bo úsuko Puteoli lǝ diyi nuǝfǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya mfóo , búsu búnyǝ mba bafokanɔfɔ bǝtsyuǝ , nya bálɛ bo lekpakpa bǝ busiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ eyi akuanse . Lǝ nyamfo eto kama se búdu mfóo , búsu búdufǝ Roma .
Nya se bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Roma tsya lɛnɔ bǝ bokpe kusu bɔlɛ bubǝǝ , bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi faa ǝbǝ bákɔ lǝ bo lǝ Apia eto asi . Nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya díbǝ bákɔ lǝ bo lǝ kaka baakpo Nsɔnɔkɔ Ntsyǝ . Se Paulo dínyǝ mǝǝ , ɔsɔ Onanto ani , nya isi ékpe wǝ nkɛale enso .
Nya lefe nǝ búsu búdufǝ Romaa , bǝtǝ Paulo kusu bǝ úsiǝ kaka woala . Nya bǝtǝ kusu bǝ bamamanyǝ bamǝ eto ɔni kase wǝ .
Lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ kamaa , Paulo ákpadi Yudafɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ba nkpe lǝ mfó kenke bǝbǝ básɔ lebo . Se bátsyaa , ɔ́tɛyi mǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ bayimi , Yudafɔ ba nkpe lǝ Yerusalem dímuǝ mɛ nya befi mɛ bésu bǝtǝ Romafɔ eto Aba bǝnkǝ okponko mɛ lekpo lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe nǝ ményifo bo Yudafɔ eto kutsyuǝ saa kulesa nye ńta bo banamǝ eto lekpa saa mbu .
Romafɔ bamfó ákponko mɛ lekpo nya bála bǝ lǝ bayani mɛ . Itsyisee , bǝnnyǝ lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ balo mɛ nye balo mɛ dikpi fe kase Yudafɔ eto beninǝ ba dimuǝ mɛ lela .
Nya lefe nǝmfo se Yudafɔ bamfó dímantɔnɔ lǝ nyamfó ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́tɔnɔ nkǝ ntɛyi mǝ lǝ nla miǝ bakpa mɛ lǝ nsu nnyǝ Okankplɛ Kaisare kosate ɔflɔ . Nya yenyifo mɔ lelabi miǝ maala bo kasɔ eto betidi kɛnyɛ .
Nyamfo eso mínkpadi mi lǝ ndiko mi etiki nɛ . Itsyise Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ ini Israelfɔ kenke eto nwǝ banlɛ kusu bobee , wǝ ni nwǝ mimfo minɔ miǝ wǝ ni nwǝ eso baakpe mɛ lǝ amana ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
Nya bátɛyi wǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Bo alɛɛ , bóamfo tɔ kulesa itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bóamfo kukue nye kɛnyɛ bua saa lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ itsyi lǝ bayimi ba dítsyi Yudea bǝbǝ bo ɔflɔ .
Fɛɛ bola boǝ boanɔ lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ lesa nǝ fáfo fánɔ mfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise sintintii , baantɛyi kulesa sɛɛ sa itsyi lǝ ditsyukpa nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ku kalebe saa . ”
Nyaso bǝtsyǝ wǝ diyi lɔni , nya betidi kpǝ díbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ . Mfo nya údi mǝ etiki itsyi lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ókpa mǝ nsusu úsuko kaka Moses ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni asa bǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ . Nya údi mǝ etiki idu lǝ olesiǝ isu ese lǝ ditsyitsyo lefe .
Nya betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mǝ nti léfo wǝ bánɔ , fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ tsya dímamfo lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi banɔ .
Nya etiki nyamfo léboko kǝnǝ lǝ mǝ nti . Nya se banlɛ busǝnsǝ keluu , Paulo átɛyi mǝ etiki fɛfɛ nǝmfo nkǝ , “ Ɔnukualɛ uni bǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛyɛ lǝ Yesaya ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi bo banamǝ bǝnkǝ ,
‘ Bisu bikatɛyi Yudafɔ bǝnkǝ , “ Biɔnɔ fɛ biǝmbɔnɔ kasɔ , nya buinyǝ nya biǝmbunyǝ fɛ bisu bete . ”
Itsyise betidi bamfo eto ketu kpe ale , nya mǝ ato etidi , nya béti mǝ ǝnǝmi tsya . Lenni nko innii , eni ele bǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi nnyǝ , nya mǝ ato tsya ebɔnɔ , nya mǝ nsusu tsya ebokpa kɛ̃ bǝ lǝ batsyi bawuninsǝ lǝ bǝbǝ mɔ ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ mɔ , Onantoo , lǝ ntsya mǝ . ’ ”
Nya Paulo lélosǝ wǝ etiki nyamǝ nkǝ , “ Ele bǝ ntɛyi mi lǝ bete biǝnkǝ , ditiki nǝ Onanto luufi ofo betidi lǝ nkpǝǝ , béfi ni bésuko mba lenni Yudafɔ . Nya mǝǝ , boofo ni banɔ ! ”

Nya Paulo lɛkɛ mfoó alɛ ǝnuǝ lǝ diyo nǝ ófo úkafó kayo , nya úkafo betidi ba kenke ba díkǝbǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Óbe Onanto eto sekakedikɔ letsya ku wǝ utu ku ǝsuǝale útǝ mǝ , nya óte mǝ asa nnya lɛyɛ lǝ Bonanto Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nya kutsyuǝ saa ménti wǝ kusu .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto uyifoyifo , nya mini nwǝ bátsyese ku Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ mbé wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ letsyaa , mɔ ni nwǝ lɛwɔni kukue komfo nɛ .
Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ ɔ́tɛyi wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ba úlǝkǝ útsyǝ nkǝ wuulǝkǝ ote kawunsiǝ fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
Katɛyiketsye kamfo etsyi lǝ Onanto eto Ubi wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Bále wǝ fe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi wǝ ni Oka David eto kafo eto ubi .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ óte betidi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nkǝ wǝ ni wǝ ubi wǝ ótakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ǝnyǝ bo kaminsǝ nya úfi bo úyifo wǝ batɔnkpe itǝ Kristo bǝ lǝ butǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi lǝ bafo wǝ banɔ lǝ beyifo wǝ lelabi .
Nya mimba nkpe lǝ Roma tsya , eyifo betidi ba Onanto lékpadi nkǝ bibǝ befiani Yesu Kristo eto bale .
Nyamfo eso minlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi mba kenke nkpe lǝ Roma nya Onanto laala mi , nya ókpadi mi nkǝ , bibǝ befiani wǝ bale nɛ . Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
Ditutɛɛ , nyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ nlɛ mɔ Onanto ani bɔsɔ lǝ mi disi , itsyise kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke ánɔ kase béfo Onanto bɛnɔ .
Onanto wǝ eto keyifo meeyifo ku kafo faa , nwǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ maabe letsya itsyi lǝ wǝ ubi ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ luulǝkǝ ote nkǝ maanta mi ǝsuǝ kulefe lǝ nlɛ ola boto nɛ .
Nya lefe saa nǝ minlɛ ola botoo , maalɛ Onanto lekpakpa minkǝ lǝ iyifo wǝ lelabii , lǝ nyǝ kusu lǝ mbǝ nyǝ mi lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
Iyifo mɔ lelabi kekleke bǝ lǝ mbǝ nnyǝ mi lǝ nwunsǝko mi lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale .
Lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo ni bǝnkǝ lǝ bokpe bo ǝsuǝ nkɛale lǝ lefe nǝmfo kemiǝ , lǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ bokpe mɛ nkɛale , lǝ mintsya lǝ nkpe mi nkɛale .
Mɔ bayimi , nla miǝ bete biǝnkǝ iyifo mɔ ketsyue lǝ lefe kpǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ , fɛɛ yǝntǝ mɛ kusu nko . Iyifo mɔ lelabi bǝnkǝ nwunsǝko betidi lǝ bafo Kristo banɔ lǝ mi nti fe kase mínyifo lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ bamba nti .
Nko eto keyifo kamfo eyifo lesa nǝ ele bǝ nyifo ntǝ utidi saa , Grikifɔ ku mba lenni Grikifɔ , ku betidi ba nyi ekue ku mba lenyi ekue tsya .
Lǝ nyamfo eso maabɛbɛ kekleke bǝ mbǝ ntɛyi mi mba nkpe lǝ Roma tsya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo .
Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto bɔtɛyi anlɛ mɛ kofani , itsyise iyifo Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nya lǝǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ laafokanɔ lǝ unyǝ nkpǝ . Yudafɔ ni betutɛ ba lɔɔnɔ fɛ mba lenni Yudafɔ lǝ bǝtǝkǝ .
Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝǝlǝkǝ kusu sɛɛ ko lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto lelabi kate . Nya kusu sɛɛ komfo etsyi lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ idu lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Lǝ fe kase báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ ke ni ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ hã luusiǝ nkpǝ nɛ . ”
Onanto ǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ lɛblɔfi itsyi taa kato kate lǝ asa nnya dińyǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ku asa bua eto eyifosa nnya leeti betidi kusu bǝ lǝ bayɛ ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ kosate bote .
Wǝǝnyǝ ɔblɔ itsyise betidi ǝǝnyǝ Onanto eto asa nnya úyifo ketsye lekpo wuee . Itsyise Onanto kosate dílǝkǝ nnya wuee óte mǝ .
Itsyise idu lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto díyifo kawunsiǝǝ , asa nnya kenke úyifo utsyǝ lǝ kee , ǝǝlǝkǝ Wǝ ǝsuǝale manlo nnya boǝnnyǝ ku wǝ ditsyǝbi boǝnnyǝ ku bo ǝnǝmi kate . Nyaso kuutsyuǝ saa bio ǝmbofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ woamfo Onanto ɔnɔ .
Ite bǝ betidi yi Onanto tsyaa , beemfi dibu nǝ dińyǝ itǝ wǝ kǝtǝ wǝ . Nya baansɔ wǝ ani tsya . Lǝ nnya kɛnyɛɛ , asa bimba eto disi ete beebu . Nsusu sɛ saa ǝmbǝ mǝ nya mǝ nsusu leena tũũ .
Nya bǝǝnyǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ fe babesibe , fɛɛ bamumu beni .
Nya baayɛ Onanto wǝ ni nkpǝ kenke busumu , kefi atɛsǝ kǝtǝ asa bimba nnya lǝmbǝ nkpǝ . Beefi asa fe utidi nye baklɔbɛ nye bebuki akpa ana nye bebuki ba laakpi lǝ kasɔ fe owa eto okle kesumu bon .
Lǝ nyasoo , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ ani , nkǝ beyifo lesa nǝ kee baala . Nya beefi mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ keyifo asinsa ku afanisa ku mǝ betsyuǝ .
Nya beefi bidiatɛyitɛyi kǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto kɛnyɛ . Bomu lǝ kedi bufi kǝtǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛɛ , beefi ke kǝtǝ asa nnya Onanto ǝmǝ díyifo . Fɛɛ Onanto kosate wǝ dińyǝ utǝ atɛsǝ lefe saa , wǝ ele bǝ besumu nɛ . Ibǝ itǝ nko .
Asa nyamfo eto okle eto buyifo eso Onanto léyani betidi bamfó nɛ , nya beeyifo asa nnya ni mǝ sinǝ eto alasa nnya lǝǝnǝ mǝ kakpe lǝ afanisa ǝsuǝ . Nya besio kulaa tsya laayani basani ketsye kesu kalabeko mǝ besiotsyuǝ nnya lanyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ .
Nya nko ke ini bǝ mǝ basani tsya laayani besio ketsye nya beeyifo afanisa nyamfo eto okle kalabeko bǝtsyuǝ fe sisǝ ku sisiǝ seka . Nya lǝ nyamfo esoo , Onanto ǝnǝ mǝ koto ko dińyǝ itǝ mǝ lǝ mǝ ditsyǝbi bua nǝ baate mfo eso .
Nya se báni bǝ bembokase asa nnya dińyǝ itǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ ani , nkǝ béyifo asa nnya dimalɛkɛ léfo mǝ nsusu kenke . Nya beeyifo asa nnya yanle bǝ beyifo .
Nya asa bua saa yifoyifo eto okle lefo mǝ nkpǝ kenke . Nya asa bua nyamǝ ni nsusu bua fifi , kunǝnkpǝ ku kabua eto bɔbɛbɛ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ . Nnya disi iyi mǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ ni kǝnǝnsɛ , betidilolo ku ekiti kpɔnkpɔ ku bidiatɛyitɛyi ku kekisi ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto ketikimadidi .
Nya beedi etiki bua kabiasǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ eto aye . Beyifo betidi ba leekisi Onanto . Baaka bǝtsyuǝ , nya baabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , nya baate ǝsuǝ . Nya baabɛbɛ kabua kǝtǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝǝmbu mǝ anto ku ambemǝ .
Beyifo betidi ba lenyi kasɛɛ lǝ kabua ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ kosate eto lesa nǝ baatɛyi tsyaa , beenyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Bakpe lefomfi nya bǝǝnnyǝ utidi kaminsǝ nya bankpe disiale .
Beeyi bǝnkǝ lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝǝ , betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ nkoo , Onanto ebolo mǝ dikpi . Fɛɛ mfe bǝǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ mǝ asa bua nyamfo buyifo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya inni nyamfo mate , bomu beekeko betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo tsya .
Nyaso , mɔ ɔyimi , fǝ nlɛ betidi bamba lekpo bokponko ? Niǝ , niǝ , niǝ inii , ǝmbofo bɔtɛyi fǝ , fǝ yɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ álo fuutsyuǝ dikpii , nko ke foolo fǝ ǝsuǝ dikpi nɛ . Itsyise asa nnya beeyifoo , nnya okle ke fintsya leeyifo nɛ .
Buyi boǝ Onanto hã ni ɔsɛɛ nya okpe ǝsuǝale bǝ okponko betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo eto okle lekpo .
Nya lǝ fǝ mɔ ɔyimi , wǝ ni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi wǝ leeyifo asa nyamfo eto kakle lɛ betidi bamba dikpi boloo , ebu fǝ ebofo butsyetsyi kedu lǝ Onanto eto lekpokponkpo ǝsuǝ ?
Nye ebu fǝ bimba ete ini bǝ Onanto leeyifo fǝ kafoɛkpɛ nya onkpe dibusǝ ku disuǝtsyǝ itǝ fǝ ? Enyi sitinti fǝ , Onanto eeyifo fǝ kafoɛkpɛ kamfo itsyise woala nkǝ woawunsǝko fǝ lǝ atsyi awuninsǝ .
Nya se fetidi ato , fáni fǝ ǝmbɔtsyi fǝ lɛkɔɛsi awuninsǝ esoo , fǝ kosate dítǝ Onanto lǝǝbǝ fǝ koto bunǝ kon lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ wookponko kawunsiǝ kenke lekpo tsyɔntsyɔ . Diyi nǝmfo nya wuulǝkǝ wǝ lefonyi ote nɛ .
Nya Onanto loobofo utsyuǝ sa kayo lǝ wǝ keyifo ka úyifo kumǝ ǝsuǝ .
Betidi ba laakpe otsyekle lǝ kasɛyifoyifo ǝsuǝ nya baabɛbɛ Onanto eto diyǝnde ku dibu ku nkpǝ manloo , Onanto ebutǝ mǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Fɛɛ betidi ba ini kǝdiǝ hã baabɛbɛ nya beentsyue ɔnuakualɛ ǝmǝ koto , nya baala asa bua buyifoo , Onanto ebunyǝ ɔblɔ okpe mǝ unǝ mǝ koto kekleke .
Betidi ba kenke difi asa buayifoyifo betsyi disii , ebudi ohiã nya boonyǝ kanyi . Yudafɔ luudi betutɛ , nya mba lenni Yudafɔ luutǝkǝ .
Fɛɛ mba leeyifo asa sɛɛ , Onanto ebutǝ mǝ kato eto diyǝnde ku dibu ku diyuǝsǝ . Yudafɔ luudi betutɛ , nya mba lenni Yudafɔ luutǝkǝ .
Itsyise Onanto ambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi fɛ woala etiki kǝlǝkǝ .
Betidi ba kenke dímante Mose eto afi fɛ béyifo abuaa , tsya ebukpǝ banya , ite bǝ Onanto embufi afi nyamǝ okponko mǝ lekpo tsyafɛ . Fɛɛ mba nyi Moses eto afi nyamǝ fɛ beeyifo asa buaa , Onanto ebokponko mǝ lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise inni betidi ba leetsyue ato kanɔ afi nyamǝ ba luudi basɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Bomu , betidi ba leeyifo lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ ni mba luudi basɛɛ nɛ .
Afi nyamfo ǝmbe mba lenni Yudafɔ , fɛɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kobetete ǝsuǝ mǝ kosate leeyifo lǝ kɔfi komǝ eto etsyuesa ǝsuǝǝ , ínwǝ efiani kɔfi itǝ mǝ ite bǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝmbǝ mǝ tsya .
Ɛlɛ bote bǝ Onanto éfi asa nnya nkpe lǝ Moses eto afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ ókpe lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ akɔɛsi tsya lɛ bote nko . Nya lefe ditsyuǝǝ , mǝ nsusu aalo mǝ dikpi nye ǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ kasɛyifoyifo kate .
Nyamfo ebubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto luutǝ kusu Yesu Kristo kponko betidi kenke lekpo lǝ asa nnya baakula lǝ mǝ nsusu kenke kǝmiǝ fe kase Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ maabe letsya nlɛ bɔɔtɛyi .
Nya lǝ aakpadi fǝ ǝsuǝ fǝ Yudanyǝ , nya faayɛ lǝ Moses eto afi ǝsuǝ , nya faabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato fǝ , fǝ eyifo Onanto eto ɔyɛtsyuǝ .
Eyi lesa nǝ Onanto laala , nya fenyi lesa nǝ ni lɛsɛ , fe kase fákase nnya lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
Eebu fǝ ǝsuǝ fe oteesu itǝ benǝmba nya feni lekpasǝ itǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ kutuntu .
Efi fǝ ǝsuǝ eyifo nwǝ leekulǝsǝ mba lenyi kobe nya faate asa mba ǝnǝ dimankpa tɔ . Eyi kukɔnɔ fǝ kobe ku ɔnukualɛ sɔ̃ɔ̃ nkpe lǝ Moses eto aafi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Beso fǝ laate betidi bamba asa , fɛ faante fǝ ǝsuǝ asa nyamǝ ? Aabe letsya fǝ benyu nya fǝ kosate enyuu ?
Aatɛyi fǝ bankpo kusiǝ nye kusǝ , fɛɛ fǝ kosate nkpǝ ? Ǝfiǝsa aalɛ fǝ sɛsi , fɛɛ eeyu asa nnya beefi kakpa wǝ .
Aabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato fǝ eyi Onanto eto afi , fɛɛ enyi fǝnkǝ , fǝǝ ke laata Onanto eto afi kebuu , ǝǝntǝ wǝ dibu ?
Lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Mi Yudafɔ eto eyifosa eso mba lenni Yudafɔ laakpadi Onanto diye bua . ”
Lǝ eeyifo lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , fǝ lelolala eyifo lesa nǝ nkpe kutǝkǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ eenyifo lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ lelolala nǝmǝ eyifo lesa bimba .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ , wǝ dímanla lelo eeyifo lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ebunyǝ wǝ fe utsyuǝ wǝ lela lelo .
Mɔmɔɔ , nwǝ lenni Yudanyǝ , fɛ weeyifo lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ebokpe kofani fǝ Yudanyǝ wǝ laata kɔfi ko báwɔni bǝtsyǝ kebu ite bǝ bála fǝ lelo tsyafɛ .
Inni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ nnya boǝnyǝ futsyǝ ni Yudanyǝ tinti . Nya lelo eto bola kosate tsyaa , enni lesa nǝ ete ńyǝ itǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto keyifo ka betidi lǝǝnyǝ ketsye lekpo futsyǝ feni .
Bomu utsyǝ ni Yudanyǝ tinti ni futsyǝ wǝ laate lǝ wǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ nkǝ úfi wǝ lɛkɔɛsi útǝ Onanto . Inni nnya lɛyɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia bála ɛyɛ lǝ kɔfikpekpe eto lekpa eto ditiki ǝsuǝ . Bomu nnya lɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ . Nnya ini kawunsiǝ eto kuutsyuǝ wǝ laabesǝ utidi ǝmfo eto diye kato , bomu Onanto .
Nya lǝ ite nkoo , nte kutǝkǝ ko Yudanyǝ wǝ bála lelo luunyǝ enso mba lenni Yudafɔ ? Nte kutǝkǝ ko nke lǝ lelolala ǝsuǝ ?
Lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , kutǝkǝ kpe . Tutɛɛ , Yudafɔ eto ani nnya Onanto dífi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ ókpe .
Fɛɛ lǝ ibǝ bǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ mámfo bánɔ ? Afo anɔ fǝ lǝ nyaso Onanto embuyifo lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ ǝsuǝ ?
Kulefe ! Lǝ ibǝ bǝ utsyuǝ saa eeyifo odia kulaa tsyaa , te fǝ Onanto eeyifo lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ . Fe kase báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lesa saa aate bǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ eto etiki eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Nya lǝ bakponko fǝ lekpoo , buutǝ fǝ lɛbɛ . ”
Lǝ bo etikididi ǝsuǝǝ , boatɛyi boǝnkǝ bo abua nnya boeyifoo , ǝǝtǝ bǝ betidi nyǝ asa sɛɛ nnya Onanto leeyifo ketsye lekpoo , ntsyǝ ini nnya tsya ? Lǝ nyasoo , bɔɔtɛyi boǝnkǝ yɛmbɔlɛkɛ bǝ Onanto nǝ bo kotoo ? Kulefe ! Fɛɛ nko bǝtsyuǝ leebu nɛ !
Nya lǝ Onanto eni nwǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝǝ , be ǝsuǝ wuunyǝ okponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lekpo ?
Bǝtsyuǝ aala bɔtɔ bǝ , “ Fɛɛ lǝ mɔ bidia bia maatɛyi ǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ɔnukualɛtiki kate wee , itǝ bǝ batɛsǝ wǝǝ , nyalɛ beso baalo mɛ dikpi bǝnkǝ utidi bua mini ? ”
Lǝ bufi nnya nkoo , boofo bɔtɛyi boǝnkǝ , “ Bǝtǝ lǝ bukeyifo asa bua lǝ asɛɛ lǝ ɛbɔ itsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . ” Fɛɛ betidi bǝtsyuǝ lɛ bo abie busǝ kaka bo , nya banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ bo bomu nlɛ etiki budi nko . Betidi ba luufi nnya nkoo , bǝńyǝ itǝ bǝ Onanto lo mǝ dikpi .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , be boofo bɔtɛyi lǝ bomba ni Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ ? Bɔtɛyi bɔnlɛ boǝ bo ale alɛkɛ eso mba lenni Yudafɔ eto alee ? Kulefe ! Itsyise mɔ́tɛyi ntɔnsǝ koko minkǝ kabua ébudi Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ kenke tsya ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise nyamfo eto okle báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ bǝ wǝ eyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Lɛ ɔni kplo ǝmbǝ !
Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ wǝ lǝǝnyǝ kasɛɛ kǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa tsya ǝmbǝ wǝ laayɛ lǝ Onanto eto kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
Betidi ba kenke etsyi kama bakpe Onanto , nya mǝmblɛ kenke ébota bébu . Nya kutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ wǝ leeyifo kasɛɛ . Lɛ ɔni kplon ǝmbǝ !
Mǝ akuɛlonlobi eyifo fe kudi ko lɛsini kɛnyɛ kunte . Nya mǝ kadiakami ńyǝ itǝ bidia bɔtɛyi . Nya mǝ nyɛ eyifo fe owa eto keni .
Nya mǝ nyɛ kenke diyi ekudi ku kalo kpinikpini .
Mǝ akpa aataka mlǝ mlǝ lǝ utidi eto bolo ǝsuǝ .
Bensi nkpǝ sɛɛ saa nya ini kanyinyǝnyǝ hã bǝǝnǝ kaboko .
Nya benyi kase ele bǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya mǝ ditsyǝbi ante bǝ baate Onanto sikpi . ”
Mɔmɔɔ , buyi boǝnkǝ lesa saa nǝ bátɛyi lǝ Moses eto afi ǝsuǝǝ , bátɛyi nnya bǝtǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ afi nyamǝ kalɔ , bǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔyɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ , bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke kakɛ lǝ Onanto eto lekpokpo eto kalɔ .
Nyasoo , kuutsyuǝ saa embuyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ eso . Bomuu , lesa nǝ afi nyamfo leeyifo ni bǝ yǝǝlǝkǝ kate utidi nkǝ uyifo obuayifo .
Fɛɛ kusu ko ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úlǝkǝ óte nkǝ betidi eyifo basɛɛ , mányɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ . Afi ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝlǝkǝ nyamfo báte wuee .
Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ betidi ba léfo Kristo bánɔɔ , yifo basɛɛ . Úyifo nyamfo útǝ betidi ba kenke léfo Kristo bánɔ . Nya wóankpe kabakefe lǝ betidi nti .
Betidi baa tã eyifo kabua , nya bánnyi báfi Onanto eto diyǝnde blɛmblɛ kon .
Fɛɛ Onanto , ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu wǝ léfo kayo lǝ bo disi ǝtǝ nkǝ bofiani basɛɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ eso .
Onanto éfi Yesu útǝ fe kedi lǝ bo abua eto disi . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ befi bo abua batsyɛ lǝ bofo Kristo banɔ ko . Onanto éyifo nyamfo lǝ ufi ote bo nkǝ wǝ eyifosa yɛ lǝ kusu sɛ ǝsuǝ . Ɔkɛ dibusǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ , nya úfǝsɛ ǝnǝmi úti betidi eto abua nnya béyifo .
Úyifo nyamfo nkǝ lǝ ote bo lefe nǝmfo nkǝ wǝ kosate eyifo nwǝ diyifo ɔsɛɛ , nya weebu nwǝ léfo Yesu ɔ́nɔ tsya nkǝ wuuntsya eyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
Nya be ǝsuǝ boofo buńyǝ kasɔ lɛkɔɛsi ? Bumbǝ kulesa ! Bǝ boayɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ eso lee ? Owo , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto laalɔ bonko wǝ eto nti .
Itsyise buyi wuee boǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ bo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nya utidi laafiani ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , nya inni lǝ wǝ bɔyɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝ eso .
Nyee , Yudafɔ hã ete ni Onanto eto bale ? Nya unni mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya eto Onanto ? Ee , uyifo mǝ tsya eto ole .
Onanto ɔni kplo nkpe . Wǝ luubu Yudafɔ nkǝ beyifo basɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nko ke eso wuubu mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya basɛɛ , ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nyaso be nyamfo nlɛ bote ? Bote ɛnlɛ bǝ bóyani afi nyamǝ butsyǝ bǝ lǝ bofokanɔ lǝ bofo busiǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ ? Kulefe ! Inni nko , bomu bǝ lǝ bɔlɛ afi nyamǝ lǝ kɔni kekleke .
Be ni lesa nǝ boofo bɔtɛyi ketsyiko lǝ bo Ona Abraham ǝsuǝ boǝ únyǝ utsyǝ lekpo itsyi lǝ ditiki nǝmfo ǝsuǝ ?
Lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo ka úyifo ǝsuǝ eso Onanto dínyǝ nkǝ Abraham eyifo ɔsɛɛ , nyalɛ okpe keńyǝnkɔ woofo bɔtɛyi nko kasɔ lɛkɔɛsi . Fɛɛ umbǝ kǝńyǝnkɔ nko lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , itsyise inni Abraham eto keyifo inni únyǝ .
Itsyise lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue kemiǝǝ , bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Abraham áfo Onanto ɔ́nɔ . Lǝ nnya eso Onanto ǝnyǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ . ”
Lǝ utsyuǝ eyifo keyifoo , wǝ kayofofo eni atsyɛsa , bomu iyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ wǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo kamǝ eto kɛnyɛ .
Fɛ lǝ utsyuǝ afo ɔnɔ nkǝ Onanto eeyifo utidi wǝ laante wǝ sikpi woafiani ɔsɛɛ , lǝ wóenyifo keyifo saa tsyaa , fɛ ini lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto eefi wǝ fe ɔsɛɛ .
Nko eso Oka David lɛtɛyi nkǝ utidi wǝ Onanto dibu nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ , fɛ yányɛ lǝ wǝ keyifo ka úyifo esoo , uyifo utidi wǝ baakpo atsyɔ . Oka David átɛyi nkǝ ,
“ Onanto ákpo atsyɔ betidi ba úfi mǝ abua ɔ́tsyɛ , nya úlǝkǝ mǝ utsyiko lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
Onanto ákpo atsyɔ utidi wǝ eto abua Bonamute dímanwɔni útsyǝ wǝ blɛmblɛ . ”
Nya atsyɔkpokpo eto etiki Oka David lɛtɛyi mfoo , mba léla alo ete luunyǝ ni nnya ? Kulefe ! Eka mba dímanla alo tsya , itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Abraham áfo Onanto ɔ́nɔ , nyaso Onanto léfo wǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ nɛ . ”
Nya dimamfe ini Onanto dínyǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ nko ? Lefe nǝ Abraham dímanla tɔ lelo lee , lee lefe nǝ úkala lelo eto kamaa ? Inni lǝ lefe nǝ óla lelo . Bomu fɛ wóla lelo .
Lelolala eto lekpa nǝ Abraham díyifo mfóo , eyifo lekpotsyǝtsyǝ nǝ laate bǝ Onanto áfo wǝ . Itsyise wǝ bofokanɔ ǝtǝ bǝ Onanto áfo wǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ fɛ óla lelo . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Abraham afiani mba léfo bánɔ kenke eto anto . Nya Onanto áfo mǝ nkǝ beyifo basɛɛ lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bánla lelo kulaa tsya .
Abraham eyifo anto itǝ mba bála alo tsya . Fɛ inni fe kase bála alo eso , bomu bǝ besi nkpǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ fe kase Boanto Abraham dísiǝ fɛ óla lelo eso .
Onanto átɛyi kɛnyɛ utsyǝ útǝ Abraham ku wǝ kafo eto bebi nkǝ boodi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ fe benake . Wǝ kɛnyɛ ka ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ mfo manka kase Abraham lɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝ eso . Bomuu , ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ nko itsyise ófo Abraham fe ɔsɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ eso .
Nya lǝ ite bǝ mba leeyifo lǝ afi ǝsuǝ loofo Onanto eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ eto asaa , nyalɛ bofokanɔ mensi fe itǝ , ete kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ tsya ensi ǝmbɔkɛ nɛ .
Itsyise afi ǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kate . Fɛ lǝ afi ǝmbǝǝ , nyalɛ kɔfi botakebu tsya ǝmbɔkɛ .
Lǝ nyasoo , kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ kamfo aka bafokanɔfɔ nya ini kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ itǝ Onanto eto betidi nya ini wǝ lefonǝ nǝ úfi útǝ betidi ba kenke ni Abraham eto kafo eto betidi . Nya inni mba Onanto dítǝ afi mate hã ete ni wǝ kafo eto betidi . Bomu mba léfo bánɔ tsya fe Abraham . Itsyisee , Abraham eyifo mba léfo bánɔ kenke eto anto .
Nya fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyii , “ Mfi fǝ ntsyǝ ese kpǝ eto anto . ” Nya kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ kamfo díbǝ itǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Onanto ǝmfoo , wǝ Abraham léfo ɔ́nɔɔ , kpe ǝsuǝale itsyise wǝ lootakasǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ besinkli bǝbǝ nkpǝ . Nya wǝ lǝǝtǝ asa nnya dímankɛ kɔ lǝǝbǝ kakɛ !
Ite bǝ kusubebe si kɔkɛ tsyaa , Abraham esi úkabe kusu kokoko , nkǝ woofiani ese kpǝ eto betidi eto anto fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ kafo eto bebi tsya ebufui kpenkpenkpe fe befandebi . ”
Abraham ébobe ófo fe alɛ kolofa . Fɛɛ ani mánlo wǝ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ , ite bǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ébobe efe nya únyǝ nkǝ útǝkǝ lǝ nkpǝ eto kotosi nya Sara tsya ébobe ófe ku bole .
Fɛɛ nyamfo mánlo wǝ ani lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Bomu ɔ́kɔbe Onanto eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ɔ́lɛ kekleke , nya ókpe nkɛale lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ bomfo ǝsuǝ nya úfi atɛsǝ útǝ Onanto .
Nya óte wuee nkǝ Onanto kpe ǝsuǝale woofo lesa nǝ ke ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ buyifo .
Nya lǝ bofokanɔ bo lɛkɛ wǝ esoo , Onanto ǝnyǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ .
Nya inni wǝ mate ǝsuǝ ete báwɔni etiki nyamfo betsyiko bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto ǝnyǝ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ . ”
Bomu eka bomba tsya Onanto dínyǝ nkǝ bo tsya eyifo basɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ kase bófo Onanto wǝ létakasǝ Bonamute Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ bɔ́nɔ eso .
Onanto ǝtǝ kusu bálo Kristo lǝ bo abua nnya búyifo eso . Nya Onanto létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ bǝ lǝ wǝ Onanto lǝ unyǝ bo basɛɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , se Onanto díyifo bo basɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ bo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto ǝtǝ diyuǝ édufǝ bonko wǝ nti ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Nya se bófo Kristo bɔnɔ esoo , útǝ nkǝ bofo Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpe mɔmɔ . Nya bɔnlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ sitinti , itsyise bɔlɛ kusu bobe boǝ buunyǝ kesiǝkɔ lǝ Kristo ɔflɔ lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , boǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ bɔlɛ kanyi bunyǝ itsyise buyi boǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ kamfo eto okle lǝǝtǝ boǝńyǝ kekleke nɛ .
Nya bo buńyǝ kekleke , ǝǝtǝ bo ditsyǝbi sɛɛ . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ bunyǝ kusubebe .
Nya kusubebe komfo ǝntǝ boedi kofani . Itsyise Onanto áyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ útǝ bo ǝsuǝ útǝ nkǝ wǝ lelabi ba didufǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ kenke .
Lefe nǝ diyifole saa dímensi fo bo bɔkɛɛ , Kristo ǝbǝ lǝ lefe sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nya úbǝ úkpǝ lǝ bo babuayifo eto disi .
Mɔmɔɔ , iyifo lesa nǝ nkpe ale bǝ utsyuǝ kpǝ lǝ utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ eto disi . Fɛɛ yoofo budi bǝ utsyuǝ ebofo bɔtɔnɔ nkǝ lǝ ukpǝ lǝ utidi wǝ lɛlɛkɛ eto disi .
Fɛɛ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ óte bo wuee kase woala bo . Itsyise lefe nǝ bɔ́kɛ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝǝ , útǝ nkǝ Kristo kpǝ lǝ bo disi .
Nya se ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo eto kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ nya úyifo bo basɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmii , ukpǝ ǝmfo ebulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kplɛ ǝsuǝ eso .
Nya lǝ Onanto álɔ bonko wǝ nti ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ubi eto ukpǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ búyifo wǝ balontidi mfóo , nyalɛ lefe nǝ bonko wǝ eto nti díkalɛkɛɛ , Onanto ebunyǝ bo kaminsǝ , úlǝkǝ bo kulaa tsya oso itsyise Kristo kpe nkpǝ .
Nya inni nyamfo mate ete , bomu buunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti ku wǝ itsyise Onanto kosate , ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo wǝ Onanto álɔ bonko wǝ eto sete nti eso .
Lebua áyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝsuǝ díbǝ kawunsiǝ , nya lebua nǝmǝ dínǝ ukpǝ léboko kawunsiǝ . Nyamfo esoo , ukpǝ lǝǝbǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise utsyuǝ saa éyifo lebua .
Lebua akɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ fɛ Onanto dítǝ bo Moses eto afi . Fɛ lǝ kaka afi lǝmbǝǝ , Onanto anlo utidi dikpi .
Fɛɛ idu lǝ Adam lefe ibǝ Moses eto lefee , ukpǝ ákaso ani kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi ku mba dímǝnyifo lebua fe kase Adam díyifo se wényifo lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝ . Nya Adam ǝmfo ńyǝ itǝ utidi wǝ lǝǝbǝ bubǝ .
Fɛɛ mǝ inuǝ bamǝ menyifo bani . Itsyise Onanto eto kafo faa eto etǝsa so Adam eto lebua nǝ úyifo . Adam ni utidi ɔni wǝ eto lebua nǝ úyifo eso betidi kpǝ díkpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ amɔ leso nya nko ke ini wǝ kafo faa eto ǝtǝsa itǝ betidi kpǝ tsya ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝsuǝ nɛ , nya wǝ ni Yesu Kristo nɛ .
Nsi nlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ku asa nnya lɛbɔ itsyi abua nnya utidi ǝmfo díyifo mankate . Itsyise abua dinǝ lekpokponkpo ku dikpilolo eboko nɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ botakebu kpǝ eto kamaa , Yesu eto lefonǝ ǝtǝ bǝ betidi eyifo basɛɛ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝmfo eto lebua ǝsuǝ nya ukpǝ dítǝkǝ betidi kato nɛ . Nko ke ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , nya betidi ba kenke dínyǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ díyifo mǝ basɛɛ , bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ku sekakedidi enso kenke nɛ .
Nyasoo , se ɛyɛ lǝ lebua lɔni nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ bálo betidi kenke dikpii , nko ke yɔɔyɛ lǝ kasɛɛ kani ǝsuǝ Onanto luufi ɔtsyɛ betidi nya wuutǝ mǝ lɛbɛ nɛ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ kase utidi ɔni ǝmfo létaka úńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ditiki ǝsuǝ nya betidi kenke lefiani babuayifoo , nko ke ɛyɛ lǝ kase utidi ɔni ǝmfo dítsyue wǝ ditiki kotoo , Onanto ebutǝ betidi kpǝ fiani basɛɛ nɛ .
Se afi nyamǝ díbǝǝ , itǝ bǝ betidi ǝnyǝ mǝ abuayifoyifo bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nya se bǝnyǝ mǝ abua kpǝ nyamǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpoo , nko ke Onanto eto lefonǝ nye kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ka úfi útǝ bo tsya leefui kakpe nɛ .
Nyaso kase lebua dítǝ ukpǝ dídi betidi ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke ini bǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ebutǝ bǝnkǝ bofiani basɛɛ lǝ budufǝ lǝ nkpǝ manlo ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ busukosǝ bukeyifo abua bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ukǝtǝ bo wǝ lefonǝ kawunsǝǝ ?
Owo lo ! Kulefe ! Se búkpǝ itǝ lebua esoo , yensile bǝ butǝ lebua di bo ketu ! Beso ele bǝ busi busiǝ nkpǝ ekeyifo lebua ?
Lefe nǝ bófo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ buyifo bani ku wǝǝ , biyi biǝ ntu bo bǝflǝsǝ bo mfo ǝtǝ bǝ búyifo lɔni ku wǝ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ tsya .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ bomǝ esoo , ete bǝ bo tsya ǝkpǝ nya bébikǝ bo ku wǝ . Nya Onanto lɛyɛ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ku ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ ótakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ botaka busiǝ nkpǝ fɔfɔ bomǝ ku wǝ .
Nya se bonko wǝ díkeyifo bani lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke buyifo bani ku wǝ lǝ wǝ botaka ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nya buyi boǝ básɔ bo ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ku Kristo itǝ bǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia laala abuayifoyifo lǝ sɛtsylɔ kenke bǝ bɔyɛ ndomufɔ budi kǝtǝ lebua bio .
Itsyise lǝ utidi ǝkpǝǝ , lebua ensiǝmbokɛ ǝsuǝale lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bio .
Nya lǝ búkpǝ ku Kristo , bófo bɔ́nɔ boǝ buusiǝ nkpǝ ku wǝ tsya .
Buyi boǝ se Onanto létakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , woensiǝmbukpǝ bio . Ukpǝ ensibǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ bio .
Kristo eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝǝ , úkpǝ itǝ sɔni hã bǝ lǝ lebua ensiembutǝkǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kato . Nya nkpǝ bo unsi mɔmɔɔ , usi mu ku Onanto .
Nya nko ke ele bǝ itsyǝ nɛ bǝ , mi tsya ǝkpǝ nya yanle bǝ lebua si ditǝkǝ mi kato . Nyaso ele bǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ bitǝ Onanto lǝ mi lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso biǝntǝ lǝ lebua fo lekpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia lǝǝbǝ bukpǝ mfo ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ lǝ sitǝkǝ mi kato lǝ asa bua buyifo ǝsuǝ .
Nye biǝntǝ kusu lǝ abua lǝ idi mi utu lǝ ǝsuǝ eto uyi eto kukalebe saa lǝ lebuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomu bifi mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto fe betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ kemiǝ óboko nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Beyani mi ǝsuǝ eto kalebe saa bitǝ Onanto fǝnkǝ mba bǝlǝkǝ betsyiko ukpǝ kɛnyɛ baboko nkpǝ . Beyani mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto lǝ ufi mi uyifo asa sɛɛ eto keyifo .
Yanle bǝ lebua si ditǝkǝ mi kato bio diyifo mi eto onamute , itsyise binsibǝ lǝ afi kalɔ . Bomu bekpe lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ kalɔ .
Nya be bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ? Bǝ bunsibǝ lǝ afi kalɔ itsyise bokpe lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ kalɔ eso , nyaso ele bǝ bukeyifo abua ? Owo lo . Inni nko ini !
Biyi sintinti biǝ , lǝ bifi mi ǝsuǝ bekpe lǝ nwǝ eto keyifo bieyifo kalɔɔ , nyalɛ biyifo utidi ǝmǝ eto beyifoyifo nye ndomufɔ . Lǝ lebua eto sele bianɔɔ , nnya laabɔ ketsyiko mfó ni ukpǝ . Lǝ Onanto eto sele bianɔɔ , nya laabɔ ketsyi mfó ni kasɛɛ yifoyifo .
Boasɔ Onanto ani , bǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bíyifo babuayifo , nya mɔmɔɔ , bifi mii lɛkɔɛsi kenke béfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mínte mi .
Nya bɛbɔ lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ , béfloma nya biyifo ndomufɔ itǝ asasɛɛ buyifo .
Nlɛ mi etiki budi ɛyɛ lǝ kase betidi leedi ǝsuǝ , lǝ nlǝkǝ nyamfo kasɔ nte mi lǝ befo nnya kasɔ bɔnɔ . Lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , béyani mi ǝsuǝ nya béfiani ndomufɔ bitǝ abua buyifo ku asa nnya dimankpa ku disiale eto asa bua saa eto okle buyifo . Nko ke ini bǝ mɔmɔɔ , bífi mi ǝsuǝ bífianisǝ ndomufɔ bitǝ asa sɛ buyifo nya ete bǝ biyifo mba leeyifo asa kɛnkɛ .
Lefe nǝ bíyifo ndomufɔ itǝ lebua , yánkle mi bǝ biyifo kasɛɛ .
Nya nte kutǝkǝ ko bínyǝ itsyi lǝ asa nnya bíkeyifo mfó nnya díyifo mi afanisa mɔmɔ ? Asa nnya , nyamfó kenke lǝǝnǝ kaboko ete ni ukpe .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mi utsyiko lǝ lebua eto ani , nya bíbǝ bíyifo wǝ ndomufɔ . Kutǝkǝ ko bínyǝ se bífi mi ǝsuǝ bítǝ wǝ kenke nya bíyifo kɛnkɛ ni bǝ , lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , buinyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Lebua eto kayofofo ni ukpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto ǝtǝsa nnya wǝǝtǝ bo kafo faa ni nkpǝ bo lǝmbǝ kalosǝkɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu wǝ ni Bonamute eto lɔniyifoyifo ku bo ǝsuǝ eso .
Sitintii , mɔ bayimi , bɛnɔ nnya mǝǝbǝ bɔtɛyi mfo eto kasɔ , itsyise mimblɛ yi afi nyamǝ . Afi aakle utidi wǝ nkpe lǝ nnya kalɔ lǝ lefe nǝ unsi nkpǝ hã ǝsuǝ .
Tǝ mfi nyamfo nte ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ . Usio wǝ nsi kusǝǝ , sisǝ ku sisiǝ eto kɔfi aakle wǝ kamanklasǝ lǝ wǝ usǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ osani ǝmǝ nsi nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ osani ǝmǝ ǝkpǝǝ , kɔfi komǝ mensikle usio ǝmǝ .
Nyaso lǝ usio ǝmfo esu usiǝ ko osani bamba lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ usǝ nsi nsi nkpǝǝ , betidi ebɔtɛyi bǝ okpo kusǝ . Fɛ lǝ usǝ ǝmǝ ǝkpǝǝ , kɔfi komǝ mensikle wǝ . Nya onkpe kusu wǝǝsiǝ kusǝ bamba nya wǝmbudi usǝnkpo .
Mɔ bayimi , nko ke ini itǝ mi tsya nɛ . Itsyise lǝ afi nyamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ɛlɛ bote bǝnkǝ bíkpǝ ku Kristo itsyise biyifo Kristo eto lekpa ditsyuǝ , nya biefiani mi bǝtsyuǝ eto bale . Nya mɔmɔɔ befiani wǝ , nwǝ bátakasǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ eto ole , bǝ lǝ biyifo keyifo sɛ ka luubǝ kutǝkǝ itǝ Onanto .
Lǝ lefe nǝ búsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto nkpǝ eto lɛkɔɛnde ǝsuǝǝ , lebua eto lɛkɔɛnde nǝ kɔfi lǝǝnǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kakpee , ábesǝ bo abuayifoyifo kato ekpe . Nya asa nnya lɛbɔ lǝ nkpǝ bomfó siǝsiǝ ǝtǝ bo ukpǝ .
Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , se búkpǝ nya bɔ́bɔ lǝ asa nnya lékle bo itsyǝ esoo , afi nyamǝ ensibǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nnya eso boensiembuyifo kulesa ɛyɛ lǝ kusu koko ku ko kɔfi ǝsuǝ . Bomuu , bo eyifosa ebɔyɛ lǝ kusu fɔfɔ ko laayɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bukatɛyi ? Boǝ , nyalɛ afi nyamǝ ǝbǝ kɔnɔɔ ? Inni nko ini ! Lǝ sitintii , ɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝ nya boǝnyǝ lesa nǝ ni lebua ketsye lekpo nɛ . Lǝ kɔfi komfo ete dímantɛyi nkǝ , “ Mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ utidi bamba eto asa ǝsuǝǝ , ” eni yoofo budi bǝ míntante kase basɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ sas ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lebua ǝnyǝ kusu lesanklisǝ kǝnǝnsɛ saa eto okle lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ kɔfi saa ǝmbǝǝ , eni lebuayifoyifo tsya ǝmbɔkɛ ǝsuale saa .
Mɔ kosate ǝsiǝ nkpǝ bomfo eto okle lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ nǝ mánte afi nyamǝ . Fɛ lefe nǝ mímbǝ mínte afi nyamǝ nya yénsitǝ mɛ kusu bǝ nyifo asa kpǝǝ , abuayifoyifo tsya átaka íńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ nya mínyǝ miǝ nkpǝ .
Nya afi nnya eni ele bǝ itǝ mɛ nkpǝǝ , nnya bomu leboko mɛ ukpǝ nɛ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝǝ , abuayifoyifo ǝnyǝ kusu ɛwɛ mɛ ekpe nya élo mɛ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , afi alɛɛ , lesa kɛnkɛ ini fɛ , nya asa nnya yaate tsya eyifo kɛnkɛ , nya ɛnyɛ lǝ kusu sɛ ǝsuǝ , nya ɛlɛkɛ .
Nyalɛɛ , bɔtɛyi bɔnlɛ boǝ lɛsa sɛ nǝmfo ni nǝ léboko mɛ ukpǝ ? Inni nko ini ! Bomu bǝ lǝ bunyǝ butsyǝ lekpo boǝ lebuayifoyifo eyifo lesa bua esoo , lebuayifoyifo ayɛ lǝ lesa nǝ nkpe kɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nya dínǝ ukpǝ léboko . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , lebuayifoyifo ǝlǝkǝ ni ditsyǝbi kosate léte .
Bomblɛ yi boǝ Kɔfi eyifo lɛwɔnɔ eto lesa . Fɛɛ nkpǝ bo minsi eyifo kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi eto nle , nya lebuayifoyifo diyi mɛ ǝsuǝ .
Maamfó asa nnya meeyifo kasɔ bɔnɔ . Itsyise lesa nǝ maala miǝ lǝ nyifoo , inni ni meeyifo . Bomu asa nnya meekisi sitintii , nnya ni nnya meeyifo nɛ .
Nya lǝ asa nnya maanla miǝ meeyifo nnya ni nnya meeyifoo , nyalɛ ɛlɛ bote bǝ ntɔnɔ miǝ afi nyamfo alɛkɛ .
Lǝ nyasoo , ɛlɛ bote bǝ inni mɔ kosate nlɛ lesa nǝmfo buyifo , bomu lebua nǝ nkpe lǝ mɛ ni nnya eso meeyifo nko .
Nya nyi lǝ mɔ kosate eto ǝsuǝ kemiǝ miǝǝ , lesa sɛɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ mɛ . Nya nlɛ nyamfo bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ eso . Itsyise maala sitinti miǝ ele bǝ eni nyifo kasɛɛ , fɛɛ meenyifo nko .
Itsyise kasɛɛ ka maala miǝ meeyifoo , inni ke ni lesa nǝ meeyifo . Nya lebua nǝ bomu maanla miǝ meeyifo , nii ni nǝ meeyifo nɛ .
Nyaso lǝ meeyifo asa nnya maanla miǝ meyifoo , inni mɔ kosate lǝǝtsyǝ keyifo nnya . Bomuu , lebua nǝ nkpe lǝ mɛ leeyifo nnya .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nsu nnyǝ lesakpa ditsyuǝ ntsyǝ lekpo . Lǝ nla miǝ meeyifo kasɛɛ , lebua hã meeyifo kekleke .
Lǝ kusu bambaa ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ mɔ utu kemiǝ sitintii , Onanto eto afi aakpe mǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti .
Fɛɛ nnyǝ miǝ asa bamba nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ mɛɛ , aakpɔ lema ku lesa nǝ mɔ nsusu laate mɛ nkǝ ɛlɛkɛ . Nya lǝǝtǝ abuayifoyifo lɛbɔ lǝ mɛ nya yeeti mɛ kusu fe nwǝ bákpe lǝ diyo .
Mɔ ǝsuǝ kpe kaminsǝ tinti . Nya owoe luulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto abua nya kɔ , nya laakpa mɛ kesuko ukpǝ kemiǝ mfo ?
Maasɔ Onanto ani , itsyise nnyǝ bulǝkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ ! Nya mɔmɔɔ , lǝ mɔ nsusu ǝsuǝǝ , nyifo nwǝ leeyifo lǝ Onanto eto afi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mɔ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝǝ , meeyifo lǝ lebua eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto embolo mǝ dikpi .
Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝǝ , afi nnya nyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ lǝǝtǝ betidi nkpǝ , ǝtǝ nkǝ mbɔ lǝ afi nnya lǝǝnǝ utidi kakpe ku ukpǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lesa nǝ kɔfi ko Onanto dítǝ Moses dímamfo buyifo , se utidi lɛyɔkpɔ nya wóanfo ko budi esoo , nnya Onanto díyifo mɔmɔ nɛ . Ótsyese wǝ ubi fǝnkǝ utidi wǝ nkpe lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ sia lebua laakpɔ nko . Úbǝ lǝ betidi eto abua eto disi nya úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi , nya útǝkǝ lebua kato nya úsensǝ lebua nǝ nsi lǝ bo eto ǝsuǝale .
Onanto éyifo nyamfo útǝ bo mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ kase Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ laala , inni lǝ kase ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ laala . Úyifo asa nyamfo kenke bǝ lǝbusiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ fe kase wǝ afi lete .
Betidi ba nsi nkpǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto ditsyǝbi fe kɔɔ , lǝ kase baalaa , mǝ nsusu si buteke lǝ asa nnya mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ laala ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ mba nsi nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ nsusu teke lǝ nnya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ laalaa ǝsuǝ .
Utidi wǝ eto nsusu nteke lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto asa ǝsuǝǝ , wǝǝnyǝ ukpǝ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ eto nsusu nteke lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , wǝǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo ku diyuǝsǝ .
Nya utidi wǝ eto nsusu nteke lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ hãa , uyifo Onanto eto olo , itsyise weentsyue Onanto eto afi koto . Nya lǝ sitinti , wǝǝmbofo nnya koto butsyue tsya kulefe .
Mba dítǝ bǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ tǝkǝ mǝ katoo , baamfo Onanto eto lelabi buyifo .
Lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ afo disiǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ binsisi nkpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lɛkuɛnde ǝsuǝ , bomu fe kase Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ laala . Nya lǝ Kristo eto Lɛwɔnɔ mamfo disiǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ , nyalɛɛ unni Kristo eto ole .
Mɔmɔ lǝ wǝ Kristo afo disiǝ unsi lǝ mii , mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ebukpǝ lǝ lebua eso . Fɛɛ mi lɛwɔnɔ ebusi disiǝ nkpǝ itsyise Onanto eyifo mi basɛɛ eso .
Nya lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ létakasǝ Yesu ditsyiko ɔkɔmǝ si lǝ mi ǝsuǝǝ , wǝǝ létakasǝ Kristo Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia luukpǝ mfoo , nkpǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ eso .
Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , keyifo ketsyuǝ abe bo lǝ ǝnǝmi ka ele bǝ buyifo , fɛɛ inni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamfo bunsi kayo , bǝ lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ lǝ se lelabi ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ bitǝkǝko bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , biukpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ belo mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto ditsyǝbi bua nǝmǝǝ , buisiǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Itsyise betidi ba Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ laayɛnkoo , mǝ ni Onanto eto bebi nɛ .
Onanto mǝntǝ mi ndomufɔ eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bikate sikpi . Bomu útǝ mi Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ ni bebi eto lele nya diǝtǝ boakpadi Onanto boǝ , “ Abba ” eto kasɔ ni , “ Nto lala . ”
Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ku bo awɔnɔ kenke lɛkɔ iyifo kɛnyɛ ka nlɛ bote bǝ buyifo Onanto eto bebi .
Nya lǝ buyifo wǝ bebii , nyalɛ buyifo mba leedi wǝ bikǝ . Nya bo ku Kristo ebudi Onanto eto bikǝ bɔkɔ . Nya fe kase búnyǝ kanyi fe Kristo , nko ke bo tsya luuyǝnle fe wǝ nɛ .
Lǝ mɔ dinyǝbi ǝsuǝǝ , sitinti lǝ befi kanyi ka bɔnlɛ bunyǝ mɔmɔ mfoo , kanle kulesa saa kon lǝ befi bakatesǝko ku diyǝnde ku disuǝyuǝ nǝ Onanto luutǝ bunyǝ .
Asa nnya Onanto díyifo kenke si ɛlɛ kusu bobe kekleke itǝ lefe nǝ Onanto luulǝkǝ wǝ bebi ote .
Nya Onanto eto asayifoyifo nyamfo kenkee , kpe lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ inni asa nyamfo mate ete dítǝ ibǝ nko , bomu Onanto kosate wǝ dítǝ kusu nko . Nya utǝ kusu nkǝ bǝnyǝ kusubebe bǝ
wuulǝkǝ asa nnya Onanto díyifo kenke utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ eto sedomu eto kabiasǝ eto ani lǝ bǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ , nya wuutǝ kusu nkǝ bǝyǝnde fe wǝ bebi ke .
Nya buyi boǝ ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , asa nnya Onanto díyifo kenke lɛ kanyi bunyǝ tinti , kakɔɛ fe usio wǝ nlabe kole .
Nya inni nyamfo mate ete , bomu bo mba Onanto dífi wǝ ditǝsa tutɛ nǝ ni wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ útǝ tsyaa , lɛ kanyi bunyǝ kukakɔɛ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ kemiǝ , nya buufi ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ kekleke boǝ Onanto lǝ ufi bo fe wǝ bebi lǝ butsyǝ ɔnwɛ .
Nya se bonkpe kusubebe komfo esoo , búnyǝ bofo . Fɛɛ asa nnya boǝnyǝ ku bo ǝnǝmii , boensiabe nnya kusu . Itsyise kuutsyuǝ ensi ambe kusu kǝtǝ asa nnya mfi nkpe wǝ koko .
Fɛɛ lǝ bufi bo ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya boǝnnyǝtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nyalɛ ele bǝ bokpe utu buɛɛ , bukabe nnya kusu .
Nya lǝ nko eto kusu komfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ laawunsǝko bo kekleke nɛ , itsyise bumbǝ ale nya bunyi kase ele bǝ boto ola butǝ Onanto bɔyɛnko . Fɛɛ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ kosate laakɔɛ kalɛ lekpakpa kǝtǝ bo fe kase ińyǝ itǝ bo lǝ kusu ko boǝmbofo bulǝkǝ kate ǝsuǝ .
Nya Onanto wǝ nyi betidi eto ketu kemiǝǝ , yi lesa nǝ nkpe lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto nsusu ǝsuǝ tsya . Itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ aalɛ Onanto lekpakpa lǝ bo disi fe kase Onanto laala .
Buyi boǝ lesa saa nǝ Onanto leeyifoo , iyifo itǝ lɛlɛkɛsǝ itǝ betidi ba laala wǝ nya ókpadi mǝ nkǝ beyifo wǝ keyifo .
Nya betidi ba Onanto léte utsyǝǝ , úlǝkǝ mǝ utsyǝ nkǝ lǝ bale wǝ Ubi itǝ bǝ wǝ Ubi lǝ udi ututɛ utǝ wǝ bayimi kpǝ bamǝ .
Lǝ nyaso mba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝǝ , mǝ ókpadi nɛ . Nya mba ókpadii , úyifo mǝ basɛɛ . Nya mba úyifo basɛɛ , mǝ ókpasǝ ǝsuǝ bǝyǝnde fe wǝ ke .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi ? Lǝ Onanto ńyǝ bo kamaa , owoe loofo buńyǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ ?
Nya lǝ Onanto mánni wǝ Ubi bufi kǝtǝ bo , bomu úfi wǝ útǝ kedi lǝ bo disii , beso wǝmbufi asa nnya ta utǝ bo kafo faa ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝmfo ǝsuǝ ?
Nya owoe luufi etiki lǝ Onanto eto betidi ba úlǝkǝ utsyǝ ǝsuǝ ? Onanto kosate ébulǝkǝ mǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ bédi lɛbɛ .
Nya owoe loofo mǝ dikpi bolo ? Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ ! Kristo Yesu wǝ ni utidi wǝ díkpǝ , nya nnya nsi nso ni bǝǝ , wǝ ni nwǝ bátakasǝ betsyiko ɔkɔmǝ nya unsi lǝ Onanto eto kodiani nlɛ bofo kǝtǝ bo .
Nya owoe loofo lelabi nǝ nkpe lǝ bonko Kristo eto nti bola ? Kanyinyǝnyǝ lee bulǝ , lee ohiãtete , lee kukpɛnsɛ , lee leyasiǝsiǝ , lee sikpi bokpe , lee ukpǝ lee lesiabi eto kɛnyɛ ?
Ekpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Lǝ fǝ disi esoo , bokpe lǝ ukpǝ eto bulǝ ǝsuǝ diyi saa diyi . Nya beeyifo bo fe basamu ba bantɔɔ kalokɔ . ”
Nya lǝ nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , butǝkǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ kase Kristo laala bo eso .
Itsyise ékpako mɛ wuee bɛ kulesa saa ǝmbǝ nǝ luusǝnsǝ bo ku wǝ nti lǝ lelabi nǝ ufi utǝ bo eso . Ukpǝ nye nkpǝ lee kato eto batɔnkpe lee awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ , lefe nǝmfo lee nǝ luubǝ nye ǝsuǝale ǝtsyuǝ ditsyi kato fanloo nye lǝ kasɔ mfo nye lesa saa nǝ beyifoo , kulesa saa ǝmbǝ nǝ loofo bo nti bola kulefe ketsyiko lǝ Onanto eto lelabi nǝ úfi útǝ bo ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu Bonamute ǝsuǝ .

Lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ , inni sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyi , itsyise nyifo Kristo eto ole . Mɔ lɛkɔɛsi nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nsii , lɛ mɛ bɔtɛyi sitinti nkǝ minlɛ sidia bɔtɛyi .
Nnla miǝ bete biǝ ɛlɛ mɛ bulǝ lǝ taa utu nya yɛnlɛ mɛ bufi tinti taa lǝ mɔ utu kemiǝǝ ?
Iyifo mɔ lelabi miǝ , lǝ yɔɔwunsǝ ko mɔ betidi ba bonko mǝ ni kusǝ kɔni eto betidi eto disii , muutǝ kusu bǝ Onanto kudi mɛ nkǝ woǝfǝ mɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise mǝ ni Israel eto kusǝ ko Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ . Nya úfi mǝ uyifo wǝ bebi . Nya úlǝkǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde óte mǝ . Nya úlǝkǝ kɛnyɛ ka ókle ku mǝ óte . Nya útǝ mǝ wǝ afi . Mǝ ni mba Onanto léte kase ele bǝ bayɛ besumu wǝ nɛ . Nya mǝ ni mba ókle kɛnyɛ ko utsyǝ .
Mǝ bana ni mba lefo aye , ba ni baseke , ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ . Nya lǝ mǝ ntii , nya Kristo lɛbɔ utsyi úbǝ fe kawunsiǝ eto utidi . Idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔ lefe saa bitǝ lǝ bufi atɛsǝ butǝ Onanto , wǝ ntǝkǝ lesa saa kato . Ibǝ itǝ .
Inni bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ ka ɔ́tɛyi utsyǝ eyifo kebimba , nya wényifo lǝ ke ǝsuǝ . Itsyise inni Israelfɔ kenke ni Onanto eto betidi .
Nya inni Abraham eto kafo eto bebi kenke ni Onanto eto bebi . Onanto atɛyi Abraham nkǝ , “ Mɔɔyɛ lǝ Isak ǝsuǝ mfɔnsǝ fǝ kafo eto bebi . ”
Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ , inni Abraham eto bebi ba kenke ole ni Onanto eto bebi . Bomu Onanto eto bebi ni mba lefo wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ banɔ . Nya mbamfo woǝnyǝ fǝnkǝ Abraham eto bebi kosate nɛ .
Ditiki nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ ni nkǝ , “ Muusinkli mbǝ lɛlɛ amba mfiǝmato . Nya Sara ebole ubisaibi . ”
Nya inni nyamfo mate . Fɛɛ Rebeka tsya ále bafimfi ini bebisaibi itsyi lǝ anto ɔni hã wǝ ni bo ona Isak ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Onanto kpe kusu ko woayɛ kǝlǝkǝ betidi . Nya fe kase ibǝ itǝ nkoo , Onanto átɛyi lesatsyuǝ utsyǝ fɛ bále bafimfi bamfo , fɛ lǝ bafimfi bamfo lǝ beyifo keyifo sɛɛ lee kabua saa . Nya kusu ko ǝsuǝ woayɛ mfo enni lǝ mǝ keyifo saa ǝsuǝ . Bomu ɔ́tɛyi Rebeka nkǝ , “ Ubi ninǝ ebofiani nwǝ luusumu dikpǝfile . ”

Íbǝ itǝ fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Nla Yakob , nya mínkisi Esau . ”
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ele bǝ bɔtɛyi mɔmɔ ? Bɔtɛyi bɔnlɛ boǝ Onanto eenyifo asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ? Kulefe ! Inni nko inte kon .
Fɛɛ ɔ́tɛyi Moses nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ maala miǝ muunǝ kafoo , wǝ muunǝ kafo nɛ . Nya utidi wǝ minla miǝ mǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝǝ , wǝ muunyǝ kaminsǝ nɛ . ”
Nyaso kase Onanto lǝǝnyǝ utidi kaminsǝǝ , aanyɛ lǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto lesa nǝ woala nye wǝǝyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomuu , itsyi lǝ kase Onanto kosate laabe lǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto átɛyi Egipte eto Oka Farao nkǝ , “ Lǝ nyamfo esoo , nlɛ fǝ seka butsyǝ bǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝale nte betidi ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bǝ lǝ mɔ diye lǝ lɛyɛ letsyo bǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lǝ banɔ . ”
Lǝ nyasoo , utidi wǝ Onanto laala nkǝ wǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝǝ , wǝ wǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ nɛ . Nya nwǝ waala nkǝ utidi atoo , wǝ wǝǝtǝ wǝǝtidi ato nɛ .
Mi bǝtsyuǝ ebɔtɔ mɛ nkǝ , “ Lǝ ite nkoo , beso Onanto nsi laalo utidi dikpi ? Owoe loofo botaka kǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto lɛkɔɛle ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya owoe feni kon bǝ lǝ edi etiki ǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ? Dikplibi antɔ utidi wǝ léto ni nkǝ , “ Beso fɛ fáto mɛ mmǝ ? ”
Lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , utidi wǝ laato ekplibi kpe kusu woasɔ sɛfɔtǝ fe kase ke woala . Nya woofo sɛfɔtǝ sia ɔminansǝ bufi kato ekplibi ǝnuǝ , nya wuufi dikplibi lɔɔni nǝ óto , laanɔ bobe utsyǝ itǝ eyididi . Nya wuufi dikplibi nuǝfǝ utsyǝ itǝ ekubi bokpa kakpo .
Nya nko ke Onanto tsya díyifo nɛ . Woala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ lɛblɔfi ote mba ǝsuǝ únyǝ ɔblɔ , bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale . Fɛɛ woefi disuǝtsyǝ tinti kǝtǝ mba ɔnlɛ ɔblɔ bunyǝ kakpe lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe úkase uyi nkǝ wɔɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ .
Nya nko ini bǝ óla nkǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ asa sɛɛ nnya nkpe lǝ wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ kemiǝ ote mba woola nkǝ wǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ . Nya buyifo betidi ba ɔlɔ utsyǝ nkǝ lǝ bubǝ bunyǝ wǝ diyǝnde kplɛ .
Lǝ nyaso úlǝkǝ bo tsya , inni Yudafɔ mate . Bomu ku mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya .
Ɔ́tɛyi ekpa wuee lǝ Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Hosea eto kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Betidi ba dímendi mɔ balee , mookpadi mǝ ‘ Mɔ betidi . ’ Nya kuse ko eto betidi maanlaa , mookpadi mǝ ‘ Mɔ balala . ’
Nya lǝ kaka tutuutu bátɛyi mǝ bǝ , Binni mɔ betidi , mfo ǝmǝ tutuutu bookpadi mǝ bǝ Onanto Wǝ Nsi Nkpe Lefe Saa eto bebi . ”
Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Yesaya ábe letsya bembembe útǝ Israelfɔ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ibǝ bǝ Israelfɔ fui kpenkpenkpe fe lekpo eto lɛwinimi tsyaa , mǝ nti esiani hã luunyǝ bulǝkǝ .
Itsyise Bonamute ebokponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke lekpo mlǝ . ”
Nya yuubǝ itǝ fe kase Yesaya lɛtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ nkǝ , “ Lenni Bonamute Ǝsuǝaletidi Kenke díbu bo kafo eto bebi bǝtsyuǝ utsyǝǝ , eni bɔ́ɔtsylɔsɔ bo tsya fe Sodom seka , nya butsyǝ fe Gomora seka ! ”
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , be ini bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ? Nko ini bǝ betidi ba lenni Israelfɔ nya bennsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ díbǝ báfiani betidi ba ni basɛɛ mɔmɔ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnemi se báfo wǝ bánɔ eso .
Fɛɛ Israelfɔ ba léfo afi nyamǝ nya banlɛ bokplatsya kekleke bǝ lǝ beyifo kasɛɛ , mámfo buyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bafiani basɛɛ .
Nya beso íbǝ nko ? Itsyise bányɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bafo kasɛɛ buyifo , bomu béfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ mǝ kosate eto eyisafa ǝsuǝ , nya bétusǝ lǝ Kristo wǝ nte fe leba nǝ ǝsuǝ utidi leetusǝ .
Fe kase báwɔni bǝtsyǝ bǝ lǝ nyaso bétusǝ lǝ Kristo wǝ ni fe leba nǝ nte lǝ mǝ kusu ǝsuǝ fe kase inte lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nnya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bebe ! Mfi leba nǝ luutǝ betidi tusǝ lǝ ni nlɛ butsyǝ lǝ Sion eto umǝ . Nya bɔɔtsyinini lǝ ni ǝsuǝ bedu banɔ . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ ke lefo wǝ ɔnɔɔ , wǝmbudi kafoni lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ kulefe . ”
Mɔ bayimi , iyifo mɔ lelabi nǝ ditsyi lǝ mɔ utu kemiǝ ku mɔ olatoto itǝ Onanto miǝ Yudafɔ lǝ bǝnyǝ bofo .
Nńyǝ mǝ kama nlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝǝ , baakpe otsyekle sitinti lǝ Onanto busumu ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ benyi kusu komǝ .
Itsyise bánte kusu ko Onanto laala nkǝ utidi yɛ lǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Bomu mǝ kosate lɛbɛbɛ mǝ kusu bǝtǝ ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyamfo eso bámbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ Onanto itǝ bǝ lǝ ote mǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ bɔɔyɛ lǝ uyifo mǝ basɛɛ .
Itsyise Kristo díbǝ ófo ǝsuǝale lǝ Moses eto afi eto ani . Nya utidi saa léfo Kristo ɔ́nɔɔ , úyifo wǝ ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Moses áwɔni asa utsyiko lǝ kase utidi leeyifo ɔsɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ afi ǝsuǝ katɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi saa wǝ leeyifo lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , afi nyamfo ebutǝ wǝ nkpǝ . ”
Fɛɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi itsyi lǝ kase utidi leeyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Mantɔ fǝ ǝsuǝ fǝnkǝ , ‘ Owoe loobe usu Kato ? ’ Nya kasɔ ni bǝ , ‘ Owoe loobe usu Kato usu okpa Kristo oboko ? ’
Nya mantɔ fǝ ǝsuǝ fǝnke , ‘ Owoe luudufǝ usu kasɔ mfo ke ? ’ Nya kɔsɔ ni bǝ , ‘ Owoe luusu ɔkɔmǝ usu oboko Kristo ku wǝ ? ’ ”
Bomu lesa nǝ ɛnlɛ bote ni bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ ebɔfi fǝ pɛɛ , nya lenkpe lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ ku fǝ lɛkɔɛsi kemiǝ . ” Nya nyamfo ni bofokanɔ eto ditiki nǝ bɔnlɛ letsya bobe nɛ .
Nya lǝ emenkli kɛnyɛ , fatɛyi fǝ Yesu ni Bonamute , nya fafo fanɔ lǝ fǝ lɔkɔɛsi kemiǝ fǝ Onanto átakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝǝ , Onanto ebutǝ fǝ nkpǝ .
Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ lɛkɔɛsi kemiǝ nya faafo kanɔɔ , nya feeyifo ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi nɛ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ ka fefi fǝlǝkǝ nyamfo fatee , nya ǝsuǝ fuunyǝ bofo nɛ .
Itsyise lǝ nyamfo seka ǝsuǝ nya Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Utsyuǝ saa wǝ léfo wǝ ɔ́nɔɔ , kofani ǝmbɔlɛ wǝ kulefe . ”
Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ , letekɛkɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudanyǝ nti . Nya Onanto ni bomblɛ eto Onamute , nya wookpo betidi ba kenke laato ola kǝtǝ wǝ atsyɔ .
Fe kase enkpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , “ Utidi saa wǝ laato ola kakpadi Bonamute eto diyee , ebunyǝ bofo . ”
Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ke dímamfo ɔ́nɔɔ , ntsyǝ woofo wǝ bokpadi katɔ wǝ lesa ? Nya utidi wǝ kee eto ditiki bámfo bábe ni letsyaa , ntsyǝ fɛ boofo wǝ bofo kanɔ ? Nya lǝ kuutsyuǝ mámbe ditiki nǝmǝ letsya bǝtǝ mǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , ntsyǝ fɛ bɔɔnɔ ni ?
Nya lǝ bántsyese batɔnkpee , ntsyǝ boobe ditiki nǝmǝ letsya ? Báwɔni bakpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , “ Kase mba léboko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ díbǝ bédufǝ , aanɔ bobe tinti . ”
Fɛɛ inni mǝmblɛ kenke ni mba díkafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ . Itsyise Yesaya kosate átɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute , owoe léfo ditiki nǝ bóbe letsya ɔ́nɔ ? ”
Lǝ nyasoo , bofokanɔ yɛ lǝ ditiki nǝ bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ditiki nǝmǝ bɔnɔ yɛ lǝ Kristo letsya bobe ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɔ ni bǝǝ , sitinti ini bǝ Israelfɔ mánnɔ ditiki nǝmǝ ? Bánɔ ni fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bánɔ mǝ kudu lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke , nya mǝ ditiki dísensǝ dísu kawunsiǝ eto kasekɔ kenke . ”
Nya lǝ nsi ntɔ nnɔ miǝ nyalɛ Israel eto kusǝ mánnɔ ni kasɔɔ ? Moses kosate ni utidi tutɛ wǝ dítsyiko Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate katɛyi nkǝ , “ Muutǝ miǝ bɛsɛsɛ ǝnǝmi lǝ betidi ba lenni kusǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ betidibuki ba eto ǝnǝmi dimansini tɔ lǝ bǝtǝ binyǝ ɔblɔ . ”
Nya Yesaya esi ókpe ɔkɔɛ ɔ́tɛyi mǝ wuee nkǝ Onanto atɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi ba dímambɛbɛ mɛɛ , mɔmɔ bǝnyǝ mɛ . Nya mínlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ mínte betidi ba dímantɔ kulesa itsyi lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ bánɔ . ”
Fɛɛ lǝ Israelfɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nsensǝ mɔ ani ntsyǝ lefe nǝ ta , bǝ lǝ mfo betidi ba lembu kuutsyuǝ saa nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Nyaso nlɛ bɔtɔ mɔmɔ miǝ nyalɛ Onanto áni wǝ Betidi ? Owo lo . Inni nko ini kulaa ! Mɔ kosate eyifo Israelnyǝ nya mini Abraham eto kafo eto ubi wǝ ditsyi Benyamin eto kafo .
Onanto manni wǝ betidi ba unyi , úlǝkǝ utsyǝ taa kasɔketsyikɔ ke . Nya biyi lesa nǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue bǝ Unyɛlǝkǝtidi Elia átɛyi Onanto itsyi lǝ Israelfɔ eto disiale ǝsuǝ nkǝ ,
“ Bonamute , betidi bamfo lélo fǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nya bésensǝ fǝ kedi eto leba kenke ! Ini mɔ hã ni utidi wǝ díbu , nya banlɛ bɔbɛbɛ bǝ lǝ balo mɛ ! ”
Nte mbuayɛ bo Onanto dítǝ wǝ ? Ɔ́tɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Nlǝkǝ betidi akpi akuanse ntsyǝ itǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ ba dímanse akonki bǝtǝ ufiǝ Baal . ”
Nko ke itsyǝ fe kase inte mɔmɔ nɛ . Israel eto betidi esiani bǝtsyuǝ ebu ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ eso .
Wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́yɛ úlǝkǝ mǝ , nya inni lesa nǝ béyifo eso úlǝkǝ mǝ . Nya lǝ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi lǝ mǝ keyifo ka banlɛ esoo , nyalɛ eni wǝ lefonǝ menyifo lefonǝ tinti .
Nyalɛ ntsyǝ nɛ ? Lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ Israelfɔ dífi kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ keklekee , bǝnnyǝ ni . Fɛɛ mba sɛkɛ Onanto dílǝkǝ utsyǝ ǝnyǝ ni . Bafɛfɛ éti ato bǝtǝ Onanto eto bokpadi .
Fe nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mǝ ani , nya kuninǝ dídi mǝ utu ku mǝ nsusu kenke . Nya ibǝ nko ibǝ ese taa mi eto bale tsya ǝsuǝ , beentsyue koto nya bǝǝnyǝ kulesa kǝtsyǝ lekpo . ”
Nyaso Oka David átɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ itǝ mǝ diyi saa eto lesa kedikɔ lǝ efiani uyibi wǝ bábio lǝ banɔ lǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ bédu bánɔ bédufǝ lǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ itǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ eba bǝ bensiembunyǝ kulesa bǝtsyǝ lekpo . Nnya lǝ itǝ mǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ lǝ kafiani bitsyike itǝ mǝ lefe saa . ”
Nya maatɔ tsya minkǝ lefe nǝ Yudafɔ lɛtsyinini bédu bánɔɔ , bánya kenke nya bénsifo botaka keńyǝǝ ? Owo ! Inni nko ini ? Bomu itsyi lǝ mǝ botakebu esoo , mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya ǝbǝ bǝnyǝ bofo bǝ lǝ itǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛsɛ mǝ lǝ Yudafɔ bakpɔ mɛ kutsyuǝsɛ .
Yudafɔ eto lebua nǝ béyifo eso Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ kawunsiǝ kenke nyǝ asa sɛɛ . Nya lefe nǝ Yudafɔ ku Onanto eto nti lebiaa , asa sɛɛ esi íbǝ , ílǝkǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto disi lǝ ntu nya báfo Onanto eto atsyɔkpokpo kpǝ . Nya lǝ mǝ botakebu áboko atsyɔkpokpo nyamfo eto okle kawunsiǝǝ , lǝ ibǝ bǝ Yudafɔ kenke esinkli bǝbǝ bakɔ ku Onantoo , wǝ atsyɔkpokpo nnya luubǝ ebufui ekpe tinti .
Nya mɔmɔ mimba lenni Yudafɔɔ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝmfo nǝ minyifo nwǝ bátsyese mi mfoo , bǝ nlǝkǝ mɔ keyifo eto bofe nte mi .
Nya ǝtsyuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , muutǝ ǝnǝmi ebɔsɛ mɔ betidi , bakpɔ kutsyuǝsɛ itǝ ǝtsyuǝ Onanto ebofo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Itsyise se Onanto dílǝkǝ mǝ anii , diyuǝ ǝbǝ Onanto ku kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto nti . Nya be luubǝ lǝ Onanto esinkli ofo mǝ ? Yuuyifo fe kase utidi leekpe kesinkli kataka kǝbǝ nkpǝ !
Lǝ didisa eto kutsyǝ tutɛ ko befi bǝtǝ Onanto eyifo kɛnkɛɛ , nyalɛ didisa nǝmǝ kenke eyifo kɛnkɛ , Nko ke lǝ kuyi komǝ eto keyudu eyifo kɛnkɛ , nyalɛ ko kalɛ tsya eyifo kɛnkɛ .
Bála kuyi ko bétsyi eto kalɛ , nya béfi mimba lenni Yudafɔ ba nte fe dibutu eto kuyi ko bála bákle bámaklasǝ lǝ nko bétsyi eto ɔlɛ wǝ bála eto kɛnyɛ . Itǝ bǝ mi tsya ǝbǝ bɛlɛ kedi bunyǝ ketsyiko lǝ kuyitsyitsyi komǝ , ko ni Yudafɔ eto keyudu ɔflɔ .
Nyaso bebe sinini biǝ biambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ uyilɛ wǝ bála ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ biyifo nkoo , ele bǝ binyǝ bitsyǝ lekpo biǝ inni mi ni ko uyudu . Bomu uyudu nlɛ mi lǝ nkpǝ nɛ .
Ebofo bɔtɛyi fǝnkǝ , “ Bála uyilɛ ǝmǝ bǝlǝkǝ bǝ lǝ befi fǝ bǝkǝ lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . ”
Nya nko ini nɛ . Fɛɛ biyi biǝ mǝ mamfokanɔ eso bála mǝ bǝlǝkǝ . Nya mi ǝnyǝ kafĩɔkɔ se befo bɛnɔ eso . Fɛɛ nyamfo anlɛ bote bǝ bebesǝ mi ǝsuǝ kato , bomu ele bǝ bikate sikpi .
Itsyise lǝ Onanto mǝnyǝ mǝ kaminsǝ ɔkɔbe Yudafɔ ba ni fe kuyi komfo eto ɔlɛ ɔlɛɛ , befo bɛnɔ biǝ wuunyǝ mi kaminsǝ ɔkɔbe mi ɔlɛ ?
Nyamfo lɛ bo bote kase Onanto lǝǝnyǝ kaminsǝ ku kase wǝ ditiki nkpe ale . Okpe ale itǝ betidi ba dímentsyue wǝ koto , nya woefi wǝ lefonǝ kǝtǝ mi mba léfo wǝ bɛnɔ kekleke lefe saa . Lǝ bienyifo nkoo , Onanto ebola mi ulǝkǝ lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ Yudafɔ tsya áyɛ mǝ mamfokanɔɔ , Onanto ebufi mǝ tsya okpe lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise Onanto kpe ǝsuǝale bǝ usinkli otsyasǝ kuyi eto kalɛ lǝ kuyi komǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ɛkɔbe ɛlɛ .
Mimba lenni Yudafɔ te fe kuyi ko ńyǝ lǝ dibutu , nya bála ko kalɛ bǝbǝ bákle bǝkǝ lǝ umǝ eto kuyi ko bétsyi ǝsuǝ . Israel eto kusǝ eyifo fe kuyi ko bétsyi . Eso imbǝ ale itǝ Onanto bǝ ufi kuyitsyitsyi komǝ eto kalɛ ka bála usinkliko ke otsyasǝ ukɔ lǝ nko ǝsuǝ bála ke , nya yɔɔlɛkɛ eso .
Mɔ bayimi , asa ǝtsyuǝ kpe nnya lɛkula mi nya minla miǝ mǝǝlǝkǝ nte mi bǝ yensikula mi lǝ bɛyɛ bubu biǝ biyi kobe tinti beso . Nnya ni bǝ , Yudafɔ bǝtsyuǝ eto atotitidi nnya bankpe embutsyǝ ɛklɛ . Bomu atotitidi nyamfo ebola lefe nǝ Onanto dínyǝ sitiditu sia woala lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ eto nti ólosǝ .
Nya kusu komfo ǝsuǝ yɔɔyɛ bǝ Yudafɔ kenke lǝ bǝnyǝ bofo fe kase Onanto lɛtɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , “ Ofomfokǝtǝ ebutsyi Sion ubǝ , nya wuubǝ ulǝkǝ disiale saa lǝ Yakob eto kato eto bebi nti .
