Nya kɛnyɛklekle kamfo ebɔkɛ lǝ bonko mǝ eto nti lǝ lefe nǝ minlǝkǝ abuayifoyifo lǝ mǝ nti . ”
Yudafɔ eyifo Onanto eto balo , itsyise bámfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mimba lenni Yudafɔ kpe kǝńyǝnkɔ . Fɛɛ se Onanto dílǝkǝ mǝ utsyǝ taa banamǝ lefe esoo , woala mǝ .
Itsyise lǝ Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ nya úte mǝ wǝ lefonǝ ditsyuǝǝ , wǝmbofloma ni .
Nya mimba lenni Yudafɔɔ , béta Onanto bíbu lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛ mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ǝnyǝ mi kaminsǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto atotitidi esoo ,
nko ini bǝ lǝ kase Onanto dínyǝ mi kaminsǝ esoo , Yudafɔ ensientsyue Onanto koto mɔmɔ bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ unyǝ mǝ tsya kaminsǝ .
Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi ba ta ani , nya mǝ atotitidi díti mǝ kusu iyifo fe diyo bákpe mǝ , lǝ itǝ bǝ unyǝ mǝmblɛ kaminsǝ .
Onanto amɔ tinti ! Nya asa sɛɛ kenke etsyi wǝ ɔflɔ . Nya sitintii , wǝ ni kobe nya unyi asa nnya kenke eto kemiǝ kukɔnɔ . kǝlǝkǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ . Nya kutsyuǝ sa ǝmbofo esu nya ǝsuǝ waayɛ keyifo wǝ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ . Nya kutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo esu nya ǝsuǝ wǝ ayɛ keyifo wǝ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ .
Nko eso báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Owoe laanɔ Bonamute eto nsusu kasɔ ? Nya owoe ni wǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ ?
Owoe díkǝtǝ wǝ lesatsyuǝ unyǝ bǝ lǝ ubǝ utsyǝ wǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ ? ”
Wǝ díyifo lesa saa , nya wǝ dímuǝ asa nnya kenke ɔnlɛ , nya wǝ ni lesa saa eto kalosǝkɔ . Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto idu mɔmɔ isu manlo manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , se Onanto nlɛ bo kaminsǝ bunyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kafo ɛkpɛ tinti esoo , nlɛ mi lekpakpa sitinti miǝ , bifi mi ǝsuǝ bitǝ Onanto fe keditǝtǝ seka nnya diyifo kɛnkɛ , nnya lǝǝyuǝsǝ wǝ kafo tsya lǝ mi nkpǝ bo binsi mfo eso . Nyamfo ni kase ele bǝ bɔyɛ busumu Onanto lǝ lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ nɛ .
Biensiǝ nkpǝ fe kase kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi lǝǝsiǝ mu . Bomu bitǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔtsyi mi nsusu ɔwuninsǝ lǝ befiani betidi fɔfɔ . Nyamfo luutǝ binyǝ lesa nǝ Onanto laala , ku lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ , nya diakɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛ nya lɛflɔ kenke tsya .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo ka útǝ mɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , nlɛ mimblɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ biambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato enso kase ele bǝ itsyǝ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ mi nsusu lǝ bote bǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya utsyuǝ saa lǝ ukato wǝ ǝsuǝ ukabe lǝ wǝ bofakanɔ bo Onanto dítǝ wǝ eto ale ǝsuǝ .
Fe kase bonkpe ǝsuǝ ani nnya nkpe akpa akpa nnya leeyifo keyifo kani eto oklee ,
nko ke ini bǝ buyifo betidi kpǝ tsya . Buyifo utidi eto ǝsuǝ ani nnya ntsyi akpa akpa kpǝ nyamfo lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo eso , nya akpa akpa nyamǝ lɛkɔɔ bǝtsyuǝ iyifo utidi ɔni .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bufi ǝtǝsa akpa akpa nnya Onanto dítǝ bo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ buyifo keyifo . Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ afo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto bulǝkǝkate eto ǝtǝsaa , ele bǝ obe ni letsya ku bofokanɔ bo nkpe wǝ .
Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ eto ǝtǝsa ni bǝ ɔwunsǝko betidi bamba eto keyifoo , ele bǝ uyifo ke ku kafo faa ka woofo . Lǝ asabote inii , ele bǝ ote asa nyamǝ fe kase woofo .
Lǝ betidi nkɛale kpekpe inii , ele bǝ okpe betidi nkɛale lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Lǝ kafoɛkpɛ buyifo kǝtǝ betidi inii , ele bǝ uyifo nnya ku kafo faa . Nya lǝ betidi bɔyɛnko tsya inii , ele bǝ ufi wǝ kobe kenke utǝ keyifo kamǝ eto buyifo , lǝ ɔtɔnko mǝ . Lǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ inii , ele bǝ unyǝ kaminsǝ ku wǝ utu kenke .
Bela mi betidi ku lelabi kenke . Bikisi lebua lǝ bɛkɔbe lesa sɛɛ bɛlɛ kekleke .
Bifi lelabi bitǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ku utu faa fǝnkǝ bayimi ba léfo bánɔ . Nya bitǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ dibu enso mi ǝsuǝ .
Bienyifo sɛflɔ , bomu bekpe ɔtsyini lǝ mi keyifo ǝsuǝ . Bisumu Bonamute ǝmǝ ku mi utu kenke .
Se bɛnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ lesatsyuǝ esoo , binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ keyifo saa ka bɛnlɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ . Nya binyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ . Nya bikato ola lefe saa .
Bɛwunsǝko mi bayimitsyuǝ ba léfo bánɔ ba asa nlɛ bohiã . Nya bifi kafo faa befo bafɔ .
Bɛtɔ Onanto lǝ okpo betidi ba laabɛbɛ mi kabua atsyɔ . Tɔ atsyɔkpokpo ǝtǝ mǝ , menkudi mǝ .
Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku mba nlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ . Nya biwinko mba nlɛ buwi .
Biyifo bani ku mi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mǝ nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ . Biambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , bomu bɛkɔ ani ku mba dimanle betidi lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Nya mǝnyǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ fe nwǝ ni obesibe onso .
Lǝ utsyuǝ eyifo mi kabua biemfi kabua bɛtisǝ wǝ oko . Kplatsya lǝ eyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ lǝ bitidi eto ǝnǝmi .
Bɛyɛ kusu saa ko luunǝ diyuǝ eboko mi ku betidi bamba eto nti .
Mɔ bayimi , biantisɛ utidi eto lebua oko kulefe . Bomu bitǝ Onanto kusu lǝ utǝ utidi ǝmǝ ni kayofofo utǝ mi . Itsyise Onanto átɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nkǝ , “ Mɔ ni Onamute wǝ laatɔ kɛnyɛ kǝtǝ , nya mɔ ni futsyǝ lǝǝtǝ kayofofo . ”
Bomu lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , bátɛyi bo bǝ , “ Lǝ kukpɛnsɛ lǝ fǝ oloo , tǝ wǝ lesa lǝ udi . Lǝ utukuɛ lɛ wǝǝ , tǝ wǝ ntu lǝ unǝ . ” Itsyise lǝ eyifo nkoo , akpa kutǝmbli akpo wǝ lǝ disinti , nye ǝtǝ kofani alɛ wǝ
Biǝntǝ lǝ kabua lǝ kedi mi utu , bomu bifi kasɛɛ buyifo bitǝkǝ lebua kato .
Ele bǝ utidi saa fi dibu utǝ Aba eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko . Itsyise aba saa ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale leni Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi . Nya Aba wǝ nsi mɔmɔɔ , Onanto dífi mǝ utsyǝ mfó .
Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ átaka uńyǝ lǝ Aba utsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto eto lesa nǝ útsyue útsyǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ni ótaka uńyǝ nɛ . Nya betidi ba leeyifo nkoo , bǝǝnǝ kotonǝnǝ kaboko ǝsuǝ .
Betidi ba leeyifo kasɛɛ , aante Aba sikpi , bomu betidi buaa , mǝ laate asa sikpi nɛ . Lǝ bela biǝ biayɛ Aba sikpi botee , ele bǝ biyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ befo atɛsǝ .
Itsyise uyifo Onanto eto uyifoyifo wǝ laabɛbɛ fǝ kasɛɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ eeyifo kabua , nyalɛ te wǝ sikpi . Itsyise inni bimba ini bǝ bǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ! Onanto eto uyifoyifo uni . Nya uyifo utidi wǝ laabe nkǝ beyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ nya wǝǝnǝ obuayifo saa koto .
Nyamfo eso ele bǝ bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ batɔnkotɔnko . Nya inni lǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi mate nɛ luubǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ eso , bomu lǝ fǝ lɛkɔɛsi nǝ loolo fǝ dikpi tsya eso .
Lǝ nyamfo tsya eso ele bǝ befo oko bitǝ mi kasɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko , itsyise Onanto eto keyifo banlɛ buyifo . Nya béfi mǝ lefe kenke bǝtǝ bǝ lǝ batɔnko betidi .
Nyasoo , befo oko bitǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ ele bǝ befo bitǝ . Lǝ kasɔ kamfo eto atabi ni nnya bensi bǝ lǝ befi bǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa wǝ ele bǝ bǝtǝǝ , bifi bitǝ . Lǝ oko unii , ele bǝ befo wuntsya . Lǝ futsyǝ ele bǝ bifi dibu bitǝǝ , bifi bitǝ wǝ . Nya lǝ atɛsǝ tsya ele bǝ idii , nyalɛ bifi atɛsǝ bitǝ .
Lǝ bisi utsyuǝ kayoo , manni ke bofo . Fo kemblɛ alosǝ . Fɛɛ kayofofo ka biusiǝ ka biembofo ke bofo kalosǝǝ , ke ni lelabi itǝ mi bayimitsyuǝ . Itsyise utidi saa wǝ nkpe lelabi itǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , ete bǝ utsyue Onanto eto afi nyamǝ koto .
Afi nnya bǝtǝ bo lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mankpo kusiǝ nye kusǝ , manlo utidi , menyu , mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ kuutsyuǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ , ” nya lǝ befi afi nnya kenke bakɔɔ , eka lesa lɔni klon nǝ ni bǝ , “ La fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fe fǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Lǝ aala fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝǝ , embuyifo wǝ kabua . Nyaso lelabi ni lesa nǝ ǝsuǝ afi nyamfo kenke nkpǝsǝ .
Besankli lǝ selabe ǝsuǝ ! Lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise biyi lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpe mɔmɔ . Lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto luulǝkǝ bo ebɔfi mɔmɔ enso lefe nǝ boto Kristo bofo kanɔ .
Ketsye lefe ébubǝ éfe , nya kale fe kalɛ busiǝ . Nyaso bɛyɛ ketsye eto asa buyifo , lǝ bifi amamawu nya dińyǝ itǝ betidi ba nkpe lǝ lekpasǝ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ bekpe .
Bitǝ lǝ bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ ola fe betidi ba laayɛ lǝ lekpasǝ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Nya yenyifo udikpuu eto budi ku sitǝkpǝ ku asɔnɔdidi eto abua ku disialeyifoyifo eto asa ku ntimama ku kenǝmisɛ eto eyifosa .
Bomu bifi Bonamute Yesu Kristo bekpe fe awu , lǝ bilǝkǝ nsusu bitsyiko lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto asa bimba nnya laakle mi lǝ ɔkɔɛ ǝsuǝ .
Befo mi utidi wǝ eto bofokanɔ dimǝmmuǝ tɔ ale ku kafo faa bekpe lǝ mi nti . Biemfi kediǝ betsyako wǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ele bǝ uyifo lee yanle nǝ bǝ uyifo ǝsuǝ .
Utsyuǝ eto bofokanɔ ǝtǝ wǝ kusu bǝ ofo lesa saa budi , fɛ , bǝtsyuǝ ba eto bofokanɔ mǝmmuǝ tɔ alee , didisa nǝ bánkpesinǝ ni nǝ hã beedi .
Nya yanle bǝ utidi wǝ leedi lesa saa mfoo , nyǝ wǝ fe nwǝ dimǝnyǝ utǝ . Nya nko ini yanle bǝ nwǝ leekisi didisa ditsyuǝ tsya kpo nwǝ leedi lesa saa eto ǝnǝmi kasɔ . Itsyise Onanto áfo wuntsya lǝ nkpǝ .
Owoe feni bǝ lǝ akponko utidi bamba eto uyifoyifo lekpo ? Wǝ kosate eto Onamute eto ǝnǝmi eebe lǝ nwǝ mǝ ńyǝ kekleke utǝ wǝ lee , lee unńyǝ . Nya uyifoyifo ǝmǝ tsya ebuńyǝ kekleke , itsyise Bonamute ebofo butǝ nkǝ uńyǝ kekleke utǝ wǝ .
Utidi utsyuǝ eebu nkǝ diyi ditsyuǝ afé leso abamba . Nya utsyuǝ tsya ǝǝnyǝ eyi nnya kenke nkǝ iyifo ani . Ele be utsyuǝ saa nyǝ nkǝ lesa nɛ weeyifo alɛkɛ .
Utsyuǝ saa ke leefi dibu kǝtǝ diyi dutsyuǝǝ , woeyifo nko kefi kǝtǝ Bonamute dibu . Nya utidi utsyuǝ wǝ ke leedi didisa ditsyuǝ tsya , woedi ni kefi kǝtǝ Bonamute dibu , itsyise woasɔ Onanto ani lǝ didisa nǝmǝ eto disi . Nya utidi wǝ lɛnni nkǝ woembudi lesa ditsyuǝ eto okle tsyaa , woeyifo nko kefi kǝtǝ Bonamute dibu . Nya woasɔ Onanto ani .
Bo kuutsyuǝ saa ensi nkpǝ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ hã . Nya nko ke ini bǝ bo kuutsyuǝ saa tsya ǝnkpǝ kǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ busi nkpǝǝ , busi mu itǝ Bonamute . Nya lǝ bukpǝ tsyaa , bukpǝ itǝ Bonamute . Nyaso lǝ busi o-o nye bukpǝ o-o , buyifo Bonamute eto bale .
Nyamfo eso sitintii , Kristo ǝkpǝ , nya usi ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ bǝ lǝ ofiani Onamute utǝ bǝkpǝnkpǝ ku bǝkpǝnsiǝ kenke .
Beso ele bǝ lo fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ dikpi ? Nyee , beso fǝǝnyǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ fǝ wǝ mamflɔ ? Bomblɛ ebunyǝ lǝ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ okponkobo lekpo .
Itsyise báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔninsa Eto Kukue Kɛnkɛ bǝ , “ Bonamute átɛyi nkǝ , ‘ Lǝ lefe nǝ minsi nkpǝ mfoo , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kekleke minkǝ , utsyuǝ saa ebose akonki utǝ mɛ . Nya utidi saa ebofo ɔnɔ nkǝ mɔ mi Onanto . ’ ”
Nyaso utsyuǝ saa lǝ bo nti ebulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
Lǝ nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔyɛ bo bǝtsyuǝ bɔtɛyi bǝ bamflɔ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ bose lesatsyuǝ uyi bǝ boembuyifo kulesa nǝ luuti kuutsyuǝ saa kusu lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ yembunǝ kuutsyuǝ ekpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ .
Se minsi nkpǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Bonamute Yesu esoo , nyi sitinti lǝ mɔ lɛkɔɛsi kemiǝ miǝ didisa saa ǝmbǝ nǝ laabiasǝ kuutsyuǝ . Fɛ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝnyǝ lesatsyuǝ fe lesa nǝ laabiasǝ wǝ , lesa nǝ ǝmǝ ebobiasǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ eedi lesatsyuǝ nnya fenyi fǝ nnyakpe fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ bulǝǝ , yenyifo lelabi fanlɛ bulǝkǝ kate wǝ . Mǝntǝ lǝ lesa nǝ feedi lǝ lebiasǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto bofokanɔ , itsyise Kristo ǝkpǝ lǝ wǝ disi tsya .
Nya biǝntǝ lǝ betidi bamba lǝ bakpe lesa nǝ mi nyi biǝ diyifo lesa sɛɛ , kɔfiɔ .
Itsyise lǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ katoo , budi ku bunǝ manle kulesa . Bomu nnya ǝsuǝ inkpesǝ ni kasɛyifoyifo , diyuǝ ku disuǝyuǝ nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lǝǝtǝ .
Itsyise nwǝ leesumu Kristo lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝǝ , wǝ Onanto laala nya betidi tsya lǝǝtǝ dibu nɛ .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bokpe nkɛale saa boofo lǝ buyifo lesa nǝ laaboko betidi diyuǝ lǝ itǝ betidi lǝ babé disi lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Bianyɛ lǝ didisa eso bebiasǝ Onanto eto keyifo . Edisa saa eyifo kɛnkɛ , fɛɛ yanlɛkɛ bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ didisa nǝ utidi luudi eso yuutǝ utsyuǝ dufǝ lǝ kabua ǝsuǝ .
Lesa sɛɛ ete ini bǝnkǝ , yɛ sinǝ nye nte nye lesa nǝ luunǝ fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ lekpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ budi nye bunǝ .
Nyaso tǝ lǝ lesa nǝ fafo fanɔ lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ɛkɛ lǝ fǝ ku Onanto eto nti ete . Disuǝyuǝ aakɛ utidi lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi aanlo wǝ dikpi lǝ lesa nǝ úyifo alɛkɛ itǝ wǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ edi lesa nǝ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi dimǝntǝ wǝ kusuu , Onanto aalo wǝ dikpi lǝ udi ni , itsyise weentsyue lesa nǝ ófo ɔ́nɔ koto . Nya lesa saa nǝ béyifo dímanyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , eyifo lebua .
Bomba eto bofokanɔ díkǝmuǝ alee , ele bǝ bɔwunsǝko mba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝtɔ ale bǝńyǝ . Nya yanle bǝ búyifo nya lɛlɛkɛ itǝ bo ǝsuǝ ete .
Lǝ nyaso ele bǝ bo nti eto utsyuǝ saa yifo lesa nǝ lɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ nya luutǝ bǝ obe lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise Kristo kulaa tsyaa , inni lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ úyifo . Báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ bǝ , Kristo átɛyi Onanto nkǝ , “ Aka nnya betidi laaka fǝǝ , ǝbǝ ékpo mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Nya asa nnya kenke báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , báwɔni nnya bǝtsyǝ bǝ lǝ bokase asa lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ bokpe lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ tsyaa , utsyuǝ saa lǝ uńyǝ kekleke ɛyɛ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto bɔwunsǝko bo nkpe itǝ bo ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bunyǝ kusubebe .
Onanto wǝ laawunsǝko bo bǝ lǝ bofo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyi nyǝnyǝ saa ǝsuǝ , nya woakpe bo nkɛalee , lǝ utǝ lɔniyifoyifo lǝ lɛkɛ mi lǝ nti lǝ Kristo Yesu eto kama butǝnko ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ mimblɛ lǝ bufi ɔkɔɛ ɔni bebesǝ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto kato .
Lǝ nnya esoo , bisensǝ mi ani lǝ befo bǝtsyuǝ fe kase Kristo dísensǝ ani ófo mi . Biyifo nyamfo lǝ betidi lǝ batɛsǝ Onanto .
Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kakpasǝ minkǝ Kristo ǝbǝ ófiani Yudafɔ eto usumunyǝ bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ ditiki nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi Yudafɔ eto bana eto bana útsyǝ ote nkǝ ditiki nǝmfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ nya bǝ lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
Nya bǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya lǝ batɛsǝ Onanto lǝ wǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ eso . Báwɔni lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔɔtɛsǝ fǝ lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto nti . Nya muusǝ ǝsǝ mfi ntɛsǝ fǝ diye . ”
Nya besi bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Mimba lenni Yudafɔ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku Onanto eto kusǝ . ”
Besi bátɛyi tsya bǝ , “ Mimba lenni Yudafɔ kenke bɛtɛsǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ . Nya mi ese ese eto betidi kenke bɛtɛsǝ wǝ . ”
Yesaya tsya esi ɔ́wɔni ɔlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Yese eto kafo eto ubi ebuke ɔbɔ . Nya wǝ ni utidi wǝ lootaka udi seka lǝ ese ese eto betidi ba kenke lenni Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya buufi mǝ kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Nlɛ lekpakpa miǝ Onanto wǝ ni bo kusubebe tǝ lǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ diyi mi ǝsuǝ kenke , nya lǝ binyǝ diyuǝ lǝ kase bífi mi ǝsuǝ bítǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ , lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale lǝ itǝ bǝ mi kusubebe lǝ kobe kokpe mi lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , mɔ kosate mfo nnɔ sitinti miǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo aba ekpo mi lǝ ǝsuǝ kenke . Nya biyi asa nnya kenke itǝ bǝ biofo mi bǝtsyuǝ asa bote lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Mfí mɔ utu ntǝkǝ sitinti lǝ ni nya minwɔni asa kpǝ lǝ kukue komfo fe kaklomasǝ itǝ mi lǝ asa nyamfo ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ útǝ mɛ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise úyifo mɛ nkǝ ntsyi nwuninsǝ nyifo Kristo eto uyifoyifo ntǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ . Nya lǝ nyifo kesumu eto keyifo ka ni bǝnkǝ mbe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ bǝ lǝ nnǝ mǝ mboko Onanto fe kesumu eto asa nnya nnya luudufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ , ini Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ díyifo nnya kɛnkɛ .
Lǝ nyamfo eso moofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ lǝ lesa nǝ Yesu Kristo díyifo ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo ka minlɛ buyifo kǝtǝ Onanto eso .
Mǝmbofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ kedi etiki lǝ lesatsyuǝ bamba ǝsuǝ enso nnya Kristo díyifo ɛyɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ hã . Utǝ nkǝ nnǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ mboko , bǝ lǝ bǝbǝ betsyue Onanto eto ditiki koto ɛyɛ lǝ lesa nǝ míntɛyi mǝ ku nǝ mínyifo ǝsuǝ tsya .
Nya úyifo nko ɛyɛ lǝ asa nnya mínlǝkǝ mínte ku ayanisa nnya bǝnyǝ mínyifo ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝalɛ ǝsuǝ eso . Lǝ nyaso ídu lǝ Yerusalem ɛyɛ etsyilama ísu Iliriko eto lɛkpɔ mfó , mbe Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya éfia kenke .
Ídu taa kɔ kenkee , íyifo mɔ lelabi kekleke minkǝ lǝ mbé Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya lǝ nlebe bo bánnɔ tɔ Kristo eto diye . Nya inni bǝ lǝ nto ntǝkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ bamba eto lesa nǝ útsyǝ kasɔ ku boto ǝsuǝ .
Bomu bǝ lesa nǝ báwɔni bǝtsyǝ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue kafo lǝ ibǝ itǝ nko bǝ , “ Betidi ba bántɛyi mǝ itsyi lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ lefe nǝ léfee , mǝ luunyǝ bǝtsyǝ wǝ lekpo bate wǝ nɛ . Nya mba tsya dimannɔ tɔ kulesa lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfee , mǝ lɔɔnɔ wǝ kasɔ nɛ . ”
Keyifo ka minlɛ buyifo mfo ǝntǝ mɛ kusu nyaso maamfo mi ɔflɔ bubǝ nɛ .
Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , se mínkalosǝ mɔ keyifo lǝ lɛkpɔ nǝmfoo , nya se minlɛ kusu bɔbɛbɛ lǝ alɛ kpǝ nnya léfe bǝ lǝ mbǝ nyǝ mi esoo ,
mfi nsusu miǝ lǝ mbǝ nlɛ Spania bofee , lǝ nyɛ mi ɔflɔ . Nla miǝ maayɛ mi ɔflɔ lǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ mfó busu ǝsuǝ lǝ nsiǝ lǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ búnyǝ disuǝyuǝ ku bǝtsyuǝ itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ eto kama bólosǝ .
Tsyafɛ mɔmɔɔ , ntɔ lǝ Yerusalem lǝ nsu nwunsǝko Onanto eto betidi ba nkpe mfó .
Itsyise iyifo bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Makedonia ku Akaia eto lelabi faa bǝ baako atabi ǝtsyuǝ lǝ befi batsyese bakombo ba nkpe lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti lǝ Yerusalem mfó .
Iyifo mǝ lelabi kafo faa bǝ beyifo nko . Nya lǝ sitintii , beyifo bayodi lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ ! Itsyise lǝ betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ ǝnyǝ kedikɔ ku Yudafɔ eto lɛwɔnɔ eto asa sɛ ǝsuǝǝ , eyi fǝnkǝ ele bǝ mǝ tsya wunsǝko Yudafɔ ku mǝ asa nnya banlɛ bunyǝ ketsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso lǝ nyifo keyifo kamfo nlosǝ nya bafo asa nnya bǝnyǝ basɔ leboo , muusu Spania nya mɔɔyɛ mi ɔflɔ mfó lǝ mfe ntɔ .
Nyi miǝ lefe nǝ muubǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , nyɛnko Kristo eto atsyɔkpokpo kenke nlɛ mi boboko .
Mɔ bayimi , nlǝ mi lekpakpa tinti lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ ku Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto lelabi ǝsuǝ miǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ boto ola kekleke butǝ Onanto lǝ mɔ disi .
Beto ola bɛlɛ Onanto lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko Yudea eto betidi ba ni mankokafɔ eto ani nya lǝ mɔ keyifo lǝ Yerusalem mfó lǝ kakɛ Onanto eto betidi mfó ɔkɔɛ bamǝ .
Nya lǝ Onanto atɔnɔɔ , muubǝ ndufǝ mi nti ku disuǝyuǝ , bǝ lǝ bomblɛ lǝ bola bɔwɔnɔ busiǝ .
Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝǝ , lǝ usiǝko mimblɛ kenke . Ibǝ itǝ .
Nla miǝ mǝǝlǝkǝ bo ɔyimisio Foebe nte mi . Uyifo ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ utǝ Kenkrea lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti .
Nya nlɛ mi lekpakpa miǝ lǝ befo wǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ lǝ kusu ko dińyǝ itǝ Onanto eto betidi ǝsuǝ . Bitǝ wǝ bɔwunsǝko saa bo wɔɔtɔ utsyiko mi ɔflɔ , itsyise ɔ́wunsǝko betidi kpǝ ku mɔ ǝmǝ tsya .
Siǝsǝ Priska ku wǝ usǝ Akwila ba bomǝ diyifo mɔ beyifoyifotsyuǝ lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝńyǝ bǝ boofo bukpǝ lǝ mɔ disi kulaa tsya . Nya inni mɔ mate ete nlɛ mǝ ani bɔsɔ , bomu ku betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa bamba ǝtsyuǝ kenke tsya .
Lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ bafokanɔfɔ ba laatsya lǝ mǝ diyo mfó tsya . Siǝsǝ mɔ ɔyɛtsyuǝ lala Epaineto wǝ ni ututɛ wǝ lɛtsyi lɛkɔɛsi ɔwuninsǝ ófo Kristo lǝ Asia eto kasɔ mfó .
Nya lǝ ǝsiese Maria wǝ díyifo keyifo kekleke útǝ mi ditsyukpa nǝmfó .
Siǝsǝ Androniko ku Yunia ba ni mɔ kusǝ eto betidi ba ni bonko mǝ bákpe lǝ aba eto diyo mfó . Betidi yi mǝ tinti fe mba baatsyese nkpe lǝ batɔnkpe nti . Nya bɔ́tɔ mɛ lǝ Kristo bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Siǝsǝ Amplia wǝ maala tinti lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ .
Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ Urbana wǝ ni bo uyifotsyuǝ ku ɔyɛtsyuǝ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ ǝtǝ mɛ . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ lala Staki .
Siǝsǝ Apele wǝ bóto bóbe nya búnyǝ boǝ uńyǝ itǝ Kristo . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ Aristobulo eto diyo eto betidi kenke ǝtǝ mǝ .
Siǝsǝ Herodion mɔ otokponyǝ ǝtǝ mɛ . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ Narkiso eto diyo eto betidi ba dífi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ Kristo .
Siǝsǝ besio ba ni Trifaena ku Trifosa ba diyifo Bonamute eto keyifo . Nya lǝ ǝsiǝsǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ lala Persi wǝ ni usio ɔni wǝ tsya díyifo keyifo tinti utǝ Bonamute .
Siǝsǝ Rufo wǝ Bonamute dílǝkǝ fe wǝ ole ku wǝ ambe wǝ tsya lɛlɛ mɛ fe mɔ ambe ke .
Siǝsǝ Asinkrito , Flegon , Herme , Patroba , Herma ku mǝ bayimi bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Siǝsǝ Filologo , Yulia , Nereo ku wǝ ɔyimisio , ku Olimpa ku Onanto eto betidi kenke ba nkpe lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ .
Bisiǝsǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bɛkɔbe bǝtsyuǝ bɛlɛ lǝ Kristo eto kusu ǝsuǝ . Bafokanɔfɔ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ eto etsyukpa kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o .
Mɔ bayimi , nlɛ mi kɔlɛ bɔlɛ kekleke minkǝ bimuǝ ǝsuǝ bińyǝ bikabe kusu itǝ betidi ba lela bǝ beesensǝ mi nti . Kǝnyǝ lǝ asa nnya bóte mi ǝsuǝ kefi keti mi kusu . Bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo eto kaklee , beenyifo Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto keyifo . Bomu mǝ kosatee , mǝ alasa nnya beeyifo nɛ . Nya bakpe kɛnyɛ mlimlimli lǝ mǝ etikididi nnya baawɛ betidi ketitlisǝ asa kakpe mba lanlɛ kulesa bote .
Utidi saa ánɔ kase bietsyue Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ koto , lǝ nyaso mǝǝnyǝ disuǝnyǝ tinti lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lesa nǝ mimbɛbɛ mintsyiko mi ɔflɔ ni bǝ binyǝ lesa sɛɛ bitsyǝ lekpo . Nya lǝ befiani betidi ba lanla asa bua buyifo .
Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝsǝ , ebusǝnsǝ oba Obonsam kenke okpo , nya wuutǝ nkǝ bitǝkǝ wǝ kato lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
Timoteo wǝ ni mɔ uyifotsyuǝ nkǝ wǝǝsiǝsǝ mi . Nko ke ini Lukio tsya ku Yason ku Sosipatro ba bomǝ ni kusǝ kɔni eto betidi bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi .
Mɔ Tertio wǝ lɛwɔni kukue komfo ǝsiǝsǝ mi lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ .
Gaio wǝ lefo mɛ kafo faa ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ laakpe disi mfo kenke bǝ bǝsiǝsǝ mi . Nya Erasto wǝ ni umǝ ǝmfo eto nwǝ lǝǝtsyǝ mǝ atabi ku bo ɔyimisani Kwarto bǝ bǝsiǝsǝ mi .
Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mimblɛ kenke . Ibǝ itǝ .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , bitǝ lǝ bɔtɛsǝ Onanto , wǝ loofó mi nkɛale bokpe nkǝ lǝ bińyǝ kekleke fe kase minlɛ bɔtɛyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ minlɛ bulǝkǝ kate itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ . Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo aka asa nnya bakula nya Onanto dílǝkǝ óte nya lɛkula bo alɛ kpǝ nnya léfe ǝsuǝ .
Fɛ , mɔmɔɔ , bǝlǝkǝ asa bate bǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke lǝ banɔ kasɔ fe kase wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛwɔni bǝtsyǝ . Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa eto lelabi ni bǝnkǝ , ele bǝ babe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo letsya itǝ kawunsiǝ ka kenke lǝ bafo wǝ banɔ lǝ betsyue wǝ ditiki koto .
Ele bǝ bɔtɛsǝ Onanto wǝ hã ni obesibe idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔ lefe saa ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ ! Ibǝ itǝ .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ mimfiani Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpee , mɔ ku bo ɔyimisani Sostene nlɛ mi kukue komfo bɔwɔni nɛ .
Bɔ́wɔni kukue komfo bɔlɛ Korintofɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ ba ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ nya ókpadi mǝ nkǝ bafiani wǝ betidi kɛnkɛ . Fe kase úyifo betidi ba kenke tsya lefo Bonamute Yesu Kristo banɔ . Wǝ ni bonko mǝmblɛ eto Onamute .
Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ boǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ ditǝkǝko mi .
Maasɔ Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ mi disi lǝ wǝ lefonǝ nǝ úfi útǝ mi ɔyɛnko lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ eso .
Ídu lǝ lefe nǝ bíyifo lɔni ku Kristo , biobe lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ titlu lǝ etikididi ka ku kobe tete ǝsuǝ .
Yesu Kristo eto ditiki nǝmfo afo disiǝ lǝ miinti kukɔnɔ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , lǝ lefe nǝ biinyǝ binsǝke Boanto Onanto bǝ utǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo kusu lǝ ulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ otee , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝtǝsa saa eyi mi ǝsuǝ .
Nya woose mi lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Wǝ ni futsyǝ luutǝ nkǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝbǝ nkǝ woakponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bembolo mi dikpi .
Onanto wǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ biyifo lɔni ku wǝ ubi Bonamute Yesu Kristo , wǝ ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ bioka bese nɛ .
Nyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ǝsuǝale nya utǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi kekleke fe mɔ bayimi bafokanɔfɔ miǝ lǝ mimblɛ lǝ bɛnɔ bǝtsyuǝ kasɔ itǝ bǝ kǝsǝnsǝ embɔkɛ mi lenti . Nya lǝ mi kɛnyɛ lǝ keyifo kani lǝ asa nnya biebu disi ketsyiko ku nsusu bo ǝsuǝ bese uyi .
Itsyise bayimi , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba dítsyi Klo eto diyo átɛyi mɛ bǝ kǝdiǝ kpe mi lenti mfó .
Lesa nǝ minlɛ ni bǝ utsyuǝ saa ku lesa nǝ ɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi . Bǝtsyuǝ bǝ , “ Paulo eto kama mintǝkǝ . ” Nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ alɛ Apolo eto kama mintǝkǝ . ” Nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Petro eto kama mintǝkǝ . ” Nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kristo eto kama mintǝkǝ . ”
Mɔɔtɔ mi miǝ nyalɛ boofo Kristo boba kakpe lǝ akpa akpa ? Nye Paulo ni nwǝ díkpǝ lǝ uyi ǝsuǝ lǝ mi disi ? Nye bǝflǝsǝ utsyuǝ ku ntu lǝ Paulo eto diye ǝsuǝ ? Owo lo !
Maasɔ Onanto ani bǝ ményifo kutsyuǝ saa ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lǝ mi nti enso Krispo ku Gaio mate hã .
Nyaso kutsyuǝ saa , embofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ mɔ diye kpe lǝ mba diflǝsǝ wǝ ntu nti .
Mookloma miǝ ńyifo Stefana ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa ntǝ wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi , nya mensikloma lǝ ḿflǝsǝ kuutsyuǝ bamba saa tsya ntu .
Kristo mántsyese mɛ nkǝ mbǝ nkeyifo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa kǝtǝ betidi . Bomu ótsyese mɛ nkǝ mbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ betidi . Nya maanyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobetete eto kusu ǝsuǝ kabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya . Itsyise lǝ nyifo nkoo , nyalɛ Yesu Kristo eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ eto ǝsuǝale ebuyifo ubimba .
Nyi kase betidi bamǝ eto ditsyǝbi ditǝ bǝ balɛ bukpǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Kristo eto ukpǝ lǝ kuyi ǝsuǝ eto etiki eyifo ebukisa lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ bomba Onanto lǝǝtǝ nkǝ bunyǝ bofoo , buyi boǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eyifo Onanto eto wǝ ǝsuǝale .
Lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ , Onanto átɛyi nkǝ “ Mɔɔtsylɔsǝ babesibe eto kobetete . Nya muulǝkǝ nte miǝ bekuente eto etiki eyifo ǝsuǝale itǝ mi . ”
Nyamfo lɛ bote bǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto babesibe ku bekuente ku betidi ba kpǝ nyɛ laafo etiki bunǝ kenke eyifo ebimbasa .
Onanto yi , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kobetete ǝsuǝ úyifo betidi nko , nkǝ lǝ bayɛ bɔyɛ lǝ mǝ kawunsiǝ eto kobetete ǝsuǝ bate wǝ . Nya wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ eto letsya boabe mfoo , nya woǝlǝkǝ eyifo ebukisa lǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto aayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya woǝlǝkǝ betidi ba léfo bánɔ lǝ nkpǝ .
Yudafɔ aabɛbɛ bǝ bǝǝnyǝ ayanisa buyifo . Nya Grikifɔ , mǝ aala bɛ baate kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe .
Fɛ boo , Kristo wǝ básɔ bámanklasǝ lǝ uyikabie usuǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto letsya boabe . Nya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo laayɛ kedufǝ kelǝ Yudafɔ lǝ akɔɛsi . Nya betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya , laanɔ nya fe ebukisa .
Fɛɛ betidi ba Onanto dílǝkǝ utǝ lǝ Yudafɔ ku Grikifɔ ntii , Kristo wǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ boabe letsya mfo , wǝ ni Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ku wǝ kobetete nɛ .
Itsyise lesa nǝ betidi lǝǝnyǝ bǝ iyifo Onanto eto ebukisaa , iyifo kobetete eso betidi eto ale . Nya Onanto eto eyifosa nya diyifo fe yɔkpɔɔ , kpe ǝsuǝale eso betidi eto ale .
Mɔ bayimi , fɛ Onanto lǝ ulǝkǝ mii , biokloma kase bítsyǝ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi ! Mi kpǝ mánte kobe nya bíankɛ ǝsuǝale saa . Nye bíambɔ bítsyi mmfo bo lɛkɛ dibu kafo saa .
Bomu Onanto étsyue úlǝkǝ betidi ba lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ǝnǝmi leeninǝ nkǝ lǝ okpe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto babesibe kofani . Nya úlǝkǝ betidi ba dimanle kulesa lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ǝnǝmi itǝ lǝ ufi okpe kawunsiǝ eto bǝsuǝaletidi bamfo kofani .
Onanto ǝlǝkǝ betidi ba dimanle kulesa lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto ǝnǝmi , nya beembu mǝ kakpe ku lesa nti nkǝ lǝ ɔyɛ lǝ mǝ usuǝ okpe betidi ba kawunsiǝ leebu bǝ mǝ ni mba nkpǝ dibu nya bankpǝ kalende kofani , se benni kulesa eso .
Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ kutsyuǝ saa embofo botaka keńyǝ kasɔ lɛkɔɛsi lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Onanto uni ditǝ kusu nkǝ biyifo bani ku Yesu Kristo . Nya Kristo ǝmǝ ni bo kobetete ko Onanto dífi útǝ bo . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ eso Onanto lǝǝnyǝ bo nkǝ bɔyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya bófiani Onanto eto betidi kɛnkɛ . Nya ófo kayo lǝ bo disi úlǝkǝ bo útsyiko abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo eso Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi wǝ laasɔ wǝ lɛkɔɛsii , ele bǝ ɔsɔ wǝ lɛkɔɛsi lǝ lesa nǝ Bonamute díyifo utǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Mɔ bayimi , lefe nǝ mímbǝ mi ɔflɔ miǝ lǝ mbé Onanto eto etiki kulakula tinti letsya nte mii , ményifo nko ku kɛnyɛ kamini nye lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe ǝsuǝ ntǝ mi .
Lefe nǝ mímbǝ mínkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ni mi etiki itsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo ete ǝsuǝ . Nya naya nsi nso kenke ni lǝ wǝ ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso lefe nǝ mímbǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , mbǝ fe ɔsɔsɔbi . Nya sikpi dímuǝ mɛ ku ketinkǝ tsya .
Nya biunyǝ biǝ asa nnya mínte áte nko ke , yényifo fe utidi wǝ eto kɛnyɛ nkpe kobe nya únyi kobe . Bomu mɔ etiki nya mikǝdii , áte sitinti kase Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nkpe ǝsuǝale .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , inni kawunsiǝ eto utidi eto kobetete ǝsuǝ bɛyɛ béte Kristo , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ mɔ etiki nnya meedi , meedi nya kǝtǝ betide ba nyi kobe nya bekesu sɛtɔ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto asa kasɔnɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya yanka kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobetete nye bǝsuǝaletidi ba leedi seka lǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ nya banlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ bonyansǝ .
Kobetete ko eto etiki minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfoo , etsyi lǝ Onanto eto kobe ko bákula betidi ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto étsyue ketsyue kamfo útsyǝ kokoko nkǝ wuulǝkǝ bo fɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ .
Kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bǝsuǝaletidi eto kuutsyuǝ mánte kulesa itsyi lǝ kobe komfo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ nnya ete bátee , eni bánsɔ Bonamute le uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lesa nǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnyǝ nye woannɔ tɔɔ , nya kuutsyuǝ saa mémbu tɔ disi utsyiko tsya nkǝ yuubǝ itǝ , nya tutuutu ni lesa nǝ Onanto dítsyue utsyǝ utǝ betidi ba laala wǝ nɛ . ”
Fɛɛ bo alɛɛ , Onanto dilǝkǝ wǝ asakulakula nyamfo lǝ lekple óte bo , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eedufǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ nya kaate , nya diate Onanto eto asakulakula kulaa tsya .
Fe kase utidi eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nkpe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ hã nyi wǝ kemiǝ eto lesa saa itsyi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , nko ke ini bǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ hã nyi lesa saa itsyi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nya boo , inni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝtǝ beeyifo asa bua nkpe lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Bomu Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bote ǝtǝsa nnya bófo butsyiko lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , kafo faa , ni ni nnǝ nkpǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , inni kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe eto asa nnya betidi laate bófo búfi bɔnlɛ mi etiki budi . Bomu asa nnya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ dílǝkǝ óte bo , nya ni asa nnya boǝlǝkǝ kate mba léfo Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ nɛ .
Utidi saa wǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo dímamfo disiǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝmbofo ǝtǝsa nnya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lǝǝtǝ bofo . Nya utidi ǝmfó tsya ǝmbofo asa nyamfo kasɔ bɔnɔ , itsyise asa nyamfó eyifo wǝ ebukisa . Nyaso Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nya utidi lɔɔyɛ fɛ wuunyǝ ǝtǝsa nyamfó utsyǝ lekpo kase efo koya .
Utidi wǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lefo disiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝ loofo lesa saa bunyǝ kǝtsyǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ wǝ alɛɛ , betidi embofo wǝ bunyǝ ketsyǝ lekpo nɛ .
Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Utidi saa enyi lesa nǝ nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute eto nsusu . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa tsya anté wǝ kulesa . ” Fɛɛ boo , Kristo eto nsusu kpe lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , mǝmbofo mi etiki budinko lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase muudinko betidi ba Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ díkafo dísiǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu muudinko mi etiki fe betidi ba eto ǝnǝmi nsi ntǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ . Nya bisi biyifo ekpefi kɛkɛ lǝ Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ asa nnya maate mii , eyifo nya diyuǝ imbǝ ale fe kase mintu lɛlɛkɛ itǝ bebifɔfɔ butǝ . Nya yenyifo asa nnya eto kasɔnɔnɔ nkpe ale fe kase inte itǝ utidi wǝ díkabe wǝ leedi asa nnya nkpǝ kalende seka . Nya ta mɔmɔ biambe tɔ itǝ lesa nǝ nkpǝ kalende budi .
Itsyise bisi bisi nkpǝ fe betidi ba difi mǝ nsusu bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo hã eto asa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ kenǝmisɛ si kakpe lǝ mi nti nya biǝdiǝ nniǝ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ , nyamfo mate kulaa ate nkǝ bisi bisi nkpǝ itǝ kawunisiǝ kamfo eto asa .
Lǝ mi nti utsyuǝ esi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , Paulo eto kama mintǝkǝ , ” nya obamba tsya nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔɔ , Apolo eto kama mintǝkǝ , ” bieyifo asa fe betidi ba kawunsiǝ kamfo eto eyifosa léfo disiǝ dinsi lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ nyamfo kenke kamaa , owoe ni Apolo ? Nya owoe ni Paulo ? Onanto eto beyifoyifo ete buni . Nya bɔ́yɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ bofo bɔnɔ . Nya bo nti eto utsyuǝ saa nlɛnko keyifo ka Onanto dítǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo .
Mɔ ni dítsyiko keyifo kamǝ kasɔ fe kase beetsyi diyibibi . Nya Apolo lékpo ni ntu . Fɛɛ Onanto ni nwǝ dítǝ lébe lɛbɔ disi .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , utidi wǝ dítsyii , ku utidi wǝ lékpo ni ntuu , mǝmblɛ ményifo kulesa kinki . Nya Onanto bomu ni nwǝ díyifo , itsyise wǝ ni nwǝ dítǝ lébe lɛbɔ disi .
Bobakefǝ kubutsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ utidi wǝ leetsyi kuyi ku nwǝ laakpo ko ntu nti . Onanto ni futsyǝ wǝ loofo mǝ kayo lǝ mǝ keyifo eto kɛnyɛ .
Itsyise buyifo beyifotsyuǝ lǝ keyifo kani ǝsuǝ . Nya boakɔ ani keyifo ke kǝtǝ Onanto . Nya biyifo Onanto eto ɔkuɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ bunyǝ bɔnlɛ keyifo . Nya bini diyo nǝ tsya Onanto léto .
Nya lǝ Onanto eto kǝtǝ ka útǝ mɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ǝtǝ mfiani fe diyo eto otonto sɛɛ . Nya mintsyǝ diyo nǝmǝ kasɔ lǝ leba ǝsuǝ . Nya utidi bamba díbǝ ɔnlɛ boto kǝtǝkǝ lǝ ni . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa wǝ dibǝ ɔnlɛ boto kǝtǝkǝ , ele bǝ ɔlɔ obe kase ɔnlɛ diyo nǝmǝ boto kayɛnko .
Itsyise Yesu Kristo ni leba nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto dífi útsyǝ diyo nǝmǝ kasɔ ele bǝ betidi be bato diyo nǝmǝ besukosǝ . Nya kuutsyuǝ bamba saa ensi embofo leba bamba bufi ketsyǝ ni kasɔ boto bio .
Bǝtsyuǝ ebufi sika sia nye siflubia nye aba nya nkpe koya , nye keyi nye sefa kato diyo nǝmǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ diyo nǝ utsyuǝ saa léto alɛkɛ nye dianlɛkɛɛ , Kristo eto disumuyo nǝmǝ ni nnǝ luulǝkǝ lete nɛ . Itsyise lǝ disumuyo nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ute buufi bǝlǝkǝ utsyuǝ saa eto keyifo lǝ lekple bate . Ute ǝmfo ni nwǝ luubǝ ukedi keyifo saa obe , lǝ obe lǝ keyifo kamǝ alɛkɛ .
Lǝ utsyuǝ eto bikǝ bia úfi óto diyo nǝmǝ ǝńyǝǝ , lǝ ute áto ɔ́yɛ mfo ófee , otonto ǝmfó ebofo kayofofo .
Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ eto bikǝ bia úfi óto diyo nǝmǝ ato utee , wǝmbofo kayofofo saa . Fɛɛ wǝ kosate ebunyǝ bulǝkǝ fe nwǝ dítsyetsyi ɔ́bɔ lǝ ute ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Ele bǝ bete lǝ ekpako mi wuee biǝ mi kosate eyifo Onanto eto disumuyo . Nya Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise Onanto eto disumuyo eyifo kakɛnkɛkɔ , nya mi ni wǝ disumuyo nǝmǝ . Nyaso lǝ utsyuǝ ata Onanto eto disumuyo nǝmǝ ubuu , Onanto ebɔtsylɔsǝ wuntsya .
Kuutsyuǝ saa manwɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ mi nti . Lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti eebu wǝ ǝsuǝ fe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto obesibee , ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ uyifo ubuki bomu lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ itǝ bǝ woofiani obesibe tinti lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Itsyise lesa nǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi leebu fe kobetetee , nyamfó eyifo ebukisa lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Nyaso Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Babesibe eto asayifoyifo ǝsuǝ nya Onanto laayɛ kemuǝ mǝ lǝ kubu ǝsuǝ nɛ . ”
Nya besi báwɔni bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto yi nkǝ babesibe eto nsusu bufi manle kulesa saa kon . ”
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , yanle bǝ utidi saa kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ lesa nǝ betidi loofo buyifo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ sitintii , lesa saa te mfó itǝ mi lɛlɛkɛsǝ .
Paulo nye Apolo nye Petro nye kawunsiǝ kamfoo , nye ukpǝ ku nkpǝǝ , mɔmɔ nye lefe nǝ luubǝǝ , asa nyamfo kenke eyifo mi ale .
Nyaa , biyifo Kristo eto bale . Nya Kristo tsya diyifo Onanto eto ole .
Utsyuǝ saa kǝǝnyǝ bo fe Kristo eto beyifoyifo ba béfi Onanto eto etiki kulakula lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mmǝǝ , bákpe kɔni bǝ bɔlɛ nya ola .
Nya lesa nǝ lefé itǝ nwǝ laabe Boanto Onanto eto asa ǝsuǝ ni bǝ úyifo keyifo kamǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ mɔ kutsyee , yǝnlǝ mɛ bǝ kuutsyuǝ kponko mɛ lekpo lǝ mɔ ditiki ǝsuǝ nye ɛyɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kobe ǝsuǝ unyǝ nkǝ nta mbu . Maankponko mɔ ǝsuǝ lekpo kulaa tsya lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ lɛkɔɛsi anlo mɛ dikpi saa . Fɛɛ nyamfo anlɛ bote nkǝ meenyifo kabua saa , eso mbɔbɔ mfe lǝ kabua ku lǝ mɔ etikididi kemiǝ . Itsyisee , Bonamute wǝ loofo mɛ lekpo bokponko nɛ .
Nyaso yanle bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kponko wǝ utsyuǝ lekpo isu ese lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu eto dibǝfe nǝmǝ leyo . Lǝ ubǝǝ , wǝ ni futsyǝ lookponko utsyuǝ saa lekpo nɛ . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ luulǝkǝ asa bua kenke nnya lɛkula lǝ lekple ote nya wuulǝkǝ asa bua nya betidi nlɛ bubu tsya ote . Mfo nya Onanto lɔɔtɛsǝ utidi saa dińyǝ itǝ atɛsǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , bǝ lǝ befo asa nnya bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ɛyɛ lǝ mɔ ku Apolo ǝsuǝ kasɔ bɔnɔɔ , nwɔni nyamfo bǝ lǝ bebe bekase . Nya lǝ bekase asa nnya eto kasɔ etiki nyamfo nlɛ bulǝkǝ kate nya báwɔni bátɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Bikeyifo asa bikayɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ tlolololo . ” Lǝ nyamfo esoo , biembu betidi bǝtsyuǝ bakplǝnyǝ beso babamba .
Owoe díyifo fǝ nya fankpǝ kutǝkǝ fanso fuutsyuǝ ? Asa nnya nkpǝ fǝ kenkee , Onanto ni nwǝ dífi útǝ fǝ . Lǝ nko intee , beso faabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato fenkǝ inni Onanto ni wǝ dítǝ fǝ asa nnya nte fǝ .
Lee asa nnya bela biǝ biakɛɛ , bíuńyǝ nyamblɛ kokoo ? Nye batabinyǝ bíkafiani ? Lee bíofiani baka lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe bo lenni tɔ baka ? Ɛlɛkɛ ! Eni seka ele bǝnkǝ bikedi pɛfɛ bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ budi se ku mi !
Itsyise ele mɛ fenkǝ bo mba ni batɔnkpee , kesiǝkɔ ka Onanto dífi utǝ bo ni kafɛfɛkɔ . Nya buyifo fe betidi ba bálo dikpi bǝ lǝ balo mǝ lǝ mba kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nya buyifo abesa nnya kawunsiǝ kenke ku Onanto eto batɔnkpǝ ńyǝ baanlɛ bobe .
Buyifo bamumu lǝ Kristo eso . Fɛɛ mi eyifo babesibe se biyifo bani ku Kristo eso ! Bo eyifo betidi ba lɛyɔkpɔ eso bumbǝ ale . Fɛɛ mii , biyifo mba nkpe ale . Buyifo betidi bimba lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Fɛɛ mii , bekpe dibu .
Ibǝ ese mɔmɔɔ , boǝsiǝ kukpɛnsǝ ku utukuɛ . Nya bikǝ kpãã saa ǝmbǝ bo boalɛ . Nya betidi laablɛ bo . Nya bumbǝ kakɛkɔ saa boǝsiǝ .
Nya boeyifo keyifo kekleke kabe bo ǝsuǝ . Lǝ betidi ékudi boo , boo , boakpo mǝ atsyɔ . Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bǝǝtǝkǝko bo lǝ bate bo ohiãa , bo boakpe nkɛale .
Lǝ báka bo , boefi kafo buɛɛ eto etiki kǝtǝ mǝ mbuayɛ . Betidi ǝǝnyǝ bo fe kuku . Buyifo kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kuku ku ekubi ibǝ ǝsǝ mɔmɔ .
Minlɛ mi kukue komfo eto okle bɔwɔni bǝ lǝ mfi nkpe mi kofani . Bomu bǝ lǝ nlɛ mi kɔlɛ fe mɔ bebi lala seka .
Itsyise lǝ ite bǝ bekpe betidi akpi lefosi ba laalɛ mi ola kulaa tsya lǝ mi bofokanɔ eto nkpǝ bo binsi ǝsuǝǝ , bimbǝ antomǝ kpǝ . Itsyise fe kase binsi nkpǝ nya biyifo lɔni ku Kristo esoo , mɔ ni mi anto , se mɔ ni Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ boboko mi eso .
Lǝ nya esoo , nlɛ mi lekpakpa miǝ lǝ bitǝkǝko mɔ ditsyǝbi kama .
Nyamfo ǝsuǝ eso minlɛ Timoteo botsyese mi nɛ . Uyifo mɔ ubi lala wǝ leeyifo Bonamute Yesu eto keyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ . Wuubǝ oklomasǝ mi kase mǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe Kristo eto nle bo eto kusu mǝǝtǝkǝko . Nya nyamfo maate bafokanɔfɔ kenke kaka kee minsu .
Mi nti eto bǝtsyuǝ átaka bǝńyǝ abesǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kato eso mǝ bǝtsyuǝ fɛfɛ , itsyise bébu bǝnkǝ , mensi embusinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ .
Nya lǝ Bonamute Yesu átɔnɔɔ , muubǝ nyǝ mi lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ . Nya mɔ kosate muubǝnyǝ ǝsuale nnya betidi ba laabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nkpe , nya moobe lǝ inni etiki bimba banlɛ budii .
Itsyise Onanto eto sekadidi aanyɛ ku etiki bimba budi . Bomu yaayɛ ku ǝsuǝale .
Bela biǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ mbǝ nnǝ mi kato lee , lee mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ lelabi ku diyuǝ ǝsuǝǝ ?
Nya mɔmɔɔ , betidi lɛ bɔtɛyi kpǝ bǝnkǝ , sɛsɔnɔdidi kpe lǝ mi nti . Nya mamfokanɔfɔ kulaa tsya anla nnya okle buyifo . Bátɛyi mɛ bǝnkǝ osani utsyuǝ ku wǝ anto eto usiǝ ákɔ okla .
Nya beso biate ǝsuǝ nko ? Keku bomu ele bǝ bikewi . Nya utidi wǝ díyifo nyamfo eto okle , ele bǝ bilǝkǝ wǝ lǝ mimba léfo bɛnɔ nti .
Ite bǝ ntsyo lǝ mi ɔflɔ nya boǝnyǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi tsyaa , nkpe lǝ mi nti lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya se minkpe lǝ mi nti esoo , nlo utidi wǝ díyifo lebua nǝmfo eto okle dikpi
lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Lǝ betsya bisii , ele bǝ bete biǝ mintsya kpe mi lenti lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto ǝsuǝale ebɔkɛ bo lenti .
Ele bǝ beyani utidi ǝmfo bitǝ Obonsam lǝ ɔtsylɔsǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ . Nya lǝ ukpǝ kula tsyaa , wǝ lɛwɔnɔ lǝ dinyǝ bofo lǝ diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu lookponko kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi lekpo lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Yanle bǝ bikabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato . Binyi biǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa sɛkɛ ete laatsyakasǝ ku nnamfo bo banwɔ nnya lǝǝtǝ boataka kabe kato ?
Bilǝkǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa saa , nnya ni lebua , bitsyiko lǝ mii nti . Nya biyifo nnamfo fɔfɔ bo bánwɔ , bo ǝsuǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa saa lǝmbǝ , fe kase minyi miǝ bite seka sitinti . Itsyise bo Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi eboyo . Nya mɔmɔɔ , boolo bo Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Lesambi nǝ ni Kristo .
Nyaso , biǝntǝ lǝ budi bo Ukpǝ Asa Bo Ɔ́yila eto Diyi ku abolo nnya ǝsuǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa koko nkpe , nnya nsusu bua ku asa bua boeyifo . Bomu bitǝ lǝ budi diyi nǝmfo ku abolo wǝ ǝsuǝ ǝyǝnkisǝsa saa lǝmbǝ nya lǝ bote boǝ boenyifo ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto betidi . Bomu lǝ bɔyɛ ku Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ kukue ko míwɔni mintǝ mi kafoo , ńtɛyi mi minkǝ bianyɛ ku betidi ba ni basɔnɔdi .
Mɔmɔɔ , inni betidi ba dimamfo banɔ ete minlɛ . Betidi ba minlɛ ni basɔnɔdi nya baasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ , mba ni beyu , leeyu betidi eto atabi kedi , ku mba lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi tsya . Nya lǝ atɛyi fǝ ǝǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kenke , ete bǝ ele bǝ lǝkǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo kenke ǝsuǝ !
Bomu lesa nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi ni bǝ nwǝ laakpo wǝ ǝsuǝ nkǝ ɔyimi wǝ díkafo ɔnɔ fɛ weedi sɛsɔnɔ nye onkpǝ kenǝmisɛ nye lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi nye laakpo betidi aye bua nye leekpǝ ntǝ nye leeyu , lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ . Nyanle bǝ fǝ ku wǝ kɔ ani lǝ ɔkpɛ ɔni bidi lesa kulaa tsya .
Iyifo lesa nǝ lekpa bǝ , inni mɔ keyifo keni bǝ nkpo betidi ba lenni bafokanɔfɔ eto itiki eto lekpo . Bomu Onanto ni nwǝ lookpo mǝ etiki eto lekpo . Fɛɛ ele bǝ bokponko bafokanɔfɔ mǝ nti eto lekpo fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bela utidi bua bilǝkǝ lǝ mi katsyakɔ nti . ”

Lǝ etiki edufǝ lǝ ofokanɔnyǝ ku wǝ utsyuǝ eto ntii , yanle bǝ ufi etiki nyamǝ usuko manfokanɔfɔ ɔflɔ nkǝ bedufǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ wǝ . Bomu mi nti eto ɔni , wǝ ele bǝ udi etiki nyamǝ nɛ .
Biyi biǝ Onanto eto betidi ni mba lookponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpo . Nya lǝ biyi biǝ mi ele bǝ bekponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi lekpoo , ele bǝ befo budufǝ lǝ etiki wɛlɛwɛlɛ esuǝ bɛlɔ bitsyǝ .
Biyi wǝǝ biǝ bo bafokanɔfɔ bo ni mba lookponko kato eto batɔkpe lekpo . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ kawunsiǝ mfo eto etiki wɛlɛwɛlɛ , so bo ani ku bɔlɛ kabe .
Nyaso lǝ etiki nyamfo eto okle edufǝ mi lentii , ele bǝ bilǝkǝ betidi ba biembu kakpe lǝ kulesa nti kulaa tsya biǝ bedufǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , enso bǝ bifi etiki nyamǝ bisuko lekple kalebe bamba .
Nlɛ mi etiki nyamfo bɔtɛyi bǝ lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ mi . Nya bɔtɛyi bɛnlɛ biǝ obesibe saa ǝmbǝ mi mba lefo bɛnɔ nti wǝ loofo etiki nyamfo bɔlɔ ketsyǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ ofokanɔnyǝ aakpa wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ usuko betidi bamba ba ni mamfokanɔfɔ ɔflɔ nkǝ lǝ bedi mǝ etiki bǝtǝ mǝǝ , nyamfo alɛkɛɛ ?
Nsusu bo nkpǝ mi fɛ biefi mi ǝsuǝ kesuko lekpokakpokɔ aate nkǝ mi bofokanɔ mamflɔ kon . Fe nwǝ léfo ɔnɔ , lǝ utidi utsyuǝ áta fǝ ubu nya fǝmuǝ utu falɛ famankpe wǝ kɛnyɛɛ , yenyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ ensoo ? Nko ini bǝ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ efi fǝ lesatsyuǝ , mankpe utidi ǝmfo kɛnyɛ .
Fɛɛ mi kosate bomu ni bǝtsyǝ léta bibu . Nya bieyu mi bayimitsyuǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto bike kulaa tsya .
Nya biyi sitinti biǝ betidi ba leeyifo asa bua embudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ . Bianwɛ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ sibuki ǝsuǝ ! Itsyise betidi ba leeyifo akuɛnsa , nye mba lǝǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi nye leedi sɛsɔnɔ , nye basani ba laalabe ko mǝ basanitsyuǝ , nye mba leeyu , nye mba laasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ asa ǝsuǝ , nye mba lǝǝnǝ nte bo nkpǝ ale kǝkpǝ , nye baabiasǝ betidi eto aye , nye mba leefi betidi eto atabi lǝ ǝsuǝale kedi , mǝ nti eto kuutsyuǝ saa embudufǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ .

Asa nyamfo mi bǝtsyuǝ díkeyifo kɔ . Fɛɛ Bonamute Yesu ébuflǝ mi asa bua úwui lǝ mi ǝsuǝ nya úyifo mi kɛnkɛ útǝ Onanto . Nya úsinkli ɔ́lɛkɛsǝ mi ku Onanto eto nti ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ku Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Mi nti eto utsyuǝ ebɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Nkpǝ kusu meeyifo lesa saa . ” Sitinti ini . Fɛɛ inni lesa saa lɛlɛkɛ itǝ fǝ . Moofo bɔtɛyi minkǝ , “ Nkpǝ kusu meeyifo lesa saa . ” Fɛɛ yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ lesa saa di mɛ utu .
Utidi bamba tsya ebofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Buyifo béyifo didisa itǝ kafo , nya kafo tsya nkpǝ itǝ didisa . ” Sitinti ini , fɛɛ Onanto ebutǝ nkǝ nyamfo kenke eto lefe lǝ dibǝ lefe . Nya inni bǝ lǝ bufi bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bukeyifo akɔɛnsa eto asa eso ete . Bomu bǝ lǝ bufi nnya bukeyifo Boanto Onanto eto keyifo . Nya wuutǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ se .
Fe kase Onanto létakasǝ Bonamute Yesu utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ , nko ke wootakasǝ bo tsya uńyǝnsǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale nɛ .
Biyi biǝ mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eyifo Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sitsyuǝ . Nya yanlɛkɛ bǝ efi Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sitsyuǝ akɔ ku utidi wǝ difi sɛsɔnɔdi uyifo wǝ keyifo .
Biyi tsya biǝ lǝ utidi éfi wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔkɔ ku nwǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi ǝsuǝ , uyifo ɔni ku wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ . Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ Eto Kukuǝ átɛyi ékpa wuee nkǝ , “ Mǝ inuǝ bamǝ ebuyifo bani lǝ sinǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Fɛɛ utidi wǝ dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ omanklasǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝǝ , uyifo ɔni ku wǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Biensiyifo abua ɛyɛ lǝ sɛsɔnɔdidi ǝsuǝ . Lebua bamba saa eto okle nǝ utidi díyifo , diammankla lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ utidi saa wǝ leedi sɛsɔnɔɔ , weeyifo lebua keńyǝ lǝ wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ .
Biyi wuee biǝ , mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eyifo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nkpe lǝ mi eto kǝsiǝkɔ nya ini Onanto dífi wǝ útǝ mi . Inni mi mbǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise Onanto áfo kayo kpǝ lǝ mi disi . Nyaso bifi mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bikeyifo asa nnya laakpe Onanto dibu .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ kukue ko bɛwɔni bítǝ mɛ eto etiki ǝsuǝǝ , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ osani utsyuǝ si nkpǝ nya waanla nkǝ weefi kusiǝ , bete biǝ utsyue nnya kukɔnɔ .
Fɛɛ se sɛsɔnɔdidi lɛbɔ esoo , ele bǝ osani saa fi kusiǝ . Nya usio saa tsya lǝ usiǝ kusǝ .
Yanle bǝ osani ni nkǝ wǝǝmbɔkɔ okla ku wǝ usiǝ . Nko ke yanle bǝ usio ni nkǝ wǝǝmbutsyǝ wǝ usǝ okla .
Itsyise usio saa eto ǝsuǝ eni wǝ fate eto ale . Bomu iyifo wǝ usǝ tsya eto ale . Nko ke ini bǝ osani eto ǝsuǝ tsya eni wǝ fate eto ale . Bomu wǝ usiǝ tsya eto ale ini .
Lǝ mǝ nti eto ɔni aala nkǝ weesu wǝ utsyuǝ ɔflɔɔ , ele bǝ wǝ unuǝfǝ tɔnɔ utǝ wǝ enso bǝǝ , lǝ iyifo mǝ inuǝ bamǝ eto ketsyue ketsyuǝ ɛtɔnsǝ bǝ lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe kliminti , fe itǝ olatoto seka esoo , fɛ yembutǝ kusu nɛ . Nya lǝ nnya kamaa , ele bǝ besinkli bǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe kase bísiǝ kɔ . Lǝ biyifo nkoo , biembudufǝ lǝ Obonsam eto bulǝ saa ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo menyifo kɔfi minlɛ mi butǝ . Bomu nsusu butsyuǝ ete minlɛ mi butǝ .
Lǝ sitintii , nta nla miǝ utsyuǝ saa siǝ fe kase minsi . Fɛɛ utsyuǝ saa ku wǝ ditǝsa nǝ Onanto dítǝ wǝ . Utidi saa ku wǝ lele nǝ bǝtǝ wǝ .
Mɔmɔɔ , itǝ mba lemfi tɔ bǝsiǝ nye lensi tɔ bǝsǝ ku bakɔbǝsiǝ nye bakɔsee , nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkǝ lǝ bisiǝ kusiǝ memfimemfi , kusǝ mǝnsiǝmǝnsiǝ fe kase minsii , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ mi eso .
Fɛɛ lǝ biǝmbofo mi ǝsuǝ ola bɔlɛ kǝsiǝ lǝ asa nnya lookpe mi bulǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , biofo bǝsiǝ bufi nye besǝ busiǝ . Itsyise lǝ eyifo nkoo , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ utsyu ǝmǝ eso bǝ okayɛ katsyilama kedi sɛsɔnɔ ukafe .
Nya mi bǝsǝ ku bǝsiǝ , kɔfi ko minlɛ mi bokpe mfo eni mɔ kole . Bomu , Boanto Onanto nlɛ mi ko bokpe . Nnya ni bǝ kusiǝ manni kusǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ ɔ́ni wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ wǝ mate siǝ nye wǝ ku wǝ usǝ sinkli bǝsiǝ . Nya yanle bǝ osani tsya ni wǝ usiǝ .
Nya mi bafɛfɛɛ , nlɛ mi nyamfo bɔtɛyi , fɛɛ inni Bonamute eto kɔfi . Lǝ mi mba lefo bɛnɔ fi kusia ko dímamfo ɔnɔ nya usio ǝmǝ lɛtɔnɔ nkǝ bǝǝsiǝ fe usǝ ku usiǝǝ , osani ǝmǝ manni wǝ .
Nko ke lǝ usio wǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ utsyuǝ si kusǝ ko dímamfo ɔ́nɔ nya osani ǝmǝ lɛnɔ kasɔ nkǝ bǝǝsiǝ fe usǝ ku usiǝ , yanle bǝ usio ǝmǝ du lǝ osani ǝmǝ eto diyo .
Itsyise osani wǝ dímamfo ɔ́nɔ ǝmǝǝ , Onanto ebuyifo wǝ kɛnkɛ ɛyɛ lǝ usio wǝ léfo ɔnɔ ǝmǝ eso . Nya nko ke ini bǝ Onanto ebuyifo usio wǝ dímamfo ɔ́nɔ tsya kɛnkɛ lǝ wǝ usǝ wǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ eso . Lenni nkoo , mǝ bebi embuyifo kɛnkɛ . Fɛɛ fe kase intee , Onanto eeyifo bebi bamǝ kɛnkɛ .
Fɛɛ lǝ utidi wǝ ni mamfokanɔnyǝ aala nkǝ wanyani nwǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝǝ , kusu kpe itǝ nko faa . Nya lǝ kusu komfo eto oklee ǝsuǝ , usio nye osani wǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝǝ , kpe kusu weeyifo lesa nǝ kee ola . Onanto ákpadi bo nkǝ bubǝ busiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso fǝ usio wǝ ni ofokanɔnyǝ , lǝ ǝsiǝ ku fǝ usǝ nkoo , etsyuǝ nǝ ebulǝkǝ wǝ etsyiko lǝ lebua eto nkpǝ ǝsuǝ . Nko ke ini bǝ lǝ fǝ ofokanɔsani tsya ku fǝ usiǝ ǝsiǝ nkoo , etsyuǝ nǝ ebulǝkǝ wǝ etsyiko lǝ lebua eto nkpǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lesa nǝ maate lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke nti , ni bǝnkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ saa lǝ usu sɛtɔ lǝ usiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kusu ko Bonamute dítǝ wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kase unsi lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto lékpadi wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ ála lelo fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝǝ , nyalɛ sukosɛ nko . Nya lǝ ámanla tɔ lelo fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝ , mantɛyi tsya fǝ esi esu ala lelo .
Itsyise lǝ ála lelo nye ámanla leloo , nyamfo menyifo kulesa . Bomu nnya lefe ni kase ele bǝ boola lesa nǝ Onanto léte bo nkǝ buyifo , nnya ni lesa nǝ lefe nɛ .
Nyaso siǝ nkpǝ lǝ ditsyǝbi nǝ ǝsuǝ fakɛ fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝ .
Lǝ utidi bamba eto opanyǝ feni fɛ Onanto lékpadi fǝǝ , nyamfo mǝnlǝ fǝ kon . Fɛɛ lǝ ayɛ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ fɔɔyɛ ayɛ utidi bamba eto opanyǝ budi nya lǝ ǝlǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , yɛ lǝ kusu komǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ ndomunyǝ feni fɛ Bonamute lékpadi fǝǝ , eyifo Bonamute eto nwǝ nsi lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ eyifo nwǝ nsi lǝ fǝ esuǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ Bonamute lékpadi fǝǝ , afiani Bonamute ndomunyǝ .
Onanto áfo nya kayo kpǝ lǝ fǝ disi . Nyaso mensiyifo fǝ ǝsuǝ ndomunyǝ ǝtǝ utidi bamba saa .
Mɔ bayimi , mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa yifo lɔni ku Onanto lǝ utidi wǝ fedi ǝsuǝ fɛ bákpadi fǝ .
Mɔmɔɔ , itsyi lǝ nnya bɛtɔ itsyi lǝ mba lensitɔ bǝsǝ ǝsuǝǝ , mámfo kɔfi saa itsyi lǝ Bonamute ɔflɔ . Fɛɛ se Bonamute dínyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ nya únyǝ mɛ nwǝ dińyǝ utǝ esoo , nnyǝ mɔ nsusu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ utidi ebu obe nya unyǝ kase asa nlɛ ale bɔkɛ lǝ lefe nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , nnyǝ miǝ ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bǝ osani siǝ nko lǝ ɔyɛ kusiǝ bufi .
Nya lǝ éfi kusiǝǝ , mantɛyi fǝ aani wǝ . Nya lǝ émemfi tɔ kusiǝ , mantɛyi fǝ eesu abɛbɛ usio lǝ efi .
Fɛɛ lǝ ébufi kusiǝ , émenyifo kabua . Nya lǝ usio wǝ dímǝnsiǝ tɔ kusǝ esu usiǝ kusǝǝ , wényifo kabua saa . Fɛɛ nla minkǝ lǝ nlǝkǝ mi ntsyiko lǝ bulǝ bo leetu usǝ ku usiǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi ni bǝnkǝ , lefe nǝ díbu mensi kulǝ . Nya idu mɔmɔ ɛntɔɔ , ele bǝ mimba mfi bǝsiǝ , siǝ nkpǝ fe bimfi bǝsiǝ .
Nya betidi ba bulǝ nlɛ butuu , beyifo fe bulǝ saa anlɛ mǝ butu . Nya mba lǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ , beyifo fe banlɛ disuǝyuǝ bunyǝ . Nya betidi ba laaya asaa , beyifo fe asa nnya baaya kenke eni mǝ kosate eto ale .
Nya mba difi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ bɔbɛbɛ betsyi lǝ disii , bemfi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ asa nyamfó ǝsuǝ . Itsyise fe kase boǝnyǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ mɔmɔɔ , inni nko biubǝ bitsyǝ lǝ lefe kliminti nǝ luubǝ kama .
Nla miǝ bilǝkǝ mi nsusu bitsyiko lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise osani wǝ lemfi kusiǝǝ , eefi wǝ nsusu kǝtǝkǝ lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ nya woakpe nkɛale keyifo lesa nǝ lɔɔkɛ Bonamute ɔkɔɛ .
Fɛɛ osani wǝ mfi kusiǝǝ , wǝ nsusu ǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo eto asa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise woala nkǝ woeyifo asa nnya lɔɔkɛ wǝ usiǝ ɔkɔɛ .
Nko ini nɛ , bǝ okpe lǝ asakpa ǝnuǝ eto nti , lekpa nǝmfo ku nǝnse , ditsyuǝ saa lɛ wǝ bunǝ . Nya usio wǝ lensi kusǝ nye kebitɛ , eefi wǝ lefe kǝtǝkǝ lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise woala nkǝ woefi wǝ ǝsuǝ kenke ku lɛwɔnɔ utǝ wǝ . Nya usio wǝ nsi kusǝ , wǝ nsusu ǝǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto asa ǝsuǝ , itsyise woala nkǝ woeyifo asa nnya lɔɔkɛ wǝ usǝ ɔkɔɛ .
Nla miǝ lǝ nwunsǝko mi . Nyamfo eso meedi mi etiki lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Inni kɔfi saa mimfi minlɛ mi bokpe . Bomu nla miǝ lǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya biofo mi ǝsuǝ kenke bufi kǝtǝ lǝ Bonamute hã kenke ku mi ketu kenke .
Nya lǝ osani átɔ usio disi nkǝ weefii , nya únyǝ nkǝ bembofo busiǝ kpo eyo lefe nǝ beebuu , boofo bǝtsyuǝ bokpa . Nyamfo menyifo lebua .
Fɛ osani wǝ difi nsusu kekleke nkǝ weembufi tɔ usio ǝmǝ fɛ woofo busiǝ sɛkɛ , woofo ko bɔyɛ bokpa etɔ . Osani ǝmfo tsya éyifo ɛlɛkɛ .
Nyaso , osani wǝ dífi kusiǝǝ , eyifo ɛlɛkɛ . Fɛɛ nwǝ ǝmǝ dímemfi kusiǝ mfó . Wǝ ale alɛkɛ eso nwǝ .
Usio wǝ díkesiǝ kusǝǝ , umbǝ kusu unsi wǝǝsiǝ kusǝ bamba lǝ lefǝ nǝ wǝ usǝ nsi nsi nkpǝ . Nya lǝ usǝ ǝmǝ ǝkpǝ , nya fɛ woofo kusǝ bamba ko woala busiǝko nɛ . Fɛɛ ele bǝ osani ǝmǝ yifo nwǝ lefo ɔnɔ .
Nya lǝ nnya ete woofo busiǝ kusǝ mǝnsiǝ , eni weebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ enso nko . Nko mǝ mɔ nsusu nlɛ mɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ , nya mfo nnɔ miǝ iyifo Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto lelabi tsya .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , nla miǝ maatɛyi mi lesatsyuǝ itsyi lǝ didisa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi ǝsuǝ . Boatɛyi boǝ bo utsyuǝ sa yi kobe . Fɛɛ buyi tsya boǝ kobe komfo ǝǝtǝ bǝ utidi abesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya woate ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lesa nǝ laakpe betidi nkɛale ni lelabi .
Utidi saa wǝ leebu nkǝ uyi lesaa , lǝ sitinti , unyi ni fe kase ele bǝ ote .
Fɛɛ utidi wǝ laala Onantoo , Onanto yi wǝ .
Nya nyamfo ni lesa nǝ minla miǝ maatɛyi mi itsyi lǝ didisa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ ǝsuǝ . Buyi boǝ asa nnya betidi díyifo bǝtsyǝ bǝtǝ kedii , eyifo asa bimba lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo . Itsyise buyi sitinti boǝ Onanto ɔni hã nkpe .
Lǝ betidi lɛ etikii , baatɛyi bǝnkǝ bǝfiǝ kpe lǝ kato nye kasɔ mfo nya bǝfiǝ akpa akpa bamfo fui ku mǝ banamute kula tsya .
Tsyafɛ boo , buyi boǝ Onanto ɔni hã ete nkpe . Wǝ ni Anto wǝ dílǝkǝ asa nyamfo kenke . Nya we ni nwǝ bunsi nkpǝ butǝ . Nya Bonamute ɔni hã wǝ nkpee , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úyifo asa nnya kenke . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya bunsi nkpǝ nɛ .
Inni utidi saa nyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . Asa nnya betidi dilǝkǝ bǝtsyǝ beesumuu , iyifo mǝ bǝtsyuǝ fe sitinti ini ibǝ ese lǝ mmi , bǝ lǝ bedi lesa nǝmfo eto oklee , beebu bǝ bǝfiǝ eto lesa dini bédi . Nya mǝ nsusu bo lǝmbǝ ale laalo mǝ dikpi bǝ edisa nyamfo ǝǝtǝ baabiasǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ .
Inni didisa nǝ boedi nǝ loobiasǝ bonko Onanto eto nti . Nya yembobiasǝ kulesa lǝ búdi ni . Nya nko ke ini boǝmbunyǝ kulesa lǝ budi lesa kuditsyuǝ .
Bebe kukɔnɔ lǝ kusu ko benkpǝ ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ bɛyɛ utidi wǝ eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale bunǝ kakpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ .
Bu abe lǝ utidi wǝ eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale nyǝ fǝ nwǝ nyi nyamfo ni nwǝ ńyǝ nlɛ lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi budi lǝ difiǝyo . Wuntsya ebunyǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ udi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi mfó .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , fǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ wǝ eto disi eso Kristo díkpǝ nya wǝ bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale átsylɔ lǝ fǝ lesa nǝ fǝnyǝ fe lɛsɛsa eso .
Lǝ ibǝ nkoo , nyalɛ alɛ fǝ bǝtsyuǝ ba ni bafokanɔfɔ bota kebu . Nya ǝtǝ fǝ mba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale lǝ ikelǝ mǝ lǝ mǝ akɔɛsi kemiǝ . Nya lǝ ibǝ nkoo , éyifo lebua alɛ Kristo bota kebu .
Nyaso lǝ lesa nǝ meedi ebutǝ mɔ ɔyimitsyuǝ lǝ uyifo lebua , mensiembudi lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi kulefe lǝ kase yuunǝ mɔ ɔnyimitsyuǝ ekpe lǝ lebua kǝmiǝ eso .
Bibu biǝ mimbǝ kusu bǝ nyifo lesa nǝ maala ? Nye minni ɔtɔnkpe nya mǝnnyǝ Bonamute Yesu lee ? Nya inni mi ni eyibibi nnya lɛbɔ itsyi lǝ mɔ keyifo ka minyifo mintǝ Bonamute Yesu ǝsuǝ ?
Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bǝtsyuǝ embofo mɛ fe Bonamute Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpe , mi áfo mɛ nko . Nya fe kase bíyifo lɔni ku Bonamute Yesu , nyamfó mate áte bǝnkǝ mi kosate lǝ nyamfo bulǝkǝ kate wuee biǝnkǝ nyifo Bonamute Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpe .
Nya lǝ betidi aala bǝ bǝǝnǝ nko mɛ eto etiki lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , nyamfo muufi nlǝkǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ kɛnyɛ nɛ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ bǝ bǝtǝ bo didisa ku ǝnǝsa nye ntu .
Itǝ kusu bǝ bo tsya yɛnko bo bǝsiǝ fe kase batɔnkpe bamba ku Bonamute Yesu eto bayimisani ku Petro tsya leeyifo .
Lee mɔ ku Barnaba mate ete ele bǝ buyifo keyifo bobe bo ǝsuǝ ?
Omamanyǝ kuutsyuǝ enyifo keyifo kafo wǝ ǝsuǝ wǝ kayofofo . Nya ɔkuɛmfo saa , kpe kusu weedi bidikǝ bia únyǝ utsyiko lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛ . Nya nwǝ lǝǝtsyǝ bebuki kpe kusu bǝ unǝ mmintu bo beeke betsyiko lǝ bebuki bamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Minlɛ asa nyamfo bɔtɛyi ɛyɛ , lǝ asa nnya betidi eto nsusu dinyǝ bǝ ɛlɛkɛ ǝsuǝ . Nko ini lesa nǝ kɔfi nlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ .
Boakla lǝ Moses eto afi eto kukue esuǝ bǝ , ubuki wǝ fakpa fesuko keyifo ɔnlɛ keyifo kǝtǝ fǝǝ , mankle wǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ uńyǝ ɔlɛ keyifo . Fɛɛ inni bebuki bamfo tinti ǝsuǝ nya Onanto nlɛ etiki budi .
Bo ǝsuǝ eso Onanto nlɛ ditiki nǝmfo bɔtɛyi nɛ . Lǝ sitintii , bo eso báwɔni ditiki nǝmfo nɛ . Utidi wǝ lekpe bidikǝ ku utidi wǝ lǝǝfǝsǝ nye lǝǝlǝkǝ bidikǝǝ , eeyifo nko ku nsusu nye kusubebe nkǝ utsyuǝ saa ebunyǝ bidikǝ biamǝ eto bitsyuǝ udi .
Boto lɛwɔnɔ sɛɛ eto eyibibi bokpe lǝ mi nti . Nya lǝ mi tsya efi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto bikǝ bitǝ boo , ebiasǝ lesa ǝtsyuǝ ?
Le betidi bamba ǝǝnyǝ kusu kenyǝ kutǝkǝ kutsyuǝ ketsyi lǝ mi ɔflɔɔ , nyalɛ ele bǝ bo nyǝ kutǝkǝ kpe enso mǝ kulaa tsya . Fɛɛ boo , boanyɛ lǝ kusu komfó bǝ lǝ bunyǝ kulesa lǝ mi ɔflɔ . Bomu bufi lesa saa butǝkǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ itǝ lǝ Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ lɛyɛ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ disensǝ disu kalebe saa .
Biyi wuee biǝnkǝ betidi ba leeyifo keyifo lǝ Onanto eto disumuyoo , mfó bǝǝnyǝ mǝ didisa ketsyiko nɛ . Nya betidi ba leefi mǝ keditǝtǝ eto asa kesu kǝtǝkǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝǝ , nnya ǝtsyuǝ bǝǝtǝ mǝ fe mǝ kedikɔ nɛ .
Nko ǝmǝ ke ini sitinti bǝ Bonamute dítǝ kɔfi nkǝ betidi ba laabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝme letsya be kǝtǝ betidii , letsya bobe nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ele bǝ bedi lesa nɛ .
Fɛɛ ménfi kusu komfo nyifo keyifo saa ntǝ ǝsuǝ . Nye bɔwɔni minlɛ mi kukue komfo bǝ lǝ ntɔ lesatsyuǝ ntsyiko mi ɔflɔ ? Lǝ nyamfó esoo , lǝ nkpǝ kulaa tsya alɛkɛ itǝ mɛ eso . Itsyise manla miǝ lesanǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ mɛ kusu bǝ mbesǝ ǝsuǝ katoo , utidi utsyuǝ yɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ uyifo nnya etiki bimba .
Yǝntǝ mǝ kusu bǝ nkabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato bǝ maabe ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya eso . Boanto Onanto ebunǝ mɛ koto lǝ mambe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ betidi !
Lǝ nnya ete iyifo bǝ mɔ kosate ete dílǝkǝ keyifo kamfo mintǝ mɔ ǝsuǝǝ , eni moobe kusu miǝ ele bǝ bafo mɛ kayo lǝ nnya disi . Fɛɛ iyifo keyifo ka Boanto Onanto dílǝkǝ utǝ mǝ nkǝ ele bǝ nyifo . Itsyise iyifo keyifo ka Onanto dífi mɛ utsyǝ lǝ ke kɛnyɛ .
Nya nte kayo ka baafo mɛ lǝ ke disi ? Kayofofo ka mǝǝnyǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ni maabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya kafo faa . Nya membunyǝ kayofofo saa lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ meedi ǝsuǝ .
Kusu saa asini kutǝ mɛ se mimbǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ kalɔ eso . Fɛɛ nyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ fe utidi wǝ leeyifo betidi ba tã eto keyifo bǝ lǝ nnǝ betidi kpǝ moko Boanto Onanto .
Lǝ nlɛ keyifo lǝ Yudafɔ ntii , mǝ ǝsiǝ nkpǝ fe Yudanyǝ bǝ lǝ itǝ bǝ moofo mǝ bunǝ kaboko Boanto Onanto . Itǝ bǝ mimbǝ lǝ Moses eto kɔfi kalɔ tsyaa , mǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ nko seka ku mba leetsyue wǝ kɔfi koto lǝ lefe nǝ minkpe lǝ mǝ nti itǝ lǝ mfo mǝ bunǝ kǝtǝ Boanto Onanto .
Nko ke meeyifo ku betidi ba lenni Yudafɔ tsya nɛ . Nya mǝǝsiǝ lǝ mǝ nti fe utidi wǝ lenni Yudanyǝ . Nya meentsyue Yudafɔ eto kɔfi koto itǝ lǝ nnǝ mǝǝntǝ Bonamute Boanto Onanto . Nyamfo aante bǝ ntaka ńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ itsyise lǝ sitintii , Kristo eto kɔfi ǝsuǝ nya meetsyue koto nɛ .
Lǝ nkpe lǝ mba eto bofokanɔ lǝmbǝ ale ntii , meeyifo mɔ ǝsuǝ fe mǝ ke bǝ lǝ nnǝ mǝ mboko Boanto Onanto . Meeyifo ǝsuǝ kakatesǝ ko betidi ba eto nti minkpe itǝ lǝ nyɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ nnǝ betidi mboko Boanto Onanto .
Meeyifo asa nyamfo kenke itǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eso bǝ lǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ nǝ laabɔ ketsyiko lǝ ni keyifo buyifo ǝsuǝ .
Biyi wuee biǝ betidi kpǝ lǝǝkǝ ketsyetsyi etsyi . Fɛɛ mǝ nti utidi ɔni hã lǝǝtǝkǝ kato kenyǝ nnya kayofofo . Nyaso bitsyetsyi nko ǝmǝ itǝ lǝ bitǝkǝ kato lǝ binyǝ nnya kayofofo .
Utidi saa wǝ lǝǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ fɛ weesu ketsyetsyii , waabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kakase lesa nǝ baate wǝ ku nnya esu kenke bǝ lǝ ofo kato butǝkǝ kafo lekankpakpa nǝ laanklɛ fɛ laa bia . Fɛɛ boo , boǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bofo lekpakpa nǝ lǝmbobia kulefe .
Nyamfo eso meetsyetsyi sidididi kesu sɛtɔ bǝ lǝ nsu nla ukuǝ wǝ nkpǝ sɛtɔ . Nya nyifo utidi wǝ laalɔ kabe fɛ woato kekpe nya maanto kekpe waata kebu .
Mǝǝtǝ miǝ kekpe lɛ mɛ , bǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ inyǝ kanyi saa eto okle . Itsyise lǝ mbe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo letsya ntǝ betidi bamba nya bubǝ botsya bokatesǝ ǝsuǝ bobee , mannla miǝ bǝlǝkǝ mɛ lenti bǝ mǝnyǝ ntǝ kayofofo !
Mɔ bayimi , nnla miǝ bekloma lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ bo bana ba dítǝkeko Moses ǝsuǝ . Lɛsɔmiloku lɛyɛ ko mǝ , nya lése mǝmblɛ kenke . Nya báyɛ lǝ ditumbukplɛ sia eto nti bafe .
Onanto éfi lɛsɔmiloku ku ditumbukplɛ sia úyifo fe mǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa fe betidi ba dítǝkeko Moses kama seka .
Mǝmblɛ edi Lɔwɔnɔ eto didisa nǝmǝ tutuutu ,
nya bǝnǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto ntu bomǝ tsya ke . Bǝnǝ ntu betsyiko lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ eto kobansǝ nǝ lɛyɛnko mǝ lidufǝnko mfo . Nya kobansǝ komǝ ni Kristo ǝmǝ kosate .
Lefe nǝmfó kemiǝ kulaa tsya , Onanto mǝnnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ mǝ kpǝ eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ . Lǝ nyasoo , bǝkpǝ lǝ ntɛnti .
Asa nyamfo nnya ele bǝ bunyǝ bokase asa bǝ lǝ abua buyifo eto kamini lensiǝmbɔkɛ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ kakpe bo bulǝ ,
nye bufi ǝsuǝ butǝ bǝfiǝ busumu eto asayifoyifo fe mǝ ke . Nyamfo eto okle Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Betidi bamfo álo bebuki , bédi bǝnǝ ku sitǝkpǝ ku sɛsɔnɔdidi eto asa , nya báke béwui ǝfiǝkǝ . ”
Yanle bǝ ibǝ bǝ bola asɔnɔsa buyifo fe kase mǝ betidi díyifo , nya betidi akpi fosi ǝnuǝ akpi ǝtsyǝ díkpǝ lǝ diyi lɔni ǝsuǝ .
Nya biǝntǝ lǝ boto Boanto bobe . Nko ibǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ díyifo nya bawa dínǝ mǝ nya békpǝ .
Nya yanle bǝ botaka buńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ fe kase mǝ bǝtsyuǝ díyifo , eso nya Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ nkpe ukpǝ eto ǝsuǝale lɛtsylɔsǝ mǝ .
Nyamfo kenke ǝbǝ itǝ bǝ lǝ bufi bokase kobe . Nnya bǝ báwɔni nnya bǝtsyuǝ bǝ lǝ bufi bɔlɛ bo kɔlɛ . Itsyise lefe nǝ ǝsuǝ bonkpǝ mfoo , eboyo kalosǝkɔ .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ leebu nkǝ uńyǝ keklekee , be kukɔnɔ nkǝ weedu ɔnɔ .
Lesa saa nǝ laato fǝ kabee , nnya okle ebofo bubǝ lǝ utidi saa ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto eeyifo lǝ wǝ katɛyi ketsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya wookpe fǝ nkɛale bǝ lǝ afo bunyǝ lǝ lesa nǝ ke nlɛ fǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ , nya yemboso fǝ ǝsuǝale , bǝ lǝ afo bunyǝ kekleke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Lefe nǝ lesatsyuǝ nlɛ fǝ bɔkpɔnkoo , Onanto ebutǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ efi ǝnyǝ lǝ asa nyamfo kenke lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya woote fǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ fǝ ɔyɛ abɔ afe lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ bǝfiǝ busumu saa ǝsuǝ .
Nlɛ mi etiki budi fe betidi ba nyi kobe . Nyaso bitsyue asa nya maatɛyi mi mfo koto lɛ bɛnɔ .
Lɛkɔbe nǝ boefi kasɔ Onanto anii , ńyǝ itǝ Boanto eto kɔtɔ . Nya abolo nnya boedi lǝ bɔlɛ Boanto eto lesa kɛnkɛ budii , aate bǝ bo ku Kristo eyifo bani .
Ite bǝ bufui tsyaa , lǝ sitintii , buyifo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni kplo . Itsyise abolo ani ete ini boedi .
Bibu Israel bebi ba leedi lesa nǝ befi bǝtǝ Onanto kedi , beyifo bani ku Onanto . Itsyise wǝ uni befi asa bǝtǝ kedi lǝ wǝ keditǝtǝ eto leba ǝsuǝ .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , bubu fanlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ bǝfiǝ ba befi ani batoo , nya mǝǝtsya eyifo Onanto kosate ? Nye lesa nǝ béfi bǝtǝ kedi bǝtǝ asa bamba , nyamfo eyifo lesa tinti ditsyuǝ ?
Owo lo ! Lesa nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi , nya ni bǝ , asa nnya béfi bǝtǝ kedi lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto aba ǝsuǝ , befi nya bǝtǝ kedi bǝtǝ awɔnɔ bua , inni Onanto . Nya manla miǝ biyifo bani ku awɔnɔ bua nyamfo .
Yanlɛkɛ bǝ binǝ asa itsyi lǝ Boanto eto lɛkɔbe kafo nya bisi bisu binǝ itsyi lǝ awɔnɔ bua tsya eto lɛkɔbe kafo . Yanle bǝ edi lesa lǝ Boanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ nya esi esu edi lesa lǝ awɔnɔ bua eto kedikǝtǝkɔ tsya .
Nye bela biǝ Boanto lǝ unyǝ ɔblɔ okpe bo ? Biembu disi biǝ bokpe ǝsuǝale beso wǝ .
Baatɛyi lekpa bǝnkǝ , “ Kusu kpe bǝ buyifo lesa saa . ” Sitinti ini . Fɛɛ inni lesa saa lɛlɛkɛ bǝ buyifo . Kusu kpe bǝ buyifo lesa saa , fɛɛ inni lesa saa laaboko bo kutǝkǝ .
Yanle bǝ nwǝ léfo ɔ́nɔ bɛbɛ wǝ maate hã eto kasɛɛ , bomu ele bǝ ɔbɛbɛ kasɛɛ utǝ wǝ utsyuǝ tsya .
Bekpe kusu biaya sinǝ saa sia banlɛ bote lǝ asi kayimi . Nya yanhiã bǝ lǝ bɛtɔ bɛnɔ sinǝ sia eto okle sini fɛ lǝ beya .
Itsyise Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kawunsiǝ ku asa nnya nkpe lǝ ke kenkee , Boanto eto ale ini . ”
Lǝ manfokanɔnyǝ utsyuǝ akpadi fǝ nkǝ bǝ lǝ bidi lesa nya fatɔnɔ fesu , lesa nǝ ke dii , di ni nya mantɔ kulesa anɔ lǝ disa nǝmǝ eyifo kɛnkɛ lee dienyifo .
Bomu lǝ utidi utsyuǝ atɛyi fǝ nkǝ befi lesa nǝmǝ bǝtǝ bǝfiǝ kedi , mendi ni . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto lɛkɔɛsi lembulǝ wǝ nɛ .
Itsyise inni fǝ nwǝ lidi lesa nǝmǝ eto utu eso yuukǝlǝ bomu nwǝ nse . Utidi utsyuǝ ebofo bɔtɔ nkǝ , “ Beso lǝ nkpe kusu meeyifo lesa ǝtsyuǝ fɛ ini utidi bamba yookpe bulǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsii , nya ele bǝ nyɛ lesa nǝmǝ buyifo ?
Lǝ nsɔ Onanto ani lǝ lesa nǝ míndi ǝsuǝǝ , beso ele bǝ utidi bamba bu nkǝ nta mbu lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ se minsɔ Onanto ani ? ”
Fɛɛ kloma fǝnkǝ lesa saa nǝ utsyuǝ leeyifo nye leedi nye lǝǝnǝǝ , ele bǝ uyifo nnyamblɛ kenke bǝ lǝ befi dibu bǝtǝ Onanto .
Bienyifo kulesa nǝ luuńyǝ lǝ Yudafɔ nye mba lenni Yudafɔ nye Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa ǝsuǝ .
Biyifo fe kase meeyifo lesa saa . Maabe kusu miǝ mǝmbuyifo kulesa nǝ luuńyǝ lǝ kutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ . Mambe kusu itǝ mɔ lɛlɛkɛsǝ , bomu itǝ lesa nǝ lɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ utsyuǝ saa bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ bulǝkǝ .
Bebe lǝ bekase mɔ ditsyǝbi fe kase mintsya laabe Kristo eto lele .
Maatɛsǝ mi itsyise biakloma mɛ lefe saa nya biakloma asa nnya minte mi nya biayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lefe saa .
Fɛɛ nla miǝ bekloma wuee biǝ , Kristo eyifo utidi saa eto disi . Nya usǝ tsya eyifo disi itǝ usio . Nya Onanto ni disi itǝ Kristo .
Nyaso osani wǝ laato ola nye laabe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ letsya lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo nya úfi lesatsyuǝ úti disi , wǝǝntǝ Kristo dibu .
Nya usio wǝ laato ola nye laabe Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ letsya lǝ Disumuyo nya weemfi ofiamɛ keti disii , wǝǝntǝ wǝ usǝ dibu . Nya letekɛkɛ saa ǝmbǝ lǝ wǝ ku usio wǝ lɛkpi disi nya wanlɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ ola eto nti .
Lǝ usio ǝmfo mémfi ofiamɛ úti disi , nyalɛ ete bǝnkǝ ɔ́kpi disi . Nya se iyifo afanisa bǝnkǝ usio kɔ disi nye ɔkpi disi esoo , ele bǝ ufi ofamɛ uti disi .
Yanle bǝ osani fi kulesa uti disi lǝ Disumuyo itsyise Onanto éyifo osani lǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ . Nya wǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto dibu kate . Fɛ kusiǝ wǝǝ , ǝǝlǝkǝ osani eto dibu kate .
Itsyise Onanto mánka usio buyifo ketsyiko osani ǝsuǝ . Bomu usio úyifo útsyiko lǝ osani ǝsuǝ .
Nya inni usio eso Onanto díyifo osani . Bomu osani eso Onanto díyifo usio .
Nya lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpǝ esoo , ele bǝ usio fi ofiamǝ uti disi lǝ ete bǝ okpe lǝ osani eto kalɔ .
Nya lǝ bo bofokanɔ eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝǝ , usio ǝnsiǝ lete lǝ osani ǝsuǝ , nya osani tsya ǝnsiǝ lete lǝ usio ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise fe kase bǝlǝkǝ usio betsyiko lǝ osani ǝsuǝǝ , nko ke ini bǝ usio tsya lele osani nɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ nyamfo kenkee , Onanto ɔflɔ itsyi .
Mi kosate bu bebe lǝ ɛlɛkɛ bǝ usio ńyǝ ukato ola lefe nǝ eto lefe weefi kulesa uti lǝ disi ?
Fe kase Onanto díyifo kawunsiǝ , nyamfo mate lɛ bo lasatsyuǝ bote . Yanlɛkɛ bǝ osani yani wǝ disi utsyǝ diyi nya sɛwɔni nyoma . Iyifo afanisa .
Fɛɛ lǝ usio eto sɛwɔni ekulǝ seyoma nkoo , iyifo dibu itǝ wǝ . Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ wǝ sɛwɔni sia dikulǝ fe lesa nǝ díti wǝ disi .
Fɛɛ lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ala nkǝ wǝǝnǝ etiki lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , lesa nǝ ete mɔɔtɛyi wǝ ni bǝ bo Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke ensibǝ kusumu eto ketsyue bamba saa enso nkamfo .
Nya lǝ asa nnya minlɛ muulǝkǝ kate nte mfo ǝsuǝǝ , inni atɛsǝ ini mǝǝbǝ mi butǝ . Itsyise lǝ mi botsya lǝ Onanto eto kesumu ǝsuǝǝ , lesa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ mi botsya ǝsuǝ eni lesa sɛ . Bomu asa bua nso bɔbɔ ketsyi mfó .
Itsyise ditutɛ , nnɔ bǝ lǝ betsya fe bafokanɔfɔɔ , biama mi ǝsuǝ lǝ akpa akpa . Nya iyifo mɛ fe nyamfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ .
Kusu kuni bǝ kǝnǝ dufǝ mi lenti bǝ lǝ ilǝkǝkǝ mba ni bafokanɔfɔ ba ni banikualɛtidi lǝ mi nti ete bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo .
Nya lǝ bétsya fe ditsyukpaa , inni Bonamute Yesu eto didisa kɛnkɛ nǝ bibǝ kedikɔ .
Itsyise lǝ bibǝ bekpe disii , biǝnnyǝ kǝsiǝkǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ fɛ utsyuǝ saa leefi wǝ lesa kedi . Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ kukpɛnsɛ aalɛ bǝtsyuǝ nya bǝtsyuǝ lǝǝnǝ nte kekpǝ .
Nya bimbǝ ayo bǝ lǝ bisiǝ lǝ nnya kafo lǝ bidi binǝ ? Nye bola bela biǝ biǝnǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa nyamǝ bekpe lǝ kofani ǝsuǝ , ku lǝ bekpe bakombo ba nkpe lǝ bo nti kofani . Be ele bǝ ntɛyi mi ? Bɔtɛsǝ ele bǝ ntɛsǝ mi lǝ nyamfo eso lee ? Owo lo !
Itsyise lesa nǝ mímfo mintsyiko lǝ Bonamute Yesu ɔflɔɔ , ni ni nnǝ minte mi nɛ . Nya lǝ ketsye ka ǝsuǝ fɛ boofi wǝ bakpee kɔni , úfi abolo ,
nya se ɔ́sɔ Onanto anii , úbudi nnya nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ nyamfo ni mɔ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia muufi ntǝ Onanto kedi lǝ mi disi . Befo lǝ bidi lǝ bifi bikakloma mɛ . ”
Nko ke ini lǝ didisa nǝmǝ eto kamaa , úfi lɛkɔbe nǝme nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lɛkɔbe nǝmfo ni Onanto eto ketsyue fɔfɔ ka mɔ kɔtɔ úfi óse uyi . Nya lefe saa nǝ biunǝ lǝ ni , binǝ lǝ bifi bikakloma mɛ . ”
Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ lefe saa nǝ biudi nye biunǝ lǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmfo kafoo , bɛlɛ Bonamute Yesu eto ukpǝ bokloma isu ese lefe nǝ usi wuubǝ .
Nyaso utidi saa wǝ luudi Bonamute Yesu eto lesa nǝmfo nye wuunǝ lǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmfo kafo lǝ kusu ko dimantsyɛ ǝsuǝǝ , ebote bǝ uyifo lebua se wǝǝntǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku kɔtɔ dibu eso .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa to wǝ ǝsuǝ obe kukɔnɔ fɛ lǝ udi abolo nye unǝ utsyiko lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto lɛkɔbe kafo .
Itsyise lǝ wante lesa nǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ni fɛ udi abolo nyamǝ nye unǝ utsyiko lǝ lɛkɔbe nǝmǝ kafoo , weedi nya wǝǝnǝ lekpokponkpo kaboko ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo dítǝ bǝ mii nti eto betidi kpǝ ǝmbǝ ǝsuǝale nya bǝtsyuǝ diyifo befinfi . Nya kpǝ tsya díkpǝ nɛ .
Nya lǝ bote kobe nya butsyiko bo ǝsuǝ budufǝ kobee , yuutǝ bǝ Onanto embokponko bo lekpo .
Fɛɛ Bonamute Yesu aakponko bo lekpo nya wǝǝnǝ bo koto bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔyɛ bo bɔtsylɔsǝ ku manfokanɔfɔ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , lǝ betsya biǝ biedi Bonamute Yesu eto lesaa , binyǝ bisiǝkǝ utsyuǝ .
Nya lǝ kukpɛnsɛ lɛ utsyuǝǝ , ele bǝ udi lǝ wǝ diyo bǝ lǝ Onanto wankponko mi lekpo lǝ betsya fe ditsyukpa seka . Nya lǝ etiki bamba kpe , lǝ mbǝ mfóo , bɔɔlɛ nnya bobe .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , lǝ asa nnya leka Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝtǝsa ǝsuǝ , mɔ bayimi , nnla miǝ bete ɔnukualɛ eto ditiki nǝ nkpe lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
Biyi wuee biǝ lefe nǝ bíante tɔ Onanto , bítǝ asa nnya lǝmbǝ nkpǝ kédi mi nya bíkesumu asa nyamfó nya bénya kusu komǝ .
Nya ele bǝ bete biǝ utidi saa wǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi lǝ ǝsuǝ , ǝǝbǝmbofo etiki budi nkǝ , “ Mbusiotidi ni Yesu . ” Nko ke tsya ini bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa embofo bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Yesu ni Boanto , ” lenni Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nsi wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝǝtǝ ǝtǝsa kpǝ , fɛɛ Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝmǝ ete diini .
Esu kpǝ kpe nnya ǝsuǝ boeyifo keyifo kǝtǝ Bonamute , fɛɛ Bonamute ɔni ǝmǝ ete uni nɛ .
Nya nyifo akpa akpa akpa tsya kpe , fɛɛ Onanto ɔni ǝmǝ ete lǝǝtǝ ǝsuǝle utsyuǝ saa weeyifo ke .
Ǝtǝsa nnya utsyuǝ saa nkpee , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ni nwǝ dítǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nyamǝ bǝ lǝ betidi ba kenke lǝ bakɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto kutǝkǝ .
Utsyuǝǝ , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝtǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝ weedi etiki budi ku kobe ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya utsyuǝ tsyaa , Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝtǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝ uyi etikibudi ketsyiko lesa nǝ unyi ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝ .
Nya obamba kpe bofokanɔ kekleke ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo ke ǝsuǝ . Nya utsyuǝǝ , okpe ǝtǝsa nnya weefi katsya bufi ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ke ǝsuǝ .
Utidi bamba aafo ayanisa buyifo kate . Nya utsyuǝǝ , lǝ kase wuudi Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ . Nya utidi bambaa , bǝ lǝ unyǝ awɔnɔ akpa akpa utsyǝ lekpo . Nya utsyuǝ , bele bele eto bɔtɛyi . Nya obamba tsyaa , bele bele eto kasɔ bulǝkǝ .
Asa nyamfo kenke , Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝmǝ eto eyifosa ete ini . Lɛwɔnɔ ni leesie ǝtǝsa nyamǝ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa ɛyɛ lǝ kase waala ǝsuǝ .
Kristo eyifo utidi eto ǝsuǝ eto uyi wǝ nkpe ǝsuǝ eto akpa lete lete kpǝ . Etidisuǝ ani ete ini tsya ǝsuǝ eto akpa lete letee , lɛkɔ iyifo ani .
Nko ke ini lǝ bomba ni Yudafɔ ku ǝsǝ bamba eto betidi ku betidi ba ni ndomunyǝ ku betide ba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ tsya eto nti nɛ . Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝ ete béfi béyifo bo ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpaa , ni ǝmǝ díyifo bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni nɛ . Nya Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni nǝmǝ eto ntu ete béfi bǝtǝ bomblɛ dínǝ nɛ .
Itsyise etidisuǝ ani eenyifo utidi . Bomu ǝsuǝ eto akpa lete lete kpǝ béfi bákɔ fɛ íyifo utidi ɔni .
Lǝ kokpa átɛyi nkǝ , “ Se minni kɔni esoo , mǝmbɔkɔ ku ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamǝ , ” nyamfo anlɛ bote sitinti nkǝ kuni ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ .
Nya lǝ koto tsya nkǝ , “ Se minni dinǝmi esoo , mǝmbɔkɔ ku ǝsuǝ nyamǝ , ” nnya tsya anlɛ bote sitinti nkǝ kuni ǝsuǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ .
Nya lǝ ǝsuǝ nyamǝ kenke ete ni dinǝmii , ntsyǝ yuubǝ fɛ diɔnɔ lesatsyuǝ ? Nya lǝ koto mate tsya inii , ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ fɛ kɔɔnɔ asa eto bɔnyi ?
Fɛɛ lǝ bɔlɛ ola bobee , buunyǝ boǝ Onanto efi akpa lete lete úyifo utidi eto dimu nǝmǝ fe kase wǝ kosate lela nkǝ utsyǝ .
Lǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa lɔni ete ni utidii , ntsyǝ wuutsyǝ !
Fɛɛ fe kase boǝnyǝ , akpa nyamǝ fui . Tsya utidi ɔni ete uni .
Fɛɛ se inni ɔni ete unii , dinǝmi embofo kɔni bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Manhiã fǝ lǝ mɔ kulesa ǝsuǝ . ” Nya nko ke disi tsya lembofo kokpa bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Manhia fǝ lǝ mɔ kulesa kǝmiǝ . ”
Lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ , akpa nya nte fe nnya lǝmbǝ ale saa , nnya bomu lǝ bǝ imbǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝǝ , boǝmbofo kulesa buyifo .
Nya akpa nya boembu kakpe lǝ kulesa kemiǝ , nnya bomu buunyi bǝ ele bǝ bɔlɛ ola nɛ . Nya akpa nnya laannɔ bobe bǝ bulǝkǝ bote betidi lǝ bǝnyǝǝ , nnya boalɛ ola kalɔ kalɛ kukɔnɔ nɛ .
Nya boenyifo nko kǝtǝ akpa nnya betidi lǝǝnyǝ lefe saa . Fɛɛ Onanto dífi nnya ɔkɔ ku akpa nyamfó nko nya útǝ nkǝ bufi dibu butǝ akpa nnya bomu boǝnyǝ boǝ bǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa .
Nyamfo te nko bǝ lǝ ntimama lǝ boyɛ bɔkɛ lǝ akpa nyamǝ nti . Bomu lǝ akpa nyamfo kenke lǝ ifi lɔniyifoyifo itǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Nya lǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa ditsyuǝ lǝ kanyi bunyǝǝ , ǝsuǝ nyamǝ kenke ǝǝnyǝ kanyi nya ǝsuǝ eto akpa bamba tsya lǝǝnyǝ kanyi . Nya lǝ batɛsǝ lekpa ditsyuǝǝ , ǝsuǝ eto akpa nyamfo kenke ǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Nyaso mimblɛ lɛkɔ biyifo Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ siamǝ nya mi utsyuǝ saa eyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ nyamǝ eto lekpa lɔni .
Nya betidi ateate ba Onanto dífi ókpe lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti ni tutɛɛ , batɔnkpe bamǝ , nya dinuǝfǝ , bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , nya ditsyǝfǝ , bateasa , fɛ mba leeyifo ayanisa . Nya mba nkpe ǝsuǝale laatsya bufi nye laawunsǝko betidi nye batɔnkotɔnko nye mba laatɛyi bele bele .
Inni betidi ba kenke ni batɔnkpe nye bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi nye bateasa . Nya inni utsyuǝ saa nkpe ǝsuǝale laafo ayanisa buyifo kǝlǝkǝ kate .
Nya inni utsyuǝ saa nkpe ǝsuǝale laafo bufi botsya nye laafo belebele bɔtɛyi nye laafo belebele kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate .
Nyamfo esoo , bifi mi akɔɛsi bitǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya nkpe kutǝkǝ enso ǝsuǝ . Asa nnya nkpe kutǝkǝ enso nyamblɛ kenke ni nnya muubǝ nte mi mfo nɛ .
Lǝ nnya ete moofo bele bele bia betidi ku Onanto eto batɔnkpǝ kenke latɛyi nya maanla betidii , mɔ etiki nnya meedi kenke eyifo efufu fe kase lǝ basɔ tsyɛnsi eto kakpɛ laale .
Nya lǝ nlǝkǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ nte nya maanɔ asakulakula kasɔ nya minyi asa nnya kenkee , nya minkpe bofokanɔ bo moofo bufi kanyi atini ketsyiko lǝ nnya kǝnyǝkɔ fɛ mimbɛ lelabii , minni kulesa .
Nya lǝ mfi mɔ bikǝ bia nte mɛ kulaa tsya ntǝ bakombo nya mintǝ miǝ batonsǝ mɛ kulaa tsya fɛ mimbɛ lelabii , minni kulesa kon .
Lelabi kpe dibusǝ nya lenkpe kafoɛkpɛ . Diansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi nya diambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya diate ǝsuǝ .
Lelabi entidi ato nya dianta asa kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ nye dinyǝ ɔblɔ . Nnya lelabi emfi nsusu bua lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ .
Nya diǝnnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ asa bua ǝsuǝ . Bomu diǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ asa sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
Lelabi ǝntǝ disi lǝ bofokanɔ ku kusubebe ǝsuǝ nya diǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ bulǝ saa bulǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lelabi ǝmbǝ kasekɔ . Onanto eto kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kpe , fɛɛ ekpe ke kalokɔ . Bele akpa akpa bɔtɛyi tsya kpe , fɛɛ biubǝ mi kasekɔ . Kobetete kpe sitinti , fɛɛ ko lefe ebubǝ efe .
Itsyise kobetete ku kɛnyɛ lǝkǝlǝkǝ eto kǝtǝ ka Onanto dítǝ bo , mamflɔ .
Fɛɛ lǝ lesa nǝ lɛflɔ kenke abɔ dibǝǝ , lesa nǝ dimamflɔ ensi ǝmbɔkɛ .
Lefe nǝ minyifo dikpefi , nkǝdi etiki nya mínkanɔ asa kasɔ nya mínkebu disi fe dikpefi . Mɔmɔ wǝ minkabee , ekpefisa nyamfo mensile mɛ kulesa .
Asa nnya boǝnyǝ mɔmɔɔ , iyifo flufluflu fe kase boǝnyǝ lesa lǝ ahuhɔɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya kama fɛ buunyǝ nnya wuee , ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi . Nya lesa nǝ minyi mɔmɔɔ , mankpako mɛ elo . Fɛɛ kamaa , muubǝ nyǝ lesa saa nya yeokpa wuee fe kase Onanto nyi mɛ mɔmɔ kenke .
Sitintii , asakpa ǝtsyǝ ni nnya nkpe mfo . Nya nyamfo ni bofokanɔ ku kusubebe ku lelabi . Fɛɛ nnya nso lǝ nnya nti kenke ni lelabi .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ lelabi lǝ diyifo lesa nǝ mi utsyuǝ saa lɔɔbɛbɛ kekleke nkǝ lǝ ɔkɛ . Nya bifi mi ǝnǝmi bitǝkǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsa ǝsuǝ . Nya ǝtǝsa nnya nso bofe kenke nibǝ lǝ afo Onanto eto ditiki sɛɛ kɛnyɛbulǝkǝ .
Utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele , weedi etiki ku betidi , bomu Onanto ni nwǝ weedinko etiki . Itsyise utidi kuutsyuǝ ǝmbɔnɔ nnya kasɔ , nya lǝ etikididi ǝsuǝ waatɛyi asa ketsyi lǝ asakulakula ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ
Fɛɛ utidi wǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ kǝtǝ betidi , waawunsǝ ko mǝ nya waakpe mǝ nya woakpe mǝ nkɛale nya wǝǝyuǝsǝ mǝ utu .
Utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele bia eto kasɔ betidi laanɔɔ , wǝ ǝsuǝ ete waawunsǝko . Fɛɛ utidi wǝ lǝtǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ , waawunsǝko bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpǝnǝ kenke .
Iyifo mɔ lelabi lǝ mimblɛ ebofo bele bele bɔtɛyi . Fɛɛ lǝ biofo Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ betidii , yɔɔlɛkɛ itǝ mɛ eso . Itsyise utidi wǝ lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ kǝtǝ betidii , kpe kutǝkǝ eso utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele , siankpa utidi utsyuǝ kpe wǝ loofo asa nnya woatɛyi kasɔ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ mba nti onkpǝ mfo , itǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ lǝ bafo kasɔ bɔnɔ .
Nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ nya minlɛ bele bele bele bia kuutsyuǝ saa laannɔ biɔtɛyii , nte kutǝkǝ ko biunyǝ lǝ nnya esuǝ ? Biembunyǝ kutǝkǝ saa , enso lǝ nlǝkǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ kasɔ ntemi , nye minte mi lesa ǝtsyuǝ , nye minlǝkǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ kɛnyɛ minte , nye minte mi asa ǝtsyuǝ .
Bu abe asa nnya buasɔ nye buefǝ nya ǝsuǝ nkpǝ lembǝ fe kakpatsyaku nye osanku nya lembofo ǝsǝ bufǝ lǝ nnya kosate ǝsuǝ . Ntsyǝ yuutǝ bǝ utidi utsyuǝ ebɔnɔ lǝ ote kusǝ ko banlɛ bufe lǝ utidi wǝ leefe kakpatsyaku nye osanku ǝmfó , amfo nnya bufǝ kukɔnɔ bǝ lǝ afo kusǝ komǝ eto ɔkɔɛ bɔnɔ wuee ketsyǝ lekpo ?
Nya lǝ utidi wǝ leefe kakpatsyaku amfo ke bufǝ kakpadi asa nyamǝ kukɔnɔɔ , ntsyǝ yuutǝ bǝ betidi fo ǝsuǝ bumuǝ itǝ lema ?
Nko ke ete ini bǝ utidi di etiki lǝ sele sitsyuǝ ǝsuǝ sia betidi lembofo lesa nǝ woatɛyi kasɔ bɔnɔ . Bomu wuubǝ uyifo fe ufiebi wǝ lénya údufǝ lǝ difule ǝsuǝ , nya kasɔnɔnɔ lǝmbǝ .
Bele kpǝ kpe lǝ kawunsiǝ , sele kusitsyuǝ saa ǝmbǝ sia lǝmbǝ kasɔnɔnɔ .
Fɛɛ lǝ utsyuǝ annɔ sele sia maatɛyi eto kasɔɔ , ete mfiani ɔfɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ , nya wǝ tsya áfiani ɔfɔ lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ .
Se ǝnǝmi lɛsɛ mi lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsa bofo ǝsuǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɛsɛ mi lǝ befo ǝtǝsa nnya lɔɔwunsǝko bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ luunǝ mǝ isuko sɛtɔ enso .
Nya utidi wǝ laatɛyi bele bele , ele bǝ ɔtɔ Onanto lǝ utǝ wǝ ǝtǝsa bǝ lǝ ofo nnya woatɛyi kɛnyɛbulǝkǝ .
Itsyise lǝ nyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ nto ola , mɔ lɛwɔnɔ ete nlɛ olaa , fɛɛ inni lǝ mɔ nsusu ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso be ele bǝ nyifo ? Mooto ola ku mɔ lɛwɔnɔ kekleke , fɛɛ mooto ola ku mɔ nsusu tsya . Nya muusǝ ǝsǝ ku mɔ lɛwɔnɔ , fɛɛ ǝsǝ nnya muusǝ ebutsyi taa mɔ nsusu kemiǝ tsya .
Nya lǝ ǝńyǝ alɛ Onanto ani bɔsɔ itsyi lǝ fǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ kee , ntsyǝ yuuyifo fɛ utidi wǝ ńyǝ fǝ lǝ akɔ mfo lɔɔnɔ lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi fɛ wɔɔtɛyi nkǝ fǝ olatoto lǝ ibǝ itǝ fe kase fanlɛ Onanto ani bɔsɔ se woannɔ lesa nǝ fanlɛ bɔtɛyi mfó ?
Nya lǝ fǝ ani nnya faasɔ Onanto alɛkɛ kula tsya , betidi bamba embunyǝ kutǝkǝ saa betsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Maasɔ Onanto ani bǝ meedinko Onanto etiki lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ enso mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa .
Fɛɛ lǝ bo katsyakɔɔ , moola miǝ maatɛyi etiki anɔ nnya eto kasɔ betidi lɔɔnɔ lǝ mfi nnya nte betidi asa enso bǝ nkǝdi etiki kpǝ lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ sia betidi laannɔ kasɔ .
Mɔ bayimi , bienyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe bekpefi lǝ mi disibubu ǝsuǝ . Bomu biyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe beninǝ lǝ mi disibubu ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ abua eto esu ǝsuǝǝ , biyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe bekpefi seka .
Nya lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , Boanto Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Muudi etiki ku mɔ Kusǝ eto betidi ɛyɛ lǝ betidi ba laatɛyi bele bele ǝsuǝ . Nya muudi etiki ɛyɛ lǝ bafɔ eto kɛnyɛ ǝsuǝ , Fɛɛ bembutsyue mɔ ɔkɔɛ koto . ”
Nyaso bele bele bɔtɛyi eyifo lesatsyuǝ bulǝkǝkate manfokanɔfɔ fɛɛ inni itǝ bafokanɔfɔ . Fɛɛ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝǝ , nnya ni lesa nǝ muufi nte bafokanɔfɔ asa nnya inni itǝ mamfokanɔfɔ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , lǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke eto utsyuǝ saa etsyiko etiki budi lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ nya utidi utsyuǝ bamba kpe mfo lǝ mi nti nye betidi ba mamfokanɔfɔ nkpe mi lǝ ntii , biǝnyǝ biǝ bɔɔtɛyi bǝnkǝ disi abia mi fe bebuki ?
Fɛɛ lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ saa eyifo Onanto eto Unyɛlǝkǝtidi nya utidi bimba nye utidi wǝ mamfokanɔnyǝ utsyuǝ ǝbǝ údufǝ lǝ mi ntii , wuunyǝ wǝ lebua utsyuǝ lekpo ɛyɛ lǝ lesa nǝ wɔanɔ eso . Asa nnya woanɔ eboté wǝ nkǝ Onanto ebokponko wǝ lekpo .
Nya wǝ kosate ebulǝkǝ asa nnya lɛbiɔ enkpe lǝ wǝ lǝ lekple nya woobokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ ɔtɛsǝ Onanto ɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Sitinti , Onanto kpe mi lenti ! ”
Mɔ bayimi , nla miǝ matɛyi lesatsyuǝ nǝ nkpe lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ lǝ mi disikakpekɔ . Lǝ betsya biǝ biato olaa , utsyuǝ kpe kusǝ ko waala nkǝ wǝǝsǝ , nya utsyuǝ kpe lesatsyuǝ waala nkǝ waate . Nya utsyuǝ tsya ala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto lesatsyuǝ ote . Nya utsyuǝ tsya kpe kɛnyɛ lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝ , nya utsyuǝ tsya ala nkǝ wǝǝlǝkǝ asa nyamfo kasɔ . Fɛɛ bebe biǝ biyifo asa nyamfo kenke bǝ ɛwunsǝko bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ .
Lǝ utsyuǝ kpe kɛnyɛ kǝtsyuǝ ka ola nkǝ waatɛyi lǝ bele bele ǝsuǝǝ , utidi fe inuǝ nye itsyǝ hã te ele bǝ bedi etiki nnya nkpe mǝ ɔni , ɔni . Nya ele bǝ bǝnyǝ uti bamba wǝ tsya luulǝkǝ asa nyamǝ bátɛyi mfó eto kasɔ .
Nya lǝ mba mfó wǝ luulǝkǝ nnya kasɔɔ , utidi wǝ nlɛ etiki mfó , ele bǝ ɔyɛ lǝ wǝ ku Onanto hã lǝ bedi etiki lǝ bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Betidi inuǝ nye itsyǝ ba lefo etiki ǝtsyuǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ ebefo kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ katɛyi nnya le mba dibu lǝ bedufǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ babe kukɔnɔ .
Nya lǝ mba nkpe lǝ katsyakɔ mfó eto utsyuǝ áfo kɛnyɛ ketsyuǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔɔ , ele bǝ utidi wǝ nlɛ etiki budi mfo yɛ wǝ etiki nnya ɔnlɛ budi lǝ utǝ utidi ǝmǝ kusu .
Mimblɛ kenke ebofo mi kɛnyɛ ka bɛnyɛnko bɔtɛyi ɔni ɔni itǝ bǝ utsyuǝ saa ebofo lesatsyuǝ nnya lookpe wǝ ǝsuǝale .
Betidi ba lǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛ aafo ǝsuǝ bunwǝ kalɛ lǝ etiki nnya budi ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise Onanto aala nkǝ buyifo asa lǝ kusu ku diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Kase seka inte lǝ Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke ntii ,
ele bǝ besio di kãã lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto katsyakɔ . Bomuu , ele bǝ babokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ fe kase Onanto eto kɔfi laate . Nya bǝmbǝ kusu bǝ lǝ bedi etiki .
Nya lǝ bala bǝ baatɔ lesatsyuǝ eto kasɔ banɔɔ , mǝ bǝsǝ ele bǝ batɔ lǝ mǝ ayo . Itsyise iyifo afanisa bǝ usio ńyǝ ukedi etiki lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto katsyakɔ .
Nye , bɔtɛyi bɛnlɛ bǝ mi ɔflɔ Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ dítsyi dibǝǝ ? Nye mi ɔflɔ ete ditiki nǝmǝ díbǝ leyoo ?
Lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ eebu nkǝ Onanto eto unyɛlǝkǝtidi unii , nye okpe Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsaa , ele bǝ ibǝ bǝ ote nkǝ , nya minlɛ bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi eyifo kɔfi itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
Nya lǝ utidi ǝmǝ áni ditiki nǝmfoo , ele bǝ mi tsya ni wǝ .
Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , bifi mi kusubebe kenke bitǝkǝ lǝ Onanto eto ditiki kɛnyɛlǝkǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ bienti mba laatɛyi bele bele kusu .
Nyaso ele bǝ biyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , mɔmɔɔ , nla miǝ bekloma ditiki sɛɛ nǝ mímboko mi béfo . Ditiki nǝ béfo bɛnɔ nya bińyǝ lǝ ni ǝsuǝ kekleke lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nya nyamfó ni ditiki sɛɛ nǝmǝ ku ni letsya nǝ mímbe míntǝ mi nɛ . Ditiki nǝ mǝ ebutǝ mi nkpǝ lǝ bɛlɛ ni kekleke , le inni nko mi bofokanɔ eyifo ebimba .
Lesa nǝ mímfo mintsyiko Boanto Onanto ɔflɔɔ , ni ke mímfi míntǝ mi nɛ . Nya nyamfo ni lesa nǝ mímfo ku koya kpǝ enso kenke bǝ Kristo ǝkpǝ lǝ bo abua eto disi fe kase báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue kemiǝ .
Nya bébikǝ wǝ , nya Onanto létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ lǝ eyi ǝtsyǝ eto kama , nya ubǝ unsi lǝ nkpǝ fe kase bawɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ .
Nya ulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte Petro ku batɔnkpe lefosi inuǝ bamǝ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , wǝǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ óte mba ditǝkǝko wǝ ba eso betidi lofa anɔ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mǝ nti eto bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ si besi nkpǝ mmi , ite bǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ ébukpǝ koko .
