Lǝ nyamfo eso ele bǝ bɔtɛsɛ Onanto lǝ wǝ lefonǝ kplɛ nǝ úfi útǝ bo kafo faa ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ubi lala ǝsuǝ eso .
Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo eto kɔtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , búnyǝ bofo , nyamfo ni bǝ búnyǝ abua eto bufikatsyɛ . Nte Onanto eto lefonɛ kplɛ eto okle ni nǝ úfi útǝ bo mfo .
Lefonǝ nǝ eto kakle lǝmbǝ bɔtɛyi . Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kobetete ku kase wǝ nsusu nyi lesa saa eso .
Útǝ bɔnɔ kasɔ ékpa wuee ketsyue kulakula ka béyifo bǝtsyǝ itǝ kǝ bolosǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ .
Nyamfo ni bǝnkǝ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ ayoo , bookpa eyifosa kenke bakɔ , lesa saa nǝ nkpe kato ku kasɔ nya boofi asa nyamfo kenke bakpe lǝ Kristo eto kalɔ .
Onanto ǝtǝ lesa saa ǝbǝ itǝ fe kase óla . Nya Onanto dílǝkǝ bo nkǝ bofiani wǝ betidi ɛyɛ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo lǝ lesa nǝ útsyue útsyǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ kẽ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bitǝ bomba ni betidi tutɛ Onanto díkǝlǝkǝ útsyǝ kokoko bɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ Kristo , lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ bɔtɛsǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde .
Nya mi tsya léfiani Onanto eto betidi se bɛnɔ ɔnukualɛtiki nǝmǝ ini Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto letsyabebe , be bínyǝ bofo , itsyise béfo wǝ bɛnɔ eso . Úfi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝ eto kɛnyɛ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ wootsyese bo , útsyǝ mi lekpo nkǝ biyifo wǝ bale .
Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo ni nnya Onanto dífi óse uyi útǝ bo nkǝ bo tsya ebunyǝ asa nnya útsyǝ kɛnyǝ útǝ mba ni wǝ bale kokooko . Uyisese ǝmfo lɛ bo bote bǝ Onanto ebutǝ bomba ni wǝ bale nyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ . Bitǝ bɔtɛsǝ wǝ diyǝnde !
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , idu lǝ lefe nǝ mínɔ miǝ béfo Bonamute Yesu bɛnɔ , ku kase biala mba kenke díkafo Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔɔ ,
maanyɛ Onanto ani bɔsɔ lǝ mi disi . Maakloma mi lefe saa lǝ mɔ olatoto ǝsuǝ .
Nya maatɔ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto , ɔkɛnkɛnyǝ kenke miǝ utǝ mi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bitsyǝ ǝnǝ nya lǝ ulǝkǝ Onanto ǝmǝ ote mi , bǝ lǝ bete wǝ kukɔnɔ .
Nya maatɔ wǝ minkǝ lǝ ɔsini mi ǝnǝmi , bǝ lǝ binyǝ nnya eso ókpadi mi óboko nkǝ lǝ bibǝ bete kusubebe ko eso ókpadi mi ku kase atsyɔkpokpo itǝ mba ni wǝ balee , lefo koya
ku kase wǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamǝ nlɛ keyifo kekleke lǝ bomba léfo wǝ bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya ǝsuǝale nyamfo , nnya nlɛ keyifo lǝ boo , lekateko wǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamǝ ,
nnya úfi ótakasǝ Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ nya úfi wǝ útsyǝ lǝ wǝ kodiani lǝ kato kenke .
Mfó Kristo nsi ɔnlɛ seka budi nya kato eto sekadidi saa ku kasɔ mfo eto ǝsuǝale saa ǝsuǝ ku ǝsuǝale bamba saa nkpe wǝ kalɔ . Wǝ diye teke kato ǝsuǝale saa ku sekakedikɔ saa lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ku nka nsi luubǝ .
Onanto éfi lesa saa ókpe lǝ Kristo eto akpa kalɔ nya úfi wǝ útǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto etsyukpa kenke fe asa kenke eto Onamute wǝ nso kenke .
Bafokanɔfɔ bamfo ni Kristo eto ǝsuǝ nnya dítǝ ɔflɔ kenke , nya Kristo tsya ni nwǝ lǝǝtǝ asa nnya kenke laaflɔ kalo .
Kɔɔ se béta bibu nya bíyifo lebua itsyi lǝ mi koto mentsyuǝmentsyue ǝsuǝ esoo , bíyifo fe betidi ba díkpe lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ .
Lefe nǝmfóo , bísiǝ nkpǝ fe kawunsiǝ bua kamfo eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ seka . Bítǝkǝko ǝsuǝale nnya nlɛ difule kato eto seka budi eto kama . Wǝ ni lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nlɛ keyifo mɔmɔ lǝ mba lɛni bǝ bembutsyue Onanto koto .
Lǝ sitintii , bomblɛ kenke ǝtsyǝ fe mǝ nya búsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ bo alasa ǝsuǝ , lǝ kase ińyǝ itǝ bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ku nsusu seka . Ditsyǝbi nǝmfo lɛkɛ lǝ bo eso Onanto dínyǝ ɔblɔ ókpe bo , fe kase únyǝ ókpe kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke , únǝ mǝ koto nɛ .
Fɛɛ se Onanto eto kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ itǝ bo mfui nya kasekɔ lǝmbǝ lǝ lelabi kplɛ nǝ onkpe utǝ bo esoo ,
se búkpǝ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ bo abua yifoyifo esoo , útǝ busikli búbǝ nkpǝ ku Kristo . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝǝ , búnyǝ bofokǝtǝ nɛ .
Se buyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu esoo , ótakasǝ bo úńyǝnsǝ ku wǝ , nya útǝ buudi seka ku Kristo lǝ kato .
Onanto éyifo nyamfo nkǝ lǝ ufi ote mba luubǝ kama kenke wǝ lefonǝ nǝ lǝmbǝ bokatesǝko ku kulesa saa ku wǝ kafoɛkpɛ lǝ kase únyǝ bo kaminsǝ lǝ Kristo Yesu eso .
Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ eso bínyǝ bofokǝtǝ , se béfo wǝ bɛnɔ eso . Nya inni lǝ mi kosate eto kulesa saa eto buyifo eso . Bomu iyifo Onanto eto ǝtǝsa nnya úfi útǝ bǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔyɛ ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .

Onanto díyifo bo ku wǝ kosate eto ani nkǝ lǝ buyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu nkǝ lǝ busiǝ kasɛɛ yifoyifo eto nkpǝ bo wǝ kosate lɛlɔ utsyǝ nkǝ bubǝ busiǝ .
Bekloma biǝ bíambɔ bitsyi lǝ Yudafɔ ǝsuǝ , bomu bále mi fe betidi ba lenyi Onanto . Yudafɔ eyifo mba laala alo , nya baaka mi bafɛfɛ bǝ betidi laanla alo . Fɛɛ sitintii , mba laala alo eeyifo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lekpa nǝ betidi leefi ani keeyifo .
Bekloma biǝ lǝ lefe nǝmfóo , bínyǝ kɔsɛsɛ lǝ Kristo ɔflɔ nya bíyifo bafɔ nya bíenyifo Onanto eto betidi ba úlǝkǝ fe kase Yudafɔ . Nya bíankɛ lǝ kɛnyɛ ka Onanto lékle ku wǝ betidi ku asa nnya eto kɛnyɛ útsyǝ ku mǝ . Nya isi enso ni bǝ kusubebe kukutsyuǝ saa mankɛ mi itǝ kulesa nya Onanto saa tsya mankɛ mi .
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ lǝ disi ǝsuǝǝ , bóokpa mi mba díńyǝ kɔsɛsɛ kɔ tsya bíbǝ bíyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu .
Itsyise Kristo kosate léboko diyuǝ lǝ bo nti lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe únǝ lɔniyifoyifo óboko Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ nti . Nya úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ óba kekisi ka nte fe ofati wǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mi nti úlǝkǝ .
Úlǝkǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi ku mǝ akpayifoyifo lenti ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ nkpǝ bo úsiǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ɔkɔ akpa ǝnuǝ nyamǝ beyifo mǝ utidi fɔfɔ ɔni bǝ lǝ beyifo bani ku wǝ , itǝ lǝ diyuǝ lǝ dibǝ lǝ mǝ nti .
Ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpe lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝǝ , ókpla kǝdiǝ ka lɛkɛ lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ nyamǝ eto nti . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ ukpǝ ǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ótsyasǝ betidi akpa ǝnuǝ bamǝ eto nti béyifo utidi ɔni nya úyifo mǝ bani ku Onanto .
Nyaso se Kristo díbǝǝ , óbe diyuǝ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ letsya útǝ mi betidi ba letsyonko Onanto ku bomba lɛfi wǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ nnya bo akpa ǝnuǝ nyamǝ kenke , Yudafɔ ku mba lenni Yudafɔ ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , bofo buńyǝ lǝ Anto Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Nyaso mimba lenni Yudafɔ ensini bafɔ ku bayɛkusutidi bio . Biyifo betidi bani ku mba ni Onanto eto bebi , ku bǝmǝmbi lǝ wǝ diyo eto betidi nti .
Mi tsya eyifo fe ofati wǝ báto bǝtǝkǝ kekleke lǝ ketsyikokɔ eto leba nǝ batɔnkpe ku bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lékpe lǝ kasɔ nya Kristo Yesu kosate ni oseke ǝmǝ .
Wǝ ni utidi wǝ lɛkɔbe diyo nǝ báto bǝtǝkǝ mfó eto akpa nnya kenke ɔkɔ , nya útǝ léfiani Onanto eto kedikǝtǝkɔ kɛnkɛ .
Nya lǝ mi lɔniyifoyifo ku wǝǝ , balɛ mi tsya booto fe diyo kakɔ ku mi bǝtsyuǝ bǝ lǝ befiani kǝsiǝkɔ itǝ Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ , Paulo , wǝ bakpe lǝ Aba eto diyo lǝ Kristo Yesu eto disi lǝ mi mba lenni Yudafɔ esoo , maato ola kǝtǝ Onanto .
Sitintii , mfo nnɔ miǝ bíɔnɔ kase Onanto lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝǝ , dífi keyifo kamfo ókpe mɛ lǝ kɔni nkǝ nyifo itǝ mi kasɛɛ eso .
Fe kase mínkawɔni kliminti míntsyese mii , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ketsyue ka úyifo ɔ́kulaa , óte mɛ .
Lǝ bekla kukue komfoo , biunye kase minɔ akulasa nnya nkpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ kasɔ .
Kɔɔ Onanto mǝntǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi te akulasa nyamfo . Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , útǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ úlǝkǝ asa nyamfo ótǝ wǝ batɔnkpe kɛnkɛ ku wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi .
Asakulakula nyamǝ ni bǝ útǝ nkǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , mba lenni Yudafɔ tsya ǝbǝ báfiani mba leedi Onanto eto bikǝ ku Yudafɔ , bákɔ beyifo ǝsuǝ eto uyi ɔni , bǝnyǝ kedikɔ lǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ka Onanto dítsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Onanto éyifo mɛ wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo eto uyifoyifo ɛyɛ lɛ wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya úfi útǝ mɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ eso .
Mɔ nwǝ ni ɔfɛfɛ kenke minso lǝ mba léfo Onanto bánɔ ntii , ǝtǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ mfi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ fokoya nɛ nkpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ mbe letsya ntǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ .
Nya lǝ nyifo betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ kase ele bǝ befi Onanto eto akulasa eto ketsyue beyifo keyifoo , Onanto wǝ ni nwǝ díyifo asa nnya ta , éfi wǝ akulasa nyamfo ɔ́kula taa lǝ lefe kokoko nǝ léfe ǝsuǝ .
Itǝ lǝ bayɛ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ ǝsuǝ bǝlǝkǝ Onanto eto kobe ateate kpǝ nyamǝ bate kato eto batɔnkpe ku bǝsuǝalenyǝ ba nlɛ seka budi lǝ kato eto kawunsiǝ .
Nyamfo eyifo ketsyue manlo ka Onanto díyifo útsyǝ taa kokoko . Mɔmɔɔ , útǝ ketsyue kamfo ǝbǝ itǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo se bófo wǝ bɔ́nɔ esoo , ókpe bo nkɛale bǝ bɔnyi bɔfi Onanto lǝ bokakase ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso nlɛ mi lekpakpa minkǝ lǝ kanyi ka minlɛ bunyǝ lǝ mi kɛnyɛ esoo , mǝntǝ lǝ elo mi ani itsyise biunyǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Fe kase minlɛ bɔtɛyii , nyamfo eso maase akonki kato ola lǝ Anto ǝmǝ eto ǝnǝmi nɛ .
Wǝ ɔflɔ asa nnya kenke nkpe kato ku kasɔ laafo mǝ diye ketsyiko .
Nlɛ ola boto miǝ Onanto lǝ utǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ lǝ difi ni ǝsuǝale nǝ nkpe lǝ wǝ diyǝnde nǝ léba lékpoo , lǝ didufǝ lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ ke .
Nya nlɛ bɔtɔ tsya miǝ Kristo lǝ uyifo wǝ kǝsiǝkɔ lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nya lǝ mi lelabi eto keyudu lǝ kedufǝ lǝ kasɔ kekleke fe kase kuyi eto kale leeyifo nya lǝ dimuǝ ale ,
bǝ lǝ mi ku mba léfo Onanto bánɔ kenke lǝ binyǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ bɛnɔ kase Kristo laala mi kasɔ , lelabi nǝ leba lenkpo , lɛyɛ letsyo , lebe kato fanloo nya letsyo disu kasɔ tsya .
Nya lǝ bibǝ bete Kristo eto lelabi nǝ biembofo kasɔ bɔnɔ kalosǝ bǝ lǝ Onanto eto ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ lǝ diyi mi ǝsuǝ kenke .
Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ni nnya nlɛ keyifo lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Woafo lesa saa nǝ lefe itǝ bo buyifo kǝtǝ bo enso kase boatɔ nye boebu disi ketsyiko kulaa tsya .
Atɛsǝ itǝ Onanto lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe saa ku idu mɔmɔ isu manlo manlo ! Ibǝ itǝ .
Nyaso mɔ nwǝ nlabe lǝ diyo , se meeyifo Bonamute eto keyifo esoo , nlɛ mi kɔlɛ bɔlɛ minkǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ bo lɛflɔ bokate ko bokpadi bo Onanto lékpadi mi .
Bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lefe saa , biyuǝ buɛɛ ku lǝ bɛkɛ disuǝtsyǝ . Bilǝkǝ mi lelabi bete bǝtsyuǝ ku lǝ bɛkɛ dibusǝ bitǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ .
Bekplatsya lǝ biyifo lesa saa lǝ kɛnyɛ kani ǝsuǝ fe kase Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nǝmǝ dífi mi ɔ́kɔ , lǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Ǝsuǝ ani ku Lɛwɔnɔ lɔni ete nkpe fe kase kusubebe kɔni hã nkpe mi nya ini nko eso Onanto lékpadi mi nɛ .
Onamute ɔni ku bofokanɔ bɔni ku ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ eto lekpa lɔni tsya ete nkpe .
Nko ini bǝ Onamute ku Anto ɔni ete nkpe itǝ betidi ba kenke nya uyifo asa kenke eto Onamute , weeyifo keyifo kayɛ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ nya onkpe lǝ bomblɛ ǝsuǝ .
Nya ǝtǝsa nnya únǝ kafo útǝ bo utsyuǝ saa , akate ko kase Kristo dítǝ .
Nyaso Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Se óbe úsu kato fanlofanloo , ókpa mba kpǝ úlǝkǝ utsyiko lǝ sidomu ǝsuǝ úsuko . Nya úsie ǝtǝsa útǝ betidi . ”
Nya se bátɛyi bǝ óbe úsu kato fanlofanloo , nnya kasɔ nkpǝ ? Nnya kasɔ ni bǝ tutɛɛ , ɔ́yifǝ úbǝ taa kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kasɔ ke .
Nya utidi ɔni ǝmǝ lɛyifǝ úbǝ kasɔɔ , wǝ ke disi óbe úsu kato fanlofanlo nɛ , oso utsyuǝ saa nya ófo unsi lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ lǝ kato ku kasɔ kenke .
Wǝ ni nwǝ dísie ǝtǝsa útǝ utidi saa nya úlǝkǝ bǝtsyuǝ báfiani batɔnkpe nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya lefiani bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi , nya bǝtsyuǝ tsya lefiani mba laabe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya , bǝtsyuǝ ni mba laalɛ bafokanɔfɔ ola , nya bǝtsyuǝ lefiani bateasa .
Úsie ǝtǝsa nyamfo útǝ nkǝ lǝ ufi ɔlɔ Onanto eto betidi utsyǝ bǝ lǝ ufi ɔlɔ bafokanɔfɔ utsyǝ lǝ beyifo wǝ keyifo , nya yɛkɔ ku nyamfoo , lǝ ufi ǝsuǝale okpe Kristo eto ǝsuǝ nnya ni bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ .
Onanto éyifo nyamfo nkǝ lǝ bomblɛ lǝ bubǝ buyifo bani lǝ nnya bofo bɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , ku lǝ bubǝ bote Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ . Lǝ bubǝ bobe bɔflɔ butsyǝ fe Kristo nya lǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ kenke lǝ leba didufǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ butsyǝ fe wǝ ke .
Nya boensi embutsyǝ fe bekpefi ba eto nsusu dímambe , ba asatete fɔfɔ saa nte fǝ ufiebi wǝ laasɔ keke mǝ kesuko sɛtɔ ku kama , nya bidiabidia eto bateasa laawɛ mǝ kakpe lǝ mǝ nsusu bua ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo eto kɛnyɛ , bǝ lǝ bɔtɛyi ɔnukualɛ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , bubǝ bobé lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ fe Kristo wǝ nwǝ ni bo disi .
Wǝ lɛkɔbe utidi eto uyi ǝmǝ kenke eto ntsyakɔ ku kate kenke ɔnlɛ ɔni , itǝ bǝ utidi eto uyi ǝmǝ kenke eeyifo keyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , kabé kaflɔ kawunsǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ .
Nlɛ mi kɔlɛ bɔlɛ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ minkǝ biensisiǝ nkpǝ fe mba lenyi Onanto , ini asa bimba hã eto disi beebu .
Nya mǝ nsusu nkpe lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Nya bǝmbǝ kedikɔ saa lǝ Onanto eto nkpǝ bo wǝǝtǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise benyi nnya kulesa kon tsya , nya bankpe letotidi .
Benyi kofani nyaso asa buayifoyifo eto kama hã bǝǝtǝkǝko . Nya baasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ asa nnya laabiasǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ saa eto buyifo ǝsuǝ .
Bebe , inni nyamfo eto okle békase bitsyi lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ éfi nnya minkǝ bɛnɔ asa itsyi lǝ wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya fe mba ntǝkǝko wǝ kamaa , báte mi ɔnukualɛtiki nnya nkpe lǝ Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Beyani ditsyǝbi koko eto nkpǝ bo bísiǝ , nǝ dítǝ bísiǝ nkpǝ bo eto okle bísiǝ léfe . Asa nyamfo díkawɛ mi kakpe nya bíkǝtǝkǝko ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto eyifosa eto nkpǝ bo laabiasǝ utidi eto nkpǝ .
Bɛtsyi mi ketu ku nsusu bɛwuninsǝ lǝ biyifo bafɔfɔ .
Nya bifi ditsyǝbi fɔfɔ nǝ béyifo lǝ Onanto eto ditsyǝbi ǝsuǝ nya weeyifo asa lǝ kusu ko diyifo kɛnkɛ bekpe fe awu .
Nyaso bɛyɛ sidia bɔtɛyi . Utsyuǝ saa tɛyi wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ ɔnukualɛ itsyise bo nti eto utsyuǝ saa lɛkɔ buyifo Kristo eto ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ ǝnyǝ ɔblɔɔ , mǝntǝ lǝ fǝ ɔblɔ ǝmǝ lǝ okpa fǝ okpe lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ nya mǝntǝ lǝ kofe lǝ kudufǝ fǝ diyo ku ɔblɔ .
Biǝntǝ Obonsam kusu saa .
Utidi wǝ leeyuu , sinkli ɔyɛ buyu lǝ ufi wǝ ani uyifo keyifo sɛɛ lǝ ɔkɛ lesatsyuǝ nǝ ofo bufi kawunsǝko bakombo .
Biǝntǝ lǝ ditiki bua saa lǝ lɛbɔ ditsyi lǝ mi kɛnyɛ , bomu bidi etiki nnya lɔɔwunsǝko utidi lɔ wǝ utsyǝ , lǝ iyifo lɛwunsǝkobi itǝ mba lɛnɔ nnya .
Bienyifo kulesa nǝ lembutǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ . Itsyise Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ befi bǝtsyǝ mi lekpo nǝ lete bǝ nǝ Onanto ebofo mi lǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyi fɛfɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Biǝntǝ lefonfi lɛkɛ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ , bilǝkǝ ɔblɔ kekleke ku lefonyi bitsyiko lǝ mi akɔɛsi . Bilǝkǝ lǝ mi nti kudukpokpo bimba , betidi eto diebiasǝbiasǝ ku nsusu bua saa kenke fifi lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nnya kɛnyɛɛ , bitǝ lǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ eto asa lǝ ɛlɛ mi kaminsǝ lǝ biyifo kafo ɛkpɛ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Bifi abua bɛtsyɛ bǝtsyuǝ fe kase Onanto tsya dífi mi ale ɔ́tsyɛ mi ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Se biyifo Onanto eto bebi lala esoo , ele bǝ bekplatsya lǝ bitsyǝ fe wǝ .
Bilǝkǝ lelabi bete lǝ mi nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase Kristo laala bo nya úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ fe kedi ka laanyi fififi útǝ Onanto lǝ bo disi . Nyamfo eyifo keditǝtǝ ka laakpe Onanto disuǝyuǝ .
Se biyifo Onanto eto betidi esoo , yensile bǝ bakpo sɛsɔnɔdi ku asinsayifoyifo saa nye kunǝkpǝ eto diye ko lǝ mi nti .
Nko ke yensile bǝ bɔtɛyi kulesa butsyiko lǝ asinsa ǝsuǝ ku akɔɛnsa nye amumusa ǝsuǝ . Bomu ele bǝ bufi lɛninsɔ butǝ Onanto .
Itsyise mi kosate yi biǝ utidi wǝ kee ni ɔsɔnɔdi nye leeyifo asinsa nye nkpe kunǝkpǝǝ , embunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ Kristo ku Onanto eto sekakedikɔ kǝmiǝ . Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , kǝnǝnsɛ lǝ asa ǝsuǝ akateko sifiǝsumu .
Biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpe ku etiki bimba saa , itsyise asa nyamfo eto kakle eso Onanto eto lefonyi looba lekpo lǝ mba nkpe letotidi ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nyaso mi ku mǝ mamfloma ani bǝtsyuǝ lǝ mǝ eyifosa ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise kɔɔ , bɛkɛ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , se bíkafiani Bonamute eto betidi esoo , bifi bekpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Nyaso bisiǝ nkpǝ fe betidi ba nkpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ ,
itsyise awɔnsa nnya laabɔ ketsyi lǝ betidi ba nsi nkpǝ lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ ni asa sɛɛ buyifo , asa buyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ ku ɔnukualɛ tɛyitɛyi .
Bekplatsya lǝ bekase asayifoyifo nnya laakpe Bonamute disuǝyuǝ .
Biankɔ ani ku mba eto eyifosa nsi nyɛ lǝ ketuntu nnya laambɔ awɔnsa saa ǝsuǝ . Bomu bilǝkǝ mǝ bete .
Itsyise iyifo afanisa tinti bǝ bedi etiki itsyiko lǝ eyifosa nyamfo eto okle ǝsuǝ lǝ kabiɔbiɔ ǝsuǝ kula tsya .
Nya lǝ bǝlǝkǝ asa nyamǝ kenke lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ batée , ete boonyǝ mǝ ditsyǝbi nǝmǝ kosate wuee nɛ .
Itsyise lesa saa nǝ bǝlǝkǝ batee lekplee , aabɔ bǝǝnyǝ lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo eso baatɛyi bǝ , “ Sankli fǝ nwǝ nlɛ selabe , taka etsyi ɔkɔmǝ ǝbǝ , lǝ Kristo lǝ uyǝnde okpo fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Nyaso bebe sinini kase binsi nkpǝ . Biǝnsiǝ nkpǝ fe betidi ba lenyi kobe . Bomu bisiǝ nkpǝ fe betidi ba nyi kobe .
Biyifo kusu ko ditu mi mfo eto keyifo kukɔnɔ , itsyise asa buayifoyifo lǝ lefe nǝ bonkpe mfo ǝbǝ ebe kato tinti .
Le nyasoo , bienyifo mi ǝsuǝ fe betidibuki . Bomu bɛbɛbɛ lǝ bete asa nnya Bonamute ǝmǝ laala nkǝ biyifo .
Biǝnnǝ nte bikpǝ itsyise nyamfo akpe mi lǝ abuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lǝ lefo disiǝ lǝ mi kenke .
Nya bifi Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue eto ǝsǝ eto etiki , ku atɛsɛ eto ǝsǝ , ku bofokanɔ eto ǝsǝ bidinko mi bǝtsyuǝ etiki . Nya bifi atɛsɛ eto ǝsǝ ku ǝsǝ minimini bɛtɛsǝ Bonamute lǝ mi akɔɛsi .
Bɛsɔ Boanto Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ .
Bebokosǝ mi ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ fe kase biebu Kristo seka .
Besio bokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ kosate eto bǝsǝ fe kase baabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kǝtǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ .
Itsyise usǝ ni disi utǝ usiǝ fe kase bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa eto disi ni Kristo . Ditsyukpa nǝmǝ ni Kristo eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nya Kristo kosate ǝmǝ ni se Ofomfokǝtǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , fe kase bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ lebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ dítǝ Kristoo , nko ke ini bǝ bǝsiǝ tsya bokasǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ bǝsǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Bǝsǝ , bela mi bǝsiǝ fe kase Kristo léla bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ nya úfi wǝ nkpǝ útǝ lǝ ni disi seka .
Úyifo nyamfo lǝ ufi uyifo bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ kɛnkɛ utǝ Onanto lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe úflǝ ni ku wǝ ditiki fe ntu ókpasǝ .
Waanla nkǝ keni kukǝtsyuǝ saa lǝ kǝlǝ ni kukalebe saa lǝ kakpɔtsyi , nye lǝ keni kukǝtsyuǝ saa eto okle lǝ kǝtǝkǝ lǝ ni . Ola nkǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ lǝ diyifo kɛnkɛ , bǝnnyǝ kabiakɔ saa lǝ ni . Lǝ balɔkɔsǝ ni kukɔnɔ fɛ befi ni babɔnko lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi .
Mmǝ ke ele bǝ bǝsǝ la mǝ bǝsiǝ fe kase baala mǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ nɛ . Nya osani wǝ laala wǝ usiǝǝ , wǝ kosate ɔnlɛ bola .
Kuutsyuǝ saa eenyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ disiale . Bomuu , waalɛ se ola bǝ lǝ sɛkɛ ale , fe kase Kristo leeyifo kǝtǝ mba bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ .
Itsyise wǝ ǝsuǝ eto lekpa buni butǝ wǝ .
Fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ nyamfo eso osani du lǝ wǝ anto ku ambe ɔflɔ usu ɔkɔ ku wǝ usiǝ nya mǝ inuǝ bamǝ loofiani ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sɔni . ”
Kasɔnɔnɔ ka letsyoo , abiɔ kakpe lǝ ditiki nǝmfo kǝmiǝ . Mɔ éfi nnya fe Kristo ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa ǝsuǝǝ , banlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko .
Fɛɛ ɛlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ fintsya ǝsuǝ . Nya ni bǝ , ele bǝ mi utsyuǝ saa la wǝ usiǝ fe wǝ ǝsuǝ , nya usiǝ saa tsya lǝ ubu wǝ usǝ .
Mi bebii , bitsyue mi antomǝ ku ambemǝ koto fe kase ɛnyɛ lɛ Kristo eto kusu ǝsuǝ itsyise nnya ni lesa nǝ lɛtsyɛ bǝ biyifo nɛ .
Kɔfi kpekpe tutɛ ko kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ nkpe ni bǝnkǝ , “ Bu fǝ anto ku fǝ ambe . ”
Isukosǝ ɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bǝ lǝ ɛlɛkɛko fǝ lǝ ǝsiǝ nkpǝ kǝntsyɛ lǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ . ”
Antomǝǝ , biankpe mi bebi lɛblɔfi . Bomuu , bikulɛsǝ mǝ lǝ binǝ mǝ ku kɔlɛlɛlɛ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute eto bofokanɔ eto kusu ǝsuǝ .
Ndomufɔ , mimba leeyifo betidi bamba eto nyifoo , bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ bitsyue mi kasɔ mfo eto banamute koto itsyi taa mi ketu kǝmiǝ fe kase bietsyue Kristo eto ditiki koto .
Bienyifo nko lǝ lefe nǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ batɛsǝ mi eso bomuu , bifi mi ǝsuǝale kenke biyifo lesa nǝ Onanto laala , fe Kristo eto ndomufɔ .
Bilǝkǝ kafo faa biyifo keyifo fe Bonamute ǝmǝ bɛnlɛ ke buyifo kǝtǝ seka , nya inni utidinini saa .
Bekloma biǝ Bonamute ebofo utsyuǝ saa kayo , ndomunyǝ feni o-o , nwǝ nsi wǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ feni o-o ɛyɛ lǝ keyifo sɛɛ ka feeyifo kumǝ .
Banamute , mi tsya yifo nkomǝ ke bitǝ mi ndomufɔ . Biankpe mǝ sikpi , itsyise biyi biǝ nwǝ ni mi ku mǝ Onamute ǝmǝ kpe kato . Waambe utidi eto ǝnǝmi lǝ etiki bola kǝlǝkǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , kase biyifo bani ku Bonamute , lǝ isi ɛkɛ ale beso ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Bekpe mi bemake kenke bia Onanto dítǝ mi bǝ lǝ befo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ Obonsam eto awɛsu bua nyamǝ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise inni bo kuu betidi nlɛ bɔkpɔ . Bomu bo ku awɔnɔ bua eto ǝsuǝale , lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale eto baka , kawunsiǝ tuu kamfo eto ǝsuǝale eto baka , ku asa buayifoyifo eto baka ba nkpe kato eto ǝsuǝale bɔnlɛ bɔkpɔnko .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bifi Onanto eto bemake kenke bekpe . Bǝ lǝ diyi bua nǝmǝ ǝbǝ ditu mii , biofo buńyǝ kekleke kakpɔ lema nǝmǝ isu kalosǝkɔ , nya lǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ isi ibu ɛkɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bińyǝ kekleke ! Bifi ɔnukualɛ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bekle nkɛ fe abɔsu lǝ bifi kasɛyifoyifo biti fe akɔɛsibi eto situ eto etisa .
Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ lǝǝnǝ diyuǝ kabokoo eto bɔtɛyi , lǝ diyifo mi afɔkpa nya biokpe bisu lema .
Ɛwunsǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , bifi bofokanɔ bɛlɛ lǝ ani lǝ idi lesa nǝ loota mi ǝsuǝ lǝ lema . Itsyise nnya ni lesa nǝ loofo itǝ mi lǝ olontidi ǝmǝ ata mi wǝ kabe ka nte fe ute wǝ nlɛ bunyǝ fla fla fla nya yaninsǝ ute ǝmǝ .
Nya bifi situ eto lemankpakpa nǝ ni Onanto eto nkpǝ bofokǝtǝ biti lǝ disi ku Onanto eto ditiki nǝ ni kalande nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ dítǝ mi bɛlɛ kekleke lǝ kɔni .
Bikato ola lefe saa kǝtǝ Onanto . Bɛtɔ Onanto eto bɔwunsǝko kekleke fe kase Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ loote . Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bińyǝ bikabe kusu , nya yaanlo mi ani . Bikato ola lefe saa lǝ mba lefiani Onanto eto betidi kenke eto disi .
Beto ola tsya lǝ mɔ disi bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ufi lesa nǝ ele bǝ ntɛyi okpe mɛ lǝ kɛnyɛ bǝ lǝ ntɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ku bofokanɔ lǝ sikpi mante mante ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ mbe letsya nlǝkǝ asakulakula nnya nkpe lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nte .
Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo eso mini ɔtɔnkpe wǝ béti bákpe lǝ diyo mfo nɛ . Beto ola bǝ lǝ mfo ni bɔtɛyi ku unnyǝ fe kase ele bǝ ntɛyi ni .
Tihiko , bo ɔyimisani lala , wǝ leeyifo asa lǝ Bonamute eto kusu ǝsuǝǝ , ebubǝ ɔtɛyi mi kase minte ku keyifo ka kenke minlɛ mfo .
Botsyese ko minlɛ wǝ miǝ ubǝ ɔtɛyi mi kase bonkpe mfo nya lǝ okpe mi nkɛale .
Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo lǝ bǝtǝ mi bafokanɔfɔ kenke , diyuǝ ku lelabi ku bofokanɔ .
Onanto eto lefonǝ lǝ ditǝkǝko betidi ba kenke laala Bonamute Yesu Kristo ku lelabi manlo .
Mɔ , Paulo , ku Timoteo ba ni Kristo Yesu eto beyifoyifo lɛwɔni kukue komfo . Bufi bɔnlɛ kǝtǝ mi Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ kenke ba nkpe lǝ Filipi nya biyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu , ɛwunsǝ lǝ mi batɔnkotɔnko ku mi bawunsǝkotsyuǝ tsya .
Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ boǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
Lefe saa nǝ ke minkloma mii , maasɔ mɔ Onanto ani lǝ mi disi
Nya lefe saa nǝ ke minlɛ ola boto lǝ mimblɛ kenke eto disii , maato wǝ ku disuǝyuǝ .
Itsyi lǝ kase bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto keyifo ǝsuǝ idu lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ ibǝ ese mɔmɔ eso .
Mfo nnɔ miǝ Onanto wǝ dítsyiko keyifo sɛɛ kamfo kasɔ lǝ mi ntii , ebusukosǝ ke isu ese kalosǝkɔ lǝ Kristo Yesu eto dibǝfe nǝmǝ .
Bekpe mɛ lǝ nsusu lefe saa nya ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bǝ nkebu disi ketsyiko lǝ mimblɛ ǝsuǝ nko . Itsyise mimblɛ efi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ kusu ko Onanto dítǝ mɛ , mɔmɔ ǝmǝ minlabe lǝ diyo ku lǝ lefe nǝ mísiǝ lǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ nta Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ disi bǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bafo ni banɔ bǝńyǝ kekleke .
Onanto ni mɔ odansiɛ nkǝ sitinti minlɛ bɔtɛyi minkǝ lelabi nǝ eto okle nkpe lǝ Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ útɛ boo , ni okle minfi minlɛ mi butǝ nɛ .
Nlɛ ola boto miǝ mi lelabi nǝ nkpe mii , lǝ disi lebe kato lekpe leso , lǝ befo ditiki nǝmǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ kala kǝlǝkǝ kukɔnɔ kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo luutǝ befo lesa sɛɛ bulǝkǝ kǝtǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ Kristo eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , biuyifo basɛɛ ba ǝsuǝ dikpilolo saa lǝmbɔkɛ .
Ɛwunsǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , bǝ lǝ kasɛyifoyifo ka eto okle Yesu Kristo hã lǝǝtǝ utidi leeyifoo , lǝ keyi mi ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ befi babesɛ Onanto kato , bǝtǝ wǝ dibu ku atɛsǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , nla miǝ bete sitinti miǝ asa nnya dítu mɛɛ , ǝbǝ ɛwunsǝ bǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nemǝ ǝbǝ dínyǝ sɛtɔsusu bomu .
Itǝ nyasoo , bamamanyǝ ba kenke nkpe lǝ lekayo mfo ku betidi bamba kpǝ ba kenke nkpe lǝ lekayo mfo ǝnyǝ bǝtsyuǝ lekpo bǝ bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo itsyise nyifo Kristo eto uyifoyifo eso .
Ɛwunsɛ ku nyamfoo , mɔ bokpe lǝ diyo esi itǝ bafokanɔfɔ kpǝ esi bakpe utu bawunsǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ bensiate sikpi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ budi ku ute .
Lǝ sitintii , mǝ nti betidi eto bǝtsyuǝ aayɛ lǝ kutsyuǝsɛ kpɔkpɔ ǝsuǝ kedi Kristo eto ditiki nǝmǝ kate , nya baala bǝ baatanko mɛ lǝ ni bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ , fɛɛ bǝtsyuǝ eeyifo nnya ku nsusu sɛɛ .
Lelabi dítǝ betidi eto lekpa nuǝfǝ nǝmfo bǝ babe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya mmǝ , itsyise beyi bǝnkǝ bokpe Onanto lékpe mɛ nke nta Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ disi .
Fɛɛ betidi eto lekpa tutɛ ábe Kristo letsya lǝ kusu ko ǝmǝ boonyǝ kutǝkǝ kǝtǝ mǝ suǝ eso , nya inni lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , bomu bǝ lǝ beyifo nko lǝ kanyi ka minlɛ bunyǝ lǝ diyo nǝmǝ kafo lǝ kabe kato kaso .
Fɛɛ nyamfo menyifo kulesa . Nya ni bǝ utsyuǝ abe Kristo letsya lǝ sidia , sidia ǝsuǝ o-o , lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ o-o , mɔ alɛɛ , bǝ bábe Kristo letsyaa , nnya mate aakpe mɛ disuǝyuǝ .
Nya muusukosǝ disuǝyuǝ nǝmǝ bunyǝ itsyise nyi miǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mi olatoto ǝsuǝ ku lǝ bɔwunsǝko bo laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Yesu Kristo eto Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝǝ , boolǝkǝ mɛ lǝ diyo .
Nnya ǝsuǝ mimfi ǝnǝ mintǝkǝ ku minlɛ kusu bobe kekleke ni bǝ medi kofani lǝ mɔ keyifo ǝsuǝ . Bomu bǝ lefe saa , ku lǝ titlu mɔmɔɔ , lǝ nkpe nkɛale ku mɔ ǝsuǝale kenke , bǝ muunǝ dibu mboko Kristo , lǝ nkpe nkpǝ o-o nye lǝ bukpǝ mínkpe tsya .
Nya be ni nkpǝ ? Lǝ mɔ kutsyǝǝ , nnya ni bǝ lǝ nsi nkpǝ ntǝ Kristo . Nya lǝ nkpee , nnya bomu luusi yooboko mɛ kutǝkǝ eso nɛ .
Lǝ nnya ete minsi muusiǝ nkpǝǝ , eni muuyifo keyifo ka luubǝ kutǝkǝ . Fɛɛ mante nnya ele bǝ mfi lenti , ukpǝ lee nkpǝ .
Mɔ nsusu áma lǝ akpa ǝsuǝ . Eni moola tinti miǝ maabɔ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo nsu nsiǝ lǝ Kristo ɔflɔ , itsyise nyamfo alɛkɛ eso famfamfamfa .
Fɛɛ lǝ mi esoo , efe bǝ nsi nsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo .
Se mimfo nyamfo minɔ nko esoo , nyi miǝ muusiǝ lǝ mimblɛ kenke ɔflɔ nsukosǝ nyifo bo kenke minlɛ buyifo bǝ lǝ busu sɛtɔ , lǝ bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ bioo , biunyǝ kusu bebesǝ ǝsuǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ bǝ biyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu eso .
Lesa nǝ lefé mɔmɔ ni bǝnkǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ bo dinyǝnko mba léfo Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ . Itǝ bǝ lǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ o-o , mǝmbǝ o-o , lǝ nnɔ ntsyiko lǝ mi ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ bińyǝ kekleke lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ku nsusu ǝsuǝ nya bińyǝ kɛnyɛkani lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ bɛnlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ disi bota .
Biante mi balo sikpi . Bomu bińyǝ ku utu kekleke . Nyamfo loote mǝ bǝ mǝ ebonya bedufǝǝ kasɔ nya mi ebutǝkǝ mǝ kato , itsyise Onanto nwǝ nlɛ bɔkpɔ kǝtǝ mi , ebutǝ bitǝkǝ kato .
Itsyise bǝtǝ mi kusu bǝ bisumu Kristo inni bǝ lǝ befo wǝ bɛnɔ ete eso , bomu bǝ lǝ binyǝ kanyi tsya lǝ wǝ disi eso .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , bɛkpɔnko mɛ lema nǝmǝ . Lema nǝmǝ bínyǝ míkakpɔ kɔ ǝmǝ ete nɛ . Nya fe kase bɛɛnɔ , ni ǝmǝ ke ete minsi minlɛ bɔkpɔ nɛ .
Mfo nnɔ miǝ mi nkpǝ bo benkpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , ǝtǝ bínyǝ ǝsuǝale . Nya wǝ lelabi lǝǝyuǝsǝ mi ketu . Biyifo bani ku wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ , nya bɛnlɛ mi ǝsuǝ wɔkɔkɔkɔɔkɔ lǝ kafoɛkpɛ ku kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ .
Nnya lǝ nko ini sitintii , nyalɛ muukǝnko mi miǝ bitǝ lǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ nsusu bɔni ku lelabi lǝ lɛkɛ bo nya lǝ biyifo lɔni lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ku disibubu ǝsuǝ .
Bienyifo kulesa nǝ lete mɔ mate hã eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ nye ǝsuǝ katobǝsǝbesǝ eto ditsyǝbi . Bebokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ , nya bibu betidi bamba fe balɛkɛ baso mi .
Nya bɛbɛbɛ betidi bamba eto kasɛɛ , inni fǝ mate eto lɛlɛkɛsɛ ete .
Bitǝ lǝ nsusu bo lɛkɛ Kristo Yesu , lǝ bɔkɛ mi tsya .
Nnya ni bǝ ite bǝ okpe Onanto eto ditsyebi tsyaa , wóemfi nnya lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nkǝ lǝ okate ku Onanto .
Bomu lǝ wǝ kosate eto lelabi ǝsuǝǝ , úfi lesa saa nǝ nte wǝ útǝ kafo faa , nya úyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ usumutidi . Nya úbǝ bále fe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto utidi .
Utidi eto ditsyǝbi lɛkɛ wǝ nya óbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya ɔ́yɛ lǝ kototsyuetsyue eto kusu ǝsuǝ úsu taa ukpǝ kǝmiǝ , ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo esoo , Onanto ábesǝ wǝ kato ka nso kenke , nya úfi diye nǝ nso bɔmɔ kaso diye saa útǝkǝ wǝ .
Nya lǝ bakpadi Yesu eto diyee , ele bǝ asayifoyifo nnya kenke nkpe kato ku kasɔ ku nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔnti se akonki bǝtǝ wǝ .
Nya mǝmblɛ luufe kɛnyɛ batɛyi bǝ Yesu Kristo ni Bonamute , bǝ lǝ befi batɛsǝ Onanto wǝ ni Boanto .
Nyaso , mɔ bayimi , fe kase bietsyue mɛ koto lefe saa , ite bǝ mimbǝ lǝ mi ɔflɔ mɔmɔ tsyaa kulaa , isi efe bǝ bitsyuǝ koto beso . Bekplatsya kekleke lǝ bifi sikpitete ku ketinkǝ biyifo keyifo ka diyǝnko mi bulǝkǝ .
Itsyise Onanto lɛ keyifo lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lefe saa nkǝ lǝ yuutǝ bɛtɔnɔ bitsyue asa nnya útsyue utsyǝ koto .
Biankpe kǝnǝ nye beto taflatsyǝ lǝ kulesa buyifo ǝsuǝ .
Itǝ bǝ lǝ kawunsuǝ biabia ka diyi ku abuayifoyifo mfoo , mii , biyifo Onanto eto bebi ba lekpa nya beele ku dikpilolo saa lǝmbǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Lǝ biyǝnde lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi eto nti fe kase befandebi lǝǝyǝnde lǝ kato seka .
Befo ditiki nǝ lǝǝtǝ nkpǝ nǝmǝ bɛlɛ kekleke , bǝ lǝ Kristo eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝǝ , moofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ katɛyi minkǝ méntsyetsyi bimba nye ményifo keyifo bimba .
Mi bofokanɔ lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ ku mi keyifoyifoyifo te fenkǝ keditǝtǝ kǝtǝ wǝ . Eni mɔ kɔtɔ bokpo lǝ kasɔ ekɔko keditǝtǝ kamfo . Nya lǝ ibǝ nkoo , yɔɔkɛ mɛ ɔkɔɛ nya muunyǝ disuǝyuǝ tinti ku mi mblɛ .
Nko ke ini nɛ bǝ mi tsya nyǝ disuǝyuǝ beto keyudu ku mɛ nɛ !
Lǝ Bonamte atɔnɔɔ , yɛmbɔklɛ , mootsyese Timoteo mi ɔflɔ , bǝ lǝ usinkli ubǝ ɔtɛyi mɛ kase asa nte lǝ mi ɔflɔ , lǝ nsi nyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mimbǝ kuutsyuǝ saa wǝ leefi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ mɔ ku mi etiki ǝsuǝ fe wǝ .
Nya bafɛfɛɛ , utsyuǝ saa lɛ wǝ lɛlɛkǝsǝ ete bobe , nya inni nnya ni Yesu Kristo eto kusu eto ale .
Fɛɛ mi kosate yi biǝ Timoteo alɛɛ , ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ uni utǝ mɛ , kase wǝǝkǝnko mɛ lǝ keyifo kamǝ ǝsuǝ fe ubi ku anto itǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto busǝnsǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso nlɛ kusu bobe miǝ , lǝ nyǝ kase asa nyamǝ luubǝ itsyǝ ku mɛ koo , mootsyese wǝ mi ɔflɔ mlǝ .
Nya mfo nnɔ tsya miǝ Bonamute ǝmǝ kosate ebutǝ mɛ kusu nkǝ mbǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ .
Mbu tsya miǝ ele bǝ ntsyese bo ɔyimi Epafrodito mi ɔflɔ , wǝ díńyǝko mɛ kekleke lǝ Onanto eto keyifo ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ni mi ɔtɔyɛ wǝ bétsyese mɔ ɔflɔ biǝ ubǝ ɔwunsǝko mɛ .
Se unyi nkǝ bɛnɔ biǝ ǝsuǝ abia wǝ esoo , ílǝ wǝ tinti nya óla kekleke nkǝ wǝǝbǝ unyǝ mimblɛ .
Lǝ sitintii , ɔ́nɔ bufi kekleke ibu sɛkɛ lǝ ukpǝ . Fɛɛ Onanto ǝnyǝ wǝ kaminsǝ , nya inni wǝ mate bomu ku mɔ tã . Lenni nko eni mɔ kanyinyǝnyǝ eto bitsyikǝ eboso mɛ ani ku butsyi .
Nyamfo kulaa eso minla miǝ matsyese wǝ mi ɔflɔ lǝ binyǝ wǝ , lǝ binyǝnko wǝ disuǝnyǝ , nya mintsya loola nwɔnɔ mɔ utu siǝ kasɔ sɛkɛ .
Nyaso befo wǝ ani ǝnuǝ , binyǝko wǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ Bonamute eto diye ǝsuǝ . Bitǝ betidi bamfo eto okle dibu .
Itsyise ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ nya untǝ kpǝ lǝ Kristo eto keyifo ka nkǝ woawunsǝko mɛ lǝ nyifo ka biamfo mǝ bɔwunsǝko nyifo eso .
Kafɛfɛkɔɔ , mɔ bayimi , binyǝ disuǝyuǝ bǝ biyifo bani ku Bonamute . Yenlǝ mɛ bǝ nsi nwɔni asa nyamfo ke ntsyese mi , itsyise nyamfo luutǝ buinyǝ kekleke nɛ .
Bɛlɛ ola bińyǝ bikabe babuayifo bamfó ba leeyifo asa fe bakpa , betidi ba lǝǝńyǝ kekleke bǝ bala ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ , ini lelolala .
Bo ni mba léfo lelolala eto lekpa inni mǝ , itsyise boesumu Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ nya boǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ se buyifo bani ku Kristo Yesu eso . Nya boemfi ǝsuǝ butǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ bola eto lekpayifoyifo .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ ebu nkǝ woofo ǝsuǝ bufi kǝtǝ lelolala eto lekpa buyifoo , eni mɔ bomu ele bǝ mfo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto lekpayifoyifo eto asa ntǝ ǝsuǝ nso .
Mɔɔ , se bále mɛ eto diyi flamfla lee , nnya bála mɛ lelo nɛ , Israelnyǝ tinti mini nya mbɔ ntsyi lǝ Benyamin eto kafo . Hebrinyǝ kosate kosate wǝ eto anto ni Hebrinyǝ tinti wǝ mini nɛ . Nya lǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , nyifo Farisinyǝ .
Nya lǝ kǝtsyuǝfifi lǝ Yudanyǝdidi ǝsuǝǝ , nyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kekleke itǝ bǝ ntǝkǝko Kristo eto bafokanɔfɔ kama nte mǝ ohiã tinti . Nya lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi ǝsuǝǝ , dikpilolo saa ǝmbɔkǝ lǝ mɛ itsyise , nyifo lǝ ko ǝsuǝ tinti .
Fɛɛ lǝ kutǝkǝ kutsyuǝ akɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ itǝ mɛ kɔ ǝmǝ tsyaa , mɔmɔɔ , lǝ Kristo esoo , efiani asa bimba nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa itǝ mɛ .
Sitintii , mfi nyamfo kenke fe asa nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa , itsyise mbǝ nyǝ ntsyǝ lekpo miǝ Kristo Yesu hã ni Bonamute nya nyamfo afe mɛ eso asa fɛfɛ kenke . Lǝ wǝ esoo , ntó lesa saa nkpe nya mimfi asa fɛfɛ kenke fe kuku eto ekubi bǝ lǝ Kristo lǝ oka mɛ kɔni bonko wǝ lǝ buyifo bani ,
lǝ mfi mɔ ǝsuǝ kenke ntǝ wǝ . Nyasoo , minsini ɔsɛɛ itǝ mɔ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ asayifoyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ kɔfi komǝ kalɔ . Kasɛɛ ka ni lǝ Kristo bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ hã moofo buyifo . Kasɛɛ ka Onanto hã lǝǝtǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya lesa nǝ minla ni bǝ lǝ nte Kristo ku ǝsuǝale nnya dítǝ ótakasǝ wǝ utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ . Nya lǝ nnyǝ kanyi ku wǝ , lǝ nyifo lɔni ku wǝ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ ,
ku kusubebe bǝ Onanto ebotakasǝ mintsya utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ oboko nkpǝ .
Minlɛ bɔtɛyi minkɛ mbutǝkǝ kato nye mbɔflɔ nlo . Bomu nlɛ bokplatsya kekleke bǝ lǝ mfo kayofofo ka Kristo Yesu luufi utǝ mɛ . Itsyise Kristo Yesu éyifo mɛ nkǝ mfiani wǝ ole .
Lǝ sitintii , mɔ bayimi lala , mamfo nnɔ miǝ mɔ kɔni éboka kayofofo kamǝ . Bomu lesa nǝ minlɛ bokplatsya lǝ nyifo ni lǝ nta nnya díkafe ǝsuǝ le mfi ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ nnya nte sɛtɔ eto kɔniboka ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso meetsyetsyi bebembe bǝ lǝ nsu nsa usunklu ǝmǝ nyila , bǝ lǝ mfo kayofofo ka Onanto lékpadi mɛ nkǝ mbǝ mfo lǝ kato ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu eso .
Bitǝ lǝ nsusu bomfo lǝ bɔkɛ bomba díkabe lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ mi utsyuǝ kpe nsusu bamba ntsyuǝ , Onanto ebulǝkǝ nyamfo ote mi ekpa wuee .
Niǝ , niǝ , nniǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ bɔyɛ busu sɛtɔ lǝ kusu ko ǝsuǝ búkayɛ ibǝ ese mɔmɔ .
Mɔ bayimi , bebe mɔ eyifobi ǝsuǝ bɛyɛ . Bɛlɛ ola bebe mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ ǝsuǝ fe kase búsiǝ bote mi seka .
Mbɔtɛyi mi nyamfo sesia , sesia mfe nya mɔmɔɔ , nsi nlɛ mi nnya bɔtɛyi ku binǝntu miǝ bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ eto nkpǝ bo bensi ǝtǝ beyifo balo itǝ Kristo eto ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ .
Betidi bamfo eebudufɛ lǝ kanyimanlo manlo eto ute ǝsuǝ . Itsyise mǝ kafo ni mǝ onanto . Nnya ni afanisaa , nnya ǝsuǝ bomu bǝǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ nya befi mǝ nsusu bǝtǝkǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛ , bo alɛɛ , bo umǝ ni kato nya buńyǝ bɔnlɛ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo kusu bobe bǝ lǝ utsyi kato ubǝ .
Wǝ loofloma bo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia lǝmbǝ ale uyifo se fe wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ sia nkpe lǝ dinyǝndǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ ǝsuǝalǝ nyamǝ ke ǝsuǝǝ , wuunǝ lesa saa okpe lǝ wǝ kɔfi kalɔ .
Nyaso , mɔ bayimi lala ba lefe bitǝ mɛ , ba minla miǝ mǝǝkǝnyǝ . Biakpe mɛ disuǝyuǝ tinti nya maasɔ lɛkɔɛsi kabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato lǝ mi disi . Mɔ bayimi lala , nko ele bǝ bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nlɛ Ewodia ku Sinteke lekpakpa miǝ bɛnɔ bǝtsyuǝ kasɔ lǝ besinkli bisiǝ fe bayimisio lǝ Bonamute eso .
Nya mi tsya ba ni mɔ beyifotsyuǝ lalaa , nla miǝ bɛwunsǝko besio bamfo . Itsyise béyifo keyifo kekleke báwunsǝko mɛ bǝ lǝ busǝnsǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ku Klemens ku mɔ beyifotsyuǝ bamba kenke ba eto aye nkpe lǝ Onanto eto Nkpǝ eto Kukue kafo .
Binyǝ disuǝyuǝ lefe saa bǝ biyifo bani ku Bonamute ǝmǝ . Nsi nlɛ bɔtɛyi bio miǝ binyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Bɛkɛ disuǝtsyǝ bitǝ utsyuǝ saa . Itsyise Bonamute ǝmǝ eto dibǝfe ebɔfi .
Biǝnsiǝ bikala kawɔnɔ lǝ kulesa ǝsuǝ , bomu bikato ola bikǝtǝ Onanto lǝ lesa saa nǝ lehiã mi ǝsuǝ , bikasɔ wǝ ani itsyi taa mi ketu kǝmiǝ ke .
Nya Onanto eto diyuǝ nǝ nso kawunsiǝ eto utidi eto kasɔnɔnɔ saa , lǝ lɛlɔ mi ketu ku nsusu ditsyǝ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , mɔ bayimi , bitǝ lǝ lesa nǝ nso kɔnɔ ku nnya dińyǝ itǝ atɛsǝ lǝ iyi mi nsusu kǝmiǝ , nyamfo ni lesa nǝ ni ɔnukualɛ , lesa saa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ dibu , lesa saa nǝ ni lɛsɛɛ , lesa saa nǝ lekpa , lesa saa nǝ laanɔ bobe ku lesa sa nǝ dinyǝnko utidi nɛ .
Bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ lǝsanǝ békase ku béfo bitsyiko mɔ ɔflɔ , itsyi lǝ mɔ etikididi ku mɔ eyifosa tã ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝ lǝ usiǝko mi .
Lǝ mɔ lɔniyifoyifo ku Bonamute ǝsuǝǝ , iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ tinti bǝ lǝ lefe kɛntsyɛ kamaa bisi bɛlɛ bulǝkǝ kate mɛ biǝ bifi kǝtsyuǝ lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ . Inni bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ bɛni mɛ lǝ lefe nǝmǝ , bomu kusu ete yǝntǝ bǝ bilǝkǝ bete nko .
Nya inni bɔtɛyi minlɛ miǝ lesaatsyuǝ ahiã mɛ , bomu mbókase lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ ku lǝ kalebe saa miǝ lesa nǝ kee nte mɛɛ , dufǝ mɛ ǝnǝ .
Nya lesa nǝ ini bǝ lesa hiã fǝ ku lesa nǝ ini bǝ , lǝsa tsyǝ fǝ eso kase fahiãa , mbokase kobe komfo . Itǝ bǝ lǝ kalebe saa ku lefe saa nyi kase muusiǝ nkpǝ , imi mɛ o-o , kukpɛnsǝ lɛ mɛ o-o , ɛlɛkɛ itǝ mɛ . Lǝ ite mɛ kpǝ o-o nye elonko mɛ tsya .
Ǝsuǝale nnya Kristo ditǝ mɛɛ , nnya lǝǝtǝ maafo nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Fɛɛ bíyifo ɛlɛkɛ tinti bǝ bɛwunsǝko mɛ lǝ mɔ bulǝ kǝmiǝ .
Nya mi Filipifɔ kosate yi biǝ idu lefe nǝ míndu lǝ Makedoniaa , nya mítsyiko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe kasɔɔ , mi hã ni bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nlɛ mɛ bɔwunsǝko , kǝtǝ mɛ asa . Kutǝkǝ mínyǝ o-o , bɔsɔ ɛsɔ mɛ o-o , mi hã ni mba díkǝnko mɛ .
Lefe nǝ minkɛ lǝ Tesalonika kulaa tsyaa , se mínhiã bɔwunsǝko , bɛwunsǝko mɛ lefe kpǝ .
Nya inni ǝtǝsa minhiã itsyi mi ɔflɔ eso , bomu kutǝkǝ ko mi luunyǝ bɛyɛnko lǝ ǝtǝsa nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
Béfo mɛ kayo kenke . Nya béfo mɛ kayo besonsǝ kase ele be itsyǝ . Ǝtǝsa nya kenke bétsyese mɛ bɛyɛnko lǝ Epafrodito ǝsuǝ ǝbǝ éka mɛ kɔni . Ǝtǝsa nyamfo eyifo fe keditǝtǝ eto asa nnya laanyi fifififi befi bǝtǝ Onanto nnya dídufǝ wǝ ǝnǝ nya ékpe wǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Nya bo Onanto kosate ebutǝ mi ǝtǝsa nnya kenke loohiã mi ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu eto setabikɛ ku diyǝnde kplɛ nǝmǝ esuǝ .
Bitǝ lǝ bɔtɛsǝ Boanto Onanto itsyi manlo isu manlo kenke . Ibǝ itǝ .
Mǝǝsiǝsǝ mba ni Onanto eto bebi ba ni Kristo Yesu eto bale kenke o-o . Nya bayimi ba nkpe lǝ mɔ ɔflɔ mfo tsyaa , bǝ bǝǝ siǝsǝ mi o-o !
Betidi ba kenke léfo Onanto bánɔ nkpe mfo ǝsiǝsǝ mi kukɔnɔ , titlu mba nkpe lǝ Roma eto Okankplɛ eto diyo .
Lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ketsyue ǝsuǝ eso mimfiani Kristo Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpee , boko bo ɔyimisani Timoteo wǝ nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni .
Bufi ko bɔlɛ bo bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Kolose ba díkafo Kristo bánɔ sitinti butǝ . Bɔlɛ Onanto wǝ ni bo Anto bɔtɔ boǝ lǝ ufi wǝ lefonǝ ku diyuǝ utǝ mi .
Lefe saa lǝ bɔlɛ ola botoo , boasɔ Onanto wǝ ni Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Anto ani lǝ mi disi .
Itsyise bɔ́nɔ kase béfo Kristo Yesu bɛnɔ ku kase biala mi bayimitsyuǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke .
Lefe nǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ tinti nǝmǝ leka mi ɔflɔ bubǝǝ , bɛnɔ kusubebe ko nkpe lǝ ni . Yanso mi bofokanɔ ku lelabi teke lǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ kusu bobe balɔ bǝtsyǝ mi lǝ Onanto eto kato ǝsuǝ .
Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lɛ bobe kakpe nya lɛnlɛ ebibi bɔnwɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ kenke , fe kase díyifo lǝ mi tsya ǝsuǝ seka , idu lefe nǝ bɛnɔ kase Onanto lǝǝnǝ utidi kafo nya bɛnɔ ni kasɔ tututu .
Bɛnɔ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝmfo eto etiki ɛyɛ lǝ bo uyifotsyuǝ lala Epafra wǝ díyifo Kristo eto keyifo ku ɔnukualɛ lǝ bo kɛnyɛ .
Wǝ díbǝ ɔ́tɛyi bo lelabi nǝ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ dífi útǝ mi .
Lǝ nya esoo , idu lǝ lefe nǝ bɔ́nɔ mi kɔsɔɔ , búkato ola lefe saa lǝ mi disi katɔ Onanto boǝ , ufi wǝ bote ku lelabi eto nsusu okpe mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ kobe kenke ku kasɔnɔnɔ ka Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmǝ lǝǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
Itǝ lǝ befo nkpǝ busiǝ fe kase Bonamute ǝmǝ laala nya lǝ bofo wǝ lelabi buyifo lefe saa . Lǝ mi nkpǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ buyi ku kasɛyifoyifo ku Onanto eto bote kakpe .
Onanto lǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝale kplɛ nnya ntǝkǝ ǝsuǝale saa kato okpe mi lǝ befo buńyǝ lǝ bulǝ saa eto kɛnyɛ ku dibusǝ . Lǝ bifi disuǝnyuǝ ku lɛninsɔ bitǝ Boanto Onanto wǝ dítǝ bɔ́flɔ bofo kedikɔ bunyǝ lǝ nka ɔ́lɔ útsyuǝ wǝ betidi lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .

Wǝ dílǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ ketuntu eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nya ókpa bo oboko wǝ Ubi lala eto sekakedikɔ .
Nwǝ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ búnyǝ bofo itǝ úfi bo abua ɔ́tsyɛ bo .
Kristo eto ditsyǝbi ǝǝlǝkǝ Onanto wǝ boǝnyǝ ku ǝnǝmi eto ditsyǝbi kate . Ɔkɛ fɛ béyifo asayifoyifo saa kenke .
Itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ wǝǝ , nya Onanto díyifo asa nnya kenke nkpe kato ku kasɔ , nnya bǝǝnyǝ ku nnya bǝnnyǝ , ɛkɔ lǝ awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale kenke , banamute , baka ku ǝsuǝalefɔ saa tsya eto okle . Onanto éyifo kawunsiǝ kenke ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ itǝ wǝ .
Kristo akɛ fɛ Onanto díyifo lesa saa , nya ɛyɛ lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku wǝǝ , nya lesa saa dínyǝ ni kǝńyǝnkɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ nɛ .
Wǝ ni disi itǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nnya ni bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝmǝ . Wǝ ni kaka diǝnyǝ ni nkpe ketsyiko . Onanto eto Ubi ǝmǝ ni ututɛ nya wǝ ni nwǝ létaka utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ , bǝ lǝ udi ututɛ lǝ asa nnya kenke nti .
Iyifo Onanto eto lalabi nkǝ ditsyǝbi nǝ tutuutu nkpe wǝǝ , lǝ lɛkɛ wǝ ubi ǝmǝ tsya .
Isi iyifo wǝ lelabi tsya nkǝ lǝ uyifo bani ku kawunsiǝ kenke , nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfo ku nnya nkpe kato kenke . Ubi ǝmǝ eto kɔtɔ ko ókpo kasɔ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ lǝ uyikabie esuǝǝ , ko dínǝ diyuǝ nǝmfo leboko nɛ .
Kɔ kabia ákɛe lǝ mi ku Onanto eto nti , nya bikisi wǝ lǝ mi nsusu kǝmiǝ lǝ abua nnya biyifo eso .
Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , úsikli ófo mi kafo faa , ɛyɛ lǝ uyikabie eto ukpǝ wǝ Ubi díkpe lǝ mi disi eso . Ɛyɛ lǝ ukpǝ ǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , nya Onanto dísinkli ɔ́lɔ mi utsyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi fe mba bǝflǝsǝ ntu nya keni nye dikpilolo saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , lékpa kɛnkɛ seka .
Nyaso efe tinti bǝ befo buńyǝ bɛlɛ mi bofokanɔ lǝ kɔni kekleke . Bunte kekleke lǝ bofo bunyǝ sitinti , nya boembu lǝkǝ bo nsusu butsyiko lǝ kusubebe ko Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ dinǝ léboku bo ǝsuǝ . Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ bábe letsya bǝtǝ kawunsiɛ eto asayifoyifo kenke , nnya eto uyifoyifo mɔ Paulo díbǝ ófiani .
Mɔmɔ , iyifo mɛ disuǝyuǝ bǝ nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ mi disi eso . Nya kanyi ka minlɛ bunyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ mfoo , lɛ mɛ bɔwunsǝko bǝ lǝ mflɔsǝ Kristo eto kanyi útǝ nkǝ nyǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ ni wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto disi .
Onanto átsyese mɛ nkǝ mfiani wǝ uyifoyifo bǝ lǝ mbe wǝ ditiki nǝmǝ letsya ntǝ mi ku betidi ba kenke lǝ banɔ kasɔ ekpa wuee .
Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo eyifo lekulasa kɔɔ , nya úkǝlǝkǝ óte wǝ betidi .
Onanto eto ketsyue keni bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ akulasa nyamfo ote wǝ betidi lǝ bate , akulasa fo asi nya diyi ku atɛsɛ mfo . Nya akulasa nyamfo ni bǝ Kristo nkpe lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ itǝ mi tsya nkpe kedikɔ lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
Nya Kristo ǝmfo bɔnlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa nɛ , nya lǝ kobe saa ǝsuǝ boalɛ mǝ kɔlɛ kate mǝ asa bǝ lǝ bokpa mǝ utsyuǝ saa busuko Onanto eto ǝnǝmi fe mba diyifo bani ku Kristo ba díkabe baflɔ seka .
Nyamfo eto otsyekle mimlɛ kakplatsya ku ǝsuǝale nnya kenke Kristo leefi kakpe mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ nnya nlɛ keyifo lǝ mɛ nɛ .
Nla miǝ bete lekplatsya nǝ minlɛ lǝ mi ku Laodikeafɔ ku betidi ba kenke bo ku mǝ dimantsya tɔ ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi bote bǝtsyuǝ eto disi .
Meeyifo nko bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ lǝ beyifo bani tsya ku mǝ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ . Isi ensoo , itǝ kase boofo asa kasɔ bɔnɔ kukɔnɔ , bǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo Onanto eto asakulakula ǝmǝ ni Kristo . Nyamfo ni bikesinɔke bia lefo koya tinti .
Kristo ni safui sia laasini Onanto eto kobe ku kobetete eto akulasafo koya nyamfo .
Nyaso nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi minkɛ biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwɛ mi okpe ku etiki eto kǝnǝ bimba niǝ niǝ niǝ ete fe ɔnukualɛ kpe lǝ nnya tsya .
Itsyise ite bǝ bɛnlɛ mɛ bunyǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , nkpe lǝ mi nti lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , nya iyifo mɛ disuǝnyuǝ lǝ kase bɛkɔ binyǝ kekleke lǝ mi Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ eso .
Kase befo Kristo Yesu ku mi lɛkɔɛsi kenke fe mi Onamutee , biyifo bani ku wǝ nko .
Bitǝ lǝ keyudu lǝ kǝńyǝ kedufǝkɔ katsyo lǝ wǝ , fe kuyi eto keyudu leedufe lǝ kasɔ . Beto mi nkpǝ bitǝkǝ lǝ wǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ bumuǝ ale fe kase báte mi . Lǝ biyi ku lɛninsɔ itǝ Onanto lefe saa .
Nyaso bebe biǝ kuutsyuǝ saa manwɛ mi uyifo mi ndomufɔ ɛyɛ lǝ betidinini eto kobetete bimba ko nyɛ lǝ akpa nya báyani bǝtsyǝ betidi ku kawunsiǝ eto awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale eto kate ka lanyɛ lǝ Kristo eto asatete eto esu ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise Onantotidi eto ditsyǝbi kɛnkɛ nǝ lɛflɔ akɛ lǝ Kristo eto ǝsuǝale eto sinǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ utidididi eto ditsyuǝbi nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya se buyifo bani ku wǝ , wǝǝ ni disi itǝ awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale saa ku awɔnɔ eto baka saa , ete bǝ bo nkpǝ tsya aflɔ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
Se buyifo bani ku Kristo eso biyifo fe mba bála lelo , inni lǝ kase kawunsiǝ eto betidi leeyifo , bomuu ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ mi ɔbɔnko lǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto abuayifoyifo eto ǝsuǝale eto kalɔ . Nyamfo ni lelo nǝ bála mi ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Itsyise lefe nǝ bǝflǝsǝ mi ntuu , bébikǝ mi ku Kristo , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , bátakasǝ mi bǝńyǝnsǝ ku Kristo lǝ mi bofokanɔ eso , lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale nyamǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝ nwǝ ni létakasǝ wǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ .
Lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ léfee , bíkpe lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ lǝ mi abua nnya bíyifo eso , itsyise biedi Yudafɔ ba dímankɛ lǝ kɔfi kalɔ . Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ébokpa mi óboko nkpǝ kǝmiǝ ku Kristo . Onanto éfi mi abua kenke ɔ́tsyɛ mi .
Ótsya ɔfiɔ lǝ kayo ka búsiǝ ku nnya afi nnya kenke lékle bo úlǝkǝ bo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ kenke ɔ́sɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ ku Kristo .
Nya lǝ uyikabie komfo ǝsuǝǝ , Kristo ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ɔ́bɔnko lǝ awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale ku baka saa eto kalɔ nya ótsyilamako mǝ ókpe mǝ kofani nya úlǝkǝ mǝ óte fe ndomufɔ ba óso ani utǝkǝ mǝ kato .
Nyaso biǝtǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ okpe mi afi lǝ lesa nǝ biudi nye biunǝ lee biembudi nye buinǝ ǝsuǝ , nye nnya ni eyi sɛɛ lee , lǝ kofa fɔfɔ abe lee nye Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi ǝsuǝ .
Nyamfo kenke eyifo nnya nkpe kama ɛnlɛ bubǝ eto koyo ete ! Nnya eto koyo bɛnlɛ bunyǝ ni Kristo kosate .
Biǝntǝ lǝ ǝnǝmi ǝnǝmi eto utidi kuutsyuǝ wǝ laatɛyi nkǝ utǝtǝ kato itsyise wǝǝnyǝ ǝnǝtǝkǝtǝkǝ eto kǝlǝkǝkate , ba laayinkǝ betidi kakpe lǝ kawɛ eto ǝsuǝ bokosǝbokosǝ kasɔ ku kato eto batɔnkpe eto bɔsumu ǝsuǝ lǝ balo mi dikpi . Asa bimba ku utidi eto nsusu lǝkǝlǝkǝ ete ini . Lǝ bitǝkǝko utidi ǝmfo eto okle eto kamaa , biemunyǝ asa nnya eto kama bɛnlɛ bɔti .
Nwǝmfo eto okle ménsikɔ uyifo lɔni lǝ Kristo , wǝ nwǝ ni disi utǝ utidi ǝmǝ . Wǝ ǝsuǝ utidi ǝmǝ eto ǝsuǝ eto nlokɔ ku wǝ ǝmǝ eto umu kenke tsya nkpǝsǝ , wǝ ɔflɔ wǝǝnyǝ lesa sɛɛ saa , nya woabe fe kase Onanto laala .
Se bíkpǝ ku Kristo esoo , bɛbɔ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto awɔnɔ eto ǝsuǝale kalɔ . Beso binsi biǝtǝ baakpe mi afi fe bisi bekpe lǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ kalɔ seka ?
Beso biesikeyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ baatɛyi mi bǝnkǝ bienyifo nyamfo eto keyifo ku biandia nǝmǝ bebe nye bientidi nǝ nse ?
Asa nnya eto afi bákpe mi mfo eyifo asa nnya lǝ beyifo nnya keyifo balosǝ koo , iyifo ebimbasa nnya lensibe kutǝkǝ saa . Afi nyamfo kenke eyifo betidi eto ketsyue ku asatete ete .
Ele fe asa nnya bátɛyi mi mfo te fe kobe kutsyuǝ kpe lǝ nnya nya iyifo fe bǝlǝkǝ nnya betsyiko lǝ Onanto eto ketsyue ka útsyue utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Yǝǝtǝ bǝ utidi bokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ , utǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sine nyǝ kanyi nnya luutǝ ola Onanto oso ku ofo ǝsuǝ bumuǝ kalɛ . Fɛɛ asa nyamfo eto okle buyifo anwunsǝko kuutsyuǝ bǝ lǝ oso wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto alasa ani .
Se ini botakasǝ Onanto létakase mi ku Kristo utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ óboko nkpǝ esoo , bɛti asa nnya nkpe kato kama kaka Kristo kosate nsi lǝ wǝ lekankpomɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto kodiani .
Bitǝ mi nsusu lǝ butǝkǝ lǝ asa nnya nkpe kato mfó ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ asa nnya nkpe lǝ kasɔ mfo .
Itsyise se bíkpee , mi nkpǝ efi bokpe lǝ Kristo eto nle ǝsuǝ bo lɛbiɔ bonkpe lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ tsya .
Mi nkpǝ kosate eyifo nkpǝ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nya lefe nǝ wɔɔbɔ bǝnyǝǝ , mi tsya ebɔbɔ ku wǝ nya buinyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso belo kasɔ mfo eto asa eto nkpǝ bo nkpe lǝ mi ǝsuǝ fenkǝ asɔnɔdidi , asinasayifoyifo , ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto kamininyǝnyǝ , kǝnǝnsɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ bɔkɛ ǝsuǝ sia diyifo ufiǝsumusumu .
Asa nyamfo eto okle ǝǝnǝ Onanto eto lɛblɔfi kaboko mba ditidi ato lentsyue wǝ koto ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nkpǝ bo bísiǝ kɔ ǝsuǝǝ , mi tsya éyifo asa nyamfo eto kakle .
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , ele bǝ bɛyɛ asa nyamfo kenke eto kakle buyifo nnya ni ɔblɔnyǝnyǝ , lefonyi , kabua bɔbɛbɛ kǝtǝ fǝ utsyuǝ , aka ku etikibua saa didi .
Se bíkǝlǝkǝ mi ditsyǝbi koko nǝmǝ ku ni eyifosa lǝ mi ǝsuǝ esoo , biesitɛyi bǝtsyuǝ bidia bio .
Bifi békpe lǝ ditsyǝbi fɔfɔ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ mɔmɔ . Nya ditsyǝbi fɔfɔ nǝmfo ni wǝ Onanto kosate eto ditsyǝbi nǝ ɔnlɛ bufi kakpe lǝ mi lefe saa , lǝ bébé bisu sɛtɔ bǝ lǝ bibǝ bete wǝ bɛwunsǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , kaba kǝfǝ saa ensibǝ lǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ ku mba ni Yudafɔ , mba bála alo ku mba bánla alo , bafɔ ku mba dimankpa ǝsuǝ , ndomufɔ ku mba nsi lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ ǝsuǝ nti . Mǝmblɛ kenke eyifo bani lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ , nya Kristo nkpe lǝ mǝmblɛ kǝmiǝ .
Mimblɛ eyifo Onanto eto betidi , nya óla mimblɛ nya úlǝkǝ mimblɛ uyifo wǝ kosate eto bale . Lǝ nyasoo , bifi ditsyǝbi nǝ dińyǝ ditǝ nkomǝ seka bɛyɛnko ǝsuǝ . Nya ni kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ , kafoɛkpɛ , ǝsuǝ kasɔ bokosǝbokosǝ , diyuǝsǝ ku disuǝtsyuǝ .
Bitsyǝsuǝ ku mi bǝtsyuǝ , lǝ bifi bɛtsyɛ bǝtsyuǝ lǝ utsyuǝ áta wǝ utsyuǝ ubu . Ele bǝ bifi bɛtsyɛ bǝtsyuǝ fe kase Bonamute dífi ɔtsyɛ mi .
Ɛwunsǝ lǝ nyamfo kenke ǝsuǝǝ , bifi lelabi bitǝ bǝtsyuǝ , itsyise ni laakɔ lesa saa kalɛ lǝ bǝtsyuǝ keyifo mǝ bani nɛ .
Kristo eto diyuǝ nǝ wǝǝtǝ , lǝ didi seka lǝ mi ketu ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamfo eso Onanto lékpadi mi ɔkɔ biyifo bani nɛ . Lɛ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , bɛsɔ Onanto ani .
Bitǝ lǝ Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ , nǝ lefo koya tinti lǝ diyi mi ketu kǝmiǝ . Bete bǝtsyuǝ asa , bɛlɛ bǝtsyuǝ kɔlɛ lǝ kobe ǝsuǝ . Bifi Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ǝsǝ ku lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝsǝ bitǝ lɛninsɔ Onanto lǝ mi ketu kǝmiǝ .
Nyaso bitǝ lesa saa nǝ biɔtɛyi nye buiyifoo , lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu ǝsuǝ , le bifi lɛninsɔ bitǝ Boanto Onanto ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ diye ǝsuǝ .
Mi besensiǝ , bebokesǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bitǝ mi bese , itsyise nko dińyǝ itǝ bǝ biyifo fe Kristo eto bafokanɔfɔ nɛ .
Nko ke , mi bǝsiǝfi tsyaa , bifi lelabi bitǝ mi bǝsiǝ . Nya bienyifo mǝ disiale .
Mi bebi , bitsyue anto ku ambe mǝ koto lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ , itsyise nyamfo laakɛ Onanto ɔkuɛ nɛ .
Mi bebiantomǝ , biankpe mi bebi lɛblɔfi bǝ lǝ ani lǝ nyanlo mǝ .
Mi ndomufɔ , bitsyuǝ mi banamutemǝ koto lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ lefe nǝ mǝ ǝnǝmi ntǝkǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ ete , bǝ lǝ batɛsǝ mi lǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ eso , bomuu , biyifo ke ku mi ketu kenke lǝ dibu biǝtǝ Bonamute eso .
Nya keyifo saa biuyifoo , biyifo ke ku kafo faa fe Bonamute bɛnlɛ ke buyifo kǝtǝ inni utidinini saa .
Bekloma biǝ Bonamute ebofo mi kayo fe kayofofo ka ɔ́lɛ utsyǝ utǝ wǝ betidi . Itsyise Kristo ni Onamute wǝ bɛnlɛ busumu .
Nya utsyuǝ saa wǝ luuyifo kabuaa , ebunyǝ kayofofo itǝ kabua ka weeyifo . Itsyise Onanto aakponko utsyuǝ saa lekpo lǝ kusu tsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ .
Mba ni banamute , bɛlɛ mi ndomufɔ ba leeyifo mi nyifo ola lǝ kusu sɛɛ ko dińyǝ itǝ ǝsuǝ . Bekloma biǝ mi tsya kpe Onamute wǝ nkpe kato .
Bianyɛ ola boto kǝtǝ Onanto lefe saa . Bitǝkǝ ǝnǝ lǝ bɛlɛ ola boto lǝ bifi lɛninsɔ bikǝtǝ Onanto .
Beto ola lǝ bo tsya eto disi , bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ ɔsini bo kusu lǝ bofo Kristo eto ditiki nǝ diyifo lekulasa kɔɔ , nǝ eso minlabe lǝ aba eto diyoo , letsya bobe kǝlǝ ni kate .
Beto ola bǝ lǝ mfo lekulasa nǝmfo bulǝkǝ kate lǝ lekpa wuee fe kase ele bǝ nyifo .
Bɛyɛ ku mamfokanɔfɔ lǝ kobe ǝsuǝ , lǝ biyifo kusu saa ko lɔɔsini kutǝ mi eto keyifo fe kase efe itǝ .
Bidi etiki ku dibu , bǝ lǝ lɛlɛkɛ bɔnɔ ku koto lefe saa , lǝ bete kase buitǝ etiki eto mbuayɛ sɛɛ itǝ utsyuǝ saa .
Bo ɔyimisani Tasiko lala , wǝ nwǝ leeyifo asa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ ku uyifoyifotsyuǝ lǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ǝsuǝ , eebɔtɛyi mi lesa saa nǝ nlɛ mɛ bubǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mfo .
Nyamfo eso minlɛ wǝ botsyese mi ɔflɔ bǝ lǝ ɔtɛyi mi bo mfo eto etiki saa nya lǝ okpe mi otsyekle tsya .
Onesimo wǝ ni bo ɔyimi lala wǝ bofobɔnɔ nwǝ ni mi nti eto ɔnii , tsya akɔ ku wǝ balɛ bubɛ . Bɔɔtɛyi mi lesa saa nǝ nlɛ bubǝ mfo eto etiki .
Aristarko nwǝ boko wǝ nlabe lǝ diyo mfo ku Marko wǝ ni Barnaba eto ɔyimisani bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o ! Bóotǝ mi bote koko bǝ lǝ Marko ǝmfo ǝbǝ mi ɔflɔ , bisensǝ ani befo wǝ kafo faa .
Yosua wǝ bensi bakpo Yusto tsya ǝǝsiǝsǝ mi . Mǝ itsyǝ bamfo hã ni Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ ba nlɛ keyifo ku mɛ itǝ Onanto eto sekakedikɔ kamǝ nɛ . Beyifo bawunsǝkotsyuǝ tinti bǝtǝ mɛ .
Epafra wǝ ni mi nti eto ɔni wǝ ni Kristo eto uyifoyifo tsya nkǝ wǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o . Woato ola kekleke lefe saa lǝ mi disi katɔ Onanto nkǝ lǝ binyǝ kekleke , lǝ bɛflɔ lǝ kototsyuentsyue Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ .
Moofo wǝ kɛnyɛ budi lǝ keyifo kekleke ka weeyifo kǝtǝ mi ku betidi ba nkpe lǝ Laodikea ku Hierapoli .
Bo ɔyimitsyuǝ lala ofala kplɛ Luka ku Dema bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ mi o-o .
Boǝsiǝsǝ bayimi ba nkpe lǝ Laodikea ku Bɔyimisio Nimfa ku bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ laakpe disi lǝ wǝ diyo o-o .
Lǝ bekla kukue komfo belosǝǝ , bifi ko betsyese bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nkpe lǝ Laodikea lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bakla . Nko kee , mi tsya lǝ bekla kukue ko míwɔni míntǝ Laodikea eto bafokanɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa tsya .
Nya lǝ bɛtɛyi Arkipo biǝ lǝ okpe otsyese lǝ olosǝ Bonamute eto keyifo ka úfi ókpe wǝ lǝ ani mfó .
Mɔ , Paulo , kosate dífi mɔ kɔni minlɛ kǝsiǝ kamfo bɔwɔni katsyese mi . Nya bianta ǝsuǝ biǝ nsi nlabe lǝ aba eto diyo . Nlɛ Onanto bɔtɔ miǝ utǝ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
Mɔ , Paulo , ku Silvano ku Timoteo bo lɛwɔni kukue komfo bɔnlɛ mi mba ni Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto bale lǝ Tesalonika butǝ . Nya bɔnlɛ ola boto kǝtǝ Boanto Onanto katɔ wǝ lefonǝ ku diyuǝ kǝtǝ mi .
Boasɔ Onanto ani lǝ mimblɛ eto disi . Nya lefe sa lǝ bɔlɛ ola botoo , boalɛ wǝ lekpakpa lǝ mi disi .
Nya boanyɛ Boanto Onanto bɔtɛyi lǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ keyifo ka bɛnlɛ buyifo eso . Boatɛyi wǝ tsya kase bɛnlɛ betidi lelabi butǝ , nya bɛnlɛ kusu bobe kekleke itǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo .
Bo bayimi , buyi boǝnkǝ Onanto aala mi tinti nya úlǝkǝ mi fe wǝ bale .
Nya Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ búbǝ bɔ́tɛyi mii , menyifo ditiki fufu nǝ ete bóboko mi . Bomu ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale nya nlɛ ni ǝsuǝale bulǝkǝ kate bǝ nya béfo bɛnɔ eyifo sitinti . Bínyǝ kase bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ lǝ mi nti , nya búyifo nko itǝ lǝ mi lɛkɛsǝ eso .
Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , mi tsya áfo nnya binsi bo ku Bonamute eto nkpǝ bomǝ . Ite bǝ bɛlɛ kanyi bunyǝ tsyaa , béfo ditiki nǝmfo ku disuǝyuǝ nǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ dítǝ mi .
Lǝ nyamfo eso bafokanɔfɔ nkpe lǝ Makedonia ku Akaia eto kasɔ kenkee , lɛ bobe kakase asa ketsyiko mi ɔflɔ .
Fɛɛ inni Bonamute eto ditiki nǝmfo ete dísǝnsǝ ditsyi mi ɔflɔ dísu Makedonia ku Akaia kenke . Bomu mi Onanto bofokanɔ tsya ébusǝnsǝ isu kalebe saa . Nya insi ni bo nsi lɔɔtɛyi kulesa , itsyise betidi ba tã ébɔnɔ nya .
Nya mǝ kosate nlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ kase béfo bo lǝ lefe nǝ búbǝ mi ɔflɔ ku kase bisinkli bɛyɛ bǝfiǝ kedi butǝ , nya bífi mi ǝsuǝ bítǝ Onanto wǝǝ hã nkpe nkpǝ .
Nya biińyǝ binsǝkǝ wǝ Ubi Yesu wǝ ótakasǝ utsyiko ɔkɔmǝ , nya úbǝ usiǝ nkpǝ ku Onanto , nya wuutsyi Onanto eto kato ubǝ . Yesu ǝmfo hã loofo bo bofo ketsyiko kotonǝnǝ ko Onanto luutǝ babuayifo kenke .
Mɔ bayimi , mi kosate yi lesa nǝ eso búbǝ mi ɔflɔ , nya bo mi ɔflɔ bubǝ ményifo bimba .
Nya biyi kase búnyǝ kanyi nya banlɛ bo boka kakpo bo ǝnǝmi kasɔ lǝ Filipi fɛ bubǝ boyo mi ɔflɔ lǝ Tesalonika mfó . Ite bǝ bǝlǝ bo lǝ mi mfó tsya , Bonamute ákpe bo nkɛale nya bɔ́tɛyi mi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
Nya kɔlɛ ko bɔ́nlɛ mi bɔlɛɛ , mentsyi lǝ bo mantebutsyuǝ nye lǝ nsusu bua saa nye lǝ bɔwɛ kuutsyuǝ saa bokpe .
Bomu Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ɔnukualɛ bɔtɛyi minlɛ . Nya lesa nǝ ele bǝ bɔtɛyi mi lefe saa dini nǝ Onanto lela nkǝ buyifo nɛ . Itsyise wǝ kosate ǝnyǝ tutɛtutɛ nkǝ buńyǝ butǝ bǝ bɔtɛyi mi wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Nya yentsyi lǝ kase betidi léla , bomu lǝ kase Onanto wǝǝ nyi utudi saa eto lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ léla .
Biyi biǝ inni kawɛ eto etiki búfi bóboko mi . Nya bóantɛyi mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ bunyǝ kutǝkǝ itsyi lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Nya Onanto kosate ebudi bo odansiɛ lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ .
Boantɔ atɛsǝ itsyi lǝ mi ɔflɔ nye betidi bamba ɔflɔ . Ite bǝ bokpe kusu fe Kristo eto batɔnkpe bǝ lǝ bɔbɛbɛ bo lɛlɛkǝsǝ bǝ bufi lesa saa butǝkǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa ,
bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ fe kase ubiambe laabe wǝ bebi ku lefonǝ .
Se boala mi sitinti esoo , iyifo bo lelabi boǝ mi tsya lǝ bɛnɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . Nya inni Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ mate . Bomu bufi bo nkpǝ tsya bútǝ lǝ mi disi , itsyise befo koya tinti bitǝ bo .
Mɔ bayimi , bekloma biǝ lefe nǝ búbǝ mi ɔflɔ búbǝ bɔ́tɛyi mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ mfóo , bókplatsya bóto diwi ketsye ku kakɔmi búyifo keyifo itǝ bǝ , bóǝmfi bo ǝsuǝ buyifo bitsyikǝ butǝkǝ lǝ mi kutsyuǝ saa lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mi kosate ku Onanto ebudi bo adansiɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ lǝ kase bɔ́lɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ mi mba dikafo bɛnɔ nti . Búyifo lesa saa kukɔnɔ . Nya kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnyǝ kabua saa lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
Biyi tsya biǝ bɔ́lɛ mi utsyuǝ saa fe kase ubianto laalɛ wǝ bebi ola wɛkɛkɛkɛ .
Bókpe mi nkɛale , bómansǝ mi lɛkɔ nya búkalɛ mi kɔlɛ kase biusiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ itǝ bǝ Boanto Onanto ebunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ mi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise wǝ kosate wǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ lǝ binyǝ bofo lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ ku diyǝnde kenke .
Nya eso ele bǝ bɔsɔ Onanto ani tsya ni bǝnkǝǝ , lefe nǝ bɔ́tɛyi mi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfoo , bíemfi ni fe ditiki bimba . Bomu béfo ni fenkǝ Onanto eto ditiki . Ɔnukualɛ ini bǝ wǝ ditiki dini . Nya íkaboko bɔtsyikawuninsǝ tsya lǝ mi mba díkafo bɛnɔ eto nkpǝsiǝsiǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , asa nnya díbǝ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ mfóo , nya ke ni lesa nǝ díbǝ lǝ Onanto eto betidi ǝsuǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kasɔ nɛ . Nya kanyi ka bínyǝ lǝ mi betidi eto anii , nko kǝ íbǝ lǝ Yudafɔ eto kasɔ eto betidi ba léfo Yesu bánɔ lǝ Yudafɔ eto ani nɛ .
Yudafɔ bamfó álo Bonamute Yesu ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi tsya nya báte bo tsya ohiã . Mǝ eyifosa átaka ińyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nya bátaka ku sikpi bǝńyǝ betidi ba tã lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Bákplatsya bǝ lǝ beti bo kusu bǝ boatɛyi mba lenni Yudafɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo . Lǝ nyaso mǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝbǝ ifui ékpia efe isu eyo kaka mɔmɔɔ , ísu ínǝ Onanto eto kotonǝnǝ eboko mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , yoofo eyi asiani se búdu lǝ miǝ ɔflɔ . Tsya bekpe bo lǝ nsusu kǝmiǝ . Nya bokplatsya lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ boofo , lǝ bubǝ botsya ku mi ǝnǝmi ku ǝnǝmi tsya yǝntǝ kusu .
Bóla boǝ lǝ busi bubǝ bunyǝ mi . Nya mɔ , Paulo , kosatee , nyɛ esu saa nya moofo bǝ lǝ mfo bubǝ . Fɛɛ obuale ǝmǝ mǝntǝ kusu .
Nla tinti miǝ lǝ mbǝ nyǝ mi , itsyise bufi bo ǝnǝ butǝkǝ lǝ mi . Nya mi ni bo disuǝyuǝ , itsyise mi ku bafokanɔfɔ bamba ni bo kutǝkǝ ko eso boofo lɛkɔɛsi bɔsɔ lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu luubǝ bio .
Sitintii , mi ni bo lɛmɔ ku bo disuǝyuǝ nɛ .
Nya se ɛnlɛ bo bulǝ se boensinyǝ mi tɔ esoo , bóse nya uyi boǝ bo inuǝ lǝ bɔtsyimɛ lǝ Atene .
Nya bótsyese Timoteo lǝ ubǝ okpe mi nkɛ alɛ , nya lǝ ɔwunsǝ ko mi lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Uyifo bo ɔyimisami wǝ laawunsǝko bo lǝ kanantoyifo ku Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ eto bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ .
Bo nsusu ni bǝnkǝ boanla bǝ bulǝ ku kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ lǝ elo mi kuutsyuǝ saa ani . Mi kosate fe biyi koko biǝ bulǝ ku kanyibunyǝ ni nnya leetu nwǝ ke ntǝkǝko Kristo .
Biokloma biǝ lefe nǝ bɔkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , bútǝ mi bote katɔnsǝ boǝnkǝ bulǝ kpǝ ebutu mi . Nya fe kase binyii , íbǝ itǝ nko sitinti .
Nyamfo eso míntsyese Timoteo minkǝ ubǝ obe lǝ bisi bińyǝ keklǝkǝ lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise mmuǝ utu nnɔ . Nya mɔ sikpitete ni bǝnkǝ ǝtsyuǝ oboale ǝmǝ ébubǝ óbiasǝ mi nsusu itǝ bǝ bo bokplatsya kenke ǝbǝ íyifo bimba .
Nya se Timoteo dísinkli ubǝǝ , ɔ́tɛyi bo ku disuǝyuǝ nkǝ bisi bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi bofokanɔ ku mi lelabi itǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ insi enso . Ɔ́tɛyi bo tsya nkǝ biakloma bo tinti nya bɛnlɛ kusu bobe biǝ biǝnyǝ bo fe kase bo tsya nlɛ bola boǝ boǝnyǝ mi .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , ite bǝ bɔlɛ kanyi bunyǝ nya asa nyamfo lekle bo tsyaa , mi bofokanɔ aakpe bo disuǝyuǝ kǝyuǝsǝ bo ketu .
Se bɔ́nɔ kase bińyǝ kekleke lǝ Bonamute eto bofokanɔ esuǝǝ , mfe fɛ nkpǝ fɔfɔ dídufǝ bo lǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Boǝmbofo Onanto ani bɔsɔ yooyo disuǝyuǝ nǝ bɔnlɛ bunyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ mi disi eso .
Bɔlɛ Boanto Onanto lekpakpa bɔlɛ ketsye ku kakɔmi boǝ utǝ lǝ busi botsya lǝ bokpe mi nkɛale lǝ mi bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , Boanto Onanto kosate ku Bonamute Yesu lǝ basini bo kusu bǝ lǝ bofo mi ɔflɔ bubǝ .
Nya Bonamute lǝ utǝ kusu bǝ mi lelabi itǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ku betidi bamba lǝ difui lekpe fe kase boala mi ke . Nya lǝ bela betidi bamba tsya fe kase boala mi .
Nyamfo luutǝ Boanto Onanto lookpe mi ǝsuǝale , ulǝkǝ mi utsyiko lǝ Obonsam eto esu kenke ǝsuǝ nya lǝ uyifo mi kɛnkɛ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi isu ese diyi nǝ Bonamute Yesu luusinkli ubǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ku wǝ mba kenke diyifo kɛnkɛ .
Mɔ bayimi , mɔ ditiki fɛfɛ nǝ minla miǝ malɛ mi lekpakpa lǝ ntɛyi ni bǝ , bisiǝ nkpǝ bo lɔɔkɛ Boanto Onanto ɔkɔɛ fe kase bóte mi . Bɛlɛnko nko kekleke , tsya bɔlɛ mi nkɛale bokpe lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto diye ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ bisi biyifo beso nko .
Itsyise biyi asa nnya bote mi ɛyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ .
Onanto aala nkǝ biyifo mi ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ lǝ bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ asɔnɔdidi kenke ǝsuǝ .
Ele bǝ usǝ ku usiǝ te kase bɔɔlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo diyifo kɛnkɛ ku lǝ dibu ǝsuǝ .
Nya biǝntǝkǝko ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto kamini bisiǝ nkpǝ fe betidi ba laante Onanto sikpi .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , kuutsyuǝ saa mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ eto usiǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ usu ota wǝ ubu . Bɔtɛyi mi nko bunyǝ nya bɔlɛ mi ato bukǝ kekleke boǝnkǝǝ , Bonamute ebunǝ mba lǝǝyifo asa nyamfo eto kakle koto kekleke .
Onanto ákpadi bo nkǝ buyifo betidi kɛnkɛ . Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bulǝkǝ bo ǝsuǝ butsyiko lǝ asinsa ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso lǝ mi nti eto utsyuǝ ani buyifo lǝ etsyuesa nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , inni betidi ǝsuǝ ótaka úńyǝ . Bomu Onanto , nwǝ leefi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kǝtǝ mi , eto ǝsuǝ ótaka úńyǝ .
Nya lǝ lelabi itǝ mi bayimitsyuǝ bafokanɔfɔɔ , yensife bǝ bɔwɔni kulesa butǝ mi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Itsyi Onanto ébote mi kase ele bǝ bela mi bǝtsyuǝ koko .
Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝǝ , sitinti ini bǝ biala mi bayimitsyuǝ ba kenke díkafo banɔ ba nkpe lǝ Makedonia eto kasɔ kenke . Nya bunsi bɔnlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lekpakpalɛlɛ ǝsuǝ boǝnkǝ biyifo beso nko .
Bisiǝ nkpǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bobokosǝ ǝsuǝ , nya utsyuǝ saa eto ǝnǝmi lǝ itǝkǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ , nya bifi mi ani biyifo keyifo bɛbɛbɛ lesa nǝ biudi fe kase bɔ́tɛyi mi bofe .
Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ mba dímamfo banɔɔ , ebubu mi nya biemukpese lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝsuǝ itǝ lesa nǝ loohiã mi .
Mɔ bayimi , bola boǝ bete ɔnukualɛ itsyi lǝ betidi ba díkekpe ǝsuǝ , itǝ bǝ lǝ bɛyɛ nku buwi nku ku kaminsǝ fe betidi ba lǝmbǝ sɛtɔ saa .
Bofo bɔnɔ boǝ Yesu ǝkpǝ nya usi ótaka utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ nkpǝ . Nya Onanto luutǝ Yesu kpa mba ǝmǝ oboko ku wǝ lǝ wǝ bubǝ bio ǝsuǝ .
Lesa nǝ Bonamute lɛtɛyi , ni ǝsuǝ buuńyǝ bɔɔnlɛ mi bɔtɛyi boǝǝ , bo mba nsi nkpǝ lǝ Bonamute eto businkli kǝbǝ lefee , boǝmbɔtɔ mba díkekpe kato busu .
Lǝ lefe nǝmfo o-o , bɔɔnɔ Bonamute eto bubǝ eto kulu ku ɔkɔɛ eto boto . Boɔnɔ Onanto eto Ɔtɔnkpe ninǝ kenke eto ɔkɔɛ . Nya buufǝ Onanto eto kakpatsyaku . Nya Bonamute kosate lɔɔyifǝ utsyi kato ubǝ . Nya betidi ba lefo Kristo baanɔ fɛ bǝkpǝǝ , mǝ loka botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ .
Nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto ebokpa bomba dibu nsi nkpǝ nya wookpa bo usu ɔkɔ ku betidi ba letaka busu botsyako Bonamute kato . Nya buusiǝ ku Bonamute isu manlo manlo .
Nyaso bifi etiki nyamfo bemansǝ bǝtsyuǝ lɛkɔ .
Mɔ bayimi , yamfe bǝ nsi nwɔni mi kulesa itsyi lǝ lefe nye eyi nnya asa nyamfo luubǝ .
Itsyise mi kosate yi sitinti biǝ Bonamute eto diyi nǝ wuubǝ ebuyifo fe kase uyu laabɔ lǝ wǝ kabiakɔ ku ketsye ,
kǝbǝ keyu utidi . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ utidi saa nlɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ lesa saa tǝ buɛ ku diyuǝǝ , lefe nǝmfo ni lefe nǝ lesabua nǝ banlɛ kusu bobee nya diǝbǝ kasɔ lǝ nti nɛ . Diubǝ fe kase kalelefo lǝǝnǝ ofonlɛ . Kalebe saa butsyetsyi kesu ǝmbǝ .
Fɛɛ , mɔ bayimi , mimii binsibǝ lǝ ketuntu ǝsuǝ . Nyaso yanle bǝ diyi nǝmǝ bǝ lefua mi fe kase uyu leeyifo .
Itsyise mimblɛ kenke kpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Nya buunte fe betidi ba leefi mǝ ǝsuǝ kakpe lǝ abua ǝsuǝ keyifo asa kakula .
Nyaso biensitǝ lǝ selabe lǝ sifi mi bilǝkǝ ato fe mba leennyi Bonamute . Bomu bitǝ lǝ buńyǝ kekleke lǝ bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ .
Itsyise mba laalabe selabee , ketsye baalabe se . Nya mba ba nlɛ ntǝ bukpǝ tsyaa , kǝtsyǝ nya beekpǝ mu nɛ .
Fɛ bo mba nkpe lǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ butǝkǝ ǝnǝ kukɔnɔ . Le bufi bo bofokanɔ ku bo lelabi bukase ǝsuǝ fe kase lɛkɔɛsibi eto situ eto awu laawunsǝ ko bamamanyǝ . Nya lǝ bufi bo ǝnǝmi butǝkǝ lǝ Boanto Onanto eto bofokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase omamanyǝ eto disi eto lema ankpakpa laafo wǝ lǝ nkpǝ .
Itsyise Onanto mǝnlǝkǝ bo itǝ wǝ lefonyi nɛ nlɛ bubǝ . Bomu bǝ lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ lǝ bunyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Yesu ǝmfo ǝkpǝ lǝ bo disi bǝ lǝ busi nkpǝ o-o , bukpǝ o-o , buusiǝ ku wǝ lǝ wǝ dibǝ bio ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bikakpe nkɛale lǝ bikawunsǝko bǝtsyuǝ fe kase bɛnlɛ buyifo mɔmɔ .
Bo bayimi , bɔlɛ mi lekpakpa bǝ bifi dibu kpǝ bitǝ mi batɔnkotɔnko ba laakplatsya kate mi Kristo eto nkpǝ busiǝ eto esu .
Bela mǝ lǝ bibu mǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ko ǝsuǝ banlɛ mi bokpa akanyǝnko eso . Lǝ mimblɛ lǝ bisiǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nnya kamaa , bo bayimi , bola tinti boǝ bɛlɛ kɔlɛ mba lanlɛ otsyekle bokpe . Bekpe mba laate sikpi nkɛale . Bɛwunsǝ ko mba lehiã bɔwunsǝ ko . Nya lǝ bifi dibusǝ bitǝ utsyuǝ saa .
Bɛlɔ bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ kuutsyuǝ saa mǝmfi kabua ofo kabua kayo . Bomu lefe saa , bikeyifo kasɛɛ bikǝtǝ mi bǝtsyuǝ ku betidi ba kenke .
Bitǝ lǝ diyuǝ lǝ lɛkɛ mi lǝ ǝsuǝ lefe saa .
Biǝntǝ lǝ ani lǝ elo mi lǝ olatoto ǝsuǝ .
Nya bifi lɛninsɔ bitǝ Boanto Onanto lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Itsyise nyamfo ni lesa nǝ Onanto nlɛ bɔtɔ ketsyiko lǝ mimba kenke ntǝkǝko Yesu Kristo nɛ .
Bienti Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ kusu lǝ mi nti .
Biemfi lesa nǝ laabɔ ketsyi lǝ Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi eto kɛnyɛ fe lesa bimba .
Bomu bekplatsya lǝ bɛbɛbɛ ɔnɔkualɛ wǝ nkpe lesa saa nǝ biɔnɔ lǝ bifi kasɛɛ ka nkpe lǝ nnya kekleke .
Bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ lebua saa ǝsuǝ .
Nya bɔlɛ Onanto wǝ lǝǝtǝ bo diyuǝ saa bɔtɔ bǝ lǝ uyifo bo kɛnkɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ ose mi lɛwɔnɔ ku nsusu ku mi ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ kenke bǝ bemunyǝ kabua saa lǝ mi ǝsuǝ lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo nsi luubǝ .
Nya Onanto wǝ lékpadi mi nkǝ befiani wǝ balee ebɔwunsǝko mi isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Itsyise lesa nǝ ke ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ wuuyifoo , weeyifo ni .
Mɔ bayimi , bikato ola kǝtǝ Onanto lǝ bo disi .
Bilǝkǝ kafo faa bɛbuta lǝ bisiǝsǝ bafokanɔfɔ .
Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti fe nwǝ ńyǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto kɛnyɛ minkǝ bekla kukue komfo bete bafokanɔfɔ kenke .
Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝ ko mi .
Mɔ , Paulo , ku Silvano ku Timoteo bo lɛwɔni kukue komfo butǝ mi mba ni bo Boanto Onanto ku Banamute Yesu Kristo eto bale lǝ Tesalonika .
Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ minkǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diyuǝ ku lefonǝ lǝ disiǝ ko mi .
Mɔ bayimi , ele bǝ bɔsɔ Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ mi disi . Lǝ nyaso ɛlɛkɛ bǝ bukato ola , kasɔ wǝ ani bǝ mi bofokanɔ lǝ busi bɔkɛ ale boso ku mi lelabi tsya lǝ difui lekpe enso .
Nyamfo eso boakpo mi diye sɛɛ lǝ mba lefo Onanto banɔ nti . Iyifo bo lɛmɔ nya boatɛsǝ mi itsyise bińyǝ kekleke lǝ mi bofo kanɔ ǝsuǝ nya bɛnlɛ otsyekle bokpe lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe banlɛ mi bulǝ kakpɔ mi ku kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ eso .
Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ Onanto aakpo akpo lǝ kusutsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya wuutǝ mi kǝsiǝkɔ lǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ kasɔ bɛnlɛ kanyi ka bɛnlɛ bunyǝ eso .
Onanto ebuyifo lesa nǝ lɛyɛ . Nya wuunǝ mba nlɛ mi bulǝ kenke koto .
Nya wuutǝ nkǝ bo ku mi mba kenke nlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ buunyǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ sɛɛ . Onanto ebuyifo nyamfo lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe nkpe asuale kplɛ lɔɔbɔ betsyi kato ku ǝsuǝale .
Buunǝ betidi ba lǝǝmbu Onanto nya bámfo Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ banɔɔ , koto .
Nya Bonamute loola mǝ udunko lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya bǝǝmbunyǝ wǝ diyǝnde ku wǝ ǝsuǝale . Nya wɔɔtsylɔsǝ mǝ ku mǝ ditsyǝbi bua nǝmǝ .
Asa nyamfo ebubǝ itǝ lǝ diyi kplɛ nǝ ǝsuǝ Yesu luusinkli ubǝ . Nya lǝ diyi nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , bafokanɔfɔ kenke ebutǝkǝko wǝ ku atɛsǝ eto ǝsǝ ku kudu . Nya miitsya ǝbɔkɛ mǝ lenti , itsyise béfo wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ bɔ́tɛyi mi mfó bɛnɔ .
Nyamfo eso boato ola lǝ mi disi lefe saa nɛ . Nya boalɛ bo Onanto lekpakpa boǝ lǝ utǝ lǝ mi nkpǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ bokate ku mi bokpadi bo ókpadi mi . Nya lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝale lǝ ɛwunsǝ ko mi lǝ itǝ mi nsusu sɛɛ bo lookpe mi nkɛale bǝ lesa saa nǝ biuyifo lǝ mi wǝ bofokanɔ esoo lǝ ibǝ itǝ kukɔnɔ .
Bɔlɛ asa nyamfo bɔtɔ kǝtǝ mi ku lekpakpalɛlɛ bǝ lǝ babesǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye kato ɛyɛ lǝ mi eso . Nya wuuntsya lǝ obesǝ mi diye kato lǝ wǝ ku Onanto eto kafoɛkpɛ eso .
Mɔ bayimi , itsyi lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto businkli kǝbǝ bio ku bo bɔkɔ botsyanko wǝ .
Biǝntǝ lǝ nyamfo lǝ ile mi nsusu nye ekpe mi bule , lǝ nnya banlɛ bɔtɛyi bǝ Bonamute eto dibǝyi ébubǝ koko . Ǝtsyuǝ biubu bǝ ébɔ lǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ bulǝkǝ kate nye bo asatete nye etiki nnya bɔ́wɔni bútǝ mi ǝsuǝ .
Biǝntǝ lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa lǝ ɔwuɛ mi lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ kon . Itsyise Bonamute eto diyi nǝmǝ ǝmbubǝ tɔ isu ese lefe nǝ usialetidi ǝmǝ lootaka uńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ nya obuale ǝmǝ lǝǝbǝ bɔtsylɔ lǝ ute luulǝkǝ ǝsuǝ ote .
Nya wootaka uńyǝ nkǝ lǝ uti Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale kusu lǝ ote nkǝ wǝ hã ni awɔnɔ kenke eto ǝsuǝaletidi . Nya wootaka ubǝ usiǝ lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo nya wuuyifo wǝ ǝsuǝǝ , fe wǝ ni Onanto .
Bíakloma biǝ lefe nǝ minkɛ mi lǝ ɔflɔɔ , ntɛyi mi asa nyamfo kenke .
Fɛɛ lesatsyuǝ leeti asa nyamfo kusu nkǝ yǝǝbǝ tɔ mɔmɔ . Nya mi kosate yi lesa nǝ ini . Nya obuale ǝmǝ ebulǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lekple lǝ wǝ lefe ayo .
Nya disiale eto asa nnya banlɛ buyifo kakula kokoko efe ɛlɛ bubǝ . Nya asa nnya luubǝǝ , ǝmbubǝ tɔ isu ese le fe nǝ Onanto dilǝkǝ nwǝ diti obusle ǝmǝ kusu .
Nya lǝ nyamfo eto kamaa , Onanto ebulǝkǝ obuale ǝmǝ ote . Nya lǝ lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu luubǝǝ , wuufi wǝ kɛnyɛ eto ufiebi ku wǝ diyǝnde otonsǝ wǝ obiasǝ wǝ ditsyǝbi kenke .
Usialetidi ǝmǝ bǝ ku Obonsam eto ǝsuǝale , nya wuuyifo bidia eto ayanisa akpa akpaa ote .
Nya betidi ba kenke lɔɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , ebonya kenkee , wɔɔyɛ lǝ disiale ku kɔwɛsu saa bǝ lǝ ɔwɛ mǝ okpe . Boonya itsyise bamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ Onanto lete mǝ bǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ banɔ .
Nyamfo eso Onanto eboyani mǝ utǝ kawɛ eto lɛwɔnɔ nǝ luutǝ bafo bidia banɔ .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , Onanto ebolo mǝ dikpi , itsyise bamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ . Bomu bǝnyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ bayimi , ele bǝ bokasɔ Onanto ani lefe saa lǝ mi disi eso . Buyi boǝ woala mi sitinti . Mi ni betidi tutɛ Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ binyǝ bofo . Úfi Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ úflǝ mi abua úwi nya béfo ɔnukualɛ bɛnɔ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo budi ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto ákpadi mi nkǝ bibǝ befo diye fe kase Bonamute Yesu Kristo léfo .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , bińyǝ kekleke lǝ bɛkɔbe ɔnukualɛ eto asatete nnya bóte mi lǝ bo kukue ko bɔ́wɔni ku etiki nnya búdi mi , bɛlɛ nya kɔni kekleke .
Nyaso bɔlɛ bɔwunsǝko bɔtɔ ku lekpakpalɛlɛ itsyi lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ku Boanto Onanto wǝ laala bo , nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ ókpe bo nkɛale nya útǝ bo kusubebe tinti .
Bɔlɛ wǝ lekpakpa buǝnkǝ , utǝ mi ǝsuǝale lǝ okpe mi utu wǝ nkpe osa , bǝ lǝ bidi etiki ku lǝ biyifo asa sɛɛ lefe saa .
Lǝ kalosǝkɔɔ , mɔ bayimi , bekloma lǝ bikato ola kǝtǝ Onanto lǝ bo disi , itǝ bǝ lǝ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo lǝ disǝnsǝ disu nlebe ku dibu fe kase miitsya seka .
Nya lǝ bɛtɔ Boanto Onanto tsya biǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ betidibua ku besialetidi eto ani ǝsuǝ , itsyise inni betidi ba tã léfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ bánɔ .
Bonamute eyifo ɔnukualɛtidi , uuńyǝ mi kama , ookpe mi nkɛale nya woobe mi bǝ olo Obonsam ǝmbutǝkǝ bo kato .
Bonamute ǝtǝ bufi bo utu butǝkǝ lǝ mi bǝ bɛlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ esu nya bote mi ǝsuǝ , nya buyi boǝnkǝ biofo buyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ enso .
Bɔlɛ Bonamute lekpakpa bǝ ɔsini mi ǝnǝmi lǝ binyǝ lǝ bete kase wǝ , Kristo laakpe bo nkɛale ku kase Onanto laala bo .
Mɔ bayimi , bɔlɛ mi kɔfi bokpe kekleke lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ boǝ bilǝkǝ mi ǝsuǝ bitsyiko lǝ bayimi ba ni baflɔ nya banlɛ buyifo lǝ bo asatete ǝsuǝ .
Mi kosate biyi kukɔnɔ biǝ ele bǝ biyifo keyifo fe kase buyifo , itsyise bóenyifo sɛflɔ lefe nǝ bɔ́kɛ mi lenti .
Bóamfo bɔwunsǝko itsyi lǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ɔflɔ bǝ bóamfo kayo . Bomu búyifo keyifo kekleke ketsye ku kakɔmi bǝ bo bobǝ ményifo bitsyikǝ itǝ kuutsyuǝ saa .
Inni nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ bumbǝ kusu boatɛyi mi bǝ bebe bo eso . Bomu bóla boǝ bekase kase ele be beyifo keyifo .
Biokloma biǝ lefe nǝ bɔkɛ mi lentii , bókpe mi kɔfi boǝnkǝ utidi wǝ ke laani nkǝ woǝmbuyifo keyifoo , mendi tsya .
Bɔlɛ mi nyamfo bɔtɛyi itsyise bɔlɛ bɔnɔ boǝ baflɔ bǝtsyuǝ kpe mi lenti nya ini mǝ bayimitsyuǝ eto ketikima hã te baayɛ kedi .
Bɔninko betidi bamfo ditsyǝbi nǝmfo kekleke lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto diye ǝsuǝ , bǝ lǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ be fi mǝ ani beyifo keyifo bedi .
Fɛɛ mii , bayimi , biǝntǝ lǝ ani lǝ elo mi lǝ lesa sɛɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ nkǝ woǝmbuyifo lǝ ditiki nǝ bɔtɛyi mi lǝ kukue ko mfoo , bitsyǝ wǝ lekpo nya lǝ bilǝkǝ wǝ lǝ mi nti , lǝ kofami lǝ kɔlɛ wǝ .
Tsyaa bienkisi utidi ǝmǝ . Bomu ele bǝ bɛlɛ wǝ kɔlɛ fe mi ɔyimi seka .
Bɔlɛ Bonamute kosate wǝ lǝǝtǝ diyuǝsǝ lekpakpa bɔlɛ bǝ lǝ utǝ mi kǝmiǝ eto diyuǝsǝ lǝ mi lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ . Lǝ Bonamute lǝ ɔlɛ mimblɛ kenke ola .
Mɔ , Paulo , kosate uni nlɛ etiki fɛfɛ nye nkla bomfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ mi ku mɔ kɔni . Iyifo mɔ kosate eto lɛnimi eto awɔnisa fe kase maawɔni kakpe lǝ mɔ kukuewɔniwɔni saa kalɔ .
Bɔlɛ ola boto boǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo lǝ ɔlɛ mi mblɛ kenke ola lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ni Yesu Kristo eto nwǝ ótsyese ɛyɛ lǝ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo wǝ bɔnlɛ kusu bobee , nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni .
Nya mimfi minlɛ fǝ Timoteo botsyese . Eyi fǝ eyifo mɛ fe ubi lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nyaso minlɛ Bonamute Onanto Ku Boanto Yesu bɔtɔ miǝ lǝ mǝ kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ lǝ kǝtǝkǝko fǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ fǝ kaminsǝ lǝ bǝtǝ fǝ diyuǝsǝ .
Nla miǝ lǝ esi ǝsiǝ lǝ Efeso mfó fe kase míntɛyi fǝ lefe nǝ mínyɛ mfo mímfe mintɔ lǝ Makedonia . Nnya ni bǝ eyi fǝnkǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ kpǝ lǝ mfo ba nlɛ asa nnya loobiasǝ nsusu itsyi lǝ bo asatete lǝ Kristo bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Ele bǝ ani komǝ nye ala betidi bamfo bǝ lǝ bayɛ nya kakloe buyifo .
Tɛyi mǝ lǝ bayɛ lefe bobiasǝ lǝ akokosatete ku bakoko eto ntsyikɔ eto katobobesǝ ǝsuǝ . Asa nyamfo eto okle bote akpe kǝnǝ lǝ betidi nti . Nya yaanyɛ lǝ Onanto eto nsusu ǝsuǝ . Nsusu bo nyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ hã ele bǝ bote .
Nya lesa nǝ lefe bǝ biyifo ni bǝ ele bǝ bola bo bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ ku kafo faa , ku utu wǝ lǝmbolo bo dikpi lǝ asa buayifoyifo saa ǝsuǝ . Nya ele bǝ bo bofokanɔ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ tsya yifo sitinti .
Fɛ betidi bǝtsyuǝ étsyi kama bakpe asa nyamfo . Nyaso bányɛ kusu sɛɛ komfo . Nya bǝǝnǝ etiki bimba nya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ .
Baala bǝ baatsyi bawuninsǝ bafiani Mose eto kɔfi eto bateasa . Fɛɛ mǝ bamǝ kosate mannɔ etiki nyamǝ kasɔ tsya . Beedi etiki kekleke itsyi lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ , fɛ mǝ bamǝ kosate maannɔ lesa nǝ banlɛ bɔtɛyi kasɔ .
Bomblɛ kenke yi boǝ Mose eto kɔfi komǝ alɛkɛ , fɛɛ ele bǝ bǝtsyue ko koto fe kase boate ko .
Nya ele bǝ bukakloma tsya boǝǝ , inni betidi sɛɛ eso béyifo afi kǝkǝ mǝ ato , bomu mba ditidi ato baata Onanto eto afi kebu ku mba leeyifo asa bua ku mǝ kakle ba eto nkpǝ diyi ku abuayifoyifo . Mǝ ni betidi ba lǝmbǝ bofokanɔ saa , mba laalo mǝ antomǝ ku ambemǝ ku mba ni bewudifɔ .
Mba ni betidi ba leedi asɔnɔ ku basani ba laalabeko mǝ basanitsyuǝ . Mǝ ni betidi ba leeyu betidi bamba kǝmuǝ kate ku mba ni badia ku mba laasɔ akɔɛsi nye kakpadi asa katɛyi bidia . Nya ku mba kenke ba dímamfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto asatete bánɔɔ , mǝ ni mba baanlɛ ato nyamfo bukǝ nɛ .
Boonyǝ asa nnya minlɛ bote lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ béfi bákpe mɛ lǝ kɔni bǝ nte itsyi diyǝnde eto Onanto wǝ boatɛsǝ nte ɔflɔ .
Mǝmbofo Bonamute Yesu Kristo ani bɔsɔ lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya ufi utǝ mɛ nkǝ lǝ mfo keyifo kamfo buyifo eso . Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , úfi ke ókpe mɛ lǝ ani . Itsyise únyǝ mɛ nya uunyi nkǝ mǝmbutsyetsyi ke nyani wǝ ntsyǝ .
Ite bǝ lǝ lefe ditsyuǝ nǝ lefee , nńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ etikibuadidi ku lǝ aka ǝsuǝ fɛ mímbǝ míntsyi mɔ lɛkɔɛsi minwuninsǝ , Onanto ǝnyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ . Itsyise lǝ lefe nǝmfoo , mámfo wǝ nnɔ tɔ nya mánte lesa nǝ mínkeyifo tsya .
Bonamute ǝnǝ mɛ kafo tinti nya útǝ mɛ bofokanɔ ku lelabi se buunyǝ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Yesu Kristo .
Ditiki nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo eyifo etiki eto ɔnukualɛ , nya ele bǝ utidi saa fo ɔnɔ . Kristo Yesu wǝ ni Nwǝ Onanto Lékpo Ɔhile Utsyǝ , díbǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo nkǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ babuayifo . Nya mɔ ni obuayifo kenke enso lǝ babuayifo nti .
Fɛɛ Onanto dínyǝ mɛ kaminsǝ nkǝ lǝ ɛyɛ lǝ mɔɔ ni obuayifo kenke enso ǝsuǝǝ , Kristo Yesu lǝ utǝ lǝ betidi lǝ bǝnyǝ bǝ okpe lelabi nǝ eso woefi katsyɛ babuayifo ba lefo wǝ banɔ . Lǝ nya esoo , wuutǝ mǝ nkpǝ bo lǝmbǝ kalosǝkɔ kulefe tsya .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bukatɛsǝ bo Oka wǝ nkpe kato wǝ boǝnyǝ ku bo ǝnǝmi wǝǝ hã ni Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ isu manlo manlo . Nya lǝ bukabesǝ wǝ Onanto wǝ leenkpǝ eto diye kato lefe saa . Ibǝ itǝ .
Mɔ ubi Timoteo , keyifo ku afi nnya mimfi mintǝ fǝ mfoo , eka asa nnya bo Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi lɛ́tɛyi itsyi le fǝ ǝsuǝ . Lɛ etiki nyamfo kɔni kekleke fe bemake , ebutǝkǝ kabua kato lǝ lema nǝmfo ǝsuǝ .
Lɛ fǝ bofokanɔ kɔni kekleke , tǝ bǝ fǝ utu manlo fǝ dikpi . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ ba dímǝntsyue mǝ ketu eto kɔlɛ kotoo , mǝ dídu bánɔ banyansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ nɛ .
Nya lǝ mǝ ntii , ni Himeneo ku Aleksandro . Nnǝ mǝ ato lǝ se mímfi mǝ míntǝ Obonsam bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ wǝ ani . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ bakase bǝ bayɛ etiki bua budi lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ .
Lesa tutɛ nǝ moola miǝ bete ni bǝ bikato ola bikǝtǝ Onanto lǝ bikalɛ wǝǝ lekpakpa kasɔ wǝ ani lǝ betidi ba tã eto disi . Bikǝfi mi ku mǝ mblɛ eto ahiã bikǝtsyǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Nya bikato ola kǝtǝ Onanto lǝ baka ku betidi ba kenke ntɔnko betidi bǝ lǝ bomblɛ lǝ bɔkɛ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ kalebe saa . Itǝ bǝ lǝ bobokosǝ bo ǝsuǝ kasɔ butǝ Onanto nya bufi dibu butǝ utsyuǝ saa .
Olatoto eyifo lesa nǝ laakɛ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Onanto ɔkɔɛ .
Itsyise ola nkǝ utsyuǝ saa te wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ ote ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ bǝ lǝ utǝ wǝ nkpǝ .
Lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , Onanto ɔni ete nkpe . Nya Ofomfokǝtǝ tsya ɔni ete nkpe . Wǝ ni utidi wǝ baakpo Kristo Yesu . Wǝ ni futsyǝ laalɔ bonko Onanto eto nti .
Wǝ ni fuutsyuǝ dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto betidi eto disi . Yesu éyifo nyamfo sitinti bǝ Onanto eto kɛnyɛ ka útsyǝ nkǝ woofo utǝ wǝ betidi kenke eto lefe eboyo .
Nyamfo eso Onanto lékpe mɛ fe wǝ ɔtɔnkpe ku wǝ oteasa . Nyamfo menyifo bǝ sidia minlɛ bɔtɛyi . Nlɛ mi bɔtɛyi sitinti minkǝ wǝ dílǝkǝ mɛ fe oteasa nkǝ lǝ mbǝ nlǝkǝ wǝ bofokanɔ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ nte betidi ba lennitɔ Yudafɔ .
Lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto katsyakɔ saa , nla minkǝ basani besǝ mǝ ani kato bato ola ku ketu ka lekpa kɛnkɛ . Nya ɔblɔ nye kǝnǝ saa mankɛ mi lǝ nti .
Nla tsya miǝ besio lɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ola ɛyɛ lǝ mǝ bikelɛlɛ ǝsuǝ , lǝ ete bǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bobokosǝ . Inni bǝ bakle mǝ esi ku sika eto bikǝ akpa akpa nya lefo koya kpǝ nya loote bǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ .
Bomuu , ele bǝ mǝ ditsyǝbi sɛɛ te bǝ beyifo besio ba laate Onanto sikpi .
Nya ele bǝ usio saa bokosǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ lǝ okase asa , lǝ busiǝ kpo ǝsuǝ .
Minlɛ mǝ kusu butǝ minkǝ baté basani asa nye bǝtǝkǝ basani kato . Bomu ele bǝ bǝsiǝ kpoo , betsyue koto .
Itsyise Adam ni futsyǝ Onanto leka buyifo fɛ úlǝkǝ Eva utsyiko lǝ wǝ .
Nya inni Adam ni nwǝ olo ǝmǝ lɛwɛ , bomu usio ǝmǝ ni nwǝ ɔwɛ . Nya útǝ úyifo lebua .
Nya lǝ usio ebuńyǝ kekleke lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ku lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ nya wuusiǝ nkpǝ kɛnkɛ nya woobokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔɔ , wɔɔyɛ lǝ kanyi ka nkpe lǝ ubilele ǝsuǝ ɔbɔ ofe .
Ɔnukualɛ uni , baatɛyi bǝnkǝǝ , lǝ utsyuǝ aala nkǝ woeyifo bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ete bǝ woala nkǝ woeyifo keyifo sɛɛ .
Fe bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnkoo , ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ bulǝ saa lǝmbǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , uufi kusiǝ kɔni , uyifo obesibe , ɔkɛ dibusǝ , ɔlɛ ǝsuǝ ola , nya betidi leebu wǝ . Ɔkɛ kafoɛkpɛ kafo bafɔ nya uyifo oteasa sɛɛ .
Yanle bǝ uyifo utǝkpǝ , nya woankpɔ ekiti . Ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ diyuǝ , nya woenyifo nwǝ lǝǝnǝ etiki , nya woansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ tsya .
Ele bǝ uyifo nwǝ laalɛ wǝ diyo eto betidi ola , nya wǝǝtǝ nkǝ wǝ bebi tsyue ditiki koto lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ utidi utsyuǝ kpe wǝ leenyi kase woobe wǝ diyoo , ntsyǝ wɔɔyɛ obe Onanto eto betidi ba wɔɔyɛnko ?
Yanle bǝ uyifo nwǝ léfo Onanto ɔnɔ fɔfɔ kase woembobesǝ ǝsuǝ kato , nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ote ǝsuǝ , lǝ ubǝ udu ɔnɔ , nya Onanto luunǝ wǝ koto fe kase únǝ olontidi ǝmǝ koto .
Ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ nkpe diye sɛɛ lǝ mba dímamfo banɔ tsya eto ǝnǝmi , nya luutǝ bǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa bua saa bakpe wǝ kofani bǝ lǝ obuale ǝmǝ lǝ unyǝ wǝ umuǝ .
Nko kǝ ini bǝ wǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝ tsyaa , ele bǝ mǝǝ tsya yifo betidi ba nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ , nya baalɛ keyifo ola kekleke . Ele bǝ beyifo betidi ba lǝǝnnǝ ntǝ kǝkpǝ , nya baansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ tsya .
Ele bǝ beyifo bǝtsyuǝ léfo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ báboko mfo banɔ kekleke ketu ka laanlo mǝ dikpi .
Nya ele bǝ beto mǝ ditsyibi bebe fɛ . Nya lǝ bǝnyǝ kabua saa lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ beyifo bawunsǝkotsyuǝ .
Ele bǝ mǝ bǝsiǝ tsya , yifo besio ba nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ , nya benyifo betidi ba leedi betidi eto ntikima . Bomu ele bǝ beyifo besio ba leekpǝ ntǝ , nya beeyifo lesa saa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ .
Be fǝ , bawunsǝkotsyuǝ bamfo eto utsyuǝ saa fi kusiǝ kɔni kplon , nya woalɛ wǝ bebi ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kenke ola .
Nya bawunsǝkotsyuǝ ba nlɛ mǝ keyifo olaa , mǝ kosate ebunyǝ dibu ku kǝńyǝsǝ sɛɛ lǝ betidi eto ǝnǝmi . Nya bɔɔkɛ utu bedi etiki lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ lǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ kate betidi bamba .
Nlɛ bobe bǝ yǝmbɔklɛ muubǝ nyǝ mi . Fɛɛ nlɛ asa nyamfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ bǝ lǝ minlɛ bubǝ mlǝǝ , lǝ efo fǝ bɔwunsǝko lǝ ate lesa nǝ ele bǝ yifo fe ɔtɔnkotɔnko lǝ Onanto eto bebi nti . Nya mǝ ba ni Onanto wǝǝ nkpe nkpǝ eto bebii , mǝ ni omayi itǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .

Onanto eto ditiki kɛnkɛ nǝ bǝlǝkǝ bátee , kpe kalende tinti nya kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo bɔni nko . Nya ni bǝnkǝ , “ Bonamute ǝbǝ bale fe kawunsiǝ eto utidi . Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ uyifo kɛnkɛ . Nya Onanto eto batɔnkpe dínyǝ wǝ . Nya bǝlǝkǝ wǝ báte lǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke nti . Kawunsiǝ eto betidi kpǝ áfo wǝ bánɔ . Nya Onanto dítsyi wǝ úsuko kato lǝ diyǝnde kplɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte bo ókpasǝ nkǝ , fɛ kawunsiǝ eto kalosǝkɔ looyoo , betidi bǝtsyuǝ ebɔbɔ lǝ bofokanɔ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ bǝtǝkǝko bidia eto awɔnɔ nnya mba luufi mǝ ǝsuǝ bǝtǝ obuale ǝmǝ eto asatete .
Bidia eto asa betidi bamfo laate , nya buufi mǝ disiale eto asatete bakula , itsyise mǝ akɔɛsi ǝkpǝ fe situ ku ute béfi bátonsǝ nnya , bǝmbǝ ɔnukualɛ .
Mǝ laate bǝ yanle bǝ betidi fi kusiǝ . Nya baatɛyi bǝnkǝ yanle bǝ bedi edisa ǝtsyuǝ eto okle tsya . Fɛɛ Onanto wǝ díyifo edisa kenke utsyǝ nkǝ mba léfo wǝ ditiki banɔ bentekǝko wǝǝ , lǝ bedi ku lɛninsɔ .
Nya sitintii , asa nnya kenke Onanto díyifoo , alɛkɛ . Nyaso yanle bǝ utidi saa kisi didisa kuditsyuǝ . Bomu ele bǝ bafo ditsyuǝ saa ku olatoto ku lɛninsɔ .
