Itsyise Onanto eto ditiki nǝmǝ ku bo lɛninsɔ lǝǝyifo didisa nǝmǝ kɛnkɛ .
Lǝ até fǝ bayimitsyuǝ asa nyamfoo , nya ǝsuǝ fɔɔyɛ afiani Yesu Kristo eto ɔwunsǝko sɛɛ nɛ . Lǝ nya féfi bofokanɔ eto etiki nyamǝ ku asatete fékluǝsǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , nyamfo luutǝ fǝ ǝsuǝle nɛ .
Nyaso lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ amamosa nnya betidi laatɛyi nya dimanyɛ lǝ konantosu nya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa . Nya kase konantosu lǝ ǝtǝkǝko ko kekleke .
Ǝsuǝ eto bunǝ itǝ ale bɔkɛ alɛkɛ lǝ kusu kutsyuǝ , tsya Anantotiki bufi kekulǝsǝ ǝsuǝ ku nya bokase kpe kutǝkǝ eso nyamblɛ kenke . Itsyise yuutǝ fǝ kutǝkǝ lǝ nkpǝ bomfo ku lǝ kǝkpǝma eto nle tsya .
Nyamfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ wǝ ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa fo ɔnɔ .
Nyamfo eso bɔnlɛ keyifo kekleke nya bɔnlɛ kanyi saa bunyǝ nɛ . Itsyise bo kusubebe tǝkǝ lǝ nkpǝ manlo bo Onanto wǝ ni betidi ba tã eto Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya mba luunyǝ wǝ bofokǝtǝ ni mba léfo wǝ bánɔ .
Nyamfo ni asa nnya ele bǝ te mǝ nɛ .
Mǝntǝ lǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ fe amamflɔ itsyise eyifo okosobi eso . Bomuu , fiani ditsyǝbi sɛɛ itǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ etikididi ku fǝ ditsyǝbi ku fǝ lelabi itǝ betidi ku fǝ bofokanɔ ku fǝ nkpǝ kɛnkɛ busiǝ tsya ǝsuǝ .
Ńyǝ kekleke lǝ akakla Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝkǝtǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke . Nyaso lǝkǝ nya kasɔ lǝ ate mǝ asa nyamǝ isu ese lefe nǝ muusinkli mbǝ .
Nya manyɛ Onanto eto Lɛwɔnɔ eto ǝtǝsa nnya úfi útǝ fǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ku bafokanɔfɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ba dítǝkǝ fǝ anii , eto keyifo buyifo .
Tǝ lǝ fǝ nsusu lǝ butǝkǝ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ , nya lǝ alɛ nko ekeyifo itǝ lǝ betidi ba tã lǝ bǝnyǝ lǝ fǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ bo fensi eto sɛtɔsusu .
Lɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ ku asa nnya faate . Nyǝ kekleke lǝ keyifo ka fanlɛ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise lǝ eyifo nkoo , ebulǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ku betidi kenke ba laanɔ fǝ ditiki etsyiko lǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝsuǝ .
Meyenki akpe nye manlɔ osani wǝ ni fǝ sininǝ ǝtsyǝ ku kudu . Bomu lǝkǝ asa kasɔ ate wǝ ku utu buɛɛ fe fanto seka . Lǝ bakosobi fe bayanisani .
Lɛ besio ba lebe banso fǝ fe fambe mǝ . Nya lǝ alɛ mbitɛ tsya fe fǝ bayimisio , nya lǝ alɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ .
Bakɔbǝsiǝ ba lǝmbǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝǝ , lɛ mǝ kukɔnɔ ku dibu .
Fɛ lǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ bǝtsyuǝ kpe bebi nye bǝflufluu , tǝ lǝ bebi bamǝ lǝ bakase tutɛ , bakase kase bɔɔlɛ mǝ diyo eto betidi ku mǝ mba léle mǝ ola fe kase mǝ bofokanɔ eto keyifo lete . Ele bǝ bedi betidi ba lǝǝtsyǝ mba léle mǝ kɔlɛ . Nyamfo lǝǝdufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ nɛ .
Nya ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ lǝmbǝ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ saa , ufi wǝ kusubebe utǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ lǝ ukato ola ukǝtǝ Onanto ketsye ku kakɔmi itsyise ohiã wǝ bɔwunsǝko .
Fɛɛ ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ leedi sɛsɔnɔɔ , umbǝ nkpǝ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi , ite bǝ usi nkpǝ tsya .
Di mǝ etiki ǝkǝ mǝ ato itsyi lǝ asa nyamfo ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nye betidi bamba lembudi mǝ ketikima .
Nya lǝ utsyuǝ lǝ mi nti áni nkǝ woǝmbɔlɛ wǝ diyo eto betidi ola kukɔnɔɔ , nyalɛ te fǝ ɔ́ni wǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu komǝ , nya wǝ etiki abia eso utidi wǝ dimamfo ɔnɔ kulaa tsya .
Memfi ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ dimamfo tɔ alɛ fosi akua eto diye akɔ ku bakɔbǝsiǝ eto ditsyukpa nǝ nkpe lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti . Nya nnya nsi nso ni bǝǝ , ɔkɔsiǝ wǝ nkpe lǝ ditsyukpa mǝmfo nti di usio ni kusǝ kɔni hã úkǝsiǝ .
Uyifo nwǝ betidi laakpadi diye sɛɛ lǝ kase unsi nkpǝ sɛɛ eso . Ele bǝ udi usio wǝ nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ wǝ dínǝ wǝ bebi kukɔnɔ nya onkpe kafoɛkpɛ itǝ bafɔbofo . Ele bǝ uyifo usio wǝ nkpe kafo ɛkpɛ itǝ wǝ bǝtsyuǝ ku bafokanɔfɔ tsyuǝ . Nya woawunsǝ ko betidi ba kenke nkpe lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ ɔnukualɛɛ , ufi nkpǝ bo kenke unsi itǝ kasɛɛ eto buyifo .
Bakɔbǝsiǝ ba dimamfo tɔ alɛ fosi akuaa , mǝmfi mǝ aye akɔ lǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ eto ditsyukpa nǝmfo nti . Itsyise lǝ kusǝsiǝsiǝ lǝ mǝ ɔkɔɛ , boosinkli lǝ Kristo kama besu bǝsiǝ bese fɔfɔ .
Nya nyamfo ebutǝ bata kakle ka nkpe lǝ mǝ ku Onanto nti bebu itǝ bedi dikpi .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , boofiani baflɔ bakatsyilama betidi eto ayo kedi etiki bimba nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ . Nya nnya nsi lebia enso ni bǝǝ , bookakpadi betidi aye bua kedi mǝ ketikima katɛyi etiki nnya dimamfe .
Nyasoo , nla miǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ bamfo eto kakle siǝ bese lǝ bale bebi lǝ bǝsiǝ babe mǝ ayo bomu . Nyamfo ebutǝ bǝ bembuyifo asa nnya dimǝńyǝ itǝ nya luutǝ bo balo kusu bǝ bǝkedi etiki bua saa lǝ bo ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise bakɔbǝsiǝ bǝtsyuǝ ébusinkli bésu bǝtǝko Obonsam .
Lǝ bakɔbǝsiǝ bǝtsyuǝ kpe lǝ usio wǝ díkafo banɔ eto diyoo , ele bǝ obe mǝ ɔlɛ mǝ ola , itǝ bǝ mǝ bitsyikǝ ǝmbubǝ itǝkǝ lǝ Onanto eto bafokanɔfɔ ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ kusu bǝ bafokanɔfɔ mfó eto ditsyukpa ebofo bakɔɛsiǝ bamba ba lǝmbǝ bawunsǝkotsyuǝ ola bɔlɛ .
Nya bafokanɔfɔ eto batɔnkotɔnko ba nlɛ mǝ keyifo kamǝ olaa , ele bǝ bǝtǝ mǝ kayofofo ka disu sɛtɔ eto sinuǝ . Titlu mba laate asa fɛ bensi beedi betidi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ tsya .
Itsyise bátɛyi lǝ Awɔnisa Eto Kukue Kɛnkɛ bǝnkǝ , “ Mankle onantsyui wǝ laafodi kamɔ kǝtǝ fǝ eto kɛnyɛ lǝ ɔlɛ keyifo . ” Besi bátɛyi tsya bǝǝ , “ Ele bǝ uyifoyifo saa nyǝ wǝ kayofofo itsyi lǝ keyifo ka ɔnlɛ ǝsuǝ . ”
Lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ǝbǝ ɔlɛ ɔtɔnkotɔnko utsyuǝ kɛnyɛ bolaa , mamfo nnya anɔ isu ese lefe nǝ ɛflɔ betidi inuǝ ku kama .
Nya betidi ba lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ buaa , lǝkǝ mǝ até lǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ nti lǝ ǝkǝ mǝ ato lǝ bafokanɔfɔ kenke eto ǝnǝmi . Nyamfo luutǝ bafɛfɛ te sikpi nɛ .
Nyaso nlɛ fǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ lǝ Onanto ku Kristo ku Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke eto ǝnǝmi minkǝ lɛ nyamfo ola kukɔnɔ lǝ ayɛ betidi eto ǝnǝmi bobe bǝ lǝ esu ala utsyuǝ aso utsyuǝ .
Tsyǝ ǝsuǝ , mankpɔ lǝ ani butǝkǝ lǝ utsyuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ kanantoyifo buyifo . Nya makɔko babuayifo saa , bomu lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ lebuayifoyifo saa ǝsuǝ .
Nya se kafo eto bufi nkpe fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , mantɛyi fǝ ǝkǝnǝ ntu fufu ete . Yɔɔlɛkɛ bǝ ǝkǝnǝ nte sɛkɛ sɛkɛ fe kofa seka .
Betidi bǝtsyuǝ eto abua nnya beeyifo amfo bɔbiɔ nyaso yǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ dikpididi kate koko . Fɛ bǝtsyuǝǝ , kama kama fɛ mǝ asabuayifoyifo tsya lǝǝbǝ kabɔ bǝǝnyǝ .
Nko kǝ ini bǝ asasɛyifoyifo tsya ǝmbofo bɔbiɔ , nya nnya lɛbiɔ tsya ebubǝ ɛbɔɔ lekple utsyuǝ saa nyǝ .
Tɛyi bafokanɔfɔ ba ni ndomufɔ kenke fǝnkǝ ele bǝ babokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ banamute lǝ keyifokɔ , bǝ betidi saa embudi etiki bua saa itsyi lǝ Onanto ku bo bofokanɔ eto asatete ǝsuǝ .
Nya ndomufɔ eto banamute ni bafokanɔfɔɔ , mántaka bǝńyǝ lǝ banamute bamǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bofokanɔ eto sɛyimididi bataka . Bomu ele bǝ babokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ bawunsǝko mǝ kulaa enso . Itsyise betidi ba baanlɛ bɔwunsǝko mfoo , beyifo mba lefo Yesu banɔ . Nya mǝ ku mǝmǝ kenke eyifo wǝ bale ba woala tinti . Nyamfo ele bǝ te mǝ lǝ akpe mǝ nkɛale lǝ beyifo ele bǝ beyifo lǝ bakpe mǝ nkɛale .
Utidi wǝ ke laate asa bamba nya laanlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , utsyǝ ǝmǝ lɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ kato bobesǝ unyi kulesa . Iyifo etiki bunǝ bimba ku kǝdiǝ ku bulǝ bimba ete woakpe . Nyamfo lǝǝtǝ betidi kǝnǝnsɛ , ndiǝkpekpe ku abiesese , ku nsusu bua bufi lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ nɛ .

Nya bǝǝnǝ etiki kǝntsyɛɛ lefe saa . Betidi bamfo eto okle eto nsunsu ebukpǝ nya bensiyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ɔnukualɛ . Mǝ nsusu ete ni bǝnkǝ bǝǝtǝkǝko Ditiki Sɛɛ nɛ mǝ kama lǝ bayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bafiani batabinyǝ . Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko mbamfo eto okle ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ utidi akpe ɔtsyini kekleke lǝ Onanto eto bɔsumu ǝsuǝ nya asa nnya nte wǝ tsya dídufǝ wǝ ǝnǝǝ , uyifo otabinyǝ .
Itsyise fe kase bále boo , bóanlɛ kulesa boboko kawunsiǝ . Nya lǝ bukpe tsyaa , boǝmbufi kulesa busuko .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bikǝ ku edisa nya ntǝ bo lǝ imi bo .
Fɛɛ betidi ba laasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ bikǝ eto bɔkɛ ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ leedufǝ lǝ Obonsam eto uyibi wǝ obio utsyǝ mǝ nɛ . Nya beetsyiko asa bimba buyifo , nya beefi kawunsiǝ eto bikǝ bɔbɛbɛ kakpimi lǝ ǝsuǝ nya baabiasǝ mǝ nkpǝ itǝ bǝǝkpǝ kanya kulaa .
Itsyise ǝnǝmi bɔsɛsǝ lǝ atabi bɔbɛbɛ ǝsuǝ laayɛnko asa bua kpǝ eto buyifo . Betidi bǝtsyuǝ lǝ kǝnǝsɛ lǝ atabi eto bɔkɛ eso áyansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu . Nya mǝ nkpǝ kenke édufǝ lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya se feyifo utidi wǝ dífi fǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ Onanto esoo , lǝkǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ asa bua nyamfo kenke eto buyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ efi fǝ ǝnǝmi ǝtǝkǝ lǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo ǝsuǝ . Tǝkǝko Boanto Onanto lǝ bofokanɔ ku lelabi ǝsuǝ . Kɛ dibusǝ lǝ alɛ betidi buɛɛ .
Ńyǝ kekleke lǝ bofokanɔ eto keyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ akpe nkɛale lǝ ǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo manlo . Nkpǝ bomfo eso Onanto lékpadi fǝ lǝ lefe nǝ fáfo wǝ bokpadi eto bofokanɔ fáte lǝ mba díkafo babɔ ku babamba eto ǝnǝmi nɛ .
Nya lǝ Onanto wǝ diyifo lesa saa ku Kristo wǝ dífǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ úlǝkǝ wǝ bofokanɔ óte lǝ Pontio Pilato eto ǝnǝmii , nlɛ mɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ bufi kǝtǝ fǝ , ini mɔ kɔfi .
Nyaso nlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi minkǝ lɛ asa nyamfo ola kase kuutsyuǝ lǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa bua itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo luusinkli ubǝ .
Nya Onanto ebutǝ Yesu Kristo sinkli ubǝ lǝ lefe nǝ ɛlɛkɛ itǝ wǝ . Onanto ni nwǝ nso kenke ku ni nwǝ fate nlɛ seka budi lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ , nya uni baka kenke eto oka . Nya lesa saa laakpo wǝ Bonamute Onanto . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ boatɛsǝ .
Wǝ fate insi nkpǝ itsyise wǝǝkpe kulefe kulefe . Nya wǝǝyǝnde itǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbofo buńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi lǝ ɔlɛ bubǝ . Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnnyǝ wǝ tɔ unyǝ nya kuutsyuǝ saa tsya ǝmbofo wǝ ǝnǝmi bobe . Nya atɛsǝ ku ǝsuǝale ni wǝ ale lefe saa . Ibǝ itǝ .
Tɛyi mba nkpe kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ fǝnkǝ , bambesǝ ǝsuǝ kato befi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ mi , bikǝ bia lalo ǝsuǝ . Bomu befi mǝ ǝnǝmi bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ . Wǝ uni lǝǝtǝ bo lesa saa kafo faa nkǝ lǝ bunyǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Tɛyi mǝ fǝ bekeyifo kasɛɛ nya luutǝ boofiani batabinyǝ bǝnyǝ atsyɔkpokpo lǝ nnya buuyifo ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ bǝkǝtǝ betidi asa kafo faa .
Lǝ beyifo nkoo , balɛ bikǝ bia lambia bɔɔlɔ kǝtsyǝ itǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ kama ka nlɛ bubǝ . Lǝ nya ǝsuǝ boonyǝ nkpǝ tinti bǝtǝ ǝsuǝ .
Timoteo , be fǝ alɔ asa nnya Onanto dífi útǝ fǝ ǝtsyǝ kukɔnɔ . Memfi fǝ ǝsuǝ akpe lǝ eyifosa bimba ku etikinǝnǝ bimba ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ǝsuǝ betidi bǝtsyuǝ laayɛ kawɛ betidi fe mba ni babesibe .
Itsyise bǝtsyuǝ efi bǝ beyi asa nyamfo . Fɛɛ ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ bányansǝ mǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu . Nlɛ Onanto bɔtɔ miǝ ufi wǝ lefonǝ obe mi .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝ mimfiani Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpe , wǝ nlɛ letsya bobe itsyi lǝ nkpǝ bo buunyǝ lǝ Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ lǝ bo ku wǝ eto lɔniyifoyifo ǝsuǝ nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɛni kǝtǝ fǝ .
Mɔ ubi lala Timoteo , nlɛ Boanto Onanto ku Bonamute Kristo Yesu bɔtɔ miǝ mǝ lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko fǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ fǝ kaminsǝ , lǝ bǝtǝ fǝ diyuǝsǝ .
Maasɔ Onanto wǝ meesumu fe kase mɔ banamǝ díyifo ani . Nya meeyifo nko ku mɔ utu wǝ laanlo mɛ dikpi ǝsuǝ . Nya , masɔ wǝ ani ketsye ku kakɔmi kalɛ wǝ lekpakpa lǝ fǝ disi lǝ nlɛ ola boto .
Nya lǝ nkloma binǝntu bia féwii , mala tinti miǝ mǝǝnyǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ iyuǝ mɛ .
Maakloma bofokanɔ kekleke bo nkpe fǝ . Bofokanɔ bo eto okle lɛkɛ fǝ ewu Lois ku fambe Eunike mǝ . Mfo nnɔ miǝ fintsya kpe mu okle .
Nsusu bomfo eso minlɛ fǝ kukue komfo bɔwɔni bǝ lǝ alɛ kekleke ǝtǝsa nnya Onanto dítǝ fǝ lǝ lefe nǝ mímfi ani míntǝkǝ fǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ mínto ola .
Itsyise lɛwɔnɔ nǝ Onanto dítǝ boo , ǝǝntǝ boate sikpi . Bomuu , útǝ bo lɛwɔnɔ nǝ lǝǝtǝ boǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale , ku lelabi , ku ǝsuǝ eto lɛkɔɛle kato butǝkǝ tsya .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mǝntǝ lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ fǝ bǝ ǝńyǝ alɛ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ mǝ bɔtɛyi nye lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ fǝ lǝ mɔ disi nwǝ bákpe le diyo lǝ Kristo eto disi . Bomuu , fintsya ńyǝ kekleke lǝ ǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ wǝ disi lǝ ǝlǝkǝ Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ate . Itsyise Onanto ǝtǝ fǝ ǝsuǝale bǝ lǝ afo nyamfo buyifo .
Onanto ni nwǝ dítǝ bo nkpǝ nya ókpadi bo nkǝ bofiani wǝ betidi . Inni lǝ bo kasɛɛ ka búyifo eso . Bomuu , iyifo wǝ Onanto eto nsusu ku kafo ɛkpɛ ka úfi útǝ bo eso . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ nya búnyǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝmfo fɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ kulaa tsya .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ébulǝkǝ nyamfo óte bo ekpa wuǝ lǝ Ofomfokǝtǝ Kristo Yesu ǝmfo eto bubǝ ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ni futsyǝ léso ukpǝ ku eto ǝsuǝale ani . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ ǝsuǝǝ , óboko bo nkpǝ bo kalosɛkɔ lǝnsiembɔkɛ kulefe .
Onanto efi mɛ uyifo nwǝ loobe wǝ letsya ku ɔtɔnkpe ku wǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo eto oteasa .
Nya lǝ nyamfo esoo , nya minlɛ kanyi bunyǝ nɛ . Fɛɛ kofani annlɛ mɛ . Itsyise mfo nnɔ sitinti , nya nyi utidi wǝ ǝsuǝ mɔ bofokanɔ nkpe . Nya nyi tsya miǝ woose mɛ ku nya kenke mimfi minlɛ bokpe lǝ wǝ ani isu ese lǝ Diyi nǝmǝ .
Lɛ etiki sɛɛ ku nnya kenke mínte fǝ kukɔnɔ kekleke , nya lǝ ayɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ . Fo nya anɔ kekleke nya lǝ eyifo lɔni ku Kristo Yesu lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale nya nkpe lǝ bo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ alɛ asa sɛɛ nya kenke béfi bǝtǝ fǝ kukɔnɔ .
Eyi fǝ Asiafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ kenke édu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ , nko ke ni Figelo ku Hermefene tsya lídu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ nɛ .
Nlɛ Bonamute lekpakpa miǝ unyǝ Onesiforo ku wǝ diyo eto betidi kaminsǝ itsyise yéanlɛ wǝ kofani bǝ bákpe mɛ lǝ diyo . Bomuu , úńyǝ ko mɛ nnya ɔ́wunsǝ ko mɛ tinti .
Nya lefe nǝ úbǝ Romaa , ótsyilama kenke ɔ́bɛbɛ mɛ isu ese lefene eto lefe únyǝ mɛ .
Nlɛ bɔtɔ miǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ unyǝ wǝ kaminsǝ lǝ wǝ Lekpoyi ǝsuǝ . Fǝ kosate yi esu kpǝ nnya ǝsuǝ ɔ́wunsǝko mɛ lǝ Efeso .
Nya fǝ , mɔ ubi , kpe nkɛale ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ nǝ úfi útǝ bo bǝ bookpe lǝ lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo Yesu ǝsuǝ .
Nya lǝ asa nnya fánɔ bǝ nte lǝ betidi kpǝ eto ǝnǝmii , nko kǝ ele bǝ fintsya fi akpe lǝ betidi ba léfobanɔ eto ani bǝ lǝ befi besu bate betidi bamba tsya .
Ńyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyi ǝsuǝ fe kase omamanyǝ sɛɛ lǝǝńyǝ , ǝtǝ Kristo Yesu .
Omamanyǝ wǝ ńyǝ sitinti itǝ wǝ keyifoo , woola nkǝ wǝ eyifosa lǝ ekpe wǝ uninǝ disuǝyuǝ . Nyaso woǝnsiǝmbufi ani okpe lǝ betidi ba lenni bamamanyǝ eto asa nnya beeyifo ǝsuǝ .
Nko ini nɛ bǝ fɛ nwǝ leetsyetsyi lǝ udi ututɛɛ , ele bǝ uyifo lǝ afi nnya baakpe ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ .
Ɔkuɛmfo wǝ leeyifo keyifo ku otsyekle lǝ wǝ ɔkuɛɛ , wǝ ni futsyǝ laaka wǝ bidikǝ bia budi nɛ .
Bu disi lǝ etiki nnya minlɛ fǝ bɔtɛyi mfo kenke laabe , itsyise nyi minkǝ Bonamute ebutǝ anɔ nyamblɛ kenke kasɔ .
Kloma Yesu Kristo wǝ ni Oka David eto ufluflu wǝ Onanto létakasǝ úńyǝnsǝ utsyi ɔkɔmǝ úbǝ fe kase Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ minlɛ bɔtɛyi mfo nlɛ bote .
Nnlɛ kanyi bunyǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ maatɛyi eso . Nya bakpe mɛ lǝ amana kulaa tsya fe utidi wǝ leeyifo asa bua . Fɛɛ Onanto eto etiki alɛɛ , bǝmbofo ni kusu buti !
Lǝ nyamfo eso maafo lesa saa akamini itǝ Onanto eto betidi ba ukǝlǝkǝ utsyǝ esoo , bǝ lǝ mǝ tsya lǝ bǝnyǝ bofo bo ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo Yesu mate ǝsuǝ lǝ bɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bunyǝ nkpǝ manlo eto disuǝyuǝ .
Ɔnukualɛ uni baatɛyi bǝnkǝ , “ Lǝ búkpe ku wǝǝ , bo tsya ebusiǝ nkpǝ ku wǝ .
Lǝ bofo buńyǝ kekleke lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ saa ǝsuǝǝ , buudi seka ku wǝ . Lǝ bɔni wǝǝ , wuntsya ebɔni bo .
Lǝ ibǝ bǝ bɔ́yɛ bofokanɔ lǝ wǝ kula tsyaa , wǝǝ , ǝmbɔyɛ buyifo lǝ kɛnyɛ ka utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise wǝmbɔni wǝ ǝsuǝ kulefe . ”
Kaklomasǝ mǝ asa nyamfo nya lǝ ǝkǝ mǝ ato kekleke lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi bǝ lǝ bayɛ etiki bunǝ . Itsyise kasɛɛ saa aambɔ le nya ǝsuǝ . Bomu asa nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ yaabiasǝ mba laanɔ nya . Mǝ bofokanɔ ebɔyuɛ .
Lɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ Onanto utǝ fǝ kayofofo sɛɛ . Yifo fǝ keyifo kukɔnɔ bǝ kofani lǝ kɔyɛ fǝ bɔlɛ . Bomu yifo utidi wǝ laate Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ kosate ǝsuǝ .
Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ akuɛntiki ku asa bimba bɔtɛyi ǝsuǝ . Itsyise betidi ba leeyifo asa nyamfo eto oklee , yǝǝlǝkǝ mǝ nsusu ketsyiko lǝ Onanto sikpibote ǝsuǝ famfamfa .
Asa nyamfo eto okle bote ale lefabe nǝ leenkpǝ nǝ laanyi kpitikpitikpiti . Nya betidi inuǝ ba léte asa nyamfo eto kakle ni Himeneo ku Fileto .
Banya kusu itsyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , nya banlɛ bafokanɔfɔ eto nsusu bobiasǝ katɛyi bǝnkǝ botaka ketsyi ɔkɔmǝ kǝbǝ nkpǝ eto lefe ébubǝ éfe .
Fɛɛ Onanto eto diyo eto leba nǝ ǝsuǝ óse ofati úńyǝnsǝǝ , ni nsi ńyǝ . Nya leba nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , ɔ́wɔni etiki nya lǝǝbǝ mfo nkǝ , “ Bonamute yi betidi ba ni wǝ bale nya , ” nya “ Utidi wǝ laatɛyi nkǝ ɔlɛ Bonamute busumuu , ele bǝ usinkli lǝ asa bua buyifo kama . ”
Lǝ diyo kplɛ saa , kedikpɛ akpa akpa lǝǝtsyǝ mfo . Befi sika sia béyifo kǝtsyuǝ kǝtsyuǝ ku sika flubia . Nya kǝtsyuǝ tsya sitǝ beefi baato kǝ fɛ nka baawoe tsya nkpe . Beeyifo kakpɛ kamfo lǝ esu esu ǝsuǝ , kǝtsyuǝ itǝ eyi sɛɛ eto budi eto keyifo . Nya kǝtsyuǝ tsya itǝ diyi saa eto keyifo buyifo .
Nyaso lǝ utidi utsyuǝ ǝlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ utsyiko lǝ asa bua ǝsuǝ nya uyifo wǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛɛ , ofo koya utǝ Bonamute fenkǝ kakpɛ ka baalɔ bǝǝtsyǝ itǝ eyisɛdidi . Itǝ bǝ boofo wǝ bufi itǝ keyifo sɛɛ saa buyifo .
Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ bakosobi eto alasa bimba butǝkǝko ǝsuǝ . Nya yifo lesa saa lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ , lǝ ǝsiǝ bofokanɔ eto nkpǝ sɛɛ , lǝ akala betidi , nya lǝ ǝsiǝ nkpǝ kpoo ku mǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ . Yifo asa nyamfo ku mba nsi nkoǝ sɛɛ , laato ola ku ketu ka lekpa bǝ ɔwunsǝko mi .
Lǝkǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ etsyiko lǝ ebukitiki ku etiki bimba budi ǝsuǝ , itsyise kǝdiǝ ete asa nyamfo eto oklee , lǝǝnǝ kaboko .
Nya yanle bǝ Bonamute eto usumunyǝ , lǝ ukǝdiǝ kǝdiǝ . Bomu ele bǝ ukǝyifo kafoɛkpɛ kǝtǝ utsyuǝ saa , udi oteasa sɛɛ , nya uyifo utidi wǝ diyuǝ .
Nya betidi ba laataka kǝnyǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝǝ , ele bǝ ofo asa kasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mǝ ku utu buɛɛ . Nya ditsyuǝ Onanto ebutǝ nkǝ batsyi lɛkɔɛsi bawuninsǝ lǝ bafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , mǝ nsusu ebɔsini bǝ lǝ bani Obonsam wǝ dífi mǝ úyifo mba leyifo wǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ .
Tsyǝ nyamfo lekpo fǝǝ , lǝ eyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝǝ , lefe nǝ lɔɔkɛ ale ebubǝ .
Betidi ebola asa nnya luutǝ mǝ hã eto lɛlɛkɛsǝ nya boola atabi . Boobesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nya bookǝnǝ ǝsuǝ . Booyifo betidi ba luukaka , betidi kedi etiki bua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ nya booyifo mba lembubu mǝ antomǝ ku ambemǝ . Booyifo mba lǝǝntsyǝ kɔlɛ ku betidi ba lǝmbofo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ banɔ tsya .
Booyifo betidi ba lǝǝmbɔkɛ lefonǝ itǝ betidi bamba ku mba ba lǝǝnyǝ mǝ bǝtsyuǝ kaminsǝ . Booyifo betidi ba laatɛyi bidia kalɛ betidi lǝ kafo kabiasɛ mǝ aye ku betidi ba lǝǝmbǝ disuǝtsyǝ kabuasǝ asa . Nya mǝ ǝnǝmi ǝmbunyǝ , bankpe disiale . Nya mǝ ni betidi ba laanla asa sɛɛ nɛ .
Mǝ ni betidi ba leedu mǝ bǝtsyuǝ . Nya mǝ ni betidi ba leebu bǝ mǝ ete ni babesibe ku betidi ba leebu bǝ mǝ hã ni bakplɛ banso ku betidi ba laala kawunsiǝ kamfo eto kamini enso Onanto .
Betidi bamfo eto okle ákplatsya kate bǝ mǝ ni betidi sɛɛ , fɛɛ bámfo Onanto eto ǝsuǝale bǝ bɔkɛ lǝ mǝ nkpǝ bo bensi ǝsuǝ . Nǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ ǝlǝkǝ lǝ betidi bamfi nti .
Itsyise betidi bamfo eto okloee , beeyu kedufǝ lǝ betidi eto ayo kabiasǝ besio ba eto nsusu lǝmbǝ ale . Besio bamfó eto abua eyifo bitsyike itǝ mǝ itsyise beyifo abua akpa akpa nnya laakpa mǝ kakpe lǝ abua kpǝ ǝsuǝ .
Besio bamfo eto kakle aakase asa lefe saa , tsya bamfó etiki nyamǝ kasɔ bɔnɔ sitinti kulefe .
Kase ɛyɛ fɛ Yane ku Yambre letaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Mose ǝsuǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , kusu komfo ǝsuǝ ke bidia eto bateasa bamfo tsya lɛyɛ bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ nɛ . Asa bua nya betidi bamfo nlɛ buyifo afo mǝ nsusu kenke , itǝ bǝ bányansǝ mǝ bofo kanɔ eto ɔnukualɛsu .
Fɛɛ betidi bamfo eto okle ǝmbǝ sɛtɔ buusu , itsyise mǝ sɛmumu sia nkpe mǝ ebɔbɔ ete utidi saa nyǝ fe mba nlɛ asa nyamfo eto okle buyifo nko , fe kase ibǝ lǝ Yane ku Yambre ǝsuǝ .
Fɛ fǝǝ , ébunyǝ nya feenyi mɔ asatete , mɔ nkpǝ bo minsi , mɔ nsusu ku mɔ bofokanɔ , kase maakplatsya , kase maala betidi , ku kase mǝǝmuǝ utu kalɛ lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ .
Eyi kase bǝtǝnko mɛ , bákpe mɛ bulǝ , mínyǝ kanyi lefe nǝ mímbǝ Antiokia ku Ikonion ku Listra . Kloma ohiã kplɛ wǝ báte mɛ . Fɛ lǝ nnya amblɛ ǝsuǝǝ , Bonamute ǝlǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ nnya kǝmiǝ .
Ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ ni bǝnkǝǝ , betidi ba kenke lǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝǝ , boonyǝ kanyi nya bookpe mǝ bulǝ bǝńyǝ mǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Betidi bua ku bidiabidia eto bateasa mǝǝ , kato ko mǝ asa bua buyifo loobe fe kase baanlɛ betidi bɔwɛ kakpe ke . Nya mǝ kosate tsya betidi bamba ebukawɛ mǝ kakpe .
Nya fǝǝ , nla miǝ lǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ asa nnya fákase nya fáfo fánɔ tsya ǝsuǝ kekleke . Itsyise eyi betidi ba ɔflɔ fákase nya .
Idu lǝ fǝ sikpefi lefe kee , áte Kukue Kɛnkɛ eto Awɔnisa eto etiki nya díbǝ yɛwunsǝko fǝ fafiani obesibe , lǝ nyaso bofokǝtǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ fánɔ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ nya bɔyɛɛ buunyǝ asa nnya kenke baawɔni baakpe lǝ Kukue Kɛnkɛ eto Asawɔniwɔni kǝmiǝ . Nya ɛlɛkɛ itǝ asatete ku bunyenki kakpe utidi ku kɔlɛlɛ ku bunǝfofo itǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ siǝsiǝ .
Báwɔni nya nko bǝ lǝ utidi saa wǝ difi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ Onanto ebɔflɔ nya yɔɔlɔ wǝ itsyǝ itǝ keyifo sɛɛ saa buyifo .
Nnyǝ lǝ Onanto ku Kristo Yesu wǝ luusinkli ubǝ okponko kawunsiǝ eto betidi ku bǝkpǝnkpǝ akpo eto kɛnyɛ . Nya se wuusinkli ubǝ bio lǝ wǝ Sekadidi ǝsuǝ esoo , nlɛ fǝ kɔlɛ bɔlɛ kekleke minkǝ ,
bekpe kɔni o-o , bimbǝ kɔni o-o tsyaa , bilǝkǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kɛnyɛ bete . Bɛlɛ mǝ kɔlɛ , nya binyɛnki bekpe mǝ , lǝ bekpe mǝ nkɛale . Nya lǝ alɛ asakasɔ bulǝkǝ kate mǝǝ , tsyǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ efi utu buɛ ku disuǝtsyǝ até mǝ .
Itsyise lefe ditsyuǝ ebubǝ lefe nǝ betidi lensiǝmbɔtɔnǝ bǝ bǝǝtsyue ato banɔ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo . Bomu boola bǝ baanɔ bateasa bamba ba lɔɔtɛyi mǝ etiki nya eto okle boola bǝ baakanɔ .
Bootsyiko kama butsyi kakpe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo kǝtǝko etiki tsyuɛntsyuɛ eto kama .
Nya fǝǝ , lɛ fǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ lǝ ayɛ lǝ kusu ko lɛlɛkɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ ekakpe ale lǝ kanyi saa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ eyifo keyifo kamǝ fe Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eto nwǝ laabe ni letsya . Nya lǝ eyifo fǝ keyifo kukɔnɔ fe bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko .
Itsyise mɔɔ , mɔ nkpǝ fe bɔlɛ kalosǝkɔ bubǝ nya boofi mɛ fe keditǝtǝ . Nya lefe tsya boyo bǝ mfe ndu lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo .
Nkpɔ bɔkpɔ sɛɛ nya mínlosǝ mɔ keyifo fe nwǝ leetsyetsyi etsyi sɛɛ . Nya minlɛ mɔ bofokanɔ lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ .
Nya idu mɔmɔɔ , Onanto ebutǝ mɛ kayofofo sɛɛ ka nlɛ bote nkǝ nsi nkpǝ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ fe nwǝ lefo ɔnɔ eto kayofofo ka bálɔ bǝtsyǝ itǝ mɛ . Iyifo kayofofo sɛɛ ka Bonamute wǝ laakpo lekpo lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ luutǝ mɛ lǝ duyi fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ . Nya inni mɔ mate ete loofo ni , bomu bonko betidi bamba ba kenke tsya díkǝfi mǝ kusubebe bǝtǝkǝ lǝ Bonamute eto bubǝ bio ǝsuǝ .
Yɛ kusu saa foofo lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ .
Itsyise Dema edu mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ lǝ usu utǝkǝko kawunsiǝ kamfo eto bikǝ lǝ Tesalonika . Nya Kreskee , usu Galatia nya Tito dísu Dalmatia .
Luka hã dibu onkpe mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ mfo . Nyaso kpa Marko lǝ bibǝ , itsyise uuyifo ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ tinti utǝ mɛ .
Ntsyese Tihiko Efeso .
Nya lǝ alɛ bubǝ , fo mɔ lɛyɔlefe eto awu nya míyani mintsyǝ lǝ Karpo ɔflɔ lǝ Troia aboko mɛ . Nya lǝ efi mɔ ekue titlu nya béfi kubukikue béyifo tsya aboko .
Aleksandro wǝ ni ɔtsyuɛntsyuɛ eyifo mɛ kabua tinti . Nya Bonamute ebofo wǝ kayo lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ .
Nyaso fintsya ńyǝ kekleke lǝ abe kukɔnɔ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise ótaka uńyǝ lǝ bo asa nnya bɔnlɛ bote ǝsuǝ kekleke .
Lefe nǝ bákpadi mɛ ditutɛ lǝ lekpo etii , kutsyuǝ sa mámfo bubǝ kǝńyǝ mɛ kama lǝ etiki nyamǝ eti , bomu báyani mɛ bǝtsyǝ bédu . Fɛɛ nlɛ Onanto lekpakpa minkǝ wǝǝnnǝ mǝ koto lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Bonamute ǝńyǝ mɛ kama nya ókpe mɛ nkɛale nya dítǝ mimfo Bonamute eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ letsya bobe kǝtǝ mba lenni Yudafɔ mfo . Nya Bonamute dílǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ .
Bonamute ebulǝkǝ mɛ utsyiko lǝ kabua saa ǝsuǝ , nya wookpa mɛ ɔyɛnko buɛ buɛ isu ese lefe nǝ mindufǝ wǝ sekakedikɔ kato . Diyǝnde eto atɛsǝ bufi bɔnlɛ Wǝ butǝ idu mɔmɔ isu manlo manlo . Ibǝ itǝ .
Mǝǝsiǝsǝ Priska ku Akwila ku Onesiforo eto diyo eto betidi kenke .
Erasto si okpe lǝ Korinto . Trofimo tsya lɛ bufi , nyaso nyani wǝ ntsyǝ lǝ Mileto .
Kpe ǝsuǝ ku nkɛale lǝ ǝbǝ etu mɛ mfo fɛ lɛyɔlefe lǝ eyo . Eubulo ku Pude ku Lino ku Klaudia ku bayimi fɛfɛ kenke bafokanɔfɔ kenke bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ kukɔnɔ !
Bonamute lǝ usiǝko fǝ , nya nlɛ wǝ lekpakpa bǝ lǝ ɔlɛ mi ola lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ ni Onanto eto usumunyǝ ku Yesu Kristo eto ɔtɔnkpe , mɔ ni futsyǝ nlɛ fǝ kukue komfo bɔwɔni . Onanto dílǝkǝ mɛ nya ótsyese mɛ nkǝ nsu nwunsǝko wǝ betidi ba úlǝkǝ útsyǝ eto bafobanɔ lǝ nyɛnko mǝ lǝ bafo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bánɔ lǝ bo bafokanɔsu ǝsuǝ .
Bofokanɔsu komfo dítǝ bɔnlɛ kusu bobe itǝ nkpǝ manlo bo ǝsuǝ bófo bɔ́nɔ nɛ . Nya Onanto wǝ lǝmbɔwɛ bo kosatee , wǝ lɛtɛyi ditiki nǝmfo útsyǝ fɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ .
Wǝ dílǝkǝ nkpǝ manlo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo óte bo ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ditiki nǝ minlɛ mi bɔtɛyi lǝ lefe nǝ wǝ kosate lɛtɛyi utsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ni lesa nǝ ufi okpe mɛ lǝ ani nya mimfi minlɛ letsya bobe kǝtǝ betidi . Boanto Onanto wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ , wǝ lɛtɛyi mɛ nkǝ mbe ni letsya nɛ .
Mɔ olala Tito , nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ itsyise eyifo mɔ ubi tinti lǝ bofokanɔ bɔni bo ǝsuǝ bonkpe eso . Nya nlɛ Boanto Onanto ku Kristo Yesu wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ lekpakpa bǝ ɔlɛ fǝ ku lefonǝ ku diyuǝ ǝsuǝ , nya lǝ utǝ fǝ diyuǝsǝ .
Nyani fǝ ntsyǝ lǝ Kreta ku nsusu bǝ lǝ alɔ lesa saa nǝ díbu bɔlɔkǝtsyǝ ǝtsyǝ . Nya lǝ umǝ saa , lǝkǝ batɔnkotɔnko ba loofo buńyǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ eto kɛnyɛ fe kase míntɛyi fǝ miǝ yifo .
Fe bafokanɔfɔ eto batɔnkotɔnkoo , yanle bǝ etiki bua saa kɛ lǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ . Nya ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ mfi kusiǝ kɔni hã . Nya wǝ bebi tsya eyifo bebi ba léfo banɔ kekleke , nya beenyifo mba ditidi ato , nya beebu mǝ antomǝ .
Fe bafokanɔfɔ eto ɔtɔnkotɔnko wǝ laabe Onanto eto keyifoo , yanle bǝ bǝnyǝ nye befi etiki bua saa lǝ wǝ nye ukabesǝ ǝsuǝ kato nye kafo kanyi wǝ mlǝmlǝmlǝ . Nya yanle bǝ udui utekpe , nya yanle bǝ okakpɔ ekiti kekleke nye ukasɛsǝ ǝnǝmi tsya lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ .
Ele bǝ ofo bafɔ bofo , keyifo kafoɛkpɛ nya woala asa sɛɛ nya woalɛ wǝ ǝsuǝ ola . Nya ele bǝ uyifo utidi wǝ nkpe ditsyǝbi sɛɛ , nya uyifo kɛnkɛ lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ , nya wooyɛ lǝ kɔfi ǝsuǝ .
Ele bǝ uyifo nwǝ nlɛ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kɔni kekleke fe kase bofokanɔ eto kusu leté . Nya kusu komfo ǝsuǝ hã ele bǝ wuukayɛ bǝ lǝ okpe betidi bamba tsya ute lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya lǝ ofo mba laataka kǝńyǝ lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo ǝsuǝ eto botakebu bulǝkǝ kate mǝ .
Itsyise betidi kpǝ kpe ba nlɛ betidi bɔwɛ nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ ditiki nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ ku mǝ ebukisa buyifo . Nya mba nso asa nyamfo kenke buyifo , mǝ ni Yudafɔ eto bafokanɔfɔ .
Efe bǝ taka ǝńyǝ lǝ mǝ asa nyamfo eto okle eto bote ǝsuǝ , itsyise asa nyamfo ǝǝnǝ bulǝ kakpe lǝ diyo eto betidi eto bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Nya se ini atabi asa buabote eto bateasa bamfo lǝǝnyǝ ketsyiko le nya ǝsuǝ esoo , nyaso banlɛ asa bua nyamfo bote nɛ .
Nya Kreta eto utidi ɔni wǝ ni mǝ unyǝlǝkǝtidi lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Kretafɔ , bidia baatɛyi mi lefe saa nya beeyifo mba laabiasǝ asa kakpe fe bebuki , nya bedikpũ beni nya bankpe sɛflɔ tsya . ”
Asa nya unyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝmfo lɛtɛyi eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Nyaso bikǝ mǝ ato bǝ lǝ bayɛ ditsyǝbi bua nǝmfo bote itǝ lǝ mǝ bofokanɔ lǝ buyifo sitinti .
Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ bǝlǝkǝ mǝ ato betsyiko lǝ Yudafɔ eto etikitsyuɛntsyuɛ ku betidi ba eto asatete nnya lanyɛ lǝ ɔnukualɛ eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Betidi ba kenke diyifo mǝ ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛɛ , mǝ eyifosa tsya eyifo kɛnkɛ . Fɛɛ lǝ betidi ba diyifo mǝ ǝsuǝ betidi bua nya bámfo banɔ ɔflɔɔ , kulesa menyifo kɛnkɛ . Mǝ esibubu ku mǝ ketu eyi ku asa bua , lǝ nyaso bǝǝmbofo nya ni asɛ lekpo butsyǝ ketsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ .
Mǝ kosate aatɛyi bǝ beebu Onanto , fɛɛ mǝ eyifosa mante nko . Beyifo betidi ba laabiasǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ nya beembu kulesa nya bǝǝńyǝ bǝtǝ lesa sɛɛ saa buyifo .
Fɛ fǝǝ , te asa nnya nyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ eto kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ .
Te basani eto beninǝ kenke bǝ ele bǝ bebu mǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ bakafo mǝ lɛkɔɛle ani boso ku bǝtǝ ǝnǝ lefe saa . Nya lǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , balɛ mǝ bofokanɔ kɔni kekleke , lǝ bala mǝ bǝtsyuǝ , nya lǝ bakpe nkɛale ku lǝ bakɛ dibusǝ tsya .
Nko ke ini itǝ besioninǝ tsya nɛ , te mǝ kase ele bǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo dinyǝ itǝ besio ba diyifo kɛnkɛ . Yanle bǝ bakakpadi betidi aye bua . Nya yanle bǝ bǝnǝ nte bǝkpǝ tsya . Bomu ele bǝ bate betidi ditsyǝbi sɛɛ .
Nya ele bǝ baté besiobitɛ ba nsi bese kase ele bǝ bala mǝ bese ku mǝ bebi tsya .
Nya ele bǝ bate mɛ kase bɔɔlɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ola , nya ele bǝ bǝsiǝ nkpǝ bo diyifo kɛnkɛ , nya lǝ beyifo bǝsiǝ ba laalɛ mǝ bese ola kukɔnɔ , mba leebu mǝ bese . Nyamfo luutǝ bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa ǝmbɔtɛyi kulesa bua saa iitsyi lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝ ditsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Nko ke ɛyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝ ele bǝ lǝ ayɛnko bakosobi bamǝ tsya lǝ akpe mǝ nkɛale lǝ kase ele bǝ balɛ mǝ ǝsuǝ ola .
Lǝ asa nyamfo kenke eto kamaa , ele bǝ yifo fǝ ǝsuǝ futsyǝ eto ditsyǝbi ele bǝ utidi saa be lǝ okase utsyiko . Nya lǝ ǝńyǝ kekleke lǝ akate asa ku ɔnukualɛ .
Be kukɔnɔ lǝ ekedi betidi etiki ku lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ itǝ bǝ bǝmbunyǝ kabua saa itsyi lǝ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nya luutǝ bǝ fǝ baló tsya ɛmbɔtɛyi kabua saa lǝ bo ǝsuǝ , bomu lǝ kofani lǝ kɔlɛ mǝ .
Ele bǝ ndomufɔ bokosǝ mǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ bǝtǝ mǝ banamute . Nya ele bǝ mǝ eyifosa kpe mǝ banamute disuǝyuǝ lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Nya yanle bǝ bǝnǝnko mǝ etiki .
Yanle bǝ beyu mǝ tsya , bomu ele bǝ baté mǝ bǝnkǝ betidi sɛɛ beni , nya beeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ kǝtǝ mǝ . Nyamfo luutǝ buunyǝ bǝtsyǝ lekpo bǝ bo asa nnya boate iitsyi lǝ Boanto Onanto wǝ ni bo Ofomfokǝtǝ ǝsuǝǝ , eyifo asa sɛɛ .
Itsyise Onanto ǝlǝkǝ wǝ lefonǝ onkpe óte bo , bǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke nyǝ dilǝkǝ .
Onanto eto kafoɛkpɛ kamǝ lɛ bo bote nkǝ , bulǝkǝ bo ato butsyiko lǝ nkpǝ bua busiǝ ku kawunsiǝ eto asa bimba kama butǝkǝko ǝsuǝ . Nyaso ele bǝ bɔlɛ bo ǝsuǝ kukɔnɔ , nya lǝ busiǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ , lǝ buyifo ǝsuǝ kɛnkɛ lǝ kawunsiǝ kamfo ǝsuǝ
Kusu komfo buufi bukabe sɛtɔ itǝ diyi kplɛ nǝ ǝsuǝ búfi bo kusubebe bútǝkǝ nɛ . Diyi nǝmfo ni diyi nǝ ǝsuǝ bo Onanto Ɔkplɛnyǝ , bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Yesu Kristo eto diyǝnde lɔɔbɔ utsyuǝ saa nyǝ .
Úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ lǝ bo disi , bǝ lǝ ulǝkǝ bo utsyiko lǝ bo abua saa ǝsuǝ lǝ bofiani betidi kɛnkɛ ba ni wǝ kosate eto bale , nyaso bíala bǝ biekeyifo kasɛɛ hã nɛ .
Te asa nyamfo ku ǝsuǝale nya Onanto dítǝ fǝ , nya lǝ akpe nkɛale betidi ba kenke laanɔ fǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ kekleke , nya lǝ ǝnyǝnki akpe mba lanlɛ bɔyɛ lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ tsya . Nyaso mǝntǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kusu lǝ unyǝ fǝ olosǝ .
Klomasǝ mǝ lǝ mǝmblɛ bakloma lǝ babokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ kǝtǝ mǝ batɔnkotɔnko ku aba lǝ bǝtsyue mǝ ditiki koto , nya lǝ bekeyifo kasɛɛ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
Tɛyi mǝ fǝnkǝ bankatɛyi betidi eto kabua . Bomu beyifo sɛhɔ ku utsyuǝ saa lǝ bǝsiǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ ku utsyuǝ saa . Nya lǝ bekebu utidi saa lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ bo ǝmǝ tsya ébuyifo ebukisa bunyǝ ku ato titli , nya bóta bubu kɔ ǝmǝ . Nya ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ eto abua yifoyifo butǝkǝko tsya diyi bo ǝsuǝ kɔ . Nya búfi bo lefe bútǝ disialeyifoyifo , asabuyifo ku kǝnǝminsɛ , nya betidi díkisi bo nya bo tsya díkisi mǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ lefe nǝ Boanto Onanto , bo Ofomfokǝtǝ , dílǝkǝ wǝ kafoɛkpɛ ku lelabi óte boo ,
ófo bo lǝ nkpǝ . Inni lǝ bo kasɛɛ ka búyifo eso , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto lǝ wǝ kosate eto kaminsǝnyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise útǝ nkǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ bǝ didufǝ lǝ bo ǝsuǝ . Lɛwɔnɔ nǝmfo esi dítǝ besinkli bále bo nya dítǝ bo nkpǝ fɔfɔ , nya díflǝ bo itǝ bǝ buyifo kɛnkɛ .
Onanto efi wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ útǝ bo kpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bo Ofomfokǝtǝ Yesu Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ lefonǝ esoo , bonko wǝ eto nti ǝbǝ bɔlɛkɛ itǝ eso bontsya ditiki ǝbǝ búnyǝ nkpǝ manlo bo bɔnlɛ kusu bobe .
Ditiki nǝmfo eyifo ɔnukualɛ . Nya nla miǝ lǝ afo nya kekleke . Nya betidi ba díkafo Onanto banɔɔ , ele bǝ befi mǝ lefe bǝtǝ asa sɛɛ buyifo nya looboko kutǝkǝ itǝ betidi ba kenke .
Mǝǝnnǝ etiki ku utidi lǝ asa bimba ǝsuǝ . Mambiasǝ lefe lǝ betidi eto ketsyikɔ bokla kate ǝsuǝ , mǝndiǝ kǝdiǝ lǝ efi Mose eto afi eto etiki eyifo kǝnǝ eto etiki . Asa nyamfo kenke ǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa .
Kǝ ato utidi wǝ laakpe ntisensǝsensǝ lǝ bafokanɔfɔ nti sinuǝ . Lǝ nnya kamaa , yani wǝ .
Eyi fǝ utidi ǝmfo eto oklee , lebua edi wǝ ǝsuǝ nya wǝ asa buayifoyifo ǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ kate , nya ókalo wǝ ǝsuǝ dikpi .
Lǝ ntsyese fǝ Artema nye Tihikoo , yɛ kusu saa ǝsuǝ lǝ ǝbǝ ǝnyǝ mɛ lǝ Nikopoli . Itsyise mfó mimfi nsusu miǝ mɔɔkɛ lǝ lɛyɔ lefe nɛ .
Kplatsya lǝ ayɛ kusu saa lǝ awunsǝko Zena wǝ ni afi eto ukuente ku Apolo bǝ lǝ bǝmuǝ ǝsuǝ itǝ mǝ kusu komǝ busu . Nya laabe fǝ bakɛ lesa saa nǝ baahiã .
Ele bǝ mba dikafo baanɔ kasé kase boofi mǝ lefe kenke bǝtǝ asasɛyifoyifo nya looboko kutǝkǝ itǝ mǝ . Nya kamaa , ele bǝ bafo betidi bamba tsya bɔwunsǝko lǝ bayɛ aflɔsa .
Bayimi ba kenke nkpe mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ mfo bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ fǝ . Fintsya siǝsǝ bayimi mba dikafo baanɔ ba nkpe mfó ǝtǝ bo . Onanto lǝ ɔlɛ mimblɛ kenke lǝ wǝ lefonǝ ǝsuǝ .
Mɔ , Paulo , wǝ nlabe lǝ Aba eto diyo lǝ Kristo Yesu eto disi , ɛyɛ lǝ letsya nǝ mímbe wǝ eso ku bo ɔyimi Timoteo , bo nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ Filemon bo uyifotsyuǝ lala , bo ɔyimisio Apia ku bo ɔyɛtsyuǝ ku uyifotsyuǝ Arkipo ku bafokakɔfɔ eto ditsyukpa nǝ laatsya lǝ fǝ diyo .

Bɔlɛ bɔtɔ boǝ Onanto wǝ ni Boanto ku Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ ku diyuǝ lǝ disiǝko mi .
Ɔyimi Filemon , maakloma fǝ lefe saa lǝ mɔ olatoto ǝsuǝ . Nya maasɔ Onanto ani lǝ fǝ disi .
Itsyise maanɔ kase faala Onanto eto betidi ku kase fáfo Bonamute Yesu fánɔ .
Maato ola minkǝ bo sɛyɛtsyuǝ ku fǝ fe bafokanɔfɔɔ , eboboko kasɔnɔnɔ enso lǝ bonti . Itǝ ínǝ atsyɔkpokpo kenke nnya nkpe lǝ nkpǝ ɛyɛ lǝ bo lɔniyifoyifo ku Kristo ǝsuǝ .
Ɔyimi lala , lelabi nǝ nkpe fǝ ǝtǝ nyǝ disuǝyuǝ kpǝ ku nkɛalekpekpe ! Ǝtǝ diyuǝsǝ mba kenke lefo Onanto banɔ eto ketu .
Se minyifo fǝ ɔyimisani ɛyɛ lǝ sɛyɛtsyuǝ sia ǝsuǝ bonkpe lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ esoo , eni moofo fǝ bɔtɛyi miǝ yifo lesa nǝ ele bǝ yifo . Tsyaa , se maala fǝ esoo , nla miǝ maalɛ fǝ lekpakpa bomu . Ite bǝ mɔ ni Paulo wǝ ni Kristo Yesu eto ɔtɔnkpe . Nya mɔmɔɔ , nyifo nwǝ béti bákpe lǝ diyo lǝ wǝ disi eso .

Nyaso mɔmɔɔ , nlɛ fǝ lekpakpa lǝ Onesimo wǝ díkafiani mɔ kosate eto ubi eto disi lǝ lefe nǝ bakpe mɛ lǝ amla lǝ aba eto diyo .
Ite bǝ wǝ diye eto kasɔ ni kutǝkǝ tsyaa , kɔɔ utidi ko ete udi , wánkɛ kutǝkǝ saa utǝ fǝ . Fɛ mɔmɔɔ , okpe kutǝkǝ útǝ bonko fǝ ta .
Mɔmɔɔ , nsinkliko wǝ nlɛ fǝ botsyese . Iyifo mɛ fe mɔ kosate eto utu minfi minlɛ fǝ botsyese .
Eni moola miǝ ɔkɛ mɛ lǝ ɔflɔ mfo lefe nǝ eto lefe minlabe lǝ diyo lǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ eso , bǝ lǝ ofo mɛ bɔwunsǝko lǝ fǝ kɛnyɛ .
Fɛɛ manla miǝ maanyinkǝ fǝ nkpe miǝ lǝ awunsǝko mɛ . Bomu moola miǝ iyifo lesa nǝ ditsyi fǝ utu kǝmiǝ , diyifo fǝ lelabi . Nyaso membuyifo kulesa nǝ dimenyifo fǝ lelabi .
Ditsyuǝ nnya eso Onesimo dídu lǝ fǝ ɔflɔ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ nǝmfo ni bǝ lǝ ofo busikli kǝbǝ kǝsiǝ fǝ lǝ ɔflɔ itǝ lefe nǝ ta .
Nya mɔmɔɔ , unsini ndomunyǝ fufu , bomu oso ndomunyǝ . Uyifo ɔyimi lala lǝ Kristo eso . Ofo koya utǝ mɛ tinti . Fɛɛ itǝ fǝǝ , ofo koya utǝ fǝ oso , itsyise uyifo fǝ ndomunyǝ fe utidinini , nya unsi uni ɔyimisani lǝ Bonamute ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso lǝ ǝǝnyǝ mɛ fe fǝ uyifotsyuǝ , sinkli afo wǝ fe kase foofo mɔ kosate .
Lǝ óta fǝ ubu nye unsi fǝ kayo kǝtsyuǝ , bu kǝ ǝtǝ mɛ .
Mɔ , Paulo , kosate difi mɔ kɔni míwɔni nyamfo minkǝ moofo fǝ ke . Fɛɛ manla miǝ maaklomasǝ fǝ miǝ esi mɛ fǝ nkpǝ eto koya .
Nya mɔ ɔyimi , tǝ lǝ nnyǝ kutǝkǝ sɛkɛ ntsyi lǝ fǝ ɔflɔ , lǝ Bonamute eso ete . Yifo nyamfo nko lǝ lekpe mɛ lǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ lɛkɔɛsi kǝmiǝ .
Nlɛ kukue komfo bɔwɔni kǝtǝ fǝ ku bofokanɔ miǝ ebuyifo lǝ lesa nǝ mintɔ fǝ ǝsuǝ , nnya ni bǝ ebuyifo lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nya uusi eso nko kulaa tsya .
Lǝ nnya kamaa , lɔ kasɔnɔkɔ ǝtsyǝ mɛ mfó . Itsyise mfo nnɔ miǝ Onanto ebɔnɔ mimblɛ eto olatoto utǝ bayani mɛ nsinkli mbǝ mi ɔflɔ .
Epafra , wǝ bonko nkpe lǝ Aba eto diyo lǝ Kristo Yesu eto disi esoo , nkǝ wǝsiǝsǝ fǝ !
Nko ke ini Marko ku Aristarko ku Dema ku Luka ba ni mɔ keyifo eto bawunsǝkotsyuǝǝ , tsya bǝ bǝǝsiǝsǝ fǝ kukɔnɔ !
Bonamute Yesu Kristo eto lefonǝ lǝ disiǝko mimblɛ kenke .
Koko lefee , Onanto édi bo banamǝ etiki sesia sesia sesia , nya lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ tsyaa , ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ lǝ eyi fɛfɛ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , údi bo etiki ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ . Wǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto lɛyɛ úyifo kawunsiǝ , nya wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto dílǝkǝ nkǝ udi wǝ bikǝ kenke nɛ .
Ubi ǝmfo dílǝkǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde óte nya Onanto eto ditsyǝbi tututu nkpe wuntsya . Nya úfi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ kplɛ nǝmǝ úmuǝ kawunsiǝ kenke ɔnlɛ . Se úflǝ bo abua kenke úwii , úsu úsiǝ lǝ Onanto , Ǝsuǝalenyǝ Kenke , eto kodiani kato .
Onanto eyifo wǝ ubi ɔkplɛ enso wǝ batɔnkpe , fe kase wǝ diye nǝ Onanto dítǝ wǝ nso mǝ lele .
Itsyise Onanto mántɛyi wǝ batɔnkpe eto kuutsyuǝ saa nkǝ , “ Fɛ ni mɔ Ubi . Mmii , minle fǝ . ” Nye Onanto mántɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ ɔtɔnkpe saa ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Muudi wǝ Anto , nya wuuyifo mɔ Ubi . ”
Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Onanto léla nkǝ woatsyese wǝ Ubi tutɛ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kenke ebusumu wǝ . ”
Fɛɛ Onanto átɛyi lǝ wǝ batɔnkpe ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto eeyifo wǝ batɔnkpe fe ufiebi , nya wǝ kato eto besumunyǝ bamfó fe ute eto kadiakami . ”
Fɛɛ Onanto átɛyi itsyi lǝ wǝ Ubi ǝsuǝ nkǝ , “ Onanto , fǝ sekakedikɔɔ , kalosǝkɔ embɔkɛ lǝ se kulefe kulefe ! Fǝ sekakedidi lǝ fǝ betidi ǝsuǝ ebuyi ku kasɛyifoyifo .
Aala kasɛyifoyifo nya feekisi kabuayifoyifo . Nyamfo eso Onanto , fǝ Onantoo , dílǝkǝ fǝ , nya úfi disuǝyuǝ nǝ nso nǝ útǝ fǝ bayɛtsyuǝ kenke útǝ fǝ . ”
Usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Fǝ , Bonamute , fǝ ni nwǝ taa kasɔ ketsyikokɔ díyifo kasɔ , nya féyifo kato ku fǝ kosate eto ani .
Asa nyamfo kenke ebubǝ efe . Fɛɛ fǝ ebubu akɛ lefe saa . Asa nyamfo kenke ebobia isensǝ fe kase mfia laala kafiani afianku .
Ebukǝnǝ nnya fe kase bǝǝkǝnǝ awu ku mfia itǝ bofloma . Fɛɛ fǝǝ , nko ete fuutsyǝ nɛ , embofloma , nya fǝ nkpǝ embolo kulefe . ”
Nte ɔtɔnkpe wǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Siǝ lǝ mɔ kodiani , isu ese lefe nǝ muufi fǝ balo nkpe fǝ kalɔ bafiani nnya ǝsuǝ fuutǝkǝ akpa ” ?
Nyalɛɛ , bawoe ni kato eto batɔnkpe fɛ ? Mǝ ni awɔnɔ nnya leesumu Onanto nya woakpe mǝ atɔ nkǝ besu bawunsǝko mba ele bǝ bafo lǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Nyamfo eso ele bǝ bɔlɛ ɔnukualɛtiki nnya bɔ́nɔ ola kekleke nɛ . Lenni nkoo , boonya kusu lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Kɛnyɛ ka Onanto eto batɔnkpe dítǝ bo banamǝǝ , eyifo ɔnukualɛ , nya lǝ utsyuǝ úta úbu nye útidi ato lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , bǝnǝ wǝ koto sitinti fe kase íńyǝ itǝ .
Nyalɛɛ , ntsyǝ boofo butsyetsyi lǝ kotonǝnǝ eto kɛnyɛ , lǝ bɔni koto butsyue akafo Ditiki Sɛɛ kplɛ nǝmfo ? Bonamute kosate leka bofo eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmfo bɔtɛyi tutɛ tutɛ , fɛ mba kenke lɛnɔ ni lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ tsya díbǝ bátɛyi ni báse uyi bǝtǝ bo bǝ , diyifo ɔnukualɛ .
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , Onanto kosate tsya édi nnya adansiɛ ku ɔnukualɛ , lǝ nyaso úyifo ayanisa ku ayanisa lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ , nya úsie Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝtǝsa útǝ lǝ kase waala ǝsuǝ .
Onanto mémfi kawunsiǝ fɔfɔ ka lǝǝbǝ bubǝ ka ǝsuǝ bɔnlɛ etiki budi ókpe lǝ batɔnkpe kalɔ .
Fɛɛ Anantotiki eto lekpa ditsyuǝ édi nnya adansiɛ ɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Be ni utidi , O Onanto , bǝ fǝ ǝnǝmii , lǝ itǝkǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nko ? Be ko ni utidinini bǝ lǝ aalɛ wǝ ola nko ?
Ábokosǝ wǝ kasɔ itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ enso Onanto eto batɔnkpe . Fɛɛ ǝbǝ éfi diyǝnde kplɛ ku dibu étsyisǝ wǝ fe lekankpakpa .
Nya fǝtǝ údi seka lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . ” Bátɛyi bǝnkǝ Onanto éyifo utidi nkǝ udi seka lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ nya nyamfo lɛ bote wuee bǝnkǝ , lesa saa banlɛ . Tsya lǝ kase intee , bɔnlɛ tɔ bunyǝ kase utidi nlɛ seka budi lǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Yesu ǝmfoo , wǝ lǝ lefe kliminti ǝsuǝ bábokosǝ kasɔ fe okpe lǝ Onanto eto batɔnkpe kalɔɔ , itǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ukpǝ lǝ utsyue saa eto disi . Bɔlɛ wǝ bunyǝ mɔmɔ nwǝ béti ǝtǝsa ku dibu kenke eto lenkpakpa , ɛyɛ lǝ ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ eso .
Ɛlɛkɛ bǝ Onanto wǝ díyifo nya woalɔ lesa saa kǝtsyǝǝ , tǝ Yesu lǝ ɔflɔ ɛyɛ lǝ kanyi ka únyǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ unǝ bebi kpǝ oboko lǝ bǝnyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ diyǝnde ǝsuǝ . Itsyise Yesu ni nwǝ lookpa mǝ usuko nkpǝ manlo kǝmiǝ .
Wǝ lǝǝflǝ abua lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ kewui , nya wǝ ku mba ǝsuǝ bǝflǝ abua béwui , anto ɔni uni mǝ . Nyaso yenyifo Yesu afanisa bǝ ókpadi mǝ nkǝ wǝ bayimi .
Woatɛyi Onanto nkǝ , “ Mɔɔtɛyi mɔ bayimi lesa nǝ féyifo . Nya mɔɔtɛsǝ fǝ lǝ mǝ katsyakɔ . ”
Usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Muufi mɔ kusubebe ntǝkǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ . ” Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nnyǝ mɔ ku bebi ba Onanto dífi útǝ mɛ . ”
Se betidi ba woakpadi nkǝ bebi ni betidi ba lɛbɔ betsyi lǝ sinǝ ku kɔtɔ ǝsuǝǝ , Yesu kosate ǝbǝ ófiani fe mǝ nnya úsiǝ nkpǝ fe mǝ ke . Úyifo nyamfo nko bǝ ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ɔtsylɔsǝ Obonsam wǝ nkpe ukpǝ eto ǝsuǝale .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ kusu komfo ǝsuǝǝ , lǝ ulǝkǝ mba kenke lɛkɛ lǝ sidomu ǝsuǝ lǝ mǝ nkpǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ nnya báte ukpǝ sikpi eso .
Nya ekpa bǝ inni Onanto eto batɔnkpe úbǝ kawunsǝko kɔ , bomu Abraham eto bebi eto bebi .
Nnya kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ , ele bǝ ofiani fe wǝ bayimi lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ ofiani ominsǝnyǝtidi ku nwǝ leesumu Onanto lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke lǝ utǝ kedi lǝ betidi eto abua eto disi .
Nya se wǝ kosate dínyǝ kanyi nya báto wǝ bábe esoo , woofo mba nkpe lǝ botokabe ǝsuǝ bɔwunsǝko .
Mɔ bayimi lala lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ , mi mba Onanto tsya lékpadi ! Bibu Yesu bebe , nwǝ Onanto létsyese nkǝ ubǝ ofiani Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke lǝ bofokanɔ bo bonkpe ǝsuǝ .
Úyifo wǝ keyifo lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ útǝ nwǝ dílǝkǝ wǝ nkǝ uyifo wǝ keyifo fe kase Moses díyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ lǝ wǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ lǝ Onanto eto diyo .
Beefi dibu kǝtǝ nwǝ léto diyo kaso diyo nǝ báto kosate . Nko ke Yesu nkpe dibu kplɛ enso Moses nɛ .
Itsyise diyo saa kpe ni otonto . Fɛɛ Onanto ni nwǝ léto lesa saa .
Moses éyifo uyifoyifo ɔnukualɛnyǝ lǝ Onanto eto diyo . Nya ɔ́tɛyi asa nnya ǝsuǝ Onanto luubǝ udi etiki utsyiko lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝǝ , ɔ́tɔnsǝ .
Fɛɛ Kristo eyifo ɔnukualɛnyǝ fe Onanto eto Ubi wǝ nsi lǝ Onanto eto diyo eto kɛnyɛ . Bo ni wǝ diyo nǝmǝ nɛ , lǝ bokpe utu nya bofo bɔnɔ kekleke lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bɔnlɛ kusu bobe .
Nnya Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ bɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ mmii ,
bientidi ato fe kase ítsyǝ lǝ mi banamǝ eto lefe , nya bátaka bǝńyǝ mɛ lǝ ǝsuǝ fe kase báto mɛ bábe lǝ mfiminti mfó .
Mfó nya báto mɛ bábe , lǝ babe lesa nǝ muuyifo , ite bǝ bǝnyǝ asa nnya mínyifo lǝ alɛ fosi ana ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nnya eso nnyǝ ɔblɔ nkpe betidi bamǝ . Nya míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Baamfo mɛ akanɔ , nya baani beentsyue mɔ afi koto . ’
Lǝ nyaso kafo ányi mɛ nya mínka ntamu míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Bembudufǝ kasɔ ka eni míntǝ tǝ mǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kulefe ! ’ ”
Mɔ bayimi bafokanɔtsyuǝ , bebe sinini biǝ mi nti eto kuutsyuǝ ǝmbɔkɛ lɛkɔɛsi bua nya wǝmbɔkɛ bofokanɔ bǝ wǝǝmbɔtsyi kama okpe Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ .
Bomuu , bɛlɛ mi bǝtsyuǝ kɔlɛ diyi saa fe kase Mmii ǝmǝ báwɔni bákpe lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝ leka mi . Lǝ itǝ bǝ biǝmbɔwɛ mi ǝsuǝ bekpe lǝ lebua lǝ befiani mba ditidi ato .
Itsyise buyifo bani ku Kristo lǝ bɔlɛ bo bofokanɔ lǝ kɔni kekleke isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ fe kase bútsyiko kasɔ .
Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue átɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ bɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ mmii , bientidi ato fe kase ítsyǝ lǝ mi bana mǝ eto lefe , nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ . ”
Bawe ni betidi ba lɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ nya bátaka bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ ? Mba kenke Moses lékpa ɔ́yɛnko utsyiko Egipte eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nya bawoe Onanto dínyǝ ɔblɔ ókpe itǝ alɛ fosi ana sɔ̃ɔ̃ ? Mǝ ni betidi ba díyifo lebua ba díkpǝ lǝ mfiminti .
Bawoe ǝsuǝ Onanto léka ntamu ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Kulefe , bembudufǝ kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ eni míntǝtǝ mǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ . ” Bawoe ɔnlɛ ? Mba létaka bǝńyǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Bunyǝ boǝ lǝ nnya eso bámfo kasɔ kamǝ budufǝ , itsyise bámfo banɔ .
Mɔmɔɔ , se kusubebe nsi nkpe bo bǝ buunyǝ ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ wǝ Onanto dítsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ útsyǝǝ , bitǝ lǝ bobe kukɔnɔ bǝ , yǝǝmbǝ bǝ mi kuutsyuǝ saa mamfo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ wǝ útsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ útsyǝ .
Itsyise bátɛyi bo Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ fe kase bátɛyi mǝ tsya . Bánɔ kɛnyɛ kamǝ , fɛɛ yényifo mǝ keyifo sɛɛ saa lǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise se banɔ nii , bámfo ni bánɔ tsya .
Fɛɛ bomba léfo bɔ́nɔɔ , búdufǝ ɔnwɛkǝtsyǝkɔ kamǝ , ka Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ . Ite fe kase ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ , “ Kafo ányi mɛ nya mínka ntamu míntsyǝ miǝ , ‘ Bembudufǝ kasɔ ka eni míntatǝ mǝ ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ kulefe ! ’ ” Ɔ́tɛyi nyamfo nko ite bǝ wǝ kosate eto keyifo álo , idu lǝ lefe nǝ úyifo kawunsiǝ ólosǝ fɛ .
Itsyise lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue ǝsuǝǝ , báwɔni asa ǝtsyuǝ itsyi lǝ diyi kuansele ǝsuǝ bǝnkǝ , “ Onanto ǝtsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ diyi kuansele ǝsuǝ lǝ keyifo saa buyifo ǝsuǝ . ”
Besi bátɛyi ditiki nǝmfo bǝ , “ Bembudufǝ kasɔ ka eni míntatǝ mǝ bafo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ ! ”
Mba leka Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ bɔ́nɔ mámfo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ , itsyise bámfo ni banɔ . Fɛɛ itǝ bǝtsyuǝǝ , kusu si kokpe bǝ bafo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ .
Bǝlǝkǝ nyamfo báte itsyise Onanto esi útsyǝ diyi bamba nǝ baakpo Mmi . Alɛ kpǝ lǝ nnya kamaa , fɛ údi etiki utsyi lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , ɛyɛ lǝ Oka David ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto nnya búkatɛyi bofe bǝ , “ Lǝ bɛnɔ Onanto eto ɔkɔɛ mmii , bientidi ato . ”
Lǝ nnya ete Yosua lɛyɛnko betidi bamǝ bédufǝ lǝ ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmǝ Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝǝ , eni Onanto ménsidi etiki kama kama utsyiko lǝ diyi bamba ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi bamba si lekpe itǝ Onanto eto betidi fe diyi kuansele nǝ ǝsuǝ Onanto dítsyǝ ɔnwɛ .
Itsyise nwǝ kee léfo Ɔnwɛditsyǝyi nǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi utsyǝǝ , ebutsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto keyifo kenke ǝsuǝ fe kase Onanto dítsyǝ ɔnwɛ lǝ wǝ kale ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bokplatsya lǝ bofo ɔnwɛtsyǝtsyǝ ǝmfo , bǝ lǝ bo kuutsyuǝ saa mentidi ato lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ fe kase béyifo .
Itsyisee , Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ kpe nkpǝ nya lɛnlɛ keyifo kekleke , nya lenkpe kobe lenso lesiabi nyɛ nnuǝ . Diala lesa saa kǝlǝkǝ lǝ nsusu ku lɛwɔnɔ kǝmiǝ , isu ese taa ǝsuǝ eto ntsyakɔ ku dikubi ku afɔ eto katsyakɔ eto nti nya diakpo utidi eto nsusu ku utu kǝmiǝ kasɛɛ kukɔnɔ .
Asayifoyifo saa menyifo akulasa lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi . Wǝǝnyǝ asayifoyifo saa tɛnklɛɛ nya ekpa wuee lǝ wǝ ǝnǝmi . Nya wǝ ni nwǝ ele bǝ bo utsyuǝ saa tǝ wǝ nkpǝ eto nkunta .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔlɛ bo bofokanɔ bo boǝlǝkǝ kate kekleke . Itsyise bokpe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ ni Yesu , Onanto eto Ubi wǝ díkatɔ bo úsu kato úsu úńyǝ lǝ Onanto kosate eto ǝnǝmi .
Bo Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke enni nwǝ lǝǝnnyǝ bo kaminsǝ , se bumbǝ ale eso . Bomu bokpe utidi wǝ báto babe lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ fe bo ke . Fɛɛ wényifo lebua saa .
Lǝ nyaso bitǝ lǝ buńyǝ bembe , lǝ bɔnyi bɔfi Onanto eto lekankpomɛ kaka buunyǝ wǝ lefonǝ . Mfó wuunyǝ bo kaminsǝ bunyǝ wǝ lefonǝ nǝ lɔɔwunsǝko bo lǝ lefe nǝ ke ehiã bo .
Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke saa , betidinini nti ete bǝǝlǝkǝ wǝ ketsyiko , nya bǝǝtsyǝ wǝ bǝ lǝ uńyǝ lǝ mǝ kɛnyɛ lǝ Onanto eto kesumu ǝsuǝ , lǝ utǝ wǝ kedi lǝ bǝnyǝ mǝ abua eto bufikatsyɛ .
Se wǝ kosate , lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝmbǝ ale lǝ okla ǝsuǝ esoo , okpe disuǝtsyǝ kǝtǝ mba lenyi kusu ko ǝsuǝ ele bǝ bayɛ eso baata kebu .
Nya se wǝ kosate lǝmbǝ ale lǝ esu kpǝ ǝsuǝ esoo , ele bǝ utǝ kedi , enni lǝ wǝ betidi hã eto abua eto disi te bomuu , lǝ wǝ kosate tsya eto abua eto disi .
Kuutsyuǝ saa ǝnlǝkǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke kefi dibu nǝ laamankla lǝ ni kǝtǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . Bomu Onanto hã laakpadi utidi , keyifo wǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke fe kase ókpadi Aaron seka .
Nko ǝmǝ ke , Kristo mémfi Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke eto dibu útǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , bomu Onanto lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Mɔ Ubisaibi fe ni . Mmi mínle fǝ . ”
Usi ɔ́tɛyi lǝ kalebe bamba tsya nkǝ , “ Usumunyǝ feni idu manlo isu manlo fe Melkisedek eto okle . ”
Se Yesu dídi utidi lǝ kasɔ kamfoo , óto ola ku lekpakpalɛlɛ kekleke ku bofa bembembe ku binǝntu útǝ nwǝ loofo wǝ bulǝkǝ ketsyiko ukpǝ kǝmiǝ . Nya se óbokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ nya woate Onanto sikpi esoo , Onanto ánɔ wǝ olatoto .
Ite bǝ uyifo Onanto eto Ubi tsyaa , lǝ wǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ ókase kase baabokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ .
Se Onanto díyifo wǝ nwǝ lɛflɔ lǝ kusu saa ǝsuǝ ólosǝǝ , úbǝ úyifo wǝ nwǝ ǝsuǝ mba kenke leetsyue wǝ koto laayɛ kǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto lɛtɛyi útsyǝ nkǝ wuubǝ ofiani Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke fe Melkisedek eto okle .
Etiki kpǝ kpe bo lǝ kɛnyɛ bo ele bǝ bɔtɛyi itsyi lǝ etiki nyamfo ǝsuǝ fɛ , fɛɛ nnya bɔtɛyi kpe bulǝ , itsyise bɛnlɛ asa kasɔ bɔnɔ mlǝmlǝmlǝ .
Lefe kpǝ ákɛ bǝ eni befiani bateasa , fɛɛ bisi behiã utsyuǝ bǝ lǝ ote mi asa tutɛ itsyi lǝ Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ ǝsuǝ , lefe nǝ eto lefe ele bǝ bidi lesa nǝ nkpe ale , isi efe bǝ bɛyimi mmintu .
Utsyuǝ saa wǝ ele bǝ ɔyimi mmintuu , esi uyifo ubisambi wǝ lenyitɔ lesa nǝ ni lɛsɛ nye lebua .
Lesa nǝ nkpe alee , eyifo lesa nǝ lɛlɛkɛ itǝ mba díkabe ɛyɛ lǝ buyifokǝnyǝ ǝsuǝ , loofo lekpo butsyǝ lǝ nǝ ni lɛsɛ ku lebua eto nti .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ busu sɛtɔ lǝ bobé lǝ asatete ǝsuǝ , lǝ bɔbɔ lǝ asatete tutɛ nnya bófo itsyi lǝ Kristo ǝsuǝ . Nyamfo ni bǝnkǝ bɔtsyi bo akɔɛsi bɔwuninsǝ bɔbɔ lǝ abua ǝsuǝ ku nyifo bo lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa ku lǝ Onanto bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Báte mi asa lǝ ntuflǝsǝflǝsǝ , anitǝkǝtǝkǝ lǝ betidi ǝsuǝ , lǝ bekpǝnkpǝ eto businkli kataka kǝbǝ nkpǝ ku lǝ lekpokponkpo fɛfɛ ǝsuǝ .
Bitǝ lǝ busu sɛtɔ ! Nya nyamfo ele bǝ buyifo lǝ Onanto atɔnɔ nkǝ busu sɛtɔ nɛ .
Itsyise ntsyǝ yuubǝ bǝ mba léfo bánɔ kɔ nya bésinkli kamaa , besinkliko mǝ baboko bɔtsyikawuninsǝ eto kusu ? Kɔɔ bákɛ lǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde ǝsuǝ , bádia kato eto ǝtǝsa babe nya báfo Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ eto ǝsuǝale .
Báte lǝ asa nnya díkǝbǝ éfe ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto eto ditiki alɛkɛ nya bǝkǝnyǝ kutǝkǝ ko nkpe lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya nkpe lǝ lefe nǝ luubǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nnya ǝsuǝǝ , báni mǝ bofokanɔ lǝ Onanto ǝsuǝ ! Esoo , yɔɔkɛ ale bǝ besi bǝnǝ mǝ baboko bɔtsyikawuninsǝ ǝsuǝ , itsyise besi balɛ Onanto eto Ubi bɔsɔ lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ , kǝnǝ wǝ kakpe lǝ kofani ǝsuǝ lǝ kawunsiǝ kenke eto ǝnǝmi .
Onanto aakpo atsyɔ kasɔ ka lǝǝnǝ nsɔmintu bo laani kakpo lǝ ke , ka leeke eyi ku sefa nnya laalɛkɛ itǝ mba eso baafo ke kakpe bidikǝ .
Fɛɛ kasɔ ka leeke biyu ku kanyii , kaanlɛkɛ kǝtǝ kulesa , kakpe lǝ bulǝ ǝsuǝ bǝ Onanto ebukudi ke nya wootonsǝ ke ku ute .
Fɛɛ balala , lǝ búdi etiki mmǝ tsyaa , bófo mi bɔnɔ boǝ lǝ mi kutsyǝ alɛɛ , buyi boǝ béfo atsyɔkpokpo sɛɛ nnya loofo mi lǝ nkpǝ .
Onanto enni nwǝ lanyɛ lǝ kusutsyɔntsyɔ ǝsuǝ . Weembota keyifo ka bíyifo nye lelabi nǝ bítǝ wǝ lǝ lɛwunsǝko bo bítǝ nya binsi bɛnlɛ butǝ bafokanɔfɔ bamba .
Bo lelabi itǝ mi ni bǝnkǝ mi utsyuǝ saa lɛ nnya kekleke nko isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ , bǝ lesa nǝ bɛnlɛ kusu bobee , le ibǝ itǝ nko .
Boanla boǝ biyifo sɛflɔ , bomu lǝ biyifo asa fe bafokanɔfɔ ba nkpe dibusǝ bǝ lǝ bafo lesa nǝ Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útǝ mǝ .
Lefe nǝ Onanto dítsyǝ Abraham kɛnyɛɛ , ɔ́tɛyi óse uyi nkǝ , wuuyifo lǝ lesa nǝ ɔ́tɛyi útsyǝ ǝsuǝ . Se kuutsyuǝ lǝmbǝ lɛmɔ onso wǝ esoo , úfi wǝ kosate eto diye úńyǝnsǝ kama .
Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nlɛ fǝ kɛnyɛ butsyǝ minkǝ , mookpo fǝ atsyɔ , ntǝ fǝ befluflu kpǝ . ”
Nya se Abraham lɛkɛ dibusǝ , úmuǝ utu ɔlɛ esoo , únyǝ asa nnya kenke Onanto dítsyǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ .
Betidi aakpadi asa nnya lɛmɔ enso mǝ kosate eto diye lǝ befi bala etiki nnya bátɛyi , lǝ befi bala etiki nnya tã .
Nyamfo eso Onanto lékpadi asa úfi óse wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ uyi nɛ , bǝ lǝ ekpako mba luubǝ bafo wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ wuee bǝ wǝ ketsyue amfloma kulefe .
Onanto áyɛ lǝ esu ǝnuǝ ǝsuǝ , nya ni kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ ku asakpadikpadi nnya lantsyi kawuninsǝ , nya bembufi batɛyi sidia tsya , nya bomba díkǝnyǝ kabiɔkɔ lǝ wǝ , bonkpe kusubebe lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ , lǝ bɔkɔbe nnya bɔlɛ kekleke ku kusubebe ko eto kɛnyɛ bǝtsyǝ bo .
Kusubebe ko nkpe bo mfo eyifo fe lesa nǝ dímuǝ bo nkpǝ butsyǝ kekleke . Nya kusubebe komfo aakpia kafia ka nti Disumuyo eto sɛtɔ kafe kedufǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ kǝmiǝ .
Mfó ǝmǝ Yesu díkatɔ úsu lǝ bo kɛnyɛ fe ɔtɔusu seka . Wǝ díbǝ ofiani fe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke Melkisedek eto okle isu ese manlo manlo .
Melkisedek ǝmfo édi seka lǝ Salem , nya úyifo usumunyǝ útǝ Onanto wǝ ntǝkǝ kato fanlo fanlo . Ɔ́bɔ ótsyako Abraham lǝ lefe nǝ útsyi lema nǝ úsu ɔ́kpɔ nya útǝkǝ baka ena ba létsyilama mfó kato . Melkisedek ǝmfo ésu ótsyako wǝ nya ókpo wǝ atsyɔ .
Nya Abraham dítǝ wǝ bikǝ bia ɔkɛ utsyiko mfó eto lekpafosile . Tutɛɛ , diye Melkisedek eto kasɔ ni Kasɛyifoyifo eto Oka . Nnya kama se údi Salem eto Oka esoo , wǝ diye eto kasɔ ni Diyuǝsǝ eto Oka .
Bánwɔni kulesa bǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ wǝ anto nye ambe nye lǝ wǝ ketsyikɔ ǝsuǝ nye wǝ leleyi lee lǝ wǝ ukpǝ ǝsuǝ . Uyifo fe Onanto eto Ubi , nya úyifo usumunyǝ ídu lǝ ketsyikokɔ isu kalosǝkɔ .
Bebe kase úyifo utidi wǝ lefo diye . Abraham wǝ ni bo ona wǝ léfo diye éfi bikǝ bia útsyiko kamato eto lekpafosile kulaa tsya útǝ wǝ !
Nya mɔmɔɔ , bǝtsyǝ kɔfi ko dítǝ kusu bǝnkǝ , Lewi eto befluflu di besumunyǝ . Baafo bikǝ bia Israel bebi ba ni mǝ betidi eto lekpafosile lǝ mǝ ɔflɔ , ite bǝ mǝ betidi bamǝ tsya eyifo Abraham eto befluflu tsya fɛ .
Melkisedek ǝmfo ményifo Lewi eto kafo eto ubi , tsyaa ófo lekpafosile utsyiko lǝ Abraham ɔflɔ , wǝǝ ni utidi Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ nya ókpo wǝ atsyɔ tsya .
Ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ ni bǝnkǝ , utidi wǝ laakpo atsyɔ kpe kalende oso utidi wǝ bákpo atsyɔ .
Lǝ besumunyǝ eto kutsyǝǝ , mba laafo asa eto lekpafosilee , eyifo besumunyǝ ba lǝǝkpǝ . Lǝ Melkisedek eto kutsyǝǝ , ófo lekpafosile nǝmǝ fe usumunyǝ , fɛɛ wǝ nsi nkpǝ manlo fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue nlɛ bɔtɛyi .
Nya boofo bɔtɛyi kulaa tsya boǝ Lewi wǝ laafo lekpafosile nǝmfoo , ɔ́yɛ lǝ Abraham eto kutsyǝ ófo asa eto lekpafosile nǝmfo útǝ Melkisedek .
Itsyise lefe nǝ Abraham létsyako Melkisedek nya útǝ wǝ asa eto lekpafosile nǝmfo , bánle tɔ Lewi , usi ɔ́kɛ lǝ wǝ ona eto kɔtɔ kǝmiǝ .
Lewi bebi eto besumunyǝdidi ǝsuǝ nnya kɔfi lɛyɛ kubǝ itǝ Israel bebi nɛ . Nya lǝ nnya ete Lewi bebi eto besumunyǝdidi lɛflɔɔ , eni yensife bǝ usumunyǝ bamba eto okle si ubǝ , nwǝ lɛbɔ utsyi lǝ Melkisedek eto okle eto kutsyǝ ǝsuǝ , inni lǝ Aaron eto kutsyǝ .
Lǝ besumunyǝdidi eto kutsyǝ átsyi kɔwuninsǝǝ , ele bǝ kɔfi ko nyɛnko ko tsya tsyi kɔwuninsǝ .
Nya Bonamute wǝ ǝsuǝ bátɛyi asa nyamfo betsyikoo , étsyi lekpake bamba nǝ eto utidi kuutsyuǝ dímendi tɔ usumunyǝ unyǝ .
Ékpa wuee bǝ bále wǝ lǝ Yuda eto kafo , nya Moses mánkpo kafo kamfo eto diye ókpe lǝ mba luudi besumunyǝ nti .
Etiki nyamfo esi ekpa eso , lǝ lefe nǝ eto lefe usumunyǝ bamba eto okle fe Melkisedek disi úbǝ údufǝ .
Utidi ǝmfo ǝbǝ ófiani usumunyǝ wǝ dímanyɛ lǝ utidi eto afi ku bunǝ ǝsuǝ , bǝ ofiani usumunyǝ lǝ diyo nǝ leedi ǝsuǝ , bomu ɛyɛ lǝ ǝsuǝale nnya eto nkpǝ lǝmbǝ kalokɔ kulefe ǝsuǝ .
Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ nyamǝ átɛyi ekpa wuee nkǝ , “ Usumunyǝ feni idu manlo isu manlo fe Melkisedek eto okle . ”
Nyamfo lɛ bote nkǝ bǝlǝkǝ kɔfi koko komǝ bǝtsyǝ kutsyǝ itsyise kumbǝ kɛnyɛale nya koǝńyǝ kutǝ kulesa .
Itsyise Moses eto kɔfi mamfo kulesa nǝ lɛflɔ buyifo . Nya mɔmɔɔ , bǝtǝ bo kusubebe fɔfɔ ko lɛlɛkɛ konso , nya bɔɔyɛ lǝ ko ǝsuǝ bɔfi Onanto enso .
Ɛwunsǝǝ , Onanto aká ntamu ɔ́wunsǝ lǝ usumunyǝdidi fɔfɔ ǝmfo ǝsuǝ . Kɔɔ Onanto mánka ntamu ɔ́wunsǝ lǝ usumunyǝdidi ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ se Yesu léfiani usumunyǝǝ , Onanto áka ntamu útǝ wǝ ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute áka ntamu , nya wǝmbɔtsyi wǝ kɛnyɛ ɔwuninsǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ nkǝ , ‘ Usumunyǝ feni idu manlo isu manlo . ’ ”
Nyamfo ǝtǝ bǝ Yesu ǝbǝ ófiani nwǝ ńyǝ kɛnyɛklekle kamfo kama , ka lɛlɛkɛ kanso .
Bɔtsyi kawuninsǝ bamba tsya ǝbǝ . Besumunyǝ ba kɔ éfui tinti , nya bánkaklɛ lǝ mǝ keyifo ǝsuǝ . Itsyise békekpǝ .
Fɛɛ se Yesu , wǝ nsi nkpǝ itǝ manlo manlo esoo , wǝ keyifo fe usumunyǝ amfloma ani kesu utidiamba ɔflɔ .
Lǝ nyasoo , woafo mba lǝǝbǝ Onanto ɔflɔ lǝ nkpǝ lefe saa ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kosate ǝsuǝ , itsyise usi nkpǝ lefe saa ɔlɛ bofokǝtǝ mǝ lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , ele bǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ fe Yesu kɛ bo . Nwǝ diyifo kɛnkɛ , nya kabua saa lǝmbǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya woambiasǝ ǝsuǝ , wǝ bǝlǝkǝ lete lǝ babuayifo nti , wǝ bábesǝ kato fanlofanlofanlo .
Yanhiã kulaa bǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ɛmfo eto oklee , kǝtǝ Onanto kedi lefe saa , tutɛ lǝ wǝ kosate eto disi esoo , nnya kama lǝ betidi bamba eto disi eso , fe kase besumunyǝ ninǝ kenke fɛfɛ leeyifo . Uyifo nyamfo diyifo lɛwɛ itǝ lefe nǝ kenke lǝ lefe nǝ úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ .
Lǝ ɔnukualɛ ǝsuǝ , Moses eto kɔfi komǝ ǝtsyǝ betidinini ba dímamflɔɔ , besumunyǝ ninǝ kplɛ , fɛɛ Onanto eto ntamu bo óka lǝ Moses eto kɔfi komǝ kamaa , ǝtsyǝ wǝ Ubi Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke wǝ úyifo lɛflɔ itǝ lefe nǝ kenke .
Nnya kenke bɔnlɛ bɔtɛyi ete ni bǝnkǝ , bokpe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmfo eto okle , wǝ nsi lǝ Ɔkplɛnyǝ Kenke eto lekankpomɛ eto kodiani lǝ kato .
Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmfo eesumu lǝ kakɛnkɛkɔ ka ni Disumuyo tinti ka Bonamute díyifo , inni betidi díyifo .
Bǝtsyǝ Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke saa bǝ lǝ ufi ǝtǝsa saa ku bebuki utǝ Onanto . Nyaso ele bǝ bo usumunyǝ tsya kɛ lesaatsyuǝ nǝ uufi utǝ kedi .
Nya lǝ kasɔ mfo ete onkpee , eni wǝ ǝmbuyifo usumunyǝ , itsyise besumunyǝ ba lǝǝtǝ kedi lǝ Yudafɔ eto kɔfi eto kusuu , fe bakpe koko .
Keyifo ka beeyifo fe besumunyǝ mfo eyifo nka nte beeyifo lǝ Onanto eto kato eto koyo ete . Nko esoo , lǝ lefe nǝ Moses nkǝ woato disumunyoo , Onanto lɛtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Be fǝnkǝ eyifo ni lekateko ku ditsyǝbi nǝ báte fǝ lǝ kɔtini ǝsuǝ . ”
Fɛɛ mɔmɔɔ , bǝtǝ Yesu kesumu eto keyifo ka ntǝkǝ mǝ kale kato , fe kase kɛnyɛklekle ka útsyue lǝ wǝ betidi ku Onanto eto ntii , alɛkɛ kaso nka kɔ , itsyise wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ eto asa alɛkɛ eso asa nnya nkpe lǝ nka kɔ .
Lǝ nya ete kulesa dimambia lǝ kɛnyɛklekle tutɛ kamǝ ǝsuǝ , eni yensife itǝ kǝnuǝfǝ kamfo .
Fɛɛ Onanto ǝnyǝ kabua lǝ wǝ betidi ǝsuǝ se ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Lefe lɛ bubǝ se mɔ , fǝ Onamutee , lookle kɛnyɛ fɔfɔ ku Israel eto betidi ku Yuda eto betidi .
Kɛnyɛklekle kamfo embutsyǝ fe nka mínkle ku mǝ bana mǝ , lǝ lefe nǝ mínkɔbe mǝ minlɛ lǝ kɔni nya mínkpa mǝ mímbɔnko lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ . Itsyise béntsyue mɔ kɛnyɛklekle kamǝ koto . Nyaso míntsyi kama mínkpe mǝ nɛ . Mmǝ Bonamute nlɛ bɔtɛyi nɛ !
Mɔmɔɔ , nyǝ kɛnyɛ ka mookle ku Israel eto betidi lǝ lefe nǝ lǝǝbǝ mǝ . Muufi mɔ kɔfi nkpe mǝ lǝ mǝ nsusu kǝmiǝ . Nya mɔɔwɔni ko nkpe lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ . Muuyifo mǝ Onanto , nya mǝǝ tsya ebuyifo mɔ betidi .
Nya mǝ kuutsyuǝ ensi embote wǝ utsyuǝ kulesa nye wǝ ɔyimitsyuǝ tɛyi nkǝ bete Bonamute ǝmǝ . Itsyise mǝ utsyuǝ saa ebote mɛ idu lǝ dikpefi isu ese lǝ uninǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya muufi mǝ abua nnya kenke béyifo ntsyɛ mǝ . Nya mensiembokloma mǝ abua nya béyifo kulefe . ”
Se Onanto lídi etiki utsyiko lǝ kɛnyɛklekle fɔfɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ete kasɔ bǝ nka kɔ eyifo kakoko . Nya lesa saa nǝ lefiani lekoko nǝ lesibǝ kutǝkǝǝ , ǝmbɔklɛ fɛ dionya kenke .
Kɛnyɛklekle tutɛ eto afi ákɛ kesumu eto afi , nya béyifo kasɔ mfo eto Disumuyo tsya bǝtsyǝ .
Béyifo Kafia eto Mpatampa Kɛnkɛ nya bésie ni lǝ akpa ǝnuǝ ku kafia . Baakpo sɛtɔ eto lekpa bǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ . Mfó bǝńyǝnsǝ okandiɛ eto keyi ku kesumu eto ɔpunu wǝ ǝsuǝ bǝǝtǝkǝ abolo nnya beefi kǝtǝ Onanto kedi .
Lǝ Disumuyo eto kaka befi kafia bala eto kamaa , ni kaka baakpo Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke .
Mfó béfi sika sia eto ɔpunu wǝ ǝsuǝ baatonsǝ lifui ku kɛnyɛklekle eto lelaka nǝ befi sika sia beti batsyilama bǝtsyǝ . Nya kɛnyɛklekle eto lelaka nǝmǝ kafoo , bákpe asa nnya ni sika sia eto okase utsyuǝ wǝ eto kafo bákpe didisa nǝ baakpo mana , ku Aaron eto uyilɛlɛ wǝ díkǝ ku afanto , ku aba blɛkɛtɛ ǝnuǝ nya ǝsuǝ báwɔni Onanto eto afi bǝtǝkǝ .
Lǝ lelaka nǝmǝ eto kato báwe Onanto eto asa nnya nkpe nkpǝ baakpo bǝ Kerubi eto ditsyǝbi bǝtǝkǝ ba nlɛ Onanto eto diyǝnde bulǝkǝ kate . Mǝ mbamba eto koyo éti kaka bǝǝnyǝ betidi kaminsǝ kefi mǝ abua katsyɛ mǝ . Fɛɛ boǝmbofo etiki budi mfo kǝlǝkǝ asa nyamfo kenke kasɔ kate mɔmɔ .
Nko ini bétsyue asa nyamfo bǝtsyǝ mfó nɛ . Besumunyǝ bamǝ eedufǝ Disumuyo tutɛ kamǝ diyi saa kesu keyifo mǝ kesumuyifo mfó .
Kǝmiǝ eto Disumuyo nǝmǝǝ , Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke hã nkpe kusu weedufǝ mfó lɛlɛ sɔni hã . Nya lǝ ɔtɔɔ , ele bǝ ufi ubuki eto kɔtɔ usuko mfó usu utǝ Onanto kedi lǝ wǝ ku kusǝ komǝ kenke eto betidi eto abua nnya béyifo lǝ mǝ mante mante ǝsuǝ eto disi .
Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ se sɛtɔ eto Disumuyo nǝmǝ nsi nte koo , yǝntǝ kusu bǝ kuutsyuǝ saa kpia mfó ofe udufǝ lǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke kǝmiǝ .
Nyamfo eyifo asabulǝkǝ kate ǝtsyuǝ itǝ utidi taa mmi , lǝ mmi eto kesumu ǝsuǝ . Ite bǝ bǝǝtǝ ǝtǝsa ku keditǝtǝ eto asa nyamfo lǝ ketsyue kamfo eto kusu ǝsuǝ tsyaa , nyamfo ǝntǝ bǝ nwǝ nlɛ Onanto kesumu butǝ eto lɛkɔɛsi laakpa kenke .
Itsyise nyamfo kenke nyǝ lǝ budi ku bunǝ ku akpa eto etsyuesa kpǝ kpǝ , nnya lɛyɛ lǝ utidi eto ǝsuǝ bokpasǝ eto esu ǝsuǝ ete . Béyifo etsyuesa nyamfo kenke itǝ utidi isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto luubǝ ɔlɔ lesa saa utsyǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kusu fɔfɔ ǝsuǝ .
Fɛɛ Kristo ebubǝ koko fe Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke itǝ asa sɛɛ nya díkǝbǝ . Uyifo usumunyǝ lǝ Kafia eto Mpatampa nǝ lɛmɔ , nya lɛflɔ lenso Kafia eto Mpatampa nǝ kɔ . Dienyifo dibu nǝ utidinini dífi wǝ ani uyifo eto kasɔ ni bǝnkǝ dienyifo kasɔ kamfo eto asayifoyifo .
Lefe nǝ Kristo dídufǝ disumuyo nǝ mǝǝ , ɔ́yɛ lǝ ni ofe lɔni kplo , údufǝ lǝ kaka ni Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke . Nya wémfi bate nye banantsyui eto kɔtɔ uyifo fe keditǝtǝ , bomu wǝ kosate eto kɔtɔ itǝ lefe nǝ ta ! Nya úyifo nko bǝ lǝ Onanto lǝ utǝ bo nkpǝ manlo .
Weefi bate ku banantsyui eto kɔtɔ ku onantsyui eto lɛkpɔ nǝ baatonsǝ eto ntɔ beefi kese lǝ nwǝ eto ǝsuǝ dimanle itǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ele , iyifo wǝ kenkɛ .
Lǝ nyamfo eyifo sitinti , nyalɛ ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ bǝ Kristo eto kɔtɔ bomu embokpasǝ bo esuǝ eso nko ! Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ Lɛwɔnɔ nǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa ǝsuǝǝ , úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe keditǝtǝ ka lɛflɔ utǝ Onanto . Wǝ kɔtɔ ebuflǝsǝ bo akɔɛsi itsyiko lǝ akpa bimba eto eyifosa nnya lǝmbǝ kutǝkǝ saa bǝ lǝ busumu Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ lefe saa .
Nyaso Kristo ni nwǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kɛnyɛklekle fɔfɔ kamǝ ǝsuǝǝ , dínyǝ lǝ bo kɛnyɛ ófo útǝ bo , bǝ lǝ betidi ba Onanto lékpadi lǝ bǝnyǝ nkpǝ manlo eto kedikɔ ka Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ . Nyamfo ebofo bubǝ kǝtǝ itsyise utidi ɔni wǝ díkpee , dílǝkǝ abuayifoyifo nnya lɛkɛ lǝ kɛnyɛklekle koko eto lefe úwui , bǝnyǝ bufikatsyɛ .
Lǝ kase yǝǝbǝǝ , lǝ utidi mǝnkpǝǝ , beensensǝ wǝ kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ eto kukue eto bikǝ .
Lǝ utidi wǝ dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ si usi nkpǝǝ , bǝmbofo utidi ǝmǝ eto bike busǝnsǝ .
Lǝ nnya eso béfi kɔtɔ bákpe ǝsuǝale kɛnyɛklekle koko kamǝ ǝsuǝ nɛ .
Tutɛɛ , Moses ábe letsya úlǝkǝ aklesa nnya nkpe lǝ kɔfi komǝ óte kusǝ komǝ kenke eto betidi . Nya úfi bate ku banatsyui eto kɔtɔ otsyakasǝ ku ntu ku basamu eto bisǝ sia ku afantosi nnya laanyi fififi fɛ úfi úse lǝ kɔfi eto kukue ku betidi bamǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ .
Nya ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyamfo ni kɔtɔ ko Onanto dífi ose kɔfi ko utǝ bo uyi nkǝ butsyue ko koto . ”
Nko ke Moses dífi kɔtɔ komǝ úsǝ lǝ Kafia eto Mpatampa nǝmǝ ku asa nnya kenke béfi béyifo kesumu kamǝ nɛ .
Sitinti lǝ kɔfi komǝ ǝsuǝ kɔtɔ beefi kǝflǝ lesa saa ǝsuǝ . Nya lǝ bankpo kɔtɔɔ kasɔɔ , beemfi lebua katsyɛ .
Ińyǝ itǝ bǝ béyifo nkomǝ eto akpa nyamfo lǝ befi bakpasǝ asa nnya lele kato eto ale ǝsuǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ asa nnya ni kato eto ale eto kutsyǝ , befi keditǝtǝ eto asa nnya lekpa ǝsuǝ enso kasɔ mfo eto alee , bákpasǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise Kristo mensu kakɛnkɛkɔ ka befi kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi eto ani beyifo , ka ni kakɛnkɛkɔ kato eto okle ete . Bomu úsu kato kosate , kaka woala kǝńyǝ kǝtǝ bo lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi .
Kristo ménsu mfó nkǝ lǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ kedi sesia sesia lǝ bo disi , fe kase Yudafɔ eto Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke leedufǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke mfó keyifo lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛ ku ubuki eto kɔtɔ , ko lenni wǝ kosate eto kole .
Lǝ nko ini , eni yoofe bǝ ufi wǝ ǝsuǝ utǝ , unyǝ kanyi sesia sesia idu lǝ kawunsiǝ eto ketsyikokɔ ke . Bomu kase inte mɔmɔ , Kristo ǝbǝ lɔni kplo lǝ kawunsiǝ eto kalokɔ eto eyi nyamfo lǝ ufi wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ utǝ fe kedi lǝ ulǝkǝ lebua uwui , lǝ bo disi .
Onanto dítsyǝ nnya nkǝ utidi kpǝ sɔni kplo , nya lǝ nnya kamaa , bakponko wǝ lekpo .
Nko ke ini Kristo dífi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi sɔni kplo , itǝ betidi kpǝ eto bofo ketsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ . Wuusinkli ubǝ dinuǝfǝ , insini lǝ lebua eso , bomu bǝ lǝ ubǝ ulǝkǝ mba nsi banlɛ wǝ kusu bobe itǝ nkpǝ manlo .
Yudafɔ eto kɔfi komǝǝ , asa sɛɛ nnya nlɛ bubǝ eto koyo ete kuni , inni asɛ nnya kosate lǝǝbǝ bubǝ ini . Nyaso kɔfi komǝ embofo bɔyɛ lǝ keditǝtǝ ka beeyifo lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛ keyifo betidi ba laanyi kafi Onantoo , baflɔ balo kulefe .
Lǝ nnya ete boofo betidi ba nlɛ Onanto busumu buyifo kɛnkɛnkɛ babɔ lǝ mǝ abua ǝsuǝǝ , eni mǝ ketu ensiembolo mǝ dikpi bio , nya keditǝtǝ saa ebolo .
Fɛɛ keditǝtǝ lɛlɛ saa lɛlɛ nyamfo aaklomasǝ betidi mǝ abuayifoyifo hã te .
Itsyise bate ku banantsyui eto kɔtɔ embofo abua buflǝ kewui lǝ utidi ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo eso fɛ Kristo luubǝ kawunsiǝ kamfoo , ɔ́tɛyi Onanto nkǝ , “ Ámanhiã keditǝtǝ ku asatǝtǝ , bomu éyifo ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ ǝtǝ mɛ .
Bebuki botonsǝ kǝtǝ kedi ku lebuayifoyifo eto asatǝtǝ lǝ kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba ǝsuǝǝ , aankpe fǝ disuǝyuǝ .
Nya míntɛyi minkǝ , ‘ Nyǝ mɔɔ , mbǝ miǝ meyifo fǝ lelabi fe kase bawɔni lǝ mɛ ǝsuǝ lǝ kɔfi eto Kukue kǝmiǝ . ’ ”
Tutɛɛ , ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Ámanhiã keditǝtǝ ku asatǝtǝ , bebuki botonsǝ kǝtǝ kedi ku lebuayifoyifo eto keditǝtǝ . ” Nya yǝnyuǝsǝfǝ kafo tsya , ite bǝ kɔfi komǝ áte nkǝ beyifo nko fɛ .
Mfó ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Nyǝ mɔ mfo . Mbǝ miǝ meeyifo fǝ lelabi . ” Ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝ esoo , Onanto ǝlǝkǝ keditǝtǝ eto asa nnya kɔ útsyǝ kutsyǝ . Nya úfi Kristo eto keditǝtǝ útsyǝ lǝ nnya kɛnyɛ .
Se Yesu Kristo díyifo lǝ Onanto eto lelabi ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ lǝ kase úfi wǝ ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ útǝ sɔni kplo itǝ afe nnya ta esoo , Onanto ákpasǝ bo ǝsuǝ lǝ nnya eso .
Diyi saa , Yudafɔ eto usumunyǝ ǝńyǝ lǝ Onanto eto Disumuyo . We efi ǝtǝsa nyamǝ ke kǝtǝ kedi lefe saa , ite bǝ yembofo abua nyamǝ buflǝ kewui tsya .
Fɛɛ se Kristo díbǝ útǝ kedi kani kamǝ hã lǝ abua eto disi itǝ lefe nǝ kenke ólosǝǝ , úsu úsiǝ lǝ Onanto eto kodiani .
Mfó unsi mɔmɔ idu isu ese lefe nǝ Onanto luufi wǝ balo okpe lǝ wǝ nkpakalɔ .
Kristo efi wǝ ǝsuǝ útǝ fe kedi ditǝ lɛwɛ , nya úyifo mba eto ǝsuǝ bákpasǝ lɛflɔ beyifo kɛnkɛ isu manlo .
Nyaa , Lɛwɔnɔ Kɛnkɛ ǝlǝkǝ nya ote wee nkǝ ,
“ Nyǝ kɛnyɛ ka mookle ku mǝ lǝ eyi nnya lǝǝbǝ mmǝ kama . Muufi mɔ kɔfi nkpe lǝ mǝ ketu kǝmiǝ . Nya mɔɔwɔni nya lǝ mǝ nsusu kǝmiǝ . ”
Nya usi ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mensi embokloma mǝ abua ku mǝ eyifosa bua saa . ”
Lǝ befi asa nyamfo bátsyɛɛ , yensiembofe bǝ , besi bǝtǝ kedi lǝ abua eto disi .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , mɔ bayimi , bokpe kusu buedufǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke kamǝ ɛyɛ lǝ Yesu eto ukpǝ wǝ úkpǝ eso .
Itsyise ɔ́sini kusu fɔfɔ utǝ bo , ko ni nkpǝ eto kusu ɛyɛ lǝ kafia ka béti lǝ Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke eto kɛnyɛ mfó ka ńyǝ itǝ wǝ kosate eto ǝsuǝ eto sinǝ .
Bokpe Usumunyǝ Kplɛ wǝ nsi lǝ Onanto eto diyo nǝmǝ eto kɛnyɛ .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔnyi bɔfi Onanto ku sitinti eto utu , ku bofokanɔ kekleke ku akɔɛsi nnya bǝflǝ éle kɛnkɛnkɛ bǝlǝkǝ betsyiko lǝ abua ǝsuǝ ku ntu bo keni saa lǝmbǝ bǝ bo akɔɛsi ensi aalo bo dikpi .
Bitǝ lǝ bɔlɛ nnya bofo bɔnɔ , bɔnlɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ nya boǝlǝkǝ katee lǝ kɔni kekleke , itsyise Onanto wǝ ditsyǝ bo kɛnyɛɛ , eyifo ɔnukualɛnyǝ .
Bitǝ bukebu disi lǝ bukakpe bo bǝtsyuǝ otsyekle lǝ lɛyimila ku nkpǝ sɛɛ busiǝ ku bǝtsyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Biǝntǝ lǝ bɔyɛ disikakpekɔ busu fe kase bo nti eto bǝtsyuǝ leeyifo seka . Bomu bitǝ lǝ bokpe bǝtsyuǝ nkɛale enso , se binyi biǝ Bonamute eto Diyi nǝmǝ fe lɛlɛ bɔnyi kafi .
Fɛɛ lǝ buyi ɔnukualɛ ǝmǝ , fɛ busi butsyǝ bɔnlɛ asa bua buyifo , nyalɛ keditǝtǝ saa ensibǝ ka dulǝkǝ abua iwui itǝ bunyǝ bufikatsyɛ bio .
Bomu nya lesa saa nǝ luubu ni bǝ Onanto ookponko bo lekpo , nya wɔɔtsylɔsǝ mba létaka bǝńyǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ ditefɛnku nǝ nkpe kɛnyɛ ale !
Utsyuǝ saa ke dímentsyue Moses eto kɔfi kotoo , bolo baalo wǝ kaminsǝ mǝnyǝmǝnyǝ , lǝ bakponko wǝ lekpo balo wǝ dikpi lǝ badansiɛ inuǝ nye itsyǝ eto kɛnyɛ kama .
Nya ntsyǝ yuutsyǝ itǝ nwǝ laani Onanto eto Ubi , nwǝ lǝǝntǝ dibu Onanto eto kɛnyɛklekle eto kɔtɔ ko díflǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ nya úlǝkǝ wǝ utsyiko lǝ lebua ǝsuǝ nya waaka lefonǝ eto Lɛwɔnɔ ? Ntsyǝ fɛ kotonǝnǝ kekleke kutsyuǝ eto okle lembunyǝ kutǝ wǝ !
Itsyise buyi nwǝ lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Muutsyǝ nnya kɛnyɛ . Mɔɔ , maatisǝ oko . ” Nya owoe tsya lɛtɛyi nkǝ , “ Bonamute ebokponko wǝ betidi lekpo . ”
Mbɔbɔɛ mǝǝtǝ nwǝ luudufǝ lǝ Onanto wǝ nkpe nkpe eto lefonyi ǝsuǝ .
Bekloma kase ítsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ lefe mmǝ . Lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto eto diyǝnde díkabɔ lékpo mi lǝ ǝsuǝ , nya bulǝ kpǝ dítu mi , fɛɛ bulǝ bomǝ mǝntǝkǝ mi kato .
Lefe ditsyuǝ , baaka mi kulaa tsya lǝ betidi nti nya beeyifo mi disiale , nya lǝ afe bamba ǝtsyuǝ tsyaa , beebu mi kakpe lǝ mba ǝsuǝ banlɛ asa nyamfo buyifo kakpe eto nti .
Bińyǝ kanyi ku mba befi bakpe lǝ aba eto diyo . Nya lefe nǝ bǝmuǝ mi balɛ mi bikǝ bafo lǝ ǝsuǝale ǝsuǝ tsyaa , yǝnlǝ mi itsyise bete biǝ bisi bekpe bikǝ bia lefo koya enso mi , bia lembobia kulefe .
Lǝ nyaso biǝntǝ lǝ elo mi ani itsyise yuunǝ kutǝkǝ kpǝ eboko mi .
Ele bǝ bekpe dibusǝ lǝ biyifo Onanto eto lelabi lǝ befo lesa nǝ útsyǝ kɛnyɛ utsyǝ mi .
Itsyise fe kase Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛtɛyii , “ Ibu sɛkɛɛ , lǝ nwǝ nlɛ bubǝ lǝ ubǝ udufǝ , wǝǝmbofe kama ku bubǝ .
Mɔ utidi wǝ ni ɔsɛɛ , ebunyǝ bofokanɔ usiǝ nkpǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ mǝ utsyuǝ etsyi kama okpe mɛɛ , membunyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ . ”
Fɛɛ boo , bunni betidi ba leetsyi kama kakpe bo bofakanɔ bǝ lǝ bonya . Bomu boo , bófo bɔ́nɔ , nya Onanto léfo bo .
Lǝ akpe bofokanɔɔ , eté bǝ akpe kusubebe kekleke itǝ lesa nǝ fanlɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ . Ite bǝ anlɛ ni bunyǝ tsya .
Bofokanɔ dítǝ Onanto dínyǝ disuǝyuǝ lǝ bo bana ǝsuǝ lǝ kokolefe .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , nya bɔ́nɔ kasɔ boǝ Onanto éyifo kawunsiǝ kenke lǝ wǝ ditiki ǝsuǝ . Nya úyifo nnya utsyiko lǝ lesa nǝ dimankɛ bǝnyǝ kɔ ǝsuǝ .
Bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ nya Abel dífi asa nnya lɛlɛkɛ enso Kain eto ale útǝ Onanto kedi eso Onanto dínyǝ wǝ nwǝ leeyifo kasɛɛ . Onanto áfo wǝ ǝtǝsa nnya ɔ́yɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ údi wǝ kɛnyɛ nkǝ uyifo ɔsɛɛ . Ite bǝ Abel ékpe tsyaa , wǝ bofokanɔ si bɔlɛ etiki budi ketsyiko lǝ wǝ ǝsuǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ Enok eto bofokanɔ esoo , weenkpe . Onanto étsyi wǝ úsuko kato . Kuutsyuǝ saa mǝnnyǝ wǝ , itsyise Onanto étsyi wǝ usuko kato . Awɔnisa Kɛnkɛ eto Kukue lɛ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , fɛ útsyi Enok úsuko katoo , wǝ asa édufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ .
Kuutsyuǝ eto etiki embudufǝ Onanto ǝnǝ , lenni ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ . Itsyise utsyuǝ saa wǝ ke lǝǝbǝ Onanto ɔflɔ , ele bǝ ofo ɔnɔ nkǝ Onanto kpe nya wǝǝtǝ mba laabɛbɛ wǝ lǝǝnyǝ wǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya Onanto díkǝ Noa ato kekleke itsyi lǝ asa nnya lǝǝbǝ bubǝ nya wǝǝnnyǝ tɔ unyǝ ǝsuǝ . Útsyue Onanto koto nya ówe lelaka eto ɔklɔ nǝ léfo wǝ ku wǝ diyo eto betidi lǝ nkpǝ . Ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ bofokanɔ bomfo ǝsuǝ Noa ǝlǝkǝ óte nkǝ kawunsiǝ eto betidi kenke édi dikpi . Nya ófiani ɔsɛɛ lǝ Onanto eto ǝnǝmi nya únyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ ɔflɔ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya Abraham lɛnɔ Onanto eto bokpadi bo ókpadi wǝ nkǝ usu kasɔ ka Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ nkǝ wuufi utǝ wǝ fe wǝ kedikɔ ǝsuǝ . Údu lǝ wǝ kasɔ úsu kaka wánte kulaa tsya .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , úsiǝ fe ɔfɔ lǝ kasɔ ka Onanto dítsyǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ . Úsiǝ lǝ ebu fe Isak ku Yakob ba léfo kɛnyɛtsyǝtsyǝ itsyi lǝ Onanto ɔflɔ .
Abraham ákabe kusu itǝ umǝnkplɛ wǝ báto bǝńyǝnsǝ wǝ ni nwǝ Onanto kosate léto .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , ite bǝ Abraham wǝ díkabe ófee , léfiani anto nya Sara wǝ díkabe ofiani uninǝsia tsya lɛlɛ kafo , Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ Abraham fiani ubianto itsyise uyi nkǝ Onanto wǝ dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ , éyifo lǝ wǝ kɛnyɛ ǝsuǝ .
Ite bǝ Abraham obobe uku tsya , ɛyɛ lǝ utidi ɔni ǝmfo ǝsuǝ , nya befluflu kpǝ lɛbɔ betsyi fe befandebi nkpe kato , fe kase lekpa eto kɔwunumi ko bǝmbofo lǝ lekpa kɛnyɛ .
Betidi bamfo kenke ǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ isu ese lefe nǝ bǝkpǝ . Bámfo asa nnya Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ útsyǝ . Fɛɛ bǝnyǝ nya famfamfamfa nya bǝtǝ nya edufǝ nya batɛyi bǝnkǝ sitinti bafɔ ku mba nyɛ kusu ete beni lǝ kasɔ kamfo ǝsuǝ .
Nya betidi ba latɛyi asa nyamfoo , ǝǝlǝkǝ kate wuee bǝnkǝ balɛ kusu bobe kǝtǝ mǝ kosate eto kǝmǝnsɔ .
Lǝ kasɔ ka ǝsuǝ bétu ete banlɛ bɔbɛbɛɛ , eni bátafo businkli kesu mfó .
Bomuu , bákabe kusu itǝ kasɔ ka lɛlɛkɛ kanso nkamfó . Ke ni Onanto eto kato . Nyamfo eso yaanlɛ Onanto kofani lǝ bakpadi wǝ bǝ mǝ Onanto nɛ , itsyise ɔ́lɔ umǝnkplɛ utsyuǝ útsyǝ itǝ mǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ Abraham eto bofokanɔ eso lǝ lefe nǝ Onanto léto wǝ óbee , ite bǝ Abraham ni nwǝ Onanto dítsyǝ kɛnyɛ utsyǝ tsyaa , ɔ́tɔnɔ lǝ ufi wǝ ubi ɔni kplo Isak utǝ Onanto kedi .
Ite bǝ Onanto ébɔtɛyi wǝ nkǝ , “ Ɛyɛ lǝ fǝ ubi Isak ǝsuǝ nya fuunyǝ befluflu kpǝ ba míntɛyi míntsyǝ . ”
Abraham éfi nnya nkǝ , Onanto ebofo wǝ ubi Isak botakasǝ ketsyiko ɔkɔmǝ kaboko nkpǝ . Nya fe kase íbǝǝ , Abraham ésinkli ófo Isak fe ɔkɔmǝ útsyi úbǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya Isak lékpo Yakob ku Esau atsyɔ itǝ sɛtɔ sia nlɛ bubǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nya Yakob le lefe nǝ ɔnlɛ bukpǝǝ , ókpo Yosef eto bebi atsyɔ , nya ɔ́tɛsǝ Onanto se úkpǝsǝ lǝ uyi wǝ waalɛ ǝsuǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ se Yosef dínyǝ nkǝ wǝ dikpǝfe éboyoo , údi etiki utsyi lǝ Israel bebi eto budu lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ ǝsuǝ nya ɔ́tɛyi mǝ kase ele bǝ beyifo ku wǝ ɔkɔ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ eso Moses eto antomǝ dífi wǝ bákula lǝ afa ǝtsyǝ ǝsuǝ se bále wǝ . Bǝnyǝ bǝ úyifo dikpefi nǝ laanɔ bobe nya bánte sikpi ku oka ǝmǝ eto kɔfi bota kebu ǝsuǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nya Moses lɛni nkǝ bánkpadi wǝ bǝ Oka Farao eto ubisiobi eto ubi lefe nǝ úkabé .
Iyifo wǝ lelabi nkǝ lǝ unyǝ kanyi ku Onanto eto betidi enso bǝ unyǝ kamini lǝ lebuayifoyifo ǝsuǝ itǝ lefe kliminti .
Úbu nnya óbe nkǝ lǝ bakpé wǝ kofani lǝ Kristo eto disii , ɛlɛkɛ famfamfamfa eso kedi ka wuunyǝ lǝ utǝkǝko Egipte eto kasɔ eto asa nnya wuunyǝ kama . Itsyise úfi wǝ ǝnǝmi utǝkǝ lǝ kutǝkǝ ko Onanto luutǝ wǝ lǝ sɛtɔ́ ǝsuǝ .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ bomǝ esoo , údu lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ nya wǝánte oka ǝmǝ eto kafo ka lɔɔnyi wǝ sikpi . Nya fenkǝ únyǝ Onanto wǝ bo ǝnǝmi lǝmbofo bunyǝ , ɔ́ni nkǝ wembusinkli kama .
Bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ ɛyɛ nya útsyǝ Ukpe Ása Bo Ɔ́yila eto lekpa kasɔ lefe nǝ béfi kɔtɔ bese lǝ biku ku keyi ǝsuǝ . Nya ɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ , Onanto eto ɔtɔnkpe wǝ díbǝ ólo Egiptefɔ eto ubisaibi ninǝ saa lǝ Egipte eto kasɔ nya yanlɛ bǝ utidi Israelfɔ eto bebi saa .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nnya dítǝ Israel bebi léfo Lekpo Sia bɔyila fe kasɔnti fufu ǝsuǝ bákayɛ nɛ . Fɛɛ lefe nǝ Egiptefɔ lekplatsya bǝ baayila ni , ntu bomǝ étsyiko mǝ búdunko .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ , se Israel bebi lɛyɛ bátsyilama kafati ka báto batsyilama Yeriko eto umǝ eyi akuansee , nnya dítǝ kafati kamǝ léba kákpoo kasɔ nɛ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ nyaso bánlo Rahab wǝ ni otsyetɔ mfó fe kase bálo mba dimamfo Onanto banɔ . Itsyise ófo Israelfɔ eto betidi ba bátsyese ba dísu mfó bésu bátsyilama béyu kasɔ kamǝ bábe kukɔnɔ .
Be tsya ele bǝ nsi ntɛyi mi ? Lefe kpǝ ǝmbǝ mɛ bǝ lǝ ndi etiki ntsyiko lǝ Gideon , Barak , Samson , Yefta , David ku Samuel ku Onanto eto bǝnyɛlǝkǝtidi ǝsuǝ .
Ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , bákpɔ nsɔ kpǝ bǝtǝkǝ mǝ kato . Béyifo lesa nǝ dińyǝ itǝ nya bǝnyǝ kɛnyɛ ka Onanto dítsyǝ útǝ mǝ . Nya bǝtsyuǝ díti batsyata eto nnyɛ .
Nya bǝtsyuǝ lɛninsǝ etefɛnku kplɛ nnya díkatonsǝ asa . Nya bǝtsyuǝ lɛbɔ báfe lǝ lesiabi eto kɛnyɛ lǝ lema ǝsuǝ . Ite bǝ betidi bamfó kenke mankɛ ǝsuǝale saa tsya , Onanto ǝtǝ nkǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale ! Bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale fe bamamanyǝ ba lɛkɛ ale kekleke , nya bǝtǝkǝ bafɔ eto bamamanyǝ bamǝ kenke kato .
Nya ɛyɛ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝǝ , besio léfo mǝ batokpenyǝ ba díkpǝ disi bǝbǝ nkpǝ . Nya bǝtsyuǝǝ , lɛnni bǝ betidi mǝnlǝkǝ mǝ betsyiko lǝ kanyinyǝnyǝ ka ǝsuǝ bákɛ , bomu bála bǝ lǝ bǝkpǝ , bǝ lǝ bǝnyǝ botaka kǝbǝ nkpǝ bo nso kɔnɔ .
Bákpe bǝtsyuǝ kɔfiɔ nya báblɛ mǝ ku keyibi . Nya bákpe bǝtsyuǝ lǝ amena nya beti mǝ bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo .
Bákpɔ bǝtsyuǝ aba nya bákpe bǝtsyuǝ tsya eku ǝnuǝ ku nlande , nya báto bǝtsyuǝ ku asiabi bálo . Nya béfi basamu ku bate eto ekue bémini mǝ ǝsuǝ nya báyɛ bákafe itsyise kulesa mǝntsyǝ mǝ . Nya betidi lékpe mǝ bulǝ , nya bǝnyǝ kanyi tinti .
Lǝ mǝ nkpǝ sɛɛ bo bǝsiǝ esoo , kawunsiǝ kamfo eto betidi mámfo mǝ . Nyaso bákayɛ bákafe lǝ mfiminti ku atiniku ku kanyinyǝnyǝ fe mba bála lǝ mǝ nsɔ , nya bákɛ lǝ aba kalɔ ku lǝ ǝbiǝ lǝ kasɔnti .
Ite bǝ bátɛsǝ betidi bamfo kenke ba bákpe bofokanɔ tsyaa , bámfo kɛnyɛ ka Onanto lɛ́tɛyi útsyǝ mǝ .
Itsyise Onanto ǝnye asa bamba nya lɛlɛkɛ enso útsyǝ bo . Nya lǝ bo mankɛ mǝ lǝ ntii , bembuyifo mǝ báflɔ balo .
Lǝ nyaso se bonkpe bamanyǝ kpǝ bamfo ba letsyilama bo nya banlɛ bo otsyekle bokpe esoo , bitǝ lǝ bulǝkǝ asa nnya leeti bo kusu ku lebua nǝ laakpa bo kekleke kalɛ lefe kpǝ buwui . Nya lǝ butsyetsyi etsyi nnya nte bo sɛtɔ ku unyǝ , kama bebe mankɛ .
Bitǝ lǝ bo ǝnǝmi lǝ itǝkǝ lǝ Yesu hã ǝsuǝ . Wǝ hã ni nwǝ ǝsuǝ bo bofokanɔ nkpǝsǝ itsyi lǝ kasɔ ketsyikokɔ isu ese lǝ kalosǝkɔ . Se óte disuǝyuǝ nǝ nte sɛtɔ wuunyǝ esoo , ókpe utu únyǝ kanyi lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ . Nya wémfi kofani ko wuudi lǝ uyikabie ǝsuǝ kulesa . Nya mɔmɔɔ , úsu usi lǝ Onanto eto lekankpomɛ ɔflɔ lǝ wǝ kodiani .
Bibu Yesu bebe , lǝ kanyi ka únyǝ lǝ babuayifo ba dínyǝ wǝ lǝ ǝsuǝ eto ani , bǝ lǝ ani lǝ ɛyɛ mi bolo lǝ bitǝ disi .
Ite bǝ bɛlɛ lema bɔkpɔ ku lebua tsyaa , yányo kaka ele bǝ bɛkpɔ lǝ bakpo mi kɔtɔ lǝ kasɔ tɔ .
Nye biota ǝsuǝ Onanto eto lɛkɔmansǝmansǝ eto etiki nnya ɔ́tɛyi úfi ókpe mi nkɛale fe wǝ bebi ? Ɔ́tɛyi nkǝ , “ Mɔ Ubi , tsyue ato nya memfi Bonamute eto bunǝtǝtǝ fe asa bimba . Nya mǝntǝ lǝ ilǝ fǝ lǝ unyǝki okpe fǝ .
Itsyise nwǝ Bonamute laalaa , wǝ wǝǝnǝ lǝ kusu sɛɛ ǝsuǝ nɛ . Nya nwǝ tsya woafo fe ubii , wǝ wǝǝnǝ koto nɛ . ”
Bifi mi kanyi saa ka biǝnyǝ fe Onanto nlɛ mi bunǝ butǝ fe wǝ bebi . Ubi utsyuǝ kpe bǝ anto ǝǝnǝ wǝ ?
Lǝ bǝǝnnǝ mi fe kase bunyi boǝ bǝǝnǝ ubi saa , nyalɛ bienyifo wǝ bebi tinti . Etǝ bǝ biyifo fe bebi ba anto dímamfo seka .
Lǝ bo betidinini eto antomǝ seka lǝ kasɔ mfoo , bǝǝnǝ bo nya boebu mǝ tsya lǝ nyamfo eso . Ntsyǝ eso yanle bǝ bobokosǝ ǝsuǝ kasɔ enso butǝ Onanto wǝ ni bo Anto lǝ lɛwɔnɔ ǝsuǝ bǝ busiǝ nkpǝ !
Bo kasɔ mfo eto antomǝ ǝǝnǝ bo itǝ lefe kliminti ditsyuǝ fe kase bǝnyǝ bǝ iińyǝ itǝ bo . Fɛɛ Onanto wǝ ǝǝnǝ bo fe kase ɛlɛkɛ itǝ bo bǝ lǝ bo tsya lǝ bunyǝ kedikɔ lǝ wǝ sɛkɛnkɛ ǝsuǝ .
Bunǝtǝtǝ utidii , aankɛ kutsyuǝ kamini , bomu yeefi wǝ . Fɛɛ lǝ nnya kamaa , mba bǝtǝ bunǝ nkoo , ǝǝtǝ beeyifo asa lǝ kusu ǝsuǝ , nnya lǝǝtǝ bǝǝsiǝ nkpǝ lǝ diyuǝ ǝsuǝ .
Lǝ nyamfo esoo , bekpe mi ani ku akpa nnya leetinkǝ ale , lǝ bitǝ ǝsuǝale fɔfɔ lǝ idufǝ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Bilǝkǝ esu nnya lekpa lǝ bɛyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝ lǝ mba eto akpa lǝmbǝ ale lǝ bafo bɔyɛ lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ bǝ bentusǝ . Bomu lǝ bǝtǝkǝko mi kama lǝ bǝnyǝ ǝsuǝale balosǝ .
Bekplatsya bǝ lǝ diyuǝ lǝ lɛkɛ lǝ mi ku betidi kenke eto nti , nya lǝ bekplatsya lǝ bisiǝ nkpǝ kɛnkɛ . Itsyise kuutsyuǝ saa embunyǝ Bonamute lǝ wenyifo kɛnkɛ .
Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ lǝ Onanto eto lefonǝ eto kusu manya mi . Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ biǝntǝ kuutsyuǝ saa tǝ lǝ binyǝ ɔblɔ kekleke bǝ inǝ bulǝ eboko betidi kpǝ ǝsuǝ lǝ bafiani babuayifo .
Bebe biǝ mi kuutsyuǝ saa mamfiani ɔsɔnɔdi nye fe nwǝ lǝmbǝ bofokanɔ fe Esau seka , wǝ dífi wǝ sininǝdidi ófloma ku didisa eto ɔkpɛ ɔni hã .
Kama kama fe kase binyii , ɔ́bɛbɛ ku binǝntu nkǝ eni lǝ ofo wǝ anto eto atsyɔkpoko . Fɛɛ wátɔnɔ útǝ wǝ , itsyise wámfo kusu saa bunyǝ lǝ ofloma lesa nǝ úkeyifo útsyǝ .
Itsyise inni Sinai eto kɔtini ko utidi loofo bunyǝ ketidi ɔflɔ bíbǝ , fe kase Israel bebi díyifo . Mfó ketuntu suu ka diti kpii , nya ufiebi nlɛ bɔsɔ kekleke nkpe , fɛɛ kɔtɔni komǝ nlɛ bunyǝ diadiadia .
Kakpatsyaku ka nlɛ bufǝ ku ɔkɔɛ wǝ nlɛ bɔbɔ ketsyi mfó lɛ bole , nya mba nlɛ nya bɔnɔ álɛ lekpakpa bǝnkǝ bensila bǝ baanɔ kolesa nko bio .
Itsyise bembofo buńnyǝ kanɔ kɔfi ko nlɛ mǝ bɔtɛyi nkǝ , “ Lǝ ubuki uni kulaa tsya wǝ eto kokpa ditidi kɔtini komǝǝ , bakpɔ wǝ aba balo . ”
Lǝ sitintii , nya bǝlǝkǝ báte mfó kpe sikpi tinti bǝ Moses kosate átɛyi nkǝ , “ Sikpi ko dímuǝ mɛ , nya mintinkǝ ! ”
Bomu mi alɛɛ , Sion eto kɔtini komǝ ɔflɔ bíbǝ . Bíbǝ Onanto wǝ nsi nkpǝ eto umǝ wǝ ni Yerusalem kato ku wǝ batɔnkpe ba bembofo bokla ba lekpe disi mfo ɔflɔ .
Bíbǝ disuǝyuǝ eto disikakpekɔ ku Onanto eto bebininǝ ba eto aye báwɔni bakpe lǝ Onanto eto kukue kato ɔflɔ . Bíbǝ bińyǝ lǝ Onanto , kawunsiǝ kenke eto okponkpo ku basɛɛ ba béyifo lɛflɔ eto awɔnɔ eto nti .
Nya mfó bíbǝ Yesu wǝ laafo kǝtǝ lǝ kakle fɔfɔ kamǝ ɔflɔ kaka kɔtɔ ko ókpo lǝ bo disi luunǝ asa sɛɛ kpǝ eboko nnya nso Abel eto kɔtɔ .
Bebe kukɔnɔ biǝ bianni nwǝ nlɛ mi etiki budinko eto ɔkɔɛ . Itsyise lǝ mba dímentsyue koto nwǝ léboko mǝ Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ lǝ kasɔ mfo mámfo butsyetsyi kedu lǝ mǝ kotonǝnǝ ǝsuǝǝ , ntsyǝ yoofo bubǝ bǝ bo mba bátɛyi Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ itsyi kato ebofo butsyetsyi lǝ ni kɛnyɛ ?
Lefe nǝmfó wǝ ɔkɔɛ étinkǝsǝ kawunsiǝ kenke . Fɛɛ mɔmɔ útsyǝ bo kɛnyɛ nkǝ , “ Bioo , mǝǝbǝ kawunsiǝ kamǝ butinkǝsǝ . Nya inni nko mate tsya , bomu muutinkǝsǝ kato tsya nwunsǝ . ”
Ditiki nǝmfo bǝ , “ Bioo ” lǝ bote bǝ , Onanto ebulǝkǝ asa nnya dítinkǝ nnya ni asa nnya úyifo uwui lǝ nnya kǝńyǝnkɔ . Nya asa nnya dímentinkǝǝ , ebubu itsyǝ .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔsɔ ani bǝ sekakedikɔ ka lembofo butinkǝ áka bo kɔni . Lǝ nnya esoo , bítǝ lǝ bufi dibu ku sikpitete busumu wǝ lǝ kusu ko lɔɔkɛ wǝ ɔkɔɛ ǝsuǝ .
Itsyise bo Onanto ǝmǝ eyifo ute wǝ laatonsǝ lesa saa .
Bitǝ lǝ sɛyimila lǝ siyi mi ǝsuǝ fe bayimi .
Bianni bafɔ bofo , itsyise ɛyɛ lǝ nyamfo ǝsuǝǝ , bǝtsyuǝ áfo Onanto eto batɔnkpe , fɛɛ bánte nko .
Bekloma mba bákpe lǝ Aba eto diyo tsya fe mba mi ku mǝ nlabe mfó . Nko kee , bekloma mba banlɛ ohiã bote fe mi ku mǝ banlɛ ohiã bote .
Usǝ ku usiǝ siǝ nkpǝ lǝ lelabi ǝsuǝ , nya ele bǝ utsyuǝ saa fi dibu utǝ kǝsiǝ . Nya kuutsyuǝ mamfe wǝ utsyuǝ kama , itsyise Onanto ebokponko mba leedi asɔnɔ , kakpo kusǝ nye kusiǝ lekpo .
Mansɛsǝ ǝnǝmi tsya lǝ atabi ǝsuǝ . Bomu bitǝ lǝ lesa nǝ nte mi lǝ didufǝ mi ǝnǝ . Itsyise Onanto átɛyi nkǝ , “ Mǝmboyani mi ntsyǝ kulefe , nya membulǝkǝ ato lǝ mi ǝsuǝ tsya kulefe . ”
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ bɔtɛyi taa bo ketu kǝmiǝ boǝ , “ Bonamute ni mɔ ɔwunsǝkotsyuǝ , nyaso mǝmbote sikpi . Be utiditsyuǝ loofo mɛ buyifo ? ”
Bekloma mi batɔnkotɔnko ba dísiǝ ba lɛtɛyi mi Onanto eto Ditiki Sɛɛ nǝmǝ . Bekloma kase bǝsiǝ nkpǝ ku kase báfo Onanto bánɔ lǝ bɛyɛ le mǝ kayɛkɔ lǝ bofokanɔ ǝsuǝ .
Yesu Kristo aamfloma kulefe . Fe kase útsyǝ lǝ lefe nǝ léfe mǝǝ , nko ke unte mɔmɔ ku lefe nǝ luubǝ kenke tsya nɛ .
Biǝntǝ lǝ asatete akpa akpa nnya lǝmbǝ disi ku akpa lǝ ɛwɛ mi ekpe lǝ benya kusu . Onanto eto lefonǝ hã laakpe bo nkɛale , nya inni afi nnya lɛyɛ lǝ lesadidi ǝsuǝ . Mba laayɛ lǝ afi nyamfo ǝsuǝ ǝǝnnyǝ bɔwunsǝko nye kutǝkǝ ketsyiko lǝ nnya ǝsuǝ .
Boo , bokpe kedikǝtǝkɔ eto leba nǝ ǝsuǝ asa nnya boedi , nya mba lǝǝtǝ kedi lǝ Yudafɔ eto kedikǝtǝkɔ , yanle bǝ bedi betsyiko lǝ bo ole .
Usumunyǝ Ninǝ Kenke ǝmǝ eefi ubuki eto kɔtɔ kedufǝnko kaka ni Kakɛnkɛkɔ Kenke . Mfó weesu kǝtǝ kedi katɔ bufikatsyɛ lǝ betidi ba kenke eto abua eto disi . Fɛɛ baatonsǝ bebuki eto sinǝ siamǝ lǝ kabanto .
Mmǝ kenke seka ini bǝ Yesu tsya ǝnyǝ kanyi lǝ umǝ ǝmǝ eto kabanto bǝ lǝ uflǝ betidi eto abua uwui ɛyɛ lǝ wǝ kɔtɔ ǝsuǝ .
Nyaso bitǝ lǝ busu botsyako wǝ lǝ kabanto mfó lǝ bakpe bo kofani faa , fe kase bákpe wuntsya kofani .
